#23002011	Anzanga apamtima , ndikukudembeterani ninga alendo , pontho okhonda khazikika padziko yapansi pano kuti muleke kuteweza pikhumbo pya manungo pile pimbamenyana na moyo wanu wauzimu . 
#23002012	Makhaliro anu pakati pa anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu akhale adidi , towera angakupambizirani kuti ndimwe anthu akudawika , adzadzindikire mabasa anu adidi , natenepo anadzakuza Mulungu pansiku ya kudza kwache pontho .

#23002019	Mulungu anadzakutsanzayisani thangwi ya penepi , ngakhala imwe munapirira nyatwa zidakhonda thema imwe kuziona thangwi imwe mwadzindikira kufuna kwa Mulungu . 
#23002020	Pana chinthu chanji chakuti akusimbeni nacho ngakhala munapirira na kumenywa kudathema imwe kuona kule thangwi yakuti mwadawa ? Mbwenye ngakhala munapirira nyatwa zinaona imwe podi kwene kuti mwachita pyakulungama , penepo Mulungu anadzakutsanzayisani .

#23002024	Khristu ene adathukula pyakudawa pyathu m'manungo mwache pamtanda , towera tileke khala na moyo wakufuna kuchita pyakudawa , mbwenye tikhale na moyo wakufuna kuchita pyakulungama . Imwe mwawangiswa na pironda pyache .

#23003002	thangwi iwo anadzaona makhaliro anu adidi , pontho achilemedzo .

#23003015	Mbwenye Khristu athema kukhala wakugopeka mumtima mwanu , thangwi iye ndi Mbuya . Ndzidzi onsene sasanyikani kutawira anthu ambakuvunzani pya chidikhiro china imwe ale ,

#23003017	Mphyadidi kubonera thangwi ya kuchita pyadidi , ngakhala nkhufuna kwa Mulungu , kusiyana na kubonera thangwi ya kuchita pinthu pyakudawika .

#23003019	mwenemo mbali na moyo muuzimu adenda kalalika kuna mizimu ikhali pauperezo ile .

#23004001	Podi Khristu adava kupha m'manungo mwache , sasawambo imwe mwathema kukhala na manyerezero onthowo mbamusasanyike kuva kupha; thangwi munthu anava kupha m'manungo mwacheyo nkhabeve pinthu na kudawa tayu . 
#23004002	Kubuluka chinchino kwenda m'tsogolo , khalani moyo wanu onsene wapansi pano wakutongwa na kufuna kwa Mulungu nee na pikhumbo pya umunthu tayu .

#23004010	Munthu onsene athema kuphatisa basa mtukwa udatambira iye kubulukira kuna Mulungu kutumikira nawo anzache . Khalani ninga akadamu adidi akudziwa kuphatisa basa mwadidi mitukwa yamtundu na mtundu yakubulukira kuna Mulungu .

40001018	Kubalwa kwa Yesu Khristu kudachitika tenepa : Mache , Maria adavunzirwa na Yosefe , mbwenye mbadzati gona pabodzi , adapiona kuti iye anadzakhala na mwana kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena . 
40001019	Yosefe akhali munthu wakuchita pyakulungama ndzidzi onsene , mbwenye hadafuna kuti achitise manyadzo Maria pakwecha tayu , natenepo adasasanya njira yakuti amwalane naye mwakukhonda dziwa anthu .

40002009	Natenepo iwo adenda , mbali panjira adaona nyenyezi yontho ile ikhadaona iwo kumabulukiro dzuwa . Pidaiona iwo , adakomerwa pyakwanga pene . Iyo idenda patsogolo pawo kufikirana idakaimira padzulu pambuto pakhali mwana pale . Iwo adapita m'nyumbamo . Tenepo pidaona iwo mwana na mache ene Maria pabodzi , adagodama pansi mbamulambira . Iwo adabulusa mitukwawo yakudula ya golidi , pyakununkhira pyakuchemerwa libano , na mafuta akununkhira akuchemerwa mure mbapipereka kuna Yesu .

40005003	" Ngakutsanzaya anthu ale ambadziwa kunyindira Mulungu kumbachita iwo thangwi Ufumu wa Kudzulu ngwawo . 
40005004	Ngakutsanzaya anthu ale anasintili ndzidzi uno , thangwi Mulungu anadzaapukuta misozi .

40005018	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti thambo na dziko mbipidzati buluka , pa mwambowo nee panadzafudzwa kalemba na kang'ono kene penu kansonga kalemba kene tayu kufikirana pinthu pyonsenepi pikwanekwane .

40005020	Ndikukupangani , mphapo , munakwanisa kupita mu Ufumu wa Kudzulu ngakhala ndimwe anthu akukhulupirika kupiringana afunzisi a mwambo na Afarisi pakuchita pinthu pinafuna Mulungu . Yesu afunzisa pya kuzhangali
40005021	" Imwe mwava kuti kalene anthu akhapangwa kuti , ' Lejcani kupha ; munthu angachita kwene penepi apisosera mseru yekha ene . '
40005022	Mbwenye chinchino ndikukupangani kuti munthu angazhangalirac mbaleache , apisosera mseru yekha ene . Munthu analonga mbaleache kuti , ' Iwe nkhabe basa ! ' anadzasumirwa kuthando ya miseru , pontho munthu anathula mbaleache kuti , ' Pupwe ' anadzaponywa kumoto wa kugehena . 
40005023	Natenepo iwe ungafuna kupereka mtukwa paguwa ya nsembe kuna Mulungu , penepo ungakumbuka kuti una mseru na mbaleako
40005024	mphyadidi kuti usiye mtukwakowo paguwapo mbauenda kaphatizana na mbaleakoyo , ungamala penepo , ubwerere mbukapereka mtukwa ule kuna Mulungu . 
40005025	" Ngakhala unango akusumira kuthando ya miseru mphyakufunika kuti uphatizane naye mbamuli panjira kwenda katongwa , thangwi ungafika kweneko iye anadzakupereka m'manja mwa nyakutonga miseru . Enewambo anadzakupereka m'manja mwa msirikali , tenepo msirikali anadzakuikha m'perezo . 
40005026	Ndikukupanga kuti iwe nkhabe dzabuluka m'perezomo kufikirana wamalisa kupagali mangawa onsene a mseru wakowo . 
40005027	" Imwe mwava kuti pidalongwa kalene kuti , ' Lekani chita uputa . '
40005028	Mbwenye chinchino ndikukupangani kuti : munthu angaona mkazi mbamsirira , penepo pene achita naye kale uputa mumtima mwache . 
40005029	Tenepo diso yako yakumadyo ngakhala ikukuchitisa kuti udawe , ikonombole uitaye . Mphyadidi kuti utaye phindi ibodzi ya manungo ako kusiyana nakuti manungo ako onsene aponywe kugehena . 
40005030	Ngakhala dzanjako yakumadyo ikukuchitisa kuti udawe , igwande uitaye . Mphyadidi kuti utaye dzanjako ibodzi kusiyana nakuti manungo ako onsene akaponywe kugehena . 
40005031	" Kalene pidalongwa pontho tenepa : ' Munthu angamwalana na mkazache alembe kalata yakudziwisa pya kumwalanako . '
40005032	Mbwenye chinchino ndikukupangani kuti : ngakhala mamuna amwalana na mkazache na mathangwi anango ene , nee kuti okhonda khulupirika , mkaziyo mbasembwa pontho , mamunayo achitisa kuti mkaziyo achite uputa . Tenepo mamuna amsembayo achitambo uputa . 
40005033	" Imwe mwapiva pontho kuti kalene anthu akhapangwa kuti , ' Lekani kuswa mapangano , mbwenye chitani pidadumbira imwe kuna Mbuya . '
40005034	Mbwenye chinchino ndikukupangani kuti mungachita mapangano na munthu muleke kudumbira . Lekani kudumbira na kudzulu , thangwi kweneko ndi mpando wachifumu wa Mulungu , 
40005035	nee na dziko yapansi , thangwi mphakutsamisira manyalo ache , penu na Yerusalemu ene , thangwi wenewo ndi mzinda wa Mfumu Wamkulu . 
40005036	Lekani kudumbira na pakhosi panu , thangwi imwe nkhabe kwanisa kuchitisa kuti tsitsi ikhale yakuchena penu yakuswipa tayu . 
40005037	Mulonge kwene kuti ' Ande ' penu Tayu ' — pinango pyonsene pinathimizira imwe kulonga mphyakubulukira kuna Satana . 
40005038	" Imwe mwava kuti pidalongwa kalene kuti : ' Diso ibweze diso , dzino ibweze dzino . '
40005039	Mbwenye chinchino ndikukupangani kuti lekani bwezera mwanzanu angakuchitirani chakudawika . Ngakhala munthu akugasani mbama kuphutu yakumadyo , mpaseni phutu inango yakumabzereyo kuti amenye pontho . 
40005040	Pontho ngakhala munthu ali nawe mseru mbakukakamiza kuti umpase mayalako , umpase akwate pabodzi na mkanjo wako ene . 
40005041	Pontho ngakhala nyankhondo akukukakamiza kuti umthukhulire mtolo wache pontho umperekeze matanyo chikwi chibodzi , ndoko naye pikwi piwiri . 
40005042	Ngakhala munthu unango akupempha chinthu , umpase ; unango angafuna kukubwereka chinthu , umbwereke . 
40005043	" Imwe mwava kuti pidalongwa kalene kuti , ' Funani ashamwali anu , chitani pyaumalwa kuna anyamalwanu . '
40005044	Mbwenye chinchino ndikukupangani kuti funani anyamalwanu pontho pemphererani ambakusanyisani ale , 
40005045	towera mukhale ana a Babanu wa Kudzulu . Thangwi iye ambagasa dzuwa pana anthu adidi na akuipa ene , pontho ambavumbisa mvula kuna ale ambachita udidi na kuna ale ambachita pyakudawika . 
40005046	Mulungu anakwanisa tani kukufupani ngakhala imwe mumbafuna kwene anthu ale ambafunambo imwe ? Na anyakukhomesa msonkho ene ambapichita penepi basi !
40005047	Ngakhala mumbamwenyika ashamwali anu ene basi , penepa mwasiyana tani na pile pimbachita anthu ene pyawo ? Na anthu ene okhonda dziwa Mulungu ambachitambo chibodzibodzi . 
40005048	Khalani akuthema monsene mwene — ninga Babanu wa Kudzulu ngwakuthema monsene mwene !
40006001	" Onesesani kuti muleke chita mabasanu akulungama mwakuoniwa , towera anthu akusimbeni napyo . Mungachita tenepo nee munadzatambira na mfupo ene kubulukira kudzulu kuna Babanu tayu . 
40006002	" Tenepo mungapasa chinthu nyakutcherenga , lekani kupilalika kuna anthu ninga mumbachitira mfakafaka zinangozi m'nyumba zakupemphereramo na m'misikamu . Iwo ambachita tenepo towera asimbwe na anthu anango . Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti enewo apagalwi kale mfupo wawo . 
40006003	Mbwenye ngakhala mukuphedza nyakutcherenga , mupichite mwakubisika mwakuti shamwalianu wapamtima aleke kupidziwa .

40006006	Mbwenye mungafuna kupemphera , ndokoni kusubi kwanu , fungani msuwo mbamupemphera kuna Babanu okhonda oneka ule . Tenepo Babanu ule ambaona pimbachita imwe mwakubisika , anadzakufupani . 
40006007	" Mungapemphera , lekani bwerezabwereza mafala onthoonthowo ninga mumbachitira anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu , ale ambanyerezera kuti Mulungu anava pinapempha iwo na kupemphera kwawo mwakulapha . 
40006008	Lekani khala ninga iwo , thangwi Babanu ambadziwa kale pimbafuna imwe mbamudzati pempha .

40006011	Tipasenimbo pyakudya pyathu pya lero .

40006014	" Mungalekerera pyakudawa pyakuchitirani anthu anango , Babanu wa Kudzulu anadzalekererambo pyakudawa pyanu .

40006016	" Ngakhala mukupimana kudya , lekani onesa makhuzi kunkhope kwanu ninga mumbachitira mfakafaka . Iwo ambachita makhuzi towera aoniwe na anthu onsene kuti akupimana kudya . Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti enewo atambira kale mfupo wawo . 
40006017	Ngakhala mukupimana kudya , musambe nkhope pontho musapule tsisi yanu , 
40006018	towera anthu anango aleke kupidziwa kuti mukupimana kudya , mbwenye apidziwe ndi Babanu ene wakukhonda oneka ule basi . Babanu ule ambaona pimbachita imwe mwakubisika , anadzakufupani . 
40006019	" Lekani kupikoyera mfuma pansi pano , kule mabelethe na midzimbiri pinakwanisa kuivunga , pontho mbava zinakwanisa kuswa mbizibamo .

40006021	Thangwi mitimanu inadzakhala ikunyerezera kunakoya imwe mfumanuko . 
40006022	" Maso ndi nyale ya manungo . Ngakhala maso ako ali mwadidi , manungo ako onsene ambakhalambo na cheza . 
40006023	Mbwenye ngakhala maso ako hali mwadidi tayu , manungo ako ambakhala mumdima . Natenepo ngakhala cheza chanu chasanduka mdima , munadzakhala mumdima wakugoswa pyakwanga . 
40006024	" Nkhabe nyabasa anakwanisa kutumikira ambuya awiri tayu , thangwi anadzazonda mbodzi mbafuna unangoyo ; anadzakhulupirika kuna mbodzi mbalulupisa unangoyo . Imwe nkhabe kwanisa kutumikira Mulungu na ndzidzi onthowo kutumikira kobiri tayu . 
40006025	" Ndi thangwi yache ndikukupangani kuti lekani swipa mtima na moyo wanu kuti munadyanji , munamwanji penu munavalanji ? Ayi moyo si wakufunika pyakwanga tayu kupiringana pyakudya ? Manungombo si akufunika pyakwanga tayu kupiringana nguwo ?
40006026	Ngayang'anani mbalame , nee zimbalima , penu kuvuna , penu kukoya phoso m'pikwa tayu , mbwenye Babanu wa Kudzulu ambaziyang'anira mwadidi . Apo imwe , si imwe akufunika pyakwanga kupiringana mbalame tayu ?
40006027	Mbani wa imwe anakwanisa kuthimizira nsikue ibodzi ene basi pa nsiku zache na kuswipa mtima ?
40006028	" Mphapo mumbaswipiranji mtima kuti munavalanji ? Ngayang'anani maluwa ambakula tani : maluwa nee ambaphata basa , penu kupisasanyira okha ene nguwo tayu . 
40006029	Mbwenye ndikukupangani kuti nee na Mfumu Solomo , na kufuma konsene kudachita iye , akhali na nguwo zakubalika ninga maluwawa tayu . 
40006030	Apo ngakhala Mulungu ambavazika ninga tenepa maudzu amtsanga ale ambalila kukhala lero ene basi , mangwana mwache mbaponywa pamoto , ayi weneyu nkhabe dzakuvazikani mwadidi tayu . Imwe anthu a chikhulupiro chakuchepa !
40006031	" Natenepo lekani sanyika na kupivunza kuti , ' Lero tinadyanji ? penu , ' Tinamwanji ? ' , penu ' Tinavalanji ? '
40006032	Thangwi ambapifuna pinthu penepi mbanthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu . Babanu wa Kudzulu ambadziwa kuti imwe mumbafuna pinthu pyonsenepi . 
40006033	Mphapo chakutoma imwe mwathema kutsalakana pya Ufumu wa Mulungu , pontho na pimbafuna iye kuti mupichite , tenepo iye anadzakupasani pinthu pinango pyonsenepi . 
40006034	Tenepo lekani swipa mtima na pya mangwana , thangwi pya mangwana mphyamangwana . Nsiku yonsene ina nyatwa zache zakukwanakwanaletu . 
40007001	" Lekani tonga mseru anthu anango , towera Mulungu aleke dzakutonganimbo .

40007010	Penu angampempha nsomba , ambampasa nyoka ?
40007011	Ngakhala imwe anthu akuipa mumbadziwa kupasa ananu pinthu pyadidi , apo Babanu wa Kudzulu ndiye tani ? Ayi iye angapichimwane kupereka pinthu pyadidi kuna anyakumpempha ale ? "
40007012	" Chitirani anthu anango pinthu pimbafuna imwe kuti iwo akuchitireni : mwambo wa Mose na pifunziso pya maprofeti pyagona penepa .

40007014	Mbwenye msuwo wakupitira kumoyo ngwakupapanula pyakwanga , pontho njira yakwenda kweneko njakunensa pyakwanga . Tenepo anthu ambagumana njira yeneyi ngakuchepa . 
40007015	" Khalani m'maso na maprofeti akunama ; iwo ambadza kuna imwe akuoneka ninga mabira kunja kwawo , mbwenye m'bwalo mwawo akhala ninga mibinzi yakugoswa !
40007016	Munadzaadziwa na pimbachita iwo . Muti waminga nee ungabale masawu tayu , penu muti wamkotamu kubala makuyu tayu . 
40007017	Muti wadidi umbabala nsapo zadidi , mbwenye muti wakuipa umbabalambo nsapo zakuipa .

40007020	Natenepo munadzaadziwa maprofeti akunama na mabasa ambaphata iwo .

40009015	Yesu adalonga mbati , " Imwe mukunyerezera kuti anthu akuchemerwa kuphwando yakukazhali anatsukwala mwenemo nyakusemba ali nawo pabodzi ? Nkhabe tayu , mbwenye ndzidzi unadzafika unafuna dzabuluswa nyakusembayo pakati pawo , tenepo iwo anadzapimana kudya . "
40009016	" Nkhabe munthu ambakwata chigamba cha nguwo itswa mbachisonera panguwo yakale tayu , thangwi chigamba chachinchinocho chinanyomola na kukuziratu benga ya panguwo yakale ile . 
40009017	Pontho nkhabe munthu ambatsanyulira vinyu wachinchino m'mabudu a nthembe akuphatisirwa kale basa tayu , thangwi mabuduwo anadzatumbuka , vinyuyo mbakhuthukira pansi , pontho mabuduwo anadzavungika . Chadidi chache vinyu wachinchino atsanyulirwe m'mabudu achinchino . Tenepo pyonsenepyo pinadzakoyeka mwadidi . "
40009018	Pikhali Yesu m'kati kulonga mafala enewa , mkadamu unango wa Chiyuda adadza kuna iye mbagodama pamaso pache mbalonga mbati , " Mwananga wamkazi afa chinchino pano . Apo tendeni mukamsanjike manjanu , tenepo iye anakhala pontho na moyo . "
40009019	Tenepo Yesu pabodzi na anyakufunzache adalamuka mbamtewera . 
40009020	Mkazi , akhadadwala utenda wamsambamsamba pyaka khumi na piwiri ule , adadza m'nduli mbaphata chikhwayeti cha mkanjo wa Yesu . 
40009021	Iye adalonga yekha ene mbati , " Ndingakhuya kwene mkanjo wache , ndinati ndiwange . "
40009022	Yesu adazungunuka mbamuona mkaziyo mbalonga mbati , " Wanga mtima , Mwananga ! Chikhulupiro chako chakuwangisa . " Tenepo na ndzidzi onthowo mkazi ule adawangiratu . 
40009023	Tenepo Yesu adenda kapita m'nyumba ya mkadamu ule . Pidaona iye anyakuimba pitoliro na anyakulira maliro ale , 
40009024	iye adalonga mbati , " Bulukani panja , monsenene ! Mwana mtsikanayu hadafe tayu — alila gona kwene ! " Tenepo onsene mwenemo adamseka Yesu . 
40009025	Mbwenye si ndzidzi pidabuluswa anthu panja , Yesu adenda kusubi kwa mwanayo mbamphata pamkono , mbamulamusa mtsikanayo . 
40009026	Mbiri yeneyi idafala konsene kukhundu yeneyo ya dziko . 
40009027	Yesu adabuluka pambutopo . Tenepo mukhaenda iye , maboliboli awiri adatoma kumtewera m'nduli mwache . Iwo adakhuwa mbati , " Mwana Davite , tiverenimbo nsisi ife ! "
40009028	Pidapita Yesu m'nyumba , maboliboli ale adadza kuna iye . Tenepo iye adaavunza mbati , " Kadi imwe mukukhulupiradi kuti ine ndinakwanisa kukuwangisani ? " Iwo adatawira mbati , " Ande , Mbuya ! "
40009029	Tenepo Yesu adaaphata maso awo mbalonga mbati , " Pichitike ninga munakhulupira imwe ! "
40009030	Penepo kuona kwawo kudabwerera . Yesu adalonga mwakugogomeza mbati , " Lekani kapanga munthu na mbodzi ene tayu . "
40009031	Mbwenye iwo adenda mbakavekesa mbiri ya Yesu konsene kukhundu yeneyo ya dziko . 
40009032	Pikhaenda amuna ale , anthu anango adadza kuna Yesu na munthu wakukhonda longa , thangwi iye akhali na mzimu wakuipa . 
40009033	Mbwenye si ndzidzi pikhadabuluswa mzimu wakuipa , munthu ule adatoma kulonga . Natenepo anthu onsene adadzudzumika mbalonga mbati , " Chipo nee tidzati taona pinthu ninga penepi tayu mu Israele muno ! "
40009034	Mbwenye Afarisi adalonga mbati , " Ndi mfumu wa mizimu yakuipa , ule ambampasa mphamvu zakubulusira mizimuyi . "
40009035	Yesu adafamba m'maluwani na m'midzi yonsene . Iye adafunzisa m'nyumba zakupemphereramo , adalalika Mphangwa Zadidi za Ufumu wa Mulungu , pontho adawangisa anthu akukhala na utenda wamtundu na mtundu . 
40009036	Pidaona iye mwinji , adava nawo nsisi , thangwi akhali akusanyika pontho na akutaya mtima ninga mabira akusowa makabuswa . 
40009037	Iye adalonga kuna anyakufunzache mbati , " Pinthu pyakuvuna mphizinji , mbwenye anyabasa akupivuna ngakuchepa . 
40009038	Pempherani kuna Mulungu , mwenechiro munda ule , kuti atumize anyabasa kuti akavune . "
40010001	Yesu adachemera anyakufunzache khumi na awiri ale pabodzi mbaapasa utongi wakubulusira mizimu yakuipa , pontho kuwangisa utenda onsene . 
40010002	Madzina a anyakutumwa khumi na awiri ale mbawa : wakutoma , Simoni wakuthulwa Peturo na mbaleache Andrea ; Yakobo na mbaleache Yohani , ana Zebedeo ale ;
40010003	Filipi na Batolomeo ; Tomasi na Mateo , nyakukhomesa msonkho ; Yakobo mwana Alufeo , na Tadeo ;
40010004	Simoni mbodzi wa m'gulu ya Ayuda wakufuna kudzesa utumbe kuna Israele ule na Yudasi Iskarioti , adapereka Yesu kuna anyamalwache ule . 
40010005	Yesu adatuma anyakutumwa khumi na awiriwa mbaapanga mbati , " Lekani kwenda kunthemba ya anthu okhonda khala Ayuda penu kumaluwani a Samaria . 
40010006	Mbwenye muende kuna anthu a ku Israele , ale akhala ninga mabira akutayika . 
40010007	Ndokoni mukalalike kuti , ' Mulungu ali chifupi kukhazikisa Ufumu wache . '
40010008	Kawangiseni atenda na anyamatanya , kalamuseni anyakufa , pontho kabuluseni mizimu yakuipa . Mwatambira okhonda pagali , tenepo kaperekeni okhonda pagalisa . 
40010009	Lekani kwata kobiri m'mabudu mwanu , 
40010010	penu mabudu a paulendo , mayala a papezi , nkhwaira penu mthondodzo tayu . Nyabasa athema kupaswa pinasowa iye . 
40010011	" Mungafika muluwani penu m'mudzi , mukayang'ane munthu anafima kukutambirani mwadidiyo . Mukakhale naye pabodzi kufikirana mubuluke pambutopo . 
40010012	Mungakapita m'nyumba , kalongeni kuti , ' Pyonsene pikhale pyadidi kuna imwe ! '
40010013	Ngakhala anthu a m'nyumbamo anakutambirani mwadidi , kaasiyireni mwenyikiro wanu wa mtendere ; mbwenye ngakhala hanakutambirani mwadidi tayu , kathukuleni mwenyikiro wanuwo muende nawo pyanu . 
40010014	Ngakhala anthu a m'mudzi penu muluwani hanakutambirani mwadidi tayu , penu mbakhonda kukuveserani , bulukani pyanu pambutopo , pontho kagubudzeni fiimbi kumanyalo kwanu kuonesa kuti mwaakhonda . 
40010015	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti pa Nsiku inafima Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , iye anadzavera nsisi anthu a kumizinda ya Sodomu na Gomora kupiringana anthu a kuluwani yeneyo . 
40010016	" Ngavani ! Ndikukutumani sasawa ninga mabira pakati pa mibinzi . Natenepo mukhale akuchenjera ninga nyoka , pontho akufulika ninga nkhangaiwa . 
40010017	Kakhaleni m'maso , thangwi panadzabwera anthu dzakumangani mbaenda namwe kuthando ya miseru , pontho anadzakukwapulani m'nyumba zakupemphereramo . 
40010018	Na thangwi ya ine , imwe munadzasumirwa kuna atongi na mafumu , kuti mulonge Mphangwa Zadidi kuna iwo na kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . 
40010019	Angakuperekani kuthando ya miseru , lekani swipa mtima tayu na pinafuna imwe kalonga , penu munakalonga tani , mbwenye ndzidzi ungadzakwana , munati mudzapaswe pyakuti mudzalonge . 
40010020	Thangwi mafala anafuna imwe dzalongawo hanadzakhala anu tayu , mbwenye anadzakhala akubulukira kuna Mzimu Wakuchena wa Babanu Mulungu kulonga kudzera muna imwepo . 
40010021	" Anthu anadzapereka abale awo kuti aphiwe , pontho ababambo anadzachita chibodzibodzi kuna anawo . Anambo anadzapandukira makolo awo mbadzaaphesa . 
40010022	Anthu onsene anadzakuzondani thangwi mumbanditewera . Mbwenye munthu anapirira mbafika kumamalisiroyo anadzapulumuswa . 
40010023	Angadzakusanyisani m'mudzi ubodzi , muthawire kumudzi unangowo . Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti nee munakwanisa kumalisa mabasanu tayu m'maluwani onsene a mu Israele , mwenemo Mwana Munthu mbadzati fika . 
40010024	" Nkhabe nyakufunza anapiringana mfunzisi wache tayu , penu bitchu kupiringana mbuyache . 
40010025	Tenepo mphyakukwanakwana kuti nyakufunza akhale sasawa ninga mfunzisi wache , pontho bitchu kukhala sasawa ninga mbuyache . Ngakhala mkadamu wa banja akuthulwa Belezebule , anthumbo a m'banjamo anadzathulwa na dzina yakuipa kupiringana yeneyi . 
40010026	" Natenepo lekani gopa anthu , thangwi pinabisala chinchinopi pinadzarununkhulwa , pontho pyachibisobiso pyonsene pinadzadziwika . 
40010027	Pinakupangani ine m'chibisobisopi munadzapilonga pakwecha , pontho pikhava imwe m'chiwerewere munadzapilalika na pansoyi ya nyumba . 
40010028	Mphapo lekani chita mantha na ule ambapha manungo okha ene , mbwenye iwo nkhabe kwanisa kupha mzimu tayu . Mbwenye chitani mantha na Mulungu ule anakwanisa kuvunga manungo anu na mzimu wanu ene pabodzi kugehena . 
40010029	Ntchenga ziwiri zimbaguliswa na kobiri ibodzi , kwache nkhabe ntchenga na ibodzi ene imbagwa pansi Babanu mbakhonda kuidziwa . 
40010030	Imwembo , tsisi yonsene ya mumsolo mwanu yamala lengeswa . 
40010031	Natenepo lekani kugopa , thangwi imwe ndimwe akufunika pyakwanga kupiringana ntchenga !
40010032	" Ngakhala munthu anatawira pamaso pa anthu kuti iye ngwanga , inembo ndinadzamchitira chibodzibodzi pamaso pa Babanga wa kudzulu . 
40010033	Mbwenye ngakhala munthu anandikhonda pamaso pa anthu , inembo ndinadzamkhonda pamaso pa Babanga wa kudzulu . 
40010034	" Lekani nyerezera kuti ndadzera dzapereka mtendere padziko yapansi . Nkhabe , ine sidadza na mtendere tayu , mbwenye ndadza na nthonga . 
40010035	Ndadzera dzalekanisa baba na mwanache wamamuna , mama na mwanache wamkazi , mebzala na mkwenyache . 
40010036	Anyamalwache munthu anadzakhala anthu a m'banja mwache monthomo . 
40010037	" Munthu anafuna babache na mache pyakwanga kupiringana ine , nee athema kukhala nyakufunzanga tayu ; munthu anafuna mwanache wamamuna , penu wamkazi pyakwanga kupiringana ine , nee athema kukhala nyakufunzanga tayu . 
40010038	Munthu anakhonda sasanyika kuona nyatwa penu kufa kwene mbanditewera , nee athema kukhala nyakufunzanga tayu . 
40010039	Munthu anafuna kupulumusa moyo wache , anadzautaya , mbwenye munthu anafuna kutaya moyo wache thangwi ya ineyo , anati adzaupulumuse . 
40010040	" Munthu anakutambirani mwadidiyo , atambirambo na ine ene . Pontho munthu ananditambira mwadidiyo , atambirambo na adandituma ule . 
40010041	Munthu anatambira mwadidi nyabasa wa Mulungu , thangwi yakuti ndi nyabasa wa Mulungu , weneyo anadzafupwa sasawa ninga nyabasa ule . Pontho munthu anatambira mwadidi munthu wakulungama , thangwi yakuti ngwakulungama , weneyo anadzafupwa sasawa ninga munthu wakulungamayu . 
40010042	Munthu anapasa ndiko ya madzi akutonthola kuna mbodzi wa anyakufunzanga waning'onoletu , thangwi yakuti ndi nyakunditewera , ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti weneyo anati adzatambire mfupo wache . "
40011001	Pidamala Yesu kulonga mafala enewa kuna anyakufunzache khumi na awiri , iye adabuluka pambutopo mbaenda kafunzisa na kulalika kumaluwani a chifupi na kweneko . 
40011002	Yohani Nyakubatiza mbali m'perezo , adava pyonsene pikhachita Khristu pile , tenepo adatuma anango mwa anyakufunzache kwenda kuna iye kamvunza . Iwo adamvunza mbati ,

40012001	Kubuluka penepo Yesu akhagwanda na m'minda ya tirigu pa Nsiku Yakupuma . Tenepo anyakufunzache akhali na njala mbatoma kukwedzula ngala za tirigu mbanununa .

40012018	" Uyu ndi nyabasanga , asankhula ine ule , iye ngwapamtima panga , pontho ndimbakomerwa naye pyakwanga . Ndinadzatumiza Mzimu wanga pana iye , tenepo iye anadzalalika kuna madzinza onsene kuti ine ndimbatonga mseru mwakulungama .

40012020	Iye hanadzamalisa mtete wakuthyoka kale , penu kuthimisa nsakali yakupuchira tayu , kufikirana iye achitise kuti anthu avere matongero a Mulungu . 
40012021	Tenepo anthu a madzinza onsene anadzamnyindira . "
40012022	Anthu anango adadza kuna Yesu na munthu wakukhonda longa na kuona kwene , thangwi akhali na mzimu wakuipa . Yesu adamuwangisa , tenepo iye adakwanisa pontho kulonga na kuona kwene . 
40012023	Mwinji onsene udadzudzumika na pidachita Yesu pile mbavunza mbati , " Ayi angakhale Mwana Davite weneyu ? "
40012024	Pidava Afarisi penepi , adatawira mbati , " Kubulusa mizimu yakuipa kumbachita iyeku , kumbabulukira kwinango tayu , mbwenye kuna Belezebule , mfumu wa mizimu yakuipa , ule ambampasa mphamvu zakuchitira penepi . "
40012025	Yesu adadziwa kale pikhanyerezera iwo , tenepo adaapanga mbati , " Dziko ingagawikana yokha ene m'magulu mbimenyana , hinakwanisa kwenda m'tsogolo tayu , pontho luwani penu banja ingagawikana yokha ene m'magulu mbimenyana , inadzafudzika . 
40012026	Tenepo ngakhala gulu inamenyana na inzache mu ufumu wa Satana , kweneku nkhulonga kuti ufumuwo wagawikana kale m'magulu , tenepo chinchino unadzafudzika . 
40012027	Imwe mukulonga kuti ndimbabulusa mizimu yakuipa thangwi ambandipasa mphamvu zakuchitira penepi ndi Belezebule . Mphapo mbani ambapasa anyakuteweranu mphamvu zakubulusa nazo mizimu yakuipa ? Natenepo pimbachita anyakuteweranu pimbaonesa kuti pimbalonga imwe mphyakudawa . 
40012028	Nkhabe , si Belezebule tayu , mbwenye ndi Mzimu wa Mulungu , ule ambandipasa mphamvu zakubulusira mizimu yakuipa kutsikimizira kuti Mulungu akhazikisa kale Ufumu wache pakati panu . 
40012029	" Nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kuswa nyumba ya munthu wamphamvu mbakwata pinthu pyache pyonsene . Mbwenye chakutoma amange munthu wamphamvuyo . Angachita tenepo anakwanisa kupokosa pinthu pyonsene pya nyumbamo . 
40012030	" Munthu anapokanyisana na ineyo , nee ngwanga tayu ; munthu anakhonda kundiphedza kugumanyayo , kunachita iyeko nkhumwaza . 
40012031	Natenepo ndikukupangani kuti anthu anakwanisa kulekererwa pyakudawa pyawo pyonsene na mafala onsene akudawika analonga iwo ; mbwenye munthu angalongera Mzimu Wakuchena pyakuipa , nee anadzalekererwa pyakudawa pyache tayu . 
40012032	Munthu analongera Mwana Munthu pyakuipa anadzalekererwa , mbwenye munthu analongera Mzimu Wakuchena pyakuipayo , nee anadzalekererwave kubulukira chinchino kwenda m'tsogolo tayu . 
40012033	" Mungalonga kuti mutiwu ngwadidi , ndiye kuti nsapo zache nsadidi ; mungalonga kuti mutiwu ngwakuipa , ndiye kuti nsapo zache nsakuipa . Muti umbadziwika na nsapo zimbala iwo . 
40012034	Imwe nyoka , mungakwanise tani kulonga pinthu pyadidi mwenemo ndimwe akuipa ? Thangwi mulomo umbalonga pinthu pyakudzala mumtima . 
40012035	Munthu wadidi ambalonga pinthu pyadidi pimbakoya iye mumtima mwache ; munthu wakuipa ambalonga pyakuipa kubulukira m'pyakuipa pimbakoya iye mumtima mwache . 
40012036	" Mbwenye ndikukupangani kuti pa Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , munthu anadzakhala na mseru thangwi ya mafala apezi onsene alonga iye . 
40012037	Mulungu anadzakutongani mseru na mafalanu ontho adalonga imwe — kukupangani ngakhala ndimwe adidi penu akuipa . " Yesu apemphwa kuchita chidzindikiro
40012038	Tenepo afunzisi anango a mwambo na Afarisi anango adalonga mbati , " Mfunzisi , tinafuna tikuoneni mukuchita chidzindikiro . "
40012039	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Anthu a makaunomwe , ndimwe akuipa pontho okhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu . Mukufuna muone chidzindikiro ? Nkhabe ! Chidzindikiro chinafuna imwe paswa ndi chile cha mprofeti Yona ene basi . 
40012040	Ninga mudamalira Yona m'mimba mwa chinsomba nsiku zitatu mosiku na masikati , sasawambo Mwana Munthu anadzamala nsiku zitatu mosiku na masikati pansi m'mataka . 
40012041	Pa Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , anthu a mumzinda wa Ninevi anadzaimira kupokanya anthu a makauno , thangwi iwo adaleka pyakudawa pyawo pidava iwo kulalika kwa Yona . Chinchino ndikukupangani kuti pano pana unango wamkulu kupiringana Yona !
40012042	Pa Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , mfumukazi wa kudziko ya Sheba anadzaimira kupokanya anthu a makauno , thangwi iye adafamba nsinzo ukulu pyakwanga kavesera mafala a nzeru a Mfumu Solomo . Chinchino ndikukupangani kuti pano pana unango wamkulu kupiringana Solomoyo . 
40012043	" Mzimu wakuipa ungabuluka muna munthu , umbazungulirazungulira kunthemba zakusowa madzi kusaka mbuto yakuti upume . Ungakhonda kuigumana mbutoyo , 
40012044	umbalonga okha ene kuti , ' Ndinabwerera pyanga kunyumba kudabulukira ine kule . ' Tenepo umbabwereradi mbukagumana m'nyumbamo nkhabe pinthu , mwatswairwa , pontho mwamala sasanywa . 
40012045	Tenepo umbaenda kakwata mizimu inzache minomwe yakuipa pikulu kupiringana iwo ene mbibwera dzakhala mwenemo . Pakumalisira pache makhaliro a munthuyo ambanyanyiratu kuipa kupiringana pakutoma . Penepi mphile pinafuna dzachitika kuna anthu akuipa a makauno wa . "
40012046	Yesu akhali m'kati kulonga kuna anthu ale pidafika mache na abale ache . Iwo adaimira panja mbapempha kuti alonge naye .

40012048	Yesa adatawira mbati , " Mama na abale anga mbani ? "

40012050	Thangwi munthu anachita pinafuna Babanga wa kudzulu weneyo ndi mbaleanga , nyamainganga na mamanga . "
40013001	Nsiku yonthoyo Yesu adabuluka panyumbapo mbakakhala m'khundukhundu mwa nyanza kufunzisa . 
40013002	Mwinji udagumanyikana mwakumzungulira penepowo udakula pyakwanga mwakuti adapakira m'mwadiya mbakhala pyache mwenemo , mwinjimbo ule udaimira pagombe . 
40013003	Iye adaphatisa basa misangani kuapanga pinthu pizinji mbati , " Pidachitwa na nyakulima unango , ule adenda kawaza mbewu m'munda mwache . 
40013004	Pikhawaza iye mbewuzo , zinango zidagwera m'njira , tenepo mbalame zidadza mbizidzonkhona mbewuzo . 
40013005	Mbewu zinango zidagwera pambuto yachimwalamwala , pale pakhali na mataka akuchepa . Mbewuzo zidamera msanga thangwi mataka hadapita pansi mwakuzika tayu . 
40013006	Mbwenye pidakwira dzuwa , idavula umerawo . Na thangwi yakuti mitsitsi hidapita pansi mwakuzika tayu , umerawo udauma msangansanga . 
40013007	Mbewu zinango zidagwera m'matenthere a minga , ale adakula mbaphimbira umerawo . 
40013008	Mbwenye mbewu zinango zidagwera m'mataka adidi , tenepo mbewuzo zidabala ; zinango zidaikha maso dzana , zinango makumatanthatu , zinangombo makumatatu kupiringana zidawazwa zile . "
40013009	Tenepo Yesu adamalisa na kulonga mbati , " Ule ana makutu akuva , ave ! "

40013011	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Imwe mwapaswa udziwisi wa pinthu pyakubisika pya Ufumu wa Kudzulu , nee kuti pidapaswa kuna anthu enewa tayu . 
40013012	Thangwi munthu ana pinthu kaleyo anati adzapaswe pontho pinango ; mbwenye nyakusowaletu pinthuyo anadzapokwa na pinkiti pene pina iye kale . 
40013013	Thangwi imbaphatisa ine basa misangani ndingalonga kuna iwo njakuti aone , mbwenye aleke onesesa , ave , mbwenye aleke vesesa . 
40013014	Tenepo mafala a mprofeti Yesaya akwanekwane kuna iwo lero akuti , ' Anthuwa anadzava na kuva , kwache hanadzavesa tayu , anadzayang'ana na kuyang'ana , kwache hanadzaonesesa tayu . 
40013015	Thangwi misolo yawo yafa , pontho aphopha makutu na kufunga maso awo . Mbadakhonda chita tenepo , maso awo mbadaona , makutu awo mbadava , pontho misolo yawo mbidavesa , tenepo mbadazungunukira kuna ine , alonga Mulungu , inembo mbandidaawangisa . '
40013016	" Muna mwayi ndimwe , thangwi maso anu akuona , pontho makutu anu akuva . 
40013017	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti maprofeti azinji na anthu a Mulungu azinji adafuna pyakwanga kuona pinthu pinaona imwepi , kwache hadapione tayu . Iwo adafuna kuva , pinava imwepi , kwache hadapiva tayu . 
40013018	" Ngavani , mphapo , mufiinze kuti msangani wa nyakuwaza mbewu ukulonganji . 
40013019	Ale ambava mphangwa zakulonga pya Ufumu wa Mulungu , mbwenye nee vesesa tayu , akhala ninga pidachita mbewu zidagwa m'njira zile . Satana ambadza mbadzapoka pile pikhadawazwa m'mitima mwawo . 
40013020	Pidachita mbewu zidagwera pachimwalamwala zile , mbale ambatambira mphangwa na kukomerwa pandzidzi unaziva iwo . 
40013021	Mbwenye nee zimbapita pansi mwakuzika muna iwo tayu . Tenepo nyatwa penu kusanyika pingadza thangwi ya mphangwazi , iwo ambagweratu kabodzi kene . 
40013022	Pidachita mbewu zidagwera m'matenthere a minga zile , mbale ambavadi mphangwa , mbwenye pyakunensa pya moyo uno , na kukhumba mfuma pimbaphimba mphangwazo . Tenepo hambabalave tayu . 
40013023	Pidachita mbewu zidagwera m'mataka adidi zile , mbale ambatambira mphangwa , mbazivesesa . Iwo ambaikha maso azinji , anango dzana , anango makumatanthatu , anangombo makumatatu . "
40013024	Yesu adaapanga pontho msangani unango mbati , " Ufumu wa Kudzulu wakhala ninga tenepa . Munthu adabzala mbewu zadidi m'munda mwache . 
40013025	Nsiku inango na mosiku mwenemo anthu onsene mbali m'chitulo , nyamalwa adadza mbabzala dawe pakati pa mapira mbaenda pyache . 
40013026	Mapira adakula mbatoma kuonesa ngala , tenepo dawe adaonekambo . 
40013027	Nyabasa wa munthu ule adalonga mbati , ' Mbuya , mbewu zidabzala imwe m'munda mwanu zile zikhali zadidi , apo dawemboyi abulukira kupi ? '
40013028	Iye adatawira mbati , ' Achita penepi ndi nyamalwa unango pontho . ' Iwo adavunza mbati , ' Mphapo munafiina kuti tiende kadula daweyo ? '
40013029	Iye adatawira mbati , ' Tayu , thangwi mungakamdula mwinango munadzadula pabodzi na mapira ene . 
40013030	Pilekeni pikulire pabodzi kufikirana ndzidzi wakuvuna . Tenepo ndinadzapanga anyakuvuna kuti chakutoma adule daweyo mbamgumanya m'makuku mbampitsa . Angamala penepo agumanye mapirawo mbadzaaikha m'chikwa mwanga . ' "
40013031	Yesu adaapanga pontho msangani unango mbati , " Ufumu wa Kudzulu wakhala ninga tenepa . Munthu ambakwata mbewu ya chitowe mbakaibzala m'munda mwache . 
40013032	Iyo ndi mbewu yakufinuka pyakwanga , mbwenye ingakula , imbapiringanaletu mbewu zonsene . Imbakula mbikhala thenthere ene mwakuti mbalame zimbadza mbizimanga pisa pyawo m'nthambi zachezo . "
40013033	Yesu adaapanga pontho msangani unango mbati , " Ufumu wa Kudzulu wakhala ninga tenepa . Mkazi ambakwata chakufufumisira mikate mbavungaza na ufa wakudzala ndowa kufikirana mpambo onsenewo ufufume . "
40013034	Yesu akhaphatisa basa misangani kupanga mwinji pinthu pyonsenepi ; iye hakhalonga kwene okhonda phatisa basa msangani tayu . 
40013035	Iye adachita tenepa kuti pikwanekwane pidalongwa na mprofeti pile kuti , " Ndinadzaphatisa basa msangani kulonga kuna iwo . Ndinadzaapanga pinthu pyakubisika kutomera pidalengwa dziko yapansi . " Yesu alonga mwakuveka pya msangani wa dawe
40013036	Pidabuluka Yesu pamwinji pale , adakapita pyache m'nyumba , tenepo anyakufunzache adadza kuna iye mbalonga mbati , " Ngatipangeni , msangani wa dawe m'munda ukulonganji . "
40013037	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Munthu adabzala mbewu zadidi ule ndi Mwana Munthu ;
40013038	mundawo ndi dziko yapansi ; mbewu zadidizo ndi anthu a mu Ufumu wa Mulungu ; dawe ule ndi anthu a Satana ;
40013039	pontho nyamalwa adabzala dawe ule ndi Satana ene . Kuvuna kule nkhumala kwa dziko yapansi , tenepo anyakuvuna ale mbangelo . 
40013040	Ninga mule mumbadulwa dawe mbapitswa pamoto , pinadzachitikambo sasawa pakumala pa dziko yapansi . 
40013041	Mwana Munthu anadzatuma angelo ache kudzagumanyisa mu Ufumu wache anthu onsene ale akhachitisa kuti anthu adawe , pontho na onsene anango akuchita pyakudawika

40013043	Tenepo anthu a Mulungu anadzachena ninga dzuwa mu Ufumu wa Babawo . Ngavani , mphapo , imwe muna makutu ! "

40013053	Pidamala Yesu kulonga misangani yeneyi , adabuluka pambutopo , 
40013054	mbabwerera kuluwani ya kwawo . Iye adafunzisa m'nyumba yakupemphereramo , tenepo onsene adamvawo adadodoma mbavunza mbati , " Nzeru ninga yeneyi pontho mphamvu zakuchita nazo pyakudodomesa adaikwata kupi ?

40014001	Pandzidzi wenewo Herodi mfumu wa ku Galilea , adava pya Yesu . 
40014002	Iye adalonga kuna mathubu ache mbati , " Iye ndiyedi Yohani Nyakubatiza , ule alamuka kuimfa mbakhala pontho na moyo . Ndi thangwi yache ana mphamvu zakuchitira pyakudodomesa . "
40014003	Herodi akhadatonga kumangwa kwa Yohani . Iye akhadammangisa na njema mbamuikha m'perezo . Iye adachita penepi thangwi ya Herodia , mkazi wa mbaleache Filipi . 
40014004	Thangwi Yohani Nyakubatiza akhapanga Herodi mbati , " Nkhudawira mwambo kuti iwe usembe Herodia ! "
40014005	Herodi akhafuna kumpha kwache akhachita mantha na Ayuda , thangwi iwo akhayesa Yohani ninga mprofeti . 
40014006	Pansiku yakusekera kubalwa kwa Herodi , mwana wamkazi wa Herodia adavina mwadidi pamaso pa gulu yonsene mwakuti Herodi adakomerwa pyakwanga .

40014009	Mfumu adatsukwala , mbwenye na thangwi ya kudumbira kudachita iye pamaso pa alendo ache onsene , iye adatonga kuti kufuna kwa mwana mtsikana kuchitike . 
40014010	Natenepo adatuma munthu kuperezo kagwanda msolo wa Yohani .

40014013	Pidava Yesu pya Yohani , adabuluka kweneko na mwadiya mbaenda kakhala kumbuto ya yekha ene . Pidava anthu penepi , iwo adabuluka m'maluwani mwawo mbatewera Yesu na pamtunda . 
40014014	Yesu adatchitha m'mwadiya mule , na pidaona iye mwinji ukulu ule , mtimache udadzala na nsisi , tenepo adawangisa atenda ale . 
40014015	Na mawulo mwache , anyakufunzache adadza kuna iye mbalonga mbati , " Yang'anani kunjaku kwadoka , pontho kuna ife kuno nkhutsanga . Tenepo apangeni anthuwa aende kumidzi kuti akapigulire wokha kudya . "
40014016	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Mphyakufunika tayu kuti iwo aende . Imwe ene muapase pyakuti adye ! "

40014018	Yesu adalonga mbati , " Idzani napyo kuno . "
40014019	Iye adapanga anthu ale kuti akhale pansi pamaudzu ; tenepo adakwata mikate mishanu na nsomba ziwiri zile , adayang'ana kudzulu mbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu . Penepo adamenya mikateyo mbaipereka kuna anyakufunza , anyakufunzambo adaigawiza anthu ale . 
40014020	Onsene adadya mbakhuta , tenepo anyakufunza adathukula pitundu khumi na piwiri pyakudzala na pyakusalira . 
40014021	Konta ya anthu adadya ale akhali ninga amunakulu pikwi pishanu , nee kuvungazapo akazi na ana tayu . 
40014022	Kubuluka penepo Yesu adapanga anyakufunza kupakira m'mwadiya kuti atsogole kumtunda unango wa nyanza , mwenemo iye adatumiza anthu m'makwawo . 
40014023	Pidamala iye kugwinya anthu ale , iye adenda yekha ene paphiri kapemphera . Tenepo pikhadoka kunja , Yesu akhali kweneko yekha ene . 
40014024	Pandzidzi wenewu mwadiya ukhali kutali na kumtunda , ukhaona nyatwa na mabimbi , thangwi mphepo ikhadza mwakuyang'anisana nawo . 
40014025	Pakati paora yachitatu na chitanthatu na machibese Yesu adadza kuna anyakufunza mwenemo akufamba pa madzi . 
40014026	Pidamuona iwo akufamba pamadzi pale , iwo adagoswerwa pyakwanga mbakhuwa na mantha mbati , " Ndi mzukwa ! "

41006009	Valani nkhwaira , kwache lekani kwata kamiza yapapezi . "

41006011	Mungafika muluwani mbamukhonda tambirwa na anthu a mwenemo penu mbakhonda kukuveserani ; mubulukemo mbamugubudza fumbi kumanyalo kwanu . Penepi pinadzaacheuza ! "
41006012	Tenepo anyakufunza ale adabuluka mbaenda kalalika kuti anthu aleke pyakudawa pyawo . 
41006013	Iwo adabulusa mizimu yakuipa izinji , mbakhwaza atenda azinji mafuta mbaawangisa . 
41006014	Mfumu Herodi adapiva pyonsenepi thangwi dzina ya Yesu idadziwika mwadidi mwene . Anthu anango akhalonga mbati , " Yohani Nyakubatiza alamuka kuimfa ! Ndi thangwi yache akukhala na mphamvu zakuchita nazo pinthu pyakudodomesa . "
41006015	Anango adalonga mbati , " Weneyu ndi Elia . " Anangombo adalonga mbati , " Weneyu ndi mprofeti , akhala ninga mbodzi wa maprofeti a mvula zakale ale . "
41006016	Pidapiva Herodi , adalonga mbati , " Weneyudi ndi Yohani Nyakubatiza ! Adagwandisa ine msolo ule , alamuka kuimfa ! "
41006017	Herodi makayo ndiye adatonga kumangwa kwa Yohaniyu , adammangisa na njema mbamuikha m'perezo . Herodi adachita penepi , na thangwi yakuti Herodi akhadasemba Herodia , ule akhali mkazi Filipi , mbaleache , 
41006018	tenepo Yohani Nyakubatiza akhadampanga Herodi mbati , " Kweneku nkhudawira mwambo wathu kuti iwe usembe mkazi mbaleako ! "
41006019	Natenepo Herodia adaipirwa naye Yohani mbafuna kumpha , kwache adapichimwana thangwi Herodi
41006020	akhachita mantha na Yohani . Herodi akhapidziwa kuti Yohani akhali munthu wadidi pontho wakuchena , natenepo adamkoya mwadidi . Herodi angava kwene pyakulonga pya Yohani , akhakomerwa naye kumvesera , mbwenye akhazunguzika napyo . 
41006021	Kumamalisiro kwache Herodia adagumana danga . Pansiku yakusekera kubalwa kwa Herodi , adasasanya phwando mbachemera akadamu a Boma na a nkhondo ene , pontho na anthu akuveka a mu Galilea . 
41006022	Mwana wamkazi wa Herodia adapita m'thando mbavina mwakuti Herodi na alendo ache adakomerwa pyakwanga . Natenepo mfumu adalonga kuna mtsikanayo mbati , " Ninji chinafuna iwe ? Ngandipange , ndinati ndikupase . "
41006023	Iye adalonga naye na mapangano azinji mbati , " Ndinadumbira kuti ndinati ndikupase male chinafuna iwecho , podi pyakuinjipa ninga katinakati ya ufumu wangawu ! "
41006024	Natenepo mwana mtsikana adabuluka mbakavunza mache mbati , " Ndipemphenji ine ? " Mache ule adamtawira mbati , " Msolo wa Yohani Nyakubatiza . "
41006025	Mwana mtsikana Kabodzi na kabodzi adabwerera kuna mfumu mwakuchimbiza mbapempha mbati , " Ndinafuna mundipasire msolo wa Yohani Nyakubatiza m'palato chinchino pano ! "
41006026	Penepi pidatsukwalisa mfumu pyakwanga pene , kwache mbadakwanisa kumkhondera tayu , thangwi ya kudumbira kudachita iye pamaso pa alendo ache onsene . 
41006027	Tenepo Kabodzi na kabodzi Herodi adatuma nyakuonera perezo na utongi kakwata msolo wa Yohani . Nyakuonerayo adabuluka mbaenda kuperezoko , mbakagwanda msolo wa Yohani . 
41006028	Adadza nawo m'palato mbaupereka kuna mwana mtsikanayo ; iyembo adaukwata mbaupasa mache . 
41006029	Pidapiva anyakufunza a Yohani , adadza mbakwata mtembo wa Yohani , mbakauikha m'masiye . 
41006030	Anyakutumwa adabwerera kuna Yesu , mbampanga pyonsene pikhadachita iwo na pikhadafunzisa iwo pene . 
41006031	Anthu akudza na kwenda akhalipo azinji mwakuti Yesu na anyakufunzache adasowa na ndzidzi ene wakuti adye . Natenepo Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Tendeni kumbuto ya tekha ene kuti tikakwanise kupumambo pang'ono . "
41006032	Natenepo adapakira m'mwadiya mbaenda okha ene kumbuto ya wokha ene . 
41006033	Kwache anthu azinji adaaona akwenda mbaadziwiratu kabodzi kene kuti akhali iwo , natenepo anthu ale adenda kubulukira m'maluwani onsene mbathamanga patsogolo na pamtunda mbafika pambutoyo , mwenemo Yesu na anyakufunzache mbadzati fika . 
41006034	Pidatchitha Yesu m'mwadiya , adauona mwinji ukuluwo , tenepo adava nyambalo , thangwi iwo akhali ninga mabira akusowa makabuswa . Penepo adatoma kuafUnzisa pinthu pizinji . 
41006035	Pikhadoka kunja , anyakufunzache adadza kuna iye mbalonga mbati , " Kunja kwadoka , pontho kuno nkhutsanga . 
41006036	Agwinyeni anthuwa aende pyawo kumidzi na minda ili chifupiyi nakuti akapigulire okha ene phoso yakuti adye . "
41006037	Mbwenye Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Imwe maka muapase chakuti adye ! " Iwo adalonga naye mbati , " Ayi munafuna kuti tiende kagula mikate na kobiri za siliva zakukwana madzana mawiri kuti tidyese anthu onsene wa ? "
41006038	Tenepo Yesu adaavunza mbati , " Muna mikate mingasi ? Ndokoni mukayang'ane . " Pidaigumana iwo , adamdziwisa Yesuyo mbati , " Pana mikate mishanu na nsomba ziwiri . "
41006039	Kubuluka penepo Yesu adapanga anyakufunzache kuti akhazike anthu pansi patsanga iwisi m'magulu . 
41006040	Natenepo anthu adakhala pansi m'magulumagulu a dzana , anangombo m'magulumagulu a makumashanu . 
41006041	Tenepo Yesu adakwata nsomba ziwiri zile na mikate mishanu ile , mbayang'ana kudzulu , mbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu . Iye adaimenyamenya mikate ile mbaipereka kuna anyakufunzache kuti agawize anthu ale . Yesu adagawiza pontho nsomba ziwiri zile kuna onsene . 
41006042	Onsene adadya mbakhuta . 
41006043	Anyakufunzache adalokota mikate na nsomba zidasalira zile mbadzaza pirundu khumi na piwiri . 
41006044	Konta ya amunakulu okha adadya ale ikhali pikwi pishanu . 
41006045	Kabodzi kene Yesu adapanga anyakufunzache kuti apakire m'mwadiya kuti atsogole ku Betesaida , kumtunda unango wa nyanza , mwenemo iye akhagwinya anthu ale kwawo . 
41006046	Pidamala iye gonekana na anthu ale , iye adabuluka mbaenda kuphiri kapemphera . 
41006047	Pidadoka kunja , mwadiya ukhali pakati pa nyanza , mwenemo Yesu ali yekha kumtunda . 
41006048	Yesu adaona anyakufunzache ale akuona nyatwa na kuchapa , thangwi mwadiya ukhayang'anisana na mphepo . Natenepo pandzidzi wa pakati paora yachitatu na yachitanthatu na machibese iye adadza kuna iwo , akufamba pa madzi . Pikhali iye chifupi kuapiringana ,
41006049	iwo adamuona akufamba pa madzi mbanyerezera kuti ukhali mzukwa . Tenepo adakhuwa . 
41006050	Pidamuona iwo , onsene ale adagoswerwa pikulu . Kabodzi kene Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Wangani mtima ! Ndine pano . Lekani gopa ! "

41006056	Konsene kudenda Yesu m'midzi , m'maluwani , penu m'minda , anthu akhakwata atenda onsene ale kwenda nawo kumbuto za msika mbampempha kuti aatawirise kukhuya kwene chikhwayeti cha mkhanjo wache basi ; onsenembo adachikhuyawo adawangadi . 
41007001	Afarisi anango na afunzisi a mwambo , ale akhadabulukira ku Yerusalemu , adagumanyikana mwakuzungulira Yesu . 
41007002	Iwo adaona anyakufunza anango a Yesu akudya okhonda samba m'manja — ninga mukhalongera Afarisi kuti pichitwe . 
41007003	Afarisi na Ayuda anango onsene hambadya okhonda chita mtemo wawo wakusamba m'manja tayu , thangwi ambateweza mtemo wa makolo awo akale . 
41007004	Pontho hambadya chinthu na chibodzi chene chakubulukira kumsika mbakhonda toma kuchitsuka tayu . Ambateweza pontho mitemo inango izinji ile idatambira iwo , yakukhala ninga njira yakuthema kutsukira nayo makhomitcho , pitomba , pikalango na mabonde . 
41007005	Natenepo Afarisi na afunzisi a mwambo ale , adavunza Yesu mbati , " Thangwi yache njanji inakhondesa anyakufunzanu kuteweza chifunziso chidaperekwa na makolo athu akale ? Iwo ambadya okhonda samba m'manja ! "
41007006	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Ndimomwene ninga mudapilembera mprofeti Yesaya mule pya imwe kuti imwe ndimwe mfakafaka . Iye adalemba kuti Mulungu adalonga mbati , ' Anthu awa ambandilemedza na m'kanwa mwawo mwene basi , mbwenye mitimawo ili kutali na ine . 
41007007	Kundipembedza kwawo nkhwakusowa basa , thangwi ambafunzisa matongero akusasanywa na anthu khala ninga asasanywa na Mulungu ! '
41007008	" Mumbaikha pakhundu matongero a Mulungu mbamuvera mitemo ya anthu . "
41007009	Yesu adathimiza kulonga mbati , " Imwe muna njira yakuchenjera yakuikhira nayo matongero a Mulungu pakhundu nakuti munyanye kuphatirira pachifunziso chanu mwekha . 
41007010	Thangwi Mose adatonga kuti : ' Lemedza babako na mako . ' Adalonga pontho kuti : ' Onsene anatikana ababawo na amawo athema kuphiwa . '
41007011	Mbwenye imwe mumbafunzisa kuti ngakhala munthu ana chinthu anakwanisa kuphatisa basa kuphedzera nacho babache na mache , mbwenye munthuyo angalonga kuti : ' Ndi korobani ' , kweneku nkhulonga kuti chenechi chakoyerwa Mulungu , 
41007012	tenepo imwe nee mumbamtawirisa tayu kuti aphedze babache na mache . 
41007013	Pakuchita tenepo , mumbalulupisa mafala a Mulungu na mitemo yanu imbasiyirana imwe , mbamuchita pinango pizinji ninga tenepa . "
41007014	Yesu adachemera pontho mwinji mbalonga nawo mbati , " Ngavani kuno , monsenene , pontho muvesese . 
41007015	Nkhabe chibodzi chinapita muna munthu kubulukira kunja kwa manungo chingamswipise munthu tayu , mbwenye ntchinthu chakubuluka muna munthuyo chimbamswipisa . " ?
41007017	Pidasiya Yesu mwinji ule mbakapita m'nyumba , anyakufunzache adampempha kuti afuthule pidalonga iye pile . 
41007018	Yesu adalonga nawo mbati , " Kani misolo yanu njakuuma basi ? Imwe nkhabe vesesadi tayu ? Nkhabe na chibodzi chene chakupita muna munthu kubulukira kunja kwa manungo chingamswipise , 
41007019	thangwi chinthucho hachimbakapita mumtima mwache tayu , mbwenye m'chifu mwache mbachikabulukira pontho kunja kwa manungo . " Pakulonga pinthu penepi , Yesu akhalonga kuti pyakudya pyonsene mphyakuthema kudyiwa . 
41007020	Iye adathimiza kulonga mbati , " Mphinthu pyakubuluka muna munthu pimbamchitisa munthu kukhala wakuswipa .

41007022	uputa , mtima , kunama , kuseluka , bivu , tsweda , kudungudza , pyakupupwa na kuchita pinthu pinango pyakuipa . 
41007023	Pinthu pyakuipa pyonsenepi pimbadza kubulukira muna munthu mbapimswipisa . "
41007024	Tenepo Yesu adabuluka mbaenda kunthemba ya chifupi na mzinda wa Turo . Iye adakapita m'nyumba mbakhonda funa kuti munthu na mbodzi ene apidziwe kuti iye akhali kweneko , mbwenye iye adapichimwana kuti akhale mwakubisala . 
41007025	Mkazi , ule akhali na mwanache wamkazi wakukhala na mzimu wakuipa , adava pya Yesu . Kabodzi kene adadza mbapiponya pansi pamanyalo a Yesu . 
41007026	Mkazi ule akhali wa mtundu okhonda khala Ayuda , wakubalwa kunthemba ya Fonike m'dziko ya Siria . Iye adapempha Yesu kuti akabuluse mzimu wakuipa muna mwanache . 
41007027	Mbwenye Yesu adamtawira mbati , " Chakutoma tidyese ana . Si pyadidi tayu kukwata kudya kwa ana mbatiponyera anambwa . "

41007030	Mkazi ule adenda kumusa kwache mbakagumana mwanache akugona patalimba ; mzimu wakuipa ukhadabulukadi muna mwanayo . 
41007031	Kubuluka penepo Yesu adabuluka kumbuto ya Turo mbagwanda na ku Sidoni , kutchithira kunyanza ya Galilea mbaenda pontho kunthemba ya Maluwani Khumi . 
41007032	Kweneko kudadza anthu anango na munthu wakukhonda kuva na kulonga kwene . Iwo adapempha Yesu kuti asanjike manjache pana munthu ule . 
41007033	Pidamkwatira iye pakhundu , kumbulusa pamwinji pale , Yesu adapitisa pyala pyache m'makutu mwa munthu ule . Tenepo adaphula mata mbamphata lulume yache .

41007035	Penepo pene , makutu a munthu ule adafunguka , lulume yache idasudzuka mbatoma kulonga pyakuveka . 
41007036	Yesu adapanga anthu ale mwakugogomeza kuti aleke kapilonga kuna munthu na mbodzi ene . Mbwenye na kuakhondesa kukulu kudachita iye , iwombo adavekesa pyakwanga pene pinthu pidachitikapyo . 
41007037	Anthu adamalwa nzeru mbalonga mbati , " Weneyu aphata pyonsene mwadidi mwene ! Akuchitisadi madodo kuva pontho anyakukhonda longa , kulonga ! "
41008001	Si ndzidzi nkhubuluka penepo mwinji unango ukulu udagumanyikana . Pidasowa anthu chakuti adye , Yesu adachemera anyakufunzache kuna iye mbalonga mbati , 
41008002	" Ndikuva nyambalo na anthuwa , thangwi akhala na ine nsiku zitatu apo lero nkhabe chakuti adye .

41008004	Anyakufunzache adamvunza mbati , " Nkhupimbo m'tsanga muno kunakwanisa munthu kagumana phoso yakudyesa anthu onsenewa ? "

41009001	Yesu adathimiza kulonga mbati , " Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti pana anango pano hanadzafa tayu kufikirana aone Mulungu akukhazikisa Ufumu wache na mphamvu . "

41009008	Anyakufunza ale adayang'anayang'ana msanga mbaona Yesu ene basi akhali na iwo , nee munthu unango akhali penepo tayu . 
41009009	Pikhatchitha iwo paphiripo , Yesu adaapanga mbati , " Lekani kapanga munthu na mbodzi ene pinthu pyaona imwepi , kufikirana Mwana Munthu alamuke kuimfa . "
41009010	Anyakufunza adaveradi pidapangwa iwo , mbwenye paokha ene adatoma kuvunzana unango na mwanzache mbati , " Kulamuka kuimfamboku nkhulonga kuti tani ? "
41009011	Natenepo iwo adavunza Yesu mbati , " Afunzisi a mwambo ambalongeranji kuti Elia ndiye athema toma kudza ? "
41009012	Kutawira kwache kukhali tenepa , " Elia ndiye athema toma kudza kuti asasanyiletu pinthu pyonsene . Apo Malembambo analongeranji kuti Mwana Munthu anadzasanyika pyakwanga mbadzakhondwa ?
41009013	Mbwenye ndikukupangani kuti Elia adadza kale , anthumbo adachita naye ninga mudafunira iwo , ninga mudalongera Malemba pya iye . "
41009014	Pidaphatana iwo na anyakufunzache adasalira ale , adaona mwinji ukulu waazungulira , pontho Afunzisi anango a mwambo akuchita nawo mphoka . 
41009015	Pidaona mwinjiwo Yesu , udadodoma pyakwanga mbumthamangira kammwenyika . 
41009016	Yesu adavunza anyakufunzache mbati , " Mukupokanyisananji nawo enewa ? "
41009017	Munthu mbodzi m'mwinjimo adatawira mbati , " Mfunzisi , ndadza na mwananga kuna imwe , thangwi ana mzimu wakuipa mwakuti hambakwanisa kulongabi . 
41009018	Panamphata mzimupo , umbamponya pansi , mbabuluka phovu kukanwa . Iye ambakikita mano , pontho manungo ache onsene ambagwima . Ndidapempha anyakufunzanu kuti aubuluse mzimuwo , mbwenye iwo adapichimwana . "
41009019	Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Shaa ! Anthumwe kukhonda khulupira kwenekumbo nkhwanji ? Ndikhale namwe kufikirana lini ? Ndipirire namwe kufikirana lini ? Dzani naye kuno , mwana mphaleyo . "
41009020	Tenepo adadza nayedi . Si ndzidzi pidachita mzimu soo Yesu , udamdzadzamirisa mphale ule . Iye adagwa pansi mbabulumundabulumunda , phovu ili kukanwa . 
41009021	Yesu adavunza babache mphaleyo mbati , " Mphaleyu akhala tenepa kutomera lini ? " Babache adatawira mbati , " Kutomera uwanache . 
41009022	Ndzidzi uzinji mzimu wakuipawu wamponyera pamoto na m'madzi kuyesayesa kuti umphe . Tiverenimbo ife nsisi na kutiphedza , ngakhala munakwanisa kuchita tenepo . "
41009023	Yesu adalonga mbati , " Thangwi ninji mukulonga kuti , ' Ngakhala imwe munakwanisa kuchita tenepo ? ' Pyonsene mphyakukwanisika kuna munthu wakukhala nacho chikhulupiro . "
41009024	Kabodzi na kabodzi babache mphaleyo adalira mbati , " Ndili nacho chikhulupiro , kwache ntchakuchepa . Ndiphedzenimbo kuti ndikhale nacho chizinji ! "
41009025	Yesu adapidziwa kuti mwinji ukhafedzerafedzera kuna iwo . Natenepo adatonga mzimu wakuipa mbati , " Mzimu wa ugontha na wakukhonda longa , ndikukutonga kuti ubuluke muna mphaleyu pontho leka dzapitave muna iye . "
41009026	Mzimu ule udakhuwa , mbumponya mphaleyo mwakumdzadzamirisa pikulu mbubuluka . Mwana mphale adaoneka ninga wakufa , natenepo onsene adalonga mbati , " Aa ! Mwanayu afa ! "
41009027	Mbwenye Yesu adaphata dzanja mphaleyo mbamphedza kulamuka , tenepo iye adaimira . 
41009028	Pidapita Yesu m'nyumba , anyakufunzache adamvunza pakhundu mbati , " Ifembo tapichimwana tani kuubulusa mzimuwu ? "
41009029	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Nkhabe chinango chingakwanise kubulusa mtundu wa mzimu ninga weneyu , mbwenye kupemphera kwene basi . "
41009030	Yesu na anyakufunzache adabuluka pambutoyo mbaenda na m'Galilea . Iye hadafuna tayu kuti munthu na mbodzi ene adziwe kukhali iye , 
41009031	thangwi akhafunzisa anyakufunzache . Iye adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Mwana Munthu anadzaperekwa kuna anthu , ale anafuna dzampha . Mbwenye pangadzagwanda nsiku zitatu anati adzalamuke mbakhala na moyo . "
41009032	Mbwenye anyakufunza ale hadavesese tayu pikhalonga iye pile , mbachita mantha kumvunza . 
41009033	Iwo adadza ku Kafaranao . Pikhadapita iwo m'nyumba , Yesu adavunza anyakufunzache mbati , " Pikhalongalonga imwe m'njiramu ninji ? "
41009034	Mbwenye iwo hadamtawira tayu , thangwi m'njira mule akhadapokanyisana kuti mkululetu mbani pakati pawo . 
41009035	Yesu adakhala pansi mbachemera anyakufunza khumi na awiri ale , mbalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Ule anathanda kukhala wakutoma , apiikhe yekha ene pambuto yakumalisira ya onsene mbakhala pontho nyabasa wa onsene . "
41009036	Natenepo Yesu adathukula kamwana mbakaimirisa pamaso pawo . Iye adakakhumbatira mbalonga kuna iwo mbati , 
41009037	" Munthu onsene anatambira mwadidi mbodzi wa pianapi thangwi ya ine , atambirambo na ine ene ; pontho munthu onsene anatambira ine mwadidi , hadatambire ine ndekha tayu , mbwenye atambirambo adandituma ule . "
41009038	Yohani adalonga kuna Yesu mbati , " Mfunzisi , tidaona munthu akubulusa mizimu yakuipa na dzinanu , natenepo ife tidampanga kuti abasikeletu thangwi iye si mbodzi wa gulu yathu tayu . "
41009039	Yesu adapanga anyakufunzache mbati , " Lekani kumkhondesa , thangwi nkhabe mbodzi ule anachita pinthu pyakudodomesa na dzinanga , ndzidzi onthowo mbakwanisa kundilongera pinthu pyakuipa . 
41009040	Thangwi ule anakhonda kutipokanyayo ngwathu . 
41009041	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti ule anadzakupasani madzi akumwa , thangwi yakuti ndimwe anga , anati adzafupirwedi . 
41009042	" Ngakhala munthu anachitisa mbodzi wa anawa kutaya chikhulupiro chache pana ine , mbapidakhala pyadidi kuti munthu weneyo amangirirwe libwe ikulu m'khosi mwache mbaponywa m'nyanza . 
41009043	Natenepo ngakhala dzanjako ikukudawisa , igwande ! Mphyadidi kuti ukapite kumoyo okhonda mala wakusowa dzanja , kusiyana nakuti ukoye manjako onsene mawiri mbuenda kugehena , kumoto okhonda thima . '
41009045	Ngakhala dzinyalo yako ikukudawisa , igwande ! Mphyadidi kuti ukapite kumoyo okhonda mala wakusowa dzinyalo , kusiyana nakuti ukoye manyalo ako onsene mawiri mbuponywa kugehena . "
41009047	Pontho ngakhala diso yako ikukudawisa , ikonombole ! Mphyadidi kuti ukapite mu Ufumu wa Mulungu na diso ibodzi , kusiyana nakuti ukoye maso ako onsene awiri mbuponywa kugehena . 
41009048	Kweneko ' mfunye zakuadya hazimbafa tayu , na moto wakuaotcha humbathimiswa tayu . '
41009049	" Anthu onsene anadzacheneswa na moto ninga mumbacheneserwa nsembe ya nyama na munyu . 
41009050	Munyu ngwadidi , mbwenye kunyung'unya kwache kungamala , munadzaunyung'unyisa nanji pontho ? Mukhale nacho chinthu chinango chakukuchenesani mumtima mwanu ninga munyu , pontho mukhale mwamtendere unango na mwanzache . "
41010001	Tenepo Yesu adabulukapo pambutoyo mbaenda kunthemba ya Yudea , mbawambuka mkulo wa Yorodani . Mwinji udagomokera pontho kuna Yesu , tenepo iye adaufiinzisa ninga mukhachitira iye nsiku zonsene . 
41010002	Afarisi anango adadza kuna iye mbayesera kumtapa m'kanwa , natenepo adamvunza mbati , " Tipange , mwambo wathu umbatawirisa mamuna kumwalana na mkazache ? "
41010003	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Ndi mwambo wanji udakupasani Mose ? "
41010004	Kutawira kwawo kukhali tenepa , " Mose adatawirisa kuti mamuna alembe kalata yakudziwisa pyakumwalanako , angachita tenepo , anakwanisa kumwalana na mkazacheyo . "
41010005	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Mose adakulemberani matongero enewa thangwi ndimwe anthu akuuma mtima pyakwanga . 
41010006	Pakutoma pandzidzi udalenga Mulungu pinthu pyonsene ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , ' Mulungu adasasanya iwo mamuna na mkazi . '
41010007	' Na thangwi yeneyi , mamuna anadzasiya babache na mache mbaphatikana na mkazache ,
41010008	tenepo uwiriawo anadzakhala mbodzi . ' Natenepo hanakhalave awiri tayu , mbwenye mbodzi . 
41010009	Tenepo munthu aleke lekanisa awiriwa , thangwi ndi Mulungu adaaphataniza . "
41010010	Pidabwerera iwo m'nyumba , anyakufunza adavunza Yesu pya penepi . 
41010011	Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Ngakhala mamuna anamwalana na mkazache mbasemba mkazi unango , achitira uputa mkazache wakutomayo . 
41010012	Ntchibodzibodzi mkazi angamwalana na mamunache mbasembwa na mamuna unango , achitira uputa mamunache wakutomayo . "
41010013	Anthu anango adadza na ana kuna Yesu kuti aikhe manjache pana iwo , mbwenye anyakufunza adalongera anthu ale . 
41010014	Pidaona Yesu penepi , adazhangali mbalonga kuna anyakufunzache mbati , " Atawiriseni ana adze kuna ine . Muleke kuakhondesa , thangwi Ufumu wa Mulungu ngwa anthu akukhala ninga wa anawa . 
41010015	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti anakhonda tambira Ufumu wa Mulungu ninga kamwana , hanadzaupita na pang'ono pene tayu . "
41010016	Natenepo adathukula piana m'khaphwa mwache mbaikha manjache pana iwo mbaatsanzayisa . 
41010017	Pidachita Yesu kuti autome pontho ulendo wache , munthu unango adamthamangira , mbagodama pamaso pache , mbamvunza mbati , " Mfunzisi wadidi , ndichitenji kuti nditambire moyo okhonda mala ? "
41010018	Yesu adamvunza mbati , " Unandithuliranji wadidi ? Nkhabe mbodzi wadidi , mbwenye Mulungu ene basi !
41010019	Mukuadziwa matongero akuti , ' Leka kupha , leka chita uputa , leka kuba , leka kupambizira , leka kupunza mwanzako , pontho lemedza babako na mako . ' "
41010020	Munthu ule adalonga naye mbati , " Mfunzisi , kutomera uwananga ndavera matongero onsenewa . "
41010021	Yesu adamuyang'ana mbamfuna mbalonga mbati , " Chakusowa ntchinthu chibodzi , kagulise pyonsene pina iwe mbupereke kobirizo kuna anyakutcherenga , iwembo mfuma unadzakhala nayo kudzulu ; tenepo bwera unditewere ! "
41010022	Pidava munthu ule penepi , nkhope yache idagwa , mbaenda pyache wakutsukwala , thangwi akhali wakufuma pyakwanga . 
41010023	Yesu adayang'anayang'ana mbalonga kuna anyakufunzache mbati , " Mphyakunensa pyakwanga kuti anthu akufuma atambire Mulungu kukhala Mfumu wawo ! "
41010024	Anyakufunza adazunguzika nawo mafala enewa , mbwenye Yesu adathimiza kulonga mbati , " Ananga , mphyakunensa pyakwanga kupita mu Ufumu wa Mulungu !
41010025	Mphyakunensadi pyakwanga pene munthu wakufuma kupita mu Ufumu wa Mulungu , kusiyana na ng'ombe kupita na pabenga ya nsingano ! "
41010026	Na mafala enewa anyakufunza ndiye adanyanyiratu kuzunguzika mbavunzana unango na mwanzache mbati , " Mbani mphapo anakwanisa dzapulumuka ? "
41010027	Yesu adayang'aniratu pana iwo mbaatawira mbati , " Penepi mphyakuchimwanika na munthu , mbwenye na Mulungu nkhabe , thangwi pyonsene mphyakukwanisika na Mulungu . "
41010028	Natenepo Peturo adalonga mbati , " Ngayang'anani , ife tasiya pyathu pyonsene mbatitewera imwepo . "
41010029	Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Ande , inembo ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti onsene anasiya nyumba , penu abale , penu anyamainga , penu baba , penu mama , penu ana , penu minda , thangwi ya ine na thangwi ya Mphangwa Zadidi , 
41010030	anadzatambira pansiku zino , madzanamadzana a nyumba , abale , anyamainga , amama , ana na minda — mbadzatambira pontho nyatwa ; pontho pandzidzi unadzawo anadzatambira moyo okhonda mala . 
41010031	Mbwenye azinji ale pandzidzi uno ngakutoma anadzakhala akumalisa , pontho na azinji ale pandzidzi uno ngakumalisira anadzakhala akutoma . "
41010032	Pandzidzi wenewu Yesu na anyakufunzache akhali panjira ulendo wakwenda ku Yerusalemu . Yesu patsogolo , anyakufunza m'nduli . Anyakufunzawo adadodoma pyakwanga , pontho na anthu enembo akhaatewerawo adagoswerwa . Yesu adakwatira pontho pakhundu anyakufunzache khumi na awiri ale mbaapanga pinthu pikhafuna dzamgwera m'tsogolo . 
41010033	Iye adaapanga mbati , " Ngavani , tikwenda ku Yerusalemu kule kunafuna kaperekwa Mwana Munthu kuna anyansembe akulu na kuna afunzisi a mwambo . Anakamtonga kuti aphiwe , pontho anati akampereke m'manja mwa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . 
41010034	Anthuwo anati akamsedegule , kamphulira mata , kamkwapula , mbampha ; mbwenye nsiku zitatu zingadzagwanda anati adzalamuke mbakhala na moyo . "
41010035	Yakobo na Yohani , ana Zebedeo , adadza kuna Yesu mbalonga mbati , " Mfunzisi , tichitirenimbo chinthu chinafuna kukupemphani ifechi . "
41010036	Yesu adaavunza mbati , " Ninji chinafuna imwe kuti ndikuchitireni ? "
41010037	Iwo adamtawira mbati , " Mungadzakhala pampando mu Ufumu wanu wademelero , mudzatitawirisembo kukhala namwe , mbodzi kumabzere kwanu , mbodzimbo kumadyo kwanu . "
41010038	Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Pinapempha imwe nee mukupidziwabi . Ayi imwe munakwanisa kumwera ndiko ya nyatwa inafuna mwera ine ? Ayi imwe mungakwanise kubatizwa na mbatiziro unafuna batizwa na ine ? "
41010039	Iwo adamtawira mbati , " Tinakwanisa . " Yesu adaapanga mbati , " Imwe munati mumweredi ndiko inafuna dzamwera ine , mbamubatizwadi na mbatiziro unafuna dzabatizwa na ine . 
41010040	Ine nkhabe mphamvu zakusankhula nyakudzakhala kumadyo kwanga na kumabzere kwanga tayu . Mbwenye Mulungu ndiye anadzapereka mbuto zenezi kuna anthu asasanyira iye ale . "
41010041	Pidapiva anyakufunza anango khumi ale , adazhangalira Yakobo na Yohani . 
41010042	Natenepo Yesu adachemera anyakufunzache onsene pabodzi mbalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Mukupidziwa kuti anthu analongwa kuti mbatongi a anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu ana mphamvu pana anthuwo ; pontho akadamu awo ana utongi wakumalisikiratu . 
41010043	Penepi hapili tenepo pakati panupa tayu . Kwache , ngakhala unango wa imwe anafuna kukhala wamkulu , athema kukhala nyakutumikira wa anangomwe ;
41010044	pontho ngakhala unango wa imwe anafuna kukhala wakutoma , athema kukhala bitchu wa onsene . 
41010045	Thangwi na Mwana Munthu ene hadadzere dzatumikirwa tayu ; mbwenye dzatumikira na kupereka moyo wache kuombola anthu azinji . "
41010046	Tenepo iwo adafika kuluwani ya Yeriko . Pikhabuluka Yesu na anyakufunzache pabodzi na mwinji ukulu mu Yeriko , boliboli nyakupemphesa dzinache Batimeo , mwana Timeo , akhakhala m'khundukhundu mwa njira . 
41010047	Pidapiva iye kuti akhali Yesu wa ku Nazareti , adatoma kukhuwa mbati , " Yesu , mwana Davite ! Ndiverenimbo nsisi ine ! "
41010048	Anthu azinji adamlongera mbampanga kuti amatame . Mbwenye iye adanyanyiratu kukhuwa pyakwanga pene mbati , " Mwana Davite ! Ndiverenimbo nsisi ine . "
41010049	Yesu adaimira mbalonga mbati , " Mchemereni . " Tenepo iwo adachemera boliboliyo mbalonga kuna iye mbati , " Wangisa ! Lamuka , akukuchemera . "
41010050	Iye adakunundula chakufmika chache mbalamuka msangansanga mbadza kuna Yesu . 
41010051	Yesu adamvunza mbati , " Unafuna ndikuchitirenji ? " Boliboliyo adamtawira mbati , " Mfunzisi , ndinafuna ndione . "
41010052	Yesu adampanga mbati , " Ndoko , chikhulupiro chako chakuwangisa . " Kabodzi kene adakwanisa kuona mbatewera Yesu paulendowo . 
41011001	Pikhafika iwo chifupi na Yerusalemu , pamaluwani a Betifage na Betania , adafika paphiri ya Olivi . Tenepo Yesu adatuma awiri mwa anyakufunzache , 
41011002	mbaapanga mbati , " Muende kumidzi ili kutsogolo kwanuyo . Si ndzidzi nkhufika mwenemo , munakagumana mwana bulu hadzati pakirwa na munthu na kalene tayu , amangirirwa na nkhambala . Mukamsudzule mudze naye kuno . 
41011003	Ngakhala munthu unango anakakuvunzani kuti munachitiranji tenepo , kampangeni kuti Mbuya anamfuna , mbwenye anati amtumize chinchino . "
41011004	Iwo adenda mbakagumanadi mwana bulu m'khundukhundu mwa njira , amangirirwa chifupi na msuwo wa nyumba . Pikhamsudzula iwo , 
41011005	anthu anango penepo adavunza mbati , " Munamsudzuliranji mwana buluyi ? "
41011006	Iwo adaatawira ninga mudaapangira Yesu mule , natenepo anthu ale adaatawirisa kuti aende pyawo . 
41011007	Pidadza iwo na mwana bulu ule kuna Yesu , iwo adathasika nguwo zawo pamsana pabuluyo , Yesu mbapakira . 
41011008	Anthu azinji adathasika nguwo zawo m'njira , mwenemo anango akuthasika matsamvu adagwanda iwo m'minda . 
41011009	Anyakupita patsogolo na anyakutewera m'nduli akhakhuwa mbati , " Alemedzwe Mulungu ! Nyakutsanzaya ngweneyu wakudza na dzina ya Mbuya !
41011010	Ngwakutsanzaya ufumu wa babathu Davite unadzawu ! Alemedzwe Mulungu Wakudzuludzulu ! "
41011011	Yesu adenda mu Yerusalemu mbakapita m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , mbayang'anayang'ana pinthu pyonsene . Na thangwi yakuti kunja kudadoka , iye adabuluka mbaenda ku Betania pabodzi na anyakufunza khumi na awiri ale . 
41011012	Mangwana mwache , pikhabulukira iwo ku Betania , Yesu adava njala . 
41011013	Iye adaona muti wamkuyu na pakamsinzo uli gudugudu , tenepo adenda kayang'ana ngakhala ukhali na makuyu . Mbwenye pidafika iye pamutipo , adagumana masamba ene basi , thangwi hukhali ndzidzi wache wakuti ubale tayu . 
41011014	Yesu adalonga kuna muti wamkuyu ule mbati , " Nkhabe mbodzi anadzadya pontho makuyu kubulukira muna iwe tayu . " Anyakufunzache adamva akulonga penepi . 
41011015	Pidafika iwo ku Yerusalemu , Yesu adenda ku Nyumba ya Mulungu mbathamangisira kunja anyakugulisa na anyakugula malonda . Adagadabula matebulo a anyakuchinja kobiri pontho na mipando ya anyakugulisa nkhangaiwa . 
41011016	Iye hadatawirise munthu na mbodzi ene kuti agwande na pathando ya Nyumba ya Mulungu athukula chinthu tayu . 
41011017	Tenepo adafunzisa anthu mbati , " Pyalembwa m'Malemba kuti Mulungu alonga mbati : ' Nyumbanga inadzachemerwa nyumba yakupemphereramo anthu a madzinza onsene . ' Mbwenye imwe mwaisanduza nyumba yakubisaliramo zimbava . "
41011018	Anyansembe akulu na afunzisi a mwambo adava penepi , natenepo adagundika kusaka njira inango yakuphera Yesu . Iwo akhagoswerwa naye , thangwi mwinji onsene ukhadodoma na kufunzisa kwache . 
41011019	Pidadoka kunja , Yesu na anyakufunzache adabuluka mumzindamo . 
41011020	Bzobzo mangwana mwache , pikhafamba iwo m'njira , adaona muti wamkuyu ule wafa kutomera kunsonga kufikirana kumitsitsi . 
41011021	Peturo adakumbuka pile pidachitika mbalonga kuna Yesu mbati , " Mfunzisi , yang'anani muti wamkuyu udatemberera imwe ule wafa . "
41011022	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Khalani nacho chikhulupiro muna Mulungu . 
41011023	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti ule anadzapanga phiriyi kuti iende kapiponya yokha ene m'nyanza mbakhonda penuka mumtima mwache , mbakhulupira kuti chalonga iye chinachitika , chinati chidzachitikedi kuna iye . 
41011024	Na thangwi yeneyi ndikukupangani kuti mungapempha Mulungu chinthu , khulupirani kuti munadzachitambira , tenepo munadzapaswa chinthu chinapempha imwecho . 
41011025	Mungafuna kupemphera , chakutoma mwathema kulekerera pyakukudawirani mwanzanu . Mungachita tenepo , Babanu wa kudzulu anadzakulekereranimbo pyakudawa pyanu . "
41011027	Iwo adafika pontho ku Yerusalemu . Tenepo pikhafamba Yesu m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , anyansembe akulu , afunzisi a mwambo , na akuluakulu adadza kuna iye

41011029	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Ndinakuvunzanimbo chinthu chibodzi chene basi ; munganditawira , ndinati ndikupangeni utongi una ine wakuchita nawo pinthu penepi . 
41011030	Utongi wa Yohani wakubatiza nawo , udabulukira kupi ? Ayi udabulukira kuna Mulungu penu kuna munthu ? Ndipangeni ! "
41011031	Iwo adatoma kupokanyisana okhokha mbati , " Tinalonganji ? Tingalonga kuti udabulukira kuna Mulungu , anati alonge kuti : ' Mudakhonderanji , mphapo , kukhulupira pidalonga Yohani ? '
41011032	Mbwenye tingalonga kuti , ' Udabulukira kuna munthu . . . ' " Penepa akhagopa anthu , thangwi onsene akhapidziwadi kuti Yohani akhali mprofeti . 
41011033	Natenepo adamtawira Yesu mbati , " Ife nkhabe kupidziwa . " Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Inembo sinakupangani tayu utongi una ine wakuchita nawo pinthu penepi . "
41012001	Yesu adatoma kulonga nawo m'misangani mbati , "

Mbwenye mumbafunzisa pyakuonadi pya makhaliro ambafuna Mulungu kuna anthu . Ngatipangenimbo , ayi nkhudawira mwambo wathu kukhoma msonkho kuna Mfumu wa Roma ? Ayi tikhome penu tileke kukhoma ? "

41012020	Pidachitwa na amuna anomwe ubaleawo ; nanawo adasemba mbafa wakusowa ana .

41012023	Pansiku inadzalamuka anthu kuirnfa , mkaziyo anadzakhala wa ani , podi onsene anomwe ubaleawo akhadamsemba ? "
41012024	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Imwe mwadodomeka pikulu , thangwi imwe nkhabe dziwa Malemba penu mphamvu ya Mulungu tayu .

41012027	Iye ndi Mulungu wa anthu a moyo , si wa anyakufa tayu . Imwe mwadodomeka pikulu . "
41012028	Penepo pakhali mfunzisi unango wa mwambo mbaava akupokanyisana . Pidapiona iye kuti Yesu adatawira Asaduki mwadidi , adavunzambo Yesu mbati , " Pa matongero onsene , akufunika pyakwanga ngapi ? "

41012031	Matongero achiwiri akufunika pyakwanga ngakuti , ' Mfune mwanzako ninga mumbapifunira iwe wekha ene . ' Nkhabe matongero anango akupiringana awiriwa tayu . "
41012032	Mfunzisi wa mwambo ule adalonga kuna Yesu mbati , " Mwatawira mwadidi , Mfunzisi ! Ndimomwene ninga mwalongera imwe kuti Mbuya ndi Mulungu yekha nakuti nkhabe mulungu unango , mbwenye iye ene basi . 
41012033	Nakuti munthu afune Mulungu na mtimache onsene , na kunyerezera kwache konsene , pontho na mphamvu zache zonsene ; nakuti pontho afune mwanzache ninga mumbapifunira iye yekha ene . 41012034	Tenepo pidaona Yesu kuti akhadamtawira mwanzeru , adampanga mbati , " Iwe uli chifupi kutambira Mulungu kukhala Mfumu wako . " Mudamala iye kulonga penepi , nkhabe mbodzi adawanga pontho mtima kuvunza Yesu chinthu na chibodzi chene tayu . 
41012035	Pikhafunzisa Yesu m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , adavunza mbati , " Afunzisi a mwambo ambalongeranji kuti Khristu anadzakhala chidzukulu cha Davite ?

41013001	Pikhabuluka Yesu pa Nyumba ya Mulungu , mbodzi wa anyakufunzache adalonga mbati , " Mfunzisi ! Yang'anani kukula kwa miyala na nyumbazi ! "

41013005	Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Khalani m'maso , kuti paleke khala unango wakukunyengezani . 
41013006	Thangwi anthu azinji anadzabwera mbadzapilonga kuti iwo ndi Khristu , pontho iwo anadzanyengeza anthu azinji . 
41013007	Mungadzava kumenyana penu kuti kwinango kuna nkhondo , lekani dzasanyika m'mitima mwanu . Pinthu ninga penepi mphyakuti pichitike . Mbwenye si kuti pikulonga kuti mamalisiro afika tayu . 
41013008	Dzinza inadzamenyana na dzinza inzache , dziko inadzachita nkhondo na dziko inzache . Panadzakhala piteketeke ponsene pene , mbapadzakhala njala . Nyatwa zenezi zinadzakhala ninga nthomatoma yakuva kupha kwa mkazi wamimba pakubala . 
41013009	" Imwe mupiyang'anire mwekha ene . Munati mudzamangwe mbamuendeswa kuthando ya miseru . Munadzamenywa m'nyumba zakupemphereramo . Munadzaimira pamaso pa atongi na mafumu kuchita umboni pya ine kuna iwo . 
41013010	Mphangwa Zadidi zimaliswe lalikwa kuna anthu a madzinza onsene nsiku yakumalisa mbidzati fika .

41013015	Ngakhala munthu ali pansoyi ya nyumbache aleke vunga ndzidzi kutchitha mbapita m'nyumba mule kabulusamo chinthu na chibodzi chene kuthawa nacho .

41013019	Thangwi nyatwa za nsiku zenezo zinadzakhala zakugoswa pyakwanga kupiringana zonsene zidachitika padziko yapansi pano kubulukira ndzidzi udalenga Mulungu dziko yapansi kufikirana ndzidzi uno . Pontho hakunadzakhalave pinango ninga penepi tayu .

41014039	Yesu adenda pontho kapemphera mafala abodzibodzi ninga pakutoma . 
41014040	Iye adadza pontho kuna anyakufunzache mbaagumana akugona ; thangwi maso awo adalemera . Natenepo iwo adasowa chakuti alonge kuna Yesu . 
41014041	Pidadza iye pontho kuna iwo kachitatu , Yesu adalonga mbati , " Mukupuma na kugona pyanu basi ? Pyakwana ! Ndzidzi wafika ! Ngayang'anani , Mwana Munthu akuperekwa m'manja mwa anthu akudawa . 
41014042	Lamukani , tiende ! Ngayang'anani , nyakundipereka uyo anadzayo ! "
41014043	Yesu akhali m'kati kulonga pidafika Yudasi , mbodzi wa anyakufunza khumi na awiri ale , pabodzi na mwinji wakuphatirira matalasada na pigomba . Iwo adatumwa na anyansembe akulu , afunzisi a mwambo na akuluakulu . 
41014044	Nyakupereka Yesuyo akhadapangiza mwinji ule chidzindikiro chakuti , " Munthu anamwenyika ine mwakumpsompsonayo ndiye ene anafuna imwe . Mukammange mbamuende naye mwakuyang'anirwa na anyankhondo . "
41014045	Si ndzidzi Yudasi nkhufika , adenderatu kuna Yesu mbakalonga mbati , " Mfunzisi ! " mbampsompsona . 
41014046	Natenepo anthu ale adamphata Yesu mbammanga . 
41014047	Mbwenye mbodzi wa anthu adaimira penepowo , adasolola talasadache mbakhamwadza bitchu wa Nyansembe Wamkulu na kumgwandiratu khutu . 
41014048	Yesu adaavunza mbati , " Mwatani mwachita kudza na matalasada na pigomba dzandiphata khala ninga ndine phanga ?
41014049	Nsiku na nsiku ndikhali namwe kufunzisa m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , mbwenye imwe hamudandimanga tayu . Kwache Malemba anati akwanekwane . "
41014050	Tenepo anyakufunza onsene adamsiya mbathawa pyawo . 
41014051	Mphale unango wakuvala chakufinika chache chene basi akhatewera Yesu . Anthu ale adapiyesa kumphata , 
41014052	mbwenye iye adathawa chipezipezi kusiya chakufinika chachecho m'nduli . 
41014053	Kubuluka penepo Yesu adakwatirwa kunyumba ya Nyansembe Wamkulu kule kudagumanyikana anyansembe akulu onsene , akuluakulu , na afunzisi a mwambo . 
41014054	Peturo adatewera m'nduli pakamsinzo mbakapita muchintalo cha nyumba ya Nyansembe Wamkulu . Peturo adakhala pansi mwenemo pabodzi na anyakulondali mbaotha moto . 
41014055	Anyansembe akulu pabodzi na onsene a m'Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda akhayesa kugumana umboni wakupambizira nawo Yesu , towera amphe , mbwenye hadaugumana tayu . 
41014056	Mboni zizinji zidalongera Yesu umboni wakunama , mbwenye umboni wawowo hukhaphatizana tayu . 
41014057	Amuna anango adalamuka mbapambizira Yesu mbati , 
41014058	" Tidamva weneyu akulonga kuti , ' Ndinadzafudza Nyumba ya Mulungu yakumangwa na anthuyi mbandidzamanga inango yokhonda mangwa na anthu , pangadzagwanda nsiku zitatu . ' "
41014059	Mbwenye , penepo pene , umboni wawo hudaphatizane pontho tayu . 
41014060	Nyansembe Wamkulu adalamuka pakati pa anthu onsene mbavunza Yesu mbati , " Watani unakhonda tawira umboni unakulongera anthuwu ? "
41014061	Mbwenye Yesu hadabuluse fala tayu . Iye adakhala pyache mulomo phoo ! Nyansembe Wamkulu adavunza pontho Yesu mbati , " Ayi ndiwedi Khristu , Mwana Mulungu Nyakulemedzwa ? "
41014062	Yesu adamtawira mbati , " Ndine ene pano . Monsene munati mudzaone Mwana Munthu akhala kudzanja yamadyo ya Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene pontho munadzamuona akudza pamakole a kudzulu ! "
41014063	Nyansembe Wamkulu adang'amba mkanjo wache mbalonga mbati , " Ife nkhabe funave mboni zinango pontho tayu !
41014064	Mwava mwekha kushola Mulungu kwachita iyeku . Apo mukunyerezera tani ? " Anthu onsene adatawira kuti akonwa , pontho athema kuphiwa . 
41014065	Anthu anango adatoma kuphulira Yesu mata , mbammanga kunkhope mbammenya mbampanga mbati , " Lotera , mbani akumenya ! " Anyakulondali adamkwata mbammenyambo . 
41014066	Pikhali Peturo pansi muchintalo cha nyumba ya Nyansembe Wamkuluyo , nyabasa mbodzi wachitsikana wa Nyansembe Wamkulu adadza mwenemo . 
41014067	Pidaona iye Peturo akuotha moto , adamuyang'anisisa mbalonga mbati , " Iwe pontho ukhali naye pabodzi Yesu wa ku Nazareti ule . "
41014068	Mbwenye Peturo adakhonda mbati , " Ine nkhabe kumdziwa , pontho nkhabe vesa pinalonga imwepi . " Tenepo adabulukiratu mbaenda kumsuwo . Penepo pene dzongwe adalira . 
41014069	Mtsikanayo adamuona pontho mbalonga kuna anthu akhali penepowo mbati , " Mwanzathuyu ndi mbodzi wa enewo . "
41014070	Peturo adakhonda pontho . Pidagwanda ndzidzi pang'ono , anthu akuimira penepowo adalonga kuna Peturo mbati , " Ndimomwene , iwe ndiwe mbodzi wa iwo , thangwi ndiwe Mgalilea . "
41014071	Tenepo Peturo adalonga mbati , " Ndikudumbira kuti pinalonga inepi mphyakuonadi ! Mulungu mbanditchunyuse ngakhala ndikulonga pyakunama ! Munthu analonga imweyu , sinamdziwa tayu ! "
41014072	Kabodzi na kabodzi dzongwe adalira kachiwiri . Penepo Peturo adakumbuka pidampanga Yesu kuti : " Dzongwe mbadzati lira kawiri , unadzalonga katatu kuti hunandidziwa tayu . " Tenepo Peturo adasweka mtima mbalira . 
41015001	Bzobzo na machibese anyansembe akulu , akuluakulu , na afunzisi a mwambo , na onsene a m'Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda adagumanyikana pabodzi msangansanga kuverana pyakuti achite na Yesu . Tenepo adammanga mbaenda naye kamtula kuna Pilato . 
41015002	Pilato adavunza Yesu mbati , " Ayi iwe ndiwedi Mfumu wa Ayuda ? " Yesu adamtawira mbati , " Ndimomwene , ninga mwalongera imwe . "
41015003	Anyansembe akulu ale adampambizira Yesu pinthu pizinji , 
41015004	natenepo Pilato adamvunza pontho mbati , " Hunatawira tayu ? Ngava pyonsene pinakulongera iwopi . "
41015005	Mbwenye Yesu hadabuluse fala tayu basi , tenepo Pilato adadodoma . 
41015006	Pandzidzi onsene wa Phwando ya Paska , ukhali nsambo wa Pilato kusudzula nyaperezo mbodzi anafuna anthu kuti asudzulweyo . 
41015007	Pakhali mamuna unango dzinache Baraba , ule akhali m'perezo pabodzi na anyakupandukira Boma , ale akhadapha anthu pachimpiningu . 
41015008	Mwinji udadza dzapempha Pilato kuti aachitire ninga mwa nsambo wache . 
41015009	Pilato adaavunza mbati , " Munafuna ndikusudzulireni Mfumu wa Ayudayi ? "
41015010	Iye adapidziwa mwadidi mwene kuti anyansembe akulu adamtula Yesu kuna iye thangwi ya bivu .
