41015012	Pilato adaavunza mbati , " Ndichitenji naye mphapo , analonga imwe kuti ndi Mfumu wa Ayudayi ? "
41015013	Anthu ale adakhuwa mbati , " Mkhomereni pamtanda ! "
41015014	Pilato adaavunza mbati , " Thangwi yache njanji ? Asosa mseru wanji ? " Mbwenye iwo adakhuwa mwakugaluza fala mbati , " Mkhomereni pamtanda ! "
41015015	Pilato , na kufuna kuti mwinji ule ukomerwe , adaasudzulira Baraba . Tenepo adatonga kuti Yesu akwapulwe mbampereka kuti akakhomerwe pamtanda . 
41015016	Anyankhondo adamkwatira Yesu muchintalo cha nyumba ya mkadamu wa Boma mbagumanyisa pabodzi anyankhondo anango a guluyo . 
41015017	Iwo adavazika Yesu mkanjo wachoza , mbasasanya chipewu cha chifumu na matsamvu a minga , mbachivazika mumsolo mwache . 
41015018	Tenepo iwo adatoma kumchitira sawasha mbalonga mbati , " Dondowe ! Mfumu wa Ayuda ! "
41015019	Akhamkwapula mumsolo na ntswamu , mbamphulira mata , kumgodamira na kumulambira . 
41015020	Pidamala iwo kumselusa , adamdulisa mkanjo wachozawo mbamvazika nguwo zache . Tenepo adamkwata mbaenda naye kamkhomera pamtanda . 
41015021	Panjira iwo adagumanikana na munthu dzinache Simoni , ule akhabulukira kumidzi kwenda kumzinda . Anyankhondo adamkakamiza kuti athukule mtanda wa Yesu . Kwawo kwa Simoni kukhali ku Kirene pontho iye akhali babawo Alekezanda na Rufu . 
41015022	Iwo adenda na Yesu kumbuto yakuthulwa Gologota , kweneku nkhulonga kuti , " Ndi mbuto ya Chibade cha msolo . "
41015023	Kweneko adampasa vinyu wakuvungaza na ntombwe wakuthulwa mure kuti amwe , mbwenye iye hadatawire tayu . 
41015024	Tenepo adamkhomera pamtanda mbagawana pyawo nguwo zache pakuchita ntsango kuti aone chinafuna kwata munthu . 
41015025	Ikhali ora yachifemba na machibese idakhomera iwo Yesu pamtanda . 
41015026	Chidziwiso cha mseru udapherwa iye chidalembwa kuti , " Mfumu wa Ayuda . "
41015027	Iwo adakhomera pontho mbava ziwiri pamitanda na Yesu , mbodzi kumadyo kwache , unango kumabzere kwache .

42001001	Teofilo nyakulemedzwa : Anthu azinji ayesayesa kulemba mbiri ya pinthu pyonsene pidachitika pakati pathu . 
42001002	Iwo adalemba pya pinthu pidapangwa ife pile na ale adapiona na maso kutomera pakutoma , pontho na ale adalalika Mphangwa Zadidi . 
42001003	Na thangwi yakuti ine ndidateweza mwadidi mwene pinthu pyonsenepi kutomera pakutoma , ndapinyerezera kuti mphyadidi kuti ndikulemberenimbo pinthu penepi munyandandanda mwache . 
42001004	Ndachita tenepa towera mudziwe kuona konsene kwa pinthu pyafunziswa imwe . 
42001005	Pandzidzi ukhali Herodi mfumu wa Yudea , pakhali nyansembe dzinache Zakaria , wa m'gulu ya anyansembe ya Abia . Mkazache akhali Elizabeti , iyembo akhali chidzukulu cha Aroni , nyansembe . 
42001006	Uwiriawo akhali akulungama pamaso pa Mulungu mbavera miyambo na matongero a Mulungu mwadidi mwene . 
42001007	Iwo akhali akusowa ana , thangwi Elizabeti akhali wakuuma nthumbo , pontho iye pabodzi na Zakaria ene akhali akukalamba . 
42001008	Nsiku ibodzi Zakaria akhaphata basache ninga nyansembe m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , thangwi buswa ya gulu yache ikhadakwana . 
42001009	Iye adasankhulwa pakuchita ntsango , ninga mwa mtemo wa unyansembe , kuti aende m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kaotcha pinthu pyakununkhira paguwa . 
42001010	Mwinji ukhapemphera panja pandzidzi ukhaotcha iye pyakununkhira . 
42001011	Mngelo wa Mbuya adaonekera kuna iye , mngeloyo adaimira kukhundu yamadyo ya guwa ikhaotcherwa pyakununkhirapyo . 
42001012	Zakaria adatutumuka mbachita mantha pidaona iye mngeloyo . 
42001013	Mbwenye mngelo adampanga mbati , " Zakaria , leka chita mantha ! Mulungu ava kupemphera kwako , pontho mkazako Elizabeti anadzakubalira mwana wamamuna mbudzamthula Yohani . 
42001014	Mwana weneyu angadzabalwa unadzakomerwa na kusekera , anthumbo anango azinji anadzakomerwa . 
42001015	Iye anadzakhala munthu wamkulu pamaso pa Mbuya . Iye aleke dzamwa vinyu penu chakumwa chaukali . Kutomera pansiku yakubalwa kwache , anadzakhala wakudzazwa na Mzimu Wakuchena . 
42001016	Pontho anadzadzesa anthu azinji a Israele kuabwezera kuna Mbuya Mulungu wawo . 
42001017	Iye anadzatsogola patsogolo pa Mbuya , mwakuwangisa na mphamvu ninga mprofeti Elia . Anadzachitisa ana na ababawo kuti averane pontho ; anadzasanduza anthu okhonda vera kuti anyerezere ninga kunyerezera kumbachita anthu akulungama . Anadzachitisa kuti anthu a Mbuya asasanyikire pya kudza kwache . "
42001018	Zakaria adalonga kuna mngelo ule mbati , " Ine ndine munthu wakukalamba na mkazanga ene ngwakukalambambo . Apo ndinapidziwa tani kuti penepi mphyakuonadi ? "
42001019	Mngelo adamtawira mbati , " Ndine Gabriele , nyakuimira pamaso pa Mulungu , ule andituma kuti ndilonge nawe na kukupanga mphangwa zadidizi . 
42001020	Mbwenye iwe hudakhulupire mphangwa zangazi tayu , zile zinadzakhala zakuonadi pandzidzi wache . Na thangwi yakukhonda khulupira kwako , unati ukhale wakuchimwana kulonga ; mulomo wako unadzakhala wakuphopha kufikirana nsiku inaftina dzachitika pidadumbira ine pile . "
42001021	Pandzidzi ukhachitika penepi anthu akhadikhira Zakaria ale adadodoma na thangwi ikhamdembukisa m'Nyumba ya Mulungumo . 
42001022	Pidabuluka iye m'Nyumba mule adachimwana kulonga nawo , natenepo iwo adapidziwa kuti Zakaria adaona masomphenya m'Nyumba ya Mulungu mule . Iye akhalonga pyache na manja , thangwi adachimwana kubulusa fala . 
42001023	Pidamala buswache m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , Zakaria adabwerera kumusa kwache .

42001033	mbadzakhala mfumu wa dzinza ya Yakobo kwenda na kwenda ; ufumu wache hunadzamalave tayu . "

42005012	Pikhali Yesu kuluwani inango , adagumanikana na munthu wa matanya . Pidaona iye Yesu , adapiponya pansi mbampempha mbati , " Mbuya , imwe mungapifuna , munakwanisa kundichenesa . "

42005014	Yesu adampanga mbati , " Leka kapanga munthu na mbodzi ene , mbwenye ndokoletu kuna nyansembe akakuone ; nakuti onsene akapidziwe kuti wawangadi , kapereke nsembe zidatonga Mose zile . "
42005015	Kwache mbiri ya Yesu idaveka pikulu pene mwakuti mwinji udadza kumvesera na kuwangiswa utendawo . 
42005016	Mbwenye kazinji kene Yesu akhaenda kumbuto za yekha ene mbakapemphera . 
42005017	Nsiku inango , pikhafunzisa Yesu , Afarisi na afunzisi anango a mwambo ale adadza kubulukira kumidzi yonsene ya ku Galilea , Yudea pontho na a ku Yerusalemu akhakhala pansi penepo . Mphamvu ya Mbuya ikhali na Yesu yakuti awangise nayo atenda . 
42005018	Amuna anango adadza na makha a munthu wamfutete mbapiyesera kupita naye m'nyumba kuti akamtule pamaso pa Yesu . 
42005019	Pidasowa iwo njira yakumpitisira nayo m'nyumbamo thangwi ya mwinji , adakwira naye pansoyi mbabulusa maphali anango mbamtchithisira pamakha m'gulumo mbamfikisa pamaso pa Yesu . 
42005020	Pidaona Yesu chikhulupiro chawocho , adalonga kuna nyamfuteteyo mbati , " Shamwali , pyakudawa pyako pyalekererwa . "
42005021	Afarisi na afunzisi a mwambo adatoma kupivunza okha ene mbati , " Mbani weneyu anashola Mulunguyu ? Mbani anakwanisa kulekerera pyakudawa , ayi si Mulungu yekha tayu ? "
42005022	Yesu adadziwa pikhanyerezera iwo mbalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Mwatani munanyerezera pinthu ninga penepi ?
42005023	Chifupi ntchipi , kulonga kuti , ' Pyakudawa pyako pyalekererwa ' , penu kuti , ' Lamuka ufambe ' ?
42005024	Ndinati ndikupangizenidi kuti Mwana Munthu ana utongi wakulekerera pyakudawa padziko yapansi ! " Natenepo adalonga kuna nyamfutete ule mbati , " Ndikukupanga ; lamuka uthukule makhako uende kwanu ! "
42005025	Kabodzi na kabodzi munthu ule adaimira , anthu onsene mbamuona . Iye adathukula makhache akhadagonera iye mbaenda kwawo akukuza Mulungu . 
42005026	Anthu onsene adadodoma pyakwanga . Na mantha pikulu iwo adakuza Mulungu mbati , " Lero taona pinthu pyakudodomesa ! "
42005027	Kubuluka penepo Yesu adabuluka mbaona nyakukhomesa msonkho , dzinache Levi , alikhale m'nyumba yakukhomesera msonkho . Yesu adalonga kuna iye mbati , " Nditewere . "
42005028	Levi adalamuka , adasiya pinthu pyonsene , mbamteweradi . 
42005029	Kubuluka penepo Levi adakasasanyira Yesu phwando ikulu kumsuwo kwache . Pakati pa anyakuchemerwa kuphwandoko pakhali anyakukhomesa msonkho azinji pabodzi na anthu anango . 
42005030	Afarisi anango , makamaka ale akhali afunzisi a mwambo , adadungunya kuna anyakufunza a Yesu mbati , " Munadyeranji na kumwa pabodzi na anyakukhomesa msonkho pontho na anyakudawawa ? "
42005031	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Anthu akuwanga nkhabe tuna ng'anga tayu , mbwenye atenda . 
42005032	Ine sidadzere dzachemera anthu akulungama tayu , mbwenye anyakudawawa kuti aleke pyakudawa pyawo . "
42005033	Anthu anango adalonga kuna Yesu mbati , " Anyakufunza a Yohani ambapemphera na kupimana kudya kazinji kene , pontho anyakufunza a Afarisi ambachita chibodzibodzi , mbwenye anyakufunzanuwa ambalila kudya na kumwa kwene pyawo . "
42005034	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Ayi mungachitise anyakuchemerwa kuphwando yakukazhali kupimana kudya , nyakusembayo mbali ponthopo ? Nkhabe tayu !
42005035	Mbwenye ndzidzi unadzafika unafuna dzabuluswa nyakusembayo pakati pawo , tenepo iwo anadzapimana kudya . "
42005036	Yesu adaapanga pontho msangani mbati , " Nkhabe munthu angang'ambe chigamba panguwo itswa mbachisonera panguwo yakale . Angachita tenepo , iye anang'amba nguwo itswa , pontho chigamba cha panguwo itswa nkhabe themerana na panguwo yakale tayu . 
42005037	Pontho nkhabe munthu ambatsanyulira vinyu wachinchino m'mabudu a nthembe akuphatisirwa kale basa tayu , thangwi vinyu wachinchinoyo anadzatumbula mabuduwo . Tenepo vinyu anadzatayika pontho mabuduwo anadzavungika . 
42005038	Pyadidi pyache vinyu wachinchino atsanyulirwe m'mabudu achinchino !
42005039	Pontho nkhabe munthu ambafuna pontho vinyu wachinchino angamala kumwa vinyu wakale tayu , thangwi ambalonga kuti wakale ngwakudzipa . "
42006001	Yesu akhagwanda na m'minda ya tirigu pa Nsiku Yakupuma . Anyakufunzache adatoma kukwedzula ngala za tirigu , adamting'inda m'manja mwawo mbadya . 
42006002	Afarisi anango adavunza mbati , " Munaphatiranji pinthu pinakhondesa mwambo wathu kupiphata pa Nsiku Yakupuma ? "
42006003	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Kadi imwe hamudawerenge tayu pidachita Davite na anzache ndzidzi udava iwo njala ?
42006004	Iye adapita m'Nyumba ya Mulungu mbakwata mikate yakuperekwa kuna Mulungu , adaidya mbapasambo anthu ache . Pikhali pinthu pyakudawira mwambo kuti munthu ene pyache , kupambula anyansembe , adye mikate yeneyo . "
42006005	Tenepo Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Mwana Munthu ndi Mbuya wa Nsiku Yakupuma . "
42006006	Pa Nsiku inango Yakupuma , Yesu adakapita m'nyumba yakupemphereramo mbakafunzisa . Mwenemo mukhali munthu wakulamala dzanja yamadyo . 
42006007	Afunzisi anango a mwambo pabodzi na Afarisi anango akhasakira Yesu thangwi ya kumsumira nayo pakuchita pinthu pyakudawika . Natenepo adamuyang'ana naye phanamana kuti aone khala ninga anawangisa pa Nsiku Yakupuma . 
42006008	Mbwenye Yesu adadziwa manyerezero awo . Tenepo adapanga munthu ule mbati , " Lamuka udze kutsogolo kuno . " Munthu ule adalamukadi mbakaimira kutsogoloko . 
42006009	Tenepo Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Ndikuvunzeni . Mwambo wathu umbatitawirisa kuchitanji pa Nsiku Yakupuma ? Kuphedza , penu kuchita pyakudawika ? Kupulumusa moyo wa munthu , penu kuupha ? "
42006010	Iye adayang'anayang'ana anthu onsenewo mbalonga kuna munthuyo mbati , " Futhula dzanjako . " Iye adachitadi tenepo , dzanjacheyo mbibwerera ninga mwakale . 
42006011	Anthu ale adazhangali pyakwanga mbaverana pyakuti achite na Yesu . 
42006012	Pandzidzi wenewo , Yesu adenda kuphiri kapemphera mbaphuphudza na kupemphera kuna Mulungu . 
42006013	Pidachena kunja , iye adachemera anyakufunzache mbasankhulapo khumi na awiri , adapasa iye dzina yakuti mbanyakutumwa ale . 
42006014	Simoni , ule adapasa iye dzina yakuti Peturo , na mbaleache Andrea ; Yakobo na Yohani ; Filipi na Batolomeo ;
42006015	Mateo na Tomasi ; Yakobo mwana Alufeo ; na Simoni ( mbodzi wa Ayuda wakufuna kudzesa utumbe kudziko ya Israele ) ;
42006016	Yudasi mwana Yakobo ; na Yudasi Iskarioti akhafuna dzapereka Yesu kuna anyamalwache ule . 
42006017	Pidadza Yesu pabodzi na anyakutumwa kubulukira kuphiri kule , adaimira pambuto yakusowa pitunda pabodzi na mwinji wa anyakufunzache . Mwinji ukulu ukhali penepo kubulukira ku Yudea konsene , ku Yerusalemu , pontho ku Turo na Sidoni , mizinda ya m'khundu mwa nyanza yamunyu . 
42006018	Iwo adadza dzamvesera , pontho dzawangiswa utendawo . Anyakusanyiswa na mizimu yakuipa ale adawangiswambo . 
42006019	Anthu onsene adayesayesa kumkhuya thangwi mphamvu zikhabuluka muna iye mbiziwangisa anthu onsene . 
42006020	Yesu adayang'ana anyakufunzache mbaapanga mbati , " Akutsanzaya ndimwe anyakutcherenga ; thangwi Ufumu wa Mulungu ngwanu !
42006021	" Akutsanzaya ndimwe munava njala ndzidzi uno , thangwi munadzakhuta ! " Akutsanzaya ndimwe munalira ndzidzi uno , thangwi munadzasekera !
42006022	" Akutsanzaya ndimwe munachitirwa pyaumalwa na anthu mbakukhondani na kukutikanani , mbakulongani kuti ndimwe akuipa , thangwi ya Mwana Munthu . 
42006023	Penepi pingachitika , komerwani , pontho muvine na kutsanzaya , thangwi mwakoyerwa mfupo ukulu kudzulu . Kumbukani kuti makolo a anthu enewa anafuna dzakusanyisani ale adachita chibodzibodzi kuna maprofeti . 
42006024	" Mbwenye muna dzedze ndimwe anyakufuma , thangwi mwatambiriratu pyakukutsanzayisani . 
42006025	" Muna dzedze ndimwe akukhuta ndzidzi uno , thangwi munadzakhala na njala . " Muna dzedze ndimwe akukomerwa ndzidzi uno , thangwi munadzatsukwala mbamulira . 
42006026	" Muna dzedze ndimwe anthu onsene angakusimbani , thangwi makolo awo adachita chibodzibodzi kuna maprofeti akunama . 
42006027	" Mbwenye imwe anyakundivesera , ndikukupangani kuti afuneni anyamalwanu , chitani udidi kuna anyakukuzondani . 
42006028	Tsanzayisani anyakukutembererani , pontho apempherereni anyakukuboneresani . 
42006029	Ngakhala munthu unango anakumenya phutu ibodzi , mpase amenye inangoyo . Munthu angakupokosera mkanjo wako , mpase pontho na mayalako ene . 
42006030	Munthu anakupempha chinthu , mpase . Pontho munthu angakwata chinthu chako , leka kumbwezesa . 
42006031	Chitirani anthu anango pinthu pimbafuna imwe kuti iwo akuchitireni . 
42006032	" Ngakhala mumbaafuna anthu okha ambakufunanimbo ale , mungadikhire kutambira mfupo wanji mphapo ? Na anthu enembo akudawa , ambafuna ale ambaafunambo . 
42006033	Pontho mungachita udidi kuna anthu okha ambakuchitiranimbo udidi ale , mungatambire mfupo wanji ? Na anthu enembo akudawa ambachitambo tenepo . 
42006034	Ngakhala munafiyalisa anthu okha ambadziwa imwe kuti anadzakubwezerani ale , munadzatambira mfupo wanji ? Podi na anyakudawa enembo ambafiyalisa anyakudawa anzawo , towera adzaabwezere pyonthopyonthopyo . 
42006035	Tayu ! Afuneni anyamalwanu pontho achitireni udidi . Fiyalisani mbamukhonda dikhira kubwezerwa . Tenepo munadzatambira mfupo ukulu , mbamudzakhala ana a Mulungu Wakudzuludzulu . Thangwi iye ambachitira udidi anthu akuipa , pontho na okhonda pereka takhuta ene . 
42006036	Khalani na nsisi ninga zina Babanu . 
42006037	" Lekani tonga mseru anthu anango , tenepo Mulungu nee anadzakutonganimbobi . Lekani longa kuti anthu anango akonwa , tenepo Mulungu nee anadzalongambo kuti mwakonwa tayu . Lekererani anthu anango , tenepo Mulungu anadzakulekereranimbo . 
42006038	Perekani kuna anango , tenepo Mulungu anadzakupasanimbo . Iye anadzakhuthulira m'manja mwanu mdida wakudzala , wakutsindirika , na wakutayikira . Mdida unapasa imwe anango , Mulungu anadzaphatisa basa mdida onthowo kupasambo imwe . "
42006039	Yesu adaapanga msangani mbati , " Boliboli hangaphate nsenzi boliboli mwanzache tayu , thangwi angachita tenepo onsene uwiriawo anagwera m'dzenje . 
42006040	Nyakufunza nkhabe piringana mfunzisi wache tayu , mbwenye angamalisa kufunza kwacheko , anadzakhalambo ninga mfunzisi wacheyo . 
42006041	" Unayang'aniranji chitsotso chili m'diso mwa mwanzako mbukhonda nyerezera chigo chili m'diso mwakomo ?
42006042	Unalonga tani kuna mwanzako kuti , ' Mwanzanga , ndikubuluse chitsotso chili m'diso mwako , ' mbuchimwana kuona chigo chili m'diso mwakomo ? Mfakafakawe ! Toma wabulusa chigo chili m'diso mwakocho , natenepo unadzakwanisa kuona mwadidi kubulusa chitsotso chili m'diso mwa mwanzakocho . 
42006043	" Muti wadidi nkhabe bala nsapo zakuipa tayu . Chibodzibodzi , muti wakuipa nkhabe bala nsapo zadidi tayu . 
42006044	Miti yonsene imbadziwika na nsapo zimbabala iyo . Imwe nkhabe tchola nkhuyu m'mikandankhuku , penu kutchola mphesa m'muti wamphinimini tayu . 
42006045	Munthu wadidi ambabulusa pinthu pyadidi pa pyadidi pyakoyeka mumtima mwache ; munthumbo wakuipa ambabulusa pinthu pyakuipa pa pyakuipa pyakoyeka mumtima mwache . Thangwi mulomo umbalonga pyakunjipa pyakukhala mumtima . 
42006046	" Munandichemereranji kuti , ' Mbuya , Mbuya , ' mbamukhonda chita pinalonga ine ?
42006047	Ndinakuonesani kukhala kwachita munthu wakudza kuna ine , mbava mafalanga na kuachita . 
42006048	Iye akhala ninga munthu angafuna kumanga nyumba . Iye ambakumba pansi mwakuzika mbaphata phanzwi , penepo ambamanga maziko a nyumbache . Pidakuka rnkulo mbutayikira , udamenya nyumbayo , mbwenye iyo hidatekenyeke tayu , thangwi ikhadamangwa mwadidi . 
42006049	Mbwenye ule anava mafalanga mbakhonda kuachita , akhala ninga munthu wakumanga nyumba padzuludzulu okhonda zikisa maziko . Madzi akutayikira a mumkulo adamenya nyumbayo . Natenepo iyo idagomoka mbisakaliratu kabodzi kene . "
42007001	Pidamala Yesu kulonga pinthu pyonsenepi kuna anthu , adenda ku Kafaranao . 
42007002	Mkadamu wa anyankhondo dzana akhali na nyabasache wapamtima . Nyabasayo akhadwala chifupi imfa . 
42007003	Pidava mkadamuyi pya Yesu , adatuma akuluakulu a Chiyuda kampempha kuti adze dzamuwangisira nyabasacheyo . 
42007004	Pidafika iwo kuna Yesu , adampempha mwakumbulumundira mbati , " Munthuyu athemadi kuti mumphedze . 
42007005	Iye ambaafuna anthu athu , pontho iye ene adatimangira nyumba yakupemphereramo . "
42007006	Natenepo Yesu adenda nawo . Pikhali Yesu chifupi kufika panyumba ya mkadamu ule , iye adatuma ashamwali ache kuna Yesu kampanga mbati , " Mbuya , lekani kupiboneresa , thangwi sidatheme kuti imwe mupite m'nyumba mwanga tayu . 
42007007	Pontho ine ndidanyerezera kuti sidatheme kudza ndekha ene kuna imwe tayu . Mulile longa kwene , nyabasanga anawanga . 
42007008	Ine pontho , ndine munthu wakutongwa na akadamu anga . Ine ndina anyankhondo anango ambatonga inembo . Unango ndingampanga kuti , ' Ndoko ! ' ambaendadi . Ndingapanga unango kuti , ' Bwera ! ' ambabweradi . Pontho ndingapanga nyabasanga kuti , ' Phata ichi ! ' ambapbatadi . "
42007009	Pidava Yesu mafala enewa , adadodoma nawo . Adazungunuka mbapanga mwinji ukhamtewerawo mbati , " Ndimomwene , handidagumana tayu munthu wakukhala na chikhulupiro ninga chenicheni , podi na mu Israele mwene . "
42007010	Amuna akhadatumwa ale adabwerera kumusa kwa mkadamuyo mbagumana nyabasayo awanga . 
42007011	Si ndzidzi nkhubuluka penepoe Yesu na anyakufunzache pabodzi na mwinji ukulu , adenda kuluwani ya Naini . 
42007012	Pidasala Yesu chifupi kufika pamsuwo wa luwaniyo , adagumanikana na maliro . Nyakufayo akhali mphale . Mache mphaleyo akhali mamfelwa , pontho mwanache akhali yekha eneyo basi . Anthu azinji a muluwanimo akhali naye pabodzi . 
42007013	Pidamuona Mbuya , adava naye nsisi pikulu , mbampanga mbati , " Leka lira . "
42007014	Yesu adadza chifupi mbakhuya bawuluyo , tenepo amuna akuthukula bawuluyo adaimira . Tenepo Yesu adalonga mbati , " Mphalewe , ndikukupanga kuti lamuka ! "
42007015	Nyakufayo adalamuka mbakhala na matako mbatoma kulonga , tenepo Yesu adampereka kuna mache . 
42007016	Anthu onsene adagoswerwa mbalemedza Mulungu . Adalonga mbati , " Mprofeti wamkulu aoneka pakati pathu . Mulungu adza dzapulumusa anthu ache . "
42007017	Mbiri ya Yesuyi idaveka m'dziko yonsene ya Yudea , na kunthemba zonsene zakuzungulira Yudeayo . 
42007018	Anyakufunza a Yohani adapanga Yohani pinthu pyonsenepyo . Natenepo iye adachemera anyakufunzache anango awiri , 
42007019	mbaatuma kuna Mbuya kamvunza mbati , " Ayi akhalongwa kuti anadzabwera ule ndimwe , penu tidikhire unango ? "
42007020	Pidafika iwo kuna Yesu , adampanga mbati , " Yohani Nyakubatiza atituma kuna imwe kuti tidzakuvunzeni ngakhala ndimwedi akhalongwa kuti anadzabwera , penu tidikhire unango . "
42007021	Pandzidzi wenewu Yesu akhawangisa utenda wa anthu azinji , na kubulusa mizimu yakuipa , mbafungula pontho maso a maboliboli azinji . 
42007022	Natenepo iye adatawira amuna adatumwa na Yohani ale mbati , " Bwererani mbamukampange Yohaniyo pyava na pyaona imwepi . Maboliboli akuona , anyamfutete akufamba , anyamatanya akucheneswa , madodo akuva , anyakufa akulamuka , pontho Mphangwa Zadidi zikulalikwa kuna anyakutcherenga . 
42007023	Ngwakutsanzaya munthu ule ' anakhonda taya chikhulupiro muna ine ! "
42007024	Pidabuluka amuna akhadatumwa na Yohani ale , Yesu adatoma kulonga kuna mwinji ule pya Yohani mbati , " Pidenda imwe kuthando mukhadikhira kaonakonji ? Mtete wakutekenyeka na mphepo ?
42007025	Mudenda kaonanji ? Munthu wakuvala nguwo zakufewa ? Nkhabe , anthu akuvala nguwo zakudula na akudya pyadidi , ambakhala m'nyumba zachifumu . 
42007026	Apo mudenda kaonanji ? Mprofeti ? Ande , ndikukupangani kuti mudakaona wakupiringana mprofeti . 
42007027	Weneyu ngule , pyache pidalongwa m'Malemba kuti , ' Mulungu adalonga mbati , Ndinadzatuma nyakutumwanga patsogolo pako kudzakusasanyira njira . '
42007028	Ndikukupangani kuti pakati pa anthu onsene adabalwa pansi pano , nkhabepo unango wamkulu kupiringana Yohani . Mbwenye wamng'onoletu mu Ufumu wa Mulungu ngwamkulu kupiringana iye . "
42007029	Anthu onsene , pabodzi na anyakukhomesa msonkho ene , adava mafala a Yesu , pontho adavera matongero akulungama a Mulungu , thangwi iwo adabatizwa na Yohaniyo . 
42007030	Mbwenye Afarisi na afunzisi a mwambo adakhonda pikhafuna kuachitira Mulungu , thangwi iwo adakhonda kubatizwa na Yohani . 
42007031	Yesu adathimiza kulonga mbati , " Chinchino ndinaasangiza nanji anthu a makauno ? Akhala ninganji ?
42007032	Iwo akhala ninga ana akukhala pamsika . Gulu ibodzi mbilonga kuna gulu inango kuti , Tidakuimbirani nyimbo zakukazhali nazo , mbwenye imwe nee mudavina tayu ! Tidakuimbirani nyimbo za pamaliro , mbwenye imwe nee mudalira tayu ! '
42007033	Yohani Nyakubatiza adadza mbapimana kudya mkate na kumwa vinyu , tenepo imwe mudamulonga kuti akhali na mzimu wakuipa . 
42007034	Mwana Munthu adadza mbadya na kumwa , tenepo imwe mudalonga kuti , ' Ngayang'anani munthu wamtima pontho dombeyi , shamwali wa anyakukhomesa msonkho na wa anthu akudawa ! '
42007035	Mbwenye onsene anazitambira nzeru za Mulungu ale , ambaonesa kuti nsakuonadi . "
42007036	Munthu unango wa m'gulu ya Afarisi adatchitcha Yesu kuti akadye naye . Natenepo Yesu adenda kunyumba ya mfarisiyo mbakakhala pansi kuti adye . 
42007037	M'mudzimo mukhali mkazi wa makhaliro akudawika . Iye adava kuti Yesu akhadya m'nyumba ya mfarisiyo , natenepo adadza na mafuta akununkhira mumtete wakusasanywa na alabasta , 
42007038	mbaimira kunduli , kumanyalo a Yesu uku akulira . Adatotesa manyalo a Yesu na misozi yache , mbaapukuta na tsitsi yache . Adampsompsona manyalowo mbaadzozeka mafuta ale . 
42007039	Mfarisi adatchitcha Yesu kudya ule , pidaona iye penepi adalonga yekha ene mbati , " Ngakhala munthuyu ndi mprofeti , mbadamdziwa kuti mkazi anamkhuyayu mbani , pontho ngwa makhaliro akutani — kuti ngwakudawika . "
42007040	Yesu adamtawira mbati , " Simoni , ndina chinthu chakuti ndikupange . " Simoni adalonga mbati , " Ndipangeni , Mfunzisi . "
42007041	Yesu adampanga mbati , " Anthu awiri adafiyali kobiri kuna nyakufiyalisa kobiri . Mbodzi adafiyali kobiri madzana mashanu , unangoyo kobiri makumashanu . 
42007042	Na thangwi yakuti iwo akhali nkhabe kobiri zakumbwezera mwenechiroyo , iye adaalekerera onsene awiri . Mbani wa awiriwa anadzamfuna pikulu ? "
42007043	Simoni adalonga mbati , " Ndikunyerezera nyakulekererwa zizinjiyo . " Yesu adampanga mbati , " Walonga pyadidi . "
42007044	Tenepo Yesu adachewukira mkazi ule , mbapanga Simoni mbati , " Ukumuona mkaziyu ? Ndapita m'nyumba mwako muno , mbwenye iwe hudandipasa madzi akutsukira manyalo anga tayu . Mbwenye iye atotesa manyalo anga na misozi mbaapukuta na tsitsi yache . 
42007045	Iwe hudandimwenyika na kundimpsompsona tayu , mbwenye chipitire changa muno iye hadaleke kumpsompsona manyalo anga tayu . 
42007046	Iwe hudadzozeke msolo wanga na mafuta tayu , mbwenye iye adzoza manyalo anga na mafuta akununkhira . 
42007047	Natenepo ndikukupanga kuti kundifuna kukulu kwaonesa iyeku kukuonesadi kuti pyakudawa pyache pizinji pyalekererwa . Mbwenye munthu wakulekererwa mwakuchepa ambaonesambo kufuna kwakuchepa . "

42010004	Lekani kwata budu ya kobiri , penu budu ya paulendo , penu na nkhwaira zene . Lekani imira panjira kuti mumwenyike anthu . 
42010005	M'nyumba monsene munakapita imwe , chakutoma mukalonge kuti , ' Mtendere mbukhale m'nyumba muno . '
42010006	Ngakhala m'nyumbamo muna munthu wa mtendere , mtendere walonga imwewo unadzakhala na iye . Mbwenye ngakhala nkhabemo munthu wa mtendere , kwatani pyanu mafala a mtendere alonga imwewo . 
42010007	Khalani m'nyumba yonthoyo . Mudye na kumwa pinakupasani iwo , thangwi nyabasa athema kupagalwi . Lekani buluka pafikira imwepo mbamuenda kakhala m'nyumba zinango . 
42010008	Mungapita m'mudzi , anthu mbakutambirani mwadidi , idyani pinakupasani iwo . 
42010009	Wangisani atenda a m'mudzimo , pontho muapange anthuwo kuti , ' Ufumu wa Mulungu wadza chifupi na imwe . '
42010010	Mbwenye mungapita m'mudzi mbakhonda kukutambirani mwadidi , muende kunjira za m'mudzimo mbamukalonga kuti , 
42010011	Na fiimbi ya m'mudzi mwanu ene yaphatirira kumanyalo kwathuyi , tikukugubudzirani kuonesa kuti pyachita imwepi mphyakudawika . Kwache dzindikirani kuti Ufumu wa Mulungu wadza chifupi na imwe . '
42010012	Ndikukupangani kuti pa Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , iye anadzavera nsisi Sodomu kupiringana mudzi wenewo . 
42010013	" Una dzedze ndiwe luwani ya Korazini ! Una dzedze ndiwe luwani ya Betesaida . Thangwi pyakudodomesa pidachitwa muna imwe mbapidachitwa m'mizinda a Turo na Sidoni , anthu a kweneko mbadavala kale masakha , na kukhala pansi mbapikhwaza dotha kuonesa kuti alekadi pyakudawa pyawo . 
42010014	Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , iye anadzavera nsisi pikulu anthu a ku Turo na Sidoni kupiringana imwepo . 
42010015	Mphapo iwembo Kafaranao ! Ayi ukhafuna kupikwiza wekha ene kudzulu ? Iwe unadzaponywa kugehena ! "
42010016	Yesu adapanga anthu makumanomwe na awiri ale mbati , " Munthu anakuveraniyo , averambo na ine ene . Anakukhondaniyo , akhondambo na ine ene . Kwache nyakundikhondayo , akhondambo na adandituma ene ule . "
42010017	Amuna makumanomwe na awirim ale adabwerera na kukomerwa mbalonga kuna Yesu mbati , " Mbuya , na mizimu yakuipa ene ikhativera pikhaipanga ife na utongi wa dzinanu ! "
42010018	Yesu adaapanga mbati , " Ndidaona Satana akugwa kubulukira kudzulu khala ninga ching'aning'ani . 
42010019	Ngavani kuno ! Ndakupasani mphamvu kuti mukwanise kuponda nazo nyoka na akong'a , mbamukunda mphamvu zonsene za nyamalwayo . Nkhabe chibodzi chinadzakukuwazani tayu . 
42010020	Kwache lekani komerwa thangwi yakuti mizimu yakuipa imbakuverani , mbwenye mukomerwe thangwi madzinanu alembwa kudzulu . "
42010021	Pandzidzi wenewo Mzimu Wakuchena adadzaza Yesu na kukomerwa , tenepo iye adalonga mbati , " Baba , Mbuya wa kudzulu na dziko yapansi , ndinapereka takhuta kuna imwe , thangwi mwaonesa kuna anthu okhonda fiinza pinthu pikhabisira imwe anthu anzeru na akufunza pile . Ande , Baba , mwenemu ndiye mukhapifiinira imwe kuti pichitike . 
42010022	" Babanga andipasa utongi pa pinthu pyonsene . Nkhabe na mbodzi ene anadziwa kuti Mwana mbani , mbwenye Baba yekha basi . Pontho nkhabe na mbodzi ene anadziwa kuti Baba mbani kupambula Mwana , pontho na ale ambasankhulwa na Mwanayo kuti iye adziwise Baba kuna iwo . "
42010023	Tenepo Yesu adazungunukira kuna anyakufunzache mbalonga nawo paokha ene mbati , " Ndimwe a mwayi thangwi ya kuona pinthu pinaona imwepi . 
42010024	Ndikukupangani kuti maprofeti azinji na mafumu adaruna kuona pinthu pinaona imwepi , mbwenye adapichimwana kupiona . Adafunambo kuva pinthu pinava imwepi mbapichimwana kupiva . "
42010025	Mfunzisi wa mwambo adadza kuna Yesu kuti amuyese . Iye adavunza Yesu mbati , " Mfunzisi , ndichite tani kuti nditambire moyo okhonda mala ? "
42010026	Yesu adamtawira mbati , " Mwambo wa Mose ukulonga tani ? Umbauva tani ? "
42010027	Munthu ule adamtawira mbati , " Ukulonga kuti , ' Mfune Mbuya Mulungu wako na mtima wako onsene , na moyo wako onsene , na mphamvu zako zonsene , pontho na manyerezero ako onsene ' , pontho ' Mfune mwanzako ninga mumbapifunira iwe . ' "
42010028	Yesu adampanga mbati , " Walonga pyadidi . Chita penepyo , tenepo unadzakhala na moyo okhonda mala . "
42010029	Mbwenye mfunzisi wa mwambo akhafuna apilungamise yekha ene , natenepo adavunza Yesu mbati , " Apo mwanzangacheyo mbani ? "
42010030	Yesu adamtawira mbati , " Pidachitwa na munthu unango ule akhatchithira kwenda kuluwani ya Yeriko kubulukira ku Yerusalemu . Iye adaphatwa na mapanga panjira . Iwo adamdulisa nguwo , adammenya , mbamsiya akomoka . 
42010031	Pidachitika kuti nyansembe akhagwanda na njira yonthoyo . Mbwenye pidaona iye munthu ule adachalira pyache . 
42010032	Mlevi unango , adachita chibodzibodzi . Pidafika iye pambutoyo mbaona munthu ule , adachalira pontho na khundu inango ya njirayo . 
42010033	Mbwenye pikhali Msamaria unango paulendo wache , adafikambo pambuto yonthoyo . Pidaona iye munthu ule , adava naye nsisi pikulu . 
42010034	Adadza mbamthira mafuta na vinyu pironda pyache , mbapimanga . Pidamala iye kuchita tenepo , adamkwizika pabulu wache , adenda naye kunyumba ya alendo , mbakamuyang'anira mwadidi . 
42010035	Mangwana mwache adabulusa kobiri zakuphatira munthu basa nsiku ziwiri mbazipereka kuna mwenechiro nyumba ya alendo ile . Adapanga mwenechiro nyumbayo mbati , ' Mumuyang'anire mwadidi . Mungavunga kobiri zinango thangwi ya iye , ndinadzakubwezerani pakubwerera panga . ' "
42010036	Yesu adamvunza mfunzisi ule mbati , " Iwembo kupiona kwako , ukunyerezera kuti pa anthu atatuwa adakhala ninga mwanzache wa nyakuphatwa na mapanga ule ngupi ? "
42010037	Mfunzisi wa mwambo ule adamtawira mbati , " Ngule adamkomera mtima . " Yesu adampanga mbati , " Na iwe enembo , ndoko kachite chibodzibodzi . "
42010038	Pikhali Yesu na anyakufunzache paulendo wawo , adafika m'mudzi unango . Penepo mkazi unango dzinache Marita adamtambira kumsuwo kwache . 
42010039	Iye akhali na nanache , dzinache Maria , ule adakhala pansi chifupi na Yesu towera avesere pikhafunzisa iye . 
42010040	Marita adadungunya na kuinjipa kwa basa yonsene ikhaphata iye ile . Natenepo adadza kuna Yesu mbamvunza mbati , " Mbuya , kadi mukupiona tayu kuti nanayu andilekera basa yonseneyi ? Mpangeni adzandiphedzembo ! "
42010041	Mbuya adampanga mbati , " Marita , Marita , ukuswipa mtima na kusanyika na pinthu pizinji , 
42010042	mbwenye chinafunika ntchibodzi chene basi . Maria asankhula chinthu chakufunika , pontho hanadzachipokoserwa tayu . "
42011001	Nsiku ibodzi Yesu akhali pambuto inango kupemphera . Pidamala iye , nyakufunza unango adampempha mbati , " Mbuya , tifunzisenimbo kupemphera ninga mudafunzisira Yohani Nyakubatiza anyakufunzache . "
42011002	Yesu adaapanga mbati , " Mungapemphera longani tenepa : ' Baba , dzinanu yakuchena mbilemedzwe , Ufumu wanu mbudze . 
42011003	Tipaseni kudya kwathu kwa nsiku na nsiku .
42011004	Tilekereni pyakudawa pyathu , thangwi ifembo timbalekerera anyakutidawira onsene . Pontho lekani tawira kuti tiyeswe . ' "
42011005	Yesu adalonga pontho kuna anyakufunzache mbati , " Tisangize mbodzi wa imwe aende kumsuwo wa shamwaliache pachitichiti mbakampanga mbati , ' Shamwali , ndifiyalimbo mikate mitatu . 
42011006	Shamwalianga afika . Ali paulendo wache , mbwenye ine nkhabe chakuti iye adye . '
42011007	Penepo wa m'nyumbayo nkhumtawira mbati , ' Leka kundinyangula . Ndafunga kale msuwo , pontho ine na ananga tamala gona . Ine nkhabe kwanisa lamuka kuti ndikupase mikateyo tayu . '
42011008	Andedi , ndikukupangani kuti penu akhonde lamuka mbampasa mikateyo thangwi yakuti ndi shamwaliache , kwache anadzalamuka thangwi ya phinga ya nyakupempha ule , mbampasa pyonsene pinafuna iye . 
42011009	" Natenepo ndikukupangani kuti pemphani , tenepo munadzatambira ; sakasakani , tenepo munadzapigumana ; didimizani , tenepo munadzafungulirwa msuwo . 
42011010	Thangwi munthu onsene anapempha , anati atambire , munthu onsene anasakasaka , anati apigumane , pontho munthu onsene anadidimiza , anati afungulirwe msuwo . 
42011011	Mbani munthu , mwanache angampempha nsomba ambampasa nyoka ?
42011012	Penu angampempha dzayi , ambampasa kong'a ?
42011013	Ngakhala imwe anthu akuipa mumbadziwa kupasa ananu pinthu pyadidi , apo Babanu wa Kudzulu ndiye tani ? Ayi iye anapichimwana kupereka Mzimu Wakuchena kuna anyakumpempha ale ? "
42011014	Yesu akhadabulusa mzimu wakuipa wakuchitisa munthu kuchimwana kulonga . Pidabuluka mzimu wakuipawo , munthu ule adatoma kulonga , tenepo anthu azinji akhali penepowo adadodoma pyakwanga , 
42011015	mbwenye anthu anango pakati pawo adalonga mbati , " Mphamvu zidabulusa na iye mizimu yakuipa nsakubulukira kuna Belezebule , mfumu wa mizimu yakuipa . "
42011016	Anthu anango akhafuna pyakumuyesa , tenepo adampanga kuti aonese chidzindikiro chakuonesa kuti Mulungu ndiye akhadamtuma . 
42011017	Mbwenye Yesu adaadziwa manyerezero awo , mbaapanga mbati , " Mu ufumu , anthu angapandukirana , ufumu wenewo umbavungika . M'banja anthu angagawikana , banja yeneyo imbafudzika . 
42011018	Ngakhala ufumu wa Satana unagawikana m'magulu , maguluwo mbamenyana wokha ene , ufumu wache unaenda tani m'tsogolo ? Imwe mwalonga kuti ine ndimbabulusa mizimu yakuipa na mphamvu za Belezebule . 
42011019	Ngakhala mphyakuonadi kuti ine ndimbabulusa mizimu yakuipa na mphamvu za Belezebule , apo anyakuteweranumbo ambabulusa mizimu yakuipa na mphamvu za ani ? Natenepo anyakuteweranu onthowo ndiye anadzakupokanyani kuti mwadawa . 
42011020	Nkhabe ! Ndikubulusa mizimu yakuipa na mphamvu za Mulungu , kutsikimizira kuti Mulungu akhazikisa kale Ufumu wache pakati panu . 
42011021	" Munthu wamphamvu zache angaonera pamsuwo pache na pida pyache pyonsene pya nkhondo , pinthu pyache pimbakhala mwadidi . 
42011022	Mbwenye unango wamphamvu zakupiringana iye angadza mbamkunda , anadzampokosera pida pikhanyindira iyepyo , mbadzagawa pyaba iyepyo . 
42011023	" Munthu okhonda tawirizana na ine , ambandipokanyisa . Nyakukhonda kundiphedza kugumanyayo , ambamwaza . 
42011024	" Mzimu wakuipa ungabuluka muna munthu , umbazungulirazungulira kunthemba zakusowa madzi kusaka mbuto yakuti upume . Ungakhonda kuigumana mbutoyo umbalonga okha ene kuti , ' Ndinabwerera pyanga kunyumba kudabulukira ine kule . '
42011025	Tenepo umbabwereradi mbugumana nyumba yatswairwa pontho yamala sasanywa . 
42011026	Tenepo umbaenda kakwata mizimu inzache minomwe yakuipa pikulu kupiringana iwo ene mbibwera dzakhala mwenemo . Pakumalisira pache makhaliro a munthuyo ambanyanyiratu kuipa kupiringana pakutoma . "
42011027	Pikhalonga Yesu penepi , mkazi unango pakati pa mwinji ule adakhuwa mbati , " Wakutsanzaya ndi mkazi adakubalani mbakuyamwisani ule ! "
42011028	Mbwenye Yesu adalonga mbati , " Anyanya kutsanzaya mbanthu ale ambava mafala a Mulungu mbachita pinalonga iwo ! "
42011029	Pikhainjipa mwinji , Yesu adatoma kulonga mbati , " Anthu a makauno ngakuipa : ambapempha kuona chidzindikiro , kwache hanadzachipaswa tayu , kupambula cha mprofeti Yona chene chile basi . 
42011030	Yona akhali chidzindikiro kuna anthu a kumzinda wa Ninevi , chibodzibodzi Mwana Munthu anadzakhala chidzindikiro cha anthu a makauno . 
42011031	Pa Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , mfumukazi wa kudziko ya Sheba anadzaimira kupokanya anthu a makauno , thangwi iye adafamba msinzo ukulu pyakwanga kavesera mafala anzeru a Mfumu Solomo . Chinchino ndikukupangani kuti pano pana unango wamkulu kupiringana Solomo . 
42011032	Pa Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga anthu mseru , anthu a mumzinda wa Ninevi anadzaimira kupokanya anthu a makauno , thangwi iwo adaleka pyakudawa pyawo pidava iwo kulalika kwa Yona . Chinchino ndikukupangani kuti pano pana unango wamkulu kupiringana Yona . 
42011033	" Nkhabe munthu ambagasa nyale mbaibisa penu kuigudumira na chitomba tayu ; ' m'mbuto mwache iye ambaiikha pambuto yakuonekera , towera anthu akupita m'nyumbamo aone cheza chache . 
42011034	Maso ako akhala ninga nyale ya manungo ako . Maso ako angakhala mwadidi , manungo ako onsene ambakhala na cheza , mbwenye ngakhala maso ako hali mwadidi tayu , manungo ako onsene ambakhala mumdima . 
42011035	Onesesani , mphapo , kuti muna cheza m'manungo mwanu , nee mdima tayu . 
42011036	Ngakhala manungo ako onsene ana cheza , mbapakhonda khala khundu ibodzi yakukhala mumdima , manungo onsene anadzagaka khala ninga akumwinikirwa na nyale . "
42011037	Pidamala Yesu kulonga penepi , Mfarisi adamchemera kuti akadye naye kumsuwo kwache . Tenepo Yesu adapita m'nyumba mbakhala pansi kudya . 
42011038	Mfarisi adadodoma napyo pidaona iye Yesu kudya okhonda samba m'manja . 
42011039	Mbwenye Mbuya adalonga kuna iye mbati , " Imwe Afarisi mumbatsuka kunja kwa khomitcho na palato yanu , mbwenye m'bwalo mwanu mwadzala na nthonga na pyakuipa . 
42011040	Ndimwe anthu akupupwa ! Mulungu nyakusasanya pya kunja ule , ambasasanya pontho na pya m'bwalo mwene . 
42011041	Mbwenye mupase anyakutcherenga pinthu pya m'bwalo mwa khomitcho na palato pyanu , tenepo pyonsene pina imwe pinadzacheneswa . 
42011042	" Imwe Afarisi muna dzedze , thangwi mumbapereka kuna Mulungu chakhumi cha pimbewu pyakununkhira pontho pyakukomesa miliwo ya mtundu yonsene , mbwenye nkhabe ikha konta kuchita pyakulungama pontho kumfuna Mulungu tayu . Mwathema kuchita pyonsenepi mbamukhonda siya pinango . 
42011043	" Imwe Afarisi muna dzedze , thangwi mumbafuna mipando ya chilemedzo m'nyumba zakupemphereramo , pontho kuti anthu akumwenyikeni na chilemedzo m'misika . 
42011044	Muna dzedze , thangwi mwakhala ninga nthumbi yakubisika . Anthu akugwanda na penepo nkhabe dziwa kuti akufamba panthumbi tayu . "
42011045	Mfunzisi unango wa mwambo adalonga kuna Yesu mbati , " Mfunzisi , mungalonga tenepo , mukushola na ife ene ! "
42011046	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Imwe maka afunzisi a mwambo , muna dzedze , thangwi mumbathukulisa anthu mitolo yakulemera . Imwe enechiro mbamukhonda kuikhuya na chala chanu chene kuaphedza . 
42011047	Muna dzedze , thangwi mumbamanga maguwa a masiye a maprofeti adaphiwa na makolo anu akale ale . 
42011048	Penepo mukuonesa kuti mukutawirizana na pidachita makolo anu . Iwo adapha maprofeti , imwembo mumbamanga maguwa awo . 
42011049	Ndi thangwi yache Mulungu na nzeru zache adalonga mbati , ' Ndinadzaatumizira maprofeti na anyakutumwa , mbwenye anthu anadzapha anango a iwo , anangombo anadzaasanyisa . '
42011050	Natenepo anthu a makauno anadzatchunyuswa thangwi ya maprofeti onsene adaphiwa kutomera kulengwa kwa dziko yapansi ale , si kutomera kuphiwa kwa Abele , kufikirana kuphiwa kwa Zakaria , ule adaphiwa m'Nyumba ya Mulungu pakati paguwa ya nsembe na mbuto yakuchena . Ande , ndikukupangani kuti anthu a makauno anadzatchunyuswa thangwi ya pyonsenepi !
42011051	
42011052	" Muna dzedze , imwe afunzisi a mwambo , thangwi mudabulusa chakufungulira nyumba za nzeru . Imwe enechiro mbamukhonda pitamo , mbamukhondesa akhafuna pya kupitamo ale . "
42011053	Pidabuluka Yesu pambutoyo , afunzisi a mwambo pabodzi na Afarisi adatoma kupokanyana naye mwakuzhangali mbamvunza pya pinthu pizinji . 
42011054	Akhafuna pya kumtapa m'kanwa . 
42012001	Pandzidzi onthowo anthu pikwipikwi adagumanyikana mwakuti anthu akhapondana . Chakutoma adalonga na anyakufunzache mbati , " Onesesani chakufufumisira mkate cha Afarisi , chenechi ngufakafakawo . 
42012002	Pinthu pyonsene pyakugudumirwa pinadzafununkhulwa , pontho pyonsene pyakubisika pinadzadziwika . 
42012003	Natenepo pyonsene pyalonga imwe mumdima , pinadzaveka pakwecha , pontho pyonsene pyabedulira imwe anthu m'bwalo mwa nyumba , anadzapibweka pakwecha . 
42012004	" Ndikukupangani imwe , ashamwali anga , kuti lekani gopa ale ambapha manungo a munthu okha , angamala penepo mbasowa chinango chakuti achite . 
42012005	Ndinakuonesani wakuti mumgope . Gopani Mulungu ule angamala kupha manungo a munthu ambakhala pontho na mphamvu zakumponya kugehena . Ndikukupangani kuti weneyo mwathema kumgopa . 
42012006	" Ntchenga zishanu zimbaguliswa na kobiri ziwiri basi , kwache Mulungu hambaduwalirapo na ibodzi ene tayu . 
42012007	Na tsitsi ene ya mumsolo mwanu , Mulungu ailengesa yonsene . Natenepo lekani gopa . Imwe ndimwe akufunika pyakwanga kupiringana ntchenga zizinji . 
42012008	" Ndikukupangani kuti munthu onsene ananditawira pamaso pa anthu , Mwana Munthu anadzamtawirambo pamaso pa angelo a Mulungu . 
42012009	Mbwenye nyakundikhonda pamaso pa anthuyo , Mwana Munthu anadzamkhondambo pamaso pa angelo a Mulungu . 
42012010	" Munthu onsene anadzalongera Mwana Munthu pyakuipa , Mulungu anadzamlekerera , mbwenye nyakushola Mzimu Wakuchena , Mulungu hanadzamlekerera tayu . 
42012011	" Angadzakukwatirani kunyumba zakupemphereramo , kuna akadamu , pontho kuna atongi kuti akakutongeni mseru , lekani dzasanyika kuti , ' Ndinaenda kalonganji kuti ndipitchinjirize . '
42012012	Thangwi Mzimu Wakuchena anadzakufunzisani na ndzidzi onthowo pyakuthema kulonga . "
42012013	Munthu unango m'mwinjimo adapempha Yesu mbati , " Mfunzisi , ndipangirenimbo mbaleanga kuti agawe mfuma idatisiyira babathuyi . "
42012014	Mbwenye Yesu adampanga mbati , " Shamwali , mbani andipasa utongi kukhala nyakutonga mseru pakati panu , penu nyakugawa mfumanu yakusalayi ? "
42012015	Yesu adathimiza kulonga kuna onsene ale mbati , " Khalani m'maso , muonesese mwadidi kuti mukhonde khala amtima pachinthu na chibodzi chene . Kuinjipa kwa mfuma ya munthu si mdida wa moyo wache tayu . "
42012016	Tenepo Yesu adaapanga msangani unango mbati , " Pidachitwa kuti munthu unango wakufuma akhali na munda udabala mbewu zizinji ule . 
42012017	Iye adatoma kunyerezera mumtima mwache mbati , ' Ndinachita tani ? Ine nkhabe mbuto yakukoyeramo phoso yangayi . '
42012018	Adalonga yekha ene mbati , ' Ndinadzafudza pyete pyanga mbandimanga pinango pikulupikulu , tenepo ndinadzakoyeramo mapiranga na mfuma zanga zinango . 
42012019	Kumala penepo , ndinadzalonga ndekha kuti , Ndiwe wamwayi , una mfuma izinji ile inadzakukwanira pyaka pizinji . Puma pyako , idya , imwa , tsanzaya ! '
42012020	Mbwenye Mulungu adampanga mbati , ' Pupwewe ! Mosiku uno pano unapokoserwa moyo wakowo . Apo pyonsene pyakoya iwepyo pinadzakhala pya am ? ' "
42012021	Pakumalisa Yesu adalonga mbati , " Pimbakhala tenepo kuna munthu anapikoyera mfuma , mbwenye pamaso pa Mulungu ngwakukhonda fuma . "
42012022	Tenepo Yesu adalonga kuna anyakufunzache mbati , " Ndi thangwi yache ndikukupangani kuti lekani swipa mtima pya moyo wanu kuti munadyanji , penu pya manungo anu kuti munavalanji ?
42012023	Thangwi moyo ngwakufunika kupiringana kudya , pontho manungo ngakufunika kupiringana nguwo . 
42012024	Ngayang'anani makhungubwe . Iwo nkhabe bzala mbewu , penu kuvuna ; nkhabe nyumba zakukoyeramo phoso penu pikwa , kwache Mulungu ambaadyesa . Imwe ndimwe akufunika pyakwanga kupiringana mbalame . 
42012025	Kadi unango wa imwe anakwanisa kuthimizira ora pamoyo wacher na kuswipa mtima na penepi ?
42012026	Ngakhala imwe nkhabe kwanisa chita chinthu na ching'ono chene ninga chenecho tayu , munaswipiranji mtima na pinthu pinangopyo ?
42012027	Ngayang'anani kukula kumbachita maluwa amtsanga , iwo nkhabe phata basa penu kupisasanyira okha ene nguwo . Mbwenye ndikukupangani kuti nee na Mfumu Solomo ene , na kufuma konsene kudachita iye , akhali na nguwo zakubalika ninga abodzi mwa maluwawa tayu . 
42012028	Apo ngakhala Mulungu ambavazika ninga tenepa maudzu amtsanga ale ambalila kukhala lero ene basi , mangwana mwache mbaponywa pamoto , ayi weneyu nkhabe dzakuvazikani mwadidi tayu ? Imwe anthu a chikhulupiro chakuchepa !
42012029	" Tenepo , lekani sanyika m'manyerezero anu , pontho kuswipa mtima kuti munadyanji penu munamwanji . 
42012030	Thangwi anthu a padziko yapansi okhonda dziwa Mulungu ambasanyika na kunyerezera pya pinthu pyonsenepi . Babanu ambapidziwa kuti mumbafuna pinthu pyonsenepi . 
42012031	Mbwenye imwe mwathema kutsalakana pya Ufumu wache , tenepo munadzapaswa pinthu pyonsenepi . 
42012032	" Imwe kamkumbi ka mabira , lekani gopa , thangwi Babanu wa kudzulu afuna kukupasani Ufumu wache mwakukomerwa . 
42012033	Gulisani pyonsene pina imwe mbamupereka kobirizo kuna anyakutcherenga . Mukhale na mabudu a kobiri ale nkhabe sakala tayu , yeneyi ndi mfuma yokhonda mala ya kudzulu . Kweneko mbava nkhabe fikako , pontho uchenje hunaivunga tayu . 
42012034	Thangwi kuna mfumanu , mtimanu umbakhalambo konthoko . 
42012035	" Khalani akusasanyika pachonsene chinadza , pontho nyale zanu zikhale zakugaka . 
42012036	Khalani ninga anyabasa akudikhira mbuyawo kuti abwere kubulukira kuphwando yakukazhali , towera angadza mbadzadidimiza msuwo , amfungulire Kabodzi na kabodzi . 
42012037	Ngakutsanzaya anyabasa ale anadzagumanwa ali m'maso pakudza kwa mbuyawo . Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti iye anadzaakhazika patebulu mbadzasasanyika yekha ene towera aafiliviri . 
42012038	Ngakutsanzaya anyabasawo ngakhala anadzaagumana asasanyika pakudza pache ; penu adze pachitichiti , penu m'makalakwecha .

42012046	tenepo mbuyache nyabasayo anadzabwera pansiku inakhonda iye dikhira pontho ndzidzi okhonda iye dziwa . Mbuyacheyo anadzamgwanda mapindimapindi , mbadzamponya kumbuto imbakoyiwa anthu okhonda khulupira . 
42012047	" Nyabasa wakudziwa chinafima mbuyache kuti iye achite , mbwenye iye mbakhonda sasanyika yekha ene kupichita , anadzakwapulwa pyakwanga .

42012049	" Ndidadzera dzaponya moto padziko yapansi , pontho ndikhapifuna pyakwanga kuti mbudagaka kale . 
42012050	Mbwenye ndathema kubatizwa munjira inango , ' pontho mtimanga nkhabe khazikika kufikirana pyachitika . 
42012051	Kadi imwe mukunyerezera kuti ndadzera dzapereka mtendere pansi pano ? Tayu , si mtendere tayu , mbwenye magawikano . 
42012052	Kutomera lero kwenda m'tsogolo banja ya anthu ashanu inadzagawikana . Anthu atatu a iwo anadzapokanyana na awiri . 
42012053	Ababa anadzapokanyana na anawo achimuna , anambo achimuna anadzapokanyana na ababawo . Amama anadzapokanyana na anawo achikazi , anambo achikazi anadzapokanyana na amamawo . Amebzala anadzapokanyana na akwenyawo , akwenyambo anadzapokanyana na amebzalawo . "

42012056	Imwe mfakafaka ! Mumbakwanisa kudziwa makhaliro a dziko pontho akuthambo , apo mumbapichimwana tani kudziwa pinachitika ndzidzi uno kuti pikulonganji ?

42024040	Pidalonga iye penepi , adaaonesa manja na manyalo ache .

42024045	Tenepo iye adaaphedza kuvesa mwadidi Malemba .

42024047	pontho kuti kutomera ku Yerusalemu , mphangwa zilalikwe na dzinache kuna madzinza onsene , kuti aleke pyakudawa pyawo , tenepo Mulungu anadzalekerera pyakudawa pyawo . 
42024048	Imwe ndimwe mboni za pinthu penepi .

42024050	Tenepo Yesu adaatsogolera kubuluka mumzinda mule mpakana ku Betania . Kweneko adakwiza manjache mbaatsanzayisa .

42024052	Iwo adampembedza mbabwerera ku Yerusalemu na kukomerwa kukulu .

43001001	Dziko yapansi mbidzati lengwa mbodzi wakuchemerwa Mafala akhalipo kale . Mafalayo akhali na Mulungu , pontho iyeyo akhali Mulungu ene . 
43001002	Iye akhali na Mulungu pakutomaletu . 
43001003	Kudzera muna iye Mulungu adalenga pinthu pyonsene . Iye mbadakhonda khalapo , nee chinthu na chibodzi chene mbachidalengwa tayu . 
43001004	Iye ndi mwenechiro moyo , a tenepo moyowo udadzesa cheza kuna anthu . 
43001005	Chezacho chimbamwinikira mumdima , mbwenye mdima wachimwana kuthimisa chezacho . 
43001006	Mulungu adatuma munthu unango nyamphangwa , dzinache Yohani . 
43001007	Iye adadza dzachitira umboni kuna anthu pya chezacho , towera anthu onsene ave mphangwa mbakhulupira . 
43001008	Yohaniyo hakhali cheza tayu , mbwenye adadza kwene dzachitira umboni pya chezacho . 
43001009	Cheza chadichadi chimbamwinikira anthu onsene chile chikhadza padziko yapansi . 
43001010	Mafalayo akhali padziko yapansi pano . Podi kwene kuti Mulungu adalenga dziko yapansi kudzera muna iyeyo , anthu a pansi pano hadamdzindikire tayu . 
43001011	Iye adadza kudzinzache ene , mbwenye anthu a dzinzache adakhonda kumtambira . 
43001012	Kwache onsene adamtambira mbamkhulupira ale , iye adaapasa utongi kusanduka ana a Mulungu . 
43001013	Iwo adasanduka ana a Mulungu nee pakuchita kubalwa sasawa ninga mumbabalirwa ana thangwi ya kupifuna kwa munthu tayu , mbwenye adabalwa na Mulungu . 
43001014	Mafalayo adasanduka kukhala munthu mbakhazikika pakati pathu wakukoma mtima pikulu pontho wakuonadi monsene mwene . Tidaona demelero yache , demelero ile yakuthemera Mwana mbodzi yekha wa Baba . 
43001015	Yohani adachitira umboni pya iye mbalalika mbati , " Munthu akhalonga ine ngweneyu , pikhalonga ine kuti , ' Iye akudza m'nduli mwanga , mbwenye iye ngwamkulu kupiringana ine , thangwi iye akhalipo kale ine mbandidzati balwa . ' "
43001016	Na kukoma kwache mtima kukulu , iye adatitsanzayisa tonsene pakutipasa mtsanzayiso mwakutsogozana . 
43001017	Mulungu adapereka mwambo kudzera muna Mose , mbwenye adapereka kukoma mtima , pontho pyakuonadi kudzera muna Yesu Khristu . 
43001018	Chipo nee mbodzi aona Mulungu tayu , mbwenye Mwana mbodzi yekha , ule ndi Mulungu , pontho wapamtima wa Baba , achitisa kuti iye adziwike . 
43001019	Wenewu ngumboni wa Yohani Nyakubatiza kuna akadamu a Chiyuda a mu Yerusalemu , pidatuma iwo anyansembe na Alevib kuna Yohani , kamvunza mbati , " Iwe ndiwe ani ? "

43001021	Iwo adamvunza mbati , " Ndiwe ani , mphapo ? Ayi ndiwe Elia ? " Yohani adatawira mbati , " Tayu , si ine Elia tayu . " Iwo adamvunza pontho mbati , " Ayi ndiwe Mprofeti ? " Yohani adatawira mbati , " Tayu . "
43001022	Iwo adalonga mbati , " Mphapo , ngatipangetu , ndiwe ani ? Tinafuna tikapange adatituma ale . Iwe umbapilonga kuti ndiwe ani ? "

43001030	Munthu akhalonga ine ngweneyu , pikhalonga ine kuti , ' Munthu unango akudza m'nduli mwanga , kwache iye ngwamkulu kupiringana ine , thangwi ine mbandidzati balwa iye akhalipo kale . '

43004001	Afarisi adapiva kuti Yesu akhagumana pontho akhabatiza anyakutewera azinji kupiringana Yohani .

43004012	Mcherawu tidasiyirwa na kholo wathu Yakobo . Iye na anache pabodzi na mikumbi ya pifuyo pyache akhamwa pano . Ayi imwe mukulonga kuti ndimwe wamkulu kupiringana Yakoboyo ? "

43004019	Mkazi ule adalonga mbati , " Mbuya , ndaona kuti ndimwe mprofeti .

43004043	Pidamala Yesu nsiku ziwiri kweneko , adabuluka mbaenda ku Galilea .

43004046	Yesu adabwerera ku Kana mu Galilea , kukhadasandusa iye madzi kukhala vinyu kule . Thubu wa mfumu unango mwanache wamamuna akhadwala ku Kafaranao .

43005003	Mwinji ukulu wa atenda ukhagona m'makhondemo — maboliboli , anyakulamala na anyamfutete . 
43005005	Munthu unango ule akhadamala pyaka makumatatu na pisere kudwala , akhali penepo . 
43005006	Yesu adamuona akugona penepo , pontho adadziwa kuti munthuyo adadwala ndzidzi ukulu ene . Tenepo iye adamvunza mbati , " Ayi iwe unafuna kuwanga ? "

43005013	Mbwenye munthu akhadawangiswa ule , hakhamdziwa kuti Yesu akhali ani tayu , thangwi Yesu akhadapyanga pyache , podi penepo pakhali mwinji ukulu . 
43005014	Tenepo Yesu adagumana munthu akhadawangisa iye ule m'Nyumba ya Mulungu mbampanga mbati , " Yang'ana , iwe wawanga chinchino ; tenepo leka kudawa gopesera pyakuipa kupiringana penepi pinakugwera . " angavundulwa akhawanga utenda onsene ukhali na iye . 
43005015	Tenepo munthu ule adenda mbakapanga akadamu a Chiyuda kuti munthu akhadamuwangisa ule akhali Yesu .

43005019	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti Mwana nkhabe chita pinthu payekha ene . Iye ambachita pyonthopyo pimbaona iye Babache kuchita . Pimbachita Baba , Mwanambo ambachita pyonthopyo .

43005023	towera anthu onsene alemedze Mwana sasawambo ninga mumbalemedzera iwo Baba . Munthu anakhonda lemedza Mwanayo nkhabe lemedza Baba adamtuma ule . 
43005024	" Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti munthu anava mafalanga mbakhulupira nyakundituma ule , weneyo atambira moyo okhonda mala . Iye nkhabe dzakonwa , mbwenye abuluka kale kuimfa mbapita kumoyo . 
43005025	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti ndzidzi ukudza , pontho wadza kale , wakuti anthu akufa anadzava fala ya Mwana Mulungu , tenepo anyakuvawo anadzakhala na moyo . 
43005026	Ninga Baba ndi mwenechiro moyo , monthomonthomo iye achitisa kuti Mwanache akhalembo mwenechiro moyo .

43005029	mbadzalamuka kubulukira kumbuto zonsene zina iwo . Ale adachita udidi anadzalamuka mbakhala na moyo , alembo adachita pyakudawika anadzalamuka mbakoneswa . 
43005030	" Ine nkhabe kwanisa chita chinthu na chibodzi chene tayu na utongi wanga ene ; ine kwanga nkhutonga kwene mseru basi ninga mumbandipangira Mulungu , tenepo ine ndimbatonga mwakulungama , thangwi handimbateweza pyakufuna pyanga tayu , mbwenye pimbafuna nyakundituma ule . 
43005031	" Ine ndingapichitira ndekha umboni , pinalonga ine nee pinadzatawirwa ninga pyakuonadi tayu .

43006001	Kubuluka penepo Yesu adawambuka nyanza ya Galilea ( penu kuti Tiberia dzinache inango ) .

43006010	Yesu adaapanga mbati , " Akhazikeni anthu pansi . " Mbutoyo ikhali yamaudzu pyakwanga . Tenepo anthu onsene ale adakhala pansi ; kulengesa amunakulu okha akhali pikwi pishanu . 
43006011	Yesu adakwata mikate ile mbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu mbaigawaniza anthu adakhala pansi ale . Iye adachita chibodzibodzi kuna nsomba zile , tenepo anthu onsene adadya ninga mudafunira iwo .

43006022	Mangwana mwache mwinji ukhadakhala kumtunda unango ya nyanza ule , udadzindikira kuti penepo pakhali mwadiya ubodzi ene basi . Iwo adapidziwa kuti Yesu hakhadenda pabodzi na anyakufunzache tayu , mbwenye kuti anyakufunzache akhadenda pyawo .

43006027	Lekani phata basa kuti mukhale na phoso ile inakwanisa kuvungika ; mbwenye phatani basa kuti mukhale na phoso yokhonda vungika , yakupasa moyo okhonda mala . Phoso yeneyi njile inafuna dzakupasani Mwana Munthu , thangwi Baba Mulungu aikha chidzindikiro chache pana iye chakuonesa kuti iye akomerwa naye . "
43006028	Tenepo iwo adamvunza mbati , " Tichite tani mphapo , towera tiphate mabasa anafuna Mulungu ? "

43006030	Iwo adatawira mbati , " Ntchanji chidzindikiro chinafuna imwe kuchita towera ife tione mbatikukhulupirani ? Munachitanji ?

43006032	Yesu adaapanga mbati , " Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti udakupasani Mose hukhali mkate wakubulukira kudzulu tayu , mbwenye Babanga ndiye ambakupasani mkate chadichadi kubulukira kudzulu . 
43006033	Mkate umbapereka Mulungu ngule adatchitha kubulukira kudzulu mbapasa moyo anthu a padziko yapansi . "

43006036	Mbwenye ndidakupangani kuti imwe mwandiona , kwache nee munandikhulupira tayu .

43006040	Thangwi pinafuna Babanga mphyakuti onsene anyakuona Mwanayo mbamkhulupira , akhale na moyo okhonda mala , tenepo ine ndinadzaalamusa kuimfa pansiku yakumalisa . "
43006041	Penepo anthu adatoma kudungunya pya Yesu , thangwi iye adalonga mbati , " Ine ndine mkate udatchitha kubulukira kudzulu ule . "
43006042	Tenepo iwo adalonga mbati , " Weneyu ndi Yesu , mwana Yosefe ! Babache na mache timbaadziwa , apo akulonga tani kuti adatchitha kubulukira kudzulu ? "
43006043	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Lekani kudungunya pakati panu . 
43006044	Nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kudza kuna ine ngakhala Baba , nyakundituma ule , hanamdzesa kuna ine tayu ; tenepo ine ndinadzamulamusa kuimfa pansiku yakumalisa . 
43006045	Maprofeti adalemba kuti , ' Anthu onsene anadzafunziswa na Mulungu . ' Munthu ule ambava pimbalonga Baba mbafunza kubulukira kuna iye , weneyo ambadza kuna ine . 
43006046	Nkhabe munthu na mbodzi ene aona Baba tayu ; mbwenye nyakubulukira kuna Mulungu ule , ngweneyo ene aona Baba . 
43006047	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti munthu anakhulupirayo ana moyo okhonda mala . 
43006048	Ine ndine mkate wakupasa moyo . 
43006049	Makolo anu adadya mana m'thando , kwache iwo adafa . 
43006050	Mbwenye mkate wakutchitha kubulukira kudzuluwu ngwenewo ene wakuti nyakuudyayo hanafa tayu . 
43006051	Ine ndine mkate wakupasa moyo udatchitha kubulukira kudzulu ule . Munthu angadya mkate wenewu anadzakhala na moyo okhonda mala . Mkate unafuna ine dzampasa ndi manungo anga , ambapereka ine towera anthu a padziko yapansi akhale na moyo . "
43006052	Penepi pidalamusa mphoka ikulu pakati pa Ayudawo . Iwo adavunza mbati , " Pingakwanisike tani kuti munthu weneyu atipase manungo ache kuti tidye ? "

43006054	Munthu anadya manungo anga na kumwa chiropa changayo ana moyo okhonda mala , tenepo ine ndinadzamulamusa kuimfa pansiku yakumalisa . 
43006055	Thangwi manungo anga ntchakudya chadichadi , pontho chiropa changa ntchakumwa chadichadi . 
43006056	Munthu anadya manungo anga na kumwa chiropa changa ule , ambakhala muna ine , inembo ndinadzakhala muna iye . 
43006057	Baba wamoyo adandituma , tenepo na thangwi ya iye , inembo ndina moyo . Sasawambo munthu anandidyayo , ana moyo thangwi ya ine pano . 
43006058	Wenewu mphapo ndi mkate udatchitha kubulukira kudzulu ule , si mkate ninga udadya makolo anu ule tayu , ale m'nduli mwache adafa . Munthu anadya mkate wenewu anadzakhala na moyo kwenda na kwenda . "

43006064	Kwache anango pakati panupa hadakhulupire tayu . " Yesu adadziwiratu kubulukira pakutoma pene anthu anakhonda dzamkhulupira ale , pontho na nyakudzampereka kuna anyamalwache .

43007029	mbwenye ine ndimbamdziwa , thangwi ndidabulukira kuna iye , pontho adandituma ndiye . "

43008043	Mwatani munakhonda vesa pinalonga inepi ? Thangwi yache njakuti imwe nkhabe kwanisa kuva mphangwa zangazi tayu . 
43008044	Imwe ndimwe ana a Satana , tenepo mumbafuna kuteweza pikhumbo pya babanu Satanayo . 43008045	Ndi thangwi yache ndingakupangani pyakuonadi imwe nkhabe kundikhulupira tayu .

43008053	Kadi iwe ukufuna kulonga kuti ndiwe wamkulu kupiringana babathu Abrahamu ? Iye adafa , maprofetimbo adafa , apo ukunyerezera kuti ndiwe animbo iwe ? "

43008055	Chipo imwe nkhabe kumdziwa tayu , mbwenye ine ndimbamdziwa . Mbidalonga kuti ndikumdziwa tayu , mbidakhalambo wakunama ninga imwepo . Mbwenye ine ndimbamdziwa , tenepo ndimbavera pimbandipanga iye .

43008058	Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti Abrahamu mbadzati balwa ine ndikhalipo kale ! "
43008059	Tenepo iwo adalokota miyala kuti amponyere , mbwenye Yesu adaabisalikira mbabuluka m'Nyumba ya Mulungu ile . 
43009001	Pikhafamba Yesu , adaona munthu wakubalwa na uboliboli . 
43009002	Anyakufunzache adamvunza mbati , " Mfunzisi , penepa adadawa mbani kuti munthuyu abalwe boliboli ? Adadawa ndiye ene penu makolo ache ? "
43009003	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Uboliboli wachewu si kuti ndiye adadawa penu makolo ache tayu . Penepi pyachitika towera Mulungu aonese mphamvu yache pakumuwangisa . 
43009004	Kunja mbakuli masikati tathema kuphata basa ya nyakundituma ; mosiku ukudza wakuti nkhabe munthu anadzakwanisave phata basa tayu . 
43009005	Ndzidzi una ine pansi pano , ndine cheza cha anthu onsene a padziko yapansi pano . "
43009006	Pidamala Yesu kulonga penepi , adaphula mata pansi mbakhophola matope amatache mbamyedera nawo maso a boliboli ule
43009007	mbalonga mbati , " Ndoko kasambe nkhope pathawale ya Siloamu " ( Siloamu nkhulonga kuti " Kutumwa " ) . Munthu ule adenda kasamba nkhope , tenepo adabwerera kwawo akuona . 
43009008	Atsanthembache na anthu akhadamuona akupemphesa mwenemo mbali boliboli ale , adavunza mbati , " Ayi munthu ule akhakhala pansi mbapemphesa si weneyu tayu ? "
43009009	Anango adalonga mbati , " Ande , ndiye ene . " Mbwenye anango adalonga mbati , " Nkhabe , si iye tayu ; alila landana naye kwene . " Tenepo munthu ule adalonga yekha ene mbati , " Ndine pano . "
43009010	Iwo adamvunza mbati , " Apo pyachitika tani kuti ukwanise kuona ? "
43009011	Iye adatawira mbati , " Munthu unango dzinache Yesu , adakhophola matope pansi mbamyedera nawo maso anga mbandipanga kuti ndikasambe nkhope kuthawale ya Siloamu . Ine ndidendadi , si ndzidzi pidasamba ine nkhope , ndidakwanisa kuona . "
43009012	Iwo adamvunza mbati , " Iye ali kupi ? " Iye adatawira mbati , " Sinadziwako tayu . " Afarisi avunzavunza pya kuwangiswako
43009013	Tenepo iwo adenda na munthu akhali boliboli ule kuna Afarisi . 
43009014	Nsiku idakhophola Yesu matope kuwangisa nawo munthu ule ikhali Nsiku Yakupuma . 
43009015	Afarisi ale adamvunzambo munthu ule kuti pidachitika tani kuti iye akwanise kuona . Iye adaapanga mbati , " Iye adamyedera matope m'maso mwanga . Ndidasamba nkhope , tenepo ndikukwanisa kuona . "
43009016	Afarisi anango adalonga mbati , " Munthu achita penepiyi hangakhale wakubulukira kuna Mulungu tayu , thangwi iye nkhabe teweza mwambo wa Nsiku Yakupuma . " Mbwenye anango adalonga mbati , " Pinakwanisika tani kuti munthu wakudawa achite pidzindikiro ninga penepi ? " Tenepo iwo adagawikana . 
43009017	Tenepo Afarisi ale adavunza pontho munthu ule mbati , " Iwe ukulonga kuti iye adachitisa kuti ukwanise kuona , apo unatipanganji pya munthu weneyu ? " Munthu ule adatawira mbati , " Munthuyu ndi mprofeti . "
43009018	Akadamu a Chiyuda ale hadakhulupire tayu kuti munthu ule akhali boliboli , pontho kuti chinchino akhakwanisa kuona , kufikira iwo adachemeresa makolo ache
43009019	mbaavunza mbati , " Kadi uyu ndi mwananu ? Imwe mukulonga kuti adabalwa okhonda ona , apo pyachitika tani kuti iye chinchino akukwanisa kuona ? "
43009020	Makolo ache adatawira mbati , " Ande , tikupidziwa kuti weneyu ndi mwanathu , pontho kuti adabalwadi okhonda ona . 
43009021	Mbwenye ife nkhabe kupidziwa kuti pyachitika tani kuti iye akwanise kuona , pontho nkhabe dziwa munthu adamuwangisa . Mvunzeni . Iye ndi mkulu ; anakwanisa kulonga yekha ene ! "
43009022	Makolo ache adalonga penepi thangwi akhagopa akadamu a Chiyuda , ale akhadaverana kuti munthu angalonga kuti iye adakhulupira kuti Yesu ndi Khristu , anadzakhondeswa kupemphera nawo m'nyumba yakupemphereramo . 
43009023	Ndi thangwi yache makolo ache adalonga mbati , " Mvunzeni ; iye ndi mkulu ! "
43009024	Penepo iwo adachemera pontho kachiwiri munthu adabalwa boliboli mbalonga kuna iye mbati , " Dumbira pamaso pa Mulungu kuti unalonga pyakuonadi . Tikupidziwa kuti munthu akuwangisayu ngwakudawa . "
43009025	Munthu ule adatawira mbati , " Ine nkhabe kupidziwa ngakhala munthuyu ngwakudawa penu tayu . Mbwenye pinadziwa ine mphyakuti ine ndikhali boliboli , apo chinchino ndikukwanisa kuona . "
43009026	Iwo adavunza mbati , " Iye adakuchitiranji , pontho adachita tani kuti ukwanise kuona ? "
43009027	Iye adatawira mbati , " Ine ndakupangani kale , mbwenye imwe hamudavesera pidakupangani ine pile tayu . Pinafuna imwe kuva ninji pontho ? Penu imwe mukufunambo mukhale anyakufunzache ? "
43009028	Penepo iwo adamlulupisa mbati , " Iwe ndiwe nyakufunza wa munthuyu . Ifetu ndife anyakufunza a Mose !
43009029	Timbapidziwa kuti Mulungu adalonga kuna Mose , apo pya weneyu ife nkhabe kupidziwa na kudabulukira iye kwene tayu ! "
43009030	Munthu ule adatawira mbati , " Penepitu mphyakudodomesa kuti imwe nkhabe dziwa kunabulukira iye tayu , mbwenye iye adachitisa kuti ndikwanise kuona !
43009031	Ife timbapidziwa kuti Mulungu nkhabe kuva kupemphera kwa anthu akudawa tayu ; iye ' ambava kupemphera kwa anthu ambamulemedza , pontho kuchita pimbafuna iye ale . 
43009032	Kubulukira pakutoma padziko yapansi nkhabe mbodzi ava pya munthu wakuchitisa munthu wakubalwa na uboliboli kuti akwanise kuona . 
43009033	Ngakhala munthuyu hadabulukira kuna Mulungu tayu , iye mbadakwanisa kuchita chinthu na chibodzi chene tayu ! "
43009034	Iwo adatawira mbati , " Iwe udabalwa wakudawa , pontho udakula wakudawa , apo lero ukufuna kutifunzisa ? " Natenepo adambulusa m'Nyumba yakupemphereramo . 
43009035	Yesu adava kuti iye akhadabuluswa m'nyumba yakupemphereramo , tenepo pidamgumana iye , adamvunza mbati , " Ayi iwe umbakhulupira Mwana Munthu ? "
43009036	Munthu ule adatawira mbati , " Mbuya , ngandipangeni Mwana Munthu weneyu mbani , towera ndimkhulupire ! "
43009037	Yesu adampanga mbati , " Iwe wamuona kale , ndiye ene analonga na iwe chinchinoyu . "
43009038	Munthu ule adagodama pamaso pa Yesu mbalonga mbati , " Mbuya , ndimbakhulupira . "
43009039	Yesu adalonga mbati , " Ine ndadza padziko yapansi pano dzagawa pawiri — maboliboli asanduke akuona , pontho anyakuona asanduke maboliboli . "
43009040	Afarisi anango akhali penepo pabodzi naye ale adamva akulonga penepi mbamvunza mbati , " Kadi iwe ufuna kulonga kuti na ife enembo ndife maboliboli ? "
43009041	Yesu adaatawira mbati , " Imwe mbamudakhala maboliboli , nee mbamudakhala akudawa tayu ; podi chinchino mukulonga kuti mukukwanisa kuona , ndi thangwi yache ndimwe akudawa basi . "
43010001	Yesu adalonga mbati , " Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti munthu anakhonda pita m'thanga ya mabira na pamsuwo , mbwenye anachita kuphwetha thanga , weneyu ndi mbava pontho phanga . 
43010002	Munthu ambapita na pamsuwo wa thanga , weneyu ndi makabuswa wa mabirawo . 
43010003	Nyakuonera pathangapo ambamfungulira msuwo , mabira ambava falache iye angaachemera na madzinawo , tenepo iye ambaabulusamo . 
43010004	Iwo angamala buluka , iye ambapita patsogolo , iwombo ambamtewera m'nduli mwache , thangwi falache ambaidziwa . 
43010005	Iwo nkhabe dzatewera munthu unango tayu , mbwenye anadzathawa munthu weneyu , thangwi fala ya munthuyu nkhabe kuidziwa tayu . "
43010006	Yesu adaapanga msanganiwu , mbwenye iwo hadavesesa pikhalonga iyepyo tayu . 
43010007	Yesu adalonga pontho mbati , " Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti ine ndine msuwo wa pathanga ya mabira . 
43010008	Anango onsene adadza ine ndidzati fika ale enewo ndi zimbava pontho mapanga . Kwache mabira hadaavera tayu . 
43010009	Ine ndine msuwo . Munthu angapita na pana ine anadzapulumuka ; iye anadzapita na kubuluka pyache , pontho anadzagumunamo mpovu . 
43010010	Mbava ambadzera kwene dzaba , kupha na kuvunga , mbwenye ine ndadza kuti imwe mukhale na moyo chadichadi , moyo wakuinjipa . 
43010011	" Ine ndine makabuswa wadidi , ule ambasasanyika kufera mabirache . 
43010012	Mbwenye nyaganyo angaona kwene mbinzi ukudza , ambathawa pyache mbasiya mabirawo , thangwi mabirawo si ache tayu , pontho si makabuswa chadichadi tayu . Tenepo mbinziwo umbadza mbuphata mabirawo mbaabalalisa . 
43010013	Nyaganyo ule ambaathawa , thangwi iye ndi nyaganyo ene basi , tenepo iye hambaatsalakana tayu .

43010015	
43010016	Ndili nawo mabira anango , ale hali a m'thanga mwangamu tayu . Ine ndathema kuti ndiakuse . Iwo anadzavera falanga , tenepo anadzakhala pamkumbi ubodzi , makabuswache mbakhala mbodzi . 
43010017	" Babanga ambandifuna , thangwi ine ndasasanyika kupereka moyo wanga , towera ndidzautambire pontho .

43010019	Na thangwi ya mafala enewa Ayuda ale adagawikana pontho .

43010021	Mbwenye anango akhalonga mbati , " Munthu wakukhala na mzimu wakuipa hangakwanise kulonga tenepa tayu ! Mzimu wakuipa unakwanisa tani kuwangisa maboliboli ? "
43010022	Mu Yerusalemu mukhali Phwando yakusekera kupambulwa kwa Nyumba ya Mulungu . Wenewo ukhali ndzidzi wa mainja . 
43010023	Tenepo Yesu akhafamba m'khonde inango ya Nyumba ya Mulungu , yakuchemerwa Khonde ya Solomo . 
43010024	Ayuda adagumanyikana mwakumzungulira mbamvunza mbati , " Iwe unadzaleka lini kutipenukisa ? Ngatipange mwakuveka ngakhala ndiwedi Khristu ? "
43010025	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Ine ndidakupangani kale , mbwenye imwe nee mumbandikhulupira tayu . Mabasa ambaphata ine na utongi wa Babanga ambandichitira umboni ;
43010026	mbwenye imwe nee mumbakhulupira tayu , thangwi yakuti si imwe mabiranga tayu . 
43010027	Mabiranga ambava falanga ; ine ndimbaadziwa , pontho iwo ambanditewera . 
43010028	Ine ndimbaapasa moyo okhonda mala , tenepo iwo hanadzafave tayu . Nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kundipokosera tayu . 
43010029	Pinthu pyandipasa Babanga mphikulu pyakwanga kupiringana pinthu pyonsene , tenepo nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kuapokosa m'manja mwa Babanga tayu .

43010031	Ayuda ale adalokota pontho miyala kuti amponyere . 
43010032	Yesu adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Ine ndachita udidi uzinji pamaso panu , udandipasa Baba kuti ndiuchite ; ntchipi mwa penepi chinafima imwe kundiphera nacho na miyala ? "
43010033	Iwo adatawira mbati , " Ife nkhabe funa kukupha na miyala thangwi ya udidiwu tayu , mbwenye thangwi ya kushola Mulungu kumbachita iweku ! Iwe ndi we munthu ene pyako , mbwenye ukufuna kupiyesa kukhala Mulungu ! "
43010034	Yesu adatawira mbati , " M'mwambo mwanu mwene pyalembwa kuti Mulungu adalonga mbati , ' Imwe ndimwe milungu . '
43010035	Timbapidziwa na kale ene pimbalonga Malemba mphyakuonadi , pontho pyakukhala na kukhala , tenepo Mulungu adathula anthu enewo kuti ndi milungu , kuna anthu ale adapaswa mphangwa zache . 
43010036	Ine pano , Baba adandisankhula mbandituma kudziko yapansi pano . Apo mukulonga tani kuti ndikushola , pinalonga ine kuti ndine Mwana Mulungu ?
43010037	Lekanitu , mphapo , kundikhulupira , ngakhala pimbachita inepi mphyakukhonda funa Babanga . 
43010038	Ngakhala imwe munafuna kundikhulupira tayu , apo khulupirani pyanu mabasa ambaphata inewa . Penepo munadzapidziwa okhonda penuka kuti Baba ambakhala muna ine , inembo ndimbakhala muna Babayo . "

43010040	Yesu adawambuka pontho mkulo wa Yorodani kubwerera kumbuto kukhadabatiza Yohani Nyakubatiza kule , mbakhala pyache kweneko . 
43010041	Anthu azinji adadza kuna iye , pontho iwo adalonga mbati , " Yohani hadachita chidzindikiro tayu , mbwenye pyonsene pidalonga iye pya munthu weneyu pikhali pyakuonadi . "
43010042	Penepo anthu azinji adamkhulupira Yesu . 
43011001	Munthu unango dzinache Lazaro , wa kuluwani ya Betania akhadwala . Betania kukhali kwawo kwa Maria na mbaleache Marita . 
43011002	Maria weneyu ngule adakhuthulira mafuta akununkhira pamanyalo a Mbuya Yesu mbaapukuta na tsitsi yache . Lazaro , akhadwala ule , akhali nkhoswe yache . 
43011003	Anyamainga adatumira Yesu mphangwa kuti : " Mbuya , shamwalianu wapamtima kuno akudwala . "
43011004	Pidapiva Yesu , adalonga mbati , " Kudwala kweneku nkhwakuti anafa nako tayu ; penepi pyachitika towera Mulungu alemedzwe , pontho kuti Mwana Munthu atambire demelero . "
43011005	Yesu adaafuna Marita , na mbaleache Maria , pontho na Lazaro . 
43011006	Kwache pidatambira iye mphangwa zakuti Lazaro akhadwala , iye adakhala pyache kukhali iyeko nsiku zinango ziwiri . 
43011007	Tenepo iye adalonga kuna anyakufunzache mbati , " Tendeni tibwerere ku Yudea . "
43011008	Anyakufunzache ale adatawira mbati , " Mfunzisi , si kale ene tayu pikhafuna kukuphani Ayuda na miyala ; apo chinchino munafuna kubwererako pontho basi ? "
43011009	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Nsiku ina maora khumi na mawiri acheza , si tenepo tayu ? Munthu anafamba na masikatiyo hambagwegweduka tayu , thangwi ambaona na cheza cha dziko yapansi pano . 
43011010	Mbwenye angafamba na mosiku ambagwegweduka , thangwi nkhabe cheza . "
43011011	Yesu adalonga penepi mbathimiza pontho kulonga mbati , " Shamwaliathu Lazaro ali m'chitulo , mbwenye ndinati ndiende kamulamusa . "
43011012	Anyakufunza ale adalonga mbati , " Mbuya , ngakhala iye alila kwene gona , anawanga . "
43011013	Iwo akhanyerezera kuti Yesu akhalonga pya chitulo chadichadi , mbwenye iye akhalonga kuti Lazaro akhadafa . 
43011014	Tenepo Yesu adaapanga mwakuveka mbati , " Lazaro afa , 
43011015	mbwenye na thangwi ya imwe ndakomerwa kuti ine kukhali nkhabeko , towera mukhulupire . Tendeni kuna iyeko . "
43011016	Penepo Tomasi ( wakuchemerwa Mwana Mphasa ) adalonga kuna anyakufunza anzache mbati , " Tonsene tendeni kuti tikafere pabodzi pene na Mfunzisi wathuyi . "
43011017	Pidafika Yesu kweneko , adagumana kuti Lazaro akhadaikhwa kale m'masiye , pontho akhadagonamo nsiku zinayi .

43011019	tenepo Ayuda azinji akhadabwera dzaombera Marita na Maria , thangwi ya kufa kwa nkhoswe yawo . 
43011020	Pidapiva Marita kuti Yesu akhadza , adabuluka panja kagumanikana naye , mbwenye Maria adasalira m'nyumba mule .

43011032	Maria adafika kukhali Yesu kule , tenepo si ndzidzi pidaona iye Yesu , adagwa pamanyalo pa Yesu mbalonga mbati , " Mbuya mbamudakhala kwene kuno , nkhoswe yanga nee mbadafa tayu ! "

43011035	Yesu adalira . 
43011036	Ayuda ale adalonga mbati , " Yang'anani kumfuna pikulu kukhachita iye ! "
43011037	Mbwenye anango a iwo adalonga mbati , " Iye adawangisa boliboli , apo mbadachitapo pinthu tayu kuti Lazaro aleke kufa ? "
43011038	Na kusanyika pontho mumtima , Yesu adenda kumasiye . Masiyewo akhali a dzimba akufungwa na mwala pamsuwo pache . 
43011039	Yesu adaapanga mbati , " Bulusanipo mwalawo ! " Marita nyamaingache nyakwenda ule adatawira mbati , " Mbuya , pano pananunkha pyakwanga thangwi iye adaikhwa nsiku zinayi zagwandazo ! "

43011042	Ndimbapidziwa kuti imwe mumbava pimbalonga ine ndzidzi onsene , mbwenye ndikulonga penepi thangwi ya anthu ali panowa , towera akhulupire kuti ndimwe mudandituma . "

43011045	Ayuda azinji akhadabwera dzachezera Maria ale , adaona pinthu pidachita Yesu pile , tenepo iwo adamkhulupira . 
43011046	Mbwenye anango a iwo adenda kapanga Afarisi pinthu pikhadachita Yesu pile . 
43011047	Afarisi na anyansembe akulu adachemeresa mgumano wa Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda . Iwo adalonga mbati , " Penepa tichitenji ? Yang'anani pidzindikiro pinachita munthuyu !
43011048	Tingamsiya kwene kuti iye athimize kuchita pinachita iyepi , anthu onsene anati amkhulupire , pontho akadamu a Chiroma anati abwere dzavunga Nyumbathu ya Mulungu , pontho na mtundu wathu ene ! "
43011049	Mbodzi wa iwo dzinache Kayafa , Nyansembe Wamkulu m'chaka chenecho adalonga mbati , " Imwe nkhabe dziwa chinthu na chibodzi chene tayu !
43011050	Kadi imwe nkhabe dzindikira kuti mphyadidi kuti munthu mbodzi afere anthu onsene kusiyana nakuti mtundu onsene uvungike ? "
43011051	Iye hadalonge penepi na nzeru zache zene tayu . Podi iye akhali Nyansembe Wamkulu m'chaka chenecho , iye akhalongeratu ninga mprofeti kuti Yesu anadzafera mtundu wa Chiyuda , 
43011052	si kufera Ayuda okha tayu , mbwenye kugumanya anthu onsene a Mulungu adamwazikana ale , kuti akhale abodzi . 
43011053	Kubulukira nsiku yeneyo kwenda m'tsogolo , akadamu a Chiyuda akhasakasaka njira zakuphera Yesu . 
43011054	Natenepo Yesu hakhafamba pakwecha mu Yudea tayu , mbwenye adabulukamo mbaenda pyache kumbuto ya chifupi na thando , kuluwani ya Efremu , kudakhala iye pabodzi na anyakufunzache kule . 
43011055	Ndzidzi wa Phwando ya Paska ukhali chifupi , tenepo anthu azinji adenda ku Yerusalemu kubulukira kumidzi kachita mwambo wa kupichenesa wakuthema nawo kupembedza Mulungu , Phwandoyo mbidzati fika .
