43015003	Imwe mwacheneswa kale na chifunziso chidakupasani ine chile . 
43015004	Khalani muna ine , inembo ndinadzakhala muna imwe . Nthambi pa yokha ene nkhabe bala nsapo ingakhonda khala pamuti , sasawambo na imwe nkhabe bala nsapo mungakhonda khala muna ine . 
43015005	" Ine ndine muti wamphesa , imwe ndimwe nthambi zache . Munthu anakhala muna ine , inembo muna iye , anadzabala nsapo zizinji ; thangwi kusowa ine , imwe nkhabe kwanisa chita pinthu tayu . 
43015006	Munthu wakukhonda khala muna ineyo ambakhala ninga nthambi yakutayiwa mbiuma ; nthambi ninga zenezi zimbagumanywa mbiziponywa pamoto mbizipitswa . 
43015007	Mungakhala muna ine , pontho mafalanga angakhala muna imwe , mupemphe chonsene chinafuna imwecho , tenepo munadzachipaswa . 
43015008	Demelero ya Babanga ikuoneswa pakubala kwanu nsapo zizinji , pontho pakukhala anyakufunzanga . 
43015009	Ine ndimbakufunani ninga montho mumbandifunira Baba . Khalani mu kukufunani kwanga . 
43015010	Mungavera matongero angawa , imwe munadzakhala mu kukufunani kwanga ninga montho mudavera ine matongero a Babanga mbandikhala mu kundifuna kwache . 
43015011	" Ine ndakupangani penepi kuti kukomerwa kwanga kukhale namwe , pontho kuti kukomerwa kwanu kukhale kwakumalisikiratu . 
43015012	Matongero anga mbawa : Funanani unango na mwanzache , ninga montho mumbakufunirani ine . 
43015013	Nkhabe munthu kumfuna mwanzache kupiringana penepa pakuti munthu ataye moyo wache thangwi ya ashamwali ache . 
43015014	Imwe ndimwe ashamwali anga mungachita pinakupangani ine . 
43015015	Ine nkhabe kukuchemeranive pontho anyabasanga tayu , thangwi nyabasa nkhabe dziwa chinachita mbuyache . Mbwenye ndinakuchemerani ashamwali anga , thangwi ndakudziwisani pyonsene pyava ine kubulukira kuna Babanga . 
43015016	Si imwe mudandisankhula tayu , mbwenye ndine ndidakusankhulani mbandikupambulani kuti mukabale nsapo zizinji , nsapo zile zinakwanisa kupirira . Tenepo Baba anadzakupasani chinthu chonsene chinampempha imwe na dzinanga . 
43015017	Tenepo ndinakupasani matongero awa ; funanani unango na mwanzache . Chizondi cha anthu a padziko yapansi
43015018	" Ngakhala anthu a padziko yapansi ambakuzondani , kumbukani kuti adatoma kuzonda ine . 
43015019	Imwe mbamudakhala abodzi na anthu a padziko yapansi , iwo mbadakufunani thangwi yakuti ndimwe anzawo . Mbwenye ambakuzondani thangwi ndakusankhulani pakati pa anthu a padziko yapansi , tenepo si imweve anzawo tayu . 
43015020	Kumbukani pidakupangani ine pile kuti , ' Nkhabe nyabasa ambapiringana mbuyache tayu . ' Ngakhala iwo adandiboneresa , anati aboneresembo imwepo ; ngakhala iwo adavera chifunziso changa , anati averembo chifunziso chanu . 
43015021	Iwo anadzakuchitirani pinthu pyonsenepi thangwi yakuti ndimwe anga ; thangwi iwo nkhabe dziwa adandituma ule . 
43015022	Ine mbandidakhonda kudza mbandilonga kuna iwo , iwo nee mbadakhala akudawa tayu . Mbwenye chinchino iwo nkhabe chakuti alonge . 
43015023	Munthu ambandizondayo , azonda pontho Babanga . 
43015024	Mbandidakhonda chita pinthu pakati pawo pyakuti chipo nee mbodzi apichita tayu , iwo nee mbadakhala akudawabi ; mbwenye chinchino iwo aona pinthu pyachita ine , kwache akutizonda , ine na Babanga ene . 
43015025	Penepi pidachitika towera pikwanekwane pidalembwa m'mwambo mwawo kuti , Two adandizonda okhonda na thangwi ene . '
43015026	" Nyakuphedzera anadzabwera — Mzimu Wakuchena , nyakutchululira pyakuonadi pya Mulungu , pontho nyakubulukira kuna Baba ule . Ndinadzamtuma kubulukira kuna Baba , tenepo iye anadzandichitira umboni . 
43015027	Imwembo munadzandichitira umboni , thangwi imwe mwakhala na ine pabodzi kutomera pakutoma . 
43016001	" Ndakupangani pyonsenepi , towera muleke dzataya chikhulupiro chanu . 
43016002	Imwe munadzalekeswa kapembedza nawo m'nyumba zakupemphereramo , pontho ndzidzi unadzafika wakuti anthu anafuna dzakuphaniwo anadzanyerezera kuti iwo akutumikira Mulungu na pinachita iwopyo . 
43016003	Anthu anadzachita penepi thangwi iwo hambadziwa nee Baba penu ine tayu . 
43016004	Mbwenye ndakupangani penepi , towera ndzidzi ungafika unafuna iwo dzachita penepi , mudzakumbuke kuti ndidakucheuzani . " Sidakupangeni penepi ndzidzi wakutoma ule tayu , thangwi ndikhali pabodzi pene namwe . 
43016005	Mbwenye chinchino , ndikwenda kuna adandituma ule , kwache pakati panupa nkhabe na mbodzi ene andivunza kunaenda ine tayu . 
43016006	Mitimanu yaphatwa na nsisi pyakwanga thangwi ya pinthu pyakupangani inepi . 
43016007	Mbwenye ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti mphyadidi kuna imwe kuti ine ndiende , thangwi ndingakhonda kwenda , Nyakuphedzera nee anabwera tayu . Mbwenye ndingaenda , ndinati ndidzamtumize kuna imwe . 
43016008	Tenepo iye angadzabwera anadzatsikimizira anthu a pansi pano kuti kunyerezera kwawo pa pyakudawa , chilungamo , pontho na kutonga mseru kunafuna dzachita Mulungu nkhwakudawika . 
43016009	Kunyerezera kwawo pa pyakudawa nkhwakudawika , thangwi iwo hambandikhulupira tayu ;
43016010	kunyerezera kwawo pa chilungamo nkhwakudawika , thangwi ine ndikwenda kuna Baba , tenepo imwe nee munadzandionave tayu ;
43016011	kunyerezera kwawo pa pyakutonga mseru kunafuna dzachita Mulungu nkhwakudawika , thangwi Satana , mfumu wakuipa wa dziko yapansi pano , akonwa pyache kale . 
43016012	" Ndina pizinji pyakuti ndikupangeni , kwache chinchino nee munakwanisa kupivesa tayu . 
43016013	Mbwenye Mzimu Wakuchena , ambatchululira pyakuonadi pya Mulungu ule , angadzafika , anadzakuchitisani kuti mudziwe pyakuonadi pyonsene . Iye hanadzalonga na utongi wache ene tayu , mbwenye anadzalonga pimbampanga Baba , tenepo anadzakupangani pinthu pinafuna kudza . 
43016014	Iye anadzandipasa demelero , thangwi iye anadzakwata pinalonga ine mbadzapilongambo kuna imwe . 
43016015	Pinthu pyonsene pya Baba mphyanga ; ndi thangwi yache ndidalonga kuti Mzimu Wakuchena anadzakwata pinalonga ine mbadzapilongambo kuna imwepo . 
43016016	" Pasala kwene ndzidzi pang'ono basi wakuti imwe muleke dzandionave , mbwenye pangadzagwanda pontho ndzidzi pang'ono munati mudzandione . "
43016017	Anango a anyakufunzache penepo adavunzana okha ene mbati , " Akulonganji pinalonga iye kuti , ' Pasala kwene ndzidzi pang'ono basi wakuti imwe muleke dzandionave , mbwenye pangadzagwanda pontho ndzidzi pang'ono munati mudzandione ' , pontho na pyalonga iye kuti , Thangwi ndikwenda kuna Babanga . '
43016018	Mafala akuti , ' pasala ndzidzi pang'ono ' akulonga kuti tani ? Ife nkhabe vesa pinalonga iyepi ! "
43016019	Yesu adapidziwa kale kuti iwo adafuna kumvunza , tenepo iye adalonga mbati , " Ine ndidalonga kuti , ' Pasala kwene ndzidzi pang'ono basi wakuti imwe muleke dzandionave , mbwenye pangadzagwanda pontho ndzidzi pang'ono munati mudzandione . ' Kadi pinavunzana imwe mphenepi ?
43016020	Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti imwe munadzalira na kusintili , mbwenye anthu a padziko yapansi anadzakomerwa ; imwe munadzatsukwala , mbwenye kutsukwala kwanuko kunadzasanduka kukomerwa . 
43016021	Mkazi angafuna kubala ambasanyika pyakwanga thangwi ndzidzi wa nyatwa wafika , mbwenye si ndzidzi mwana nkhubalwa , ambaduwalira nyatwa zache zile , thangwi ambakomerwa kuti mwana aona kunja . 
43016022	Ipyombo pili sasawa kuna imwepo , chinchino imwe mukutsukwala , mbwenye ine ndinadzakuonani pontho , tenepo mitimanu inadzakomerwa pyakwanga , kukomerwa kwakuti nee mbodzi anakwanisa dzakumalisa tayu . 
43016023	" Nsiku yeneyo ingadzafika , imwe nkhabe dzandipemphave pinthu tayu . Ndikukupangani pyakuonadi kuti Baba anadzakupasani pyonsene pinadzampempha imwe na dzinanga . 
43016024	Kufikirana chinchino pano imwe nee mwapempha chinthu na chibodzi chene na dzinanga tayu ; pemphani , tenepo munati mudzatambire towera mukomerwe monsene mwene . 
43016025	" Ndakupangani penepi mwakuphiphirisa . Ndzidzi unadzafika wakuti sinadzalonga mwakuphiphirisa tayu , kwache ndinati ndidzalonge nam we pya Baba mwakuveka . 
43016026	Nsikuyo ingadzafika , munati mudzampemphe na dzinanga . Penepa ndikulonga kuti nkhabe funika kuti ine ndidzakupemphereni kuna Baba tayu , 
43016027	thangwi Baba ene mwenechiro ambakufunani . Iye ambakufunani thangwi imwe mumbafunambo ine , pontho mwakhulupira kuti ndidabulukira kuna Mulungu . 
43016028	Ine ndidabulukira kuna Baba mbandidza pansi pano ; tenepo chinchino ndikubuluka pansi pano kubwerera kuna Baba . "
43016029	Anyakufunzache adalonga kuna iye mbati , " Chinchino mukupilonga mwakuveka okhonda phiphirisa . 
43016030	Chinchino tapidziwa kuti imwe mumbadziwa pinthu pyonsene ; nkhabeve funika munthu kuti akuvunzeni tayu . Penepi pikutichitisa kuti tikhulupire kuti imwe mudabulukira kuna Mulungu . "
43016031	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Ayi mwakhulupiradi chinchino ?
43016032	Ndzidzi ukudza , pontho wakwana kale , wakuti monsenene munadzamwazikana , kuthawira m'misa mwanu mbamundisiya ndekha . Mbwenye sinadzasaliratu ndekha tayu , thangwi Baba ambakhala nane . 
43016033	Ndakupangani penepi towera mukhale na mtendere pakuphatanizana kwanu na ine . Dziko yapansi pano inadzakuonesani nyatwa , kwache wangisani , thangwi ine ndaikunda ! "
43017001	Pidamala Yesu kulonga penepi , adayang'ana kudzulu mbalonga mbati , " Baba , ndzidzi wakwana . Pasani Mwananu demelero towera Mwana akupasenimbo demelero . 
43017002	Thangwi imwe mudampasa utongi pa anthu onsene konsene kwene , towera apase moyo okhonda mala kuna onsene adampasa imwe ale . 
43017003	Moyo okhonda mala nkhulonga kuti kudziwa imwepo , Mulungu mbodzi yekha wakuonadi , pontho kudziwa Yesu Khristu , adatuma imwe ule . 
43017004	Ine ndaonesa demelero yanu padziko yapansi pano pakumalisa kuphata basa idandipasa imwe ile . 
43017005	Baba , chinchino ndipaseni demelero pamaso panu , demelero ikhali na ine pabodzi na imwe dziko mbidzati lengwa ile . 
43017006	" Ine ndachitisa kuti mudziwike kuna ale adandipasa imwe kubulukira pa anthu a padziko yapansi . Iwo akhali anthu anu , tenepo imwe mudandipasa . Iwo avera mafalanu , 
43017007	tenepo chinchino adziwa kuti pyonsene pidandipasa imwe pimbabulukira kuna imwepo . 
43017008	Ine ndidaapasa mphangwa zidandipasa imwe zile , tenepo iwo adazitambira . Iwo apidziwadi kuti ine ndidabulukira kuna imwe , pontho akhulupira kuti mudandituma ndimwe . 
43017009	" Ine ndikuapempherera anthu adandipasa imwe ale , thangwi iwo nganu . Ine nkhabe pempherera anthu a padziko yapansi tayu . 
43017010	Pyonsene pina inepi mphyanu , pyonsene pina imwembopyo mphyanga , tenepo demelero yanga ikuoneswa kudzera muna iwo . 
43017011	Chinchino ine ndikudza kuna imweko , ine sinakhalave pansi pano tayu , mbwenye iwo ali pansi pano basi . Baba Wakuchena , akoyeni mwadidi na mphamvu za dzinanu , dzina idandipasa imwe ile , towera iwo akhale abodzi sasawambo ninga muna ife abodzi . 
43017012	Ndzidzi ukhali ine nawo , ndidaakoya mwadidi na mphamvu za dzinanu , dzina idandipasa imwe ile . ' Ndidaayang'anira mwadidi , tenepo nkhabe mbodzi atayikapo , kupambula ule ene adathema kutayika kuti pikwanekwane pidalonga Malemba . 
43017013	Tenepo chinchino ndikudza kuna imwe . Ndikulonga tenepa ndzidzi unakhala ine pansi pano kuti mitimawo ikomerwe monsene mwene na kukomerwa kunaapasa ine . 
43017014	Ine ndidaapasa mphangwa zanu , tenepo anthu a padziko yapansi adaazonda , thangwi iwo si abodzi na anthu a padziko yapansi tayu , ninga inembo si ine mbodzi wa anthu a padziko yapansi tayu . 
43017015	Ine nkhabe kukupemphani kuti muabuluse pansi pano tayu , mbwenye muatchinjirize mwadidi gopesera Satana , Nyakuipa ule . 
43017016	Iwo si abodzi na anthu a padziko yapansi tayu , ninga inembo si ine mbodzi wa anthu a padziko yapansi tayu . 
43017017	Achitiseni na pyakuonadi kukhala akupambulika kuna imwe ; mafalanu ngakuonadi . 
43017018	Ine ndaatuma padziko yapansi pano sasawambo ninga mudanditumira imwe padziko yapansi pano . 
43017019	Tenepo ine ndikupipereka kuna imwe thangwi ya iwo , towera iwombo akhale akupambulika kuna imwe mwakuonadi . 
43017020	" Ine nkhabe pempherera iwo okha tayu , mbwenye na ale ene anadzandikhulupira , thangwi ya mphangwa zinadzalalika iwo . 
43017021	Ndikupemphera kuti iwo onsene akhale abodzi . Baba , achitiseni kuti iwo akhale muna ife , sasawambo ninga mule muna imwe muna ine , inembo muna imwe . Iwo akhale abodzi , towera anthu a padziko yapansi akhulupire kuti mudandituma ndimwe . 
43017022	Ine ndidaapasa demelero idandipasa imwe ile , towera iwo akhale abodzi , ninga ife ndife abodzi . 
43017023	Ine muna iwo , imwembo muna ine , towera akhaledi abodzi chadichadi kuti anthu a padziko yapansi adziwe kuti mudandituma ndimwe , pontho kuti imwe mumbaafuna ninga mumbandifunira imwe . 
43017024	" Baba , mudandipasa anthuwa ndimwe , tenepo pinafuna ine mphyakuti iwo akhale na ine pabodzi kunakakhala ine kule , towera aonembo demelero yanga , demelero idandipasa imwe ile , thangwi imwe mudandifuna dziko mbidzati lengwa . 
43017025	Baba wakulungama , anthu a padziko yapansi nkhabe kukudziwani tayu , mbwenye ine ndimbakudziwani , tenepo awa ambapidziwa kuti ndimwe mudandituma . 
43017026	Ine ndidachitisa kuti iwo akudziweni ; tenepo ndinati ndithimize kuchita chibodzibodzi , towera kundifima kwanu kukhale muna iwo , pontho kuti ine ndikhale muna iwo . "
43018001	Pikhadamala Yesu kupemphera , iye na anyakufunzache adabuluka mbawambukira kumtunda unango wa mkulo wa Kedroni . Kweneko kukhali munda , tenepo Yesu na anyakufunzache adapita m'mundamo . 
43018002	Yudasi , nyakupereka Yesu kuna anyamalwache ule , akhaidziwa mbutoyo thangwi kazinji kene Yesu akhadagumanyikana na anyakufunzache kweneko . 
43018003	Tenepo Yudasi ule adenda kumundako pabodzi na gulu ya anyankhondo a Chiroma pabodzi na anango mwa anyakulondali Nyumba ya Mulungu akutumwa na anyansembe akulu pontho na Afarisi . Iwo adathukula pida , nyale na ntsakali . 
43018004	Yesu adadziwiratu pyonsene pikhafuna kumchitikira , tenepo adenda patsogolo mbaavunza mbati , " Anafuna imwe mbani ? "
43018005	Iwo adatawira mbati , " Yesu wa ku Nazareti . " Tenepo Yesu adatawira mbati , " Ndine ene pano . " Yudasi , nyakupereka Yesu ule , adaimira ponthopo pabodzi nawo . 
43018006	Pidalonga Yesu kuna iwo mbati , " Ndine ene pano , " iwo adafundukira m'nduli mbagwa pansi . 
43018007	Yesu adaavunza pontho mbati , " Anafuna imwe mbani ? " Iwo adatawira mbati , " Yesu wa ku Nazareti . "
43018008	Yesu adalonga mbati , " Ndakupangani kale kuti ndine pano . Apo ngakhala munaflina ine , alekeni anango wa aende pyawo . "
43018009	Iye adalonga penepi kuti pikwanekwane pikhadalonga iye pile kuti , " Baba , ine sidataya na mbodzi ene pa anthu adandipasa imwe ale tayu . "
43018010	Simoni Peturo ule akhali na talasada , adaicholola mbakhamwadza nayo bitchu wa Nyansembe Wamkulu mbagwandiratu khutu yache yakumadyo . Dzinache bitchu weneyu ikhali Malikosi . 
43018011	Yesu adapanga Peturo mbati , " Feka talasada m'mbuto mwache ! Kani ukunyerezera kuti ndinamwa tayu khomitcho ya nyatwa yandipasa Babayi ? "
43018012	Gulu ya anyankhondo a Chiroma pabodzi na mkadamu wawo , pontho na anyakulondali Nyumba ya Mulungu ale , adaphata Yesu mbammanga . 
43018013	Chakutoma adenda naye kuna Anasi , thangwi iye akhali tebzalache Kayafa , ule akhali Nyansembe Wamkulu chaka chenecho . , 
43018014	Kayafayo ngule akhadapanga akadamu a Chiyuda kuti mphyadidi kuti munthu mbodzi afere anthu onsene . 
43018015	Simoni Peturo pabodzi pene na nyakufunza unango ule , adatewera Yesu . Nyakufunza unangoyo akhadziwika mwadidi mwene kuna Nyansembe Wamkulu , tenepo adapita na Yesu pabodzi m'thando ya nyumba ya Nyansembe Wamkulu , 
43018016	mwenemo Peturo adaimira panja pamsuwo . Tenepo nyakufunza unangoyo adabwerera panja mbalonga na mtsikana akhayang'anira pamsuwo pale , tenepo adapitisa Peturo m'thando mule . 
43018017	Mtsikana akhali pamsuwo ule adalonga kuna Peturo mbati , " Kadi iwe si iwe mbodzi wa anyakufunza a munthu weneyu tayu ? " Peturo adatawira mbati , " Nkhabe si ine tayu . "
43018018	Kunja kukhatonthola , tenepo anyabasa na anyakulondali Nyumba ya Mulungu akhadaphatisa moto wamakala , mbaimira kuotha . Tenepo Peturo adakaimirambo pabodzi na iwo mbaotha moto . 
43018019	Nyansembe Wamkulu adavunza Yesu pya anyakufunzache na pya chifunziso chache . 
43018020	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Ine ndikhalonga pakwecha kuna anthu onsene . Ndzidzi onsene ndikhafunzisa m'nyumba zakupemphereramo , pontho na m'Nyumba ya Mulungu , mukhagumanyikana Ayuda onsene pabodzi mule . Nee ndidalonga chinthu na chibodzi chene m'chibisobiso tayu . 
43018021	Apo munandivunziranji ? Vunzani anthu adandivawo . Ndimomwene kuti iwo akudziwa pinthu pidalonga ine kuna iwo . "
43018022	Pidalonga Yesu penepi , mbodzi wa anyakulondali penepo adamgasa mbama mbalonga mbati , " Kadi iwe ungalonge tenepa kuna Nyansembe Wamkuluyu ? "
43018023	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Ngakhala ine ndalonga pyakuipa , pilongetu mphapo kuna anthu onsene ali panowa . Mbwenye ngakhala ndalonga pyakuonadi , apo wandimenyeranji ? "
43018024	Tenepo Anasi adamtumiza wakumangwa kuna Kayafa , Nyansembe Wamkulu . 
43018025	Peturo akhaimira basi penepo kuotha moto . Tenepo anango ale adalonga kuna iye mbati , " Ayi iwe si iwe mbodzi wa anyakufunza a munthu weneyu tayu ? " Mbwenye Peturo adatuna mbati , " Nkhabe si ine tayu . "
43018026	Mbodzi wa anyabasa a Nyansembe Wamkulu , mbaleache ule akhadagwandwa khutu na Peturo adalonga mbati , " Kadi sidakuona na iye m'munda mule tayu ? "
43018027	Peturo adatuna pontho mbati , " Nkhabe ! " Penepo pene dzongwe adalira . 
43018028	Bzobzo na machibese akadamu a Chiyuda adakwata Yesu kubuluka naye kunyumba ya Kayafa mbaenda naye kunyumba ya mkadamu wa Boma . Iwo ene hadapita m'nyumba mule kuti akhonde swipa , thangwi akhateweza mwambo wawo wakupichenesa towera akwanise kudya nawo Phwando ya Paska . 
43018029	Natenepo Pilato adabuluka panja kuna iwo mbaavunza mbati , " Munthuyu adawanji kuti mumsumire kuna ine ? "
43018030	Iwo adatawira mbati , " Ife nee mbatidadza naye kuna imwe tayu , iye mbadakhonda khala na mseru . "
43018031	Pilato adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Apo mkwateni muende naye kamtonga kuteweza mwambo wanu . " Iwo adatawira mbati , " Ife nkhabe tawiriswa kupha munthu tayu . "
43018032	Penepi pidachitika towera mafala adalonga Yesu akwanekwane , mafala akulonga pya kufa kukhafuna iye dzachita . 
43018033	Pilato adabwerera m'nyumba mule mbachemeresa Yesu mbamvunza mbati , " Ayi iwe ndiwe Mfumu wa Ayuda ? "
43018034	Yesu adatawira mbati , " Kadi pinandivunza imwepi mukupinyerezera ndimwe , penu kuti anthu anango akupangani pya ine ? "
43018035	Pilato adatawira mbati , " Kani ukunyerezera kuti ine ndine Myuda ? Akupereka kuna ine ndi anthu a dzinzako na anyansembe akulu . Wasosanji ? "
43018036	Yesu adalonga mbati , " Ufumu wanga si wa padziko yapansi pano tayu . Ufumu wanga mbudakhala wa padziko yapansi pano , anyakunditewera mbadachita kale nkhondo kuti ndileke perekwa kuna akadamu a Chiyuda . Nkhabe ! Ufumu wanga si wa padziko yapansi pano tayu ! "

44005007	Pidagwanda maora matatu mkazache na kukhonda dziwa pikhadachitikira mamunache pile adapitambo monthomo .

44005009	Penepo Peturo adalonga kuna iye mbati , " Thangwi ninji iwe na mamunako mwaverana kuyesa Mzimu wa Mbuya ? Yang'ana , amuna adenda kaikha mamunako m'masiye ale , chinchino ali pamsuwopo , mphapo onthowo anadzathukulambo iwe . "
44005010	Kabodzinakabodzi iye adagwa pansi pamanyalo a Peturo mbaferatu . Aphale adapita mwenemo mbaona kuti iye adafa , tenepo iwo adamthukula mbaenda naye kamuikha m'khundu mwa mamunache . 
44005011	Mpingo onsene na anthu onsene adagoswerwa pyakwanga pidava iwo penepi . 
44005012	Pidzindikiro na pyakudodomesa pizinji pikhachitwa na anyakutumwa pakati pa anthu . Anyakukhulupira onsene akhagumanyikana pabodzi m'Khonde mwa Solomo . 
44005013	Nee mbodzi wa kunja kwa gulu yawoyo adawanga mtima kupita m'gulu mwawomo tayu , mbwenye anthu onsene akhaasimba . 
44005014	Mbwenye anthu azinji ene , amuna na akazi ale adakhulupira Mbuya , akhathimizirika kugulu kwa wo . 
44005015	Na thangwi ya pikhachita anyakutumwa , atenda akhathukulwa mbagoneswa pamakha na mabonde m'khundu mwa misewu towera pikhafamba Peturo chithunzithunzi chache chikhuye anango a iwo . 
44005016	Tenepo anthu azinji ene akubulukira m'maluwani onsene akuzungulira mzinda wa Yerusalemu adadza na atenda pontho na ale akhali na mizimu yakuipa ; tenepo onsene adawangiswa . 
44005017	Tenepo Nyansembe Wamkulu na anzache onsene a m'gulu ya Asaduki adaipirwa pyakwanga na anyakutumwa ale . Natenepo adapinyerezera kuti achitepo pinthu . 
44005018	Iwo adaaphata anyakutumwa mbaafungira m'perezo . 
44005019	Mbwenye na mosiku mwache mngelo wa Mbuya adafungula misuwo ya perezo , mbaabulusa panja , mbaapanga mbati , 
44005020	" Ndokoni mukaimire m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kupanga anthu pyonsene pya moyo wachinchinowu . "
44005021	Anyakutumwa adaveradi , tenepo na machibese ene adenda kapita m'Nyumba ya Mulungu mbatoma kufunzisa . Nyansembe Wamkulu pabodzi na anzache adachemeresa mgumano wa akuluakulu onsene a Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda . Tenepo iwo adatuma anthu kuperezo kuti adze na anyakutumwa kuna iwo . 
44005022	Mbwenye pidafika anthuwo kuperezo , hadagumanamo anyakutumwa tayu , natenepo adabwerera ku Thandoyo mbakalonga mbati , 
44005023	" Pidafika ife kweneko , tidagumana perezo yafungwa mwadidi , pontho anyakulondali onsene akhali m'misuwo , mbwenye pidachita ife m'bwalomo piteni , nee mbodzi adagumana ife mwenemo ! "
44005024	Pidapiva anyansembe akulu pontho na mkadamu wa anyakulondali Nyumba ya Mulungu , adamalwa nzeru pyakwanga na pikhadachitikira anyakutumwa pile . 
44005025	Tenepo padadza munthu kuna iwo mbalonga mbati , " Ngavani kuno ! Amuna adafungira imwe m'perezo ale ali m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kufunzisa anthu . "
44005026	Natenepo mkadamu wa anyakulondali Nyumba ya Mulungu adenda pabodzi na aphale ache mbakakwata anyakutumwa mbadza nawo . Mbwenye iwo hadaakwata mwakuzhangali tayu , thangwi adagopa anthu kuaponyera miyala . 
44005027	Iwo adadza na anyakutumwa ale mwenemo mbaaimirisa pamaso pa Thandoyo , tenepo Nyansembe Wamkulu adaavunza mbati , 
44005028	" Ife tidakucheuzani pikulu kuti muleke funzisa na dzina ya munthu weneyu . Mphapo yang'anani pyachita imwepi . Imwe mwavekesa chifunziso chanu mu Yerusalemu monsene , pontho mukufuna kutipambizira pya imfa ya munthu weneyu . "
44005029	Peturo na anyakutumwa anango adatawira mbati , " Tathema kuvera Mulungu nee kuti tivere anthu tayu . 
44005030	Imwe mudampha Yesu pakumkhomera pamtanda , mbwenye Mulungu wa makolo athu adamulamusa kuimfa . 
44005031	Mulungu adamuikha kudzanjache yamadyo kukhala Mkadamu pontho Nyankhombo kupasa mwayi anthu a ku Israele wakuleka pyakudawa pyawo kuti Mulungu aalekerere . 
44005032	Ife ndife mboni za pinthu penepi — ife na Mzimu Wakuchena , ule ndi mtukwa wa Mulungu kuna ambamvera ale . "
44005033	Pidapiva Thando ile , idazhangali pyakwanga mwakuti idafuna kuti anyakutumwa ale aphiwe . 
44005034	Mbwenye Mfarisi unango , dzinache Gamaliele , mfiinzisi wa mwambo , ule akhalemedzwa pyakwanga na anthu onsene , adaimira m'Thandomo . Iye adatonga kuti anyakutumwa atome buluswa panja pang'ono , 
44005035	tenepo adalonga mbati , " Imwe , Alsraele anzanga , chitani mpholemphole na pinachita imwe kuna anthu enewa . 
44005036	Imwe mukudziwa kuti pyaka pyapitapyo Teudasi akhafunambo kupiikha yekha ene kukhala munthu wakuveka , tenepo amuna madzana makumanayi adamtewera . Mbwenye iye adaphiwa , anyakumtewerache adamala mwazikana , pontho gulu yache idaferatu . 
44005037	Kubuluka penepo Yudasi wa ku Galilea adaonekerambo pandzidzi wa kalembera . Iye adachitisa mwinji wa anthu akhamtewera ale kupandukira , mbwenye iyembo adaphiwa , pontho anyakumtewerache onsene adamwazikanambo . 
44005038	Natenepo ndikukupangani kuti muleke kuchita pyakuipa kuna anthu enewa . Alekeni aende pyawo . Ngakhala pinanyerezera penu pinachita iwopi mphyakubulukira kuna anthu , munapiona pinamala , 
44005039	mbwenye pingakhala mphyakubulukira kuna Mulungu nee munakwanisa kupikundabi , tenepo munaoneka mwekha ene kuti mukuthimbana na Mulungu ! " Tenepo Thandoyo idatawirizana na pidalonga Gamaliele pile . 
44005040	Iwo adaachemera anyakutumwa kupita m'bwalomo mbatonga kuti akwapulwe . Tenepo adaakhondesa kulonga pontho na dzina ya Yesu , mbaasudzula . 
44005041	Pidabuluka anyakutumwa m'Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda mule , adakomerwa pyakwanga thangwi Mulungu adapinyerezera kuti iwo akhadathema kubonera thangwi ya kutumikira Yesu . 
44005042	Tenepo nsiku zonsene akhathimiza kufunzisa na kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi m'Nyumba ya Mulungu pontho na m'misuwo ya anthu kuti Yesu ndi Khristu . 
44006001	Nsiku zenezo , pikhathimizirika gulu ya anyakufunza , padalamuka kukhonda vana pakati pa Ayuda olonga Chigriki na Ayuda olonga Chiheberi . Ayuda olonga Chigriki akhadungunya thangwi yakuti amamfelwawo nee akhatsalakanwabi na pinthu pikhagawizwa nsiku na nsiku . 
44006002	Tenepo anyakutumwa khumi na awiri adagumanyisa pabodzi gulu yonsene ya anyakukhulupira mbalonga mbati , " Si pyadidi tayu kuti ife tisiye kulalika mafala a Mulungu towera tiyang'anire kugawa kwa pinthu . 
44006003	Natenepo abale , sankhulani mwakuonesesa pakati panu amuna anomwe ale anadziwa imwe kuti ngakudzazwa na Mzimu Wakuchena pontho anzeru , ifembo tinadzaapasa basa yeneyi . 
44006004	Tenepo ndzidzi onsene ife tinadzakhala tikupemphera na kuphata basa yakulalika . "
44006005	Gulu yonsene idakomerwa pyakwanga na pidalonga anyakutumwa pile , natenepo iwo adasankhula Setefano , mamuna wa chikhulupiro pontho wakudzazwa na Mzimu Wakuchena , pontho na Filipi , Prokoro , Nikanoro , Timo , Paramena , na Nikolao , wa kuluwani ya Antiokea , nyakusanduzika kukhala Myuda ule . 
44006006	Tenepo gulu idadza na amuna ale kuna anyakutumwa , anyakutumwambo adaapempherera mbaasanjika manja . 
44006007	Mafala a Mulungu adathimiza kufalikira . Tenepo gulu ya anyakufunza idathimizirika mumzinda wa Yerusalemu , mwakuti anyansembe azinji ene adatawira chikhulupirocho . 
44006008	Setefano , munthu wakutsanzayiswa na Mulungu , pontho wakudzazwa na mphamvu , adachita pyakudodomesa na pidzindikiro pikulu pakati pa anthu . 
44006009	Mbwenye amuna anango a ku Nyumba yakupemphereramo ya Ammbe ( ninga mukhachemererwa iwo ) , ale akhali Ayuda a ku Kirene na a ku Alekezandria , pabodzi pene na Ayuda anango a kunthemba ya Kilikia na Asia adatoma kupokanyisana na Setefano . 
44006010	Mbwenye Mzimu Wakuchena adampasa Setefano nzeru mwakuti mukhalonga iye , iwo adachimwana kumkunda . 
44006011	Tenepo iwo adanyengerera amuna anango towera alonge kuti , " Tidamva akushola Mose pontho Mulungu ! "
44006012	Iwo adazhangalisa mitima ya anthu , akuluakulu na afunzisi a mwambo . Iwo adamphata Setefano mbadza naye ku Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda . 
44006013	Tenepo iwo adadza na amuna anango kuti alonge pyakupambizira Setefano . Amunawa adalonga mbati , " Munthu weneyu ndzidzi onsene ambalonga pyakupokanyisana na Nyumba ya Mulungu yakuchenayi pontho na mwambo wa Mose . 
44006014	Tidamva pontho akulonga kuti Yesu wa ku Nazaretiyu anadzafudza Nyumba ya Mulungu pontho na kusanduza mitemo yonsene idatipasa Mose ! "
44006015	Onsene akhali m'Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda ale , adamuyang'anisisa Setefano mbaona kuti nkhope yache ikhali ninga nkhope ya mngelo . 
44007001	Nyansembe Wamkulu adavunza Setefano mbati , " Ayi mphyakuonadi pinalonga anthuwa ? "
44007002	Tenepo Setefano adatawira mbati , " Ngavani kuno , ababanga na abale anga ! Kholo wathu Abrahamu mbadzati kwenda kakhala ku Harani , Mulungu wa demelero adamuonekera m'dziko ya Mesopotamia . 
44007003	Mulungu adalonga kuna iye kuti , ' Siya banjako , pontho buluka kudziko kwako uende kudziko inafima ine dzakupangiza . '
44007004	Natenepo iye adabuluka kudziko kwache , yakuchemerwa Akaladea mbaenda kakhala ku Harani . Pidafa babache , Mulungu adamfulusira kudziko yeneyi inakhala imwe chinchino . 
44007005	Mulungu hadampasa Abrahamu na mbuto ene kukhala yache ene , nee thanyo na ibodzi ene tayu , mbwenye Mulungu adadumbira kuti anadzapereka dzikoyo kuna iye na pidzukulu pyache kuti ikhale yawo . Pandzidzi udapangwa Abrahamu , iye nkhuti akhali nkhabe ana . 
44007006	Mulungu adalonga kuna iye tenepa kuti , ' Pidzukulu pyako pinadzakhala m'dziko ilendo . Kweneko anadzakhala mabitchu , pontho anadzavuyiwa pyakwanga pyaka madzana manayi . 
44007007	Mbwenye ndinadzatchunyusa anthu ale anadzaphatira iwo basa ninga mabitchu . Angamala penepo , anadzabuluka m'dzikomo mbadzandipembedza pambuto pano . '
44007008	Mulungu adachita chiverano na Abrahamu , tenepo chidzindikiro chache chikhali kugwanda nsonga yakumaso yachimuna . Tenepo Abrahamu adagwanda nsonga mwanache Isake pidamala nsiku zisere pidabalwa iye . Isakembo adagwanda nsonga Yakobo , mwanache . Yakobombo adagwanda nsonga anache achimuna khumi na awiri , makolo akuveka a dzinzathu ale . 
44007009	" Ana a Yakobo adaipirwa na mbaleawo Yosefe , tenepo adamgulisa towera akhale bitchu kudziko ya Iguputo . Mbwenye Mulungu akhali naye
44007010	mbamphedza panyatwa zache zonsene . Pidaonekera Yosefe kuna mfumu wa Iguputo , Mulungu adampasa nzeru na makhaliro adidi . Natenepo mfumu adamuikha kukhala mkadamu wa dziko ya Iguputo pontho wa pyonsene pya panyumba ya mfumu . 
44007011	Kukhali njala kudziko yonsene ya Iguputo na kudziko ya Kanani kwene mwakuti idadzesa nyatwa zikulu . Makolo athu hadakwanisa kugumana phoso tayu . 
44007012	Pidapiva Yakobo kuti ku Iguputo kukhali phoso , iye adatuma anache , makolo athu . Wenewu ukhali ulendo wawo wakutoma . 
44007013	Paulendo wawo wachiwiri Yosefe adapipangiza yekha ene kuna abale ache . Tenepo mfumu wa Iguputo adatoma kudziwa pya banja ya Yosefe . 
44007014	Tenepo Yosefe adatumiza mphangwa kuna babache Yakobo kumpanga iye na banjache yonsene kuti adze ku Iguputo . Onsene pabodzi akhali anthu makumanomwe . 
44007015	Tenepo Yakobo adendadi ku Iguputo kudafera iye na anache onsene kule . 
44007016	Mitembo yawo idendeswa ku Shekemu , kweneko idaikhwa m'masiye adagula Abrahamu kubulukira kubanja ya Hamori . 
44007017	" Pidafika ndzidzi chifupi wakuti Mulungu achite pidadumbira iye kuna Abrahamu pile , gulu ya anthu athu idainjipa pyakwanga m'Iguputo . 
44007018	M'nduli mwache mfumu unango okhonda dziwa pya Yosefe adatoma kutonga Iguputo . 
44007019	Iye adadyera mkopekope na kuboneresa makolo athu mbaakakamiza kusiya anawo akachiya kunja kwa mudzi towera afe . 
44007020	Ukhali ndzidzi onthowu udabalwa Mose , mwana wakubalika pyakwanga . Iye adaleliwa m'nyumba mwa babache miyezi mitatu . 
44007021	Tenepo pidasiyiwa iye kunja kwa mudzi , mwana wamkazi wa mfumu adamulokota mbamkuza ninga mwanache ene . 
44007022	Mose adafunziswa nzeru zonsene za anthu a ku Iguputo , natenepo adakhala munthu wamphamvu pakulonga na pakuchita pinthu pene . 
44007023	" Pidafika Mose pyaka makumanayi , adanyerezera kafambira Alsraele anzache . 
44007024	Iye adaona mwanzawo mbodzi akubonereswa na munthu wa ku Iguputo , natenepo adenda kamvunulira mbabwezera pakupha munthu wa ku Iguputo ule . 
44007025	Mose adanyerezera kuti anthu ache anapidziwa kuti Mulungu anaphatisa basa iye kuti aabuluse panyatwa zawo , mbwenye iwo nee akhapidziwabi . 
44007026	Nsiku inango iye adaona amuna awiri a ku Israele okhokha akumenyana , tenepo adayesayesa kuavunulira . Iye adalonga mbati , ' Ngavani amunamwe , imwe ngubaleanu , mphapo munamenyanirananji tenepa ? '
44007027	Mbwenye akhaboneresa mwanzache ule adamgwinyira Mose kukhundu mbavunza mbati , ' Mbani akuikha kukhala mkadamu pontho nyakutonga miseru pakati pathu ?
44007028	Kadi iwe ukufuna kundipha ninga mudaphera iwe munthu wa ku Iguputo ule dzulo ? '
44007029	Pidava Mose penepi adathawako ku Iguputo mbaenda kakhala ninga mlendo kudziko ya Midiani . Kweneko adabalako anache achimuna awiri . 
44007030	" Pidagwanda pyaka makumanayi , mngelo adamuonekera Mose m'thando m'malulume a moto m'thenthere yakugaka chifupi na phiri ya Sinai . 
44007031	Mose adadodoma pyakwanga na pidaona iyepyo mwakuti adafendeza chifupi kuti aone mwadidi . Mbwenye iye adava fala ya Mbuya ikulonga kuti , 
44007032	Tne ndine Mulungu wa makolo ako , Mulungu wa Abrahamu , Isake na Yakobo . ' Tenepo Mose adatetemera na mantha , pontho hadawanga mtima kuyang'anakove tayu . 
44007033	Tenepo Mbuya adampanga mbati , ' Dula nkhwaira zako , thangwi mbuto inaponda iweyo njakuchena . 
44007034	Ine ndaona nyatwa zinaona anthu anga ku Iguputo , pontho ndava kubulira kwawo , tenepo ndatchitha kuti ndiapulumuse panyatwa . Bwera , mphapo , ndikutume uende ku Iguputo . '
44007035	" Mose ngontho ule anthu a ku Israele adamkhonda mbamvunza mbati , ' Mbani akuikha kukhala mkadamu pontho nyakutonga miseru pakati pathu ? ' Iye akhali mbodzi ule Mulungu adamtuma kuti akhale mkadamu pontho nyankhombo wa anthu na kuphedzwa kwa mngelo ule adamuonekera m'thenthere yakugaka ile . 
44007036	Mose adatsogolera anthu kuabulusa mu Iguputo mbachita pyakudodomesa na pidzindikiro mu Iguputo , pa Bara Yakufira pontho m'thando pyaka makumanayi . 
44007037	Iye akhali ontho ule adalonga kuna anthu a ku Israele kuti , ' Mulungu anadzakutumirani mprofeti ninga ine , pontho anadzakhala mbodzi wa anthu anu onthowa . '
44007038	Mose akhali ontho ule adagumanyikana pabodzi na anthu a ku Israele m'thando . Iye akhali kweneko na makolo athu , pontho na mngelo , ule adalonga naye paphiri ya Sinai mbatitambirira mphangwa zamoyo kubulukira kuna Mulungu . 
44007039	" Mbwenye makolo athu adakhonda kumvera , mbamgwinyira kukhundu mbakhumba kubwerera pyawo ku Iguputo . 
44007040	Tenepo iwo adalonga kuna Aroni mbati , ' Tisasanyire pyathu milungu kuti ititsogolere . Ife nkhabe dziwa pyachitikira munthu weneyu , Mose , ule adatidzesa kuno kubulukira ku Iguputo . '
44007041	Penepo iwo adasasanya mfanikizo wa mwanamphulu , adapereka nsembe kuna mfanikizowo mbachita phwando yakulemedza pile pidasasanya iwo wokha ene . 
44007042	Tenepo Mulungu adaapasa nkhodolo mbaaleka kuti apembedze nyenyezi za kudzulu ninga mwalemberwa ipyo m'bukhu ya maprofeti kuti , ' Anthu a ku Israele ! Si ine tayu adaphera imwe nyama zanu mbamupereka nsembe pyaka makumanayi m'thando . 
44007043	Imwe mudathukula khumbi ya mulungu Moleki pontho mfanikizo wa Refani , mulungu wanu nyenyezi ule ; yeneyi ikhali mifanikizo idasasanya imwe kuti muipembedze . Natenepo ndinadzakutamisani kupiringana dziko ya Babulo . '
44007044	" M'thando makolo athu akhali na Chikhumbi cha Umboni wakuti Mulungu akhali nawo . Chidasasanywa ninga montho mudapangirwa Mose kuti asasanye , kutewezana na mudamuonesera Mulungu . 
44007045	M'nduli mwache makolo athu adatambira Chikhumbicho kubulukira kuna ababawo . Iwo adachithukula pikhaenda iwo na Yoshua kapokosa dziko kuna madzinza anango adathamangiswa na Mulungu pamaso pawo ale . Chikhumbi chidakhala kweneko kufikirana ndzidzi wa Davite . 
44007046	Mulungu adakomerwa naye , tenepo Davite adavunza Mulungu kuti amtawirise kumanga nyumba yakukhalamo Mulungu wa Yakobo .
44007047	Mbwenye adammangira nyumba akhali Mfumu Solomo . 
44007048	" Mbwenye Mulungu Wakudzuludzulu nkhabe khala m'nyumba zakumangwa na anthu tayu . Ninga mwalongera mprofeti kuti :
44007049	' Mulungu alonga kuti , Kudzulu ndi mpando wanga wachifumu , pontho dziko yapansi ndi chakusanjikapo manyalo anga . Njakutani nyumba inafuna imwe kundimangira , pontho mbuto inafuna ine khalamo ili kupi ?
44007050	Kadi si ine ene ndekha ndidapisasanya pinthu pyonsenepi tayu ? ' "
44007051	Setefano adathimiza kulonga mbati , " Anthu akuchimwanika imwe ! Imwe muna mitima ninga ya anthu okhonda khulupira Mulungu . Makutu anu agontha tani tenepa mwakuti mukuchimwana kuva kwene mphangwa za Mulungu ? Imwe mwakhala ninga makolo anu , pontho ndzidzi onsene mumbakhonda vera Mzimu Wakuchena !
44007052	Nkhabe mprofeti na mbodzi ene adasiyiwa kukhonda kubonereswa na makolo anu tayu . Iwo adapha anyamphangwa a Mulungu , ale kalene adalonga pyakudza kwa Nyabasache Wakulungama . Tenepo imwe mwapereka na kupha nyabasayo . 
44007053	Imwe ndimwe ontho ale mudatambira mwambo wa Mulungu , udaperekwa kuna imwe na angelo ule , mbwenye imwe nee mudauverabi ! "
44007054	Pidava Thando ya miseru ya Chiyuda mafala a Setefano , idazhangali pyakwanga mbimkikitira mano . 
44007055	Mbwenye Setefano , na kudzazwa na Mzimu Wakuchena , adayang'ana kudzulu mbaona demelero ya Mulungu , pontho Yesu aimira kudzanja yamadyo ya Mulungu . 
44007056	Iye adalonga mbati , " Ngayang'anani , ndikuona kudzulu kwafunguka pontho Mwana Munthu aimira kudzanja yamadyo ya Mulungu ! "
44007057	Tenepo na kukhuwa kukulu a m'Thando ale adaphopha makutu awo na manjawo mbampomokera onsene pabodzi . 
44007058	Iwo adambuluthira kunja kwa mzinda mbatoma kumponyera miyala . Mboni zidakoyesa mikanjo yawo kuna mphale , wakuthulwa Saulo . 
44007059	Iwo mbali m'kati kuponyera Setefano miyala , iye adapemphera mbati , " Mbuya Yesu , tambirani mzimu wanga ! "
44007060	Iye adagodama pansi mbakhuwa pikulu mbati , " Mbuya , lekani ikha konta kudawa kwawoku ! " Tenepo adaferatu ponthopo . 
44008001	Saulo ule adatawirizana nawo pya kupha kweneku . Nsiku yonthoyonthoyo mpingo wa mu Yerusalemu udatoma kubonereswa pyakwanga . Anyakukhulupira onsene , kupambula anyakutumwa , adabalalika konsene kunthemba za Yudea na Samaria . 
44008002	Amuna anango akupembedza Mulungu adaikha m'masiye Setefano mbamulira na chiliro chikulu . 
44008003	Saulo akhaboneresa pyakwanga mpingo mbaenda nyumba na nyumba kuphata anyakukhulupira , amuna na akazi ene , mbaenda nawo kaafungira m'perezo . 
44008004	Anyakukhulupira , akhadabalalika ale , adalalika Mphangwa Zadidi ponsene padenda iwo . 
44008005	Filipi adenda kumzinda wakuveka ' wa ku Samaria mbakalalika pya Khristu kuna anthu . 
44008006	Pidava chimwinji cha anthu na kuona pidzindikiro pidachita Filipi pile , iwo adafungula makutu towera avese pikhalonga iye pile . 
44008007	Mizimu yakuipa idabuluka muna anthu azinji na mkhuwo ukulu , tenepo anyamfutete na anyakulamala azinji adawangiswa . 
44008008	Natenepo kukomerwa kukulu kukhalipo mumzindamo . 
44008009	Mumzindamo mukhakhala munthu , dzinache Simoni , ule adadodomesa anthu a mu Samariamo na matsengache . Iye akhadungudza kuti akhali munthu wamkulu . 
44008010	Anthu onsene mwenemo , akuveka na akukhonda veka ene , akhamvesera mafalache mbalonga mbati , " Munthu weneyu ndi mphamvu ya Mulungu yakudziwika na dzina yakuti ' Mphamvu Ikulu . ' "
44008011	Iwo akhamvesera mafalachewo thangwi iye adadodomesa anthu na matsengache ndzidzi ukulu ene .

44012001	Pandzidzi wenewu Mfumu Herodi adatoma kuboneresa anthu anango a mumpingo .

44012003	Pidaona iye kuti Ayuda adakomerwa na penepi , iye adenda pontho kamanga Peturo . Penepi pidachitika pandzidzi wa Phwando ya Mikate yakusowa chakufufumisira . 
44012004	Pidamangwa Peturo , adenda kaikhwa m'perezo . Kweneko adamuikhira magulu anayi a anyakuonera a anthu anayianayi towera amuonere . Herodi adafuna kuti atonge mseru wa Peturo pamaso pa anthu pakumala pa Phwando ya Paska .

44012007	Vumbuvumbu mngelo wa Mbuya adaimira penepo . Tenepo cheza chidaoneka m'perezomo . Mngelo adatekenya Peturo paphewa kumulamusa mbalonga mbati , " Chimbiza ! Lamuka ! " Kabodzinakabodzi njema zidagwa pansi kubuluka m'mikono mwa Peturo . 
44012008	Tenepo mngelo adalonga mbati , " Manga bande yako , pontho vala nkhwaira zako . " Peturo adachitadi ninga monthomo . Mngelo adalonga pontho mbati , " Vala mkanjo wako unditewere . "
44012009	Tenepo Peturo adamteweradi mbabuluka m'perezo mule . Mbwenye iye hadapidziwa tayu kuti pikhachita mngelo pile pikhali ipyodi . Iye adanyerezera kuti akhaona kwene masomphenya . 
44012010	Iwo adapiringana gulu yakutoma ya anyakuonera mbapiringana pontho gulu yachiwiri mbafika pamsuwo wa utale wa perezo mumzindamo . Msuwo ule udafunguka okha ene . 44012011	Tenepo Peturo adatutumuka mbalonga mbati , " Chinchino ndapidziwa kuti ndipyodi ! Mbuya adatuma mngelo wache kundipulumusa kumphamvu ya Herodi pontho na kupinthu pyonsene pikhanyerezera Ayuda kuti pinandichitikira pile . "

44012014	Iye adadziwa kuti falayo ikhali ya Peturo . Tenepo adakomerwa pyakwanga mwakuti hadafungulevebi , mbwenye adabwerera na kuthamanga kapanga anthu kuti Peturo akhali panjapo .

44017031	Thangwi iye aikha nsiku inafuna iye dzatonga mseru anthu onsene a padziko yapansi mwakulungama kudzera muna munthu asankhula iye ule . Iye adapasa anthu onsene chitsikimizo cha penepi pakulamusa munthuyo kuimfa . "

44027040	Tenepo adagwanda nkhambala za ngoloweko zile mbazileka kuti zibile . Na ndzidzi onthowo adasudzula nkhambala zidamangirirwa kung'ombo ikulu yakuwongolera mwadiya . Tenepo adakwiza mathanga kutsogolo kwa mwadiya , towera mwadiya uende pyawo na mphepo mbatienderatu pagombeyo . 
44027041	Mbwenye mwadiya udadima nthunda yatchetcha yakubisika m'madzi mbutcherera . Kutsogolo kwa mwadiya kudatcherera mbakuchimwana kufamba , mwenemo kunduli kwache kukhapanduka thangwi ya mphamvu ya mabimbi . 
44027042	Anyankhondo adanyerezera pyakupha anyaperezo onsene ale , kugopesera anasambirira kumtunda mbathawa . 
44027043	Mbwenye mkadamu wa anyankhondo dzana ule adafuna kupulumusa Paulo , natenepo iye adaakhondesa kuchita penepi . Chakutoma iye adaapanga anthu , ale anakwanisa kusambirira kuti anumphire m'madzi mbasambirire kwenda kumtunda . 
44027044	Mphapo anango aphate matabwa na pimanyenyetswa pya mwadiyawu mbaenda kumtunda . Mwenemo ndiye mudapulumukira ife tonsene mbatikafika kumtunda . 
44028001	Pidapulumuka na kufika ife pamtunda , tidava kuti dzina ya nsuwayo ikhali Melita . 
44028002	Anthu a penepo akhali adidi pyakwanga kuna ife mbatitambira mwadidi . Iwo adatigasira moto kuti tiothe thangwi tidatontholerwa thangwi kukhavumba mvula . 
44028003	Paulo adagumanya mtolo wa nkhuni mbasesera nawo moto wo . Tenepo , na thangwi ya kupitsa kwa moto wo m'nkhuni mule , mudabuluka nyoka mbiluma dzanja ya Paulo mbikakamira ponthopo . 
44028004	Anthu a pansuwa ale adaona nyoka ili lemberere padzanja ya Paulo mbalonga mbati , " Munthuyu ndi phangadi . Kupulumuka kudachita iye pabara pale nkhupulumuka kwene pyache , mbwenye mulungu wakuchemerwa ' Chilungamo ' akhonda kuti iye akhale na moyo . "
44028005	Mbwenye Paulo adakupusira nyoka ile pamoto okhonda kuwazika na pang'ono pene . 
44028006	Iwo akhanyerezera kuti manungo ache anatupa penu kuti iye anagwa pansi kabodzinakabodzi mbafa . Mbwenye pidaona iwo kuti ndzidzi ukulu wagwanda nee chitika pinthu kuna iye tayu , iwo adasanduza manyerezero mbalonga mbati , " Munthuyu ndi mulungu ! "
44028007	Chifupi na mbutoyo pakhali minda ya Populio , mkadamu wa Boma wa pansuwapo . Iye adatitambira mwadidi mbatikhala ninga alendo kumusa kwache nsiku zitatu . 
44028008	Babache Populio akhagona patalimba m'nyumba thangwi iye akhava manungo pontho kamwazi . Paulo adapita m'subimo mbampempherera , tenepo adamsanjika manja mbamuwangisa . 
44028009	Pidachitika penepi atenda anango onsene a pansuwapo adadza mbawangiswambo . 
44028010	Iwo adatipasa mitukwa izinji ene , pontho pidasasanyika ife kuti tiende adatiikhira m'mwadiya pikhasowa ife paulendo wathu . 
44028011	Pidagwanda miyezi mitatu tidalamuka kwenda ulendo wathu na m'mwadiya unangombo , ule ukhakhala pansuwapo pandzidzi wa mainja . Mwadiyawo ukhachemerwa " Milungu yamapasa " pontho wakubulukira ku Alekezandria . 
44028012	Tidafika mumzinda wa Sirakusi mbatikhala kweneko nsiku zitatu . 
44028013	Kubuluka kweneko tidenda na m'mwadiya mbatikafika mumzinda wa Regimu . Mangwana mwache mphepo idagundika kubulukira kumwera , tenepo mkuchono mwache tidafika kuluwani ya Putioli . 
44028014	Kweneko tidagumana anyakukhulupira anango mbatipempha kuti tikhale nawo dimingu yamumphu . Kubuluka kweneko tidenda ku Roma . 
44028015	Pidava anyakukhulupira mu Roma kuti tikhadza , iwo adadza kudzatichingamira , anango kumbuto yakuchemerwa Nyumba Zitatu Zakugonamo Alendo , anangombo mpakana pa Msika wa Apio . Pidaona Paulo anthu ale , iye adakuza Mulungu mbawangiswa mtima pikulu . Pya Paulo mu Roma
44028016	Pidafika ife mu Roma , Paulo adatawiriswa kukhala yekha ene , mbwenye mwakuonerwa na nyankhondo . 
44028017	Pidagwanda nsiku zitatu , Paulo adachemeresa mgumano wa akadamu a Chiyuda a kweneko . Pikhadagumanyikana iwo , iye adalonga kuna iwo mbati , " Alsraele anzanga , ine sidachita chinthu chakudawira anthu athu , penu mitemo idatambira ife kubulukira kuna makolo athu ile tayu . Mbwenye ndidaikhwa m'perezo mumzinda wa Yerusalemu mbandiperekwa m'manja mwa Aroma . 
44028018	Pidamala iwo kundivunza , Aroma akhafuna kundisudzula , thangwi hadagumana mseru wakuti ndife nawo tayu . 
44028019	Mbwenye pidapipokanya Ayuda , ine nee mbandidachitira mwinango tayu , mbwenye kupempha kuti mseru wanga ukatongwe na Mfumu wa Roma , podi kwene kuti ine nee ndikhali na mseru na anthu anga tayu . 
44028020	Ndi thangwi yache ndakuchemerani kuti ndilonge nam we . Ndimomwene ine ndamangwa na njema thangwi ya iye , anadikhira anthu a ku Israele ule . "
44028021	Iwo adalonga kuna iye mbati , " Ife nee tatambira kalata na ibodzi ene kubulukira kunthemba ya Yudea yakulonga pya iwe tayu . Pontho nee munthu adza kuno na mphangwa zakulonga pya iwe , penu kulonga pyakuipa pya iwe kubulukira kweneko tayu . 
44028022	Mbwenye pinafuna ife mphyakuti tive tekha ene manyerezero ako , thangwi tikupidziwa kuti konsene anthu ambalonga pyakupambizira gulu yakoyi . "
44028023	Natenepo iwo adapangana naye nsiku , tenepo mwinji udadza pansikuyo kumbuto kukhakhala Paulo kule . Kubulukira machibese kufikirana mosiku iye adalonga mwakuveka kuna iwo mphangwa za Ufumu wa Mulungu mbayesa kuanyengerera na pya Yesu pakuawerengera pya m'mwambo wa Mose na m'mabukhu a maprofeti . 
44028024	Anthu anango adanyengeka nawo mafalache , mbwenye anango adakhonda kukhulupira . 
44028025	Natenepo Ayudawo adabalalika akupokanyisana pakati pawo pamafala akumalisa akhadalonga Paulo akuti , " Mzimu Wakuchena adalonga pyakuonadi pidalonga iye kuna makolo anu kudzera muna mprofeti Yesaya kuti :
44028026	' Ndoko ukalonge kuna anthuwa kuti : Kuva munadzava , kwache nee vesesabi ; kuona munadzaona , kwache nee onesesabi
44028027	Thangwi anthuwa misolo yawo yauma ; aphopha makutu awo , pontho afunga maso awo . Gopesera anaona na maso awo , na kuva na makutu awo , pontho kuti misolo yawo inavesa ; tenepo mbadazungunukira kuna ine , inembo mbandidaawangisa . ' "
44028028	Pakumalisa Paulo adalonga mbati , " Imwe mupidziwe kuti mphangwa za Mulungu zakudzesa chipulumuso zatumizwa kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Iwo anakazivesera . " '
44028030	Pyaka piwiri Paulo adakhala yekha ene panyumba yakubwereka . Kweneko adatambira mwadidi onsene ale akhabwera dzamuona . 
44028031	Iye adalalika pya Ufumu wa Mulungu pontho na kufunzisa pya Mbuya Yesu Khristu mwakutakasuka pontho mwakuwanga mtima . 
45001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyabasa wa Khristu Yesu , wakuchemerwa na Mulungu kukhala nyakutumwa , pontho wakusankhulwa kalalika Mphangwa zache Zadidi . 
45001002	Mulungu adadumbira kalene kudzapereka Mphangwa Zadidizi kudzera muna maprofeti ache , ninga mwalemberwa ipyo m'Malemba akuchena . 
45001003	Mphangwazi zikulonga pya Mbuya Yesu Khristu , Mwanache . Kulonga pya umunthu wache iye akhali chidzukulu cha Mfumu Davite . 
45001004	Mbwenye kulonga pya moyo wache wauzimu , Mzimu Wakuchena adatsikimiza mwamphamvu kuti ndiye Mvvana Mulungu pakumulamusa kuimfa . 
45001005	Kudzera muna iye Mulungu adandipasa mwayi wakukhala nyakutumwa thangwi ya Khristu , towera ndichitise anthu a madzinza onsene kukhulupira pontho kuvera . 
45001006	Penepi pikulonga pontho imwe anthu a kudziko ya Roma , ale Mulungu akuchemerani kuti mukhale anthu a Yesu Khristu . 
45001007	Kwenda kuna anthu onsene a mu Roma , ale ambafimwa na Mulungu mbachemerwa kukhala anthu ache . Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Babathu Mulungu pontho Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale namwe . 
45001008	Chakutoma ndinapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu wanga kudzera muna Yesu Khristu thangwi ya monsenene , thangwi anthu a padziko yonsene yapansi akuva pya chikhulupiro chanu . 
45001009	Mulungu , ambatumikira ine na mtimanga onsene pakulalika Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Mwanache ule , ndi mboni yanga yakuti pinalonga inepi mphyakuonadi . Mulungu ambapidziwa kuti ine ndimbakukumbukani , 
45001010	ndzidzi onsene unapemphera ine . Ndimbapempha Mulungu na kufuna kwache atawirise kuti pakumalisira pikhale pyakukwanisika kukufambirani kwanuko . 
45001011	Thangwi ndikupifuna pyakwanga kukuonani kuti ndigawane namwe mtsanzayiso wakubulukira kuna Mzimu Wakuchena , towera ndikuwangiseni mtima . 
45001012	Penepa ndikufuna kulonga kuti tonsene , imwe na ine , tinadzawangiswa mtima na chikhulupiro cha unango na mwanzache . 
45001013	Abale anga , ndapifuna kuti mudziwe kuti ndzidzi onsene ine ndasasanyika kukufambirani , mbwenye na lero pana chinthu chinango chikundikhondesa kuchita tenepo . Pinafuna ine mphyakuti ndisanduze anthu azinji pakati panupo kukhala anyakukhulupira ningambo mwachitira ine kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . 
45001014	Ine ndina mangawa akulalika kuna anthu onsene , anyakutsogola papinthu na anyakusalira papinthu ene , anyakufunza na anyakukhonda funza ene . 
45001015	Natenepo ndina chipapo chakulalika Mphangwa Zadidi kuna imwembo anthu a mu Roma . 
45001016	Ine ndimbanyindira pyakwanga Mphangwa Zadidi , thangwi yeneyi ndi mphamvu ya Mulungu yakupulumusira onsene ambakhulupira ale , chakutoma Ayuda kubuluka penepo anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . 
45001017	Thangwi Mphangwa Zadidi zimbaonesa monsene mule mumbachitira Mulungu kuti anthu akwanise kulongwa akulungama pamaso pache ; kubulukira pakutoma kufikirana pakumalisa njirache nkhudzera muna chikhulupiro basi . Ninga munalongera m'Malemba kuti , " Munthu wakulungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna chikhulupiro anati adzakhale na moyo . " fl
45001018	Ukali wa Mulungu ukuoneka kubulukira kudzulu pana pyakudawa na pyakuipa pyonsene pya anthu , ale makhaliro awo akudawika ambachitisa kuti pyakuonadi pya Mulungu pileke oneka . 
45001019	Mulungu ambaatchunyusa , thangwi pinthu pinakwanisa iwo kudziwa pya Mulungu mphyakuoneka mwadidi mwene kuna iwo . Mulungu mwenechiroache ndiye apichitisa kuti pikhale pyakuonadi kuna iwo . 
45001020	Kutomera ndzidzi udalenga Mulungu dziko yapansi kufikirana lero , anthu aonadi pinthu pyokhonda oneka pya Mulungu — mphamvu zache zokhonda mala na umulungu wache ene . Anthu ambadzindikira penepi angaona pinthu pidalenga Mulungu , natenepo iwo nkhabe chinthu chakuti alonge tayu !
45001021	Iwo ambamdziwa Mulungu , kwache iwo nkhabe kumulemedza ninga Mulungu , penu na kupereka kwene takhuta kuna iye tayu . M'mbuto mwache pyakunyerezera pyawo pyasanduka pyapezi , pontho m'mitima mwawo muna mdima pyakwanga . 
45001022	Iwo ambapilonga kuti mbanthu anzeru , mwenemo iwo mbali mapupwe . 
45001023	M'mbuto mwa kupembedza Mulungu okhonda kufa ule , iwo ambapembedza mifanikizo yakuoneka ninga anthu ambafa ale , penu ninga mbalame , penu ninga nyama za miyendo minayi penu zakukambadza . 
45001024	Natenepo Mulungu adaaleka anthu kuti achite pyawo pinthu pyakuipa pimbakhumba mitimawo , tenepo iwo ambachitirana pinthu pyakuchitisa manyadzo . 
45001025	Iwo ambasanduza pyakuonadi pya Mulungu kukhala pyakunama ; iwo ambapembedza na kutumukira pinthu pidalenga Mulungu kusiya kupembedza Mulungu nyakupilengayo , nyakuthema kupembedzwa ndzidzi onsene ! Ameni . 
45001026	Na thangwi yakuti iwo ambachita penepi , Mulungu aaleka kuti achite pyawo pikhumbo pyakuchitisa manyadzo . Na akazi enembo aleka makhaliro awo akubalwa nawo a pya kugonana na amuna , mbateweza makhaliro okhonda balwa nawo . 
45001027	Amunambo ntchibodzibodzi , aleka makhaliro awo akubalwa nawo kuna akazi mbasirirana pyawo amuna okhokha . Amuna akuchita pinthu pyakuchitisa manyadzo kuna unango na mwanzache , natenepo iwo akupichemerera okha ene kutchunyuswa kwathema kudza thangwi ya kuchita pyakudawika . 
45001028	Na thangwi yakuti anthu enewo akhonda kukoya m'mitima mwawo pinthu pyakuonadi pinadziwa iwo pya Mulungu , iye aaleka kuteweza pyawo manyerezero akuipa a m'mitima mwawo , towera achite pyawo pinthu pyokhonda thema kupichita . 
45001029	Iwo adzala na pyakudawika pya rritundu onsene , pyakuipa , mtima na kuchitirana pyakuipa unango na mwanzache ; iwo adzala na bivu , kupha , nthonga , kunama na kuipirwa . Iwo ambalongana tsweda
45001030	mbalongerana pyakuipa ; mbanyamalwa a Mulungu , akutikana , akunyada , pontho akugaya ; pimbanyerezera iwo nkhusasanya njira zinango zakudawika basi ; iwo nkhabe vera makolo awo tayu ;
45001031	iwo ngakupupwa , ngokhonda khulupirika , pontho iwo nkhabe komera mtima penu kuvera nsisi anthu anango tayu . 
45001032	Iwo ambadziwadi kuti mwambo wa Mulungu umbalonga kuti anthu akuchita pinthu ninga penepi athema kufa , kwache iwo ambathimiza kuchita basi pyonthopyo mbakomerwa na anthu anango ambachita penepi ale . 
45002001	Kadi mwanzangawe , umbatongambo mseru anthu anango ? Podi ukhale ani pyako , iwe nkhabe chakuti ulonge . Thangwi ungatonga anthu anango , iwe mbuchita pyonthopyo ninga pinachita iwo , ukupitonga wekha ene . 
45002002	Timbapidziwa kuti kutonga kumbachita Mulungu anthu akuchita pinthu ninga penepi ale nkhwakulungama . 
45002003	Mbwenye iwe , mwanzanga , ule umbatonga anango thangwi yakuchita pinthu ninga penepi , iwe mbupichitambo , ayi ukunyerezera kuti Mulungu nkhabe dzakutongambo tayu ?
45002004	Ayi iwe ukululupisa kukoma mtima kukulu kwa Mulungu , kuuphata kwache mtima , na kupirira kwache kwene ? Ayi ukupidziwa tayu kuti Mulungu akukomera mtima thangwi akufuna kuti iwe uleke pyakudawa pyako ?
45002005	Mbwenye iwe una mtima wakuuma , pontho okhonda kuleka pyakudawa . Natenepo ukunyanya kupikuzira kutchunyuswa kwako pansiku inafuna dzaoneka ukali wa Mulungu na kutonga kwache mseru mwakulungama . 
45002006	Mulungu anadzafupa munthu onsene malingana na mabasa adaphata iye . 
45002007	Anango akuthimiza kuchita udidi mbasakasaka kuna demelero , chilemedzo , pontho moyo okhonda kufa ; enewo Mulungu anadzaapasa moyo okhonda mala . 
45002008	Anthu anango ambapifuna okha ene mbakhonda kuteweza pinthu pyakulungama mbateweza pyawo pinthu pyakudawika ; enewa Mulungu anadzaatchunyusa pikulu pene . 
45002009	Panadzakhala nyatwa na kuva kupha kuna anthu onsene akuchita pyakudawika , chakutoma kuna Ayuda kubuluka penepo kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . 
45002010	Mbwenye Mulungu anadzapereka demelero , chilemedzo na mtendere kuna anthu onsene akuchita pyadidi , chakutoma kuna Ayuda kubuluka penepo kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . 
45002011	Thangwi Mulungu nkhabe tonga mseru mwakuyang'ana nkhope tayu . 
45002012	Anthu okhonda khala Ayuda nkhabe dziwa mwambo wa Mose tayu ; iwo ambadawa , tenepo anadzatayika ninga anthu okhonda dziwa mwambo . Mbwenye Ayuda ambadziwa mwambo , iwo ambadawa , tenepo anadzatongwa na mwambo . 
45002013	Thangwi anthu nkhabe khala akulungama pamaso pa Mulungu thangwi ya kuva mwambo kokha tayu , mbwenye na kuchita kwene pinalonga mwambo . 
45002014	Anthu okhonda khala Ayuda nkhabe mwambo wa Mose tayu , mbwenye ndzidzi umbachita iwo na makhaliro awo akubalwa nawo pinthu mwakuthemerana na mwambo , iwo paokha ene aonesa kuti adziwa pyathema iwo kuchita , podi kwene kuti iwo nkhabe mwambowo . 
45002015	Makhaliro awo ambaonesa khala ninga mwambo udachitwa kulembwa m'mitima mwawo . Chikumbu mtima chawo chimbatsikimiza kuti penepi mphyakuonadi , thangwi manyerezero awo ndzidzi unango ambaapokanya , ndzidzi unangombo ambaatchinjiriza . 
45002016	Tenepo malingana na Mphangwa Zadidi zimbalalika ine , umu ndi mule munafuna dzakhalira pinthu pansiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga manyerezero onsene akubisika kudzera muna Yesu Khristu . Pya Ayuda na mwambo wa Mose
45002017	Chinchino imwe , ale mumbapithula kuti ndimwe Ayuda , mumbanyindira mwambo mbamunyadira Mulungu wanu , 
45002018	mumbadziwa pinthu pimbafuna Mulungu kuti imwe muchite , pontho mwafunza kubulukira m'mwambo kudziwa kusankhula pinthu pyadidi ;
45002019	imwembo mwapidziwadi kuti ndimwe nyakutsogolera maboliboli , nyale yakumwinikira anthu a mumdima ale , 
45002020	mfunzisi wa mapupwe , pontho mfunzisi wa anthu okhonda funza . Imwe mumbapidziwadi kuti kudzera m'mwambomu imwe muna nzeru pontho pyakuonadi pyonsene . 
45002021	Imwe mumbafunzisa anthu anango , apo mumbatani kupifunzisa mwekha ene ? Mumbalalika kuti , " Lekani kuba " — kwache imwe mumbaba !
45002022	Mumbalonga kuti , " Lekani chita uputa " — kwache imwe mumbachita uputa ! Imwe mumbaipirwa na kupembedza mifanikizo — kwache imwe mumbaba pya m'nyumba zakupembedzeramo milungu !
45002023	Mumbanyada kuti muna mwambo wa Mulungu — kwache imwe mumbachitisa Mulungu manyadzo na kukhonda vera kwanu mwambowo !
45002024	Malemba akulonga kuti , " Anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ambashola Mulungu thangwi ya imwe Ayuda ! "
45002025	Imwe mungavera mwambo , kugwanda nsonga yakumaso yachimuna kumbachita imwe nkhwakukuganyalisani ; mbwenye mungakhonda vera mwambo , pikhali pyadidi mbamudakhonda pyanu gwandwa . 
45002026	Ngakhala anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , okhonda gwandwa ale , ambavera pimbalonga mwambo , kadi Mulungu nkhabe dzayesa anthu enewa ninga akugwandwa tayu ?
45002027	Tenepo anthu okhonda khala Ayuda anadzalonga kuti imwe Ayuda mwakonwa , thangwi mumbaswa mwambo wa Mose podi kwene kuti imwe mwaulemba pontho kuti mwagwandwa ; mbwenye iwo ambavera mwambo , podi kwene kuti iwo hadagwandwa tayu . 
45002028	Myuda chadichadi si ule ambaoneka ninga Myuda pamaso pa anthu tayu . Pontho kugwanda chadichadi si kule kumbachitwa pamanungo pamaso pa anthu tayu . 
45002029	Mbwenye Myuda chadichadi ndi Myuda mumtima mwache . Kugwandwa kwakuonadi nkhugwandwa kwa mtima kumbachitwa na Mzimu Wakuchena , nee na mwambo wakuchitwa kulembwa ule tayu . Munthu ninga weneyu hambasimbwa na anthu tayu , mbwenye na Mulungu . 
45003001	Apo kukhala Myuda pana kuganyali kwanji ? Penu pana kuganyali kwanji pontho munthu ungagwandwa ?
45003002	Pana kuganyali kukulu kukhala Myuda ! Chakutoma Mulungu adapasa Ayuda mphangwa zache kuti azikoye . 
45003003	Apo ngakhala anango pakati pawo hanakhulupirika tayu , kadi ndiye kuti Mulungu hanadzakhulupirika tayu , thangwi yakukhonda kwawo khulupirika ?
45003004	Nkhabe na pang'ono pene ! Mbwenye anthu apidziwe kuti Mulungu ngwakuonadi podi kwene kuti munthu onsene ngwakunama . Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Imwe mwathema kuoneka wakulungama mungalonga , pontho mungatongwa mseru , mseruwo ukukomereni . "
45003005	Mbwenye ngakhala kukhonda lungama kwathu kukuonesa pakwecha kuti Mulungu ngwakulungama tilonge tani ? Kadi tinakwanisa kulonga kuti Mulungu ngokhonda lungama thangwi akutitchunyusa ? ( Ndikulonga penepi ninga mumbalongera anthu ) . 
45003006	Nkhabe tayu ! Ngakhala Mulungu si wakulungama tayu , anakwanisa tani kutonga mseru anthu a padziko yapansi ?
45003007	Apo ngakhala kunama kwanga kukuchitisa kuti demelero ya Mulungu na pyakuonadi pioneke mwadidi mwene kupiringana pakutoma , thangwi yache ninji ndikutongwa kuti ndine wakudawa . 
45003008	Apo mwatani mumbakhonda longa kuti , " Tendeni tidawe pyathu towera udidi udze . " Ndimomwene kuti anthu anango akunditikana thangwi iwo akulonga kuti ndimbalonga penepi ! Anthu enewa athema dzakonwa . 
45003009	Tinalonganji ? Kadi ife Ayuda tili pyadidi kupiringana anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ? Nkhabe na pang'ono pene ! Ndapilonga kale kuti Ayuda na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ntchibodzibodzi , tonsene tili pansi pa mphamvu za pyakudawa
45003010	ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Nkhabe na mbodzi ene wakulungama , 
45003011	nkhabe na mbodzi ene wanzeru penu wakusakasaka Mulungu . 
45003012	Anthu onsene abauka kubuluka kuna Mulungu onsene mbasanduka anthu apezi . Nkhabe na mbodzi ene ambachita pyakulungama tayu . 
45003013	Mafala ambalonga iwo ngakupha ; lulume yawo imbalonga pyakunama pyakuipa , pontho pyakuthuswa pyakugoswa ninga ukali wa nyoka pimbabuluka pamulomo pawo . 
45003014	M'kanwa mwawo mumbadzala na mafala akutemberera pontho akuipa . 
45003015	Iwo ambachimbiza kupha na kukuwaza anthu ;
45003016	Konsene kwene kunaenda iwo ambasakaziratu na kusiya anthu panyatwa . 
45003017	Iwo nkhabe funa pya mtendere tayu , 
45003018	pontho iwo nkhabe gopa Mulungu tayu . "
45003019	Mbwenye chinchino tikupidziwa kuti pyonsene pili m'mwambomu pikulonga kuna ale ali pansi pa utongi wa mwambowo , towera anthu onsene asowe chakulonga , pontho kuti anthu a padziko yapansi yonsene adze kuna Mulungu dzatongwa mseru . 
45003020	Nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kulongwa kuti ngwakulungama pamaso pa Mulungu thangwi yakuti iye ateweza mwambo tayu . Mwambo umbachitisa kuti munthu adziwe kuti iye adawa . 
45003021	Mbwenye chinchino njira ya Mulungu yakulungamisira nayo anthu pamaso pache yaoneswa pakwecha , pontho nkhabeve pinthu na mwambo tayu , podi kwene kuti mwambo wa Mose na maprofeti adapichitira umboni . 
45003022	Mulungu ambalungamisa anthu pamaso pache kudzera muna chikhulupiro chawo pana Khristu . Iye ambachita sasawa kuna anthu onsene ambakhulupira Yesu Khristu , thangwi nkhabe kusiyana pakati pawo tayu , 
45003023	thangwi anthu onsene adadawa , mbachimwana kufika pamaso pa Mulungu , Nyankhombo . 
45003024	Mbwenye na thangwi ya kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu iye adaalungamisa pamaso pache mwakukhonda pagali kudzera muna Yesu Khristu , ambaaombola ule . 
45003025	Mulungu adampereka , towera kudzera muna imfache ninga nsembe , iye akhale njira yakulekerera pyakudawa pyawo kudzera muna chikhulupiro chawo pana iye . Mulungu adachita tenepo towera aonese kuti iye ngwakulungama . Yesu mbadzati perekwa Mulungu adapirira nawo pontho hadaikha konta pyakudawa pyawo tayu , 
45003026	mbwenye chinchino Mulungu ampereka kuonesa kulungama kwache . Pakuchita tenepa Mulungu akuonesa kuti iye ngwakulungama , pontho kuti ambalungamisa anthu onsene pamaso pache ambakhulupira Yesu ale . 
45003027	Apo chinchino ninji chinakwanisa ife kunyadira ? Nkhabe ! Thangwi yache njanji ? Ndi thangwi yakuti timbavera mwambo ? Nkhabe , mbwenye kuti timbakhulupira . 
45003028	Penepa tinakwanisa kulonga kuti chimbalungamisa munthu pamaso pa Mulungu ntchikhulupiro chene basi , nee kuti kuvera mwambo tayu . 
45003029	Kadi Mulungu ndi Mulungu wa Ayuda okha ? Kadi iye pontho si Mulungu wa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda tayu ? Ndimomwene iye ndiyedi . 
45003030	Mulungu ndi mbodzi ene basi , iye anadzalungamisa Ayuda pamaso pache kudzera muna chikhulupiro chawo , pontho anadzalungamisa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda pamaso pache kudzera muna chikhulupiro chawo . 
45003031	Kadi penepi pikulonga kuti pinaphatisa ife basa pya chikhulupiro tikutaya mwambo ? Nkhabe tayu , mbwenye tikuuchitisa kuti ukhale wakufunika . 
45004001	Apo tinalonganji pya Abrahamu , kholo wa dzinzathu ? Ninji pidagumanikana na iye pa yekha ?
45004002	Ngakhala iye adalungamiswa na Mulungu thangwi ya mabasa adaphata iye , mbadakhala na chinango chakunyadira — kwache si pamaso pa Mulungu tayu . 
45004003	Malemba akulonga kuti , " Abrahamu adakhulupira Mulungu , tenepo na thangwi ya kukhulupira kwache , Mulungu adamuyesa wakulungama . "
45004004	Munthu angaphata basa ambapagalwi thangwi ya basa yaphata iyeyo , kwache pimbakhala ninga mtukwa tayu , mbwenye mphyakuthema kuti iye atambire . 
45004005	Munthu ananyindira chikhulupiro ule , nee nyindira mabasache tayu , pontho ule ambakhulupira Mulungu , ambachitisa munthu wakudawika kukhala wakulungama ule , ndi chikhulupiro chache chimbaikha Mulungu konta towera munthu akhale wakulungama pamaso pache . 
45004006	Penepi ndiye pikhalonga Davite mudalonga iye pya kutsanzaya kwa munthu ule Mulungu ambamuyesa wakulungama pamaso pache , nee na thangwi ya mabasa ambaphata iye ale tayu . Iye adalonga mbati , 
45004007	" Ngakutsanzaya anthu ale umambalawo walekererwa , ale pyakudawa pyawo pyafudziwa . 
45004008	Ngwakutsanzaya munthu ule pyakudawa pyache Mbuya nkhabe dzapiikha konta tayu ! "
45004009	Kadi kutsanzaya kudalonga Davite nkhwa anthu ale adagwandwa nsonga yakumaso okha ene basi ? Nkhabe tayu ! Nkhabe na ale ene adakhonda gwandwa ! Thangwi tawerenga m'Malemba akuti , " Abrahamu adakhulupira Mulungu , tenepo Mulungu adamuyesa wakulungama pamaso pache thangwi ya chikhulupiro chache . "
45004010	Penepi pidachitika lini ? Kadi pidachitika Abrahamu mbadzati gwandwa tayu , penu agwandwa kale ? Ipyo pidachitika mwenemo mbadzati gwandwa , nee pidamala iye gwandwa tayu . 
45004011	Iye adagwandwa m'nduli mwache , tenepo kugwandwa kwacheko kukhali chidziwiso chakuonesa kuti na thangwi ya chikhulupiro chache Mulungu adamuyesa wakulungama pamaso pache , iye mbadzati gwandwa . Tenepo Abrahamu ndi baba wa anthu onsene ambakhulupira Mulungu pontho ambayeswa akulungama pamaso pache ale , podi kwene kuti iwo hadagwandwa tayu . 
45004012	Pontho iye ndi baba wa anthu akugwandwa , nee adagwandwa kokha tayu , mbwenye ana moyo wa chikhulupiro sasawa ninga moyo ukhali na kholo wathu Abrahamu mbadzati gwandwa . 
45004013	Pidadumbira Mulungu kuna Abrahamu pontho na pidzukulu pyache kuti dziko yonsene yapansi inadzakhala yache , iye adapichitadi tenepo , nee na thangwi yakuti Abrahamu adavera mwambo tayu , mbwenye na thangwi yakuti iye adakhulupira mbakhala wakulungama pamaso pa Mulungu . 
45004014	Ngakhala pidadumbira Mulungu kuna anthu pimbachitika thangwi ya kuvera mwambo , penepo kukhulupira kwa munthu nkhwapezi , pontho pidalonga Mulungupyo mphyakusowa basa . 
45004015	Mwambo umbadzesa ukali wa Mulungu , mbwenye panasowa mwambo , penepo nkhabe kuswa mwambo tayu . 
45004016	Tenepo pidadumbira Mulungu pidagona pa chikhulupiro chene basi , towera pidadumbira Mulungu pichitwe ninga mtukwa wa Mulungu , pontho kuti pikhale pyakukhazikika kuna pidzukulu pyonsene pya Abrahamu , nee kuna ale okha ambavera mwambo wa Mose tayu , mbwenye na kuna ale ene ambakhulupirambo ninga mudachitira Abrahamu . Thangwi Abrahamu ndi kholo wa tonsenefe
45004017	ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Ine ndakuikha kukhala kholo wa madzinza azinji . " Abrahamu akhali na chikhulupiro pamaso pa Mulungu — Mulungu ambalamusa anthu kuimfa ule , pontho matongero ache ambachitisa pinthu kukhalapo , pinthu pile na kale ene pakhali nkhabe . 
45004018	Abrahamu adakhulupira mbadikhira , podi kwene kuti pakhali nkhabe thangwi ya kudikhira tayu , tenepo iye adasanduka kukhaladi kholo wa madzinza azinji . Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Pidzukulu pyako pinadzainjipa . "
45004019	Ndzidzi wenewo iye akhali kale na pyaka dzana ibodzi , mbwenye chikhulupiro chache hadachitaya na pang'ono pene tayu pidanyerezera iye pya manungo ache . Iye adapidziwa kale kuti manungo ache akhali ninga akufa kale , pontho kuti mkazache Sara akhali wakuuma nthumbo . 
45004020	Iye hadataya chikhulupiro chache tayu , pontho hadapenuka na pidadumbira Mulungu pile tayu , chikhulupiro chache chidampasa mphamvu mbakuza Mulungu . 
45004021	Iye adakhulupiradi kuti Mulungu anakwanisa kuchita pidadumbira iye pile . 
45004022	Na thangwi ya chikhulupiro chache Mulungu " adamuyesa wakulungama pamaso pache . "
45004023	Mafala akuti , " Iye adayeswa wakulungama " hadalemberwa iye yekha tayu . 
45004024	Mafalawo adalemberwa pontho ife ale anafuna yeswa akulungama , ife ale ambakhulupira iye , ule adalamusa Yesu Mbuyathu kuimfa . 
45004025	Iye adaperekwa kuti aphiwe thangwi ya pyakudawa pyathu mbalamuswa kuimfa towera atichitise kukhala anthu akulungama pamaso pa Mulungu . 
45005001	Podi chinchino talungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu thangwi ya chikhulupiro , tinarf mtendere kuna Mulungu kudzera muna Yesu Khristu Mbuyathu . 
45005002	Kudzera muna chikhulupiro chathu iye achitisa kuti tidziwe kukoma mtima kumbachita Mulungu , kule kuna ife chinchino . Tenepo timbasekerae thangwi ya chidikhiro china ife kudzatambira nawo demelero ya Mulungu !
45005003	Si pokhapo tayu , mbwenye timbasekera pontho thangwi ya nyatwa zina ifezi , podi tikupidziwa kuti nyatwa zimbachitisa munthu kupirira , 
45005004	kupirira kumbachitisa munthu kutawirwa na Mulungu , kutawirwa na Mulungu kumbachitisa munthu kukhala na chidikhiro . 
45005005	Chidikhiro chenechi nkhabe kutichitisa kutaya mtima tayu , thangwi Mulungu akhuthula kutifiina kwache m'mitima mwathu kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena , mtukwa udatipasa iye ule . 
45005006	Pikhali ife akusowa chiphedzo , Khristu adafera anthu akudawa pandzidzi wakuthema udasankhula Mulungu . 
45005007	Mphyakunensa kuti munthu unango afere munthu wakulungama , podi kwene kuti pikhale pyakukwanisika munthu kuwanga mtima kuti afere munthu wadidi . 
45005008	Mbwenye Mulungu ationesa kutifuna kwache kukulu kumbachita iye — Khristu adatifera pandzidzi ukhali ife anthu akudawa !
45005009	Podi kudzera muna imfache ninga nsembe , chinchino talungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu , ndimomwene ife tinadzapulumuswadi na iye kubulukira kuna ukali wa Mulungu . 
45005010	Ife tikhali anyamalwa a Mulungu , mbwenye iye adapichita kuti tikhale pontho ashamwali ache kudzera muna imfa ya Mwanache . Podi chinchino tikhale pontho ashamwali a Mulungu , ndimomwene ife tinadzapulumuswadi kudzera muna moyo wa Khristu . 
45005011	Kwache si pokhapo tayu , timbasekera , thangwi ya pyachita Mulungu kudzera muna Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , ule chinchino achitisa kuti tikhale pontho ashamwali a Mulungu . 
45005012	Kudawa kudadza padziko yapansi pano kudzera muna munthu mbodzi , tenepo kudawako kudadzesa imfa . Natenepo imfa yafalikira kuna anthu onsene , thangwi anthu onsene adawa . 
45005013	Mwambo mbudzati perekwa pansi pano kudawa kukhalipo kale . Pakusowa mwambo , Mulungu nkhabe ikha konta pyakudawa tayu . 
45005014	Mbwenye kutomera ndzidzi wa Adamu kufikirana ndzidzi wa Mose imfa ikhali na utongi pa anthu onsene , podi na pana ale ene hadadawa sasawa ninga mudadawira Adamu pakukhonda vera matongero a Mulungu kudachita iye kule . Adamu makayo akhali chithunzithunzi cha munthu akhafuna kudzayo . 
45005015	Kwache awiriwa hadalandana tayu , thangwi mtukwa wa Mulungu hudakhale ninga kudawa kwa Adamu tayu . Mphyakuonadi kuti anthu azinji adafa thangwi ya kudawa kwa munthu mbodzi . Mbwenye kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu nkhukulu pyakwanga , sasawambo mtukwache ngukulu pyakwanga kuna anthu azinji kudzera muna kukoma mtima kwa munthu mbodzi , Yesu Khristu . 
45005016	Tenepo pana kusiyana pakati pa mtukwa wa Mulungu na kudawa kwa munthu mbodzi . Pidadawa munthu kabodzi adatongwa kuti iye athema kutchunyuswa , mbwenye pidanyanya kuinjipa pyakudawa , mtukwa wa kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu udachitisa anthu kukhala akulungama . 
45005017	Mphyakuonadi kuti kudzera muna kudawa kwa munthu mbodzi kule , imfa idatoma kukhala na utongi thangwi ya munthu mbodzi ule . Mbwenye mbodzi , Yesu Khristu adachita pinthu pikulu pyakwanga mwakuti onsene ale adatambira kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu mbalungamiswa pamaso pache na mtukwa wa Mulungu , anadzakhala na moyo pontho utongi kudzera muna Khristu . 
45005018	Tenepo kudawa kabodzi kudachitisa kuti anthu onsene atongwe kutchunyuswa , sasawambo basa ibodzi yakulungama imbalungamisa anthu onsene na kuapasa moyo . 
45005019	Anthu azinji adakhala akudawa thangwi ya kukhonda vera kwa munthu mbodzi . Ntchibodzibodzi anthu azinji anadzalungamiswa na Mulungu thangwi ya kuvera kwa munthu mbodzi . 
45005020	Mwambo udaperekwa towera umambala uinjipe , kwache pimbainjipa kudawa , kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kumbainjipambo pyakwanga pene . 
45005021	Podi kudawa kukhali na utongi kudzera muna imfa pakati pa anthu , sasawambo kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kuna utongi kudzera muna kulungama kutidzesa kumoyo okhonda mala kudzera muna Yesu Khristu Mbuyathu . 
45006001	Tinalonganji apo ? Ayi tithimize pyathu kudawa kuti kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kuinjipe ?
45006002	Nkhabe tayu ! Kulonga pya utongi wa pyakudawa pana ife , ife takhala ninga anthu akufa , apo pinakwanisika tani kuti tithimize kuchita pyakudawika ?
45006003	Kadi imwe mwaduwalira kuti ndzidzi udabatizwa ife mukuphatanizana kwathu na Yesu Khristu tidabatizwa pontho na mukuphatanizana na imfache ?
45006004	Tenepo na ubatizo wathuwo , tidafa mbatiikhwa naye pabodzi m'masiye , towera ifembo tikhale na moyo wachinchino , sasawambo ninga mudalamusirwa Khristu kuimfa na demelero ya mphamvu ya Baba . 
45006005	Podi chinchino ife taphatanizana naye pakufa kwache , sasawambo tinadzaphatanizana naye pakulamuka kwache kukhala na moyo . 
45006006	Tenepo timbapidziwa kuti makhaliro athu akale akhomerwa pabodzi na Khristu pamtanda , kuti makhaliro athu akudawika avungike , towera ife tileke khalave mabitchu a pyakudawa . 
45006007	Thangwi munthu angafa , ambasudzulwa pa utongi wa kudawa . 
45006008	Podi ife tafa pabodzi na Khristu , tikukhulupira kuti tinadzakhala na moyo pabodzi naye . 
45006009	Thangwi timbapidziwa kuti Khristu alamuswa kuimfa , tenepo hanadzafave tayu — imfa nkhabe dzakhalave na utongi pana iye tayu . 
45006010	Tenepo , na thangwi yakuti iye adaipichita nyampheraphera kufa kabodzi kene basi thangwi ya pyakudawa , pyakudawa nkhabe utongi pana iye tayu , pontho chinchino moyo una iye ngwakuphatanizana na Mulungu . 
45006011	Ntchibodzibodzi imwe mwathema kupiyesa mwekha ene anthu akufa , kulonga pya utongi wa pyakudawa pana imwe , mbwenye kukhala amoyo kuna Mulungu pakuphatanizana na Yesu Khristu . 
45006012	Lekani tawira kuti kudawa kukhale na utongi pana manungo anu , ambafa ale , towera muteweze pikhumbo pyakuipa pya manungo anu . 
45006013	Lekani pereka phindi na ibodzi ene ya manungo anu kuna pyakudawa , kukhala ninga chinthu chakuchitira pyakudawa . Mbwenye piperekeni kuna Mulungu , ninga anthu akulamuswa kuimfa kukhala amoyo ale , pontho perekani manungo anu kuna Mulungu kukhala ninga chinthu chakuchitira mabasa akulungama . 
45006014	Kudawa kuleke khala na utongi pana imwe , thangwi imwe nee muli pansi pa utongi wa mwambo tayu , mbwenye pansi pa utongi wa kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu . 
45006015	Ninji pontho ! Tidawe pyathu , thangwi yakuti ife nee tili pansi pa utongi wa mwambo tayu , mbwenye tili pansi pa utongi wa kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu ? Nkhabe tayu !
45006016	Ndimomwene imwe mukupidziwa kuti mungapipereka mwekha ene kuti muvere munthu unango ninga mabitchu , penepo ndimwe mabitchu kuna mbuyanu anavera imweyo ; penu mbuyanu nkhudawa , kule kumbadzesa imfa , penu mbuyanu nkhuvera , kule kumbalungamisa munthu pamaso pa Mulungu . 
45006017	Tipereke takhuta kuna Mulungu ! Podi kwene kuti kale mukhali mabitchu a pyakudawa , mwavera na mtimanu onsene pyakuonadi pidagumana imwe m'chifunziso chidatambira imwe chile , pontho
45006018	mwasudzulwa pa utongi wa pyakudawa mbamukhala mabitchu kuna pyakulungama . 
45006019	Ndikulonga ninga mumbalongera anthu nsiku zonsene kuthemerana na kuvesa kwanu kwakubalwa nako . Kale mudapipereka mwekha ene ninga mabitchu kuti muphatiswe basa na pinthu pyokhonda chena pontho pyakudawika . Ntchibodzibodzi chinchino mwathema kupipereka ninga mabitchu kuna pyakulungama , towera muphatiswe mabasa akuchena . 
45006020	Pikhali imwe mabitchu kuna pyakudawa , nee mukhalive pansi pa utongi wa pyakulungama tayu . 
45006021	Pidachita imwe pinthu pyakuchitisa manyadzo ninga penepi , mudaganyalinji ? Mamalisiro ache ndi imfa basi !
45006022	Mbwenye chinchino mwasudzulwa pansi pa utongi wa pyakudawa , tenepo ndimwe mabitchu a Mulungu . Penepa mwaganyali moyo wakupambulika monsene mwene kuna Mulungu , tenepo mamalisiro ache ndi moyo okhonda mala . 
45006023	Thangwi kudawa kumbapagali imfa , mbwenye mtukwa wa Mulungu ndi moyo okhonda mala mukuphatanizana na Yesu Khristu Mbuyathu . 
45007001	Abale anga , penepa munati muvese mwadidi pinthu pinafuna ine kulonga , thangwi monsenene mukudziwa pya mwambo . Mwambo una utongi pana anthu ndzidzi una iwo na moyo . 
45007002	Mkazi wakusembwa ngwakumangika na mwambo kuna mamunache ndzidzi una iye na moyo , mbwenye mamunache angafa , mkazi ule asudzuka kuna mwambo wa kukazhali . 
45007003	Tenepo iye angasembwa na mamuna unango , mamunache wakutoma ule mbali m'maso , iye anati alongwe puta . Mbwenye mamunache angafa , mkazi ule asudzuka kuna mwambo , tenepo angasembwa pontho na mamuna unango , penepo hadachita uputa tayu . 
45007004	Abale anga , penepi pili tenepo kuna imwepo . Podi ndimwe mapindi a manungo ache , pidafa Khristu imwe mudafambo naye pabodzi , kusudzuka kuna mwambo , kuti mukhale anthu a iye , ule adalamuswa kuimfa , towera tikhale anthu akuthema kuphatira basa Mulungu . 
45007005	Ndzidzi ukhali ife na makhaliro athu akudawika akubalwa nawo ule , pikhumbo pyakuipa pyakudzeswa na mwambo pikhaphata basa m'manungo mwathu , tenepo pidachita ife pile pidadzesa imfa . 
45007006	Chinchino , tasudzulwa kuna mwambo ukhatimanga unyaperezo ule , thangwi tidafa . Ife nkhabe phatirave basa Mulungu ninga mwakale mule , kudzera muna mwambo wakuchita kulembwa tayu , mbwenye mwachinchino kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena . 
45007007	Apo tinalonganji ? Kadi mwambo wa Mose ngwakuipa ? Nkhabe tayu ! Ndi mwambo udandichitisa kudziwa kuti kudawa ninji . Mwambo mbudakhonda longa kuti , " Leka sirira pinthu pya munthu unango " ine nee mbandidadziwa tayu kuti kusirira nkhudawa . 
45007008	Mbwenye thangwi ya mwambowu kudawa kudagumana mwayi wakundichitisa kukhala na pikhumbo pya mtundu onsene pyakupifuna ndekha ene , podi pangasowa mwambo kudawaku nkhwakufa . 
45007009	Ine ene pano ndikhalidi na moyo ndzidzi udakhonda ine dziwa mwambo , mbwenye pidatoma ine kudziwa mwambo , penepo kudawa kudatsitsimuka , 
45007010	tenepo ine ndidafa . Mwambo onthowo udathema kudzesa moyo kuna anthu ule , kuna ine udadzesa imfa . 
45007011	Kudawa kudagumana mwayi , tenepo kudzera muna mwambowo kudawa kudandinyenga mbakundipha . 
45007012	Natenepo mwambo makawo ngwakuchena , pontho matongero ache ngakuchena , akulungama pontho adidi . 
45007013	Kadi penepi pikulonga kuti pinthu pyadidi pidandidzesera imfa ? Nkhabe tayu ! Kudawa ndiye kudachita penepi . Kudawa kudandidzesera imfa pakuphatisa basa pinthu pyadidi , towera makhaliro a pyakudawa aoneswe chadichadi . Natenepo kudawa kudaoneka kwakuipa pyakwanga pene kudzera muna mwambowo . 
45007014	Timbapidziwa kuti mwambo ngwauzimu , mbwenye ine ndine munthu ene pyanga ambafa ule , adaguliswa ninga bitchu kuna pyakudawa ule . 
45007015	Tenepo ine nkhabe vesa pinachita ine tayu . Thangwi ine nkhabe chita pinafuna ine kuchita , m'mbuto mwache ndimbachita pinthu pinazonda ine . 
45007016	Ngakhala ine ndimbachita pimbakhonda ine tuna kuchita , penepa ndiye kuti ine ndikutawira kuti mwambo ngwadidi . 
45007017	Tenepo , ine si ine chadichadi ambachita pinthu penepi ule tayu , mbwenye kumbachita penepi nkhudawa kumbakhala muna ine kule . 
45007018	Ndimbapidziwa kuti muna ine nkhabe udidi tayu — muna ine nkhulonga pya makhaliro anga akudawika akubalwa nawo . Ine ndimbafuna kuchita udidi , kwache ine nkhabe kwanisa kupichita tayu . 
45007019	Ine nkhabe kuchita pinthu pyadidi pimbafuna ine kuchita tayu , m'mbuto mwache ndimbachita pinthu pyakuipa pimbakhonda ine tuna kupichita . 
45007020	Ngakhala ndimbachita pinthu pimbakhonda ine tuna , penepa ndiye kuti si ineve ambapichita ule tayu , mbwenye kumbapichita nkhudawa kumbakhala muna ine kule . 
45007021	Natenepo ndimbagumana kuti pimbachita mwambo mphipi : ndzidzi unafuna ine kuchita pyadidiwo , wenewo ndi ndzidzi umbasankhula ine kuchita pyakuipa . 
45007022	Mtimanga umbakomerwa na mwambo wa Mulungu , 
45007023	mbwenye ndimbaona kuti mwambo unango ukuphata basa m'manungo mwanga — mwambo umbamenyana na mwambo umbadziwa mtimanga mwadidi mwene ule . Mwambo wenewu umbandisanduza bitchu wache — mwambo wa kudawa ukuphata basa m'manungo mwanga ule . 
45007024	Chinchino ine nkhabe komerwa na pang'ono pene tayu ! Mbani anandiombola kuna manungo anafuna kundiendesa kuimfawa ?
45007025	Takhuta kuna Mulungu ule ambachita penepi kudzera muna Yesu Khristu Mbuyathu ! Apo , chinchino mwenemu ndiye muna ine : pandekha na manyerezero anga okha ndinakwanisa kuphatira basa mwambo wa Mulungu , mwenemo makhaliro anga akudawika akubalwa nawo akuphatira basa mwambo wa pyakudawa . 
45008001	Natenepo anthu aphatanizana na Khristu Yesu ale chinchino nkhabeve konwa tayu . 
45008002	Thangwi mwambo wa Mzimu Wakuchena ule umbatidzesera moyo mukuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu Yesu , wandisudzula pamwambo wa pyakudawa na imfa . 
45008003	Pinthu pidachimwana mwambo wa Mose kupichita , thangwi makhaliro akudawika a anthu akubalwa nawo akhasowa mphamvu , penepi Mulungu adapichita . Iye adachitisa kuti kudawa kukonwe muna makhaliro akudawika a anthu akubalwa nawo pakutumiza Mwanache . Iyeyo adadza na umunthu sasawa ninga wa munthu ule makhaliro ache akubalwa nawo ngakudawika , towera akunde pyakudawa . 
45008004	Mulungu adachita tenepo kuti pyakulungama pimbafuna mwambo pichitwe na ife monsene mwene , ife ale timbateweza pimbafuna Mzimu Wakuchena , nee pimbafuna makhaliro athu akudawika akubalwa nawo tayu .
