45008005	Anthu ale ambateweza pimbalonga makhaliro awo akudawika akubalwa nawo , nzeru zawo zonsene zimbatongwa na pimbafuna makhaliro awo akudawika akubalwa nawo . Alembo ambachita pimbalonga Mzimu Wakuchena , nzeru zawo zonsene zimbatongwa na Mzimu Wakuchena . 
45008006	Munthu angatongwa na makhaliro ache akudawika akubalwa nawo mamalisiro ache ndi imfa basi . Mbwenye munthu angatongwa na Mzimu Wakuchena mamalisiro ache ndi moyo na mtendere . 
45008007	Tenepo munthu ambasanduka nyamalwa wa Mulungu ngakhala ambatongwa na makhaliro ache akudawika akubalwa nawo ; thangwi iye nkhabe vera mwambo wa Mulungu tayu , ndimomwene kuti iye nkhabe kwanisa kuvera mwambowo tayu . 
45008008	Ale ambavera makhaliro awo akudawika akubalwa nawo nkhabe kwanisa kuchitisa Mulungu kukomerwa tayu . 
45008009	Imwe nkhabe teweza pimbakupangani makhaliro anu akudawika akubalwa nawo tayu , mbwenye mumbateweza pimbakupangani Mzimu Wakuchena — ngakhaladi Mzimu wa Mulungu ambakhala muna imwe . Munthu anakhonda khala na Mzimu wa Khristu , iye si wa Khristu tayu . 
45008010	Mbwenye Khristu angakhala muna imwe , ndiye kuti mzimu wanu una moyo , thangwi Mulungu akuchitisani kukhala anthu akulungama pamaso pache , podi kwene kuti manungo anu anadzafa thangwi ya kudawa . 
45008011	Ngakhala Mzimu wa Mulungu adalamusa Yesu kuimfa ule ambakhala muna imwe , penepo ule adalamusa Khristu kuimfa anadzaperekambo moyo kuna manungo anu ambafa ale kudzera muna Mzimu wache ambakhala muna imwe ule . 
45008012	Tenepo , abale anga , ife tathema kuteweza pinthu pimbatipanga Mzimu wa Mulungu nee kuteweza pinthu pimbafuna makhaliro athu akudawika akubalwa nawo ale tayu . 
45008013	Ngakhala munateweza pinthu pimbafuna makhaliro anu akudawika akubalwa nawo , munati mudzafe . Mbwenye ngakhala Mzimu Wakuchena ambakuphedzani kupha mabasanu akudawikawo , munati mudzakhale na moyo . 
45008014	Ana a Mulungu ngale ambatsogolerwa na Mzimu wa Mulungu . 
45008015	Thangwi Mzimu akupasani Mulungu ule , si wakuti akusanduzeni mabitchu , penu kukugoswani tayu , mbwenye ambakuchitisani kukhala ana a Mulungu , tenepo na mphamvu ya Mzimuyo ife timbalira kuna Mulungu kuti , " Baba , Baba ! "
45008016	Mzimu wa Mulungu ambachitira umboni pabodzi na mzimu wathu kuti ndife ana a Mulungu . 
45008017	Podi ndife anache , tinati tidzatambire mtsanzayiso umbakoyera iye anthu ache ule , pontho tinadzatambira pabodzi na Khristu pinthu pyamkoyera Mulungu pile . Ngakhala ife tinaona nyatwa sasawa ninga zidaona Khristu zile , tinati tidzatambirembo demelero yache . 
45008018	Ndikunyerezera kuti nyatwa zinaona ife chinchinozi nkhabe kwanisa khala sasawa na pang'ono pene tayu na demelero inafuna dzaoneswa kuna ife ile . 
45008019	Pyakulengwa pyonsene pili maso kunjira kudikhira kuti Mulungu aonese anache . 
45008020	Mulungu adapinyerezera kuti pyakulengwa pyonsene pidathema kusanduka pyakusowa basa , nee kuti ipyo pidafuna kuti pikhale tenepo tayu , mbwenye Mulungu ndiye adapifuna , kwache pakhali chidikhiro , 
45008021	chakuti nsiku ibodzi pyakulengwa pinadzasudzulwa pa ubitchu wakupichitisa kuti pivunde , pontho pinadzatambira utumbe wademelero ya ana a Mulungu . 
45008022	Thangwi timbapidziwa kuti na ndzidzi uno ene pyakulengwa pyonsene pimbabulira thangwi ya kuva kupha ninga kuva kupha kwa mkazi wamimba pakubala . 
45008023	Kwache pimbabulira si pyakulengwa pypkha tayu , ife ale tina Mzimu Wakuchena , ule ndi mtukwa wakutoma wa Mulungu kuna ife , timbabulirambo basi cham'bwalobwalo , ndzidzi unadikhira ife kuti Mulungu atisanduze kukhala anache , pontho kuombola manungo athu onsene . 
45008024	Ife tidapulumuswa thangwi ya chidikhiro chathu chenechi , mbwenye ngakhala tinaona na maso pinthu pinadikhira ife , penepo chenechi si chidikhiro chadichadi tayu . Mbani munthu ambadikhira kuona chinthu chaona iye kale ?
45008025	Mbwenye tingadikhira chinthu chinakhonda ife onacho , timbadikhira mwakupirira . 
45008026	Monthomonthomo Mzimu Wakuchena ambadza dzatiphedza , anthu akusowa mphamvufe . Thangwi ife nkhabe kudziwa mudathemera ife kupemphera tayu , Mzimu Wakuchena ambatidembeterera kuna Mulungu mwakubulira , kule mafala nkhabe kwanisa kulonga tayu . 
45008027	Tenepo Mulungu ule ambaona pya mumtima mwathu , ambadziwa pyakunyerezera pya Mzimu Wakuchena , thangwi Mzimuyo ambadembetera kuna Mulungu m'mbuto mwa anthu ache malingana na kufiina kwa Mulungu . 
45008028	Timbapidziwa kuti papinthu pyonsene pimbachita Mulungu ambapichita kuganyalisa napyo anthu ambamfuna ale , . ' anthu achemera iye malingana na basa inafuna iye kuphata . 
45008029	Ale Mulungu akhadaadziwiratu , iye adaapambula kukhala ninga Mwanache , towera Mwanache akhale wautombo pakati pa abale azinji . 
45008030	Ale adapambulwa na Mulungu , adaachemera ; pontho adachemera iye ale , adaalungamisa pamaso pache mbaapasambo demelero yache . 
45008031	Pa pyonsenepi tilonge tani ? Ngakhala Mulungu ambatiphedza , apo mbani pontho anakwanisa kutikunda ?
45008032	Nee Mulungu tayu , thangwi iye hadatimane Mwanache tayu , mbwenye adampereka thangwi ya ife pano tonsene . Mulungu adatipasa Mwanache , apo iye nkhabe kwanisa kutipasa pezi pinthu pyonsene tayu ?
45008033	Mbani anafuna dzapokanya anthu akusankhulika a Mulungu ? Mulungu makayo ndiye ambalonga kuti iwo ngokhonda dawa . 
45008034	Apo mbani anafuna dzalonga kuti iwo akonwa ? Nee Khristu Yesu adafa ule tayu , makamaka adalamuswa kuimfa mbakhala na moyo , pontho ali kumadyo kwa Mulungu . Iye akudembetera kuna Mulungu m'mbuto mwathu . 
45008035	Mbani pontho anakwanisa kutilekanisa na kutifuna kwa Khristu — nyatwa penu , kuva kupha penu , kusanyika penu , njala penu , kutcherenga penu , pyakugoswa na imfa penu ?
45008036	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Ndzidzi onsene tikuona nyatwa za imfa thangwi ya imwepo , tikukwatwa ninga mabira akwenda kachekwa . "
45008037	Nkhabe , kwache papinthu pyonsene pinaona ifepi tinakunda monsene mwene kudzera muna adatifuna ule . 
45008038	Ndikupidziwa mwadidi mwene kuti nkhabeve chinthu chinango chinakwanisa kutilekanisa na kutifuna kwache , nee imfa penu moyo , nee angelo penu atongi na anyamphamvu akudzulu , nee pinthu pili leropi penu pyam'tsogolo , 
45008039	nee dziko yakudzulu penu dziko yapansi — nkhabeve papinthu pyakulengwa pyonsene chingakwanise kutilekanisa na kutifuna kwa Mulungu tayu , kule nkhwathu kudzera muna Yesu Khristu Mbuyathu . 
45009001	Ndikulonga pyakuonadi : ine ndine wache wa Khristu , pontho nkhabe longa pyakunama tayu . Chikumbu mtima changa chimbatongwa na Mzimu Wakuchena chile , chimbatsikimizira kuti ine nkhabe nama tayu , 
45009002	ndingalonga kuti ndina nsisi zikulu , pontho ndikuva kupha kokhonda mala mumtima mwanga
45009003	thangwi ya abale anga , ale mbanthu a dzinzanga . Na thangwi ya kufuna kuaphedza ine ndikhapifuna kuti ndikhale pyanga wakutembererwa na Mulungu , pontho wakulekaniswa kuna Khristu . 
45009004	Iwo mbanthu a Israele , Mulungumbo adaasankhula kukhala anache mbaaonesa demelero yache ; iye adachita nawo piverano mbaapasa mwambo ; iwo akupembedza mwakuonadi pontho atambira pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu kuna iwo pile . 
45009005	Iwo mphidzukulu pya makolo athu akuveka a Chiheberi , pontho kulonga pya umunthu wa Khristu , iye ngwadzinzawo . Mulungu ule ana utongi papinthu pyonsene mbalemedzwe kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
45009006	Kadi ndikulonga kuti pidadumbira Mulungu pyachimwanika ? Nkhabe tayu , thangwi si onsene anthu a ku Israele mbanthu a Mulungu tayu . 
45009007	Si pidzukulu py onsene pya Abrahamu mbana a Mulungu tayu . Mulungu adalonga kuna Abrahamu mbati , " Kudzera muna Isake iwe unadzakhala na pidzukulu ninga mudadumbira ine kuna iwe . "
45009008	Penepi pikulonga kuti si ana onsene adabalwa na Abrahamu mbana a Mulungu tayu . Pidzukulu pyache chadichadi mphyokha pile pidadumbira Mulungu kuti anadzampasa . 
45009009	Thangwi pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu pidalongwa tenepa : " Ndinati ndidze pontho pandzidzi wache wakuthema , tenepo Sara anadzakhala na mwana wamamuna . "
45009010	Apo si pokhapo tayu , ana awiri amuna a Rebeka akhali na baba mbodzi , ule ndi kholo wathu Isake . 
45009011	
45009012	
45009013	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Ndidamfiina Yakobo , mbwenye ndidazonda Esau . "
45009014	Kadi penepa tilonge kuti Mulungu ngokhonda lungama ? Nkhabe na pang'ono pene tayu . 
45009015	Iye adalonga kuna Mose mbati , " Ndinadzavera nsisi anthu onsene anafuna ine kuvera nsisi , pontho ndinadzakomera mtima anthu onsene anafuna ine komera mtima . "
45009016	Tenepo pyonsene pyagona pansisi za Mulungu , nee pana pimbafuna munthu , penu pimbachita iye tayu . 
45009017	Malemba akulonga kuna Mtumu wa ku Iguputo kuti , " Ndakupitisa ufiimu towera ndikuphatise basa kuonesa mphamvu yanga , pontho kuti undivekese padziko yonsene yapansi . "
45009018	Tenepo Mulungu ambavera nsisi munthu onsene ninga mumbapifiinira iye , pontho ambaumisa mtima wa munthu onsene ninga mumbapifiinira iye . 
45009019	Mbodzi pakati panu anati adzalonge kuna ine mbati , " Pinakwanisika tani Mulungu kulonga kuti munthu adawa ? Mbani angakhonde kufuna kwa Mulungu ? "
45009020	Mwanzanga , ndiwe animbo iwe , kuti utawire Mulungu ? Chikalango nkhabe vunza adachiumba ule kuti , " Udandiumbiranji ninga tenepa ? "
45009021	Angamala penepo nyakuumba pikalango ule ana utongi kuphatisa basa dongo ninga munapifiinira iye mbaumba pikalango piwiri na dongo ibodzibodziyo , chibodzi mbachikhala chakuphatisirwa basa yakufimika pyakwanga , chinangombocho mbachikhala chikalango chene pyacho chakuphatisa basa nsiku na nsiku . 
45009022	Penepi ndi sasawa na pinthu pyachita Mulungu pile . Iye akhafiina kuonesa ukali wache , pontho kudziwisa mphamvu zache . Mbwenye iye adapirira pyakwanga na anthu adazhangalira iye ale , anthu adathemadi kuvungika ale . 
45009023	Iye akhafiina pontho kuonesa demelero yache yakuinjipa , ile idakhuthulwa pana ife , anthu akhadavera iye nsisi ale , pontho asasanya iye kuti titambire demelero yeneyi ale . 
45009024	Ife ndife anthu adachemera iye ale , nee pakati pa Ayuda okha tayu , mbwenye pontho pa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ene . 
45009025	Penepi ndiye pinalonga iye m'bukhu ya mprofeti Hosea kuti , " Anthu okhonda khala anga , ndinati ndidzaachemere kuti , ' Anthu anga . ' Anthu ale si apamtima panga tayu , ndinati ndidzaachemera kuti , ' Anthu a pamtima panga . '
45009026	Pontho pambuto padapanga iwo kuti , ' Si imwe anthu anga tayu ' , penepo pene iwo anadzachemerwa ana a Mulungu wamoyo . "
45009027	Tenepo mprofeti Yesaya adalonga mwakugaluza fala pya Israele mbati , " Podi anthu a ku Israele ainjipe pyawo tani ninga tchetcha ya m'nyanza , mbwenye akuchepa okha ndiye anadzapulumuka , 
45009028	thangwi Mbuya anadzatonga mseru anthu onsene padziko yapansi pano mwakuchimbiza pontho mwakupimalisiratu . "
45009029	Penepi ndiye pikhadalonga mprofeti Yesaya kalene mbati , " Mbuya wamphamvu zonsene mbadakhonda kutisiyirambo pidzukulu pinango , ife mbatidakhala ninga mizinda ya Sodomu na Gomora . , , 
45009030	Apo penepa tinalonga tani ? Tinalonga kuti anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , ale adakhonda kupilungamisa pamaso pa Mulungu , chinchino alungamiswa na Mulungu kudzera muna chikhulupiro chawo ;
45009031	mbwenye Alsraele ale akhasakasaka mwambo udanyerezera iwo kuti unaalungamisa pamaso pa Mulungu ule hadaugumana tayu . 
45009032	Apo thangwi yache ninji ? Thangwi yache njakuti iwo hadanyindire pa chikhulupiro tayu , mbwenye adanyindira pinthu pidachita iwo . Natenepo iwo adagwegweduka na mwala wakugwegwedusa anthu
45009033	ule unalonga Malemba kuti , " Yang'anani , ndaikha m'Zioni mwala , ule unafuna dzagwegwedusa anthu , chimwala chinafuna dzaagwesa chile . Mbwenye munthu onsene anamkhulupirayo hanadzachita manyadzo tayu . "
45010001	Abale anga , ndikupifuna na mtimanga onsene kuti Alsraele anzanga apulumuke . Ine ndimbaapempherera pikulu kuna Mulungu . 
45010002	Ndinakwanisa kuchitira umboni kuti iwo ngaphinga papinthu pya Mulungu , kwache phingawoyo si yanzeru nayo chadichadi tayu . 
45010003	Iwo hakudziwa tayu mule mumbalungamisira Mulungu anthu pamaso pache , mbwenye m'mbuto mwache iwo apiyesera okha kupiikhira njirawo , nee kupipereka kuna njira ya Mulungu yakulungamisira nayo tayu . 
45010004	Khristu amalisa mwambo , towera onsene ambamkhulupira ale akhale akulungama pamaso pa Mulungu . 
45010005	Mose adalemba tenepa pya kulungamiswa kwa anthu pamaso pa Mulungu pakuvera mwambo : " Munthu anavera mwambo , anadzakhala na moyo kudzera muna mwambowo . "
45010006	Mbwenye pidalonga Malemba pya kulungamiswa kwa anthu pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna chikhulupiro mphipi : " Lekani kupivunza mwekha ene kuti , ' Mbani anafuna dzaenda kudzulu ? ' " ( Kweneku ndiye kutchithisa Khristu kubulukira kudzulu . )
45010007	" Pontho lekani kupivunza kuti , ' Mbani anafuna dzatchitha pansi kuchiphompho chikulu ? ' " ( Kweneku ndiye kubulusa Khristu kumbuto ya anyakufa . )
45010008	Penepi pikulonga kuti , " Mphangwa za Mulungu zili chifupi namwe , m'kanwa mwanu na m'mitima mwanu mwene . " Zenezi ndi mphangwa za chikhulupiro zimbalalika ife zile . 
45010009	Imwe mungatawira na mulomo wanu kuti Yesu ndi Mbuya mbamukhulupira mumtima mwanu kuti Mulungu adamulamusa kuimfa , munati mudzapulumuke . 
45010010	Thangwi Mulungu ambatilungamisa pamaso pache kudzera muna chikhulupiro mumtima mwathu , pontho timbapulumuka kudzera muna kutawira kwathu na mulomo wathu . 
45010011	Malemba akulonga kuti , " Munthu onsene anamkhulupirayo nkhabe dzachita manyadzo tayu . "
45010012	Penepi pikulonga kuna munthu onsene , thangwi nkhabe kusiyana tayu pakati pa Ayuda na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Mulungu ndi Mbuya mbodzi wa anthu onsene , tenepo iye ambatsanzayisa pikulu pene anthu onsene ambamchemera kuti aaphedze ale . 
45010013	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Munthu onsene anachemera Mbuya kuti amphedzeyo , anadzapulumuka . "
45010014	Apo pinakwanisika tani kuchemera Mbuya kuti aaphedze ngakhala iwo nkhabe khulupira tayu ? Pinakwanisika tani kuti iwo akhulupire ngakhala hadave mphangwa tayu ? Pinakwanisika tani kuti iwo ave mphangwa ngakhala mphangwazo zikulalikwa kuna iwo tayu ?
45010015	Apo mphangwazo zinalalikwa tani , ngakhala anthu akuzilalika nkhabe tumwa kazilalika tayu ? Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Mphyakukoma pyakwanga kudza kwa anyakulalika mphangwa zadidi . "
45010016	Kwache si anthu onsene atambira mphangwa zadidi tayu . Mprofeti Yesaya ene adapilonga mbati , " Mbuya , mbani adakhulupira mphangwa zathu ? "
45010017	Tenepo chikhulupiro chimbadza munthu angava mphangwa ; angava mphangwa zakulonga pya Khristu zikulalikwa . 
45010018	Apo ndivunze , ayi mphyakuonadi kuti anthu a ku Israele hadava mphangwa zadidi tayu ? Ndimomwene iwo adava — thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Falawo idaveka padziko yonsene yapansi , mafalawo adafika kumadolomezero a dziko . "
45010019	Ndivunze pontho : Ayi anthu a ku Israele hadapivese tayu ? Mose ene ndiye nyakutoma kutawira kuti : " Ndinadzakuchitisani kukhala abivu pakuphatisa basa dzinza yokhonda khala dzinza chadichadi . Ndinadzakuchitisani kuzhangali pakuphatisa basa dzinza ya anthu akupupwa . "
45010020	Yesaya awanga mtima pyakwanga munalonga iye mbati , " Anthu adakhonda kundisakasaka , ndiye adandigumana . Ndidaonekera kuna anthu akhakhonda kuvunza pya ine . "
45010021	Mbwenye pya anthu a ku Israele iye adalonga mbati , " Nsiku yonsene ndidafuthula dzanjanga kutambira anthu okhonda vera na akupandukira . "
45011001	Apo ndivunze , ayi Mulungu adakhonda anthu ache ? Nkhabe tayu ! Ine ene pano ndine Mulsraele , chidzukulu cha Abrahamu wa dzinza ya Benjamini . 
45011002	Mulungu hadakhonda anthu ache tayu , adasankhula iye pakutoma ale . Mukudziwa pinalonga Malemba m'ndime idadungunya mprofeti Elia kuna Mulungu kapokanyisana na Israele ile mbati , 
45011003	" Mbuya , iwo apha maprofeti anu mbagwesa maguwanu a nsembe . Ndasala ndine ene basi , tenepo iwo akuyesayesa kuti andiphe . "
45011004	Mulungu adamtawira tani ? Adamtawira mbati , " Ndapikoyera amuna pikwi pinomwe ale akhonda kupembedza Baala , mulungu wakunama ule . "
45011005	Tenepo makauno pili sasawa ; asala ngakuchepa pakati pa anthu asankhulwa na Mulungu ale , thangwi ya kukoma kwache mtima . 
45011006	Kusankhula kwache kwagona pa kukoma kwache mtima , nee papinthu pyachita iwo tayu , thangwi ngakhala kusankhula kwa Mulungu kudagona papinthu pimbachita anthu , penepo kukoma kwache mtima nee mbukudakhala kwa chadichadi tayu . 
45011007	Ninji pontho ? Anthu a ku Israele hadachigumana chinthu chikhasaka iwo chile tayu . Mbwenye anthu akuchepa adasankhula Mulungu ale adachigumana ; akusala ale adasanduka madodo kuna kuchemera kwa Mulungu . 
45011008	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Mulungu adachitisa nzeru zawo kukhala zakufa , mwakuti na lero ene iwo nkhabe kwanisa kuva penu kuona tayu . "
45011009	Pontho Davite akupilonga kuti , " Maphwando awo mbakhale ninga misampha kuna iwo ; iwo mbagwe pontho atchunyuswe !
45011010	Maso awo mbafungike towera aleke kwanisa kuona , pontho ndzidzi onsene muachitise kuva kupha , thangwi ya nyatwa zina iwozo . "
45011011	Apo ndivunze kuti pidagwegweduka Ayuda , ayi iwo adagwa mwakuvungikiratu ? Nkhabe tayu ! Podi iwo adadawa , chipulumuso chidadza pyacho kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , towera Ayudawo achite nawo bivu . 
45011012	Kudawa kwa Ayuda kudadzesa kutsanzaya kukulu padziko yapansi , kutcherenga kwawo mumzimu kudadzesa kutsanzaya kukulu kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Mphapo Ayuda onsene anafuna dzapulumuka angadzathimizirwa kuna anyakupulumuka , kutsanzaya kwache kunadzakhala kukulu tani !
45011013	Chinchino ndikulonga na imwe anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Podi ine ndine nyakutumwa kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , ndinati ndinyadire basanga inaphata ineyi . 
45011014	Mwinango ndinakwanisa kusanduza anthu a dzinzanga kukhala na bivu , towera ndikwanise kuchitisa anango pakati pawo kupulumuka . 
45011015	Ndzidzi udaakhonda Mulungu ule , anthu a padziko yapansi adasanduka kukhala pontho ashamwali a Mulungu . Apo pinadzakhala tani Mulungu angadzaatawira ? Kuna anthu akufa unadzakhala moyo !
45011016	Ngakhala nyetswa yakutoma kumenywa pamkate inaperekwa kuna Mulungu , tenepo mkate onsene wamumphuwo ngwache pontho ; ngakhala mitsitsi ya muti inaperekwa kuna Mulungu , na nthambi zenezo nsache pontho . 
45011017	Nthambi zinango za muti wakubzalwa waolivi zasadzwa , tenepo nthambi za muti wamtsanga waolivi zafekiwa kumutiwo . Imwe anthu okhonda khala Ayuda mwakhala ninga muti waolivi wamtsanga , tenepo chinchino imwe mukutambirambo madzi a mitsitsi ambapasa moyo muti wakubzalwa waolivi ule sasawa na Ayuda . 
45011018	Tenepo lekani kutikana anthu adasadzulwa ninga nthambi ale . Ninji chinafuna imwe nyadira ? Podi ndimwe nthambi zene pyanu , imwe nkhabe phatisa mitsitsi , mbwenye mitsitsi imbaphatisa imwepo . 
45011019	Penepo imwe munadzalonga kuti , " Ande , kwache nthambi zidasadzwa kundipasa mbuto . "
45011020	Ndimomwene kuti izo zidasadzwa thangwi ya kukhonda khulupira , mwenemo imwe muli m'mbuto mwanu thangwi mumbakhulupira . Kwache lekani kunyada thangwi ya penepi , mbwenye chitani mantha . 
45011021	Mulungu hadasiya Ayuda m'mbuto mwawo tayu , ale akhala ninga nthambi chadichadi za muti zakubalwa nawo ; kadi imwe mukunyerezera kuti Mulungu anadzakusiyani m'mbuto mwanu ?
45011022	Penepa tinakwanisa kuona nsisi , pontho kukala mtima kwa Mulungu . Iye azhangalira anthu akugwa ale , mbwenye akomera mtima imwepo — ngakhala munathimiza kuchita pinthu pyakumkomera . Mbwenye mungakhonda chita tenepa , imwe ene munadzasadzulwambo . 
45011023	Ngakhala Ayuda analeka kukhonda khulupira kwawo , anati abwezerwe m'mbuto zawo zakale zile , thangwi Mulungu anakwanisa kuchita tenepo . 
45011024	Imwe anthu okhonda khala Ayuda mwakhala ninga nthambi ya muti waolivi wamtsanga yakusadzulwa ile mbifekererwa kumuti wakubzalwa waolivi yakusiyana na makhaliro akubalwa nawo a muti . Ayuda akhala ninga muti wakubzalwawu ; tenepo pinadzakhala chifupi pyakwanga kuna Mulungu kufekerera pontho nthambizi kumuti wawo . 
45011025	Abale anga , penepa pana pyakubisika pyakuonadi pinafuna ine kuti mupidziwe pile , thangwi pinadzakuchitisani kuti muleke kupiyesa ninga ndimwe anthu anzeru . Pyakubisika penepi mphyakuti kuuma mtima kwa anthu a ku Israele si kwakukhala na kukhala tayu , mbwenye kunadzamala kufikirana anthu onsene okhonda khala Ayuda anafuna dzakhulupira Mulungu ale , amkhulupire . 
45011026	Tenepo mwenemu ndi mule munafiina dzapulumusirwa anthu a ku Israele onsene . Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Nyankhombo anadzabulukira ku Zioni mbadzabulusa pyakudawa pyonsene pya pidzukulu pya Yakobo . 
45011027	Ine ndinadzachita nawo chiverano chenechi ndzidzi unadzabulusa ine pyakudawa pyawo . "
45011028	Podi iwo adakhonda Mphangwa Zadidi , Ayuda asanduka anyamalwa a Mulungu , thangwi ya anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Podi Mulungu adaasankhula , chinchino mbashamwali ache thangwi ya makolo awo akuveka a Chiheberi . 
45011029	Mulungu nkhabe sanduza manyerezero ache pa anthu ambasankhula na kutsanzayisa iye ale tayu . 
45011030	Imwembo anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , kalene mudakhonda kuvera Mulungu ; mbwenye chinchino Mulungu akuverani nsisi thangwi ya kukhonda vera kwa Ayuda . 
45011031	Ntchibodzibodzi , thangwi ya kukuverani nsisi kudachita Mulungu , chinchino Ayuda akukhonda vera Mulungu , towera chinchino Mulungu aaverembo nsisi . 
45011032	Mulungu achitisa anthu onsene kukhala anyaperezo a kukhonda vera kwawo , towera iye aonese nsisi zache kuna iwo onsene . 
45011033	Mfuma ya Mulungu njakuinjipa pyakwanga . Nzeru na udziwisi wache mphyakuzika pyakwanga . Mbani anakwanisa kudziwa manyerezero ache ? Mbani anakwanisa kuvesa pinthu pimbachita iye ?
45011034	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Mbani ambadziwa manyerezero a Mbuya ? Mbani anakwanisa kupangiza Mbuya pyakuchita ?
45011035	Chipo mbani ampasa pinthu kuti iye adathema kukhala na mangawa ? "
45011036	Podi pinthu pyonsene pidalengwa na iye , tenepo pinthu pyonsene pina moyo kudzera muna iye pontho thangwi ya iye . Demelero ikhale kuna Mulungu kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
45012001	Natenepo abale anga , thangwi ya nsisi zikulu za Mulungu pana ife , ndikukupemphani kuti mupipereke kuna Mulungu ninga nsembe yamoyo , yakupambulika kuna basache pontho yakumkomera . Kweneku nkhupembedza kwakuonadi kudathema imwe kuchita kule . 
45012002	Lekani tsanzira makhaliro a anthu a padziko yapansi pano , mbwenye mulekeni Mulungu akusanduzeni monsene mwene pakukupasani manyerezero atswa . Tenepo munadzakwanisa kudziwa kufuna kwa Mulungu — kwadidi , kwakumkomera pontho kwakuthema monsene mwene . 
45012003	Na thangwi ya mtukwa udandipasa Mulungu kudzera muna kukoma kwache mtima , ndinalonga kuna monsenene kuti : Lekani kupiyesa ninga ndimwe akulu pyakwanga piringana muna imwepo . M'mbuto mwache nyerezerani mwakupichepesa , malingana na mdida wa chikhulupiro chakupasani Mulungu chile . 
45012004	Manungo athu abodziwa ana mapindi azinji , tenepo mapindi enewa ana mabasa akusiyanasiyana . 
45012005	Ntchibodzibodzi , podi kwene kuti ife tainjipa , ndife manungo abodzi thangwi taphatanizwa na Khristu , tenepo tonsene taphatanizwa kuna unango na mwanzache ninga mapindi akusiyana a manungo abodzi . 
45012006	Apo tendeni tiphatise basa mitukwathu yakusiyanasiyana idatipasa Mulungu kudzera muna kukoma kwache mtima ile . Ngakhala mtukwathu ngwakuti tilonge nawo mphangwa za kubulukira kuna Mulungu , tendeni tipichite kutewezana na chikhulupiro china ifechi , 
45012007	ngakhala nkhutumikira , tendeni titumikire , ngakhala nkhufunzisa , mbatifunziseni , 
45012008	ngakhala nkhuwangisa anthu anango mtima , tendeni tichite tenepo . Munthu anagawana na anzache pina iye , apichite mwakufewa manja . Ngakhala nkhutsogolera anthu anango , atsogolere mwaphinga ; munthu anakomera anzache mtima , apichite mwakukomerwa . 
45012009	Kufunana kwathema kukhala kwamaso . Mwathema kuzonda pyakuipa , mbwenye phatisani pyadidi . 
45012010	Funanani na mtima onsene ninga abale . Khalani na chipapo kulemedzana unango na mwanzache . 
45012011	Khalani anthu aphinga , pontho phatani basa mwakuwangisa . Tumikirani Mbuya mwakupipereka na mtimanu onsene . 
45012012	Komerwani thangwi ya chidikhiro chanu , pirirani panyatwa , pontho pempherani ndzidzi onsene . 
45012013	Ngakhala akhristu anzanu ngakutcherenga , gawanani nawo pinthu pina imwepyo , pontho tambirani alendo mwadidi pamsuwo panu . 
45012014	Pemphani Mulungu kuti atsanzayise ambakuboneresani ale — ande , mpempheni kuti aatsanzayise , nee kuatemberera tayu . 
45012015	Komerwani pabodzi na anyakukomerwa , lirani na anyakulira . 
45012016	Tsalakananani sasawa unango na mwanzache . Lekani nyada , mbwenye phatizanani na anthu ene pyawo akupichepesa . Lekani kupiyesa mwekha ene ninga anthu anzeru ndimwe ene basi . 
45012017	Ngakhala unango akuchitirani chakuipa lekani bwezera chakuipa . Yesesani kuchita pinthu pya m'maso mwa anthu onsene . 
45012018	Ngakhala mphyakukwanisika , yesesani kukhala mwamtendere na anzanu . 
45012019	Abale anga , lekani bwezera kudawa kwa anzanu , mbwenye lekerani Mulungu kubwezera . Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Mbuya alonga kuti , ' Ndilekereni ndibwezere kudawa kwawo , ndinati ndibwezere ndine . ' "
45012020	Mbwenye ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Ngakhala nyamalwanu ana njala , mpaseni phoso ; ngakhala iye ana nyota , mpaseni chakumwa ; thangwi mungachita tenepo iye anachita manyadzo . "
45012021	Lekani kundwa na pyakuipa ; mbwenye chitani pinthu pyadidi kuti pyakuipapyo pikundwe . 
45013001	Munthu onsene athema vera atongi a dziko , thangwi nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kukhala mtongi ngakhala Mulungu hadampitise tayu . Atongi alipowa adachita kuikhwa na Mulungu . 
45013002	Munthu anapokanyisana na atongi enewa , apokanyisana na pidaikha Mulungu ; natenepo munthu wakuchita penepi anati apichitise yekha ene kukonwa . 
45013003	Atongi hadathema kugopiwa na anthu akuchita pyadidi ale tayu , mbwenye ambagopiwa na anthu akuchita pyakudawika ale . Ayi imwe mukufuna kukhala anthu okhonda gopa atongi ? Apo chitani pinthu pyadidi , tenepo iwo anadzakusimbani , 
45013004	thangwi iwo mbatumiki a Mulungu kudzesa udidi kuna imwepo . Mbwenye ngakhala munachita pyakuipa , penepo agopeni , thangwi mphamvu zawo zakutchunyusa nazo nsachadichadi . Iwo mbatumiki a Mulungu akudzesa ukali wa Mulungu kuna anthu akuchita pyakudawika . 
45013005	Tenepo na thangwi yeneyi imwe mwathema kuvera atongi wo , nee kwene kuti thangwi ya ukali wa Mulungu tayu , mbwenye thangwi ya chikumbu mtima . 
45013006	Ndi thangwi yache pontho mumbakhoma msonkho , thangwi atongiwo akuphatira basa Mulungu ndzidzi unaphata iwo mabasawo . 
45013007	Apo , apagalini mangawa ana imwe kuna iwo , pagalini msonkho wa munthu pontho na msonkho wa pinthu pyanu , pontho alemedzeni onsenewo monsene mwene . 
45013008	Lekani khala na mangawa na munthu , mangawa akhale akufunana kwene basi . Munthu anachita penepiyo avera mwambo . 
45013009	Matongero akuti , " Leka chita uputa ; leka kupha ; leka kuba ; leka sirira pinthu pya mwanzako " — onsenewa pontho na anango ali m'chigwandira m'matongero akuti , " Funa mwanzako ninga mumbapifunira iwe mwenechiro . "
45013010	Ngakhala imwe mumbafuna mwanzanu , penepo nkhabe dzamchitira pyakuipa tayu . Kufunana nkhuvera mwambo onsene . 
45013011	Imwe mwathema kuchita penepi , thangwi mumbapidziwa kuti ndzidzi wakwana ; ora yakwana yakuti mulamuke kuchitulo . Thangwi ndzidzi unafuna ife dzapulumuswa uli chifupi kusiyana na kale ndzidzi udakhulupira ife . 
45013012	Mosiku uli chifupi kumala , tenepo makalakwecha ali chifupi kutoma . Apo tendeni tileke kuchita pinthu pya mumdima mbatithukuleni pida pya cheza pyakumenyera nkhondo . 
45013013	Tendeni tikhale na makhaliro adidi , ninga anthu a m'cheza cha masikati — tileke madyaidya penu kuledzera , tileke kuchita pinthu pyakujejeduka , penu pyakunyansa , nthonga na bivu . 
45013014	Mbwenye thukulani pida pya Mbuya Yesu Khristu mbamuleke kuteweza pikhumbo pyakudawika pyanu pyakubalwa napyo . 
45014001	Tambirani mwadidi munthu wakuchepa chikhulupiro , kwache lekani kupokanyisana naye pa manyerezero ache akusiyana na anu . 
45014002	Munthu unango chikhulupiro chache chimbamtawirisa kudya pyakudya pya mtundu onsene , mbwenye unango , ule ana chikhulupiro chakuchepa ambakhonda kudya nyama ya mtundu onsene . 
45014003	Munthu wakudya pinthu pyonsene ule aleke selusa mwanzache wakukhonda kudya pyonsene ule . Tenepo ule ambakhonda kudya nyama aleke longa kuti mwanzache wakudya nyama ule adawa , thangwi Mulungu amtawirisa kuchita tenepo . 
45014004	Ndi we ani iwe kuti ulonge kuti nyabasa wa munthu unango adawa ? Ndi mbuyache ene basi anafuna dzapitonga ngakhala iye akupikwanisa penu akupichimwana . Iye anati adzapikwanise m'tsogolo , thangwi Mbuya ndiye anafuna dzachitisa kuti iye apikwanise . 
45014005	Munthu unango ambanyerezera kuti nsiku inango njakufunika pyakwanga kupiringana nsiku zinango , mwenemo munthu unango ambayesa kuti nsiku zonsene ndi sasawa . Munthu onsene apichite ninga munanyerezera iye kuti mphyakuthema . 
45014006	Munthu ambanyerezera kuti nsiku inango njakufunika pyakwanga kupiringana nsiku zonsene , ambachita tenepo kulemedza Mbuya . Tenepo munthu anadya pyonseneyo , ambachita tenepo kulemedza Mbuya thangwi ambapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu iye angadya kudyako . Munthu onsene anakhonda kudya pyonsene ule , ambachita tenepo kulemedza Mbuya , kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu . 
45014007	Nkhabe mbodzi pakati pathu ambakhala na moyo iye yekha ene tayu ; nkhabe mbodzi pakati pathu ambafa iye yekha ene tayu . 
45014008	Ngakhala tinakhala na moyo , tinakhala na moyo thangwi ya Mbuya ; ngakhala tinafa , tinafa thangwi ya Mbuya . Natenepo penu tikhale na moyo , penu tife , ndife ache a Mbuya . 
45014009	Ndi thangwi yache Khristu adafa mbalamuka kuimfa towera akhale Mbuya wa anthu a moyo na akufa ene . 
45014010	Tenepo , imwe mumbalongeranji kuti akhristu anzanu adawa , pontho mumbaseluseranji akhristu anzanu ? Tonsenefe tinadzaimira pamaso pa Mulungu kutongwa mseru . 
45014011	Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Mbuya alonga mbati , ' Ine ndine Mulungu wamoyo ; natenepo munthu onsene anati adzandigodamire , pontho munthu onsene anati adzatawire na mulomo wache kuti ndine Mulungu . ' "
45014012	Tenepo tonsenefe tinati tidzalonge kuna Mulungu pinthu pyonsene pikhachita ife . 
45014013	Natenepo , tileke longa kuti unango adawa . M'mbuto mwache tinyerezere kuleka kuchita pinthu pyakuchitisa abale anu kugwegweduka penu kuchita pyakudawa . 
45014014	Mukuphatanizana kwanga na Mbuya Yesu ndikupidziwadi kuti nkhabe chakudya pachokha ntchakuswipa tayu pamaso pa Mulungu . Mbwenye ngakhala munthu anakhulupira kuti chakudya ntchakuswipa , kuna iye chakudyacho ntchakuswipadi . 
45014015	Ngakhala munatsukwalisa mbaleanu thangwi ya pinthu pimbadya imwe , penepo imwe nkhabe kumfiina mbaleanuyo tayu . Lekani kumvunga mwanzanu , ule Khristu adamfera , thangwi ya pinthu pimbadya imwe . 
45014016	Lekani tawirisa kuti pinthu pimbayesa imwe kuti mphyadidi pilongwe kuti mpyakuipa . 
45014017	Thangwi Ufumu wa Mulungu nkhabe pinthu na pya kudya penu na pya kumwa tayu , mbwenye chilungamo , mtendere na kukomerwa kumbapasa Mzimu Wakuchena kule . 
45014018	Tenepo munthu angatumikira Khristu ninga tenepa , iye ambachitisa Mulungu kukomerwa , pontho anthu anango ambamsimba . 
45014019	Tenepo ndzidzi onsene tathema kuyesayesa kuchita ' pinthu pyakudzesa mtendere , towera pitiphedze kuwangisana mtima . 
45014020	Lekani kuvunga pinthu pyachita Mulungu thangwi ya kudya . Imwe munakwanisa kudya pyakudya pyonsene , kupambula pile pinakwanisa kudawisa munthu unango . 
45014021	Mphyadidi kuthunda kudya nyama penu kumwa vinyu , penu pile pinaona imwe kuti pinakwanisa kudawisa mbaleanu . 
45014022	Koyani pinthu pinakhulupira imwe papinthu penepi , kwache pikhale pakati pa imwe na Mulungu . Ngwakutsanzaya munthu ule ambakhonda kupilonga yekha ene kuti adawa angachita pinthu pinaona iye kuti mphyakuthema !
45014023	Ngakhala iye ambapenuka na pinadya iye , Mulungu ambalonga kuti iye akonwa angapidya , thangwi iye nkhabe khulupira kuti pinachita iyepyo mphyakuthema tayu . Chinthu chonsene chingachitwa okhonda chikhulupiro , kweneko nkhudawa . 
45015001	Ife ale tina chikhulupiro chakuwanga tathema kuphedza anyakusowa mphamvu kuthukula nyatwa zawo . Tileke kupichitisa kukomerwa tekha ene . 
45015002	M'mbuto mwache ife tonsene tathemambo kuchitisa anzathu kukomerwa kuti kukhale udidi kuna iwo , towera iwo akule m'chikhulupiro . 
45015003	Khristu hadapichitise yekha ene kukomerwa tayu , mbwenye ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Kutikana kukhakuchitani iwo kule , kwagwera ine pano . "
45015004	Pyonsene pidalembwa m'Malemba kale , pidalembwa kuti pitifunzise , towera tikhale na chidikhiro kudzera muna kupirira pontho kuwanga mtima kumbatifunzisa Malemba kule . 
45015005	Mulungu , mwenechiro kupirira pontho kuwanga mtima , mbakuchitiseni kukwanisa kuvana mwadidi , kuteweza upangizi wa Yesu Khristu , 
45015006	towera monsenene pabodzi na mtima ubodzi mukuze Mulungu pontho Baba wa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
45015007	Tambiranani unango na mwanzache mwadidi ninga mwakutambirirani Khristu , towera Mulungu alemedzwe . 
45015008	Thangwi ine ndikukupangani kuti Khristu adakhala mtumiki kuna Ayuda kuonesadi kuti Mulungu ngwakukhulupirika kuchitisa chiverano chidachita iye na makolo athu chile kukwanakwana , 
45015009	pontho kuchitisa kuti na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ene akuze Mulungu thangwi ya nsisi zache . Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Ndinadzakukuzani pakati pa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Ndinadzaimba nyimbo zakukukuzani nazo . "
45015010	Pyalembwa pontho kuti , " Komerwani imwe anthu okhonda khala Ayuda pabodzi na anthu a Mulungu . "
45015011	Pyalembwa pontho kuti , " Kuzani Mbuya , imwe anthu okhonda khala Ayuda monsene , Mkuzeni , imwe anthu a madzinza onsene . "
45015012	Pontho mprofeti Yesaya apilonga kuti , " Chidzukulu cha Yese chinadzabwera , iye anadzabwera dzakhala mfumu wa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , tenepo iwo anadzaikha chidikhiro chawo pana iye . "
45015013	Mulungu mwenechiro chidikhiro mbadzaze mtimanu na kukomerwa pontho mtendere kudzera muna chikhulupiro chanu pana iye , towera chidikhiro chanu chithimize kukula na mphamvu za Mzimu Wakuchena . 
45015014	Abale anga , ndimomwene kuti ine ene pano ndikupidziwa kuti ndimwedi anthu adidi , pontho kuti mumbadziwa pyonsene mwadidi mwene , pontho mumbakwanisa kufunzisana unango na mwanzache . 
45015015	Mbwenye m'kalata yeneyi ndawanga mtima pyakwanga kulonga pya pinthu pinango pyakukukumbusani napyo . Ndawanga mtima tenepa thangwi ya mwayi wandipasa Mulungu
45015016	wakukhala nyabasa wa Khristu Yesu kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Ndingalalika Mphangwa Zadidi zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , ndimbatumikira ninga nyansembe , towera anthu okhonda khala Ayuda aperekwe ninga nsembe yakutawirwa na Mulungu , pontho yakupambulika kuna iye kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena . 
45015017	Mukuphatanizana kwanga pabodzi na Yesu Khristu , ndinakwanisa kunyada thangwi ya kutumikira kwanga Mulungu . 
45015018	Ine sinadzalonga mwakuwanga mtima pya pinthu pinango tayu , kupambula pinthu pyachita Khristu pile , kudzera muna ine pano kuchitisa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda kuvera Mulungu . Mulungu achita penepi kudzera muna mafala na mabasa ;
45015019	kudzera muna mphamvu ya pidzindikiro na pyakudodomesa , pontho na mphamvu za Mzimu wa Mulungu . Tenepo panjiranga yonsene kubulukira ku Yerusalemu kufikirana ku Iliriko , ine ndalalika monsene mwene Mphangwa Zadidi za Khristu . 
45015020	Ndzidzi onsene ndimbakhumba chinthu chibodzi chene basi chakuti ndilalike Mphangwa Zadidi kumbuto zile zidakhonda veka Khristu , towera ndileke manga pamaziko adamanga anthu anango ale . 
45015021	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Ale adakhonda kupangwa pya iye , anati adzamuone ; ale adakhonda kuva pya iye , anati adzapivese . "
45015022	Tenepo ndzidzi uzinji sidakwanisa tayu kudza kwanuko . 
45015023	Mbwenye chinchino , podi ndamalisa basanga kunthemba za kunozi , pontho kuti pyaka pizinji ndikhapifuna kuti ndifike kwanuko , 
45015024	ndikudikhira kuchita tenepo chinchino pano . Ndapinyerezera kukuonani pakwenda kwanga ku Spanya , kuti imwe mundiphedze kwenda kweneko , mwenemo ndamala komerwa na kuchedza namwe ndzidzi pang'ono . 
45015025	Kwache chinchino pano ndikwenda ku Yerusalemu kapereka pinthu pyakuphedza napyo anthu a Mulungu kweneko . 
45015026	Thangwi mipingo ya mu Makedonia na Akaya pidaakomera kupereka pinthu pyakuphedza napyo anthu akutcherenga pakati pa anthu a Mulungu a ku Yerusalemu . 
45015027	Pidaakomera kuchita tenepo , kwache kulonga pyakuonadi , iwo ana mangawa akuti aaphedze , podi Ayuda adagawana na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda mtsanzayiso wawo wauzimu , tenepo anthu okhonda khala Ayudawo athema kuphatisa basa pinthu pyawo kuphedza napyo Ayuda . 
45015028	Ine ndingamalisa basayi , pontho kutula pinthu pyonsene pidaperekwa kuna iwo , ndinati ndidzabuluke kweneko kwenda ku Spanya mbandifambirambo imwepo pakwenda kwanga kweneko . 
45015029	Ndikupidziwa kuti ndingadza kuna imweko , ndinati ndidze na mtsanzayiso wakuinjipa wakubulukira kuna Khristu . 
45015030	Abale , thangwi ya Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , pontho na kufunana kumbapasa Mzimu Wakuchena kule , ndikulaidembeterani kuti pabodzi na ine tipemphere kuna Mulungu na mtima onsene thangwi ya ine . 
45015031	Pempherani kuti Mulungu andiyang'anire mwadidi gopesera Ayuda okhonda khulupira a mu Yudea . Pempherani pontho kuti anthu a Mulungu a mu Yerusalemu atambire mwakukomerwa pinthu pyakuaphedza napyo pina inepi . 
45015032	Tenepo ndinabwera kwanuko na kukomerwa kukulu , ngakhala Mulungu anapifuna kuti pikhale tenepo , mbanditsanzaya na kupuma thangwi ya kuchedza namwe kwanga . 
45015033	Mulungu , mwenechiro mtendere , mbakhale namwe monsene . Ameni . 
45016001	Ndikumpereka kuna imwe Febe , nyamaingathu , nyakutumikira mpingo wa ku Kenkerea ule . 
45016002	Mtambireni mwadidi na dzina ya Mbuya , ninga mwathema anthu a Mulungu kuchita , pontho mphedzeni na pinthu pinasowa iye , thangwi iye achita udidi kuphedza nawo anthu azinji pontho na ine ene . 
45016003	Ndikupereka mwenyikiro kuna Priskila na Akila , anzanga akuphata nawo basa pabodzi yakutumikira Yesu Khristu ;
45016004	iwo adasasanyika kufa , thangwi ya ine pano . Ndinapereka takhuta kuna iwo , kwache si ine ndekha ndinapereka takhuta tayu , mbwenye na mipingo ene ya anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . 
45016005	Ndikupereka pontho mwenyikiro kuna mpingo umbagumanyikana m'nyumba mwawo kupemphera ule . Ndikupereka mwenyikiro kuna shamwalianga wapamtima , Epeneto , ule akhali munthu wakutoma kukhulupira Khristu m'nthemba ya Asia . 
45016006	Mwenyikiro kuna Maria , akuphatirani basa mwakuwangisa ule . 
45016007	Mwenyikiro pontho kuna Androniko na Yunia , Ayuda anzanga akhali na ine pabodzi m'perezo ale ; iwo akhali akudziwika pakati pa anyakutumwa , pontho iwo akhali akutoma kusanduka akhristu ine mbandidzati . 
45016008	Mwenyikiro kuna Ampiliato , shamwalianga wapamtima mukuphatanizana kwathu na Mbuya . 
45016009	Mwenyikiro kuna Urubano , nyabasa mwanzanga pabasa ya Khristu , na Staku , shamwalianga wapamtima ule . 
45016010	Mwenyikiro kuna Apele , ule kukhulupirika kwache kuna Khristu kwatsikimizwa . Mwenyikiro kuna onsene a m'banja ya Aristobulo . 
45016011	Mwenyikiro kuna . Herodiono , Myuda mwanzanga , pontho kuna abale onsene m'banja ya Narikiso . 
45016012	Mwenyikiro kuna Trifena na Trifosa , akazi ale ambaphatira basa Mbuya , pontho na shamwalianga wapamtima Perisi , ule achita pizinji kuphatira basa Mbuya . 
45016013	Ndikupereka mwenyikiro kuna Rufu , nyabasa adasankhulwa kutumikira Mbuya ule , pabodzi na mache ene , ule ambakhala ninga mamanga ene . 
45016014	Mwenyikiro kuna Asinkrito , Felego , Hereme , Patroba , Herima na akhristu anango onsene ali kweneko pabodzi nawo . 
45016015	Mwenyikiro kuna Filologo na Zhulia , kuna Nerea na nyamaingache ene , kuna Olimpa , pontho kuna anthu onsene a Mulungu ali kweneko pabodzi nawo . 
45016016	Pasanani mwenyikiro wachikhristu wakuonesa kufunana unango na mwanzache . Mipingo yonsene ya Khristu kuno ikupereka mwenyikiro kuna imwe . 
45016017	Abale anga , ndikukupemphani kuti mukhale m'maso na ale ambagawanisa anyakukhulupira na kudzudzumisa chikhulupiro chawo pakupokanya pinthu pidafimziswa imwe pile . Tenepo khalani kutali na iwo . 
45016018	Anthu ambachita pinthu ninga penepi ale nkhabe kutumikira Khristu Mbuyathu tayu , mbwenye ambatumukira pikhumbo pyawo . Na kudziwa kwawo kulonga , pontho na mafalawo akukoma , iwo ambanyengeza anthu anango okhonda dziwa pinthu . 
45016019	Anthu onsene ava pya kuvera kwanu Mphangwa Zadidi , tenepo na thangwi yeneyi ndakomerwa namwe pyakwanga . Ine ndikupifuna kuti imwe mukhale anthu anzeru zakudziwa pinthu pyadidi , kwache okhonda dziwa pinthu pyakuipa . 
45016020	Tenepo Mulungu , mwenechiro mtendere , anadzapeya chinchino pano Satana pansi pamanyalo anu . Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuyathu kukhale namwe . 
45016021	Timoti , mwanzanga wakuphata naye basa pabodzi , akupereka mwenyikiro kuna imwe . Lukio , Yasoni na Sosipatro , Ayuda anzanga akuchitambo chibodzibodzi . 
45016022	Ine , Teritio , nyakulemba kalata ya Pauloyi , ndikuperekambo mwenyikiro wachikhristu kuna imwe . 
45016023	Gayo , nyakundikoya m'nyumba mwache , pontho ule mpingo umbagumanyikana m'nyumba mwache akupereka mwenyikiro kuna imwe . Erasito , nyakukoya kobiri za mzinda na mbaleathu Kwarto ene , akupereka mwenyikiro kuna imwe . '
45016025	Tendeni tipereke demelero kuna Mulungu . Iye anakwanisa kukuchitisani kukhala na chikhulupiro chakuwanga , malingana na Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Khristu zimbalalika ine , pontho na udziwisi wa pyakubisika pyakuonadi pidabiswa kuna mifendu izinji ene m'nduli pile . 
45016026	Kwache chinchino , pyakuonadi penepi pyaoneswa pakwecha kudzera muna pidalembwa na maprofeti , pontho kudzera muna matongero a Mulungu wakukhala na kukhala ule , lero pyadziwika kuna anthu a madzinza onsene , towera apive na kupikhulupira . 
45016027	Kuna Mulungu yekha , Mulungu wanzeru zonsene , kukhale demelero kudzera muna Yesu Khristu kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
46001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyakuchemerwa na kufuna kwa Mulungu kukhala nyakutumwa wa Khristu Yesu , pontho kubulukira kuna mbaleathu Sostene —
46001002	Kwenda kuna mpingo wa Mulungu wa mu Korinto , kuna ale achemerwa kukhala anthu akuchena a Mulungu . Ale ngache thangwi ya kuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu , pabodzi pene na onsene konsene kwene , ale ambapembedza Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , ule ndi Mbuyawo pontho Mbuyathu . 
46001003	Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Babathu pontho Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale namwe . 
46001004	Na thangwi ya imwe ndzidzi onsene ndimbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu wanga thangwi ya kukoma mtima kwakuchitirani iye kudzera muna Khristu Yesu . 
46001005	Thangwi mukuphatanizana na Khristu mwasanduka anthu akufuma mupyonsene , kuthimiza malongero anu onsene na udziwisi wanu onsene . 
46001006	Mphangwa zakulonga pya Khristu zakhazikika muna imwe
46001007	mwakuti imwe nee mwachimwana tayu kutambira mtsanzayiso wa mtundu onsene ndzidzi unadikhira imwe kuti Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu adzatchululwe . 
46001008	Iye anadzakuchitisani kuimira dzololo kufikirana kumamalisiro , towera mudzakhale akusowa chinthu chakukupokanyisani pansiku ya Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
46001009	Mulungu nyakukuchemerani kuti mudzakhale akuphatanizana na mwanache Yesu Khristu Mbuyathu , ngwakunyindirika . 
46001010	Abale anga , ndikukupemphani imwe monsene na utongi wa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu kuti mutawirizane pa pinalonga imwe , towera paleke khala magawikano pakati panu . Khalani abodzi monsene mwene m'manyerezero anu , pontho na chakufuna chibodzi . 
46001011	Abale anga , anango a pabanja ya Koloe andipanga mwakuveka kuti pakati panu pana nthonga . 
46001012	Chinalonga ine ntchakuti munthu onsene pakati panu akulonga pyakusiyana na mwanzache . Unango akulonga mbati , " Ine ndimbatewera Paulo " ; unangombo ati , " Ine ndimbatewera Apolo " ; unango ati , " Ine ndimbatewera Kefa " ; unangombo ati , " Ine ndimbatewera Khristu . "
46001013	Kani Khristuyu agawika ? a Kani ndi Paulo ule adakuferani pamtanda ? Kani mudabatizwa na dzina ya Paulo ?
46001014	Ndimbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi pakati panu sidabatizepo munthu na mbodzi ene tayu , kupambula kwene Khrisipo na Gayo basi . 
46001015	Natenepo nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kulonga kuti imwe mudabatizwa kukhala anyakufunzanga tayu . 
46001016	Ande ndakumbuka kuti ndidabatiza pontho Stefanasi pabodzi na banjache . Kwache ine nkhabe kwanisa kumbuka pontho tayu ngakhala pana unango adabatiza ine . 
46001017	Khristu hadandituma dzabatiza tayu , mbwenye kuti ndidzalalike Mphangwa Zadidi — kuzilalika mwakukhonda phatisa basa mafala anzeru za anthu , gopesera kufa kwa Khristu pamtanda kunamala mphamvu yache . 
46001018	Thangwi mphangwa zakulonga pya imfa ya Khristu pamtanda nsakusowa basa kuna anthu akutayika ale , mbwenye kuna ife anyakupulumuswa ndi mphamvu za Mulungu . 
46001019	Malemba akulonga kuti , " Ndinadzavunga nzeru za anthu anzeru mbandidzamalisa kuchenjera kwa anthu akuchenjera . "
46001020	Apo munthu wanzeru ali kupi ? Ali kupi munthu wakufunza ? Ali kupi nyakupidziwisa wa mfendu uno ? Mulungu apionesa kuti nzeru za anthu a pansi pano nsakupupwa . 
46001021	Thangwi Mulungu na nzeru zache adapisasanyiratu kukhala pyakuchimwanika kuti anthu amdziwe na nzeru zawo . M'mbuto mwache Mulungu adanyerezera kupulumusa anthu ambakhulupira ale kudzera muna mphangwa zimbalongwa kuti nsakupupwa zimbalalika ife zile . 
46001022	Ayuda ambafuna kuona pyakudodomesa , Agriki ambafuna nzeru , 
46001023	mbwenye ife timbalalika Khristu adakhomerwa pamtanda ule . Kuna Ayuda , mphangwa zenezi nsakuzhangalisa , pontho kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda nsakupupwa . 
46001024	Mbwenye kuna onsene ale adachemerwa na Mulungu , Ayuda na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ene , mphangwazi ndi Khristu , ule ndi mphamvu za Mulungu , pontho nzeru za Mulungu . 
46001025	Thangwi pinthu pyakuoneka ninga pyakupupwa pya Mulungu , mphyanzeru kupiringana nzeru za anthu , pontho pinthu pyakuoneka ninga mphyakusowa mphamvu pya Mulungu , mphyamphamvu kupiringana mphamvu za anthu . 
46001026	Abale anga , chinchino kumbukani kale mukhali animbo imwe , ndzidzi udakuchemerani Mulungu . Na kupiona kwa anthu , pakati panu nkhabepo azinji ale akhayeswa anzeru penu amphamvu , penu akubalwa m'mabanja akuveka tayu . 
46001027	Mbwenye Mulungu adasankhula pile pimbayeswa pyakupupwa na anthu a padziko yapansi , towera achitise manyadzo anthu anzeru . Pontho iye adasankhula pile pimbayeswa pyakusowa mphamvu na anthu a padziko yapansi , towera achitise manyadzo anthu amphamvu . 
46001028	Iye adasankhula pinthu pimbayeswa na anthu a padziko yapansi kuti mphyakululupa , pyakukhondiwa , pontho pyakusowa basa , towera iye avunge pikhanyerezera iwo kuti mphyakufunika pile . 
46001029	Mulungu adachita penepi towera paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakunyada pamaso pache . 
46001030	Mbwenye Mulungu ndiye akuphatanizani na Khristu Yesu , pontho iye achitisa Khristu kukhala nzeru yathu . Kudzera muna iye ife tayeswa akulungama pamaso pa Mulungu ; ife tasanduka kukhala anthu akupambulika a Mulungu , pontho tasudzulwa kubuluka pansi pautongi wa pyakudawa . 
46001031	Natenepo , ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Nyakufuna kunyada , athema nyadira pinthu pyachita Mbuya . "
46002001	Abale anga , pidadza ine kwanu dzalalika pyakuonadi pyakubisika pya Mulungu , nee sidaphatisa basa mafala akimensa kuavesa , pontho na kufunza kukulu tayu . 
46002002	Thangwi ndzidzi ukhali ine namwe ndidanyerezera kuduwalira pinthu pyonsene kupambula Yesu Khristu ene basi , makamaka imfache ya pamtanda . 
46002003	Tenepo pidafika ine kwanu ndikhali wakusowa mphamvu , pontho wakutetemera pyakwanga na mantha . 
46002004	Mphangwa na chifunziso changa nee ndikhapilonga na mafala aluso a nzeru za anthu tayu , mbwenye na chitsikimiziro cha mphamvu za Mzimu wa Mulungu , 
46002005	towera chikhulupiro chanu chileke gona panzeru za anthu , mbwenye pamphamvu za Mulungu . 
46002006	Kwache ine ndimbalonga mafala anzeru kuna akukola mu uzimu . Mbwenye nzeruzo si zapansi pano , penu za atongi a dziko yapansi pano tayu , ale mphamvu zawo zikumala . 
46002007	Nzeru zimbalonga ine ndi nzeru zakubisika za Mulungu , zabisika kuna anthu zile . Mulungu akhadasankhuliratu nzeru yeneyi dziko yapansi mbidzati lengwa , towera atipase demelero . 
46002008	Nkhabe mtongi na mbodzi ene wa dziko yapansi pano adadziwa nzeru yeneyi tayu . Thangwi iwo mbadapidziwa , nee mbadakhomera pamtanda Mbuya wa demelero tayu . 
46002009	Kwache ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Chinthu chidakhonda ona penu kuva munthu , chinthu chidakhonda nyerezera munthu kuti chinachitika , ntchonthocho chidasasanyira Mulungu anthu ambamfuna ale . "
46002010	Mbwenye Mulungu atchulula penepi kuna ife kudzera muna Mzimu wache . Mzimu Wakuchena ambasakasaka chinthu chonsene podi na pinthu pene pyakubisika pyakuzika pya Mulungu . 
46002011	Ndi mzimu wa munthu okha umbadziwa pyonsene pya munthuyo . Ntchibodzibodzi Mzimu wa Mulungu okha umbadziwa pyonsene pya Mulunguyo . 
46002012	Ife hatidatambire mzimu wa dziko yapansi pano tayu , m'mbuto mwache tidatambira Mzimu Wakuchena wakubulukira kuna Mulungu , towera tidziwe pyonsene pyatipasa Mulungu . 
46002013	Timbalonga penepi na mafala ambatifunzisa Mzimu Wakuchena , nee na mafala akufunziswa na nzeru za anthu tayu , ndzidzi unafunzisa ife pyakuonadi pyauzimu kuna anthu akukhala na Mzimu Wakuchenayo .
46002014	Munthu wakusowa Mzimu Wakuchena nkhabe kwanisa kutambira pinthu pyakubulukira kuna Mzimu wa Mulungu tayu . Munthu ninga weneyu nkhabe kupivesa tayu ; ipyo mphyakupupwa kuna iye , thangwi munthu anakwanisa kutonga makhaliro a pinthu ninga penepi na chiphedzo cha Mzimu Wakuchena basi . 
46002015	Munthu onsene wakukhala na Mzimuyo anakwanisa kutonga makhaliro a pinthu pyonsene , kwache nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kumtonga tayu . 
46002016	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Mbani anadziwa manyerezero a Mbuya kuti ampangize ? " Mbwenye ife tina manyerezero a Khristu . 
46003001	Abale anga , ine sidakwanise kulonga namwe ninga ndikulonga na anthu akukhala na Mzimu Wakuchena tayu , mbwenye ninga anthu a padziko yapansi pano , pontho ninga akachiya pa chikhulupiro chachikhristu . 
46003002	Ndidakupasani mkaka , nee kudya kwakuwanga tayu , thangwi nee mbamudakwanisa kukutafuna tayu . Podi na chinchino ene nee munakwanisa kukutafuna tayu basi , 
46003003	thangwi mukuthimiza kukhala na makhaliro ninga anthu a padziko yapansi pano basi . Pakati panu pangakhala bivu na nthonga . Ayi penepi nkhabe tsikimizira tayu kuti imwe ndimwe anthu a padziko yapansi pano , anthu akuteweza makhaliro a anthu a padziko yapansi pano ?
46003004	Unango pakati panu angalonga mbati , " Ine ndimbatewera Paulo , " unangombo ati , " Ine ndimbatewera Apolo . " Ayi penepa hamukuchita ninga anthu a padziko yapansi pano tayu ?
46003005	Apo Apolo mbanimbo ? Pontho Paulo mbani ? Ife ndife anyabasa ene pyathu a Mulungu , ale adakuonesani njira kuti mukhulupire . Munthu onsene wa ife ambaphata kwene basa idampasa Mbuya ile . 
46003006	Ine ndidabzala mbewu , Apolo adazithilira madzi , mbwenye adazimeresa ndi Mulungu . 
46003007	Natenepo nyakubzala na nyakuthirira si anyakufunika tayu , mbwenye Mulungu , nyakuzimeresa , ndiye nyakufunika . 
46003008	Tenepo nkhabe kusiyana pakati pa nyakubzala na nyakuthirira tayu , thangwi Mulungu anadzaapasa mfupo malingana na basa idaphata iwo . 
46003009	Thangwi ife ndife anyakuphata basa pabodzi na Mulungu , imwe mwakhala ninga munda wa Mulungu . Pontho imwe mwakhala ninga nyumba ya Mulungu . 
46003010	Ine ndidaphata basa ninga misiri waluso mbandiikha maziko pakuphatisa basa mtukwa udandipasa Mulungu , tenepo munthu unango akumangapo . Mbwenye munthu onsene athema kuchita mpholemphole na mamangiro ache . 
46003011	Thangwi Mulungu adaikha kale Yesu Khristu ninga maziko abodzi okha basi . Tenepo nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kuikha maziko anango na abodzi ene tayu . 
46003012	Ngakhala munthu anamanga na golidi , siliva na miyala yakudula ; penu na miti , maudzu na mitete pamaziko enewa , 
46003013	makhaliro a basache anadzaoneka pakwecha , thangwi Nsiku ya Khristu inadzabulusa basayo pakwecha . Pansiku yeneyi pinadzabuluswa pakwecha na moto , pontho moto unadzayesa makhaliro a mabasa a munthu onsene . 
46003014	Ngakhala chinamanga munthu chinakhonda kupya na moto , munthuyo anadzatambira mfupo . 
46003015	Mbwenye chingapya , munthuyo nkhabe dzatambira mfupo tayu ; munthuyo anadzapulumuka , kwache kunadzakhala ninga munthu wakupulumuka pamoto . 
46003016	Ndimomwene imwe mukupidziwa kuti ndimwe nyumba ya Mulungu , pontho kuti Mzimu wa Mulungu ambakhala muna imwe . 
46003017	Tenepo ngakhala munthu anavunga nyumba ya Mulungu , Mulungu anadzamvungambo , thangwi nyumba ya Mulungu njakupambulika ; nyumba yeneyi ndimwe . 
46003018	Lekani kupinyengeza mwekha ene . Ngakhala unango apiyesa wanzeru malingana na mumbapionera anthu a padziko yapansi pano , iye athema kusanduka wakupupwa , towera akhale wanzeru chadichadi . 
46003019	Thangwi pinthu pimbayeswa pya nzeru na anthu a padziko yapansi pano mphyakupupwa pamaso pa Mulungu . Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Mulungu ambakwesha anthu anzeru na kuchenjera kwawoko " ;
46003020	akulonga pontho kuti , " Mbuya ambadziwa kuti manyerezero a anthu anzeru ngakusowa basa . "
46003021	Tenepo paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakunyadira pinthu pinakwanisa anthu kuchita pile . Pyonsene mphyanu :
46003022	Paulo , Apolo na Kefa ; dziko yapansi ino , moyo na imfa , pya ndzidzi uno na pya m'tsogolo — pyonsenepi mphyanu . 
46003023	Imwembo ndimwe ache a Khristu , pontho Khristu ngwa Mulungu . 
46004001	Imwe mwathema kutiyesa ninga anyabasa a Khristu , ale apaswa utongi kulonga pyakuonadi pyakubisika pya Mulungu . 
46004002	Tenepo chinthu chakufunika kuna anthu akupaswa basa yeneyi ntchakuti akhale akukhulupirika kuna Mbuyawo . 
46004003	Chinchino ine nkhabe ikha konta tayu ngakhala ndinatongwa mseru na imwe penu na thando inango ya miseru ya anthu ; ndimomwene kuti ine nkhabe kupitonga ndekha ene tayu . 
46004004	Chikumbu mtima changa ntchakusowa chinthu chakupokanyisa , kwache penepi nkhabe tsikimizira tayu kuti ndine okhonda dawa . Mbuya yekha ndiye nyakunditonga mseru . 
46004005	Natenepo , lekani tonga mseru munthu na mbodzi ene ndzidzi wakuthema mbudzati kwana . Dikhirani kufikirana Mbuya adze ; iye anadzabulusa pakwecha pinthu pyakubisika pya mumdima , pontho na pyakufuna pya mtima wa anthu . Tenepo munthu onsene anadzatambira chilemedzo chathema iye kutambira kubulukira kuna Mulungu . 
46004006	Thangwi ya imwe , abale anga , ine ndalonga pyonsenepi khala ninga pikulonga Apolo na ine pakuphatisa basa uwiriathu kukuonesani upangizi , towera pikufunziseni kuti mafala ale akuti , " Tewezani mwadidi pinalonga Malembapi " akulonga kuti tani ? Tenepo paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakunyadira munthu unango mbaselusa munthu unango . 
46004007	Mbani adakuchitisani kukhala akufunika kupiringana anthu anango onsene ? Kadi Mulungu hadakupasani pinthu pyonsene pina imwepyo tayu ? Apo ngakhala mudapitambira ninga mtukwa munanyadiranji ?
46004008	Pinthu pimbakhumba imwe muli napyo kale ! Kani mwafuma kale , pontho mwasanduka kale mafurnu , podi kwene kuti ife si ife mafurnu tayu ? Imwe mbamudakhala mafurnu , mbandidakomerwa pyakwanga , towera na ife enembo tikhale mafurnu pabodzi na imwe . 
46004009	Thangwi ndikupiona kuti ife anyakutumwa , Mulungu adatipasa mbuto zakumalisiraletu ninga anthu akutongwa kuphiwa pakwecha ale , khala ninga ndife chinthu chakuoniwa na pyakulengwa pyonsene , anthu na angelo ene , ninga masenzeka . 
46004010	Na thangwi ya Khristu ife ndife mapupwe , mbwenye imwe ndimwe akuchenjera mukuphatanizana kwanu na Khristu ! Ife ndife akusowa mphamvu , mbwenye imwe ndimwe amphamvu ! Ife taseluswa , mbwenye imwe mwalemedzwa !
46004011	Na lero ife tina njala na nyota , tikuvala masakala , tikumenywa , pontho ife nkhabe msuwo wakukhazikika tayu , 
46004012	timbatopa na kuphata basa mwakuwangisa na manjathu . Podi kwene kuti timbatembererwa , ife timbatsanzayisa . Podi kwene kuti timbabonereswa , ife timbapirira . 
46004013	Podi kwene kuti timbatikanwa , ife timbatawira na mafala adidi . Na lero pano ife tikuyeswa ninga shuzhu ya dziko yapansi , pontho ninga pyakunyansa pya dziko yapansi . 
46004014	Ine ndikukulemberani penepi nee na thangwi yakuti ndikuchitiseni manyadzo tayu , mbwenye kuti ndikupangizeni ninga ananga apamtima . 
46004015	Podi kwene kuti muna amakayaya pikwi khumi pa moyo wanu wachikhristu , muna baba mbodzi yekha basi . Thangwi mukuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu , ine ndasanduka babanu pidakulakirani ine Mphangwa Zadidi . 
46004016	Ndikukupemphani mphapo kuti mutsanzire ine pano . 
46004017	Na thangwi yeneyi ndikukutumizirani Timoti , mwananga wapamtima , pontho wakukhulupirika m'moyo wachikhristu . Iye anadzakukumbusani matongero ambateweza ine m'moyo wanga wachinchino wakuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu , pontho ambafunzisa ine m'mipingo yonsene konsene kwene ale . 
46004018	Anango pakati panupo atoma kutumbama khala ninga kwanuko sinadzako tayu . 
46004019	Mbwenye ngakhala Mbuya anapifuna ndinati ndidze kwanuko chinchino pano , mbandidzadziwa ndekha ene mphamvu zinanyadira anthu akutumbamawa , nee pinthu pimbalila iwo longa kwenepi tayu . 
46004020	Thangwi mu Ufumu wa Mulungu chinthu chakufunika si mafala tayu , mbwenye mphamvu . 
46004021	Apo chinafuna imwe ninji ? Munafuna kuti ndidzabwere kwanuko na ntswamu penu na mtima wakukufunani na wakufulika ?
46005001	Pyavekadi pikulu pene kuti pakati panu pakuchitika pinthu pyakuzuda pyakugoswa mwakuti na anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu ene nkhabe kupichita tayu . Ndapiva kuti munthu unango akugonana na mkazi wa babache . 
46005002	Apo ninji munatumbama ? M'mbuto mwache imwe mwathema kutsukwala pikulu pene , mbamumbuluse m'gulu mwanu munthu wakuchita pinthu ninga penepi . 
46005003	Podi kwene kuti ine ndikhale pyanga kutali na imwe kumanungo , kwache ndili namwe pabodzi mumzimu . Pontho ndamtonga kale mseru na dzina ya Mbuya munthu adachita pinthu pyakugoswa ninga penepiyu , khala ninga ndili namwe pabodzi . 
46005004	Ndzidzi unagumanyikana imwe pabodzi mbandigumanyikana namwe mumzimu wanga , pontho na mphamvu ya Mbuyathu Yesu mbikhala pakati pathu
46005005	mumpereke munthu weneyu m'manja mwa Satana kuti manungo ache avungwe , towera mzimu wache udzapulumuswe pa Nsiku ya Mbuya . 
46005006	Si pyakuthema tayu kuna imwe kuti mukhale akunyada . Imwe mukudziwa mafala akulonga kuti , " Chakufufumisira mkate pang'ono chimbafufumisa mpambo onsene . "
46005007	Imwe mwathema bulusa chakufufumisira mkate chakale cha pyakudawa , towera mudzakhale akuchena monsene mwene . Natenepo munadzakhala ninga mpambo wachinchino wakusowa chakufufumisira ninga munadziwira ine kuti muli tenepadi . Thangwi Khristu , mwanabirathu wakuchitira Phwando ya Paska ule , aphiwa kale ninga nsembe . 
46005008	Tendenitu mphapo tichite Phwando yathu ya Paska mwakukhonda phatisa basa chakufufumisira mkate chakale chakudawa , pontho chakuipa chile , mbwenye na mkate wakusowa chakufufumisira , wakuchena pontho wakuonadi . 
46005009	M'kalata idakulemberani ine ile ndidakupangani kuti muleke phatizana nawo anthu akuzuda . 
46005010	Penepo nee ndikhalonga anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu tayu , ale mbakuzuda , penu amtima , penu mbava , penu akupembedza mifanikizo . Kuti muthunde anthu enewa , imwe mudathema kubuluka padziko yapansi pano . 
46005011	Mbwenye ndikhalonga kuti mwathema kuleka phatizana na munthu onsene ambapilonga yekha ene kuti ndi mkhristu , mwenemo iye ngwakuzuda , penu wamtima , wakupembedza mifanikizo , nyatsweda , dombe , penu mbava . Munthu wakuchita pinthu ninga penepi muleke kudya naye na pang'ono pene .

46005013	
46006001	Ngakhala unango pakati panu ana mseru na mkhristu mwanzache , anawanga tani mtima kamtongesa mseru na anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu , m'mbuto mwa kwenda naye kuna akhristu anzache . 
46006002	Kadi imwe nkhabe kupidziwa tayu kuti akhristu anadzatonga mseru anthu onsene a padziko yapansi pano ? Apo ngakhala munadzatonga anthu onsene a padziko yapansi pano , kadi imwe nkhabe kwanisa kutonga pimiseru ping'ono ping'onopi tayu ?
46006003	Kadi imwe nkhabe dziwa tayu kuti tinadzatonga mseru angelo ? Apo ndi tani pya moyo uno ?
46006004	Ngakhala muna miseru ninga yeneyi , ayi munakaitongesa na munthu wakunja , ule nkhabe pinthu na mpingo ?
46006005	Penepi ndikupilonga kuti ndikuchitiseni manyadzo . Ndimomwene kuti alipo mbodzi wanzeru m'gulu mwanu wakuti anakwanisa kutonga miseru ya pakati pa akhristu anzache . 
46006006	M'mbuto mwache mkhristu ambakasumira mkhristu mwanzachekutawira kuti mseru wache utongwe na anyakukhonda khala akhristu . 
46006007	Chenechi chakukhala na miseru pakati panu chikuoneseratu kuti mwapichimwana . Kadi si pyadidiletu tayu kuti anthu anango akudawireni ? Kadi si pyadidiletu tayu kuti munthu unango akupokosereni pinthu pyanu ?
46006008	M'mbuto mwache imwe maka ndiye mumbadawirana unango na mwanzache mbamupokoserana pinthu unango na mwanzache , pontho penepi mumbapichita kuna akhristu anzanu ene . 
46006009	Ndimomwene mukudziwa kuti anthu akudawika nkhabe dzatambira khundu mu Ufumu wa Mulungu tayu . Lekani kupinyengeza mwekha ene , thangwi anthu akuzuda , akupembedza mifanikizo , maputa , penu amuna penu akazi okhokha kugonana , 
46006010	mbava , anyamtima , madombe , anyatsweda penu pimbalangondo , nkhabe dzatambira khundu mu Ufumu wa Mulungu tayu . 
46006011	Anango a imwe kalene mukhali ninga tenepo , kwache mwacheneswa kubulusa pyakudawa pyanu , mwapambulwa kukhala anthu a Mulungu , mwalungamiswa na Mulungu kudzera muna Mbuya Yesu Khristu , pontho muna Mzimu wa Mulungu wathu . 
46006012	Munthu unango anati alonge mbati , " Ine ndina utumbe kuchita pinthu pyonsene . " Ande , kwache si pyonsene mphyakuganyalisa tayu . Ndinakwanisa kulonga kuti ndina utumbe kuchita pinthu pyonsene , kwache ine nkhabe tawirisa chinthu na chibodzi chene kundichitisa kukhala bitchu wache tayu . 
46006013	Unangombo anati alonge mbati , " Kudya kudasasanyirwa chifu , chifumbo chidasasanyirwa kudya . " Ande , mbwenye Mulungu anadzavunga pyonsene piwiripyo . Manungo si akuchitira pyakuzuda tayu , mbwenye kutumikira Mbuya , Mbuyambo ambapasa manungo pyakusowa pyache . 
46006014	Mulungu adalamusa Mbuya kuimfa , tenepo na mphamvu zache anadzatilamusambo ife pano . 
46006015	Kadi imwe nkhabe dziwa tayu kuti manungo anu ndi mapindi a manungo a Khristu ? Apo ndikwate phindi ya Khristu mbandiphatanizana kumanungo a puta ? Nkhabe na pang'ono pene tayu . 
46006016	Penu imwe nkhabe dziwa pontho tayu kuti munthu wakugonana na puta , iwo awiriawo ambasanduka kukhala manungo abodzi ? Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Uwiriawo anadzasanduka kukhala manungo abodzi . "
46006017	Mbwenye nyakuphatanizana yekha ene kuna Mbuya , ambasanduka kukhala abodzi na Mbuya mumzimu . 
46006018	Thundani pyakuzudapyo . Pyakudawa pinango pyonsene pimbachita munthu , nkhabe pinthu na manungo ache tayu , mbwenye munthu wakuchita pyakuzuda ambadawira manungo ache . 
46006019	Kadi imwe nkhabe dziwa tayu kuti manungo anu ndi nyumba ya Mzimu Wakuchena , ambakhala muna imwe , pontho adakupasani Mulungu ule ? Moyo una imwewo si wanuve tayu , mbwenye ngwa Mulungu , 
46006020	thangwi iye adakugulani na konta ikulu . Tenepo phatisani basa manungo anu kudzesa demelero kuna Mulungu . 
46007001	Chinchino nditawire kundivunza kudachita imwe pya kukazhali m'kalata idandilembera imwe ile . Mphyadidi kuti munthu akhonde kazhali ,
46007002	mbwenye na thangwi yakuti pana kuzuda kukulu , mamuna onsene akhale na mkazache mbodzi , mkazimbo onsene akhale na mamuna mbodzi . 
46007003	Mamuna athema kuchita na mkazache pinafuna mkaziyo . Ntchibodzibodzi mkazi athema kuchita na mamunache pinatuna mamunacheyo . 
46007004	Mkazi nkhabe tonga manungo ache yekha ene tayu , mbwenye ambaatonga ndi mamunache . Ntchibodzibodzi mamuna nkhabe tonga manungo ache yekha ene tayu , mbwenye ambaatonga ndi mkazache . 
46007005	Lekani khondesana , kwache ngakhala munafuna kuthunda ndzidzi wakuchepa towera mupemphere , chakutoma mwathema kutawirizana . Mungamala penepo , khalani pontho pabodzi gopesera Satana anakuyesani , thangwi ya kukhonda kwanu kwanisa kuuphata mtima . 
46007006	Pinalonga ine penepi , si kukukhondesani tayu , mbwenye kukutawirisani . 
46007007	Ine ndikhapifuna kuti anthu onsene akhale ninga ine ; mbwenye munthu onsene ana mtukwa udampasa Mulungu , unango ana uwu , unangombo ana uwo wakulekana na wa mwanzache . 
46007008	Mafalanga kuna okhonda kazhali na kuna amamfelwa ngakuti mphyadidiletu kuti iwo athimize kukhala pyawo okha ene ninga ine . 
46007009	Mbwenye ngakhala hanakwanisa kuuphata mtima tayu , athema kukazhali , thangwi mphyadidi kukazhali kusiyana na kusanyika na pikhumbo . 
46007010	Kuna anthu a pabanja matongero anga , ale si anga tayu , mbwenye a Mbuya , ngakuti mkazi aleke mwalana na mamunache . 
46007011	Ngakhala analekana naye aleke sembwave , penu abwerezane na mamunache ; mamunambo aleke mwalana na mkazache . 
46007012	Kuna anthu anango mafalanga , ale si a Mbuya tayu , ngakuti ngakhala mamuna wachikhristu ana mkazi okhonda khala mkhristu , mkaziyo mbafuna pyakukhala naye , mamunayo aleke mwalana naye . 
46007013	Pontho ngakhala mkazi wachikhristu ana mamuna okhonda khala mkhristu , mamunayo mbafuna pyakukhala naye , mkaziyo aleke mwalana naye . 
46007014	Thangwi mamuna okhonda khala mkhristu ambatawirwa ninga mbodzi wa anthu a Mulungu thangwi ya mkazacheyo . Mkazi wakukhonda khala mkhristu ambatawirwa ninga mbodzi wa anthu a Mulungu thangwi ya mamunache . Mbapidakhonda khala tenepo , anawo nee mbadakhala a Mulungu tayu , mbwenye iwo ndiwodi ana a Mulungu . 
46007015	Mbwenye ngakhala nyakukhonda khala mkhristu akufuna kumwalana na mkhristuyo , mlekeni achite tenepo . Ngakhala pinakhala tenepa , mkhristu wamkazi , penu wamamuna ana utumbe kuchita tenepo . Mulungu adakuchemerani kuti mukhale na moyo wa mtendere . 
46007016	Kadi iwe mkhristu wamkazi nkhabe kupidziwa kuti mwinango unadzachitisa mamunako kupulumuka ? Penumbo iwe mkhristu wamamuna nkhabe kupidziwa kuti mwinango unadzachitisa mkazako kupulumuka ?
46007017	Munthu onsene athimize kukhala na moyo ukhali na iye ndzidzi udamchemera Mulungu , thangwi Mbuya ndiye adamsasanyira penepi . Penepi ndiye pimbatonga ine m'mipingo monsene . 
46007018	Ngakhala unango adachemerwa na Mulungu mbali wakugwandwa nsonga yakumaso , aleke kubulusa chidziwiso chakugwandwako . Ngakhala unango adachemerwa na Mulungu mbali okhonda gwandwa nsonga yakumaso , aleke gwandwave . 
46007019	Thangwi kugwandwa penu kukhonda gwandwa nsonga yakumaso si pinthu tayu , mbwenye kuteweza matongero a Mulungu ndiye pyakufunika . 
46007020	Munthu onsene athimize kukhala na moyo ukhali na iye pidamchemera Mulungu . 
46007021	Kadi pidakuchemera Mulungu ukhali bitchu ? Leka dungunya napyo tayu . Mbwenye ngakhala unagumana mwayi wakusanduka mtumbe , phatisa basa mwayi wenewo .
46007022	Thangwi ule akhali bitchu pidamchemera Mbuya , ndi mtumbe wa Mbuya . Ntchibodzibodzi ule akhali mtumbe pidamchemera Khristu , ndi bitchu wache . 
46007023	Mulungu adakugulani na konta ikulu , tenepo lekani khala mabitchu a anthu . 
46007024	Abale anga , munthu onsene athimize kukhala pamaso pa Mulungu na moyo ukhali na iye , pidamchemera Mulungu . 
46007025	Kulonga pya anyakukhonda kazhali na amamfelwa , ine nkhabe matongero akubulukira kuna Mbuya tayu . Mbwenye ninga munthu wakuchitirwa nsisi na Mulungu ndathema kukhulupirwa , tenepo ndinakupangani manyerezero anga . 
46007026	Na thangwi ya nyatwa ya ndzidzi uno , ndikunyerezera kuti mphyadidi munthu kukhala pyache ninga muna iyemo . 
46007027	Ayi ndimwe akukazhali ? Lekani yesera kumwalana . Ayi ndiwe nyakukhonda semba ? Leka yesera kusemba . 
46007028	Kwache ngakhala unasemba hudadawe tayu , pontho ngakhala mkazi anasembwa hadadawe tayu . Mbwenye ndikhafuna kwene kukupulumusani kunyatwa zansiku na nsiku zimbagumanikana na any akukazhali pamoyo wawo . 
46007029	Mbwenye , abale anga , chinafuna ine kulonga ntchakuti ndzidzi wachepa , tenepo kubulukira chinchino kwenda m'tsogolo anyakusemba akhale ninga hadasemba tayu ;
46007030	anyakulira akhale ninga hakhalira tayu , anyakutsanzaya akhale ninga hakhatsanzaya tayu ; anyakugula pinthu akhale ninga pidagula iwopyo si pyawo tayu ;
46007031	anyakuphatisa basa rnfuma ya dziko yapansi pano , akhale ninga hakhaiphatisa basa chadichadi tayu . Thangwi dziko yapansi pano ninga muna iyo chinchinomu ikwenda . 
46007032	Ndinafuna kuti paleke khala chinango chakukuswipisani mtima . Mamuna okhonda semba ambatsalakana pya kuphatira basa Mbuya , thangwi iye ambayesa kuchitisa Mbuya kukomerwa . 
46007033	Mbwenye mamuna wakusemba ambatsalakana kuchita pinthu pya dziko yapansi pano , thangwi iye ambafuna kuti mkazache akomerwe , 
46007034	natenepo ambaphatwa uku na uku . Mkazi okhonda sembwa penu mwali ambatsalakana pya kuphatira basa Mbuya , thangwi ambafuna kuti manungo ache na mzimu wache ene pikhale pyakupambulika kuna Mbuya . Mbwenye mkazi wakusembwa ambatsalakana pinthu pya dziko yapansi pano , thangwi iye ambafuna kuti mamunache akomerwe . 
46007035	Ndikulonga penepi kuti ndikuphedzeni , si kuti nkhukukhondesani utumbe wanu tayu . M'mbuto mwache ndikufuna kuti muchite pyonsene mwakulungama na mwakuthema , pontho mupipereke monsene mwene kuphatira basa Mbuya . 
46007036	Ngakhala mamuna anyerezera kuti akuchita pyakukhonda thema kuna mwali avunzira iye ule , pontho ngakhala pikhumbo pyache pikunyanya kukula mbanyerezera kuti iwo athema kukazhali , penepo iwo akazhali pyawo . Tenepo kweneku si kudawa tayu . 
46007037	Mbwenye ngakhala mamuna , okhonda kakamizwa na munthu , anyerezera na mtimache onsene kuti aleke semba mkaziyo , ' pontho ngakhala iye anakwanisa kuuphata mtimache mbanyerezeradi mumtima mwache chinthu chakuti achite — tenepo iye achita pyadidi kukhonda semba mkaziyo .
46007038	Natenepo nyakusemba ambachita pyadidi , mbwenye nyakukhonda semba ambachita pyadidiletu kupiringana nyakusembayo . 
46007039	Mkazi ambamangika na matongero a pabanja mwenemo mamunache ana moyo . Mbwenye mamunache angagonera mkono , mkaziyo ngwakusudzuka kasembwa na mamuna unango anafuna iye , kwache mamunayo athema kukhala mkhristu . 
46007040	Na kupiona kwanga iye anadzakhala wakukomerwa pyakwanga angakhonda sembwa , pontho ndikunyerezera kuti na ine enembo ndina Mzimu wa Mulungu . 
46008001	Kulonga pya kudya kwakuperekwa nsembe kuna mifanikizo , ande , ndimomwene kuti " tonsenefe tina udziwisi " , ninga mumbalongera anthu , kwache " udziwisi " wenewu umbachitisa munthu kukhala wakugaya , mbwenye kufunana ndiye kumbapasa munthu mphamvu . 
46008002	Munthu onsene anapiyesa kuti ana udziwisi wa pinthuyo ndimomwene kuti iye nkhabe kupidziwisisa ninga mudathema iye kupidziwa tayu . 
46008003	Mbwenye munthu anafuna Mulungu , Mulungu ambamdziwa . 
46008004	Apo , kulonga pya kudya kwakuperekwa nsembe kuna mifanikizo , timbapidziwa kuti mifanikizo yeneyi si pinthu chadichadi tayu , thangwi nkhabe Mulungu unango , mbwenye mbodzi yekha basi . 
46008005	Podi kwene kuti pana pinthu pinango pile anthu ambapithula " milungu " , penu nkhudzulu penu pansi pano , pontho podi kwene kuti pana pinthudi pizinji pyakuthulwa " milungu " , penu " ambuya " , 
46008006	kwache kuna ife , Mulungu ndi mbodzi basi , weneyu ndi Baba , nyakulenga pinthu pyonsene , pontho ife tina moyo kuti timchitise kukomerwa . Mbuyathu ndi mbodzi basi , Yesu Khristu ; kudzera muna iye Mulungu adalenga pyonsene , pontho ife tina moyo kudzera muna iye . 
46008007	Kwache ana udziwisi wa penepi si anthu onsene tayu . Kalene anango akhadzolowera kupembedza mifanikizo mwakuti na lero iwo angadya kudya kwakuperekwa nsembe kuna mifanikizo ambakumbuka basi kuti kudyako kwaperekwa nsembe kuna mifanikizo ; chikumbu mtima chawo ntchakusowa mphamvu , tenepo iwo ambanyerezera kuti kudyako kumbaaswipisa . 
46008008	Kwache kudya nkhabe kutikonwesa pamaso pa Mulungu tayu . Tingakhonda kukudya nkhabe chinataya ife ; tingakudya nkhabe chinafuna ganyali ife . 
46008009	Kwache onesesani kuti utumbe wanu wakuchita nawo pinthu pinafuna imwewo uleke kudawisa anthu anango akuchepa chikhulupiro . 
46008010	Tisangize tenepa : Iwe ule wati una " udziwisi " , ukudya m'nyumba yakupembedzeramo mfanikizo , apo munthumbo wachikumbu mtima chakusowa mphamvu angakuona ukuchita tenepo ; kadi iye hangawange mtima tayu kadyambo kudya kwakuperekwa nsembe kuna mifanikizo ?
46008011	Natenepo nyachikhulupiro chache chakuchepayu , mbaleako adaferwa na Khristu ule , anadzatayika thangwi ya " udziwisi " wako . 
46008012	Mungadawira akhristu anzanu tenepo , mbamukuwaza chikumbu mtima chawo chakusowa mphamvu , penepo mukudawira pontho na Khristu ene . 
46008013	Natenepo ngakhala kudyako kukudawisa mbaleanga , ine nkhabe dzadyave pontho nyama tayu , gopesera kudawisa mbaleangayo . 
46009001	Kadi ine si ine mtumbe tayu ? Kadi ine si ine nyakutumwa tayu ? Kadi Yesu Mbuyathu sidamuone tayu ? Kadi imwe si imwe nsapo za basa idaphatira ine Mbuya tayu ?
46009002	Podi kwene kuti anango akhonde kundiyesa nyakutumwa , kwache kuna imwe ndinedi nyakutumwa , thangwi moyo wanu wakuphatanizana na Mbuya umbatsikimizadi kuti ndine nyakutumwa . 
46009003	Anthu angandipokanya , ndimbaatawira tenepa kupitchinjiriza :
46009004	Kadi ine sidatheme tayu kupaswa kudya na chakumwa thangwi ya basa inaphata ineyi ?
46009005	Kadi sidatheme tayu kuchitambo ninga pidachita anyakutumwa anango na abale ache a Mbuya pabodzi na Peturo pakukwata mkazi wachikhristu mbandifamba naye pa ulendo wanga ?
46009006	Kadi ndi Barnaba na ine ene basi tathema kuphata basa towera tipigumanire tekha ene pyakusowa pyathu ?
46009007	Mbani nyankhondo adathema kupipagalira yekha ene pimbavunga iye pabasa ya nkhondo ? Mbani nyakulima munda wamphesa ambakhonda kudya mphesazo ? Mbani makabuswa ambakhonda kumwa mkaka wa pifuyo pimbadyesa iye ?
46009008	Pinthu penepi ine ndikupilonga nee na nzeru za anthu zokha tayu , thangwi mwambo wa Mose ukulonga chibodzibodzi . 
46009009	Timbawerenga m'mwambo wa Mose kuti , " Lekani manga ng'ombe mlomo mwenemo ikububuda tirigu . " Pinalonga Mulungu penepi , ayi iye akutsalakana pya ng'ombe pene basi ?
46009010	Kadi penepi akupilonga thangwi ya ife tayu ? Ande , pidalemberwadi ife , thangwi nyakulima na nyakuvuna ambaphata basa na chidikhiro chakuti adzatambire khundu yawo ya pyakuvunapyo . 
46009011	Ngakhala ife tidabzala mbewu za pinthu pya uzimu pakati panu , apo mphyakunensa kuti titambire pyakusowa pyathu kubulukira kuna imwe ?
46009012	Ngakhala anango athema kutambira penepi kubulukira kuna imwe , apo ife nkhabe thema kupitambira kupiringana iwo tayu ? Kwache kuthema kweneku ife hatidaphatise basa tayu . M'mbuto mwache tidapirira papinthu pyonsene , towera tileke kutchinga anthu kutambira Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Khristu . 
46009013	Kadi imwe nkhabe dziwa tayu kuti anyakuphata basa m'Nyumba ya Mulungu ambadya pya m'nyumbamo , pontho kuti anyakupereka nsembe ambatambira kubulukira pa pinapereka iwopyo ?
46009014	Ntchibodzibodzi , Mbuya adatonga kuti anyakulalika Mphangwa Zadidi atambire pyakuakoya kubulukira pakulalika kwawo mphangwazo . 
46009015	Mbwenye ine sidaphatise basa kuthema kweneku na pang'ono pene tayu , penu ine ndikulemba kalata yeneyi nee na thangwi yakuti mundichitire pinthu penepi tayu . Mbandidakomerwa kufa pyanga kusiyana nakuti munthu unango andibulusire chinthu chimbanyadira inechi . 
46009016	Ine nkhabe kwanisa kunyada thangwi yakuti ndimbalalika Mphangwa Zadidi tayu , thangwi adandipanga kuchita tenepo ndi Mbuya . Tenepo mbandidakhonda kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi mbandidakhala wadzedze pikulu . 
46009017	Mbandidasankhula ndekha kuphata basa yeneyi , ine mbandidadikhira kupagalwi , mbwenye ndikuiphata kwene pyanga na thangvi yakuti basayi adandipasa ndi Mulungu . 
46009018	Apo penepa chinapagalwi ine ninji ? Wenewu ndi mwayi wakuti ndingalalika Mphangwa Zadidi , ndizilalike mwakukhonda pagalwi , okhonda phatisa basa kuthema kwanga kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi kuti ndipagalwi nako . 
46009019	Ine ndine mtumbe nee bitchu wa munthu na mbodzi ene tayu , kwache ndidapisanduza bitchu wa munthu onsene , towera ndinyengerere anthu azinji ene kuti akhale anyakukhulupira . 
46009020	Kuna Ayuda , ndidakhala ninga Myuda , towera ndianyengerere kuti akhale anyakukhulupira . Kuna anyakuteweza mwambo wa Mose , ndidakhalambo ninga nyakuteweza mwambo wa Mose , podi kwene kuti ine nee ndili pansi pa utongi wa mwambo wa Mose tayu , towera ndianyengerere kuti akhale anyakukhulupira . 
46009021	Kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , okhonda dziwa mwambo ale , ndidakhala ninga nyakukhonda khala Myuda , towera ndianyengerere kuti akhale anyakukhulupira . Penepi nee pikulonga kuti ine nkhabe vera matongero a Mulungu , kwache ndimbaveradi matongero a Khristu . 
46009022	Kuna anthu akuchepa chikhulupiro , ine ndidakhalambo ninga nyakuchepa chikhulupiro , towera ndianyengerere kuti akhale anyakukhulupira . Ine ndidakhala ninga chinthu chonsene kuna anthu onsene , towera na njira zonsene zakukwanisika , ndichitise anango a iwo kupulumuka . 
46009023	Pyonsenepi ndimbapichita thangwi ya Mphangwa Zadidi , towera na ine enembo ndikatambira mtsanzayiso wa mphangwazo . 
46009024	Kadi mumbapidziwa tayu kuti pabitchabitcha wakuthamanga azinji ambathamanga , kwache nyakufupirwa mbakhala mbodzi ? Tenepo kuthamanga kwanu kukhale kwakuti munadzatambira nako mfupo . 
46009025	Anyakuchita bitchabitcha , onsene ambasasanyikiratu mwadidi mwene , towera akatambire mfupo okhonda khala ndzidzi ukulu ene . Mbwenye ife timbapichita kuti tidzatambira mfupo wakukhala na kukhala . 
46009026	Ndi thangwi yache ndimbathamanga kuti ndikafikeletu pamadolomero . Ndi thangwi yache ndakhala ninga nyakumenya okhonda khwitcha . 
46009027	Ndimbachitisa manungo anga kukhala na mphamvu pakupimenya ndekha ene mbandiachitisa kukhala ninga bitchu , towera pidamala ine lalika kuna anthu anango ninga nyakuachemera kubitchabitcha , ndileke khondeswa kupita nawo bitchabitcha
46010001	Abale anga , ndinafuna kuti ndikukumbuseni pidachitikira makolo athu akale ale . Onsene adafamba pansi panthunzi wa makole mbawambuka panyanza yakufiyira . 
46010002	Onsene adabatizwa pidapita iwo m'makole na m'nyanza mule na kuphatanizana kwawo na Mose . 
46010003	Onsene adadya sasawa mkate wauzimu , 
46010004	mbamwa sasawa kumwa kwauzimu . Iwo adamwa kubulukira kumwala wauzimu , ukhaenda na iwo pabodzi ule ; mwala wenewu akhali Khristu . 
46010005	Kwache Mulungu hadakomerwa na azinji a iwo tayu , natenepo mitembo yawo idamala mwazikana m'thando . 
46010006	Chinchino pyonsene pidachitika pile mphyakuticheuza kuti tileke kusirira pinthu pyakuipa ninga pikhachita iwo . 
46010007	Tileke kupembedza mifanikizo ninga pikhachita anango a iwo . Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Anthu adakhala pansi kuti adye na kumwa , mbipisanduka kuchita pyakuzuda . "
46010008	Tileke kuchita pyakuzuda ninga pidachita anango a iwo — anthu pikwi makumawiri na pitatu mbafa nsiku ibodzi . 
46010009	Tileke kuyesa Mbuya ninga kumuyesa kudachita anango a iwo , tenepo adaphiwa na nyoka . 
46010010	Tileke dungunya ninga kudungunya kudachita anango a iwo — tenepo iwo adavungwa na Mngelo wakudzesa imfa . 
46010011	Pyonsenepyo pidachitika kuna makolo athu , towera pikhale upangizi kuna ife . Pidalembwa , towera pikhale pyakuticheuza . Thangwi tikukhala pandzidzi , ule mamalisiro ali chifupi . 
46010012	Natenepo munthu ananyerezera kuti aimira dzololoyo , achite mpholemphole kuti aleke kugwa . 
46010013	Mayesero agumanikana na imwe ndi sasawa na mayesero ambagumanikana na anthu anango onsene . Mbwenye Mulungu ngwakukhulupirika mwakuti iye nkhabe dzatawira kuti muyeswe kupiringana mphamvu zanu tayu ; kwache ndzidzi unayeswa imwe , iye mwenechiroache anadzakusasanyirani njira yakupulumuka nayo pakukupasani mphamvu zakupirira nazo . 
46010014	Tenepo , abale anga apamtima , lekani pembedza mifanikizo . 
46010015	Ndikulonga kuna imwe ninga anthu anzeru ; mupitonge mwekha ene pyalonga inepi . 
46010016	Khomitcho imbaphatisa ife basa pimbamenya ife mkate kukumbuka Mbuya , pontho imbaperekera ife takhuta kuna Mulungu tingaimwera , tonsene tikugawana m'chiropa cha Khristu . Pontho mkate umbamenya ifewu tingaudya , tikugawana m'manungo a Khristu .
