46010017	Na thangwi yakuti pana mkate ubodzi basi , podi kwene kuti ndife azinji , ifembo
46010018	Nyerezerani pya Alsraele : Pimbadya iwo nsembe zakuperekwa kuna Mulungu paguwa , ambaphatizana pabodzi na nsembe zimbapereka iwo kuna Mulungu . 
46010019	Kadi penepa ndikulonga kuti mfanikizo , penu nsembe yakuperekwa kuna mfanikizowo ndi pinthu ?
46010020	Si tenepo tayu . Mbwenye ndikulonga kuti nsembe zimbapereka anthu okhonda khala akhristu , ambazipereka kuna mizimu yakuipa , nee kuna Mulungu tayu . Tenepo ine nkhabe funa kuti muphatizane na mizimu yakuipa tayu . 
46010021	Imwe nkhabe kwanisa kumwera khomitcho ya Mbuya , na ndzidzi onthowo khomitcho ya mizimu yakuipa tayu ; imwe nkhabe kwanisa kudyera patebulu ya Mbuya , na ndzidzi onthowo patebulu ya mizimu yakuipa tayu . 
46010022	Penu tikufuna kuchitisa Mbuya kukhala wantchanje ? Ayi tikunyerezera kuti ife ndife amphamvu kupiringana iye ?
46010023	Anango alonga mbati , " Tatawiriswa kuchita pyonsene . " Mwenemo ndimomwene , kwache si pinthu pyonsene mphyakuganyalisa tayu . " Tatawiriswa kuchita pyonsene , " kwache si pinthu pyonsene mphyakuphedza tayu . 
46010024	Munthu aleke kupisakira udidi wa yekha ene , mbwenye asakirembo anango udidi . 
46010025	Muna utumbe kudya pyonsene pyakuguliswa pamsika wanyama mbamukhonda vunza , gopesera chikumbu mtima chanu . 
46010026	Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Dziko yapansi pano na pyonsene pyakukhala mwenemo mphya Mbuya . "
46010027	Ngakhala munthu okhonda khala mkhristu anakuchemera kuti ukadye kumsuwo kwache mbunyerezera pyakwendako , ukadye pinakakupasa iye mbukhonda vunza , gopesera chikumbu mtima chako . 
46010028	Mbwenye ngakhala munthu unango anakupanga kuti , " Kudya kweneku kwaperekwa kuna milungu , " leka kudya , thangwi ya nyakukupangayo , pontho thangwi ya chikumbu mtima —
46010029	chenechi si chikumbu mtima chako tayu , mbwenye chikumbu mtima cha munthu unangoyo . Penepo munthu unango anadzavunza kuti , " Kadi utumbe wanga wakuchita pinthu utongwe na chikumbu mtima cha munthu unango ? "
46010030	Ngakhala ine ndimbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi ya pimbadya ine , apo munthu unangombo anandisumuliranji thangwi ya kudya kumbaperekera ine nako takhuta kuna Mulungu ?
46010031	Natenepo pyonsene pinachita imwe , penu kudya na kumwa , pichiteni pyonsene kuti mudzese demelero kuna Mulungu . 
46010032	Mukhale na makhaliro okhonda dzesa nyatwa kuna Ayuda , penu kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , penu kuna mpingo wa Mulungu ene . 
46010033	Muchite ninga pimbachita ine ; ine ndimbayesayesa kuti anthu onsene akomerwe na pyonsene pimbachita ine . Ine nkhabe kupisakira udidi wa ine ndekha tayu , mbwenye udidi wa anthu onsene , towera iwo apulumuswe . 
46011001	Tsanzirani inetu mphapo , ninga kutsanzira Khristu kumbachita ine . 
46011002	Ndimbakusimbani thangwi ndzidzi onsene mumbandikumbuka , pontho mumbateweza pifunziso pidakupasani ine pile . 
46011003	Mbwenye ndinafuna kuti mupivesese kuti Khristu ndi msolo wa mamuna onsene , mamuna ndi msolo wa mkazache , Mulungumbo ndi msolo wa Khristu . 
46011004	Ngakhala mamuna anapemphera , penu kulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , mwenemo avala chinthu kumsolo kwache , akuchitisa manyadzo Khristu , ule ndi msoloache . 
46011005	Mbwenye mkazi angapemphera , penu kulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu okhonda vala chinthu kumsolo kwache , akuchitisa manyadzo mamunache , ule ndi msoloache ; penepo nkhabe siyana na mkazi wakuchinga mpala tayu . 
46011006	Ngakhala mkazi anakhonda vala chinthu kumsolo kwache , mphyadidi achinge tsitsi yache , penu achinge mpala . Na thangwi yakuti mphyakupasa manyadzo kuti mkazi achinge tsitsi yache , mphyadidi kuti avale chinthu kumsolo kwache . 
46011007	Mamuna nkhabe funika kuvala chinthu kumsolo kwache tayu , thangwi iye ambalandana na Mulungu mbaonesa demelero yache . Mbwenye mkazi ambaonesa demelero ya mamunache , 
46011008	thangwi mamuna hadasasanywa kubulukira kuna mkazi tayu , mbwenye mkazi adasasanywa kubulukira muna mamuna . 
46011009	Pontho mamuna hadasasanyirwe mkazi tayu , mbwenye mkazi adasasanyirwa mamuna . io Tenepo na thangwi ya angelo , mkazi athema kuvala chinthu kumsolo kwache , kuonesa kuti iye ali pansi pa utongi wa mamunache . 
46011010	
46011011	Mbwenye mukuphatanizana kwathu na Mbuya , mkazi angasowa mamuna si pinthubi , mamunambo angasowa mkazi si pinthubi . 
46011012	Mkazi adasasanywa kubulukira muna mamuna , sasawambo mamuna adabalwa na mkazi ; mbwenye Mulungu adachitisa kuti pinthu pyonsene pikhalepo . 
46011013	Pitongenimbo mwekha ngakhala mphyakuthema kuti mkazi apembedze Mulungu okhonda vala chinthu kumsolo kwache . 
46011014	Ninji apo makhaliro athu akubalwa nawo ambakufunzisani kuti mphyakupasa manyadzo kuti mamuna akhale na tsitsi yakulapha , 
46011015	mbwenye kuna mkazi ntchinthu chakumchitisa kuti akhale wakubalika ? Mulungu adapasa mkazi tsitsi yakulapha kuti ikhale chakumpsampsira nacho kumsolo kwache . 
46011016	Mbwenye ngakhala unango anafuna kupokanya penepi , inembo chinalonga ine ntchakuti , nee ife pano penu mipingo inango ya Mulungu tina mtemo unango wakupembedza nawo tayu . 
46011017	Kulonga pya matongero ali m'tchindemu , ine nkhabe kukusimbani tayu , thangwi kugumanyikana kwanu kuti mupembedze Mulungu kumbavunga pyakwanga m'mbuto mwa kuchita udidi . , 
46011018	Chakutoma ndidapangwa kuti pambakhala kukhonda vana pakati panu mungagumanyikana . Ndikukhulupira kuti penepa pana pinango pyakuonadi . 
46011019	Nkhabe penuka tayu , thangwi pakati panu pathema khala magawikano , towera anyakuchita pyamaso aoneke . 
46011020	Mungagumanyikana kumenya mkate , mumbanyerezera kuti mumbakumbuka Mbuya , kwache si tenepo tayu . 
46011021	Thangwi mungagumanyikana kudya , munthu onsene ambatomeratu kudya okhonda dikhirana , mwakuti anango ambakhala na njala mwenemo anangombo ambaledzera . 
46011022	Kadi imwe nkhabe nyumba zanu zakuti mungadyeremo na kumweramo tayu ? Penu mumbafuna kululupisa mpingo wa Mulungu na kupasa manyadzo anthu akutcherenga ? Ndilongenji kuna imwe pya penepi ? Ayi ndikusimbeni ? Sinachita tenepo na pang'ono pene tayu !
46011023	Thangwi ine ndidatambira chifunziso chidakupasani ine chile kubulukira kuna Mbuya : chifunziso chache ntchakuti mosiku udaperekwa Mbuya Yesu kuna anyamalwache ule , iye adakwata mkate , 
46011024	adapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu , adamenya mkate ule , mbalonga mbati , " Awa ndi manungo anga akuperekwa thangwi ya imwe . Chitani penepi , towera mundikumbuke . "
46011025	Pidamala iwo kudya , iye adachita chibodzibodzi . Adakwata khomitcho mbalonga mbati , " Khomitchoyi nchiverano chachinchino cha Mulungu , chakutsikimizirwa na chiropa changa . Ndzidzi onsene unachimwa imwewo , mundikumbuke . "
46011026	Penepi pikulonga kuti pandzidzi onsene unadya imwe mkatewu mbamumwera khomitchoyi , mukulalika kufa kwa Mbuya kufikirana kudza kwache . 
46011027	Natenepo munthu onsene angadya mkate wenewu , penu kumwera khomitcho ya Mbuyayi mwakukhonda thema , adawira manungo na chiropa cha Mbuya . 
46011028	Natenepo munthu mbadzati kudya mkate na kumwera khomitcho yeneyi , atome kupiona mwadidi yekha ene . 
46011029	Thangwi munthu anadya mkate , na kumwera khomitcho mwakukhonda dzindikira kuti manungo a Mbuya akulonganji , akuchitisa yekha ene kukonwa ndzidzi unadya na kumwa iye . 
46011030	Ndi thangwi yache azinji a imwe ngakusowa mphamvu , pontho ana utenda , anangombo azinji agonera kale mkono . 
46011031	Mbwenye mbatidapiona tekha ene mwadidi , nee mbatidatongwa mseru na Mulungu tayu . 
46011032	Ife timbatongwa mseru pontho kutchunyuswa na Mbuya , towera tileke konwa pabodzi na anthu a padziko yapansi pano . 
46011033	Tenepo abale anga , mungagumanyikana kuti mudye kukumbuka Mbuya , dikhiranani unango na mwanzache . 
46011034	Ngakhala unango ana njala , akadye kumsuwo kwache , towera mungagumanyikana pabodzi muleke dzakonwa pamaso pa Mulungu . Pinthu pinangombopyo ndinadzapilonga ndingadzabwera . 
46012001	Abale anga , kulonga pya mitukwa yakubulukira kuna Mzimu Wakuchena , ndinafuna kuti mupivese mwadidi . 
46012002	Mukupidziwa kuti mbamudzati sanduka kukhala akhristu , mukhadawiswa m'njira zizinji kapembedza mifanikizo yakusowa moyo . 
46012003	Na thangwi yeneyi ndapifuna kuti mupivese kuti nkhabe munthu wakutsogolerwa na Mzimu wa Mulungu anakwanisa kulonga mbati , " Yesu ngwadzedze , " pontho ngakhala munthu hanatsogolerwa na Mzimu Wakuchena tayu , iye nkhabe kwanisa kutawira na mulomo wache kuti , " Yesu ndi Mbuya ! "
46012004	Pana mitukwa ya mtundu na mtundu , mbwenye Mzimu Wakuchena mbodzi ene ndiye nyakuipereka . 
46012005	Pana njira zakusiyanasiyana zakuphatira basa , mbwenye Mbuya mbodzi ene ndiye nyakuphatirwa basayo . 
46012006	Pana mphamvu zakusiyanasiyana zakukwanisa kuphatisa basa , mbwenye Mulungu mbodzi ene ndiye nyakupereka mphamvu kuna anthu onsene zakuphatira basa inaphata iwoyo . 
46012007	Mzimu Wakuchena ambaoneka kuphata basa muna munthu onsene m'njira zinango , towera munthuyo aganyalise anango onsene . 
46012008	Mzimu Wakuchena ambapasa munthu unango mtukwa wakulonga mafala anzeru . Kuna unango Mzimu Wakuchena onthoyo ambapereka mtukwa wakulonga mafala audziwisi . 
46012009	Mzimu Wakuchena onthoyo ambapasa munthu unango chikhulupiro , unangombo ambampasa mphamvu zakuwangisa nazo utenda . 
46012010	Mzimu Wakuchena ambapasa munthu unango mphamvu zakuchita nazo pyakudodomesa ; unango mtukwa wakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu ; unangombo nzeru zakusiyanisa nazo pakati pa mitukwa yakubulukira kuna Mzimu Wakuchena na yakubulukira kwinango . Unango ambampasa mtukwa wakulonga pilongero pyachilendo , unangombo mtukwa wakuthumbusula pilongeropyo . 
46012011	Mbwenye nyakuchitisa pinthu pyonsenepi ndi Mzimu Wakuchena mbodzi onthoyo . Iye ambapereka kuna munthu onsene na kufuna kwache mitukwa ya mtundu na mtundu . 
46012012	Khristu akhala ninga manungo abodzi akukhala na mapindi mazinji . Manungo ngabodzi ene basi , podi kwene kuti ana mapindi mazinji . 
46012013	Podi tikhale Ayuda penu anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , mabitchu penu mtumbe , tabatizwa na Mzimu Wakuchena onthoyo kutisanduza kukhala manungo abodzi , pontho tonsene tapaswa Mzimu mbodziyo kuti timwe . 
46012014	Manungo hana phindi ibodzi yokha tayu , mbwenye ana mapindi mazinji . 
46012015	Ngakhala dzinyalo inalonga kuti , " Thangwi yakuti si ine dzanja , si ineve phindi ya manungo tayu , " yeneyi si thangwi ya kumulekesa kukhala phindi ya manungo tayu . 
46012016	Ngakhala khutu inalonga kuti , " Na thangwi yakuti si ine diso , si ineve phindi ya manungo tayu , " yeneyi si thangwi ya kumulekesa kukhala phindi ya manungo tayu . 
46012017	Ngakhala manungo onsene akhali diso , mbadakwanisa tani kuva ? Ngakhala akhali khutu yokha , mbadakwanisa tani kununkhiza ?
46012018	Kwache Mulungu adaikha phindi yonsene yakusiyanasiyana kumanungo ninga mudapifunira iye . 
46012019	Ngakhala mapindi onsene akhali phindi ibodzi ene basi , nee mbapadakhalave manungobi . 
46012020	Ninga muna ipyomu , mapindi alipo mazinji , mbwenye manungo ngabodzi ene basi . 
46012021	Natenepo , diso nkhabe kwanisa kulonga kuna dzanja kuti , " Ine nkhabe kukufuna tayu ! " penu msolo kukwanisa kulonga kuna dzinyalo kuti , " Ine nkhabe kukufuna tayu ! "
46012022	Kwache ndimomwene kuti nkhabe chinakwanisa ife kuchita pakusowa mapindi anango a manungo , ale ambaoneka ninga ngakusowa mphamvu , 
46012023	pontho mapindi ale ambayesa ife kuti ngakukhonda thema kulemedzwa ndiye ambatsalakana ife pikulu . Mapindi anango a manungo okhonda thema kuoniwa ndiye ambavazikwa mwadidi mwene , 
46012024	pinthu pyakuti mapindi a manungo akuthema kuoniwa nkhabe kupifuna tayu . Mulungu mwenechiroache aphatanizana manungo pabodzi tenepa , towera mapindi akusowa chilemedzo ale , alemedzwe pikulu . 
46012025	Natenepo m'manungo paleke khala magawikano , mbwenye mapindi ache onsene akusiy anas iy ana atsalakane pya unango na mwanzache . 
46012026	Ngakhala phindi ibodzi inava kupha m'manungo , mapindi anango onsene wo ambavambo kupha nayo pabodzi . Ngakhala phindi ibodzi inatambira chilemedzo , mapindi anango onsenewo ambakomerwambo nayo pabodzi . 
46012027	Monsene ndimwe manungo a Khristu , pontho munthu onsene wa imwe ndi phindi ya manungowo . 
46012028	Mulungu aikha pyonsene mumpingo m'mbuto mwache : pambuto yakutoma aikhapo anyakutumwa , pambuto yachiwiri maprofeti , pambuto yachitatu afunzisi , kubuluka penepo anyakuchita pyakudodomesa , kubuluka penepo anyakukhala na mphamvu zakuwangisa nazo utenda , penu anyakuphedza anango , penu anyakutsogolera , penu anyakulonga pilongero pyachilendo . 
46012029	Si onsene mbanyakutumwa , penu maprofeti , penu afunzisi tayu . Si onsene ana mphamvu zakuchita nazo pinthu pyakudodomesa , 
46012030	penu kuwangisa utenda , penu kulonga pilongero pyachilendo , penu kuthumbusula pilongeropyo tayu . 
46012031	Apo ikhani mtimanu pana mitukwa yakufunika pikulu . Kwache chadidiletu cha pyonsenepi chili m'tchindemu . 
46013001	Ndingakwanise kulonga na pilongero pya anthu na pya angelo pene , kwache ndingakhonda kumfuna mwanzanga , kulonga kwanga kunakhala ninga kulira kwa utale , penu kusokosa kwa nkhotcho . 
46013002	Ndingakwanise kukhala na mtukwa wakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , mbandidziwa pinthu pyonsene na kuvesa pyakubisika pyonsene ; ndingakwanise kukhala na chikhulupiro chonsene chakukwanisa kuthukusa nacho mapiri — kwache ndingakhonda kumfuna mwanzanga , ine nkhabe basa . 
46013003	Ndingakwanise kupereka pyonsene pina ine kuna anyakutcherenga , pontho ndingakwanise kupereka manungo anga kuti apitswe " — kwache ndingakhonda kumfuna mwanzanga , penepi nkhabe kundiganyalisa tayu . 
46013004	Kufunana nkhwakupirira pontho nkhwakukoma mtima ; nkhabe bivu , penu kugaya , penu kutumbama tayu . 
46013005	Kufunana nkhabe tikana , penu kupifuna kokha kwene , penu kuzhangali tayu ; kufunana nkhabe koya mangawa a pyakudawa tayu . 
46013006	Kufunana nkhabe komerwa na pyakuipa tayu , mbwenye kumbakomerwa na pyakuonadi . 
46013007	Kufunana nkhabe taya mtima ; pontho chikhulupiro chache , chidikhiro chache na kupirira kwache nkhabe chimwana tayu . 
46013008	Kufunana nkhwakukhala na kukhala . Pana mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , kwache zinadzamala . Pana mitukwa yakulonga na pilongero pyachilendo , kwache zinadzamala . Pana udziwisi , kwache unadzamala . 
46013009	Thangwi mtukwa wathu wa udziwisi na wakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu nee ngwamumphu tayu , 
46013010	mbwenye ndzidzi ungadzafika wakuti Mulungu asasanye pinthu pyonsene kukhala pyakuthema monsene mwene , penepo pinthu pyakukhonda khala pyamumphupyo pinadzamala . 
46013011	Pikhali ine mwana , kulonga kwanga , kupiona kwanga kwa pinthu na kunyerezera kwanga konsene kukhali kwauwana . Chinchino na thangwi yakuti ndine mamunamkulu , pya uwana nkhabeve napyo basa tayu . 
46013012	Pinaona ife chinchino pyakhala ninga nkhope yokhonda oneka mwadidi pa gilazi yakuonera , tenepo tinadzaona nkhope na nkhope . Chinadziwa ine chinchino ntchokhonda khala chamumphu , tenepo chenecho chinadzakhala chamumphu — ninga udziwisi wa Mulungu pana ine ngwamumphu . 
46013013	Pana pinthu pitatu pyakukhala na kukhala . Pinthu penepi mphipi : chikhulupiro , chidikhiro , na kufunana ; mbwenye kufunana nkhukulu pyakwanga kupiringana pinangopi . 
46014001	Imwe mwathema kuchita chipapo kuti mukhale nako kufunana , pontho muikhe mtima pamitukwa imbapasa Mzimu Wakuchena ile , makamaka mitukwa yakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu . 
46014002	Munthu wakulonga na pilongero pyachilendo nkhabe longa kuna anthu tayu , mbwenye kuna Mulungu , thangwi nkhabe munthu ambavesa mwadidi pinthu pinalonga iyepyo tayu . Iye ambalonga na mphamvu za Mzimu Wakuchena pinthu pyakuonadi pyakubisika . 
46014003	Mbwenye munthu wakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , ambalonga kuna anthu towera aaphedze , kuawangisa mtima , pontho kuathonthoza mtima na mphangwazo . 
46014004	Munthu wakulonga na pilongero pyachilendo ambapiphedza yekha ene , mbwenye nyakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu ambaphedza mpingo onsene . 
46014005	Ndikhafunadi kuti monsenene mulonge na pilongero pyachilendo , kwache ndikhapifuna pyakwanga pene kuti mukhale na mtukwa wakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu . Thangwi munthu wakulonga mphangwa zauprofeti zakubulukira kuna Mulungu ngwakufunika pikulu kupiringana nyakulonga na pilongero pyachilendo — pangakhonda khala munthu unango wakukwanisa kuthumbusula pinalonga iyepyo , towera mpingo onsene uphedzeke . 
46014006	Tenepo abale anga , ndingadza kuna imwe mbandilonga na pilongero pyachilendo munadzaganyalinji ? Nkhabe na pang'ono pene tayu , ndingakhonda kudza na chidziwiso chakubulukira kuna Mulungu , penu udziwisi , penu mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , penu chifunziso . 
46014007	Kwatani pinthu pyakuimbira pyakusowa moyo pyakukhala ninga chitoliro penu nyakutangale mbamuimba — apo anthu anadzadziwa tani kulira kwapyo , ngakhala pyakuimbirapyo pyadyerana ?
46014008	Ngakhala nyakuimba ngoma hanaiimba mwakuveka pyadidi tayu , anafuna dzasasanyika kuti aende kunkhondo mbani ?
46014009	Ntchibodzibodzi , apo anthu anadzavesa tani pinalonga imwepyo , ngakhala mphangwa zinalonga imwe na pilongero pyachilendo nkhabe veka mwadidi tayu ? Mafala anu anadzambuluka na mphepo . 
46014010	Pilongero pilipo pizinji padziko yapansi pano , kwache nee chibodzi chimbakhonda longa pyakuveka tayu . 
46014011	Mbwenye ine ndingakhonda dziwa chilongero chakulongwa na munthu unango , nyakulongayo anadzakhala mlendo kuna ine , inembo ndinadzakhala mlendo kuna iye . 
46014012	Na thangwi yakuti mumbaikha mtima pakukhala na mitukwa yakubulukira kuna Mzimu Wakuchena , imwe mwathema kukhala na chipapo kuphatisa basa pikulu pene mitukwa imbaphedza kuwangisa mpingo ile . 
46014013	Munthu wakulonga na pilongero pyachilendo athema kupemphera kuti akhale na mtukwa wakuthumbusula pinalonga iyepyo . 
46014014	Thangwi ngakhala ndinapemphera na pilongero pyachilendo , mzimu wanga ndiye umbapemphera , mbwenye manyerezero anga nkhabe kwatapo khundu tayu . 
46014015	Ndichitenji mphapo ? Ndinadzapemphera na mzimu wanga mbandidzapemphera na manyerezero anga . Ndinadzaimba na mzimu wanga mbandidzaimba na manyerezero anga . 
46014016	Ngakhala unapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu na mzimu wako okha , apo munthumbo wakukhala nawo penepo , okhonda dziwa pya penepi , anakwanisa tani kulonga kuti , " Ameni " kutawira kupemphera kwako kwakupereka nako takhutako ?
46014017	Podi kwene kuti kupereka kwako takhuta kuna Mulungu kukome tani , munthu unangoyo nkhabe phedzeka nako na pang'ono pene tayu . 
46014018	Ndinapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi ndimbalonga na pilongero pyachilendo kupiringana monsenene . 
46014019	Mbwenye ndikhapifuna pyakwanga pene kulonga mafala mashanu basi mumpingo , ale anakwanisa kuviwa , towera ndifunzise nawo anthu anango , kusiyana nakuti ndilonge mafala pikwipikwi na pilongero pyachilendo . 
46014020	Abale anga , lekani nyerezera ninga ana ang'ono ; papinthu pyakuipa khalani ninga ana , mbwenye akulu m'manyerezero . 
46014021	M'Malemba pyalembwa kuti , " Mbuya alonga mbati , ' Ndinadzalonga kuna anthu anga pakuphatisa basa amuna akulonga na pilongero pyachilendo . Ndinadzalonga kudzera muna milomo ya anthu achilendo , kwache anthu anga nkhabe dzandivera tayu basi . ' "
46014022	Natenepo , mkhristu angalonga na pilongero pyachilendo , ntchidzindikiro kuna anthu okhonda khala akhristu , nee kuna akhristu tayu , mbwenye mtukwa wakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu ntchidzindikiro kuna akhristu , nee kuna anthu okhonda khala akhristu tayu . 
46014023	Ngakhala mpingo onsene wagumanyikana , onsene mbatoma kulonga na pilongero pyachilendo , ayi anthu okhonda dziwa pya penepi , penu anthu okhonda khala akhristu angapita muna iwomo , nkhabe dzalonga tayu kuti monsenene mwayaluka ?
46014024	Mbwenye ngakhala onsene analonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , munthu okhonda dziwa pya penepi , penu okhonda khala mkhristu angapita muna iwomo , anadzadzindikira kudawa kwache kubulukira pa pinava iyepyo . Anadzalaswa mtima na pyonsene pyava iye . 
46014025	Manyerezero ache akubisika anadzabuluswa pakwecha , natenepo anadzalamba mbapembedza Mulungu , mbatawira mbati , " Andedi , Mulungu ali pakati panu ! "
46014026	Abale anga , penepa ndikufuna kulonga kuti , ndzidzi unagumanyikana imwe kupembedza Mulungu , munthu mbodzi ana nyimbo , unango ana chifunziso , unango ana chidziwiso chakubulukira kuna Mulungu , unango ana mphangwa zakuti alonge na pilongero pyachilendo , pontho unango wakukwanisa kuthumbusula pilongero pyachilendopyo . Pyonsenepi pyathema kuchitwa kuphedza napyo mpingo . 
46014027	Ngakhala anango anafuna kulonga na pilongero pyachilendo , athema kulonga mbawiri penu atatu basi , kwache achite kupitisirana , pontho pakhale munthu unango wakukwanisa kuthumbusula pinalongwapyo . 
46014028	Mbwenye ngakhala nkhabepo munthu wakukwanisa kupithumbusula , penepo nyakupilongayo athema kumatama mbalonge kuna yekha ene , pontho kuna Mulungu . 
46014029	Anthu awiri penu atatu athema kulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , anango onsene apione mwadidi pinalongwapyo . 
46014030	Mbwenye ngakhala munthu unango wakukhala pansi penepo atambira mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , adatoma kulongayo athema kumatama . 
46014031	Monsenene munakwanisa kulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu mwakupitisirana , towera munthu onsene afunze pontho awangiswe mtima . 
46014032	Mtukwa wakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu uli pansi pautongi wa nyakulongayo , 
46014033	thangwi Mulungu nkhabe funa kuti tikhale mwakuvunganyikana tayu , mbwenye mwamtendere . Ninga muna ipyo kuna anthu m'mipingo yonsene ya Mulungu , 
46014034	akazi athema kumatama pamigumano ; iwo nkhabe tawiriswa kulonga tayu . Iwo athema kukhala akuvera ninga mumbapilongera mwambo wa Chiyuda . 
46014035	Ngakhala iwo anafuna kudziwa pinthu pinango , akavunze amunawo angaenda kwawo . Ntchinthu chakuchitisa manyadzo kuti mkazi alonge mumpingo . 
46014036	Kani mafala a Mulungu adabulukira kuna imwe ? Penu kuti adadza kuna imwe mwekha ?
46014037	Ngakhala unango anapinyerezera kuti ndi nyakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , penu kuti ana mtukwa wauzimu , athema kudzindikira kuti pinakulemberani inepi ndi matongero a Mbuya . 
46014038	Mbwenye ngakhala iye anakhonda kuvesera penepi , imwembo lekani kumvesera . 
46014039	Tenepo , abale anga , ikhani mitimanu pakulonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , pontho lekani khondesa anthu kulonga na pilongero pyachilendo . 
46014040	Pinthu pyonsene pichitwe mwakuthema pontho mwakundendemera . 
46015001	Abale anga , ndinafuna kukukumbusani chinchino pya Mphangwa Zadidi zidalalika ine kuna imwe , pontho zidatambira imwe zile , zile ndi maziko padakhazikika chikhulupiro chanu pale . 
46015002	Mphangwa zidalalika ine kuna imwe ndi Mphangwa Zadidi . Imwe mwapulumuka ngakhala munaphatisa nganganga mphangwazo , gopesera kukhulupira kwanu kunadzakhala kwapezi . 
46015003	Ndidakupasani pidatambira ine , pile mphyakufunika kupiringana pyonsene : penepi mphyakuti Khristu adafera pyakudawa pyathu ninga munalongera Malemba ;
46015004	kuti iye adaikhwa m'masiye , pontho kuti adalamuswa kuimfa pidagwanda nsiku zitatu , ninga munalongera Malemba ;
46015005	kuti iye adaonekera kuna Peturo , pontho kubuluka penepo kuna anyakutumwa khumi na awiri ale . 
46015006	Kubuluka penepo iye adaonekera kuna anthu azinji ene kupiringana madzana mashanu a anyakumtewerache kabodzi kene , azinji ngale ana moyo na lero , podi kwene kuti anango adagonera mkono . 
46015007	Tenepo iye adaonekera kuna Yakobo , kubuluka penepo kuna anyakutumwa onsene . 
46015008	Pakumalisira pache iye adaonekerambo kuna ine . Penepi kuna ine pikhali ninga kubalwa kwa munthu nsiku zache zidzati kwana . 
46015009	Thangwi ndine wakumalisiraletu pakati pa anyakutumwa onsene . Ine nkhabe thema kuchemerwa nyakutumwa tayu , thangwi ndidasanyisa mpingo wa Mulungu . 
46015010	Mbwenye na kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu , chinchino ndili ninga munandionera imwe muno , kukoma kwache mtima nee kukhali kokhonda ganyalisa tayu . Ndidaphatadi basa mwakuwangisa kupiringana anyakutumwa anango onsene , podi kwene kuti si ine ndidaphata tayu , mbwenye kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu ndiye kudaphata basa pabodzi na ine . 
46015011	Tenepo zenezi ndi mphangwa zimbalalika ife tonsene , penu ndine ndizilalike , penu ndiwo , pontho zenezi ndi mphangwa zakhulupira imwe zile . 
46015012	Podi mphangwa zinalalika ifezi nsakuti Khristu alamuswa kuimfa , apo pikukwanisika tani kuti anthu anango alonge kuti anthu akufa hanadzalamuswa mbakhala na moyo tayu ?
46015013	Ngakhala mphyakuonadi , ndiye kuti Khristu hadalamuswe kuimfa tayu , 
46015014	pontho ngakhala Khristu hadalamuswe kuimfa tayu , pinalalika ifepi mphyapezi , pontho chikhulupiro chanu ntchapezi . 
46015015	Kuthimiza penepa ife taoneka akunama pya Mulungu , thangwi tachitira umboni kuti Mulunguyo adalamusa Khristu kuimfa . Mbwenye ngakhala mphyakuonadi kuti anthu akufa hanadzalamuswa mbakhala pontho na moyo tayu , ndiye kuti iye hadalamusa Khristu kuimfa tayu . 
46015016	Thangwi ngakhala anthu akufa hanalamuswa kuimfa tayu , ndiye kuti Khristu hadalamuswembo tayu . 
46015017	Ngakhala Khristu hadalamuswe kuimfa tayu , ndiye kuti kukhulupira kwanu nkhwapezi , pontho kudawa kwanu mukuthimiza kukhala nako basi . 
46015018	Penepa mbapidalonga pontho kuti anyakukhulupira Khristu adagonera mkono ale , ngakutayikambo . 
46015019	Ngakhala chidikhiro chathu pana Khristu ntchadidi pamoyo uno ene basi , penepo tathema kuverwa nsisi pyakwanga kupiringana munthu unango onsene padziko yapansi . 
46015020	Mbwenye pyakuonadi mphyakuti Khristu alamuswa kuimfa kutsikimiza kuti anango adagonera mkono ale , anadzalamuswambo . 
46015021	Na thangwi yakuti imfa idadza kudzera muna munthu mbodzi , sasawambo kulamuswa kuimfa kumbadza kudzera muna munthu mbodzi . 
46015022	Na thangwi yakuti anthu onsene ambafa thangwi yakuphatanizana kwawo na Adamu , sasawambo anthu onsene anadzalamuswa kuimfa , thangwi ya kuphatanizana kwawo na Khristu . 
46015023	Mbwenye munthu onsene anati adzalamuswe pandzidzi wache wakuthema : adatoma pa onsene ndi , Khristu ; kubuluka penepo pandzidzi unafuna dzabwera pontho Khristu , anthu ale ngache anadzalamuswambo . 
46015024	Tenepo kumala kwa pinthu pyonsene kunadzafika . Khristu anadzakunda mizimu yonsene yakukhala na utongi , ufumu na mphamvu , pontho anadzapereka ufumu kuna Mulungu , ule ndi Baba . 
46015025	Thangwi Khristu athema kutonga ninga mfumu kufikirana Mulungu akunde anyamalwa onsene mbaaikha pansi pamanyalo ache . 
46015026	Nyamalwa wakumalisiraletu dzakundwa anadzakhala imfa . 
46015027	Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Mulungu adaikha pinthu pyonsene pansi pamanyalo ache . " Mphyakuveka kuti mafala akuti , " pinthu pyonsene " nkhabe thimizapo tayu Mulungu mwenechiro , nyakuikha pinthu pyonsene pansi pa utongi wa Khristu ule . 
46015028	Mbwenye pinthu pyonsene pingamala ikhwa pansi pa utongi wa Khristu , penepo iye , Mwanayo , anadzapiikha ekha ene pansi pa utongi wa Mulungu , adaikha pinthu pyonsene pansi pa utongi wa Khristu ule , tenepo Mulungu anadzakhala na utongi monsene mwene pa pyonsene . 
46015029	Ngakhala nkhabe kulamuka kuimfa , apo anthu ale ambabatizwa m'mbuto mwa anthu akufa akuchitanji ? Ngakhala anyakufa hanadzalamuswave kuimfa tayu , apo ninji anthu ambabatizwa m'mbuto mwa anyakufa ?
46015030	Apo ifembo , ninji tikupipereka kuna pyakugoswa ndzidzi onsene ?
46015031	Abale anga , nsiku na nsiku imfa ndimbaiona ! Ndikulonga penepi thangwi ya kukunyadirani kwanga m'moyo wathu wakuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . 
46015032	Ngakhala ndidamenyana na anthu a ku Efeso akhakhala ninga pirombo pyantsanga ale , pakuteweza kwene manyerezero aumunthu , penepo ndaganyalinji ? Ngakhala anyakufa hanadzalamuswa tayu , tenepo tichite ninga munalongerwa ipyo kuti , " Tendeni tidye na kumwa pyathu , podi mangwana tinafa . "
46015033	Lekani kupinyengeza . " Kuphatizana na anthu akuipa kumbaipisa makhaliro adidi . "
46015034	Kungunukani , pontho lekani makhaliro anu akudawa . Mwathema kuchita manyadzo na pinakupangani inepi kuti anango pakati panupa ngokhonda dziwa Mulungu . 
46015035	Unango anati avunze mbati , " Pingakwanisike tani kuti anthu akufa adzalamuswe kuimfa ? Iwo angadzalamuswa anadzakhala na manungo amtundu wanji ? "
46015036	Pupwewe ! Ungabzala mbewu m'mataka , iyo nkhabe mera tayu ingakhonda kufa . 
46015037	Tenepo chinabzala iwecho ndi mbewu ene pyayo , penu ya tirigu , penu inango ene , nee si mmera unafuna dzamera ule tayu . 
46015038	Mbwenye Mulungu ambaisanduza mbewuyi kukhala na manungo anango ninga montho munapifunira iye ; iye ambapasa mbewu yonsene manungo ache ene akuthemerana na iyo . 
46015039	Mnofu wa pinthu pyamoyo nkhabe khala sasawa tayu ; mnofu wa munthu ngwamtundu unango , wa nyama ngwamtundu unango , wa mbalame ngwamtundu unango , pontho wa nsomba ngwamtundu unangombo . 
46015040	Pana pinthu pya kudzulu na pya pansi pano ; kubalika kwa pinthu pya kudzulu nkhwakusiyana na kubalika kwa pinthu pya pansi pano . 
46015041	Dzuwa ina kubalika kwache , mwezi una kubalika kwawo , nyenyezimbo zina kubalika kwazo , pontho na pakati pa nyenyezi pene pana kubalika kwakusiyanasiyana . 
46015042	Pinadzakhalambo sasawa anthu akufa angadzalamuswa . Tingaikha manungo m'masiye , ambakhala akuvunda ; mbwenye angadzalamuswa , anadzakhala okhonda vunda . 
46015043	Manungo angaikhwa m'masiye ambakhala okhonda balika pontho akusowa mphamvu , mbwenye angadzalamuswa , anadzakhala akubalika pontho amphamvu . 
46015044	Manungo ambaikhwa m'masiye ngakubalwa nawo , mbwenye anafuna dzalamuswa , anadzakhala manungo auzimu . Tenepo ngakhala pana manungo akubalwa nawo , pathema pontho kukhala manungo auzimu . 
46015045	Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Adamu , munthu wakutoma ule , adalengwa wamoyo . " Mbwenye Adamu , wakumalisa ule , ndi Mzimu wakupasa moyo . 
46015046	Chimbatoma kudza si manungo auzimu tayu , mbwenye manungo akubalwa nawo , kubuluka penepo manungo auzimu . 
46015047	Adamu , munthu wakutoma ule , adabulukira pansi pano , pontho adasasanywa na mataka . Mbwenye Adamu wachiwiri ule , adabulukira kudzulu . 
46015048	Ale ngapansi pano akhala ninga munthu adasasanywa na mataka ule , mbwenye ale ngakudzulu akhala ninga munthu adabulukira kudzulu ule . 
46015049	Chinchino ninga montho mwalandana ife na munthu wakusasanywa na mataka , sasawambo tinadzalandana na munthu wakubulukira kudzulu ule . 
46015050	Abale anga , chinalonga ine ntchakuti mnofu na chiropa nkhabe kwanisa kukwata khundu mu Ufumu wa Mulungu tayu , pontho pinthu pimbavunda pile nkhabe kwanisa kukwata khundu pa pyokhonda vunda pile tayu . 
46015051	
46015052	
46015053	Thangwi pinthu pyakuvunda pyathema kusanduzwa pyokhonda vunda , pinthu pyakufa pyathema sanduzwa pyokhonda kufa . 
46015054	Tenepo manungo ambavundawa angadzasanduzwa okhonda vunda , pontho manungo ambafa ale , angadzasanduzwa okhonda kufa , penepo pinadzakwanakwanadi pinalonga Malemba pile kuti , " Imfa yafudzwa pontho yakundwa monsene mwene ! "
46015055	" Iwe , Imfa , kukunda kwako kuli kupi ? Iwe , Imfa , mphamvu zako zakukuwaza nazo zili kupi ? "
46015056	Mphamvu za imfa zakukuwaza nazo anthu zimbabulukira kuna pyakudawa , pyakudawambo pimbakhala na mphamvu thangwi ya mwambo . 
46015057	Mbwenye tipereke takhuta kuna Mulungu , ule ambatichitisa kukunda kudzera muna Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu !
46015058	Natenepo , abale anga apamtima , imirani dzololo , pontho lekani tekenyeka . Ndzidzi onsene phatani basa ya Mbuya na chipapo , thangwi imwe mukupidziwa kuti basa imbaphatira imwe Mbuyayi , si yakusowa basa tayu . 
46016001	Kulonga pya chakupereka chidalemba imwe kuti chiperekwe kuphedza nacho anthu a Mulungu mu Yudea , imwe mwathema kuchita pinthu pidalonga ine kuna mipingo ya m'nthemba ya Galatia . 
46016002	Pansiku ya Dimingu yonsene munthu onsene wa imwe athema kupambula kobiri zidaganyali iye , mbizikoyiwe , towera ine ndingadzabwera palekeve dzakhala kusonkhesa tayu . 
46016003	Tenepo ndingadzafika ndinadzapereka makalata a umboni kuna anthu asankhula imwe ale , inembo ndinadzaatuma kuti akapereke mitukwanuyo ku Yerusalemu . 
46016004	Mbwenye ngakhala mphyakufunika kuti ine ndiendembo , penepo iwo anakwanisa kwenda nane pabodzi pene . 
46016005	Ndinadzafika kwanuko , ndingamala fambira m'nthemba ya Makedonia — thangwi ndathema kugwanda na m'nthemba ya Makedonia . 
46016006	Mwinango ndinakhala namwe kwanuko ndzidzi ene , penu mainja onsene , towera imwe mukwanise kundiphedza kuthimiza ulendo wanga konsene kunafuna ine dzaenda . 
46016007	Thangwi ine nkhabe funa kukuonani mwachigwandira kwene tayu paulendo wanga unaenda inewu , mbwenye Mbuya angapifuna , ndikudikhira kukhala namwe ndzidzi ene . 
46016008	Ndinati ndikhale mumzinda wa Efeso muno kufikirana nsiku ya Pentekosti ikwane , 
46016009	thangwi njira zafungulwa zakuti ndinakwanisa kuphata basa mwadidi , podi kwene kuti anyakundipokanya ainjipa . 
46016010	Ngakhala Timoti anadza kwanuko muonesese kuti mwamtambira mwadidi pakati panu , thangwi iye akuphatira basa Mbuya ninga munachitira inembo . 
46016011	Paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakumyang'ana na diso ibodzi , mbwenye mumphedze kuthimiza ulendo wache mwamtendere , towera abwerere kuna ine kuno ; thangwi ndikumdikhira kudza kuno pabodzi na abale anango . 
46016012	Kulonga pya mbale Apolo . Ndidamdembetera kazinji kene kuti akufambireni pabodzi pene na abale anango , kwache iye hakhafuna tayu kuti aende ndzidzi wenewu . Mbwenye angadzagumana ndzidzi wadidi , anati adze . 
46016013	Khalani m'maso , khalani dzololo m'chikhulupiro chanu , pontho khalani anthu akuwanga mtima na amphamvu . 
46016014	Pyonsene pinachita imwe mupichite mwakufunana . 
46016015	Imwe mukupidziwa kuti Stefanasi na banjache mbanthu akutoma kusanduka akhristu m'nthemba ya Akaya , pontho kuti apipereka okha ene kutumikira anthu a Mulungu . Ndikukupemphani imwe abale anga kuti
46016016	imwe muvere anthu ninga enewa , pontho na ale onsene ambaphata basa na kutumukira nawo pabodzi . 
46016017	Ndakomerwa pyakwanga na kudza kwachita Stefanasi , Fortunato na Akaiko , thangwi iwo achita pinthu kuna ine ninga ndimwe mukupichita , podi kwene kuti imwe pakhali nkhabepo . 
46016018	Iwo adanditsitsimusa pyakwanga , ninga pidachita iwo kuna imwe . Anthu ninga enewa athema kulemedzwa . 
46016019	Mipingo ya m'nthemba ya Asia ikupereka mwenyikiro kuna imwe ; Akila na Priskila , pontho mpingo onsene umbagumanyikana m'nyumba mwawo kupemphera ule ukupereka kuna imwe mwenyikiro wachikhristu mwakukomerwa . 
46016020	Abale onsene kuno akupereka mwenyikiro . Pasanani mwenyikiro wachikhristu kuonesa kufunana kwanu unango na mwanzache . 
46016021	Na dzanja yanga ene ndikulemba mafalawa awa : Mwenyikiro wakubulukira kuna ine , Paulo . 
46016022	Munthu anakhonda funa Mbuyayo , dzedze kuna iye . Mbuyathu , bwerani !
46016023	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuya Yesu kukhale namwe . 
46016024	Kukufunani kwanga kukhale namwe monsenene kudzera muna Khristu Yesu . 
47001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyakutumwa wa Yesu Khristu na kufuna kwa Mulungu , pontho na kuna mbaleathu Timoti — Kwenda kuna mpingo wa Mulungu mu Korinto , pontho kuna anthu onsene a Mulungu m'nthemba yonsene ya Akaya . 
47001002	Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Babathu pontho Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale namwe . 
47001003	Tendeni tipereke takhuta kuna Mulungu Baba wa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , Baba wa nsisi , Mulungu ambatiphedza monsene mwene ule . 
47001004	Iye ambatiphedza panyatwa zathu zonsene , towera ifembo tikwanise kuphedza anthu anango ale ana nyatwa za mtundu na mtundu na chiphedzo chonthocho chidatambira ife kubulukira kuna Mulungu . 
47001005	Ninga munakwatira ife khundu m'nyatwa zizinji za Khristu , monthomonthomo ifembo kudzera muna Khristu takwata khundu m'chiphedzo chikulu cha Mulungu . 
47001006	Ngakhala ife tinaona nyatwa , ndi thangwi ya kufuna kuphedza na kupulumusa imwepo ; ngakhala ife tinaphedzwa , na imwe enembo munaphedzwa pontho na kukuchitisani kuti mukhale na mphamvu zakupirira nazo nyatwa sasawa ninga munapirira ifembo . 
47001007	Tenepo chidikhiro chathu pana imwe nkhabe tekenyeka tayu ; ife tikupidziwa kuti ninga munasanyikira imwe pabodzi na ife , munati mudzatambirembo chiphedzo pabodzi na ife . 
47001008	Tikufuna kuti mudziwe , abale , pya nyatwa zikhadaona ife kunthemba ya Asia . Mitolo idathukuliswa ife ikhali ikulu pyakwanga mwakuti tidataya mtima pyakukhala na moyo . 
47001009	Tikhaona ninga tathema kufa . Mbwenye penepi pidachitika , towera tileke kupinyindira tekha ene , mbwenye tinyindire Mulungu ene basi , nyakulamusa anthu kuimfa ule . 
47001010	Iye adatipulumusa kuna pyakugoswa pya imfafl ninga penepi , pontho anati adzatipulumuse ; tenepo ife taikha chidikhiro chathu pana iye towera iye athimize kutipulumusa , 
47001011	ndzidzi unatiphedza imwe pakutipempherera . Tenepo kutipempherera kwanu kukulu kunadzaveka kuna Mulungu , iyembo anadzatitsanzayisa , natenepo anthu azinji anadzamkuza , kupereka takhuta kuna iye thangwi ya ife pano . 
47001012	Chinthu chimbanyadira ife ntchakuti chikumbu mtima chathu chimbachitira umboni pyonsene pyachita ife padziko yapansi pano , maka ubale wa pakati pa imwe na ife tapichita na mtima wakuchena pontho na mtima onsene , pile pikhali pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu kudzera muna kukoma kwache mtima , nee na thangwi ya nzeru za anthu tayu . 
47001013	
47001014	
47001015	Podi ndidakhulupiradi penepi , ndidanyerezera kuti nditome fambira imwepo , towera mutsanzayiswe na kundiona kwanu kachiwiri . 
47001016	Thangwi ndidanyerezera pya kukufambirani paulendo wanga wakwenda ku Makedonia , pontho na pakubwerera panga pene , towera ndikwanise kuphedzwa na imwepo paulendo wanga wa ku Yudea . 
47001017	Pikhasasanya ine penepi , ayi mukhandiona ninga ndikhapichita mwadzenda ? Ndingasasanya kuchita pinthu ayi ndimbapisasanya ninga munthu wa padziko yapansi wakusasanyika kulonga mbati , " Ande , ande " , pontho " Tayu , tayu " pandzidzi ubodzi ?
47001018	Mulungu athemadi kunyindirwa , natenepo pinthu pimbakupangani ife si " Ande " na " Tayu " tayu . 
47001019	Thangwi Yesu Khristu , Mwana Mulungu , akhalalikwa pakati panu na Sila , Timoti na ine ule , si " Ande " na " Tayu " tayu , mbwenye ndzidzi onsene akhali " Ande " wa Mulungu . 
47001020	Thangwi kudzera muna Khristu pinthu pyonsene pidadumbira Mulungu kudzapichita ndi " Ande " . Ndi thangwi yache kudzera muna Yesu Khristu " Ameni " ambalonga ife , ambalongwa kudzesa demelero kuna Mulungu . 
47001021	Ndi Mulungu mwenechiro , ule ambachitisa ife pabodzi pene na imwe kukhala akukhazikika m'moyo wathu wakuphatanizana na Khristu ; ndi Mulungu mwenechiro , ule achitisa kuti tikhale anthu akupambulika , 
47001022	ule aikha chidzindikiro pana ife chakuonesa kuti ndife ache , pontho ule atipasa Mzimu Wakuchena m'mitima mwathu kuti akhale chitsikimizo cha pyonsene pinafuna ife dzatambira pile . 
47001023	Ndikupempha Mulungu kukhala mboni yanga — iye ambadziwa mtimanga ! Ine sidafuna pya kukutsukwalisani tayu , ndi thangwi yache ndidanyerezera kukhonda kudza ku Korintoko . 
47001024	Pinachita inepi , si kuyesa kukukakamizani kukhulupira pinthu pyathema imwe kukhulupira tayu ; tikupidziwa kuti imwe ndimwe anthu akuimira dzololo pachikhulupiro . M'mbuto mwache pinafuna ife mphyakuti tiphate basa pabodzi na imwe towera mukhale akukomerwa . 
47002001	Tenepo ndidanyerezeradi nee kudza pontho kwanuko kudzakutsukwalisani tayu . 
47002002	Ngakhala ine ndinakutsukwalisani , mbani mphapo , anadzasala kuti anditsanzayise ? Anthu ache ngonthowo atsukwalisa ine ale . 
47002003	Ndi thangwi yache ndidakulemberani kalata ile — ine sidafuna tayu kudza kwanuko , gopesera imwe ene ale mudathema kunditsanzayisa , munanditsukwalisa . Ndikukhulupiradi kuti ndzidzi unakomerwa ine kuno , imwembo mumbakomerwa kweneko . 
47002004	Mukhalemba ine kalata ile kuna imwe , mtimanga udasanyika na kutsukwala pikulu , pontho ndikhagwesa misozi izinji . Ine sidafuna kukutsukwalisani tayu , mbwenye maka kuti ndikuoneseni kukufunani kwanga . 
47002005	Chinchino , ngakhala pana unango atsukwalisa mwanzache , iye hadatsukwalise ine tayu , mbwenye atsukwalisa imwe monsene m'njira zinango . ( Ndikulonga tenepo thangwi ine nkhabe funa kumnensa pyakwanga munthu ninga weneyu tayu . )
47002006	Pyakwana kuti munthu weneyu atchunyuswa na anthu azinji ninga tenepa . 
47002007	Mbwenye chinchino imwe mwathema kumlekerera kudawa kwache , pontho mumuwangise mtima , gopesera anatsukwala pikulu mbatayaletu mtima . 
47002008	Natenepo ndikukupemphani kuti mumtsikimizire kuti mumbamfuna chadichadi . 
47002009	Ndidakulemberani kalata ile thangwi ndidafuna kukuyesani kuona ngakhala ndzidzi onsene mwasasanyika kuveradi pidakupangani ine pile . 
47002010	Imwe mungalekerera mwanzanu thangwi ya kudawa kwacheko , ine ndamlekererambo . Thangwi ndzidzi unalekerera ine , ngakhala pana chinthu chakuti ndilekerere , ndalekerera pamaso pa Khristu thangwi ya imwepo , 
47002011	towera tileke tawirisa Satana kutidyera mkopekope thangwi tikudziwa machenjerero ache . 
47002012	Pidafika ine mumzinda wa Troa kalalika Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Khristu , ndidagumana kuti Mbuya akhadafungula kale msuwo kuti ndikaphate basa kweneko . 
47002013	Kwache ndidasanyika pikulu mumtima mwanga , thangwi mbaleanga , Tito , sidamgumanako tayu . Natenepo ndidagonekana na anthu kweneko mbandienda ku Makedonia . 
47002014	Mbwenye takhuta kuna Mulungu ule , thangwi mukuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu , ndzidzi onsene ambatitsogolera pamlikiti wakusekera kukunda kwa Khristu . Mulungu ambatiphatisa basa kuti tivekese mbiri ya Khristu konsene kwene ninga khwema yadidi . 
47002015	Thangwi ife takhala ninga khwema yadidi yakuperekwa na Khristu kuna Mulungu , ile imbanunkhira pakati pa anthu akupulumuka pontho na anthu akutayika ene . 
47002016	Kuna anthu akutayika ale , ndi khwema ya imfa imbaapha , mbwenye kuna akupulumuka ale , ndi khwema yadidi imbaapasa moyo . Apo , mbani anakwanisa kuphata basa ninga yeneyi ?
47002017	Ife nee takhala ninga anthu anango azinji ale tayu , ale ambaphata basa ya Mulungu ninga malonda , mbwenye podi Mulungu atituma , ndi thangwi yache tikulonga na mtima onsene pamaso pache ninga anyabasa a Khristu . 
47003001	Kadi tikulonga kuti tatoma pontho kupichitira umboni tekha ene ? Penu kuti pinafunika kuti ifembo , sasawa ninga anthu anangowa , tikhale na makalata akutichitira umboni kuna imwe , penu akubulukira kuna imwepo ?
47003002	Kalatathu ya umboni ndimwepo , yakulembwa m'mitima mwathu yakuti munthu onsene anakwanisa kuidziwa pontho kuiwerenga . 
47003003	Mphyakuveka mwadidi kuti Khristu makayo ndiye adalemba kalata yeneyi mbaitumiza kudzera muna ife pano . Iyo hidalembwa na tinta tayu , mbwenye na Mzimu wa Mulungu wamoyo , pontho hidalembwa pamwala tayu , mbwenye m'mitima ya anthu . 
47003004	Tikulonga tenepa thangwi timbanyindira Mulungu pikulu kudzera muna Khristu . 
47003005	Thangwi muna ife tekha nkhabe chinthu na chibodzi chene tayu chile chinatichitisa kulonga kuti tinakwanisa kuphata basa yeneyi . Kukwanisa kuna ife kuchita nako penepi kumbabulukira kuna Mulungu ;
47003006	ndiye ene onthoyo ule adachitisa kuti ife tikwanise kutumikira chiverano chachinchino , chile nee china mwambo wakuchita kulembwa tayu , mbwenye wa Mzimu Wakuchena . Mwambo wakuchita kulembwa umbadzesa imfa , mbwenye Mzimu Wakuchena ambapasa moyo . 
47003007	Mwambo wa Mose udalembwa pakuchita kugoba pamwala , tenepo demelero ya Mulungu idaoneka pandzidzi udaperekwa mwambo wo . Demeleroyo idang'azimira pyakwanga mwakuti anthu a ku Israele hadakwanise kuyang'anisisa nkhope ya Mose tayu , podi kwene kuti kung'azimirako kukhathima . Ngakhala mwambo wakukhala na mphamvu zakudzesa imfa udadza na demelero ninga yeneyi , 
47003008	apo ndi tani na demelero ya mabasa a Mzimu Wakuchena !
47003009	Ngakhala basa imbachitisa anthu kukonwa ile njademelero , apo ndi tani na basa yakuchitisa anthu kuti apulumuke !
47003010	Na thangwi yakuti yaoneka demelero yakung'azimira pikulu pene , demelero yakale , ikhaoneka ninga yakung'azimira ile , chinchino yathima . 
47003011	Ngakhala pinthu pyakuthima pile pikhali na demelero ndzidzi pang'ono basi , apo ndi tani na demelero ya pinthu pile mphyakukhala na kukhala !
47003012	Na thangwi yakuti tina chidikhiro chenechi ife tawanga mtima pikulu . 
47003013	Ife nkhabe khala ninga Mose tayu , ule akhampswampswika nkhope yache na nguwo , towera anthu a ku Israele aleke kuona kumalisika kwa kuthima kwa cheza cha demelero kunkhope kwache . 
47003014	Ndimomwene kuti manyerezero awo adafungika ; tenepo na lero manyerezero awo ampswampswirwa na nguwo ndzidzi unawerenga iwo mabukhu a chiverano chakale chile . Chakumpswampswira chenechi chimbakunundulwa munthu angaphatanizana na Khristu basi . 
47003015	Podi na lero ene iwo angawerenga mwambo wa Mose , chakumpswampswirachi champswampswira basi manyerezero awo . 
47003016	Mbwenye chakumpsampsira chimbakunundulwa munthu angazungunukira kuna Mbuya .
47003017	Chinchino " Mbuya " m'ndime yeneyi ndi Mzimu ; tenepo kule kuna Mzimu wa Mbuya , konthoko kuna utumbe . 
47003018	Ife tonsene takhala ninga gilazi kuonesa demelero ya Mbuya na nkhope zakusowa chakumpswampswira , tenepo demelero yonthoyo , ile imbabulukira kuna Mbuya , ule ndi Mzimu , imbatisanduza na demelero yakuthimiza kuinjipa kukhala ninga iye . 
47004001	Na kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu iye atipasa basa yeneyi kuti tiphate , natenepo ife nkhabe taya mtima tayu . 
47004002	Taleka pinthu pyonsene pyakupasa manyadzo pikhachita ife m'chibisobiso pile ; ife nkhabe chita pinthu mwakunama , penu kupotoza Mafala a Mulungu tayu . M'mbuto mwache timbalonga pakwecha pyakuonadi kupichitira umboni tekha ene kuna chikumbu mtima cha anthu onsene pamaso pa Mulungu . 
47004003	Thangwi ngakhala Mphangwa Zadidi zimbalalika ifezi nsakubisika , nsakubisika kuna anthu akutayika ene ale basi . 
47004004	Iwo nkhabe khulupira tayu , thangwi mulungu wakuipa wapansi pano aphimbira manyerezero awo , towera akhonde kwanisa kuona cheza , chile chimbabulukira mu Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya demelero ya Khristu , ule alandana na Mulungu monsene mwene . 
47004005	Thangwi ife nkhabe lalika pya ife tayu , mbwenye timbalalika Yesu Khristu , kuti ndiye Mbuya , pontho kuti ife ndife anyabasanu thangwi ya Yesu . 
47004006	Mulungu nyakulonga kuti , " Cheza chioneke kubulukira mumdima ! " ndi Mulungu ontho ule adachitisa kuti cheza chenechi chitimwinikire m'mitima mwathu , towera tidziwe demelero ya Mulungu , imbamwinikira kubulukira kunkhope ya Khristu ile . 
47004007	Mbwenye ife takhala ninga chikalango chakukoyeramo mfuma yauzimu , kutsikimiza kuti mphamvu zikulu ninga zenezi zimbabulukira kuna Mulungu , nee kuna ife tayu . 
47004008	Ndzidzi uzinji timbapondedzwa , kwache nee timbapeyeka tayu ; ndzidzi unango timbasanyika mumtima mwathu , kwache nee timbataya mtima tayu ;
47004009	anyamalwathu ngazinji , kwache ashamwali tili nawo basi ; penu ndzidzi uzinji tasanyiswa pikulu pene , ife nkhabe vungika tayu . 
47004010	Ndzidzi onsene timbafamba nayo imfa ya Yesu m'manungo mwathu , towera moyo wache uonekembo m'manungo mwathumu . 
47004011	M'moyo wathu onsene timbaona pyakugoswa pya imfa thangwi ya kutumikira Yesu , towera moyo wache uoneke m'manungo mwathu ambafa ale . 
47004012	Kweneku nkhulonga kuti imfa ikuphata basa muna ife , mbwenye moyo ukuphata basa muna imwe . 
47004013	Malemba akulonga kuti , " Ndalonga thangwi ndidakhulupira . " Na mzimu onthowo wakukhala na chikhulupiro ifembo timbalonga thangwi timbakhulupira . 
47004014	Tikupidziwa kuti Mulungu , adalamusa Mbuya Yesu kuimfa ule , anadzalamusambo ife pabodzi na Khristu mbadzatikwata , pabodzi pene na imwe , pamaso pache . 
47004015	Pyonsenepi mphyakuganyalisa imwepo , towera kuinjipa kwa kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kuthimizirike kufikira anthu azinji , kuchitise kuti iwo anyanye kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu mwakudzesa demelero kuna iye . 
47004016	Na thangwi yeneyi ife nkhabe taya mtima tayu . Podi kwene kuti manungo athu akwenda mbavunda , kwache mzimu wathu ukusanduswa utswa nsiku na nsiku . 
47004017	Tenepo nyatwa zakuchepa pontho zabanga phata zinaona ifezi zinadzatidzesera demelero yakukhonda mala , demelero ikulu pyakwanga yakupiringana nyatwazi . 
47004018	Timbaikha maso athu phanamana pana pinthu pyokhonda oneka , nee pana pinthu pyakuoneka tayu . Thangwi pinthu pyakuoneka mphyabanga phata , mbwenye pinthu pyokhonda oneka na maso mphyakukhala na kukhala . 
47005001	Thangwi tikupidziwa kuti m'khumbi munakhala ife mule — manungo athu apansi pano — ingafudzika , Mulungu atisasanyira nyumba yakuti tikakhalemo kudzulu , nyumba yasasanya iye mwenechiro , ile inadzakhala yakukhala na kukhala . 
47005002	Ndi thangwi yache chinchino tikubulira , pontho kukhumba pikulu pene kuti Mulungu ativazike na nyumba yathu yakudzuluyo . 
47005003	Tingadzaivala , nee tinadzakhalave akusowa manungo tayu . 
47005004	Ndzidzi unakhala ife m'khumbi yapansi pano , tikubulira pontho kuva kupha thangwi ya nyatwa zinaona ife , nee kuti tikufuna kudula manungo athu apansi pano tayu , mbwenye kuti tikufuna kuvala manungo akudzulu , towera pinthu pimbavunda pile pisanduzwe moyo okhonda mala . 
47005005	Mulungu ndiye adatisasanyira pinthu penepi , pontho adatipasa Mzimu Wakuchena kukhala chitsikimizo cha pinthu pyonsene pinafuna ife dzatambira . 
47005006	Natenepo ndzidzi onsene timbawanga mtima . Tikupidziwa kuti ndzidzi onsene unakhala ife m'manungo , ale ndi nyumba yapansi pano , till kutali na Mbuya . 
47005007	Moyo wathu wagona pachikhulupiro , nee papinthu pimbaona ife tayu . 
47005008	Tawanga mtima pyakwanga mbatipifuna pyakwanga kusiya nyumbathu yapansi pano kuti tikakhale kunyumba ya Mbuya . 
47005009	Kupiringana pyonsene , chinafuna ife ntchakuti , ndzidzi una ife m'nyumba yapansi pano , penu ya kuna iyeko , ife tichite pinthu pyakumkomera . 
47005010	Thangwi tonsenefe tathema dzatongwa mseru pamaso pa Khristu . Munthu onsene anadzatambira pinthu pyakuthemerana na pinthu pyonsene pyaphata iye m'manungo ache apansi pano , pyadidi , penu pyakuipa . 
47005011	Na thangwi yakuti ife tikupidziwa kuti kugopa Mbuya ninji , ife timbayesayesambo kunyengerera anthu anango . Mulungu ambatidziwa monsene mwene , tenepo ndina chidikhiro kuti imwembo mumbandidziwa m'mitima mwanumo . 
47005012	Ife nkhabe yesa pontho kupichitira tekha ene umboni kuna imwe tayu , mbwenye kuti tikupaseni mathangwi adidi akuti munakwanisa kutinyadira nawo , towera mukwanise kutawira mwadidi anthu ale ambanyadira makhaliro awo akunja , nee pya mumtima tayu . 
47005013	Ngakhala talongwa kuti tayaluka , pikhale tenepo kulemedza napyo Mulungu . Mbwenye ndimomwene kuti tina nzeru , kuphedza nazo imwepo . 
47005014	Kutifuna kwa Khristu ndiye kumbatikakamiza , podi chinchino tadzindikira kuti munthu mbodzi adafera anthu onsene , natenepo anthu onsene adafambo . is lye adafera anthu onsene , towera anthu ana moyo ale alekeve khala na moyo wakufuna kupichitisa okha ene kukomerwa , mbwenye kuti achitise iye kukomerwa , ule adafa mbalamuswa kuimfa thangwi ya iwo . 
47005015	
47005016	Natenepo kubulukira lero kwenda m'tsogolo ife nkhabeve tonga mseru munthu na mbodzi ene mwakuteweza nzeru za anthu tayu . Podi kwene kuti ndzidzi unango ife tidatonga Khristu mwakuteweza nzeru za anthu , ife nkhabe chitave tenepo tayu . 
47005017	Ngakhala munthu anaphatanizana na Khristu , iye ambasanduka chakulengwa chachinchino ; pyakale pyaenda , pyachinchino pyadza . 
47005018	Pyonsene pimbachitwa na Mulungu , ule kudzera muna Khristu adatichitisa kuti tikhale pontho ashamwali ache , pontho adatipasa basa yakuti tichitisembo anthu anango kuti akhale pontho ashamwali ache . 
47005019	Mphangwa zina ife nsakuti Mulungu akhachitisa kuti anthu onsene akhale pontho ashamwali ache kudzera muna Khristu . Mulungu hadakoye mangawa pana pyakudawa pyawo tayu , pontho iye atipasa mphangwa zakupanga anthu pya mule mumbaachitisira iye kukhala pontho ashamwali ache . 
47005020	Apo , chinchino , tikulonga m'mbuto mwa Khristu , khala ninga Mulungu maka ndiye akulonga namwe mwakukudembeterani kudzera muna ife . Ife tikukupemphani m'mbuto mwa Khristu : mlekeni Mulungu akuchitiseni kuti mukhale pontho ashamwali ache . 
47005021	Khristu akhali nyakukhonda dawa , mbwenye Mulungu adamsanduza kukhala ninga nyakudawa thangwi ya ife , towera mukuphatanizana kwathu na iye tisanduke anthu akulungama pamaso pa Mulungu . 
47006001	Podi , chinchino , tikuphata basa pabodzi na Mulungu , tikukudembeterani imwe , ale mwatambira kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu , kuti muleke tawirisa pidatambira imwe pile kuti pivungike . 
47006002	Ngavani pinalonga Mulungu kuti : " Pidafika ndzidzi wakuti ndikuoneseni kukoma kwanga mtima ndidakuvani ; pidafika nsiku yakuti ndikupulumuseni ndidakuphedzani . " Ngavani kuno ! Uno ndi ndzidzi unakomera Mulungu anthu mtima ; lero ndi nsiku yakupulumuka . 
47006003	Ife nkhabe funa munthu na mbodzi ene kuti alulupise basa inaphata ifeyi tayu , natenepo ife nkhabe yesa na pang'ono pene kutchinga njira ya munthu na mbodzi ene tayu . 
47006004	M'mbuto mwache papinthu pyonsene pimbachita ife timbaonesa kuti ndife anyabasa a Mulungu pakupirira kwathu pikulu panyatwa , kusanyika , pontho pyakunensa . 
47006005	Ife tamenywa , taikhwa m'perezo , pontho taputwa na mwinji ; taphata basa mwakupiringana mdida , pontho ndzidzi unango tikhakhala nee gona penu kudya tayu . 
47006006	Mbwenye na mtima wakuchena , udziwisi , kupirira na kukoma mtima kwathu , taonesa kuti ndife anyabasa a Mulungu — na mphamvu ya Mzimu Wakuchena , na kufunana kwathu chadichadi , 
47006007	na mphangwa zathu zakuonadi zimbalalika ife , pontho na mphamvu ya Mulungu . Chilungamo chakhala ninga chida m'manja mwathu chakumenya na chakutchinjiriza nacho . 
47006008	Ife timbalemedzwa pontho timbalulupiswa ; timbatikanwa pontho timbasimbwa ; timbayeswa ninga akunama , kwache timbalonga pyakuonadi ;
47006009	timbayeswa ninga anthu okhonda dziwika , kwache anthu onsene ambatidziwa ; timbayeswa ninga anthu akufa , kwache tina moyo ninga munationera imwemu . Podi kwene kuti timbatchunyuswa , ife nkhabe kufa tayu ;
47006010	podi kwene kuti timbatsukwaliswa , ife timbakomerwa ndzidzi onsene ; timbaoneka ninga anthu akutcherenga , kwache timbafumisa anthu azinji , timbaoneka ninga anthu akusoweratu , kwache tina pinthu pyonsene . 
47006011	Ashamwali athu a mu Korinto ! Ife talonga mwakusudzuka kuna imwe ; tafunguladi mitimathu . 
47006012	Si ife afunga mtimathu kuna imwe tayu ; mbwenye ndimwe mwafunga mitimanu kuna ife . 
47006013	Chinchino ndikulonga namwe khala ninga ndimwe ananga : tionesenimbo kutifuna sasawa ninga kukufunani kudachita ife . Fungulanimbo mitimanu ! Pya kukhonda phatizana na anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu
47006014	Lekani phatizana na anyakukhonda khala akhristu , khala ninga imwe na iwo ndi sasawa . Kadi kulungama kungakwanisike kuphatizana na kudawa ? Kadi cheza chingakwanisike kuphatizana na mdima ?
47006015	Kadi Khristu angakwanisike kuphatizana na Satana ? Mkhristu na munthu okhonda khala mkhristu ninji chinafuna iwo khalira pabodzi ?
47006016	Pana kuphatizana kwanji pakati pa Nyumba ya Mulungu na mifanikizo yakupembedzwa ninga milungu ? Thangwi ife ndife Nyumba ya Mulungu wamoyo ! Ninga mwapilongera Mulungu mwenechiro mbati : " Ndinadzakhazikika muna iwo , mbandidzakhala pakati pawo ; Ndinadzakhala Mulungu wawo , iwombo mbadzakhala anthu anga . "
47006017	Tenepo Mbuya akulonga kuti , " Bulukani pakati pawo , mbamupambuke kuna iwo . Lekani khuya pinthu pyakunyansa , tenepo ine ndinati ndidzakutambireni . 
47006018	Ndinati ndidzakhale babanu , imwembo mbamudzakhala ananga achimuna na achikazi , alonga Mbuya Wamphamvu zonsene . "
47007001	Ashamwali anga apamtima , pyonsene pidadumbira Mulungu pile pinadzachitwa kuna ife pano . Tenepo tendeni tipichenese tekha ene kuna pinthu pyonsene pimbaswipisa manungo na mtima pile , pontho tikhale anthu akuchena monsene mwene pakukhala anthu akugopa Mulungu . 
47007002	Tisasanyireni mbuto m'mitima mwanu . Ife nee tadawira munthu na mbodzi ene , penu kuipisa munthu na mbodzi ene , penu kuyesa kudyera mkopekope munthu na mbodzi ene tayu . 
47007003	Ine ndikulonga penepi , nee kuti ndikuchitiseni kukhala akukonwa tayu ; thangwi ninga mudalongera ine pakutoma imwe ndimwe apamtima pathu mwakuti ndzidzi onsene tili pabodzi pene , penu tife penu tikhale na moyo tani . 
47007004	Ndikulonga namwe mwakusudzuka pikulu pene ; pontho ndimbakunyadirani pyakwanga ! Panyatwa zathu zonsene ndimbawanga basi mtima , tenepo ndakomerwa pyakwanga pene . 
47007005	Na pidafika ife ku Makedonia kwene , hatidapuma tayu . Konsene kwene kukhali nyatwa zikulu , kukangana na anthu anango , pontho tikhali na mantha m'mitima mwathu . 
47007006	Mbwenye Mulungu , nyakuwangisa anyakutaya mtima , adatiwangisa mtima na kudza kwa Tito . 
47007007	Kudatiwangisa mtima si kudza kwache kokha tayu , mbwenye pontho pidava ife kumuwangisa mtima kudachita imwe kule . Iye adatipanga mule munakhumbira imwe kuti mundione , pya kutsukwala kwanu , kusasanyika kwanu kuti munditchinjirize , tenepo chinchino ndakomerwa pyakwanga pene . 
47007008	Ngakhala kalatangayo idakutsukwalisani , ine nkhabe tsukwala tayu kuti ndidailemba . Ine mbandidatsukwala ndzidzi udaona ine kuti kalatayo idakutsukwalisani ndzidzi pang'ono basi . 
47007009	Mbwenye chinchino ndakomerwa — nee kuti ndidakutsukwalisani tayu , mbwenye kuti kutsukwala kwanuko kudachitisa kuti musanduze makhaliro anu . Mulungu adaphatisa basa kutsukwala kweneku mwakuti pidachita ife nee pidakugoswani tayu . 
47007010	Thangwi kutsukwala kumbaphatisa basa Mulungu nkhabe tsukwalisa munthu tayu , kwache kumbamchitisa kuleka pyakudawa pyache , kule kumbadzesa chipulumuso . Mbwenye kutsukwala ninga kumbachita anthu apansi pano kumbadzesa imfa . 
47007011	Yang'anani pidachita Mulungu na kutsukwala kwanuko ; kwakupasani phinga pikulu , kwakupasani chipapo kukutsikimizirani kuti ndimwe anthu okhonda chinthu chakukupokanyisani ; kwakuzhangalisani pyakwanga na pyakuipa , pontho kwakupasani mantha akulu ; kwakuchitisani kuti mukhumbe pikulu kundiona ; kwakuchitisani kuti mukhale anthu akutsalakana ; pontho kwakupasani chipapo kuona kuti chilungamo chikutewezwa . Papyonsenepi mwatsikimiza kuti imwe nkhabe chinthu chakukupokanyisani tayu . 
47007012	Kalatayo nee ndidailembera nyakudawa penu nyakudawirwa tayu , mbwenye ndidailemba kuti ndikuoneseni kutitsalakana kwanu kukulu pamaso pa Mulungu . 
47007013	Ndi thangwi yache tidawanga mtima tenepa . Nee tidawanga kokha mtima tayu ; mbwenye makamaka tidakomerwa pyakwanga pene pakuona kukomerwa kwa Tito , thangwi monsenene mudamphedza kumuwangisa mtima . 
47007014	Ine ndidampanga kuti ndimbakunyadirani , pontho imwe nee mudandichitisa manyadzo tayu . Ndzidzi onsene talonga pyakuonadi kuna imwe , sasawambo pidapanga ine Tito kuti timbakunyadirani pile , pyatsikimizika kuti mphyakuonadi . 
47007015	Natenepo kukufunani kwache kukukula na mphamvu , ndzidzi unakumbuka iye pya Kusasanyika kudachita imwe kuvera pinthu pidakupangani iye pile , pontho kumtambira mwadidi kudachita imwe mwakutetemera na mantha kule . 
47007016	Ndakomera pyakwanga kuti ndinakwanisa kukukhulupirani monsene mwene !
47008001	Abale athu , tinafuna mudziwe mule mudakomera Mulungu mtima mpingo wa ku Makedonia . 
47008002	Anthu a mumpingo wenewu ayeswa pikulu na nyatwa zidaona iwo , kwache adakomerwa pyakwanga mwakuti adapereka mwakufewa manja , podi kwene kuti iwo ngakutcherenga pyakwanga . 
47008003	Ndinakwanisa kuchitira umboni kuti iwo adapereka ninga mudakwanisira iwo , pontho kupiringana mudakwanisira iwo , mwakukhonda kakamizwa na munthu unango . 
47008004	Iwo adatidembetera kuti tiapase mwayi wakuti iwombo aphedze anthu a Mulungu a ku Yudea . 
47008005	Iwo adapichita mwakupiringana mukhadikhira ife ! Chakutoma adapipereka okha ene kuna Mbuya ; kubuluka penepo na kufuna kwa Mulungu iwo adapipereka pontho kuna ife . 
47008006	Tenepo tidampempha Tito , adatoma basa yeneyi ule , kuti athimize kuiphata , pontho akuphedzeni kumalisa basa yakupereka mwakukoma mtima inachita imweyi . 
47008007	Imwe ndimwe anthu akufuma pyakwanga mupyonsene : m'chikhulupiro , m'malongero na nzeru , phinga ina imwe kufuna kwanu kutiphedza , pontho na kutifuna kwanu . Natenepo tinafuna kuti imwe mukhalembo anthu akufewa manja kuna basa yakuperekayi . 
47008008	Penepa ine nkhabe funa kukutongani pyathema imwe kuchita tayu . Pinachita ine nkhuyesa kuona kufunana kumbachita imwe pakukuonesani phinga inachita anthu anango kufuna kuphedza . 
47008009	Imwe mukudziwa kukoma mtima kwa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . Podi kwene kuti iye akhali nyakufuma , iye adasanduka nyakutcherenga thangwi ya imwepo , towera imwe musanduke anthu akufuma na kutcherenga kwacheko . 
47008010	Kupiona kwanga nkhwakuti , mphyadidi kuti imwe mumalise basa idatoma imwe chaka chamala ile . Imwe mukhali akutoma , nee kuchita kokha tayu , mbwenye na kufuna kwene kupichita . 
47008011	Apo , malisani basayi , towera phinganu kufuna kupichita , ithemerane na kuimalisa kwanu , malingana na pinthu pina imwe . 
47008012	Ngakhala imwe munachita phinga kufuna kupereka , Mulungu anadzatambira mtukwanu malingana na pinthu pina imwe , nee pinakhonda imwe khala napyo tayu . 
47008013	
47008014	
47008015	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Munthu adagumanya pinthu pizinji ule , iye nkhabe pizinjiletu tayu , pontho munthu adagumanya pinthu pyakuchepa ule , iye nkhabe pyakuchepaletu tayu . "
47008016	Tinapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi ya kupasa Tito phinga yakuti akuphedzeni ninga munachitira ifembo !
47008017	Iye hadakomerwa kokha kuchita pidampempha ife tayu , mbwenye iye adachita phinga pyakwanga kukuphedzani mwakuti na kufuna kwache iye adanyerezera kudza kwanuko . 
47008018	Tikumtuma pabodzi pene na mbaleathu , ule ambalemedzwa pikulu na mipingo yonsene thangwi ya basache yakulalika Mphangwa Zadidi . si pokhapo tayu , iye asankhulwa na mipingo kuti afambe na ife pabodzi ndzidzi unasonkhesa ife pontho kugawa chakuperekachi thangwi ya demelero ya Mbuya , pontho towera tionese chipapo china ife kufuna kuphedza . 
47008019	
47008020	Ife nkhabe funa tayu kuti anthu adungunye na munaphatisira ife basa chakuperekwa mwakufewa manjachi . 
47008021	Pinafuna ife nkhuchita pinthu pyakulungama , nee pamaso pa Mbuya pokha tayu , mbwenye na pamaso pa anthu pene . 
47008022	Tenepo tikumtuma mbaleathu unango pabodzi pene na iwo ; ife tamuyesa kazinji kene , tenepo tamgumana kuti iye ana phinga ndzidzi onsene kufuna kuphedza . Chinchino iye ana phinga kufuna kuphedza , thangwi iye ambakukhulupirani pyakwanga pene . 
47008023	Kulonga pya Tito , weneyu ndi mwanzanga , pontho timbaphatira pabodzi basa , towera tiphedze imwepo ; abale anangombo anaenda pabodzi na iyewo , ngakuimirira mipingo yawo , pontho ambadzesa demelero kuna Khristu . 
47008024	Aoneseni kuafuna kwanu , towera mipingo yonsene idzave pya kuafuna kwanu , pontho kudziwa kuti kukunyadirani kwathu nkhwakuthema . 
47009001	Ine nkhabeve funika kuti ndikulembereni pya chiphedzo chinatumizwa kuna anthu a Mulungu a ku Yudea tayu . 
47009002	Ndikupidziwa kuti imwe mukufuna kuphedza , tenepo ndakunyadirani pyakwanga kuna anthu a ku Macedonia . Ndidalonga kuti , " Abale athu a ku Akaya asasanyika kupereka kutomera chaka chamala chile . " Kupichita kwanu mwaphinga kwapasa chipapo azinji a iwo kweneko . 
47009003	Chinchino ndikuatuma abale enewa , towera kukunyadirani kwathu pa penepi kuleke khala kwapezi , mbwenye kuti musasanyikedi kuphedza ninga mudalongera ine mule . 
47009004	Ngakhala anthu a ku Makedonia anadzatsagana na ine , mbadzakugumanani kuti nee mwasasanyika tayu , ife tinadzachita manyadzo pyakwanga — kuleka kulonga pya manyadzo anu — thangwi ya kukukhulupirani kudachita ine !
47009005	Natenepo ndidanyerezera kuti pikhali pyadidi kupempha abale enewa kuti atome tsogola ndiwo kuti asasanyiletu mtukwa udadumbira imwe kuti munadzaupereka ule . Tenepo ndingadzafika kweneko ndinadzagumana wakumangamanga kale , penepo pinadzaonesa kuti imwe mudapereka mtukwawo na kufuna kwanu , nee mwakuchita kukakamizwa tayu . 
47009006	Kumbukani kuti munthu wakubzala pyakuchepa , ambavuna pyakuchepambo , pontho nyakubzala pyakuinjipa , ambavuna pyakuinjipambo . 
47009007	Munthu onsene apereke ninga munanyerezera iye , nee mwakutsamala penu mwakuchita kukakamizwa tayu ; thangwi Mulungu ambamfuna munthu wakupereka mwakukomerwa . 
47009008	Tenepo Mulungu anakwanisa kukupasani pizinji kupiringana pinasowa imwe , towera ndzidzi onsene mukhale na pinthu pyonsene pinasowa imwe , pontho na pinango pizinji pyakuti munakwanisa kuphata napyo mabasa adidi a mtundu na mtundu . 
47009009	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Iye ambapereka kuna anyakupisowa mwakufewa manja ; kukoma kwache mtima nkhwakukhala na kukhala . "
47009010	Tenepo Mulungu , nyakupereka mbewu kuti tibzale , pontho mkate kuti tidye , anadzaperekambo kuna imwe mbewu zonsene zinasowa imwe , tenepo iye anadzapichitisa kukula na kubala pinthu pizinji kubulukira pa kupereka kwanu mwakufewa manjako . 
47009011	Ndzidzi onsene iye anadzakuchitisani kukhala akufuma mwakuti ndzidzi onsene munakwanisa kupereka mwakufewa manja , towera anthu azinji apereke takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi ya mitukwanu inatambira iwo kubulukira kuna ife ile . 
47009012	Thangwi basa inaphata imweyi nee ikuphedza kokha anthu a Mulungu tayu , mbwenye ikuchitisa kuti anthu azinji apereke takhuta kuna Mulungu mwakukomerwa . 
47009013	Na thangwi ya kukutsikimizirani kunachita basanuyi , anthu azinji anadzalemedza Mulungu thangwi ya kuvera kwanu Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Khristu zidatawira imwe na mulomo wanu zile , pontho kugawana nawo kwanu pontho na anthu anango onsene mwakufewa manja . 
47009014	Natenepo iwo anadzakupemphererani na kukufunani kukulu , thangwi Mulungu akukomerani mtima pikulu pene . 
47009015	Tendeni tipereke takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi ya mtukwache okhonda longeka !
47010001	Ine , Paulo , ule anthu anango ambandilonga kuti ndine wamantha ndzidzi unakhala ine namwe pabodzi , mbwenye wakuwanga mtima ndzidzi unakhala ine namwe kutali . Na kufulika , pontho na kukoma mtima kwa Khristu ndikukupemphani
47010002	kuti muleke kundikakamiza kukhala munthu wavinga ndingadza kwanuko , thangwi ndikupidziwa kuti ndinakwanisa kuchitira vinga anthu ale ambalonga kuti ife tina makhaliro ninga a anthu apansi pano . 
47010003	Ndimomwene kuti timbakhala padziko yapansi , kwache ife nkhabe menya nkhondo ninga anthu apansi pano tayu . 
47010004	Pida pinaphatisa ife basa kumenya napyo nkhondo si pyapansi pano tayu , mbwenye mphida pyamphamvu pya Mulungu kuvunga napyo mipanda ya anyamalwa . 
47010005	Timbavunga napyo mphoka zakunama za anthu , timbavunga kupikuza konsene , kule kumbatchinga anthu kuti aleke kudziwa Mulungu ; timbavunga manyerezero onsene kuti avere Khristu . 
47010006	Tenepo ndzidzi unaonesa imwe kuvera monsene mwene , penepo pene ife tinadzasasanyika kutchunyusa munthu onsene okhonda vera . 
47010007	Imwe mukuona kwene makhaliro akunja a chinthu . Ngakhala pana munthu unango akupinyerezeradi kuti iye ngwa Khristu , mphyadidi kuti apinyerezere pontho thangwi ifembo ndife ache a Khristu ninga iye . 
47010008	Thangwi ine nkhabe chita manyadzo tayu , podi kwene kuti ine ndanyadira mwakusudzuka utongi watipasa Mbuyawu , utongi wakuti tiwangise nawo chikhulupiro chanu , nee wakufudza nawo tayu . 
47010009	Ine nkhabe funa kuti pioneke ninga ndikuyesa kukuthuswani na makalatangawa tayu . 
47010010	Unango anati alonge mbati , " Makalata analemba Paulo ngaukali pontho amphamvu , mbwenye mwenechiro angakhala nafe , ngwakusowa mphamvu , pontho mafala ambalonga iye ngapezi ! " Munthu ninga weneyu athema kuvesa kuti nkhabe siyana tayu pakati pa pinthu pimbalemba ife m'makalata tingakhala kutali namwe na pinthu pinafuna ife dzachita tingadzabwera kwanuko . 
47010011	
47010012	Ife nkhabe wanga mtima kupiikha penu kupiyesa tekha ene sasawa na anthu anango ambapichitira okha ene umboni ale tayu . Ngakupupwa pyakwanga ! Iwo ambapisasanyira okha ene mdida kupiyeseka nawo , pontho ambapitonga okha ene pakuteweza makhaliro awo !
47010013	Kwache ifembo , kukunyadirani kwathu nkhabe piringana mdida wakuthema tayu ; kunadzakhala pamdida onthowo wa basa idatipasa Mulungu ile , tenepo penepi pikuthimiza basathu pakati panu . 
47010014	Podi imwe muli m'bwalo mwa mdidawu , ife hatidapichita mwakupiringana mdidawo tayu ndzidzi udadza ife kwanuko kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Khristu . 
47010015	Tenepo ife nkhabe nyadira basa idaphata anthu anango mwakupiringana mdida tayu . Mbwenye tikudikhira kuti chikhulupiro chanu chinakula , pontho kuti tikwanise kuphata basa pakati panu kupiringana penepa ndzidzi onsene , mwakuteweza mdida udatipasa Mulungu ule . 
47010016	Tenepo tinakwanisa kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi m'madziko anango kupiringana dziko yanuyo , okhonda nyadira basa idaphatwa kale m'nthemba za munthu unango ile . 
47010017	Mbwenye ninga munalongera Malemba , " Munthu anafuna kunyada athema kunyadira pinthu pyachita Mbuya . "
47010018	Thangwi munthu wakuthema si ule ambapichitira yekha ene umboni tayu , mbwenye ngule ambachitirwa umboni na Mbuya . 
47011001	Mbandidakomerwa kuti mupirire nane pang'ono na kupupwa kwangaku . Ndaphata miyendo !
47011002	Ndikuchita namwe ntchanje , ninga mumbachitirambo Mulungu ; imwe mwakhala ninga mwali okhonda dziwa mamuna , ule adapanga ine kuti anadzasembwa na mamuna mbodzi yekha basi , mamuna weneyu ndi Khristu . 
47011003	Ninga mudachitira Hava kunyengezwa na kuchenjera kwa nyoka , ndikuchita mantha kuti manyerezero anu anasanduka akuipa , pontho kuti munaleka kupipereka kuna Khristu na mtimanu onsene . 
47011004	Thangwi imwe mumbatawirisa mwakukomerwa munthu wakudza kuna imwe dzalalika pya Yesu unangombo , nee Yesu analalika ifeyu tayu , pontho mumbatambira mzimu wakusiyana na Mzimu Wakuchena adatambira imwe ule , pontho mphangwa zakusiyana na Mphangwa Zadidi zidakupangani ife zile . 
47011005	Ine nkhabe nyerezera kuti ndine okhonda funikaletu kuna ale ambathulwa kuti mbanyakurumwa akufunikaletuwa . 
47011006	Podi kwene kuti ndine nyakukhonda dziwa kulonga , kwache ndina nzeru ; penepi tapionesa mwadidi mwene kuna imwe ndzidzi onsene . 
47011007	Ine sidakupagalisani pinthu tayu ndzidzi ukhalalika ine Mphangwa Zadidi za Mulungu kuna imwe ; ndidapichepesa ndekha ene , towera imwe mukhale anthu akufunika . Ayi ndidadawa pidachita ine penepi ?
47011008	Pikhaphata ine basa pakati panu , mipingo inango ikhandipagali . Pakuchita tenepo , ine ndikhachita ninga ndikuabera , towera ndiphedze napyo imwepo . 
47011009	Pontho ndzidzi ukhali ine na imwe , ine nee ndidanensa munthu na mbodzi ene kuti andiphedze kundipasa pinthu pikhasowa ine tayu ; abale akubulukira ku Makedonia adadza na pyonsene pikhasowa ine . Ndinathimiza kuchita tenepo ninga montho mukhachitira ine kale mule : ine nkhabe dzanensa munthu na mbodzi ene tayu !
47011010	Podi pyakuonadi pya Khristu pili muna ine , nkhabe munthu na mbodzi ene anafuna dzamalisa kunyada kwangaku m'nthemba yonsene ya Akaya tayu . 
47011011	Ayi ndikulonga tenepa thangwi ine nkhabe kukufunani ? Mulungu ambapidziwa kuti ndimbakufunani !
47011012	Chinchino ndinati ndithimize kuchita pinachita inepi , towera ndileke pasa " anyakutumwa anangowa " mwayi wakunyada , pontho wakulonga kuti iwo ambaphata basa sasawa na ina ifeyi . 
47011013	Amuna enewa nee mbanyakurumwa chadichadi tayu , mbwenye mbanyakurumwa akunama , mfakafaka , ale ambapisangiza kukhala ninga anyakutumwa chadichadi a Khristu . 
47011014	Apo , lekani dodoma napyo tayu ! Na Satana enembo ambapisangiza kukhala ninga mngelo wa cheza !
47011015	Tenepo si pyachilendo tayu kuti anyabasa a Satana apisangize kukhala ninga anyabasa a pyakulungama . Pakumalisira pache iwo anati adzatambire pyakuthemerana na pinthu pidachita iwo . 
47011016	Ndinati ndilonge pontho : paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakundiyesa pupwe . Mbwenye ngakhala munandiyesa pupwe , ndilekeni ndikhale pyanga ninga pupwe , towera inembo ndikwanise kunyadira pang'ono . 
47011017	Kunyada kunachita ine chinchinoku , si kule kunafuna Mbuya tayu , mbwenye ndikulonga kwene pyanga ninga pupwe . 
47011018	Podi pana anthu azinji ale ambanyada ninga anthu apansi pano , inembo ndinadzachita chibodzibodzi . 
47011019	Imwe ene ndimwe anthu anzeru pyakwanga , ndi thangwi yache mumbatawirisa mwakukomerwa mapupwe kuchita pinafuna iwo . 
47011020	Imwe mumbatawirisa munthu kukuyesani mabitchu , penu kukudyerani mkopekope , penu kukuteyerani msampha , penu kutumbama , penu kukugasani mbama . 
47011021	Ndina manyadzo na kutawira kuti ife tikhachita mantha pyakwanga kuchita pinthu penepi ! Mbwenye ngakhala munthu unango ana wanga mtima kunyadira chinthu chinango — ine ndikulonga ninga ndine pupwe — inembo ndinadzawanga mtima kunyadira chinthu chinango . 
47011022	Kadi iwo mba Aheberi ? Inembo ndine Mheberi . Kadi iwo mba Alsraele ? Inembo ndine Mulsraele . Kadi iwo mphidzukulu pya Abrahamu ? Inembo ndine chidzukulu cha Abrahamu . 
47011023	Kadi iwo mbanyabasa a Khristu ? Ndikulonga ninga ndine nyamsala — kwache ndine nyabasa wakufunika kupiringana iwo ! Ine ndawangisa kuphata basa kupiringana iwo , kazinji kene ndafungirwa m'perezo , ndakwapulwa pikulu pene , pontho kazinji kene ndikhali chifupi kufa . 
47011024	Ndzidzi ushanu Ayuda adandikwapula makumatatu na kafemba ;
47011025	katatu ndidamenywa na ndodo , pontho kabodzi ndidaponyerwa miyala . Katatu ndidalobzeka na mwadiya , pontho kabodzi ndidamala nsiku yamumphu m'madzi . 
47011026	M'maulendo anga azinji akhaenda ine , ndaona pyakugoswa thangwi ya madzi akutayikira m'mikulo , pyakugoswa kubulukira kuna mapanga , pyakugoswa kubulukira kuna Ayuda anzanga pontho na kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ; ndaona pyakugoswa m'mizinda na m'thando , ndaona pyakugoswa panyanza zikuluzikulu , pontho kubulukira kuna ashamwali akunama . 
47011027	Ine ndaphata mabasa akunensa , ndzidzi uzinji nee ndikhaona chitulo tayu , ndzidzi uzinji ndakhala na njala pontho na nyota ; ndzidzi uzinji kudya kukhali kwakupereweza , pontho okhonda khala na mbuto yakukhumba , pontho okhonda nguwo . 
47011028	Kuthimiza penepi , nsiku na nsiku ndili pakalikiliki na basa yakuyang'anira mipingo yonsene . 
47011029	Munthu unango angasowa mphamvu , ine ndimbakhala wakusowa mphamvu ; ngakhala unango adawiswa , ine pimbandipha mtima pyakwanga . 
47011030	Ngakhala ndathema kunyada , ndinati ndinyadire pinthu pimbaonesa kusowa kwanga mphamvu pile . 
47011031	Mulungu pontho Baba wa Mbuya Yesu — ule kwenda na kwenda athema kukuzwa , ambapidziwa kuti ine ndimbalonga pyakuonadi . 
47011032	Pikhali ine ku Damasiko , mkadamu wa Boma , ule akhali pansi pa utongi wa Mfumu Areta , adaikha anyakulondali m'misuwo ya mzinda kuti andiphate . 
47011033	Mbwenye ndidatchithisirwa m'chitundu na pabenga yafufu ya mpanda mbandimthawa . 
47012001	Ine ndathema kunyada , podi kwene kuti nkhabepo chakuganyalisa tayu . Mbwenye chinchino ndinati ndilonge pya masomphenya na kunditchululira kudachita Mbuya . 
47012002	Ndikupidziwa , pyaka khumi na pinayi pyagwandapyo , mkhristu unango adagomphiwa kwenda kudzuludzulu . Ine nkhabe dziwabi ngakhala penepi pidachitikadi penu kuti pikhali masomphenya ene — mbwenye Mulungu yekha ndiye anapidziwa . Ndinalonga pontho , ndikudziwa kuti munthu weneyu adagomphiwa kwenda kumbuto yakutsanzaya kudzulu . Penepo pontho ine nkhabe dziwa ngakhala penepi pidachitikadi penu kuti pikhali masomphenya ene — mbwenye Mulungu yekha ndiye anapidziwa . Kweneko iye adava pinthu pyokhonda longeka , pinthu pyakuti munthu nkhabe kwanisa kupilonga tayu . 
47012003	
47012004	
47012005	Munthu weneyu ine ndinadzamnyadira — mbwenye nkhabe dzapinyadira ndekha ene tayu kupambula pinthu pile pimbaonesa kusowa kwanga mphamvu . 
47012006	Ngakhala ndikhafuna kunyada nee mbandidakhala pupwebi , thangwi mbandidalonga pinthu pyakuonadi . Mbwenye ine nkhabe dzanyada tayu , thangwi ine nkhabe funa munthu na mbodzi ene kuti aleke kundiyesa munthu wakufunika pyakwanga kupiringana pinthu pidaona iye ndikuphata pontho kupiva ndikupilonga . 
47012007	Mbwenye kugopesera ndingatumbame thangwi ya pinthu pyakudodomesa pidaona ine , ndidapaswa chinthu chakupha ninga munga m'manungo mwanga , chile chakhala ninga nyamphangwa wa Satana kuti chindibonerese , towera chindilekese kunyada . 
47012008	Katatu ndidapemphera kuna Mbuya kuti andibulusire chinthu chenechi . 
47012009	Mbwenye kutawira kwache kukhali tenepa : " Chinafuna iwe nkhukoma kwanga mtima basi , thangwi mphamvu yanga njikululetu ndzidzi unasowa iwe mphamvu . " Natenepo ndakomerwa pyakwanga kunyadira kusowa kwanga mphamvu , towera mphamvu ya Khristu ikhale pana ine . 
47012010	Ndakomerwa pyakwanga na kusowa kwanga mphamvu , kutikanwa , kuona nyatwa , kubonereswa na kunenswa thangwi ya kutumikira Khristu . Thangwi ndzidzi unasowa ine mphamvu , penepo ndimbakhala na mphamvu . 
47012011	Ine ndakhala ninga pupwe , mbwenye mwachitisa kuti ndichite tenepo ndimwepo . Anthu adathema kundichitira umboni ndimwepo . Podi kwene kuti si ine pinthu tayu , ine nkhabe khala okhonda funikaletu kuna anyakutumwa akufunikawa . 
47012012	Pidzindikiro na pyakudodomesa pizinji pidachitwa pakati panu mwakupirira kukulu pikutsikimizira kuti ndine nyakutumwa . 
47012013	Apo ninji chakuipa chidakuchitirani ine kupiringana mipingo inango , kupambula chile chokha chakuti ine sidakunensani tayu na kusowa kwanga kobiri . Ndaphata miyendo , ndilekerereni kudawa kwangaku !
47012014	Keneka nkhachitatu kuti ndisasanyike dzakufambirani , tenepo ine nkhabe dzakunensani tayu . Thangwi ine sinafuna kobiri zanu tayu , mbwenye imwepo . Si basa ya ana kukoyera ababawo mfuma tayu , mbwenye ababa akoyere anawo . 
47012015	Ndinadzakomerwa kuvunga pinthu pyonsene pina ine , pontho na ine ene , towera ndiphedze imwepo . Kadi imwe munadzandifuna pang'ono thangwi yakuti ine ndimbakufunani pikulu pene ?
47012016	Apo , imwe munati mudzanditawire kuti ine sidakunenseni tayu , mbwenye unango anati alonge kuti ndine wakuchenjera , pontho kuti ndidakukweshani na unthawatawa wanga !
47012017	Ayi ine ndidakudyerani mkopekope kudzera muna amuna adakutumirani ine ale ?
47012018	Ndidapempha Tito kuti abwere kwanuko , pontho ndidatuma mbale mbodzi pabodzi na iye . Ayi Titoyo adakudyerani mkopekope ? Kadi iye na ine tidachita pinthu na manyerezero abodzi tayu , pontho mbatikhala na makhaliro abodzi tayu ?
47012019	Penu mukunyerezera kuti ndzidzi onsene tikhayesa kupitchinjiriza tekha ene pamaso panu ? Nkhabe ! Timbalonga ninga mumbafunira Khristu kuti ife tilonge pamaso pa Mulungu , pontho ashamwali athu apamtima , pyonsene pimbachita ife timbapichita kuti tiphedze napyo imwepo . 
47012020	Ndikuchita mantha kuti ndingabwera kweneko , ndinadzakugumanani muna makhaliro akusiyana na munafuna ine kuti mukhale nawo , pontho kuti imwe mungadzandione na makhaliro anga asiyana na mukhafunira imwe mule . Ndikuchita mantha kuti ndingadzagumane kukangana , bivu , kuzhangali , kupithemba , kutikana , tsweda , kudungudza na kuvunganyika . 
47012021	Ndikuchita mantha kuti ndingadzabwera pontho Mulungu wanga anadzandichepesa pamaso panu , pontho kuti ndinadzasintiliri anthu ale adadawa kale ene , mbwenye hadaleka makhaliro akuipa tayu — pyakusirira na pyakuzuda pidachita iwo . 
47013001	Keneka nkhachitatu kuti ndidze dzakufambirani .
47013002	Ndinafuna ndilonge kuna imwe ale mudadawa kalene , pontho kuna anango onsene ; ine ndidaacheuza kale pandzidzi udakufambirani ine kachiwiri ule , kwache ndinati ndiacheuze pontho ndzidzi una ine kutali namwe : ndzidzi unafuna ine dzabwera pontho nkhabe munthu na mbodzi ene wa iwo anafuna ine dzasiya kukhonda kumtchunyusa tayu . 
47013003	Penepo munadzaona chitsikimizo chinafuna imwe chakuti Khristu ndiye ambalonga kudzera muna ine . Iye nkhabe sowa mphamvu tayu pa mabasa ambaphata iye muna imwe ; mbwenye ambaonesa mphamvu yache pakati panu . 
47013004	Ndimomwene kuti akhali wakusowa mphamvu pandzidzi udakhomerwa iye pamtanda , kwache chinchino ana moyo thangwi ya mphamvu ya Mulungu . Ifembo ndife akusowa mphamvu mukuphatanizana kwathu naye , kwache tinadzakhala na moyo pabodzi naye kudzera muna mphamvu ya Mulungu kuti tiphate basa pakati panu . 
47013005	Piyeseni na kupitonga mwekha ene , towera muone ngakhala muna chikhulupirodi . Kadi imwe nkhabe kupidziwadi kuti Khristu Yesu ali muna imwe ? Ngakhala si tenepo tayu , ndiye kuti mwapichimwanaletu .
