47013006	Mbwenye ndikukhulupira kuti imwe munati mudziwe kuti ife nee tapichimwana tayu . 
47013007	Timbapemphera kuna Mulungu kuti muleke chita pyakuipa — nee towera kuonesa kuti ife tapikwanisa tayu , mbwenye kuti imwe muchite pinthu pyakulungama , podi kwene kuti ife tioneke pyathu ninga tapichimwana . 
47013008	Thangwi ife nkhabe kwanisa kuchita chinthu chakupokanyisana na pyakuonadi tayu , mbwenye kuchita pinthu pyakuikhira kunduli pyakuonadipyo . 
47013009	Timbakomerwa ndzidzi umbasowa ife mphamvu , mbwenye imwe mumbakhala na mphamvu . Timbapemphera pontho kuti mukhale anthu akuthema monsene mwene . 
47013010	Ndi thangwi yache ndalemba kalatayi ndzidzi unakhala ine kutali namwe ; towera ndingadzafika kweneko ndileke dzachita vinga namwe pakuphatisa basa utongi udandipasa Mbuya ule — utongi wakuwangisa nawo chikhulupiro chanu , nee wakufudza nawo tayu . 
47013011	Chinchino , abale anga , ndaenda ! Yesayesani kukhala akuthema monsene mwene , vani pinakupemphani inepi ; veranani unango na mwanzache . Khalani mwamtendere . Mulungu wakukufunani pontho wamtendere anati akhale namwe . 
47013012	Pasanani mwenyikiro wachikhristu kuonesa kufunana unango na mwanzache . 
47013013	Anthu onsene a Mulungu akukupasani mwenyikiro . 
47013014	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuya Yesu Khristu , kukufunani kwa Mulungu , na chiphatizano cha Mzimu Wakuchena pikhale namwe monsenene . 
48001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , ule adachemerwa kukhala nyakutumwa nee na munthu tayu , penu kudzera muna Baba , adalamusa Yesu kuimfa ule , 
48001002	pontho na kuna abale onsene ali kuno pabodzi na inewa — Kwenda kuna mipingo ya kunthemba ya Galatia . 
48001003	Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Babathu na Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale namwe . 
48001004	Na kuvera kufuna kwa Mulungu ule ndi Babathu , Khristu adapipereka yekha ene ninga nsembe thangwi ya pyakudawa pyathu , towera atisudzule panyatwa za ndzidzi wakuipawu . 
48001005	Tenepo kuna Mulungu kukhale demelero yakukhala na kukhala ! Ameni . 
48001006	Ndadodoma napyo kuti imwe mwabauka msangansanga tenepa kuleka Mulungu , adakuchemerani kudzera muna kukoma mtima kwa Khristu a ule , mbamutewera mphangwa zinango zakusiyana na Mphangwa Zadidi . 
48001007	Mphangwa zimbateweza imwe zile , si mphangwa zadidi chadichadi tayu . Pana anthu anango akukudzudzumisani . Iwo akuyesayesa kuti apotoze Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Yesu Khristu . 
48001008	Mbwenye podi kwene kuti ife penu mngelo wakubulukira kudzulu analalika mphangwa kuna imwe zakusiyana na zidakulalikirani ife zile , weneyo athema kutchunyuswa kwenda na kwenda . 
48001009	Penepi tidapilonga kale , mbwenye chinchino ndikupilonga pontho kuti ngakhala munthu unango anakulalikirani mphangwa zinango zakusiyana na zidatambira imwe zile , munthu weneyo athema kutchunyuswa kwenda na kwenda . 
48001010	
48001011	Abale anga , ndinafuna kukupangani kuti Mphangwa Zadidi zinalalika inezi , si zakubulukira kuna munthu tayu . 
48001012	Sidachita kuzitambira kubulukira kuna munthu na mbodzi ene tayu , nee munthu na mbodzi ene adandifunzisa tayu . Mbwenye ndidazitambira mwakuchita kutchululirwa na Yesu Khristu . 
48001013	Imwe mwava pya makhaliro anga akale ndzidzi ukhapipereka ine kuteweza chipembedzo cha Chiyuda ule , mule mukhaboneresa ine mpingo wa Mulungu mwakukhonda kuva nawo kwene nsisi , pontho na mule mukhawangawanga ine kuuvunga . 
48001014	Ine ndikhali patsogolo pa Ayuda anzanga azinji a thunganga mupinthu pya chipembedzo cha Chiyuda pikhaphata ine pile , pontho ndikhapipereka pyakwanga kuna mitemo ya makolo athu . 
48001015	Mbwenye Mulungu na kukoma kwache mtima adandisankhuliratu ndidzati balwa , mbandichemera kuti ndimphatire basa . Tenepo pidanyerezera iye
48001016	kutchulula Mwanache kuna ine , towera ndilalike Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Yesu kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , ine sidenda kuna munthu na mbodzi ene kavunza nzeru tayu , 
48001017	nee ndidenda ku Yerusalemu kaonana na ale akhali anyakutumwa ine ndidzati sanduka kukhala nyakutumwa . Mbwenye ndidenderatu kudziko ya Arabia ; kubuluka penepo ndidabwerera ku Damasiko . 
48001018	Pidagwanda pyaka pitatu ndidenda ku Yerusalemu kaonana na Peturo mbandikhala naye madimingu mawiri . 
48001019	Kweneko sidaonana na nyakutumwa unango tayu kupambula Yakobo , mbaleache Mbuya . 
48001020	Pinalemba inepi mphyakuonadi . Mulungu akupidziwa kuti nee ndikunamabi . 
48001021	Kubuluka penepo ndidenda kunthemba za Siria na Kilikia . 
48001022	Pandzidzi wenewu mipingo ya mu Yudea nkhuti hidzati kundidziwa na pankhope tayu . 
48001023	Iwo akhava kwene mbiri basi kuti : " Munthu akhatiboneresa pakutoma ule , chinchino akulalika chikhulupiro chikhayesa iye kuchivunga chile ! "
48001024	Natenepo iwo adakuza Mulungu thangwi ya pidachitika kuna ine pile . 
48002001	Pidagwanda pyaka khumi na pinayi ndidenda pontho ku Yerusalemu pabodzi na Barnaba . Pa ulendo wanga ndidakwata pontho Tito . 
48002002	Ine ndidenda thangwi ya kunditchululira kudachita Mulungu kuti ndiende . Pamgumano wa akadamu okhokha , ndidaapanga Mphangwa Zadidi , zile zikhalalika ine pakati pa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Ine sidafuna tayu kuti basa ikhadaphata ine penu ikhaphata ine ikhale yapezipezi . 
48002003	Tito adatsagana na ineyi , podi kwene kuti akhali Mgriki , iye hadakakamizwa kuti agwandwe nsonga yakumaso tayu . 
48002004	Mphoka yeneyi idalamuka thangwi ya anthu anango , ale akhadapita mwakupibisa m'gulu mwathu kupisangiza ninga abale athu , towera azonde utumbe una ife mukuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu Yesu . Iwo akhafuna kuti tikhale mabitchu . 
48002005	Mbwenye ife nee tidachita pikhafiina iwo na pang'ono pene tayu , towera tikukoyereni mwadidi pyakuonadi pya Mphangwa Zadidi . 
48002006	Mbwenye , ale akhaoneka ninga mbakadamu — ndikulonga penepi thangwi ine nkhabe ona kusiyana na mukhali iwo kale mule tayu ; Mulungu nkhabe tonga mseru mwakuyang'ana nkhope tayu ndikupilonga kuti akadamu ale nkhabe chinthu chibodzi chitswa chidathimiza iwo kundifunzisa pa pidalalika ine pile tayu . 
48002007	Kwache iwo adaona kwene kuti Mulungu andipasa basa ya kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , ninga montho mukhadapasira iye Peturo basa ya kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi kuna Ayuda . 
48002008	Thangwi na mphamvu ya Mulungu ine ndidaikhwa kukhala nyakutumwa kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , ninga montho mudaikhirwa Peturo kukhala nyakutumwa kuna Ayuda . 
48002009	Yakobo , Peturo na Yohani , ale akhaoneka ninga mizati , adadzindikira kuti Mulungu akhadandipasa basa yakusankhulikayi , tenepo iwo adapereka dakamawu kuna Barnaba na ine kuonesa kuti tonsene ndife abodzi . Ife tidatawirizana kuti ine na Barnaba tiende kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , iwombo aende kuna Ayuda . 
48002010	Chinthu chidapempha iwo chene ntchakuti tikumbuke anyakutcherenga m'gulu mwawo , chenechi ntchontho chile chikhafunac ine kuti ndichichite . 
48002011	Mbwenye pidadza Peturo ku Antiokea , ndidamsumulula pakwecha , thangwi iye akhadadawadi . 
48002012	Anthu ale akhadatumwa na Yakobo mbadzati fika kweneko , Peturo akhadya pabodzi na akhristu okhonda khala Ayuda . Mbwenye pidafika amuna ale , iye adafunduka , tenepo hadadyeve na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ale tayu , thangwi iye akhagopa gulu ikhalonga kuti anthu okhonda khala Ayudawa athema kugwandwa nsonga yakumaso . 
48002013	Akhristu anango a Chiyuda adatomambo kuchita unthawatawa pabodzi pene na Peturo , mwakuti na Barnaba ene adakwatikambo na unthawatawa udachita iwowo . 
48002014	Pidaona ine kuti makhaliro awo akhali akupotoka malingana na pyakuonadi pya Mphangwa Zadidi , ndidalonga kuna Peturo pamaso pa iwo onsene kuti , " Iwe ndiwe Myuda , mbwenye ukukhala ninga munthu okhonda khala Myuda , nee ninga Myuda tayu . Apo lero , unakwanisa tani kukakamiza anthu okhonda khala Ayuda kuti ateweze mitemo ya Chiyuda ? "
48002015	Ndimomwene kuti ife ndife Ayuda pakubalwa , nee anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ambalongwa " anyakudawa " ale tayu , 
48002016	kwache timbapidziwa kuti nkhabe munthu ambalungamiswa thangwi ya kuteweza mwambo tayu , mbwenye thangwi ya kukhala na chikhulupiro muna Khristu Yesu . Tenepo na ife ene taikha chikhulupiro chathu muna Khristu Yesu towera tilungamiswe kudzera muna chikhulupiro chathu pana Khristu , nee thangwi ya kuteweza mwambo tayu , thangwi nkhabe mbodzi anadzalungamiswa pakuteweza mwambo . 
48002017	Ngakhala pinafuna ife kulungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna kuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu pikuonesa kuti ife ene ndife anyakudawa ninga anthu okhonda khala Ayudawa — ayi kweneku nkhulonga kuti Khristu ndiye nyakuchitisa anthu kudawa ? Nkhabe , na pang'ono pene tayu !
48002018	Ngakhala ine ndinatoma kumanga pontho mwambo udafudza ine , penepo pikuonesadi ndekha ene kuti ndine munthu wakuswa mwambo . 
48002019	Mwambo udandidzindikirisa kuti ndathema kufa , natenepo ndafa kuti ndibuluke pansi pa utongi wa mwambowo , towera ndikhale na moyo wakutumikira Mulungu . 
48002020	Ine ndakhomerwa pamtanda pabodzi na Khristu , natenepo si ine ule ana moyo tayu , mbwenye Khristu ndiye ana moyo muna ine . Moyo uno una ine kumanungowu ngwakudzera m'chikhulupiro muna Mwana Mulungu , ule adandifuna mbapereka moyo wache thangwi ya ine . 
48002021	Ine ndakhonda kuikha kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu pakhundu , thangwi ngakhala munthu ambalungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna mwambo , penepo pikulonga kuti Khristu adafa papezi . 
48003001	Agalatia akupupwamwe , adakulodzani mbani ? Imwe mudapangwa mwakuveka pya imfa ya Yesu Khristu pamtanda khala ninga mudapiona maso na maso !
48003002	Ndipangeni chinthu chibodzi : kadi imwe mudatambira Mzimu wa Mulungu thangwi ya kuteweza mwambo , penu thangwi yakuti mudakhulupira pidava imwe Mphangwa Zadidi zile ?
48003003	Kani ndimwe akupupwa tenepa ? Mudatoma na Mzimu wa Mulungu , apo chinchino munafuna kumalisa na mphamvu zanu zene ?
48003004	Kadi pinthu pyonsene pidachitika kuna imwe pidalila kuchitika kwene ? Ine nkhabe khulupira tayu kuti pidalila chitika kwene !
48003005	Kadi Mulungu ambakupasani Mzimu wache na kuchita pinthu pyakudodomesa pakati panu , thangwi yakuti imwe mumbateweza mwambo , penu thangwi yakuti mumbava Mphangwa Zadidi mbamuzikhulupira ?
48003006	Nyerezerani pya Abrahamu : ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " lye adakhulupira Mulungu , natenepo Mulungu adamuyesa munthu wakulungama , thangwi ya kukhulupira kwacheko . "
48003007	Tenepo imwe mupidziwe lero kuti pidzukulu chadichadi pya Abrahamu mbanthu ale ana chikhulupiro . 
48003008	Malemba adalongeratu kuti Mulungu anadzalungamisa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda kudzera muna chikhulupiro . Natenepo Malemba adalonga pya Mphangwa Zadidi kuna Abrahamu mbati , " Kudzera muna iwe Mulungu anadzatsanzayisa anthu a madzinza onsene . "
48003009	Abrahamu adakhulupira , tenepo adatsanzayiswa . Natenepo anthu onsene anakhulupira , ambatsanzayiswa ninga mudatsanzayisirwa Abrahamu . 
48003010	Ale ambanyindira kuvera mwambo wa Mose ngadzedze . Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Ngwadzedze munthu onsene anakhonda thimiza kuchita pinthu pyonsene pidalembwa m'bukhu ya mwambo . "
48003011	Tenepo mphyakuveka kuti nkhabe munthu na mbodzi ene ambalungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna mwambo tayu , thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Ngweneyo ene munthu ule ambalungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna chikhulupiro anadzakhala na moyo . "
48003012	Mbwenye mwambo nkhabe pinthu na chikhulupiro , kwache ninga munalongera Malemba kuti , " Munthu onsene anachita pinthu pyonsene ninga munafunira mwambo anadzakhala na moyo . "
48003013	Khristu adatiombola kutibulusira dzedze ya mwambo pakukhala nyadzedze m'mbuto mwathu . Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Ngwadzedze munthu onsene anamanikwa pamuti . "
48003014	lye adatiombola towera kutsanzaya kudadumbira Mulungu kudzampasa Abrahamu kule , kufike kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda kudzera muna Khristu Yesu , kuti kudzera muna chikhulupiro titambire Mzimu Wakuchena adadumbira Mulungu kudzampereka ule . 
48003015	Abale anga , ndinafuna kuphatisa basa upangizi wa nsiku na nsiku : ngakhala anthu awiri averana pa chinthu chinango mbaphatizana mwadidi chinthu chidaverana iwocho , nkhabe munthu na mbodzi ene anakwanisa kuswa chiveranocho , penu kuthimizapo chinthu chinango tayu . 
48003016	Tenepo Mulungu adadumbira kuna Abrahamu na kuna chidzukulu chache . Malemba hadainjipise kuti " pidzukulu " , kulonga kuti anthu azinji tayu , mbwenye adachepesa kuti " chidzukulu " , kulonga kuti munthu mbodzi basi , ule ndi Khristu . 
48003017	Chinalonga ine ntchakuti Mulungu adachita chiverano na Abrahamu mbadumbira kukoya chiveranocho . Tenepo pidagwanda pyaka madzana manayi na makumatatu mwambo udaperekwa . Mwambo wenewu nkhabe kwanisa kuswa chiveranochi , pontho kufudza kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kule tayu . 
48003018	Ngakhala mtsanzayiso wa Mulungu wagona pakuteweza mwambo , penepo mtsanzayiso nkhabe gonave pana kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kule tayu . Mbwenye Mulungu na kukoma kwache mtima adapereka mtsanzayiso kuna Abrahamu thangwi ya kudumbira kudachita iye kuna Abrahamu . 
48003019	Apo basa ya mwambo ninji ? Mwambowo udathimizirwa towera kutionesa kuti pyakudawa ninji , kufikirana chidzukulucho chidzabwere , kuna ule adadumbira Mulungu . Mulungu adaphatisa basa angelo kupereka mwambowo kuna anthu kudzera muna mkhala pakati , Mose . 
48003020	Mbwenye mkhala pakati nkhabe kufunika tayu , ngakhala pana munthu mbodzi basi , pontho Mulungu ndi mbodzi basi . 
48003021	Kadi penepa nkhulonga kuti mwambo ukupokanyisana na kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kule ? Nkhabe , na pang'ono pene tayu ! Thangwi ngakhala kuti munthu akhadatambira mwambo wakuti unakwanisa kumpasa moyo , penepo munthu onsene mbadakwanisa kulungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu thangwi ya kuteweza mwambo . 
48003022	Mbwenye Malemba akulonga kuti dziko yonsene yapansi ili pansi pa mphamvu ya pyakudawa , natenepo mtsanzayiso udadumbira Mulungu kudzaupereka kudzera muna chikhulupiro muna Yesu Khristu ule , ukuperekwa kuna anthu ambakhulupira ale . 
48003023	Chikhulupirochi mbichidzati fika , mwambo udatifiingira tonsene ninga anyaperezo kufikirana chikhulupirochi chidatchululwa . 
48003024	Natenepo ife tikhali pansi pa utongi wa mwambo kufikirana Khristu adadza kuti tilungamiswe pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna chikhulupiro . 
48003025	Podi ndzidzi wa chikhulupiro wafika , mwambo nkhabeve utongi pana ife tayu . 
48003026	Nkhudzera muna chikhulupiro kuti monsenene ndimwe ana a Mulungu mukuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu , 
48003027	thangwi monsene mudabatizwa kukhala akuphatanizana na Khristu , tenepo mwapivazika mwekha ene na Khristu . 
48003028	Natenepo nkhabe Myuda penu munthu okhonda khala Myuda , nkhabe bitchu penu mtumbe , nkhabe mamuna penu mkazi , thangwi monsenene ndimwe mbodzi mukuphatanizana kwanu na Khristu Yesu . 
48003029	Ngakhala ndimwe anthu a Khristu , penepo ndimwe pidzukulu pya Abrahamu , pontho mwathema dzatambira pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu pile . 
48004001	Chinalonga ine ntchakuti nyakusiyirwa mfuma angakhala kuti ndi mwana , iye nkhabe siyana tayu na bitchu , podi kwene kuti iye ndi mwenechiro mfuma yonsene . 
48004002	Iye mbali mwana ambakhala pansi pa utongi wa makayaya na akuluakulu pa pya mfumayo kufikirana nsiku ikwane idaikha babache yakuti iye atome kutonga mfumacheyo . 
48004003	Monthomonthomo ife , pikhali ife ana mupinthu pyauzimu , tikhali mabitchu a mizimu imbatonga pinthu pya dziko yapansi ile . 
48004004	Mbwenye pidafika ndzidzi wakuthema , Mulungu adatumiza mwanache . Iye adabalwa kudzera muna mkazi , pontho mbakhala pansi pa utongi wa mwambo wa Chiyuda , 
48004005	kuti aombole ale akhali pansi pa utongi wa mwambo towera tisanduke ana a Mulungu . 
48004006	Kuonesa kuti imwe ndimwe ana a Mulungu , iye adatuma Mzimu wa Mwanache kudza muna ife , Mzimu ambatichitisa kuti timchemere kuti , " Baba , Baba " ule . 
48004007	Natenepo si imweve bitchu tayu , mbwenye mwana wa m'nyumba . Podi ndimwe mwanache , Mulunguyo anadzakupasani pyonsene pyakoyera iye anache . 
48004008	Pakutoma pikhali imwe anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu , mukhali mabitchu a milungu , ile si pinthu tayu . 
48004009	Mbwenye podi lero Mulungu mukumdziwa , penu ndilonge kuti Mulungu akukudziwani , mphapo pinakwanisika tani kuti mubwerere m'nduli kuna mizimu yakusowa mphamvu , pontho yakusowa basa ile ? Munafuniranji kukhala pontho mabitchu awo ?
48004010	Mumbatsalakana nsiku zakusankhulika , miyezi , ndzidzi wa chaka , na pyaka !
48004011	Ndaswipa namwe mtima , thangwi mwinango ndidalila pezi kuvunga mphamvu zanga kuphata basa kuna imwe . 
48004012	Abale anga , ndikukupemphani kuti mukhale ninga ine , podi ine ndakhala ninga imwembo . Imwe nee mudandidawira tayu . 
48004013	Imwe mukupidziwa kuti kudwala kwanga ndiye kudachitisa kuti ndikwanise kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi ndzidzi wakutoma kuna imwe . 
48004014	Podi kwene kuti kudwala kwanga kukhali mayesero akulu kuna imwe , imwe hamudandikhonde , penu kundilulupisa tayu . M'mbuto mwache mudanditambira mwadidi khala ninga ndine mngelo wakubulukira kudzulu ; pontho khala ninga ndine Khristu Yesu . 
48004015	Imwe mwakomerwa pyakwanga ! Mphapo chinchino chachitika ninji ? Ine ene ndinakwanisa kuchitira umboni kuti mbapidakhala pyakukwanisika kukonombola maso anuwo , mbamudaakonombola kundipasa . 
48004016	Kani chinchino ndasanduka nyamalwanu thangwi ya kukupangani pyakuonadi ?
48004017	Anthu anango ale akuyesa kukunyengererani , kwache iwo nkhabe kukufunirani pyadidi tayu . Pinafuna iwo kwene mphyakuti imwe na ine tiphadzane , towera imwe mukwatike nawo pikulu . 
48004018	Tenepo mphyadidi kukwatika ngakhala pinafuniwapyo mphyadidi , pontho mwathema kuchita tenepo ndzidzi onsene , nee kuti kwene ndingakhala namwe pabodzi tayu . 
48004019	Imwe ananga apamtima , ine ndikukuverani pontho kupha ninga mkazi wamimba pakubala kufikirana mukhale na makhaliro chadichadi a Khristu . 
48004020	Ndikhapifuna pyakwanga kukhala namwe chinchino kuti ndisanduze malongero anga kuna imwe , thangwi ndaswipa namwe mtima pyakwanga !
48004021	Ndipangeni , imwe ale munafuna kukhala pansi pa utongi wa mwambo , kadi mukupidziwa pinalonga mwambo ?
48004022	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti Abrahamu akhali na ana achimuna awiri , mbodzi mache akhali bitchu , unangoyi mache akhali mtumbe . 
48004023	Mwanache adabalwa na bitchuyi adabalwa kwene ninga mumbabalirwa anthu onsene , mbwenye mwanache unango ule adabalwa na mtumbeyi adabalwa kudzera muna kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kule . 
48004024	Penepi pinakwanisa kuveka ninga msangani , thangwi amama awiri ale akuimirira piverano piwiri . Mama , ule anache adabalwa mabitchu ale , ndi Hagara , tenepo akuimirira chiverano chidasasanywa paphiri ya Sinai . 
48004025	Hagara , ule akuimirira phiri ya Sinai m'dziko ya Arabia , ntchithunzithunzi cha mzinda wa Yerusalemu walero , thangwi iye na anache ndi mabitchu . 
48004026	Mbwenye Yerusalemu wakudzulu ndi mtumbe — pontho iye ndiye mathu . 
48004027	Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Tsanzaya iwe mkazi wokhonda bala ! Khuwa , pontho lira na kusekera , ule chipo hudave mtswotswo wakubala tayu . Thangwi mkazi , ule adakhondwa na mamunache anadzakhala na ana azinji kupiringana mkazi , ule anakhala na mamunache . "
48004028	Chinchino imwe abale anga , ndimwe ana a Mulungu akubalwa thangwi ya kudumbira kudachita iye , ninga mudachitira Isake . 
48004029	Pandzidzi wenewu mwana adabalwa ninga mumbabalirwa anthu onsene ule , adaboneresa mwana ule adabalwa na mphamvu ya Mzimu wa Mulungu ; natenepo pili chibodzibodzi na lero . 
48004030	Apo Malemba akulonga tani ? Akulonga kuti , " Mbuluse bitchu wamkaziyu na mwanache ene ; thangwi mwana bitchu hanadzakwatambo khundu tayu pa mfuma ya baba pabodzi na mwana mtumbeyo . "
48004031	Natenepo , abale anga , ife nee ndife ana akubalwa na bitchu wamkazi tayu , mbwenye akubalwa na mtumbe . 
48005001	Utumbe ngwenewu una ifewu — Khristu adatisudzula pa ubitchu . Tenepo imirani dzololo , pontho lekani kupitawirisa mwekha ene kukhala pontho na goli ya ubitchu m'khosi mwanu . 
48005002	Ngavani ! Ine , Paulo , ndikukupangani kuti ngakhala munapitawirisa kugwandwa nsonga yakumaso , ndiye kuti Khristu nkhabeve basa na pang'ono pene kuna imwe tayu . 
48005003	Ndikucheuza pontho amuna onsene kuti angapitawirisa kugwanda nsonga yakumaso iwo athema kuvera mwambo onsene wa Mose . 
48005004	Imwe ene ale mumbayesayesa kuti Mulungu akulungamiseni pamaso pache , thangwi yakuti mumbateweza mwambo , mwapilekanisa mwekha ene na Khristu . Tenepo imwe mwapasa nkhodolo kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu . 
48005005	Ifembo chidikhiro chathu ntchakuti Mulungu anadzatilungamisa pamaso pache ; pontho na mphamvu ya Mzimu wa Mulungu chenechi ndiye chinadikhira ife kudzera muna chikhulupiro . 
48005006	Thangwi tingaphatanizana na Khristu Yesu kugwandwa nsonga yakumaso penu kukhonda gwandwa nkhabe basa tayu . Chinthu chene chakufunika ntchikhulupiro chile chimbaoneka kudzera muna kufunana . 
48005007	Mukhachitadi pyadidi ! Mbani adakulekesani kuvera pyakuonadi ? Adakunyengererani tani ?
48005008	Pinthu ninga penepi nee pimbabulukira kuna Mulungu tayu , ambakuchemerani ule . 
48005009	Ninga mumbalongerwa ipyo kuti , " Pyakufufumisira mkate ping'onong'ono pimbafufumisa mpambo wamumphu " , 
48005010	Thangwi ya kuphatanizana kwathu na Mbuya kumbachitisa kuti ndikhale na chikhulupiro kuti manyerezero anu na anga si akusiyana papinthu penepi tayu . Mbwenye munthu anakudzudzumisaniyo , penu akhale pyache ani , Mulungu anati adzamtchunyuse . 
48005011	Mbwenye kulonga pya ine , abale anga , ine ngakhala ndathimiza kulalika kuti kugwandwa nsonga yakumaso nkhwakufunika , thangwi ninji mphapo ndikubonereswa basi ? Ngakhala ndikhapichitadi , kulalika kwanga pya mtanda wa Khristu nee mbakudachitisa anthu anango kuzhangali tayu . 
48005012	Ndikhapifuna pyakwanga kuti anthu anakudzudzumisaniwa apikapali pyawo okha ene . 
48005013	Mbwenye kulonga pya imwe , abale anga , mudachemerwa kuti mukhale mtumbe . Kwache lekani phatisa basa utumbe wenewu ninga chinthu chakukupasani danga ya kuteweza pikhumbo pyakudawika pyakubalwa napyo . M'mbuto mwache tumikiranani unango na mwanzache mukufunana . 
48005014	Thangwi mwambo onsene waikhwa m'chigwandira m'matongero abodzi akuti , " Funa mwanzako ninga mumbapifunira iwe wekha ene . "
48005015	Mbwenye mungachita ninga nyama zam'tsanga , kulumana na kukhwadzulana , penepo chitani mpholemphole gopesera munasakazana unango na mwanzache . 
48005016	Chinalonga ine ntchichi : tawirisani Mzimu Wakuchena kutonga moyo wanu , tenepo imwe nee munadzachitave pikhumbo pya makhaliro akudawika akubalwa nawo tayu . 
48005017	Thangwi pimbafuna makhaliro akudawika akubalwa nawo mphyakupokanyana na pimbafuna Mzimu Wakuchena . Na pinafuna Mzimu Wakuchena mphyakupokanyana na pinafuna makhaliro akudawika akubalwa nawo . Pinthu piwiripi pili pa umalwa , pontho kweneku nkhulonga kuti munthu nkhabe kwanisa kuchita pinthu pinafuna iye chita tayu . 
48005018	Ngakhala mumbatsogolerwa na Mzimu Wakuchena , imwe nkhabe khalave pansi pa utongi wa mwambo tayu . 
48005019	Pinthu pimbachita makhaliro akudawika akubalwa nawo mphyakudziwika ; pimbapionesa pyokha ene pakwecha pakuchita ipi : pyakuzuda , pyakunyansa na kukhonda kupithunda , 
48005020	kupembedza mifanikizo na ufiti , kuchita umalwa , kumenyana , bivu , kuzhangali , kupithemba , kugawikana , kusankhana , 
48005021	kuipirwa , kuledzera , kuchita pyakudzedzeduka m'maphwando , pontho kuchita na pinango ninga penepi . Ndikukucheuzani ninga mudachitira ine pakutoma pale kuti anachita penepiwo hanadzakwata khundu mu Ufumu wa Mulungu tayu . 
48005022	Mbwenye Mzimu Wakuchena ambatichitisa kukhala akufunana , akukomerwa , amtendere , akupirira , akukoma mtima , adidi , akukhulupirika , 
48005023	akupichepesa na akupithunda . Nkhabe mwambo wakupokanyana na penepi tayu . 
48005024	Anthu ale mba Khristu Yesu akhomera pamtanda makhaliro awo akudawika akubalwa nawo pabodzi pene na pikhumbo pyache na kusirira kwene . 
48005025	Podi Mzimu Wakuchena atipasa moyo , tenepo iye athema kutonga moyo wathu . 
48005026	Ife tathema kukhala anthu okhonda nyada , penu kuzhangalisana unango na mwanzache , penu kuchitirana bivu unango na mwanzache . 
48006001	Abale anga , ngakhala unango aphatwa akuchita pinthu pyakudawika , imwe anyakukhala na Mzimu Wakuchena , mumsumulule , kwache mupichite mwakumkomera mtima . Pontho chitani mpholemphole , gopesera imwembo munayeswa na pinthu pyakudawika . 
48006002	Tsalakanani nyatwa za unango na mwanzache ; pakuchita tenepo munati muvereA mwambo wa Khristu . 
48006003	Ngakhala munthu anapinyerezera yekha ene kuti iye ngwakufimika , mwenemo iye si wakufunika tayu , akulila kupinyenga yekha ene . 
48006004	Munthu onsene athema kutonga makhaliro ache . Ngakhala ngadidi , penepo anakwanisa kunyadira chinthu chidaphata iye yekha ene , mbakhonda kuchiyeseza na chinthu chidaphata munthu unango . 
48006005	Thangwi munthu onsene athema kutsamala nyatwa zache . 
48006006	Munthu ule akurunziswa mphangwa zachikhristu , athema kugawana na mfunzisi wache pyonsene pyadidi pina iye . 
48006007	Lekani kupinyengeza mwekha ene ! Nkhabe munthu anasenzekesa Mulungu . Munthu anadzavuna chonthocho chidabzala iye . 
48006008	Ngakhala anabzala mwakuteweza makhaliro akudawika akubalwa nawo , kubulukira mwenemo , iye anadzavuna imfa ; ngakhala anabzala mwakuteweza Mzimu Wakuchena , kubulukira muna Mzimu Wakuchena iye anadzavuna moyo okhonda mala . 
48006009	Tenepo tendeni tileke topa na kuchita pinthu pyadidi . Thangwi ndzidzi wakuthema unadzafika wakuti tidzavune , tingakhonda taya mtima . 
48006010	Natenepo , ndzidzi onsene unakhala ife na danga , ife tathema kuchita pinthu pyadidi kuna munthu onsene , makamaka kuna ale ana ife pabodzi m'banja yachikhristu . 
48006011	Ngayang'anani pilemba pikulupikulu pyaphatisa ine basa pinakulemberani ine na manja anga ene !
48006012	Anthu , ale akuyesayesa kukukakamizani kuti mugwandwe nsonga yakumaso , ngontho ale ambafuna kuoneka akukoma pamaso pa anthu pakunyadira pinthu pikhachita iwo pamanungo awo . Iwo ambachita tenepo gopesera kubonereswa thangwi ya mtanda wa Khristu . 
48006013	Podi na anyakugwandwa nsonga yakumaso ene hambavera mwambo tayu ; iwo akufuna kuti imwe mugwandwe towera iwo akwanise kunyada kuti imwe mudavera pakugwandwa kwanu nsonga yakumaso . 
48006014	Mbwenye kulonga pya ine , ndinati ndinyadire mtanda wa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu basi , thangwi kudzera muna mtandache , kupiona kwa pinthu kwa anthu a padziko yapansi kuna ine , nkhwapezi — ine ndakhala ninga wakufa kuna kupiona kwawo kwa pinthu . 
48006015	Kugwandwa nsonga yakumaso penu kukhonda gwandwa nkhabe basa na pang'ono pene tayu . Chinthu chakufunika chadichadi nkhukhala munthu wakusasanywa mwachinchino . 
48006016	Kuna onsene akuteweza chirunziso chenechi m'moyo mwawo , ndikupempha kuti mtendere na nsisi za Mulungu pikhale kuna iwo na kuna anthu onsene a Mulungu .
48006017	Pakumalisira : munthu na mbodzi ene mbaleke kundithimizira nyatwa zinango tayu , thangwi madazwi ana ine m'manungo mwangawa akuonesa kuti ndine bitchu wa Yesu . 
48006018	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuya Yesu Khristu kukhale namwe monsene , abale anga . Ameni . 
49001001	Kubulukira kuna ine , Paulo . Mulungu adandiikha kukhala nyakutumwa wa Khristu Yesu , thangwi iye adapifuna kuti pikhale tenepo — Kwenda kuna anthu a Mulungu mumzinda wa Efeso , a kuna ale ngakuphatanizana na Yesu Khristu , pontho akukhulupirika kuna iye . 
49001002	Kukoma mtima pontho mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Babathu , pontho na kuna Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu pikhale nam we . 
49001003	Tendeni tipereke takhuta kuna Mulungu , ule pontho ndi Babache Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . Mulungu atitsanzayisa na mtsanzayiso wa mtundu onsene wa m'dziko yakudzulu kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena , thangwi ya kuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu . 
49001004	Na kale ene dziko mbidzati lengwa , Mulungu akhadatisankhuliratu kukhala anthu ache kudzera mukuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu , towera tikhale akuchena pontho okhonda na chakudawa chene pamaso pache . Mulungu ambatifuna pikulu , 
49001005	natenepo iye akhadapinyerezera kale kuti , kudzera muna Yesu Khristu , iye anadzatichitisa kukhala anache , thangwi ya kukomerwa pontho na kufuna kwache . 
49001006	Tendeni timkuze Mulungu thangwi ya kukoma kwache mtima kwakudodomesa , thangwi iye adatipasa Mwanache wapamtima ninga mtukwa wapezi !
49001007	Ife taombolwa , thangwi ya imfa ya Khristu ninga nsembe ; kweneku nkhulonga kuti Mulungu atilekerera pyakudawa pyathu . Mulungu ngwakukoma mtima pyakwanga , 
49001008	tenepo iye adatikomera mtima pikulu pene . Thangwi ya nzeru zache zonsene na kuvesa kwache konsene , 
49001009	pontho na kufuna kwache , Mulungu adatidziwisa pyakubisika pikhadanyerezera iye kalene kupimalisa pile , pakuphatisa basa Khristu . 
49001010	Pyakubisika pinafuna dzamalisa Mulungupi , ndzidzi ungadzakwana , mphyakuti agumanye pabodzi pyakulengwa pyonsene , pinthu pyonsene pya kudzulu na pya pansi pano , kuti pikhale pansi pa utongi wa Khristu . 
49001011	Pinthu pyonsene pimbachitika ninga mumbapifunira na kupinyerezera Mulungu . Mulungu adatisankhula kale kudzera mukuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu kuti tikhale anthu ache ene . Iye adapifuna kuti pikhale tenepo , thangwi iye akhadapinyerezera kutomera pakutomaletu . 
49001012	Tendeni , mphapo , tikuze demelero ya Mulungu , ife ale tikhali akutoma kukhala na chidikhiro pana Khristu !
49001013	Pidava imwe mphangwa zakuonadi , Mphangwa zadidi zakudzesa chipulumuso , imwe mudasandukambo kukhala anthu a Mulungu . Imwe mudakhulupira Khristu , tenepo Mulungu adakuikhani chidindo chakuonesa kuti ndimwedi anthu ache pakukupasani Mzimu Wakuchena ninga mudadumbira iye kuti anadzakupasani . 
49001014	Mzimuyo ndi chitsikimizo chakuti ife tinadzatambira pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu kuna anthu ache pile , pontho pikutitsikimizira kuti Mulungu anadzapereka kuna anthu ache utumbe monsene mwene . Tendeni , mphapo , tilemedze demelero yache !
49001015	Na thangwi ya penepi , kutomera ndzidzi udava ine pya kukhulupira kwanu Mbuya Yesu , pontho na kuafuna kwanu anthu onsene a Mulungu , 
49001016	ine sidaleka tayu kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi ya imwe . Ine ndimbakukumbukani ndingapemphera
49001017	pontho ndimbapempha Mulungu wa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , Baba wademelero , kuti akupaseni Mzimu Wakuchena , ule anadzakupasani nzeru , pontho dzatchulula Mulungu kuna imwe , towera mumdziwe mwadidi mwene . 
49001018	Ndimbampempha kuti iye afungule manyerezero anu kuti muone cheza chache , towera mudziwe chidikhiro chidakuchemererani iye chile , pontho kuti mudziwe kuinjipa kwa mtsanzayiso wakudodomesa unadumbira iye kuupereka kuna anthu ache ule , 
49001019	pontho na munaphatira basa mphamvu zache zikulu muna ife anyakukhulupira . Mphamvu zenezi ndi sasawa na mphamvu zikulu , 
49001020	zile zidaphatisa iye basa kulamusa nazo Khristu kuimfa , mbamkhazika nazo kudziko yakudzulu kumadyo kwache . 
49001021	Kweneko Khristu ana utongi kupiringana mafumu onsene akudzulu , atongi , anyamphamvu na ambuya : pontho dzinache ili padzulu pa madzina a utongi anango onsene ale anakwanisa iwo kuchemerwa nawo lero penu ndzidzi unadzawo . 
49001022	Mulungu adaikha pyonsene pansi pa manyalo a Khristu , pontho adampereka kuna mpingo kukhala ninga Mbuya wa pinthu pyonsene mumpingomo . 
49001023	Mpingo ndi manungo a Khristu , mpingo ule umbamchitisa kukhala wamumphu , pontho iye ambachitisa pinthu pyonsene kukhala pyamumphu monsene mwene .
49002001	Kale mukhali akufa m'moyo wanu wauzimu thangwi ya pyakudawa pyanu , pontho na kukhonda vera kwanu Mulungu . 
49002002	Pandzidzi wenewo imwe mukhafamba m'njira zakudawika za dziko yapansi ino ; imwe mudavera mzimu wakuipa ule una utongi onsene pa mizimu yakuipa ya kuthambo , mzimuwu ngule chinchino ukutonga miyoyo ya anthu okhonda vera Mulungu . 
49002003	Ndimomwene kuti ife tonsene tikhalimbo na makhaliro ninga awo , tenepo tikhateweza pikhumbo pya makhaliro akudawika akubalwa nawo . Tikhachita pikhafuna manungo na manyerezero athu . Thangwi ya makhaliro athu akudawika akubalwa nawo , ife tidathema kutchunyuswa na Mulungu , ninga anthu anango onsene akudawika . 
49002004	Mbwenye Mulungu ngwansisi pikulu , pontho kutifuna kwache nkhukulu pyakwanga
49002005	mwakuti iye adatipasa moyo pabodzi na Khristu ndzidzi ukhali ife akufa m'moyo wathu wauzimu pakukhonda vera kwathu Mulungu . Mbwenye imwe mwapulumuka thangwi yakuti Mulungu ngwakukoma mtima . 
49002006	Mukuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu Yesu , Mulungu adatikwiza pabodzi na Khristu kuti titonge pabodzi naye m'dziko ya kudzulu . 
49002007	Iye adachita penepi kuti ndzidzi wakwenda na kwenda aonese kukoma kwache mtima kukululetu kwakukhonda longeka , kudzera muna kutifuna kwache kudationesa iye kudzera muna Khristu Yesu .
49002008	
49002009	
49002010	Mulungu atisanduza kukhala ninga muna ife chinchinomu ; pontho mukuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu Yesu , iye adatilenga kuti tikhale na moyo wakuphata nawo mabasa adidi , mabasa akhadatisasanyira iye kalene kuti tiaphate ale . 
49002011	Kumbukani mule mukhali imwe kalene , imwe anthu okhonda khala Ayuda . Ayuda , anthu akugwanda nsonga yakumaso yachimuna ( penepi mphile pikhachita iwo na manjawo pa manungo pawo ) akhakuchemerani anthu okhonda gwandwa nsonga yakumaso . 
49002012	Pandzidzi wenewo imwe mudalekaniswa na Khristu mbamukhala ninga alendo , pontho mbamukhonda khala m'gulu ya anthu akusankhulwa na Mulungu . Imwe mukhali nkhabe khundu m'piverano pidagona pa kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kuna anthu ache kule , mbamukhala m'dziko yapansi pano akusowa chidikhiro , pontho akusowa Mulungu . 
49002013	Mbwenye chinchino mukuphatanizana kwanu na Khristu Yesu , imwe kale mukhali kutali ale , mwafendezwa chifupi na Mulungu , thangwi yakuti Khristu adafa ninga nsembe . 
49002014	Thangwi Khristu ene adzesa mtendere pakati pathu pakuchitisa Ayuda na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda kukhala anthu abodzi . Na kufa kwache pamtanda iye adagomola fufu ikhaalekanisa , pontho kuachitisa kuti azondane ile . 
49002015	Iye adafudza mwambo wa Chiyuda , na matongero pontho na mitemo yache ene yonsene , towera kubulukira muna madzinza mawiriwa iye asasanye dzinza ibodzi itswa mukuphatanizana kwayo naye . Pakuchita tenepo iye akukhazika mtendere pakati pawo . 
49002016	Khristu adafudza umalwa wawo na imfa yache ya pamtanda ; iye adafa pamtanda towera aphatanize madzinza mawiriwa kukhala manungo abodzi pontho kuabweza iwo kuna Mulungu . 
49002017	Tenepo Khristu adadza dzalalika Mphangwa Zadidi zakudzesa mtendere kuna anthu onsene — kuna imwe , anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , ale kale mukhali kutali na Mulungu , pontho na kuna Ayuda akhali chifupi na Mulungu ale . 
49002018	Kudzera muna Khristu tonsenefe , Ayuda na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda ene , tinakwanisa kudza kuna Baba mu Mzimu mbodzi Wakuchena . 
49002019	Tenepo , chinchino , imwe anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , si imweve alendo tayu ; chinchino imwe ndimwe mzika pabodzi na anthu a Mulungu , pontho imwe muli m'banja ya Mulungu . 
49002020	Imwe mwamangwa pamaziko a nyumba adamangwa na anyakutumwa pontho na maprofetirf ale , mwala wa pankhomo mbukhala Yesu Khristu mwenechiroache . 
49002021	Iye ngule ambaphataniza nyumba yonsene pabodzi pontho ambaikuza kufikirana Nyumba ya Mulungu ikhale yakupambulika kuna Mbuya . 
49002022	Mukuphatanizana kwanu na iye , imwembo mukumangirirwa pabodzi na anthu ache onsene ale kukhala nyumba , kule kumbakhala Mulungu kudzera muna Mzimu wache . 
49003001	Na thangwi yeneyi , ine Paulo , nyaperezo wa Yesu Khristu , thangwi ya imwepo anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , ndimbakupemphererani kuna Mulungu . 
49003002	Ndimomwene kuti imwe mwapiva kuti na kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu , ine ndapaswa basayi kuti muganyali nayo . 
49003003	Mulungu adatchulula pinthu pyakubisika pikhafuna iye dzachita mbapipangiza kuna ine . Ine ndapilemba mwachigwandira , 
49003004	tenepo ngakhala imwe munawerenga pyalemba inepi , munakwanisa kudziwa kuvesa kudachita ine papinthu pyakubisika pya Khristupi . 
49003005	Kalene anthu nee akhapangwa pyakubisika penepi tayu , mbwenye chinchino Mulungu apitchulula kuna anyakutumwa na maprofeti ache akupambulika kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena . 
49003006	Pyakubisikapi mphyakuti kudzera muna Mphangwa Zadidi za Yesu anthu okhonda khala Ayuda athemambo kutambira mtsanzayiso wa Mulungu pabodzi na Ayuda ; iwo ndi mapindi a manungo abodzi , pontho anatambirambo khundu pabodzi na Ayuda malingana na kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kudzera muna Khristu Yesu kule . 
49003007	Mulungu adandipasa mtukwa wakukhala nyabasache kulalika Mphangwa Zadidizi . Iye adachita tenepo kudzera muna kukoma kwache mtima na mphamvu zache zikulu . 
49003008	Pakati pa anthu onsene a Mulungu ndine wang'ono kupiringana wang'onoletu , kwache iye adandikomera mtima kundipasa basa yeneyi ya kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi za mfuma ya Khristu yokhonda madire kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , 
49003009	pontho zakuchitisa anthu onsene kuti aone munafuna Mulungu dzaphatira basa ya pinthu pyakubisikapi . Mulungu , nyakulenga pyonsene , akhadapibisa kutomera mifendu yonsene ya anthu idagwanda ile ;
49003010	towera chinchino , kudzera mwa mpingo , nzeru zikulu za Mulungu mu pyonsene zidziwike kuna anyamphamvu na atongi onsene a kudziko yakudzulu . 
49003011	Mulungu adapichita malingana na kufuna kwache kwakukhala na khala mbapichitisa kuti pikwanekwane kudzera m'mabasa a Khristu Yesu Mbuyathu . 
49003012	Thangwi ya kuphatanizana kwathu na Khristu pontho na chikhulupiro chathu pana iye , ife tinakwanisa kudza kuna Mulungu mwakuwanga mtima pontho na mtima wakulikha . 
49003013	Mphapo ndikukupemphani kuti muleke swipa mtima , thangwi ya kukubonererani kunachita ineku . Pinachita inepi pinaganyalisa imwepo . 
49003014	Thangwi ya penepi , ndinagodama pansi kuna Baba
49003015	kubulukira kumbatambira madzinza onsene a kudzulu pontho na a pansi pano dzina yakuonadi kule . 
49003016	Ndikupempha Mulungu kuti kubulukira mumfuma yache yademelero iye akukuwangisani na mphamvu m'moyo wanu wauzimu kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena . 
49003017	Pontho ndikupemphera kuti Khristu akhazikike m'mitima mwanu kudzera muna chikhulupiro chanu . Ndikupemphera pontho kuti imwe muikhe mitsitsi mwakuzika pansi mbamukhazikika mukukufunani kwa Mulungu , 
49003018	towera imwe pabodzi na anthu onsene a Mulungu mukwanise kuvesadi kukula , kulapha , pontho na kuzika kwachita kukufunani kwa Khristu . 
49003019	Pontho ndikupemphera kuti mudziwedi kukufunani kukulu kwa Khristu — podi kwene kuti nkhwakukhonda dziwika — pontho kuti mukhale monsene mwene na makhaliro a Mulungu . 
49003020	Kuna Mulungu kukhale demelero , ule anakwanisa kuchita pinthu piringana pingakwanise ife kupempha penu kupinyerezera , kudzera muna mphamvu yache ile imbaphata basa muna ife . 
49003021	Ife a mumpingo pontho ale taphatanizwa na Khristu timpase demelero kubulukira mifendu yonsene kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
49004001	Ine nyaperezo thangwi ya kutumikira Mbuya , ndikukupemphani kuti mukhale na makhaliro akuthemerana na pikhakupangani Mulungu pandzidzi udakuchemerani iye . 
49004002	Ndzidzi onsene khalani akupichepesa , akufulika pontho akupirira . Onesani kufunana kwanu pakuvana mafala . 
49004003	Chitani ninga munakwanisira imwe , kukoya mwadidi ubodzi udakupasani Mzimu Wakuchena kudzera muna mtendere umbakuphatanizani pabodzi ule . 
49004004	Manungo alipo abodzi , pontho Mzimu mbodzi , sasawambo ninga chidikhiro chilipo chibodzi chidakuchemererani Mulungu chile . 
49004005	Mbuya alipo mbodzi , chikhulupiro chibodzi , ubatizo ubodzi , 
49004006	pontho Mulungu alipo mbodzi , ule ndi Baba wa anthu onsene , Mbuya wa onsene , ule ambaphata basa kudzera muna anthu onsene , pontho ule ali m'mitima ya anthu onsene . 
49004007	Tonsenefe tatambira mtukwa wakufunika sasawa ninga montho mudaupimira Khristu . 
49004008	Ninga munalongera Malemba kuti : " Pidakwira iye kudzuludzulu , iye adakwata anyaperezo azinji mbaenda nawo pabodzi mbapereka mitukwa kuna anthu . "
49004009	Mphapo mafala akuti , " adakwira kudzulu " , nkhulonga kuti tani ? Mafalawa akulonga kuti chakutoma iye adatchitha mbafika kumbuto yakuzika ya dziko yapansi pano .
49004010	Adatchitha ule , ngonthoyo adakwira kudzulu kupiringana thambo kuti pinthu pyonsene pyakulengwa pidzazwe na iye . 
49004011	Iye ngontho ule adapereka mitukwa kuna anthu : iye adasankhula anthu anango kukhala anyakutumwa , anango kukhala maprofeti , anango kukhala anyakulalika Mphangwa Zadidi , anango kukhala abusa , anangombo kukhala afunzisi . 
49004012	Iye adaasankhula kuti iwo asasanye anthu a Mulungu towera aphate basa yachikhristu . Pakuchita tenepo iwo akulise mpingo , manungo a Khristu . 
49004013	Natenepo ife tinadzasanduka abodzi m'chikhulupiro chathu pontho na mu udziwisi wathu wa Mwana Mulungu : ife tinadzasanduka anthu akukola m'moyo wathu wauzimu mbatidzakhalaletu na makhaliro sasawa ninga a Khristu . 
49004014	Tenepo ife nkhabe dzakhalave ninga ana tayu , ife nkhabe dzabeluka na mabimbi penu kupheluka na mphepo ya chifunziso cha mfakafaka zimbanyengeza anthu zile na unthawatawa umbachita iwo ule tayu . 
49004015	Mbwenye pakulonga pyakuonadi na mtima wa kufunana , tendeni tikule monsene mwene muna Khristu . Iye ndi msolo wa mpingo . 
49004016	Iye ambatonga manungo onsene . Mapindi angaphatana na uzingo ambasasanya manungo amumphu . Tenepo mapindi onsenewa angaphata basa idasasanyirwa iwo , mwakufunana ambaphedza manungo kukula . 
49004017	Na dzina ya Mbuya , chinchino ndikukucheuzani kuti muleke khalave ninga anthu okhonda dziwa Mulungu , ale manyerezero awo ngakusowa basa
49004018	pontho nzeru zawo nsa mumdima . Iwo nkhabe khundu m'moyo umbapereka Mulungu tayu , thangwi iwo adakhonda kudziwa Mulungu na kuuma kwawo mtima . 
49004019	Iwo nkhabeve manyadzo tayu : iwo apipereka okha ene kuna makhaliro awo akudawika towera achite pinthu pyakunyansa pyonsene mwakukhonda kuleka . 
49004020	Mbwenye penepi si pile pidafunza imwe pya Khristu tayu !
49004021	Ndimomwene kuti imwe mudavadi pya Khristu , pontho imwe ninga anyakutewera a Khristu mudafunziswadi pyakuonadi pile pimbagumanwa muna Yesu . 
49004022	Tenepo chinchino , lekani makhaliro anu akale , ale akhakuchitisani kuti mukhale ninga mukhakhalira imwe kale — moyo wanu wakale , ule ukhakuvungani , thangwi ya pikhumbo pyakunama . 
49004023	Mitimanu na manyerezero anu pisanduzike kukhala pyachinchinoletu , 
49004024	pontho khalani na moyo wachinchino ule walengwa sasawa ninga Mulungu , moyo ule ngwakulungama pontho wakuchena . 
49004025	Mphapo lekani kunama ! Munthu onsene athema kulonga pyakuonadi pyokhokha kuna mwanzache , thangwi tonsene pabodzi ndife mapindi a manungo a Khristu . 
49004026	Ngakhala imwe mwazhangalira mwanzanu , lekani tawirisa kuzhangaliko kukuchitisani kuti mudawe , pontho lekani khala akupinda kufikirana kudoka kwa dzuwa . 
49004027	Lekani pasa danga Satana . 
49004028	Ngakhala munthu akhaba kalene , aleke kubako , pontho atome kuphata basa yadidi na manjache towera agumane pinthu pyache na pinango pyakuphedzerambo anyakutcherenga . 
49004029	Lekani bulusa mafala akufudza m'kanwa mwanu , mbwenye longani mafala akuwangisa mtima pandzidzi anafunika iwo , towera anyakukuveserani aganyali na mafalanu . 
49004030	Pontho lekani tsukwalisa Mzimu Wakuchena wa Mulungu . Mzimuyo ntchidindo chakuonesa kuti ndimwedi anthu ache a Mulungu , pontho chitsikimizo kuti munadzasudzulwa pa Nsiku inafuna Mulungu dzapulumusa anthu ache . 
49004031	Bulusani pinthu pyonsene pyakupinda , pyaukali na pyakuzhangali mumtima mwanu . Lekani longolozana na kutikanizana , pontho muleke nyerezeranave pyakuipa unango na mwanzache . 
49004032	Mbwenye khalani anthu akukomerana mtima pontho akuverana nsisi ; ngakhala mwadawirana unango na mwanzache , mulekererane ninga kukulekererani kudachita Mulungu kudzera muna Khristu . 
49005001	Tendeni , mphapo , tikhale ninga Mulungu , thangwi ife ndife anache apamtima . 
49005002	Khristu adatifuna pyakwanga mwakuti adapereka moyo wache ninga nsembe yakununkhira pontho yakukomera Mulungu . Tenepo , chinchino khalanimbo na moyo wa kufunana . 
49005003	Lekani chita pyakuzuda , pyakunyansa , penu mtima , penu na kupilonga kwene pakati panu , thangwi imwe ndimwe anthu a Mulungu . 
49005004	Pontho pakanwa panu paleke bulusa mafala akuzuda , akupupwa , penu akusingirira . Mbwenye longani mafala akupereka nawo takhuta kuna Mulungu . 
49005005	Chinthu chakuti mudziwe ntchichi , nkhabe munthu wakuchita pyakuzuda , pyakunyansa , penu mtima ( kuchita mtima ndi sasawa na kupembedza mifanikizo ) anadzagumana mbuto mu Ufumu wa Khristu na wa Mulungu tayu . 
49005006	Lekani tawirisa munthu kukunyengezani na mafala akupupwa , thangwi pinthu ninga penepi pimbadzesa ukali wa Mulungu kuna anthu okhonda kumvera ale . 
49005007	Mphapo lekani fambirana na anthu ninga enewa . 
49005008	Kalene imwe mukhafamba mumdima , mbwenye chinchino mwasanduka anthu a Mbuya , natenepo muli m'cheza . Tenepo khalani ninga anthu a m'cheza , 
49005009	thangwi cheza ndiye chimbadzesa pyakuvuna pyadidi ninga udidi , pyakulungama na pyakuonadi . 
49005010	Sakasakani pinthu pyakukomera Mbuya . 
49005011	Lekani chita pinthu pyapezi ninga pimbachita anthu a mumdima , mbwenye adzeseni kuti adzaone cheza . 
49005012	( Mphyakuchitisadi manyadzo na kulonga kwene pinthu pile pimbachita iwo m'chibisobiso . )
49005013	Pontho cheza chingamwinikira pinthu pyonsene , makhaliro chadichadi a pyonsene ambaonekera pakwecha . 
49005014	Tenepo chinthu chonsene chakuonekera pakwecha , chimbasanduka cheza . Ndi thangwi yache pikulongwa kuti : " Nyakugonawe , lamuka , lamuka kuimfa , tenepo Khristu anadzakumwinikira . "
49005015	Tenepo chitani mpholemphole na makhaliro anuwo . Lekani khala ninga anthu okhonda dziwa pinthu , mbwenye mukhale ninga anthu anzeru . 
49005016	Phatisani basa mwadidi mwayi onsene una imwewu , thangwi nsiku zina ife zino nsakuipa . 
49005017	Lekani khala akupupwa , mbwenye sakasakani pinthu pinafuna Mbuya kuti mupichite . 
49005018	Lekani ledzera , thangwi munadzavungika , kwache mudzazwe na Mzimu Wakuchena . 
49005019	Longesanani na mafala a masalimo , nyimbo zakulemedza Mulungu , na nyimbo zakumkuza nazo . Imbirani Mbuya nyimbo na kumkuza m'mitima mwanu . 
49005020	Ndzidzi onsene perekani takhuta kuna Mulungu Baba kudzera muna dzina ya Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu thangwi ya pyonsene pimbachita iye . 
49005021	Khalani akuverana unango na mwanzache , thangwi mungachita tenepo munalemedzambo Khristu . 
49005022	Imwe akazi verani amunanu ninga mumbavera imwe Mbuya . 
49005023	Mamuna ndi msolo wa mkazache , ningambo Khristu ndi msolo wa mpingo ; pontho Khristu mwenechiro ndi Nyankhombo wa mpingo , ule ndi manungo ache . 
49005024	Natenepo akazi avere monsene mwene amunawo , sasawa ninga mumbavera mpingo Khristu . 
49005025	Amuna , funani akazanu sasawa ninga mudafunira Khristu mpingo , mbapereka moyo wache thangwi ya mpingowo , 
49005026	towera ukhale wache ene . Iye adachita tenepo kuti aupambule na kuupereka kuna Mulungu , pidamala iye kuuchenesa pakuusambisa na mafalache , ale akhala ninga madzi , 
49005027	towera ukhale kuna iye ene mpingo wakudemelera na wakubalika , wakusowa dontho , makwinya , penu pinango ninga penepi , mbwenye wakupambulika pontho wakusowa chinthu chakuupokanyisa . 
49005028	Amuna athema kufuna akazawo sasawambo ninga mumbafunira iwo manungo awo . Mamuna ambafuna mkazache ngule ambapifuna yekha ene . 
49005029	Nkhabe munthu ambazonda manungo ache , mbwenye iye ambaadyesa na kuayang'anira mwadidi , ninga mumbachita Khristu kuna mpingo wache , 
49005030	thangwi mpingowo ndi manungo ache , ifembo ndife mapindi a mpingowo . 
49005031	Ninga mudalongera Malemba kuti , " Thangwi ya penepi mamuna anadzasiya babache na mache mbakaphatikana na mkazache , tenepo uwiriawo anadzakhala mbodzi . "
49005032	Pana chakubisika chakuzika chakuonadi chile chatchululwa m'Malemba chinaona ine kuti chikulonga pya Khristu na pya mpingo . 
49005033	Mbwenye chikulonga pontho kuna imwepo : Mamuna onsene athema kufuna mkazache ninga mumbapifunira iye yekha ene , mkazimbo athema kulemedza mamunache . 
49006001	Anamwe verani makolo anu , thangwi , ninga ana a Mulungu , mphyakuthema kuchita tenepo . 
49006002	" Lemedzani babanu na manu " , enewa ndi matongero akutoma ale padzulu pache pana kudumbira ;
49006003	" towera pinthu pyonsene pifambe mwadidi kuna imwe , pontho kuti nsiku zakukhala kwanu na moyo pansi pano ziinjipe . "
49006004	Imwembo , ababa lekani kusosa ananu , mbwenye mualere na kuapasa mwambo pontho kuafunzisa m'njira yachikhristu . 
49006005	Imwe mabitchu , verani ambuyanu a pansi pano mwakualemedza na kuagopa ; chitani penepi na mtimanu onsene khala ninga mukuchitira Khristu . 
49006006	Lekani vera kokha mbuyanu ngakhala iye ali ponthopo kukuyang'anirani towera mukome kuna iye ; mbwenye muphate basa na mtimanu onsene ninga bitchu wa Khristu pontho ninga mumbarunira Mulungu . 
49006007	Mabitchumwe , phatani basanu mwakukomerwa ninga mukuphatira Mbuya , nee kuti mukuphatira munthu tayu . 
49006008	Kumbukani kuti Mbuya anadzafupa munthu onsene , mabitchu penu mtumbe , thangwi ya mabasa adidi ambaphata iye . 
49006009	Imwembo ambuya , ntchibodzibodzi khalani adidi kuna mabitchu anu , pontho lekani kuathuswa . Kumbukani kuti imwe monsene pabodzi ndimwe mabitchu a Mbuyanu mbodzi wakudzulu , ule ambatonga mwakukhonda yang'ana nkhope . 
49006010	Pakumalisira , khalani akuwanga mukuphatanizana kwanu na Mbuya , pontho na mphamvu yache ikulu . 
49006011	Valani pida pyonsene pimbakupasani Mulungu , towera mukwanise kupitchinjiriza mwekha ene kuna unthawatawa wa Satana . 
49006012	Thangwi nkhondo yathuyi nee njakumenyana na anthu tayu , mbwenye tikumenyana na mizimu yakuipa ya kuthambo , ile ndi mafumu , atongi na anyamphamvu a nsiku za mdima zino . 
49006013	Tenepo , chinchino , valani pida pya Mulungu , towera mudzakwanise Impitchinjiriza nyamalwa angadzakusosani pansiku yakuipayo , pontho kuti pakumala pa nkhondoyi , imwe munadzathimiza kukhala na mphamvu . 
49006014	Tenepo khalani dzololo mwenemo mwavala kale pyakuonadi ninga bande yakumangwa m'chuno mwanu , chilungamo ninga mayala a utale akutchinjiriza nawo pagangaruwa panu , 
49006015	pontho kusasanyika kwanu kwenda kalalika Mphangwa Zadidi za mtendere kukhale ninga nsapato za anyankhondo . 
49006016	Ndzidzi onsene khalani na chikhulupiro ninga chakugedera nacho matswimo m'manja mwanu , towera mukwanise kuthimisa nacho matswimo akugaka moto akubulukira kuna Satana . 
49006017	Valani chipulumuso ninga chipewu cha utale chakutchinjirizira misolo yanu . Phatisani basa mafala a Mulungu , ale akhala ninga talasada yakumenyera nkhondo imbakupasani Mzimu Wakuchena ile . 
49006018	Chitani pyonsenepi pakupemphera ; pempherani ndzidzi onsene kuti Mulungu akuphedzeni . Pempherani ndzidzi onsene , ninga munakuphedzerani Mzimu Wakuchena . Thangwi ya penepi khalani m'maso , lekani taya mtima ; ndzidzi onsene pemphererani anthu onsene a Mulungu . 
49006019	Pontho pempherani kuti Mulungu andipase mphangwa ndzidzi onsene unalalika ine , towera ndilonge mwakuwanga mtima pontho kuti ndivekese pyakubisika pya Mphangwa Zadidi . 
49006020	Thangwi ya mphangwazi ine ndine muimiriri , podi kwene kuti ndine nyaperezo . Pempherani kuti ine ndikhale wakuwanga mtima pakulonga pya Mphangwa Zadidi , ninga mwathemera ine kulonga . 
49006021	Tikiko , mbaleathu wapamtima pontho nyabasa wakukhulupirika pabasa ya Mbuya , anadzakupangani pyonsene pya ine , towera imwe mupidziwembo kuti ine ndili tani , pontho mule munaphatira ine basa . 
49006022	Ndi thangwi yache ndikumtuma kuna imwe — kuti akupangeni mule munakhalira ife kuno , pontho kukuwangisani mtima . 
49006023	Mtendere , kufunana na chikhulupiro pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Baba pontho Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale na akhristu onsene . 
49006024	Kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kukhale kuna onsene ale ambamfuna Mbuya Yesu Khristu na kumfuna kokhonda mala . 
50001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , na Timoti , anyabasa a Khristu Yesu — Kwenda kuna anthu a Mulungu onsene a ku Filipi , ale ngakuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu , kuthimizapo akadamu a mpingo pabodzi na anyakuphedzera . 
50001002	Kukoma mtima pontho mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Babathu na Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale namwe . 
50001003	Ndimbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu wanga pandzidzi onsene umbakukumbukani ine ;
50001004	pontho ndzidzi onsene umbakupemphererani ine monsenene , ndimbapemphera na kukomerwa
50001005	thangwi ya kundiphedza kudachita imwe pabasa ya kuvekesa Mphangwa Zadidi kutomera nsiku yakutoma kufikirana lero . 
50001006	Natenepo ndikupidziwadi kuti Mulungu , ule adatoma basa yadidi muna imwe anati athimize kuiphata kufikirana idzamalisike pansiku yakudza pontho kwa Khristu Yesu . 
50001007	Imwe ndimwe apamtima panga , natenepo mphyakuthemadi kuti ndinyerezere pya imwe ninga mumbachitira inemu . Thangwi imwe monsenene mwagawana na ine mwayi udandipasa Mulunguwu , podi kwene ndzidzi una ine m'perezo , penu pikhali ine wakusudzulwa kutchinjiriza Mphangwa Zadidi na kuzichitisa kukhala zakukhazikika mwadidi . 
50001008	Mulungu ndiye mboni yanga kuti kukufunani kwanga na mtimanga onsene kumbabulukira kuna kukufunani kukulu kwa Khristu Yesu mwenechiro . 
50001009	Ndikupemphera kuti kufunana kwanu kuthimize kukula pabodzi na udziwisi chadichadi pontho na kuona kwa pinthu mwadidiletu , 
50001010	towera mukwanise kusankhula chadidiletu . Tenepo munadzakhala akusowa chinthu chakukuipisani pontho chakukupokanyisani pansiku yakudza pontho kwa Khristu . 
50001011	Moyo wanu unadzakhala na makhaliro akulungama , ale anakwanisa kubulukira kuna Yesu Khristu yekha basi , kudzesa demelero kuna Mulungu na kumkuza . 
50001012	Ndinafuna mupidziwe , abale anga , kuti pinthu pile pyandichitikira pyaphedzadi kuti Mphangwa Zadidi ziende m'tsogolo . 
50001013	Penepi pyachitisa kuti anyakulondali nyumba yachifumu onsene pabodzi na anthu anango onsene kuno apidziwe kuti ndili m'perezo thangwi ya kukhala nyabasa wa Khristu . 
50001014	Kukhala kwanga m'perezo muno kwachitisa abale azinji ene kunyindira Mbuya mwakuti awanga mtima ndzidzi onsene kulalika Mphangwa Zadidia mwakukhonda gopa kupiringana pakutoma . 
50001015	Ndimomwene kuti anthu anango ambalalika Khristu thangwi iwo akuchita bivu pontho akufuna pyakuthimbana , mbwenye anango ambapichita na mtima wakufuna kuphedza anango . 
50001016	Enewa ambapichita na mtima wakufunana thangwi ambapidziwa kuti Mulungu andipasa basa yakutchinjiriza Mphangwa Zadidi . 
50001017	Anangombo ambalalika Khristu na manyerezero akupotoka pontho na mtima wakupithemba ; iwo ambanyerezera kuti anathimiza kundidzesera nyatwa ndzidzi unakhala ine m'perezo muno . 
50001018	Nkhabe basa tayu ! Ine ndakomerwa napyo , male munakwanisira Khristu kulalikwamo , penu na manyerezero adidi penu akupotoka . Tenepo ndinathimiza kukomerwa , 
50001019	thangwi ndikupidziwa kuti kudzera muna kupemphera kwanu , pontho na chiphedzo chakubulukira kuna Mzimu wa Yesu Khristu ndinati ndisudzulwe . 
50001020	Chinakhumba ine chikulu pontho chidikhiro changa ntchakuti ine nkhabe na pang'ono pene dzachimwana basanga tayu , mbwenye kuti ndzidzi onsene , makamaka chinchino pano , ndinawanga mtima pyakwanga , towera Khristu akuzwe kudzera muna ine , penu ndikhale na moyo penu ndife . 
50001021	Thangwi kuna ine kukhala na moyo ndi Khristu , pontho kufa nkhwakuganyalisa . 
50001022	Mbwenye ngakhala kuthimiza kwanga kukhala na moyo kunandipasa mwayi wakuti ndiphate basa yakuganyalisa anango , penepa ine chakuti ndisankhule nkhabe kuchidziwa tayu . 
50001023	Ndaphatwa uku na uku , kwinangoku ndikufuna pyakwanga kuti ndiende pyanga kakhala pabodzi na Khristu , thangwi chenechi ntchakundikomera pikulu ;
50001024	mbwenye kwinangomboku nkhwakufunika pyakwanga kuti ndikhale na moyo thangwi ya imwe . 
50001025	Penepi pyandichitisa kupidziwadi kuti ndinati ndikhale na moyo . Ndinadzathimiza kukhala basi na imwe monsene kuphedza chikhulupiro pontho kukomerwa kwanu kuti pikule , 
50001026	towera ndingadzakhala namwe pontho , mudzakhale nawo mathangwi akuinjipa akuti munakwanisa kundinyadira nawo m'moyo wanu wakuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . 
50001027	Chinchino chinthu chakufunika ntchakuti makhaliro a moyo wanu akhale akuthemerana na pinafuna Mphangwa Zadidi za Khristu . Tenepo ngakhala ndinakwanisa kudza dzakuonani penu tayu , ndinati ndive kuti mukuimira dzololo na manyerezero abodzi , pontho kuti na chikhumbo chibodzi mumbaphedzana kumenya nkhondo kutchinjiriza chikhulupiro chakuthemerana na Mphangwa Zadidi . 
50001028	Lekani gopa anyamalwanu ; khalani akuwanga mtima ndzidzi onsene . Penepi pinadzaatsikimizira kuti iwo anadzavungwa , pontho kuti imwe munadzakunda , thangwi ambakuchitisani kukunda ndi Mulungu . 
50001029	Imwe mwapaswa mwayi wa kutumikira Khristu , nee wa kumkhulupira kokha tayu , mbwenye na kumbonerera kwene . 
50001030	Chinchino mukumenyambo nkhondo pabodzi na ine . Nkhondo yache njontho idandiona imwe kale kuimenya ile ninga munapivera imwe kuti ndikuthimiza kuimenya . 
50002001	Moyo wanu wakuphatanizana na Khristu umbakupasani mphamvu , pontho kukufunani kwache kumbakuthonthozani . Chiphatizano na Mzimu Wakuchena muli nacho , pontho imwe mumbakomerana mtima pontho mumbaverana nyambalo unango na mwanzache . 
50002002	Ndikukupemphani , mphapo , kuti mundichitise kukomerwa monsene mwene pakukhala na manyerezero abodzi na kufunana kubodzi , pontho kukhumba na kunyerezera chinthu chibodzi . 
50002003	Lekani chita chinthu na mtima wakupithemba penu wakutumbama , mbwenye khalani akupichepesa ; ndzidzi onsene nyerezerani anzanu ninga akufunika kupiringana imwe . 
50002004	Lekani nyerezerani kuchita pinthu pyakukomera imwe mwekha , mbwenye na pyakukomerambo anango ene . 
50002005	Monsene mwathema kukhala na mtima onthowo ninga ukhali na Khristu Yesu ule :
50002006	Iye akhali na umulungu onsene , mbwenye iye hadaikha konta pya kukhalac kwache sasawa na Mulungu tayu . 
50002007	M'mbuto mwache iye adapereka na kufuna kwache pyonsene pikhali na iye , pontho iye adasanduka kukhala ninga bitchu mbakhala munthu ninga anthu onsene . 
50002008	Pidakhala iye ninga munthu tenepo , iye adapichepesa pontho adavera , podi na kufa kwene — kufa kwache kwa pamtanda kule . 
50002009	Na thangwi yeneyi Mulungu adamkuza monsene mwene mbampasa dzina yakupiringana madzina onsene , 
50002010	mwakuti pyonsene pya kudzulu , pya pansi pano , na pya dziko ya pansi pamataka , pinadzagodama kulemedza dzina ya Yesu , 
50002011	pontho munthu onsene anadzatawira na mulomo wache kuti Yesu Khristu ndi Mbuya , kudzesa demelero kuna Mulungu Baba . 
50002012	Natenepo , abale anga apamtima , mphyakufunika pyakwanga pene chinchino ndzidzi una ine kutali na imwe kuti munyanye kundivera ninga kundivera kukhachita imwe ndzidzi onsene ukhali ine na imwe . Thimizani kuchita pinthu pyakuthemerana na chipulumuso chanu mwamantha pontho mwakutetemera kufikirana mamalisiro ache . 
50002013	Thangwi Mulungu ndiye ambaphata basa muna imwe kukuchitisani kufuna , pontho kukwanisa kuvera kufuna kwache . 
50002014	Phatani pyonsene mwakukhonda dungunya penu kupokanya , 
50002015	towera mukhale okhonda dawa pontho amtima wangwiro , ana a Mulungu akusowa chinthu chakukupokanyisani , ale ambakhala m'dziko ya anthu akuipa na akudawika . Imwe mwathema kuonesa cheza pakati pawo ninga nyenyezi zakumwinikira dziko yonsene , 
50002016	ndzidzi unapereka imwe kuna iwo mafala akupasa moyo . Ngakhala munapichita tenepo ine ndinadzakhala nayo thangwi yakunyadira pansiku yakudza pontho kwa Khristu , thangwi penepyo pinadzaonesa kuti mphamvu na basanga nee pyamalila papezi tayu . 
50002017	Chikhulupiro chanu chakhala ninga nsembe yakuperekwa kuna Mulungu . Podi kwene pichitike kuti chiropa changa chitsanulirwe pansembe yeneyi ninga chakupereka , ine ndakomerwa , pontho ndatsanzaya pabodzi na imwe monsene . 
50002018	Ntchibodzibodzi imwembo mwathema kukomerwa pontho kutsanzaya pabodzi na ine . 
50002019	Ngakhala nkhufuna kwa Mbuya ndikudikhira kutuma Timoti kuna imwe chinchino pano , towera ndiwangiswe mtima na pinafuna iye dzandipanga pya imwe . 
50002020	Iye ndiye ene basi ana manyerezero ninga anga akutsalakanadi pya imwe . 
50002021	Anango onsene ambatsalakana pya kufuna pya okha ene , nee tsalakana pya kufuna pya Yesu Khristu tayu . 
50002022	Imwe mumbapidziwa kuti makhaliro a Timoti aoneka kale kuti ngadidi . Mumbapidziwa kuti iye adaphata basa yakuvekesa Mphangwa Zadidi pabodzi na ine khala ninga pimbachita mwana na babache . 
50002023	Si ndzidzi ndingadziwa munafuna dzandifambira pinthu , ndikudikhira kumtuma kuna imwe . 
50002024	Inembo ndinanyindira Mbuya kuti ine ene ndinati ndifikembo kwanuko chinchino pano . 
50002025	Ndapinyerezera kuti mphyakufunika kumbwezera mbaleathu Epafrodito . Weneyu adaphata basa , pontho adatchinjiriza pabodzi na ine Mphangwa Zadidi . Iye adakuphatirani basa ninga nyakutumwanu kundiphedza . 
50002026	Epafrodito ana chitchuwo kufuna kukuonani monsene , pontho akusanyika mumtima mwache thangwi imwe mudava kuti iye akhadwala . 
50002027	Ndimomwene kuti iye akhadwala chifupi kufa . Mbwenye Mulungu akhadamvera nsisi , nee kuti adavera nsisi iye yekha tayu , mbwenye na ine ene , towera ndileke tsukwala pikulu . 
50002028	Ndiye thangwi yache ndina chipapo chikulu kumbwezera kuna imwe , towera mungamuona mukomerwe pontho , penepo kutsukwala kwanga kunamalambo . 
50002029	Mtambireni mwakukomerwa ninga mbale muna Mbuya . Anthu ninga iye mwathema kualemedza . 
50002030	Iye adapipereka kutaya moyo wache , pontho akhali chifupi kufa thangwi ya kuphata basa ya Khristu , towera andiphedze pinthu pidakhonda imwe kwanisa kundiphedza napyo . 
50003001	Pakumalisira , abale anga , komerwani mukuphatanizana kwanu na Mbuya . Ine nkhabe nenseka na kukulemberani pontho mafala abodzibodziwo tayu , thangwi mphinthu pyakukutchinjirizani . 
50003002	Khalani m'maso na anambwa , anthu ambachita pinthu pyakuipa ale . Enewa ngale ambakakamiza kucheka manungo . 
50003003	Ife ndife anyakugwandwa nsonga yakumaso chadichadi , thangwi timbapembedza Mulungu kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena mbatikomerwa m'moyo mukuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . Ife nkhabe nyindira pinthu pimbachita anthu pamanungo tayu , 
50003004	podi kwene kuti ine ndinakwanisadi kunyindira pinthu ninga penepi . Ngakhala munthu unango ananyerezera kuti anakwanisa kunyindira pimbachitwa pamanungo , inembo ndina mathangwi mazinji akuchitira chibodzibodzi kupiringana achewo . 
50003005	Ine ndidagwandwa nsonga yakumaso pidamala ine dimingu ibodzi yakubalwa . Ine ndine Mulsraele pakubalwa , ndine wa dzinza ya Benjamini , pontho Mheberi chadichadi . Kulonga pya kuteweza mwambo , ine ndikhali Mfarisi , 
50003006	pontho ndikhali na chipapo chikulu pa chipembedzo changa mwakuti ndidaboneresa mpingo . Kulonga pya kulungamiswa kwa munthu pakuvera matongero a mwambo , ine ndidayeswa nyakusowa chakundipokanyisa . 
50003007	Mbwenye pinthu pyonsene pikhayesa ine kuti mphyakuganyalisa pile , lero ndikupiyesa ninga pyakukhonda ganyalisa thangwi ya kutumikira Khristu , 
50003008	pontho si pyokhapyo tayu , mbwenye ndimbayesa pinthu pyonsene ninga pyakukhonda ganyalisaletu thangwi ya chinthu chakufunika pikulu , chile ndi udziwisi pa Khristu Yesu Mbuyanga . Na thangwi ya kutumikira Khristu ndataya pinthu pyonsene . Ndapiyesa pinthu pyapezi mbandipitaya pakhuku , towera ndikhale wa Khristu , 
50003009	pontho ndikukhala wakuphatanizana na iye monsene mwene . Ine nkhabeve kupiyesa ndekha ene wakulungama pamaso pa Mulungu pakuvera mwambo tayu , mbwenye chinchino ndalungamiswa pamaso pa Mulungu kudzera muna chikhulupiro pana Khristu . Kulungamiswa kweneku kumbabulukira kuna Mulungu , pontho kwagona pachikhulupiro . 
50003010	Chinafuna ine nkhudziwa Khristu , pontho kuona mphamvu idamulamusa kuimfa ile . Ndinafuna pontho kuti ndione nyatwa sasawa ninga mudaonera iye nyatwa mbandisanduka ninga iye na mafero adachita iye ene , 
50003011	na chidikhiro chakuti inembo ndinadzalamuswa kuimfa . 
50003012	Sinalonga kuti penepi ndapikwanisa kale , penu kuti ndathema monsene mwene kale tayu . Mbwenye ine ndimbachita phinga kufuna kutambira mfupo , thangwi penepi ndiye pidandichitisira Khristu Yesu kuti ndikhale wache . 
50003013	Abale anga , sinapiyesa ndekha ene kuti penepi ndapikwanisa kale tayu . Mbwenye pana chinthu chibodzi basi chimbachita ine . Chinthu chache ntchakuti ndimbaduwalira pinthu pya m'nduli , mbandichita phinga kufuna kafikira pinthu pya kutsogolo . 
50003014	Ndikuthamangira kumadolomezero a bitchabitcha , towera ndikatambire mfupo wa moyo okhonda mala , wandichemerera Mulungu kudzera muna Khristu Yesu ule . 
50003015	Tenepo ife tonsene ale ndife akukola m'moyo wauzimu , tikhale na manyerezero sasawa ninga enewa . Mbwenye ngakhala anango a imwe ana manyerezero akulekana na enewa , Mulungu anadzapichitisa kukhala pyakuveka kuna imwe . 
50003016	Podi na kutani kwene , tendeni tithimize kwenda m'tsogolo malingana na matongero ateweza ife kufikirana lerowa . 
50003017	Abale anga , imwe mwathema kuthimiza kunditsanzira . Tsanzirani ale ambateweza upangizi wakuthema udakuonesani ife ule . 
50003018	Ndakupangani kale penepi kazinji kene , tenepa chinchino ndikukupangani pontho na misozi : alipo anthu azinji ale makhaliro awo ambaachitisa kukhala anyamalwa a imfa ya Khristu pamtanda . 
50003019	Pakumalisira pache anadzaenda kugehena , thangwi mulungu wawo ndi pikhumbo pya manungo . Iwo ambanyadira pinthu pidathema iwo kuchita napyo manyadzo , pontho iwo ambanyerezera kwene pinthu pya padziko yapansi pano basi . 
50003020	Mbwenye ife ndife mzika za kudzulu , pontho ife maso ali kunjira kudikhira Nyankhombo wathu kudza kubulukira konthoko . Weneyu ndi Mbuya Yesu Khristu , 
50003021	ule anadzasanduza manungo athu , ambavunda ana ifewa , kukhala sasawa na manungo ache ademelero ale . Iye anadzachita penepi na mphamvu zontho zile zimbakwanisa na iye kuikha nazo pinthu pyonsene pansi pautongi wache . 
50004001	Natenepo , abale anga , ndimwe apamtima panga , pontho ndakutchuwani pyakwanga . Imwe mumbandichitisa kukomerwa pyakwanga , pontho ndimbakunyadirani pyakwanga . Tenepo abale anga apamtima panga , mwenemu ndiye mwathema imwe kuimira dzololo m'moyo wanu wakuphatanizana na Mbuya . 
50004002	Ndaphata miyendo , Yuodia na Sintike , ndikukupemphani kuti muyese kuphatizana ninga abale muna Mbuya . 
50004003	Ndinapempha pontho iwe mwanzanga wakukhulupirika wakuphata nane basa pabodzi kuti uaphedze akaziwa , thangwi iwo adaphata basa mwakuwangisa pabodzi pene na ine kuvekesa Mphangwa Zadidi , pabodzi pene na Klementi pontho na anyabasa anzanga onsene , ale madzina awo alembwa m'bukhu ya moyo . 
50004004	Komerwani mukuphatanizana kwanu na Mbuya ndzidzi onsene . Ndikulonga pontho kuti : komerwani !
50004005	Muonese kufulika kwanu kuna anthu onsene . Mbuya ali chifupi . 
50004006	Lekani swipa mtima na chinthu na chibodzi chene , mbwenye ndzidzi onsene kupemphera kwanu konsene mupemphe Mulungu pinthu pinasowa imwe , na mtima wakupereka takhuta . 
50004007	Tenepo mtendere wa Mulungu , ule ngwakupiringana nzeru za anthu , unadzakutchinjirizani mwadidi mitima na manyerezero anu mukuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . 
50004008	Pakumalisira , abale anga , imwe mwathema kuikha mtima papinthu pile mphyadidi pontho pyakuthema kusimbwa napyo . Pinthu pyache mphipi : pyakuonadi , pyakusiririka , pyakulungama , pyangwiro , pyakubalika na pyachilemedzo . 
50004009	Imwe mwathema kuchita pinthu pidafunza imwe na kutambira kubulukira kuna ine pile , pyonsene pidava imwe kubulukira kuna ine , pontho kupiona ndikupichita . Tenepo Mulungu , nyakupasa anthu mtendere ule , anadzakhala namwe . 
50004010	Pagwanda nsiku zizinji mbamukhonda onesa kunditsalakana kwanu , tenepo ndakomerwa pikulu mukuphatanizana kwathu na Mbuya , thangwi mwatoma pontho kuonesa kunditsalakana kwanu . Kunditsalakana mukhanditsalakanadi , mbwenye mukhadasowa danga yakuti mupionese . 
50004011	Pinalonga inepi , si thangwi yakuti ndasowa chinthu tayu , thangwi ine ndafunza kukwana na pinthu pina ine . 
50004012	Kusowa na kukhala napyo pizinji ndimbakudziwa . Papinthu pyonsenepi ndidafunza kukhala kwapyo , penu kukhuta penu kukhala na njala , penu kukhala na pinthu pizinji penu pyakuchepa . 
50004013	Ndimbakwanisa kuchita pyonsene kudzera muna Khristu ambandipasa mphamvu ule . 
50004014	Mbwenye mudachita pyadidi kundiphedza panyatwa zanga . 
50004015	Imwe anthu a ku Filipi mukupidziwa mwadidi mwene kuti pidabuluka ine ku Makedonia nsiku zakutoma kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi , ndimwe ene basi mpingo udandiphedza ; ndimwe ene basi mudagawana na ine pinthu pidaganyali ine na pidakhonda ganyali ine . 
50004016	Pikhali ine ku Tesalonika , imwe mukhanditumizira kazinji kene pinthu pikhasowa ine kundiphedza napyo . 
50004017	Si kuti ndikuikha mtimanga pamtukwa udandipasa imwe ule tayu , mbwenye chinafuna ine ntchakuti mabasanu adidi azinji athimizirike kuna mabasanu alembwa kale na Mulungu ale . 
50004018	Ndatambiradi pyonsene mbandikhala napyo pizinjiletu . Tenepo ndina pyonsene pinasowa ine , pile pidatumizira imwe Epafrodito . Mitukwanu yonseneyi yakhala ninga khwema yadidi , nsembe yakutambirwa na Mulungu mbakomerwa nayo . 
50004019	Mulungu wanga ngwakufuma pyakwanga pene , tenepo anadzakupasani pyonsene pinasowa imwe kudzera muna Khristu Yesu . 
50004020	Demelero ikhale kuna Mulungu Babathu , kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
50004021	Mwenyikiro kuna anthu onsene a Mulungu , ale nga Khristu Yesu . Abale ali pabodzi na ine kunowa akukupasani mwenyikiro . 
50004022	Anthu onsene a Mulungu ali kunowa akukupasani mwenyikiro makamaka ale ambaphata basa kunyumba ya Mfumu wa Roma . 
50004023	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu kukhale namwe monsene . 
51001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyakutumwa wa Khristu Yesu na kufuna kwa Mulungu ; ikubulukira pontho kuna mbaleathu Timoti —
51001002	Kwenda kuna anthu a Mulungu mumzinda wa Kolose , ale mbabale athu akukhulupirika mukuphatanizana na Khristu . Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu pikhale namwe . 
51001003	Ndzidzi onsene umbakupemphererani ife , timbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu , Baba wa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
51001004	Thangwi tava mule mumbakhulupira imwe Khristu Yesu , pontho na mule mumbaafunira imwe anthu onsene a Mulungu . 
51001005	Mphangwa zakuonadi , zile ndi Mphangwa Zadidi , pidatoma izo kulalikwa kuna imwe , imwe mudava pya pinthu pinadikhira imwe dzatambira . Natenepo chikhulupiro chanu na kufunana kwanu pyagona pa pinadikhira imwe dzatambira , pile pyakoyerwa imwe kudzulu . 
51001006	Mphangwa Zadidi zikuthimiza kudzesa kutsanzaya , pontho zikufalikira kudziko yonsene yapansi ninga pyachitira izo pakati panu kutomera nsiku idatoma imwe kuva na kudzindikira chadichadi pya kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu . 
51001007	M'mbuto mwathua Epafra adakufunzisani pya kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu . Iye ndi mwanzathu wapamtima wakuphatira naye basa pabodzi , ule pontho ndi nyabasa wakukhulupirika wa Khristu . 
51001008	Iye atipanga pya kufunana kwanu kwakupasani Mzimu Wakuchena kule . 
51001009	Thangwi ya penepi ndzidzi onsene takupemphererani kutomera nsiku idava ife pya imwe . Timbapempha Mulungu kuti akudzazeni na udziwisi wa kufuna kwache na nzeru pontho kuvesa konsene kule kumbabulukira kuna Mzimu Wakuchena . 
51001010	Tenepo imwe munadzakwanisa kukhala na makhaliro ninga munapifunira Mbuya , pontho kuchita pyakumkomera monsene mwene . Moyo wanu unadzaonesa nsapo zadidi za mtundu onsene , pontho nzeru zanu zakudziwa nazo Mulungu zinadzakula . 
51001011	jye akuchitiseni kukhala anthu amphamvu monsene mwene kudzera muna mphamvu pontho demelero yache , towera mukwanise kupirira papinthu pyonsene okhonda taya mtima . Perekani takhuta na mtima wakusekera kuna Baba , ule akuchitisani kukhala anthu akuthema kutambira khundu yanu papinthu pidakoyera Mulungu anthu ache mu ufumu wa cheza pile . 
51001012	
51001013	Iye adatiombola kuna mphamvu za mdima mbatidzesa mwadidi muufumu wa mwanache wapamtima , 
51001014	ule kudzera muna iye , Mulungu adatiombola , pontho kutilekerera pyakudawa pyathu . 
51001015	Khristu , ule ngwakuoneka , alandana na Mulungu , wakukhonda oneka ule , pontho iye ndi Mwana wautombo , wakufunika pyakwanga kupiringana pyakulengwa pyonsene . 
51001016	Thangwi Mulungu adalenga pinthu pyonsene pya kudzulu na pya pansi pano kudzera muna iye , pinthu pyakuoneka na pyakukhonda oneka pene , kuthimizapo mizimu yakukhala na mphamvu , ile ndi ambuya , atongi pontho mafumu . Mulungu adalenga kudzulu na dziko yapansi kudzera muna iye , pontho kuti pikhale pyakuganyalisa kuna iye . 
51001017	Khristu akhalipo kale pinthu pyonsene mbipidzati lengwa , tenepo kuphatanizana na Khristu kwachitisa kuti pinthu pyonsene pikhale na mbuto zakuthemerana nayo . 
51001018	Iye ndi msolo wa manungo ache , ale ndi mpingo ; iye ndi phata ya moyo wa manungo . Iye ndi Mwana wautombo , wakutoma kulamuswa kuimfa ule , towera iye yekha ene akhale wakutoma padzulu pa pinthu pyonsene . 
51001019	Thangwi Mulungu mwenechiroache pidamkomera kuti mwanayo akhale na umulungu wache monsene mwene . 
51001020	Tenepo kudzera muna mwanayo , Mulungu adanyerezera kudzesa pontho pinthu pyonsene , pya dziko yapansi na pya kudzulu pene , kuna iye mwenechiro pakudzesa mtendere kudzera muna imfa ya mwanache pamtanda ninga nsembe . 
51001021	Kalene imwe mukhali kutali na Mulungu , pontho mukhali anyamalwache , thangwi ya makhaliro na manyerezero anu akudawika . 
51001022	Mbwenye chinchino Mulungu akuchitisani kukhala pontho ashamwali ache kudzera muna manungo a mwanache pidafa iye , towera mukhale anthu akuchena , angwiro na akusowa chinthu chakukupokanyisani pamaso pache . 
51001023	Tenepo imwe mwathema kukhala anthu akukhulupirika , pamaziko akuwanga pontho akukhazikika mwakukhonda tekenyeka pachidikhiro china imwe chakubulukira kuna Mphangwa Zadidi zidatambira imwe zile . Ndi Mphangwa Zadidi zidandisanduza , ine Paulo , kukhala nyabasa wa Mbuya — Mphangwa Zadidi zile zalalikwa kuna anthu onsene padziko yapansi . 
51001024	Chinchino ndakomerwa na nyatwa zinakuonerani inezi , thangwi nyatwa zinaona ine m'manungo mwangazi nkhuphedza kumalisa nyatwa zakusalira za manungo a Khristu , ale ndi mpingo . 
51001025	Tenepo Mulungu adandiikha kukhala nyabasa wa mpingo . Iye adandipasa basa yeneyi yakuchitira udidi wanu . Basa yeneyi njakuti ndichitise mphangwa zache kudziwika monsene mwene , 
51001026	zile kalene zikhadabisirwa madzinza onsene , mbwenye chinchino zatchululwa kuna anthu ache . 
51001027	Pinafuna Mulungu mphyakuti adziwise anthu ache chakubisikachi , chile ndi mfuma pontho demelero , pyakoyera iye madzinza onsene . Tenepo pyakubisikapi mphyakuti Khristu ali muna imwepo , kweneku nkhulonga kuti imwe munadzakwatambo khundu mudemelero ya Mulungu . 
51001028	Tenepo ife timbalalika pya Khristu kuna anthu onsene . Na nzeru zathu zonsene tikuacheuza pontho kuafunzisa , towera tidzese onsene pamaso pa Mulungu anthu akuthema monsene mwene mukuphatanizana na Khristu . 
51001029	Kuti penepi pichitike , ine ndimbaphata basa mwakuwangisa pyakwanga na mphamvu zikulu , zimbandipasa Khristu zile , pontho zikuphata basa muna ine zile . 
51002001	Ndinafuna mupidziwe mule mwaphatira ine basa mwakuwangisa thangwi ya imwepo , anthu a ku Laodikea , pontho anthu anango onsene ale anakhonda kundidziwa na pankhope . 
51002002	Ine ndikuchita tenepa , towera iwo awangiswe mtima , pontho kuti aphatanizane mukufunana . Tenepo iwo anakhala na mtsanzayiso wamumphu wa kuvesa chadichadi , towera iwo adziwedi pyakubisika pya Mulungu , pile ndi Khristu ,
51002003	mule mwagona mfuma yakubisika yonsene ya nzeru na udziwisi wa Mulungu . 
51002004	Mphapo , ndikukupangani kuti paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakukunyengezani na mphoka zakunama , penu ipyo pikhale pyakuveka mwadidi tani . 
51002005	Thangwi podi kwene kuti ndalekana namwe kumanungo , kwache muuzimu ndili namwe pabodzi , pontho ndakomerwa pyakwanga pyaona ine mule munafambisira imwe pinthu pyonsene mwadidi , pontho kukhazikika kwachita chikhulupiro chanu pana Khristu . 
51002006	Podi imwe mwatawira Khristu Yesu kukhala Mbuya , tenepo khalani mukuphatanizana naye . 
51002007	Zikisani mitsitsi yanu muna iye , ikhani mtimanu pana iye , pontho mukhale anthu akuwanga m'chikhulupiro chanu ninga mudafunzisirwa imwe . Pontho mukhale anthu akudziwa kupereka takhuta . 
51002008	Khalani m'maso kuti paleke khala munthu wakukuchitisani kukhala mabitchu m'manyerezero anu na nzeru zapezi zakunama za anthu , zile zimbagona pamitemo imbafunzisa anthu , pontho na mphamvu ya mizimu yakukhala na utongi padziko yonsene , nee zile zimbagona pa Khristu tayu . 
51002009	Thangwi umulungu onsene umbakhala m'manungo a Khristu , 
51002010	tenepo imwe mwapaswa moyo wamumphu mukuphatanizana kwanu na iye . Iye ana utongi pana mizimu yakukhala na mphamvu pontho utongi . 
51002011	Mukuphatanizana kwanu naye imwe mudagwandwa nsonga yakumaso , nee na kugwandwa kumbachita anthu kule tayu , mbwenye na kugwandwa kumbachita Khristu , kule kwakuchitisani kubuluka pansi pa utongi wa makhaliro akudawika akubalwa nawo . 
51002012	Thangwi pandzidzi udabatizwa imwe , mudaikhwa pabodzi na Khristu m'masiye , pontho muubatizo monthpmo imwe mudalamuswambo pabodzi naye kudzera muna chikhulupiro chanu pana mphamvu ya Mulungu , adalamusa Khristu kuimfa ule . 
51002013	Imwe kale mukhadafa muuzimu thangwi ya pyakudawa pyanu , pontho thangwi yakuti imwe mukhali anthu okhonda khala Ayuda okhonda dziwa mwambo . Mbwenye chinchino Mulungu akupasani moyo pabodzi na Khristu . Mulungu adalekerera pyakudawa pyathu pyonsene ;
51002014	iye adafudza mangawathu akhali na ife na matongero ache ene akhapokanyana na ife ale , pontho iye adaafudziratu pakuakhomera pamtanda . 
51002015	Pamtandapo Khristu adamalisa mphamvu za mizimu yakukhala na mphamvu pontho utongi , pontho iye adaatsogolera pakwecha ninga anyaperezo pamlikiti kuonesa kuakunda kwache . 
51002016	Tenepo paleke khala munthu wakukupokanyani papinthu pinadya imwe penu kupimwa , penu pya nsiku zakupambulika , maphwando akusekera kubalwa kwa mwezi , penu pya Nsiku Yakupuma . 
51002017	Pinthu ninga penepi ntchithunzithunzi chene cha pinthu pya m'tsogolo , mbwenye chadichadi ndi Khristu . 
51002018	Lekani tawirisa munthu na mbodzi ene kukuchitisani kukhondeswa kutambira mfupo , ule ambapiyesa ninga wakufunika pyakwanga thangwi ya masomphenya akupambulika , pontho ule ambapikakamiza kuoneka ninga ngwakupichepesa , pontho kuti angelo apembedzwe . Munthu ninga weneyu ambapithemba na manyerezero ache a umunthu okhonda na mathangwi ene , 
51002019	pontho aleka pyakukakamira pana Khristu , ule ndi msolo wa manungo . Manungo ambatambira mphamvu mbaphatana pabodzi na mphindo zache na uzingo , angakhala pansi pa utongi wa Khristu , tenepo manungowo ambakula ninga mumbafunira Mulungu . 
51002020	Imwe mwafa pabodzi na Khristu , pontho mwasudzulwa pautongi wa mizimu yakukhala na utongi ya padziko yonsene yapansi . Mphapo , mwatani , munakhala ninga anthu a padziko yapansi ? Ninji mumbavera matongero ninga enewa akulonga kuti , 
51002021	" Leka phata ichi " , " Leka lawa icho " , pontho " Leka khuya ichi " ?
51002022	Pinthu pyonsenepi pingaphatiswa basa kabodzi pimbasanduka pyakusowa basa ; penepi ndi matongero pontho pifunziso pyakusasanywa kwene na anthu basi . 
51002023	Matongero enewa ambakhaladi ninga anzeru pakukakamiza anthu kuti athema kupembedza angelo , mbapisangiza ninga akupichepesa , pontho kuvesa manungo awo nyatwa . Kwache matongerowo nkhabe phedza munthu kukwanisa kuleka pikhumbo pyakudawika pya manungo tayu . 
51003001	Imwe mwalamuswa kuimfa pabodzi na Khristu , tenepo ndzidzi onsene ikhani mitimanu papinthu pya kudzulu , kule kumbakhala Khristu pampando wache wachifumu kumadyo kwa Mulungu . 
51003002	Ikhani mitimanu papinthu pya kudzulu , nee papinthu pya pansi pano tayu . 
51003003	Thangwi imwe mwafa , pontho moyo wanu wabiswa pabodzi na Khristu muna Mulungu . 
51003004	Khristu ndiye moyo wanu chadichadi , tenepo iye angadzaoneka pontho , imwe munadzaonekambo naye pabodzi mudemelero yache . 
51003005	Mphapo mwathema kupha pikhumbo pya padziko yapansi pano , pile pili m'mitima mwanu ninga pyakuzuda , pyakunyansa , pyakusirira , pyakuipa , na mtima ; mtima nkhulonga kupembedza mifanikizo . 
51003006	Thangwi Mulungu anadzazhangalira anthu akuchita pinthu ninga penepi , anthu okhonda kumvera ale .
51003007	Pikhali imwe na makhaliro akale mukhateweza pikhumbo ninga penepi .
