51003008	Mbwenye chinchino mwathema kuleka chita pinthu pyonsene ninga ipi : kuzhangali , ukali na kuipirwa . Lekani kutikana , penu pakanwa panu kulonga mafala akunyansa . 
51003009	Lekani kulonga pyakunama kuna unango na mwanzache , thangwi imwe mwadula moyo wakale na makhaliro ache ene , 
51003010	pontho mwavala moyo wachinchino , unasanduza Mulungu , nyakuulenga ule , nsiku na nsiku kuti mukhale na makhaliro a iye ene mwenechiro , towera imwe mumdziwe mwadidi mwene . 
51003011	Natenepo nkhabeve kusiyana pakati pa Ayuda na anthu okhonda khala Ayuda , anyakugwandwa nsonga yakumaso penu okhonda gwandwa , anthu a mitundu inango penu anthu akusalira , mtumbe penu mabitchu , mbwenye Khristu ndi pyonsene , pontho ali muna pyonsene . 
51003012	Imwe ndimwe anthu a Mulungu , iye adakufunani mbakusankhulani kuti mukhale anthu ache . Natenepo khalani anthu akuva nyambalo , akukoma mtima , akupichepesa , akufulika , pontho akupirira . 
51003013	Vanani unango na mwanzache , pontho lekereranani unango na mwanzache ngakhala unango wa imwe ana thangwi na mwanzache . Mwathema kulekererana unango na mwanzache mungadawirana ninga mwakulekereranimbo Mbuya . 
51003014	Kuthimiza papyonsenepi khalani nako kufunana unango na mwanzache , thangwi kufunana ndiye kumbamanga pinthu pyonsenepi kuti pikhale chibodzi chakuthema monsene mwene . 
51003015	Mtendere ule umbapereka Khristu ukutsogolereni m'manyerezero anu onsene . Mulungu adakuchemerani kuti mukhale na mtendere wenewu , podi imwe ndimwe mapindi a manungo abodzi . Pontho mwathema kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu . 
51003016	Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Khristu zathema kukhazikika monsene mwene m'mitima mwanu . Mufunzisane na kupangizana makhaliro adidi mwanzeru . Imbani masalimo na nyimbo zakukuza , pontho zakulemedza nazo Mulungu . Imbani nyimbo zakupereka nazo takhuta kuna Mulungu m'mitima mwanu . 
51003017	Pyonsene pinaphata imwe , penu kupilonga pichitwe na dzina ya Mbuya Yesu na kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu Baba kudzera muna iye . 
51003018	Akazimwe , verani amunanu , thangwi ninga akhristu imwe mwathema kuchita tenepo . 
51003019	Amunambo , runani akazanu , pontho lekani kuachitira vinga . 
51003020	Anamwe , verani anyakukubalani monsene mwene , thangwi penepi ndiye pimbakomera Mulungu . 
51003021	Imwembo , Ababa , lekani chitisa ananu kuzhangali gopesera anataya mtima . 
51003022	Mabitchu , verani ambuyanu apansi pano na pyonsene pinakupangani iwo kuti mupichite ; lekani kuoneka anthu adidi pakuphata basa ngakhala iwo ali ponthopo kukuyang'anirani , mbwenye phatani na mtimanu onsene , thangwi imwe mumbagopa Mbuya Mulungu . 
51003023	Pyonsene pinachita imwe , pichiteni na mtimanu onsene khala ninga mukuphatira basa Mbuya Mulungu , nee anthu tayu . 
51003024	Kumbukani kuti Mbuya anadzakupasani mfupo wakoyera iye anthu ache ale . Thangwi Khristu ndi Mbuya chadichadi anatumikira imwe ule . 
51003025	Nyakuchita pyakudawa onsene anatambirambo malingana na pyakudawa pimbachita iyepyo , thangwi Mulungu ambatonga mseru munthu onsene okhonda yang'ana nkhope . 
51004001	Imwembo ambuya , khalani adidi kuna mabitchu anu , pontho achitireni pyakuthema , thangwi imwembo muna Mbuya kudzulu . 
51004002	Pempherani mwakukhonda lekeza , pontho khalani m'maso ndzidzi unapemphera imwe , kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu . 
51004003	Tipemphererenimbo ife towera Mulungu atipase mwayi wakuti tilalike mphangwa zache zakulonga pyakubisika pya Khristu . Ndi thangwi yache ine lero ndili m'perezo . 
51004004	Pempherani kuti ndilalike mwakuveka mphangwa zachezi ninga munathema ine kuzilalika . 
51004005	Khalani anzeru na mule munakhalira imwe na anthu akunja , pakuphatisa basa mwayi onsene una imwe . 
51004006	Ndzidzi onsene unalonga imwe , mafalanu athema kukhala adidi pontho akuganyalisa , pontho mwathema kudziwa kutawira mwadidi mungalongesana na munthu onsene . 
51004007	Mbaleathu wapamtima , Tikiko , ule ndi nyabasa wakukhulupirika , pontho nyabasa mwanzathu pabasa ya Mbuya , anadzakupangani pyonsene pya ine . 
51004008	Ndi thangwi yache ndikumtuma kuna imwe , towera adzakutsitsimuseni pakukupangani pya mule munakhalira ife tonsene . 
51004009	Iye akutsagana na Onesimo , mbaleathu wapamtima , pontho wakukhulupirika wa m'gulu mwanu ule . Iwo anadzakupangani pyonsene pinachitika kuno . 
51004010	Aristariko , nyaperezo mwanzanga , pontho na Maliko , mdzukulu wa Barnaba ule , akukupasani mwenyikiro . Imwe mwava kale kuti mumtambire mwadidi , Maliko angabwera kwanuko . 
51004011	Yoshua , ule ambadziwika pontho na dzina yakuti Yusito , akukupasanimbo mwenyikiro . Anthu atatuwa ngokhawa Ayuda adasanduka anyakukhulupira , ale adandiphedza pabasa ya Ufumu wa Mulungu , pontho iwo andiphedza pikulu pene . 
51004012	Epafra , mbodzi wa m'gulu mwanu , pontho nyabasa wa Khristu Yesu , akukupasani mwenyikiro . Ndzidzi onsene iye ambakupemphererani pikulu kuna Mulungu kumpempha kuti imwe mukhale anthu akuimira dzololo ninga akhristu akukola , pontho akukhulupira chadichadi , na kuvera monsene mwene pinafuna Mulungu . 
51004013	Ine ene ndekha ndinakwanisa kuchitira umboni basache idaphata iye mwakuwangisa kukuphatirani , pontho idaphatira iye anthu a ku Laodikea na Hieropoli . 
51004014	Luka , shamwaliathu wapamtima , ule ndi mng'anga , pontho na Dema akukupasani mwenyikiro . 
51004015	Tiperekerenimbo mwenyikiro kuna abale mu Laodikea , na kuna Nimfa , pontho na kuna mpingo , ule umbagumanyikana m'nyumba mwache . 
51004016	Kalatayi ingamala werengwa pakati panu , ikawerengwembo kuna mpingo wa ku Laodikea . Pandzidzi onthowo mwathema kuwerengambo kalata inafuna kudzakutumizirani mpingo wa ku Laodikea . 
51004017	Pangani Arikipo kuti , " Onesesa mwadidi kuti basa idakupasa Mbuya waimalisa . "
51004018	Ndikulemba na dzanja yangayi mafala awa : Mwenyikiro kubulukira kuna ine , Paulo . Kumbukani kuti ine ndamangwa na njema . Kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kukhale namwe . 
52001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , pontho Sila na Timoti — Kwenda kuna mpingo wa ku Tesalonika , ule ngwa Mulungu Baba pontho wa Mbuya Yesu Khristu . Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu pikhale namwe . 
52001002	Ndzidzi onsene timbapereka takhuta kuna Mulungu thangwi ya imwe monsene , pontho timbakuthulani ndzidzi onsene unapemphera ife . 
52001003	Tenepo timbakumbuka pamaso pa Mulungu Babathu pya mabasanu akuonesa chikhulupiro chanu ale , pya mule mudaphatira imwe basa kuonesa kufunana kwanu , na pya kukhazikika kwachita chidikhiro chanu pana Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
52001004	Abale athu , ife timbapidziwa kuti Mulungu ambakufunani , pontho akusankhulani towera mukhale ache , 
52001005	thangwi Mphangwa Zadidi zidadza kuna imwe , nee na mafala okha tayu , mbwenye pontho na mphamvu za Mzimu Wakuchena , pontho na kukhulupira kukulu kudachita imwe pa pyakuonadi pya mphangwazo . Imwe mukudziwa mwadidi pya mule mukhakhalira ife ndzidzi ukhali ife namwe ; pikhachita ife pile pikhali pyakuganyalisi imwepo . 
52001006	Imwe mudatsanzira ife pabodzi na Mbuya ene . Podi kwene kuti mudasanyika pikulu , imwe mudatambira mphangwa za Khristu na kukomerwa kule kumbabulukira kuna Mzimu Wakuchena . 
52001007	Natenepo imwe chinchino mwasanduka upangizi kuna anyakukhulupira onsene a m'nthemba za Makedonia na Akaya . 
52001008	Si mphangwa zokha za Mbuya zidafalikira ku Makedonia na ku Akaya tayu , mbwenye mbiri yakulonga pya chikhulupiro chanu pana Mulungu idaveka konsene kwene . Mphapo nkhabeve chinthu chinafuna ife kulonga . 
52001009	Anthu onsene ambalonga pya mule mudatitambirira imwe , ndzidzi udakufambirani ife , pontho na mule mudalekera imwe kupembedza mifanikizo mbamuzungunukira kuna Mulungu wakuonadi pontho wamoyo , towera mumtumikire . 
52001010	Chinchino imwe mukudikhira Mwanache kudza kubulukira kudzulu — Mwanacheyu ndi Yesu , adalamusa iye kuimfa ule , pontho ule ambatipulumusa kuna ukali wa Mulungu unafuna kudza . 
52002001	Abale athu , imwe mukupidziwa kuti ulendo wathu kuna imwe hukhali wapezi tayu . 
52002002	Imwe mukupidziwa kuti tikhadavuyiwa na kutikanwa mumzinda wa Filipi , mwenemo mbatidzati kudza ku Tesalonikako . Podi kwene kuti anthu azinji adatipokanya , Mulungu wathu adatipasa kuwanga mtima kuti tikulalikireni Mphangwa Zadidi zakubulukira kuna iye . 
52002003	Kukudembeterani kunachita ifeku nee tikuchita mwakunama , penu na manyerezero akuipa , penu kuyesa kunyengeza napyo anthu tayu . 
52002004	M'mbuto mwache ndzidzi onsene timbalalika ninga mumbapifunira Mulungu , thangwi iye adatiyesa anthu akuthema kupaswa basa ya kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi . Ife nkhabe yesa kufuna kukoma kuna anthu tayu , mbwenye kuna Mulungu , nyakudziwa makhaliro athu ule . 
52002005	Imwe mukupidziwa mwadidi mwene kuti ndzidzi udadza ife kuna imwe , ife nee tidadza na mafala akukoma , penu mafala akusembedzera nawo pinthu pyanu tayu ! Mulungu ndi mboni yathu . 
52002006	Ife nee tidafuna kusimbwa na anthu , penu na imwe , penu na anthu anango tayu . 
52002007	Ife mbatidakwanisa kukupangani kuti mutivere , thangwi ndife anyakutumwa a Khristu . Mbwenye ndzidzi ukhali ife na imwe , tikhali anthu akufulika ninga mama wakutsalakana anache .
52002008	Ife tidakufunani pyakwanga mwakuti tidasasanyika kugawana namwe nee Mphangwa Zadidi zokha zakubulukira kuna Mulungu tayu , mbwenye pontho na moyo wathu ene , thangwi imwe mukhalidi apamtima pathu !
52002009	Abale athu , ndimomwene kuti imwe mukukumbuka mule mukhaphatira ife basa mwakuwangisa . Mosiku na masikati tidaphata basa , towera tileke kukunensani na nyatwa zathu , pikhalalika ife Mphangwa Zadidi zakubulukira kuna Mulungu . 
52002010	Imwe ndimwe mboni zathu , pontho na Mulungu ene kuti makhaliro athu akhali angwiro , akulungama pontho akusowa chinthu chakuapokanyisa kuna imwe anyakukhulupira . 
52002011	Imwe mukupidziwa kuti kukhala kwathu pabodzi na munthu onsene kudakhala ninga mule mumbachita baba kuna anache . 
52002012	Ife tidakuwangisani mtima na kukuthonthozani , pontho tidathimiza kukudembeterani kuti mukhale na makhaliro akukomera Mulungu , ule ambakuchemerani kuti mukakwate khundu mu Ufumu wache , pontho mudemelero yache . 
52002013	Thangwi inango imbaperekera ife takhuta mwakukhonda lekeza kuna Mulungu njishi : imwe mudava na kutambira mphangwa za Mulungu zidadza na ife kuna imwe . Imwe mudazitambira ninga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , nee zakubulukira kuna anthu tayu , thangwi Mulungu akuphata basa mumtima mwa imwe anyakukhulupira . 
52002014	Abale athu , pinthu pidakuchitikiranipi mphyonthopyontho pile pidachitikira mipingo ya Mulungu ku Yudea , kuna anthu ale nga Khristu Yesu kweneko . Imwe mudasanyiswa na anthu a dzinzanu yonthoyo sasawambo ninga mudasanyisirwa iwo na Ayuda , 
52002015	ale adapha Mbuya Yesu , pontho na maprofeti mbaboneresa pontho ife . Mulungu hambakomerwa nawo anthu enewa na pang'ono pene tayu . Iwo nganyamalwa kuna anthu onsene !
52002016	Iwo adayesa kutitchinga kuti tileke kulalika kuna anthu okhonda khala Ayuda mphangwa zakudzesa chipulumuso . Pakuchita tenepo iwo apithimizira mwakumalisikiratu pyakudawa pidachita iwo ndzidzi onsene . Pakumalisira ukali wa Mulungu wadza pana iwo . 
52002017	Abale , pidalekana ife kuonana namwe ndzidzi pang'ono pamaso na pamaso nee m'manyerezero tayu , tidakutchuwani pyakwanga mwakuti tidayesayesa pyakwanga kuti tionane namwe pontho maso na maso . 
52002018	Ife tikhafuna kubwera pontho kuna imwe . Maka ine Paulo ndidayesayesa kazinji kene kuti ndibwere pontho , mbwenye Satana hadatitawirisa tayu . 
52002019	Imwe ndimwe ene basi , ale anafiina dzakhala chidikhiro chathu , kukomerwa kwathu pontho mfupo unafuna dzaonesa kukunda kwathu pamaso pa Mbuyathu Yesu , iye angadzabwera pontho . 
52002020	Ndimomwene , kunyada kwathu na kukomerwa kwathu ndimwepo . 
52003001	Pakumalisira , tidapichimwana kuti tipirire okhonda kukuonani , natenepo ife tidanyerezera kukhala pyathu mumzinda wa Atene , 
52003002	mbatituma Timoti , mbaleathu wakuphata naye pabodzi basa ya Mulungu yakulalika Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Khristu . Ife tidamtuma kuti akuwangiseni mtima , pontho kukuphedzani kuti muwange m'chikhulupiro chanu , 
52003003	towera paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wa imwe wakutekenyeka thangwi ya nyatwa zinaona imwezi . Imwe mukudziwa kuti nkhufuna kwa Mulungu kuti tione nyatwazi . 
52003004	Thangwi pikhali ife kweneko pabodzi namwe tidakupanganiletu kuti tidathema dzabonereswa , tenepo pidachitikadi ninga montho munapidziwira imwe mwadidi . 
52003005	Ine ndapichimwana kuti ndipirire okhonda kukuonani , ndi thangwi yache ndikhadamtuma Timoti , tenepo ndidamtuma dzaona kuti chikhulupiro chanu chili tani . Thangwi ndikhaswipa mtima kuti penu Satana , nyakunyengeza , akhadakunyengezani mbachitisa kuti basa yonsene idaphata ife ikhali yapezi !
52003006	Mbwenye chinchino pyadza Timoti , atipanga pyakutichitisa kuti tikomerwe pakulonga pya chikhulupiro chanu pontho kufunana kwanu . Iye atipanga kuti imwe ndzidzi onsene mumbatikumbuka mwadidi , pontho kuti imwe mumbafuna kutiona sasawa ninga mumbafunirambo ife kukuonani . 
52003007	Tenepo nyatwa na kusanyika kwathu konsene tawangiswa mtima na kuva pya imwe . Ntchikhulupiro chanu chinatiwangisa mtima , 
52003008	thangwi chinchino tina moyo chadichadi , podi imwe mwaimira dzololo m'moyo wanu wakuphatanizana na Mbuya . 
52003009	Chinchino tinakwanisa kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu wathu thangwi ya imwe . Timbapereka takhuta kuna iye thangwi ya kukomerwa kwathu pamaso pache thangwi ya imwe . 
52003010	Mosiku na masikati timbampempha na mtimathu onsene kuti atitawirise kuonana namwe pamaso na pamaso , towera tikupaseni pinthu pinasowa imwe m'chikhulupiro chanu . 
52003011	Mulungu Babathu na Mbuya Yesu atisasanyire njira yakuti tidze kuna imwe . 
52003012	Mbuya akulise na kuinjipisa kufunana kwanu pana unango na mwanzache na pana anthu onsene kuti kukhale sasawa ninga kukufunani kumbachita ife pana imwe . 
52003013	Mungachita tenepo iye anadzakuwangisani mtima , tenepo imwe munadzakhala akusowa chinthu chakukupokanyisani , pontho akuchena pamaso pa Mulungu Babathu ndzidzi unafuna dzabwera pontho Mbuyathu Yesu pabodzi na anthu onsene , ale ngache . 
52004001	Pakumalisira , abale athu , ife takufunzisani mwadidi pya mule mwathema imwe kukhala na makhaliro akukomera Mulungu ; ndimomwene ninga munakhalira imwemu . Tenepo chinchino tikukupemphani pontho kukudembeterani na dzina ya Mbuya Yesu kuti muchite kupiringana penepo . 
52004002	Thangwi imwe mukudziwa matongero adakupasani ife na utongi wa Mbuya Yesu . 
52004003	Mulungu akufuna kuti imwe mukhale anthu akuchena pontho anthu okhonda chita pinthu pyakuzuda . 
52004004	Mamuna onsene athema kudziwa kukhala mwadidi na mkazachec mwakuchena na mwakupilemedza , 
52004005	aleke khala na pikhumbo pyakusirira ninga mumbachitira anthu akunja , okhonda dziwa Mulungu ale . 
52004006	Natenepo paleke kukhala munthu wakuchitira mwanzache wachikhristu pyakudawika penu kumdyera mkopekope . Ife takupanganiletu penepi , pontho kukucheuzani pikulu pene kuti Mbuya anadzatchunyusa munthu onsene anachita penepiyi . 
52004007	Mulungu hadatichemerera kuti tichite pinthu pyakuzuda tayu , mbwenye kuti tikhale anthu akuchena . 
52004008	Tenepo munthu onsene anakhonda chifunzisochi , iye nee akukhonda munthu tayu , mbwenye akukhonda Mulungu , ule ambakupasani Mzimu Wakuchena . 
52004009	Nkhabe funika kuti tikulembereni pya kuafuna anyakukhulupira anzanu tayu , thangwi Mulungu mwenechiroache ndiye akufunzisani pya mule mwathema imwe kufunana unango na mwanzache . 
52004010	Ndimomwene imwe mumbaafuna abale onsene m'nthemba yonsehe ya Makedonia . Tenepo , abale athu , tikukupemphani kuti muchite kupiringana penepa . 
52004011	Onesesani kuti ndzidzi onsene kukhala kwanu nkhwakufulika mbamutsalakana pinthu pimbachita imwe , pontho kuphata basa na manjanu ninga mudakupangirani ife kale . 
52004012	Mungachita tenepo , imwe munadzachitisa anthu okhonda khulupira kukulemedzani , pontho munadzakhala anthu okhonda nyindira munthu na mbodzi ene papinthu pinasowa imwe . 
52004013	Abale athu , ife tikufuna kuti mudziwe pyakuonadi pya pimbachitika kuna agonera mkono ale , towera muleke kutsukwala ninga anthu akusowa chidikhiro . 
52004014	Ife timbakhulupira kuti Yesu adafa , pontho adalamuka mbakhala pontho na moyo , natenepo timbakhulupira kuti Mulungu anadzadzesa kuna iye anthu agonera mkono akumkhulupira ale , pabodzi na Yesu . 
52004015	Chinchino , ife tikukufunzisani chifunziso cha Mbuya : Mbuya angadzabwera pontho , ife ale tina moyo lerofe nee tinadzakhala patsogolo pa adagonera mkono ale tayu . 
52004016	Utongi unadzaperekwa na mkhuwo , panadzaveka fala ya mngelo wamkulu , pontho ngoma ya Mulungu inadzalira , penepo Mbuya mwenechiro anadzatchitha kubulukira kudzulu . Anyakukhulupira muna Khristu adagonera mkono ale , anadzalamuka chakutoma ;
52004017	Kubuluka penepo ife , ale tinadzakhala na moyo ndzidzi wenewo , tinadzagumanyikana pabodzi nawo m'makole kwenda kagumana na Mbuya m'dzulu . Natenepo ndzidzi onsene tinadzakhala na Mbuya . 
52004018	Tenepo wangisanani mtima unango na mwanzache na mafala enewa . 
52005001	Abale , nkhabe funika tayu kuti tikulembereni pya nsiku na ndzidzi unafuna dzachitika pinthu penepi . 
52005002	Thangwi imwe mukupidziwa mwadidi mwene kuti Nsiku ya Mbuya inadzabwera ninga mumbabwerera mbava mosiku . 
52005003	Ndzidzi umbalonga anthu kuti , " Tili pa mtendere , pontho nkhabe chakugoswa , " penepo pene nyatwa zikulu zinadzagwa pana iwo mwakututumusa ninga kuva kupha kwa mkazi wamimba angafuna kubala , tenepo anthu hanadzathawa tayu . 
52005004	Mbwenye , abale , imwe nee muli mumdima tayu , natenepo nsiku yeneyi ileke kukudodomesani ninga kubwera kwa mbava . 
52005005	Imwe monsenene ndimwe anthu a cheza , anthu a masikati . Ife si ife anthu a mosiku penu a mumdima tayu . 
52005006	Tenepo mbatilekeni kugona chitulo ninga anangowa , mbwenye mbatikhaleni m'maso , pontho mbatikhaleni akuuphata mtima . 
52005007	Anyakugona ambagona na mosiku , pontho anyakuledzera ambaledzera na mosiku . 
52005008	Ife ndife anthu a masikati , natenepo mbatikhaleni akuuphata mtima . Tendeni tivale chikhulupiro na kufunana ninga chisimbi chakutchinjiriza nacho pagangafuwa pathu , pontho chidikhiro cha chipulumuso ninga chipewu chakutchinjirizira nacho misolo yathu . 
52005009	Mulungu hadatisankhule kuti atitchunyuse na ukali wache tayu , mbwenye kuti atipulumuse kudzera muna Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , 
52005010	ule adatifera , towera tikhale na moyo pabodzi naye , penu tikhale na moyo penu tife pandzidzi unafuna iye dzabwera pontho . 
52005011	Natenepo wangisanani mtima na kuphedzana unango na mwanzache , ninga munachitira imwe chinchino . 
52005012	Abale , tikukupemphani kuti mulemedze anyakuphata basa pakati panu , ale ambakutsogolerani na kukupangizani makhaliro adidi pa moyo wanu wachikhristu . 
52005013	Alemedzeni na kuafuna pikulu thangwi ya basa imbaphata iwo . Khalani mwamtendere pakati panu . 
52005014	Abale athu , tikukudembeterani kuti mucheuze anthu akupolola , wangisani mtima anthu amantha , phedzani anyakusowa mphamvu , pontho khalani akupirira kuna anthu onsene . 
52005015	Lekani kubwezera chakuipa mwanzanu angakuchitirani chakuipa , mbwenye ndzidzi onsene khalani anthu akufuna kuchitirana udidi kuna unango na mwanzache , pontho na kuna anthu onsene . 
52005016	Komerwani ndzidzi onsene , 
52005017	pempherani mwakukhonda lekeza , 
52005018	perekani takhuta kuna Mulungu papinthu pyonsene pimbachitika . Penepi ndiye pinafuna Mulungu kuti imwe mupichite m'moyo wanu wakuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . 
52005019	Lekani thimisa moto wa Mzimu Wakuchena , 
52005020	lekani lulupisa mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , 
52005021	mbwenye yesani pyonsene ; chitani pinthu pyadidi ndzidzi onsene , 
52005022	pontho thundani kuchita pinthu pyakuipa pya mtundu onsene . 
52005023	Mulungu , ule ambatipasa mtendere , akusanduzeni kukhala anthu akupambulika monsene mwene , pontho akoye mwadidi mzimu , moyo na manungo anu , towera mudzakhale anthu akusowa chinthu chakukupokanyisani pandzidzi unafuna dzabwera pontho Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
52005024	Mulungu ambakuchemerani ule anadzachita pyonsenepi , thangwi iye ngwakukhulupirika . 
52005025	Abale , tipempherenimbo ife . 
52005026	Perekani mwenyikiro kuna anyakukhulupira onsene kuonesa kuafuna kwanu . 
52005027	Na utongi wa Mbuya , ndikukudembeterani kuti muwerenge kalatayi kuna anyakukhulupira onsene . 
52005028	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu kukhale namwe . 
53001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , pontho Sila na Timoti — Kwenda kuna mpingo wa ku Tesalonika , ule ngwa Mulungu Babathu pontho wa Mbuya Yesu Khristu . 
53001002	Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Babathu pontho Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale namwe . 
53001003	Abale athu , ife tathema kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu ndzidzi onsene thangwi ya imwepo . Mphyadidi kuti ife tichite tenepo , thangwi chikhulupiro chanu chikuthimiza kukula pyakwanga , pontho kufunana kwanu unango na mwanzache kukukula pyakwanga . 
53001004	Natenepo ife pano timbakunyadirani pakati pa mipingo ya Mulungu , thangwi ya kuthimizira kwanu kupirira na kukhulupira pandzidzi wa nyatwa na kubonereswa kunaona imweku . 
53001005	Pyonsenepi pikutsikimizira kuti Mulungu ambatonga mseru mwakulungama . Chinafuna Mulungu ntchakuti imwe mukhale anthu akuthema kupita mu Ufumu wache , unaonera imwe nyatwa chinchinowu . 
53001006	Mulungu ngwakulungama ; iye anadzabwezera nyatwa pana anthu anakuboneresaniwa , 
53001007	mbwenye imwe munaona nyatwa chinchino Mulungu anadzakupumisani pabodzi pene na ife . Iye anadzachita penepi ndzidzi unafuna dzaoneka Mbuya Yesu kubulukira kudzulu pabodzi pene na angelo ache amphamvu , 
53001008	na moto wakugaka , kudzatchunyusa anthu ambakhonda Mulungu ale , pontho na ale ambakhonda kuvera Mphangwa Zadidi zakulonga pya Mbuyathu Yesu . 
53001009	Kutchunyuswa kwawo kunadzakhala kwa kwenda na kwenda . Iwo hanadzaona nkhope ya Mbuya , pontho mphamvu yache yademelero tayu , 
53001010	iye angadzabwera pansiku yeneyo kudzatambira demelero na chilemedzo kubulukira kuna anthu ache onsene , pontho kuna anyakumkhulupira onsene . Imwembo munadzakhala nawo pabodzi , thangwi imwe mwakhulupira mphangwa zidadza na ife kuna imwe . 
53001011	Ndi thangwi yache ife ndzidzi onsene timbakupemphererani kuti Mulungu wathu akuchitiseni kukhala anthu akuthemerana na moyo ule udakuchemererani iye . Na mphamvu yache iye achitise pikhumbo pyanu pya kuchita udidi kukwanakwana , pontho amalise pyonsene pimbachita imwe kudzera muna chikhulupiro chanu . 
53001012	Munjira yeneyi dzina ya Mbuyathu Yesu inadzatambira demelero kubulukira kuna imwepo , pontho imwembo munadzatambira demelero kubulukira kuna iye kudzera muna kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu wathu pontho na kwa Mbuya a Yesu Khristu . 
53002001	Kulonga pya kubwera pontho kwa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , pontho na pya kugumanyikana kwathu pabodzi kugumanikana naye : Abale anga , ndikukupemphani kuti
53002002	muleke kudzudzumika m'manyerezero anu , penu kututumuka na pinalonga anthu kuti Nsiku ya Mbuya yafika kale . Penu iwo alonge pyawo kuti penepi tidapilonga ndife kudzera muna mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , penu kulalika kudachita ife , penu kalata idalemba ife ile . 
53002003	Paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakukunyengezani na pang'ono pene tayu , thangwi nsikuyo mbidzati fika , panadzachitika Kugalukira Kwakumalisira , pontho Munthu Wakuipa anadzaoneka , ule athema kwenda kugehena . 
53002004	Iye anadzapokanya pinthu pyonsene pimbapembedza anthu , pontho pimbalonga iwo kuti ndi Mulungu . Iye anadzapiikha yekha ene padzulu papinthu pyonsenepi . Pontho anadzapita m'Nyumba ya Mulungu mbakakhala pansi mbapithula yekha ene kuti ndi Mulungu . 
53002005	Ayi imwe nkhabe kukumbuka tayu ? Pikhali ine namwe kweneko ndidakupangani pyonsenepi . 
53002006	Kwache pana chinthu chinakhondesa kuti penepi pileke kuchitika chinchino , chinthu chenechi imwe ene mukuchidziwa . Mbwenye pandzidzi wache wakuthema ungakwana Munthu Wakuipayi anadzaoneka . 
53002007	Mphamvu yakubisika yakuipa yatoma kale kuphata basa , mbwenye pinthu pinafuna kudzachitikapyo nee pinati pichitike tayu kufikirana anapikhondesa kuti pileke kuchitika ule abuluswa . 
53002008	Tenepo Munthu Wakuipa ule anadzatchululwa , mbwenye Mbuya Yesu angadzabwera anadzampha na mpweya wakubulukira m'kanwa mwache , pontho anadzamvunga na kuonekera kwache kwakung'azimira . 
53002009	Munthu Wakuipa ule anadzabwera na mphamvu ya Satana mbadzachita pilengolengo na pyakudodomesa pyakunama pya mtundu na mtundu , 
53002010	pontho anadzaphatisa basa unthawatawa onsene kunyengeza nawo anthu anafuna dzatayika ale . Iwo anadzatayika thangwi hadatambire pontho kufuna pyakuonadi tayu kuti apulumuke napyo . 
53002011	Natenepo Mulungu anadzatumiza mphamvu yakuanyengeza , towera iwo adzakhulupire pinthu pyakunama . 
53002012	Na thangwi yeneyi anthu , ale adakhonda kukhulupira pyakuonadi mbakomerwa pyawo na kuchita pyakudawika , anadzakonwa . 
53002013	Ife tathema kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu ndzidzi onsene thangwi ya imwepo , abale , ale ambafunwa na Mbuya . Thangwi Mulungu adakusankhulani kukhala akutoma kupulumuswa kudzera muna mphamvu ya Mzimu Wakuchena kukuchitisani kukhala anthu akuchena kudzera muna chikhulupiro chanu pana pyakuonadi . 
53002014	Mulungu adakuchemererani penepi kudzera muna Mphangwa Zadidi zidakulalikirani ife ; towera mutambirembo khundu yanu pa demelero ya Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
53002015	Natenepo , abale athu , imirani dzololo , pontho phatisani pyakuonadi pidakufunzisani ife , pakulalika na kupilemba kwene m'kalata pile . 
53002016	Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu mwenechiro , pontho Mulungu Babathu ule adatifuna , pontho ule na kukoma mtima kwache adatipasa kuwanga mtima kokhonda mala , pontho na chidikhiro chakukhazikika , 
53002017	akuwangiseni mtima pontho akupaseni mphamvu kuti ndzidzi onsene muchite na kulonga kwene pinthu pyadidi . 
53003001	Pakumalisira , abale , tipemphererenimbo ife , towera mphangwa za Mbuya zithimize kufalikira mwamsanga , pontho kuti zitambirwe na chilemedzo ninga mudachitirwa izo pakati panu . 
53003002	Pempherani pontho kuti Mulungu atipulumuse m'manja mwa anthu akudawika pontho akuipa ; thangwi si onsene ambakhulupira Mphangwa Zadidi tayu . 
53003003	Mbwenye Mbuya ngwakukhulupirika , tenepo iye anadzakupasani mphamvu , pontho anadzakukoyani mwadidi kugopesera Nyakuipa ule . 
53003004	Mbuya ambatichitisa kuti tikukhulupireni kuti mukuchita , pontho munathimiza kuchita pinthu pyonsene pidakupangani ife pile . 
53003005	Mbuya atsogolere pyakunyerezera pyanu , towera mudziwe chadichadi kuafuna kumbachita Mulungu anthu pontho na kupirira kwa Khristu . 
53003006	Abale , na dzina ya Mbuya Yesu Khristu tikukupangani kuti muleke phatizana na akhristu , ale ana makhaliro akupolola , pontho ale ambakhonda kuteweza matongero adaapasa ife ale . 
53003007	Imwe ene mukupidziwa mwadidi mwene kuti imwe mwathema kuchita ninga montho mukhachitira ife . Pikhali ife pakati panu ife nee tikhali anthu akupolola tayu . 
53003008	Ife hatidatambire kudya kubulukira kuna munthu na mbodzi ene okhonda kukupagalira tayu , m'mbuto mwache tidaphata basa na manjathu mwakuwangisa . Tidathimiza kuphata basa mosiku na masikati kugopesera kuti tinakunensani . 
53003009	Si kuti ife nkhabe utongi wakukupangani kuti mutiphedze , mbwenye tidachita tenepo kuti tikupangizeni makhaliro adidi . 
53003010	Pikhali ife pabodzi namwe kwanuko , tikhakupangani kuti " Munthu onsene anakhonda phata basayo aleke kudya . "
53003011	Tikulonga tenepa , thangwi tikuva kuti kweneko pakati panupo pana anthu anango a makhaliro akupolola , ale nkhabe phata basawo tayu , mbwenye kuzunguza basa ya anthu anango . 
53003012	Na dzina ya Mbuya Yesu Khristu tikuapanga na kuacheuza anthu ninga enewa kuti akhale na makhaliro akuthema mbaphata basa , towera agumane kudya kwakuphata basa na manjawo . 
53003013	Mbwenye imwe , abale , lekani kutopa na kuchita udidi tayu . 
53003014	Ngakhala munthu unango anakhonda kuvera mafala alemba ife m'kalatamu , munthu weneyo mumuonesese mwadidi , pontho muleke kuphatizana naye , towera achite manyadzo . 
53003015	Kwache lekani kumuyesa ninga nyamalwa , mbwenye mcheuzeni ninga mbaleanu . 
53003016	Mbuya maka , ule ndi mwenechiro mtendere , mbakupaseni mtendere ndzidzi onsene pontho munjira zonsene . Mbuya mbakhale na imwe monsene . 
53003017	Na manjanga ndikulemba mafalawa : Mwenyikiro wakubulukira kuna ine , Paulo . Chenechi ntchidzindikiro changa m'makalatanga onsene , mwenemu ndiye mumbalembera ine . 
53003018	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu kukhale na imwe monsene . 
54001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyakutumwa wa Khristu Yesu , na Imtongwa na Mulungu Nyankhombo wathu , pontho na Khristu Yesu chidikhiro chathu —
54001002	Kwenda kuna Timoti , mwananga chadichadi m'chikhulupiro . Kukoma mtima , nsisi na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Baba , pontho Khristu Yesu Mbuyathu pikhale namwe . 
54001003	Ndikupimna kuti iwe ukhale mumzinda wa Efeso ninga mudakupemphera ine ndzidzi ukhaenda ine ku Makedonia ule . Anthu anango kweneko akufunzisa pifunziso pyakunama , tenepo iwe uapange kuti aleke . 
54001004	Uapange kuti aleke kuikha konta pithankano pyakusowa basa , pontho na mndandanda wa madzina a makolo akale . Pinthu penepi pimbalamusa mphoka , pontho ipyo nkhabe pinthu tayu na pinthu pidasasanya Mulungu kudzapichita , pile pimbadziwika kudzera muna chikhulupiro . 
54001005	Thangwi ya kupasira ine matongero enewa nkhufuna kuti pakhale kufunana kwakubulukira mumtima wangwiro , chikumbu mtima chadidi , na chikhulupiro chadichadi . 
54001006	Anthu anango abauka kubuluka kuna penepi mbalemwa na mphoka zakusowa basa . 
54001007	Iwo akufuna kukhala afunzisi a mwambo wa Mose , mbwenye iwo nkhabe vesa mafala penu pinthu pimbalonga iwo mwakukhonda penuka na pang'ono pene . 
54001008	Tikupidziwa kuti mwambo ngwadidi ngakhala munthu anauphatisa basa mwakuthema . 
54001009	Ife tikupidziwa pontho kuti mwambo hudasasanyirwe anthu akulungama tayu , mbwenye anyakuswa mwambo na anyakupandukira , anyakukhonda tsalakana Mulungu , pontho na anyakudawika , anyakukhonda chena na anyakukhonda pembedza , anyakupha ababawo penu amawo , pigawenga , 
54001010	anthu akuchita uputa pontho akuzuda , anyakuba ana a anzawo , anyakunama , na anyakuchitira umboni wakunama , pontho na onsene anachita pinthu pyakupokanyisana na chifunziso chakuonadi . 
54001011	Chifunziso chakuonadichi chimbagumanwa mu Mphangwa Zadidi zidandipasa Mulunguzi kuti ndizilalike ; Mphangwa Zadidi zakubulukira kuna Mulungu wa demelero pontho wa mtsanzayiso . 
54001012	Ndikupereka ndakhuta kuna Khristu Yesu Mbuyathu , ule andipasa mphamvu zakuphatira nazo basanga . Ndikupereka ndakhuta kuna iye thangwi ya kundiyesa munthu wakuthema na kundisankhula kuti ndimphatire basa . 
54001013	Podi kwene kuti ndidamshola , kumboneresa pontho kumtikana , Mulungu andivera nsisi , thangwi ndzidzi wenewu ndikhali wakukhonda khulupira , natenepo ndikhapichita mwakukhonda dziwa . 
54001014	Mbuyathu , adandikomera mtima pikulu pene mbandipasa chikhulupiro na kufunana pina ifepi thangwi ya kuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . 
54001015	Uku nkhulonga kwakuonadi kule kwathema kutawirwa monsene mwene pontho kukhulupirwa : Khristu Yesu adadza padziko yapansi kudzapulumusa anthu akudawa . Ine ndikhali wakuipa pyakwangaletu kupiringana iwo , 
54001016	mbwenye Mulungu adandivera nsisi towera Khristu Yesu aonese kupirira kwache kokhonda mala konsene pakuphata kwache basa na ine , munthu wakudawika pyakwangaletu , towera ndikhale upangizi kuna anthu onsene , ale akhamfuna dzamkhulupira mbatambira moyo okhonda mala . 
54001017	Tenepo kuna Mfumu wakukhala na kukhala , okhonda kufa , pontho okhonda oneka , ule ndi Mulungu ene basi , kukhale chilemedzo na demelero kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
54001018	Mwananga Timoti ndikukupasa matongero awa mwakutewezana na mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu zidalongwa kalene pya iwe zile . Phatisa basa matongero enewo ninga pida towera umenye nkhondo yadidi , 
54001019	pontho koya chikhulupiro chako , pontho na chikumbu mtima chadidi . Anthu anango hadavere chikumbu mtima chawo tayu , natenepo achitisa chikhulupiro chawo kuvungika . 
54001020	Pakati pawo pana Himeneo na Alekezanda , atchunyusa ine ale pakuapereka m'manja mwa Satana kuti afunzire kuleka kushola Mulungu kunachita iwoko . 
54002001	Chakutoma cha pyonsene ndikukupemphani kuti mupempherere anthu onsene kuna Mulungu , kumdembetera , kumpempha , pontho kupereka takhuta kuna iye . 
54002002	Pemphererani mafumu na atongi onsene , towera tikhale na moyo wakumatama pontho wamtendere , wakulemedza Mulungu monsene mwene , pontho na makhaliro adidi . 
54002003	Penepi mphyadidi , pontho Mulungu Nyankhombo wathu ambakomerwa napyo . 
54002004	Iye ambafuna kuti anthu onsene apulumuswe mbadziwa pyakuonadi . 
54002005	Thangwi pana Mulungu mbodzi ene basi , pontho pana nyakukhala pakati mbodzi ene basi pakati pa Mulungu na anthu , weneyu ndi Khristu Yesu , 
54002006	ule adapereka moyo wache kuti aombole anthu onsene . Chenecho chikhali chitsikimizo ndzidzi wache wakuthema kuti Mulungu akufuna kupulumusa anthu onsene . 
54002007	Tenepo ndi thangwi yache ine ndidatumwa ninga nyakutumwa pontho mfunzisi wa anthu okhonda khala Ayuda kuti ndialalikire mphangwa za chikhulupiro , pontho na zakuonadi . Ine nee ndikunamabi ; pinalonga inepi mphyakuonadi . 
54002008	Ndinafuna kuti konsene kunagumanyikana anthu kupemphera , amuna ale ngakupambulika kuna Mulungu , akwize manjawo m'dzulu kupemphera mwakukhonda zhangali penu kupokanya . 
54002009	Ine ndinafuna pontho kuti akazi avale mwakuthema mwakupilemedza na mwakupichepesa . Kupithemesera kwawo kuleke khala kwa kusasanya tsitsi tayu , penu kuvala golidi , penu usanga wakudula , penu nguwo zakudula . 
54002010	Mbwenye apithemesere na mabasa adidi akuthemerana na akazi , ale ambalonga kuti mbanyakupembedza Mulungu . 
54002011	Akazi athema kumatama , pontho kuvera monsene mwene pinafunziswa iwo . 
54002012	Ine nkhabe tawirisa kuti akazi afunzise penu kukhala na utongi pana amuna tayu , mbwenye athema kumatama . 
54002013	Thangwi Adamu ndiye adatoma kusasanywa , kubuluka penepo Hava . 
54002014	Si Adamu tayu adanyengezwa ule , mbwenye ndi mkazi adanyengezwa mbaswa mwambo wa Mulungu . 
54002015	Mbwenye mkazi anadzapulumuka thangwi ya kubala , a ngakhala iye anapirira m'chikhulupiro , mukufunana , na m'mtima wakuchena , pontho na mwakupilemedza . 
54003001	Kulonga uku nkhwakuonadi : Ngakhala munthu ana chipapo kukhala mkadamu wa mpingo , iye akhumba basa yadidi pyakwanga . 
54003002	Mkadamu wa mpingo athema kukhala munthu wakusowa chinthu chakumpokanyisa . Akhale mamuna wa mkazi mbodzi , okhonda ledzera , wakuuphata mtima , wakupilemedza , wakutambira alendo mwadidi kumusa kwache , wakukwanisa kufunzisa ;
54003003	aleke khala dombe penu wanthonga ; mbwenye akhale wakufulika pontho wakufuna mtendere ; aleke khala wakukhumba mfuma ;
54003004	iye athema kukwanisa kufambisa mwadidi banjache , pontho aone kuti anache akumvera na chilemedzo chikulu . 
54003005	Thangwi ngakhala munthu hanadziwa kufambisa banjache mwadidi tayu , anakwanisa tani kuyang'anira inpingo wa Mulungu ?
54003006	Iye athema kukhala wakukola m'chikhulupiro , gopesera anadzanyada mbadzakonwa ninga mudakonerwa Satana . 
54003007	Iye akhale munthu wakulemedzwa na anthu okhonda khala akhristu , towera iye aleke khala munthu wakudzesa manyadzo mbakweshwa na msampha wa Satana . 
54003008	Anyakuphedzera mumpingo athema kukhalambo anthu a makhaliro adidi , pontho kulonga pinthu na mtima wakuonadi ; aleke kumwa pyakwanga pyakuledzeresa , penu kuikha mtima pakobiri . 
54003009	Iwo athimize kuphatisa chikhulupiro chakuzika chakuonadi na chikumbu mtima chadidi . 
54003010	Chakutoma iwo ayeswe , tenepo ngakhala anapikwanisa , penepo iwo athema kuphata basa . 
54003011	Akazawombo athema kukhala na makhaliro adidi , pontho aleke khala atsweda , penu akuledzera , mbwenye akukhulupirika papyonsene . 
54003012	Nyakuphedzera mumpingo athema kukhala na mkazi mbodzi basi , pontho akhale wakukwanisa kuyang'anira mwadidi anache na banjache ene . 
54003013	Anyakuphedzera ale ambaphata basa mwadidi ambapichemerera okha ene mbiri yadidi . Pontho ambawanga mtima pakulonga pya chikhulupiro chawo pana Khristu Yesu . 
54003014	Pinalemba ine kalatayi kuna iwe , ndikudikhira kubwera chinchino pano kuti ndidzakuone . 
54003015	Mbwenye ngakhala ndinanonokwa , kalatayi inakudziwisa makhaliro athema ife kukhala nawo m'banja ya Mulungu , ile ndi mpingo wa Mulungu wamoyo , pontho mzati wakuphatisa nawo pyakuonadi . 
54003016	Nkhabe mbodzi anakwanisa kukhonda kukula kwa pyakubisika pya chipembedzo chathu : Iye adaonekera na manungo a umunthu , adaoneswa na Mzimu Wakuchena kuti ngwakulungama , pontho adaoniwa na angelo . Iye adalalikwa pakati pa madzinza onsene , anthu onsene a padziko yapansi mbamkhulupira , pontho iye adakwatwa kwenda kudzulu . 
54004001	Mzimu Wakuchena akulonga mwakuveka kuti nsiku zakumalisa anthu anango anadzataya chikhulupiro chawo . Iwo anadzavera mizimu yakunama mbadzateweza pifunziso pya mizimu yakuipa . 
54004002	Pifunziso ninga penepi pimbavekeswa na anthu akunama , ale chikumbu mtima chawo ntchakufa , khala ninga chapya na mtove wakupisa . 
54004003	Anthu ninga enewa ambafunzisa kuti kukazhali na kudya pinango nkhudawa . Mbwenye Mulungu adasasanya phoso yeneyi kuti idyiwe na anthu akukhulupira , adzindikira pyakuonadi ale , iwo angamala pereka takhuta kuna Mulungu . 
54004004	Chinthu chonsene chidasasanya Mulungu ntchadidi : nkhabe chinthu chathema kukhondwa tayu , mbwenye pyonsene pyathema kutambirwa na kupereka takhuta kuna Mulungu , 
54004005	thangwi mafala a Mulungu na kupemphera ndiye pimbachitisa kuti kudyako kutawirwe pamaso pa Mulungu . 
54004006	Ngakhala unapereka matongero enewa kuna abale , unadzakhala nyabasa wadidi wa Khristu Yesu , wakukulira m'chikhulupiro na m'chifunziso chakuonadi , chatewera iwe chile . 
54004007	Mbwenye ukhonde pithankano pyakusowa basa , pile mphyakukhonda thema kupilonga , m'mbuto mwache thimiza masenzeka akulemedza nawo Mulungu . 
54004008	Masenzeka akuwangisa manungo ngakuganyalisa , mbwenye moyo wakulemedza Mulungu ngwakuganyalisa pyakwanga monsene mwene , thangwi ambachitisa kudumbira kukwanekwane kuna moyo uno , pontho na kuna moyo unafuna kudzawo . 
54004009	Kulonga uku nkhwakuonadi , kule kwathema kutambirwa monsene mwene , pontho kukhulupirwa . 
54004010	Ife timbaphata basa mwakuwangisa thangwi taikha chidikhiro pana Mulungu wamoyo , ule ndi Nyankhombo wa onsene makamaka wa anthu akukhulupira . 
54004011	Pereka kuna iwo matongero na pifunziso penepi . 
54004012	Leka tawirisa munthu unango kuti akululupise thangwi ya kukhala mphale . Mbwenye ukhale upangizi kuna anyakukhulupira kudzera muna malongero ako , makhaliro ako , kufunana kwako , chikhulupiro chako pontho na ungwiro wako . 
54004013	Upipereke pa kuwerengera anthu mafala a Mulungu pakwecha , kualalikira , pontho na kuafunzisa , mpakana ndibwere kweneko . 
54004014	Onesesa kuti ukuphatisa basa mtukwa wauzimu , ule udapaswa iwe kudzera muna mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu , pontho pidasanjikwa iwe manja na akuluakulu a mpingo . 
54004015	Piphatise basa penepi , pontho upipereke wekha ene kuna ipyo , towera anthu onsene aone kuti moyo wako wachikhristu ukuthimiza kukula . 
54004016	Yang'anira makhaliro ako , pontho na chifunziso chako . Thimiza kuchita penepi , thangwi ungachita tenepo , unadzapipulumusa wekha ene pabodzi na anthu , ale ambava mafalako . 
54005001	Leka kulongera munthu wamkulu , mbwenye umdembetere khala ninga babako . Aphale ukhale nawo ninga abale ako , 
54005002	akazikulu ninga amamako , atsikana ninga anyamaingako na mtima wangwiro monsene mwene . 
54005003	Tsalakana akazi akufelwa , ale nkhabeletu munthu na mbodzi ene wakuaphedza . 
54005004	Mbwenye ngakhala mamfelwayo ana anache , penu pidzukulu , iwo chakutoma adziwe kuchita pinthu pinalonga chipembedzo chawo pakutsalakana anthu a pabanja pawo . Palmchita tenepo akupagali makolo awo na ambuyawo , thangwi penepi ndiye pimbakomera Mulungu . 
54005005	Mamfelwa , ule nkhabeletu munthu na mbodzi ene wakumphedza , ambaikha chidikhiro chache pana Mulungu , pontho ambapemphera mwakukhonda lekeza kuna Mulungu mosiku na masikati kuti amphedze . 
54005006	Mbwenye mamfelwa , ule ambapitsanzayisa yekha ene na pinthu pya dziko yapansi , weneyo akhala ninga afa kale , podi kwene kuti akhale pyache na moyo tani . 
54005007	Pereka matongero enewa kuna anthu , towera iwo aleke khala na chinthu chakuapokanyisa . 
54005008	Mbwenye ngakhala munthu hambatsalakana abale ache tayu , makamaka a pabanja pache , weneyo akhonda chikhulupiro chache , pontho ngwakuipa pyakwanga kupiringana munthu okhonda khulupira . 
54005009	Leka kuikha mamfelwa pamndandanda wa amamfelwa angakhonda kwanisa pyaka makumatanthatu pyakubalwa . Kuthimiza penepo akhale mkazi wakuti adasembwa kwene kabodzi basi ,
54005010	pontho akhale wakudziwika thangwi ya mabasache adidi ninga kukuza anache mwadidi , kutambira alendo mwadidi kumusa kwache , kutsuka manyalo a anthu a Mulungu , na kuphedza anthu m'nyatwa zawo , pontho wakupipereka kuchita mabasa adidi . 
54005011	Mbwenye leka ikha pamndandanda amamfelwa achitsikana ; thangwi pikhumbo pyawo pingaachitisa kufuna kukazhali , iwo anabauka kubuluka kuna Khristu . 
54005012	Natenepo ambakhala munthu wakudawa thangwi ya kuswa chiverano chawo chakutoma na Mulungu . 
54005013	Iwo ambafunza kuvunga ndzidzi wawo pakufambafamba msuwo na msuwo wa anthu anango . Si pokhapo tayu , iwo ambafunza kulonga tsweda na kutundukira pya anthu anango , kulonga pinthu pyakukhonda thema kupilonga . 
54005014	Tenepo ndikupifuna kuti amamfelwa achitsikana asembwe , akhale na ana na kutsalakana mwadidi mabanjawo , towera tileke kuapasa mwayi anyamalwathu kutilongera pinthu pyakuipa . 
54005015	Thangwi amamfelwa anango abauka kale kutewera Satana . 
54005016	Mbwenye ngakhala mkhristu unango wachikazi ana amamfelwa panyumba pache , athema kuatsalakana mwadidi , gopesera kunensa mpingo , towera mpingowo utsalakane amamfelwa , ale nkhabeletu munthu na mbodzi ene wakuaphedza . 
54005017	Akuluakulu a mpingo , ale ambaphata mwadidi basa yaukadamu , athema kulemedzwa pyakwanga pakupagalwi kawiri , makamaka ale ambaphata basa yakulalika na kufunzisa . 
54005018	Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Leka manga mulomo wa ng'ombe uku ikububuda mapira " pontho " Nyabasa athema kupagalwi pyakumthemera . "
54005019	Leka vera mafala akulongwa mwakupokanyisana na mkulu wa mpingo pangakhonda khala mboni ziwiri panu zitatu . 
54005020	Anthu anachita pyakudawawo asumulire pakwecha , towera anangowo achite mantha . 
54005021	Pamaso pa Mulungu na Khristu Yesu , pontho na pa angelo ndikukupanga mwakugogomeza kuti uvere matongero onsenewa mwachilungamo pontho uchite pinthu mwakukhonda yang'ana nkhope . 
54005022	Leka chimbiza na kusanjika manja pana munthu kumpambula kuti aphate basa ya Mbuya . Leka kwata khundu pa pyakudawa pya munthu unango ; pikoye wekha ene mwakuchena mtima . 
54005023	Leka kumwa madzi okha , mbwenye umwe pontho vinyu pang'ono kunyungulusa kudya m'mimba mwako podi umbadwaladwala . 
54005024	Kudawa kwa anthu anango kwaoneka kale pakwecha , pontho kudawa kwawo kwatsogola kale katongwa mseru . Mbwenye kudawa kwa anthu anango kumbachita kuatewera m'nduli . 
54005025	Monthomonthomo mabasa adidi ambaoneka pakwecha , podi na ale ene okhonda oneka , nkhabe kwanisa kubisika tayu . 
54006001	Mabitchu onsene athema kulemedza ambuyawo monsene mwene , towera paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakulongera pyakuipa dzina ya Mulungu pontho na pifunziso pyathu . 
54006002	Mabitchu , ale ambuyawo mbanyakukhulupira , hadatheme kualulupisa ambuyawo tayu , thangwi yakuti mbabale mwa Yesu . M'mbuto mwache iwo athema kuaphatira basa pyakwanga pene , thangwi ale ambaganyali na mabasawowa mbanyakukhulupira ambafuna iwo ale . Iwe wathema kufunzisa na kulalika pinthu penepi . 
54006003	Munthu onsene anafunzisa chifunziso chakusiyana na penepi , pontho mbakhonda phatizana na mafala akuonadi a Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , pontho na chifunziso cha chipembedzo chathu , 
54006004	iye ngwakudzala na kunyada , pontho iye nkhabe dziwa chinthu na chibodzi chene tayu . Iye ana chikhumbo chakunyansa chakufuna kwene kupokanyisana na kukangana pya mafala . Penepi pimbadzesa bivu , kukangana , kutikana , na kunyerezerana pyakuipa , 
54006005	mphoka zokhonda mala zakubulukira kuna anthu a manyerezero akupotoka , pontho ale nkhabe dziwa pyakuonadi tayu . Iwo ambanyerezera kuti kupembedza Mulungu ndi njira yakufuma nayo . 
54006006	Ndimomwene kupembedza Mulungu kumbafumisa pyakwanga ngakhala munthuyo anakwana na pinthu pina iyepyo . 
54006007	Ife tidakwatanji kubwera napyo kudziko ino yapansi ? Nkhabe chinthu ! Apo tinakwatanji kubuluka napyo padziko yapansi ? Nkhabe chinthu !
54006008	Tenepo ngakhala tina phoso na nguwo penepyo tikwane napyo . 
54006009	Mbwenye anthu ambafuna kufuma ale , ambagwa m'mayesero , pontho ambakweshwa m'misampha ya pinthu pizinji pyakupupwa na ya pikhumbo pyakupha , pimbaasakaza na kuavunga pile . 
54006010	Thangwi kuikha mtima pa kobiri ndi phata ya pyakuipa pyonsene pya mtundu na mtundu . Anthu anango achita phinga kukhala na kobiri mwakuti iwo adatayika kubuluka kuna chikhulupiro , pontho asanyika pikulu mumtima thangwi ya pinthu pizinji pyakutsukwalisa . 
54006011	Mbwenye iwe , munthu wa Mulungu , thunda pinthu pyonsenepi . Wangawanga kukhala na moyo wakulungama , wakulemedza Mulungu , wakukhulupira , wakufuna anango , wakupirira , pontho wakufulika . 
54006012	Menya nkhondo yadidi ya chikhulupiro . Piganyalire moyo okhonda mala ule udachemererwa iwe ndzidzi udatawira iwe pya chikhulupiro chako pamaso pa mboni zizinji . 
54006013	Pamaso pa Mulungu , ule ambapasa moyo pinthu pyonsene , pontho pamaso pa Khristu Yesu , ule adatawira pakwecha pya chikhulupiro chache pamaso pa Pontio Pilato , ndikukupanga
54006014	kuti uvere matongero enewa , pontho uakoye mwakukhulupirika mpakana ndzidzi unafuna dzaoneka Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
54006015	Kuoneka kwache kunadzaoneswa pandzidzi wache wakuthema na Mulungu nyakutsanzaya , pontho Mtongi mbodzi ene basi , Mfumu wa mafumu , pontho Mbuya wa ambuya . 
54006016	Iye yekha ene ngwakukhonda kufa , pontho ambakhala m'cheza chakuti nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kuchifikira chifupi tayu . Chipo nkhabe munthu amuona , pontho nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kumuona tayu . Kuna iye kukhale chilemedzo na mphamvu kwenda na kwenda . Ameni . 
54006017	Panga anthu akufuma na pinthu pya moyo uno kuti aleke khala anthu akunyada , pontho aleke nyindira mfuma ile njakukhonda khazikika , mbwenye anyindire Mulungu , ule ambatipasa pyonsene mwakufewa manja kuti tikomerwe napyo . 
54006018	Apange kuti aphate pinthu pyadidi , akhale akufuma m'mabasa adidi , akufewa manja , pontho akusasanyika kugawana pinthu pyawo na anango . 
54006019	Pakuchita tenepo anadzapigumanyira okha ene mfuma ninga maziko akukhazikika mwadidi pandzidzi unadzawo . Tenepo anakwanisa kuganyali moyo , ule ndi moyo chadichadi . 
54006020	Timoti koya mwadidi pidapaswa iwe kuti upikoye pile . Thunda mafala akuipa pontho mphoka zapezipezi , pimbalonga anthu kuti mphyaudziwisi pile . 
54006021	Anthu anango , ale akhapilonga okha ene kuti ana nzeru ninga yeneyi , adatayika kubuluka kuna chikhulupiro chawo . Kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kukhale na imwe monsene . 
55001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyakutumwa wa Khristu Yesu na kufuna kwa Mulungu . Ine ndidatumwa kuti ndilalike pya moyo , ukhadadumbira Mulungu kudzaupereka , pontho una ife mukuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu ule —
55001002	Kwenda kuna Timoti , mwananga wapamtima . Kukoma mtima , nsisi na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Baba Mulungu na Khristu Yesu Mbuyathu pikhale nawe . 
55001003	Ndinapereka ndakhuta kuna Mulungu ambaphatira ine basa na chikumbu mtima chakusowa chinthu chakupokanyisa ule , ninga mudachitira makolo anga kale . Ndimbapereka ndakhuta kuna iye , kukukumbuka ndzidzi onsene unapemphera ine mosiku na masikati . 
55001004	Misozi yako ndimbaikumbuka , pontho ndikupifunadi kuti ndikuone , towera ndikomerwe pikulu pene . 
55001005	Ine ndimbakumbuka chikhulupiro chadichadi china iwe . Chikhulupiro chenechi ndi sasawa na chile chikhali na mbuyako wamkazi Loisi , pontho mako Yunike akhali nachombo . Tenepo ine ndina chikhulupiro chonsene kuti iwembo uli nacho . 
55001006	Na thangwi yeneyi , ndikukukumbusa kuti uchitise kugaka ninga moto mtukwa udapaswa iwe na Mulungu ule , ndzidzi udakusanjika ine manja ule . 
55001007	Thangwi Mzimu Wakuchena adatipasa Mulungu si mzimu wakutipasa mantha tayu , mbwenye ngwakutipasa mphamvu , kufunana , pontho na kuuphata mtima . 
55001008	Tenepo leka chita manyadzo na kuchitira umboni pya Mbuyathu , penu kuchita manyadzo na ine nyaperezo thangwi ya kutumikira Khristu . M'mbuto mwache kwata khundu m'nyatwa thangwi ya Mphangwa Zadidi ninga munakupasira Mulungu mphamvu zakuphata nazo penepi . 
55001009	Iye adatipulumusa mbatichemera kuti tikhale anthu ache , nee na thangwi ya pinthu pyaphata ife tayu , mbwenye na thangwi ya kufuna kwache pontho na kukoma kwache mtima . Iye adationesa kukoma mtima kweneku kudzera muna Khristu Yesu , dziko mbidzati lengwa , 
55001010	mbwenye chinchino kwaoneswa pakwecha kuna ife kudzera muna kubwera kwa Nyankhombo wathu , Khristu Yesu . Iye adamalisa mphamvu za imfa , pontho kudzera muna Mphangwa Zadidi iye adaonesa pakwecha moyo okhonda kufa ule . 
55001011	Mulungu andisankhula kukhala nyakutumwa pontho mfunzisi towera ndilalike Mphangwa Zadidi , 
55001012	tenepo ndi thangwi yache ine ndikubonera ninga munachitira inemu . Kwache ine nkhabe chita manyadzo tayu , thangwi ananyindira ineyo ndimbadziwa , pontho ndina chikhulupiro kuti iye anakwanisa kukoya mwadidi pinthu pidamkoyesa ine pile " mpakana nsiku yakubwera kwache pontho . 
55001013	Phatisa chifunziso chakuonadi chidava iwe kuna ine chile , towera chikhale upangizi wathema iwe kuutsanzira . Thimiza kukhala m'chikhulupiro pontho mukufunana , pile mphyathu mukuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . 
55001014	Na kuphedzwa na Mzimu Wakuchena ambakhala muna ife ule , koya pinthu pyadidi pidapaswa iwe kuti upikoye pile . 
55001015	Iwe ukupidziwa kuti munthu onsene m'nthemba ya Asia , kuthimiza Figelo na Heremogene adandisiya ndekha ene . "
55001016	Mbuya achitire nsisi banja ya Onesiforo thangwi kazinji kene adanditsitsimusa ndiye . Iye hadachite manyadzo tayu kuti ndili m'perezo , 
55001017	mbwenye si ndzidzi pidafika iye mu Roma , adatoma kundisakasaka mpakana adandigumana .

55002001	Kulonga pya iwe , mwananga , khala wakuwanga kudzera muna kukoma mtima kuna ife mukuphatanizana na Khristu Yesu . 
55002002	Kwata pifunziso pidava iwe ndikupifunzisa pamaso pa mboni zizinji pile mbupikoyese kuna anthu akuthembeka , ale anakwanisa kufunzisambo anango . 
55002003	Kwatambo khundu pabodzi na ife m'nyatwa ninga nyankhondo wakukhulupirika wa Khristu Yesu . 
55002004	Nyankhondo wakumenya nkhondo mwaphinga athema nee kukwata khundu papinthu pya nsiku na nsiku tayu ngakhala anafuna kuchitisa mkadamu wache kukomerwa . 
55002005	Ntchibodzibodzi munthu wakuchita bitchabitcha yakuthamanga nkhabe tambira tayu mfupo angakhonda vera matongero a bitchabitchayo . 
55002006	Nyakulima wakuphata basa mwakuwangisa athema kukhala wakutoma kutambira khundu yache pa pyakuvuna . 
55002007	Nyerezera mwadidi pinalonga inepi , thangwi Mbuya anadzakuchitisa kukwanisa kupivesa mwadidi pyonsenepi . 
55002008	Kumbuka Yesu Khristu , ule adalamuswa kuimfa , ule akhali chidzukulu cha Davite , ninga mudafunziswa ipyo mu Mphangwa Zadidi zimbalalika inezi . 
55002009	Ine pano ndikubonera , pontho ndamangwa ninga phanga thangwi yakuti ndimbalalika Mphangwa Zadidi . Mbwenye mafala a Mulungu hadamangwe tayu , 
55002010	natenepo ndimbapirira pyonsene thangwi ya anthu adasankhulwa na Mulungu ale , towera iwombo agumane chipulumuso kudzera muna Khristu Yesu mbatambira demelero yokhonda mala . 
55002011	Kulonga uku nkhwakuonadi : " Ngakhala tidafa naye pabodzi , tinadzakhala pontho na moyo pabodzi naye . 
55002012	Ngakhala tinathimiza kupirira , tinadzatonga naye pabodzi . Ngakhala tinamkhonda , iyembo anadzatikhonda . 
55002013	Ngakhala tinakhonda khala akukhulupirika , iye anathimiza kukhala wakukhulupirika thangwi iye nkhabe kwanisa kupikhonda yekha ene tayu . "
55002014	Kumbusa anthu ako pinthu penepi , pontho uacheuze pikulu pene pamaso pa Mulungu kuti aleke kupokanyisana na pya mafala . Penepi nkhabe ganyalisa tayu , mbwenye pimbavunga kwene anthu akupiveserawo . 
55002015	Wangisira na kuphata pinthu pyadidi kuti ukhale wakutawirwa pamaso pa Mulungu ninga nyabasa ule hambachita manyadzo na basache tayu , pontho wakufunzisa mwadidi mwene mphangwa zakuonadi za Mulungu . 
55002016	Mbwenye thunda mchezo wapezipezi okhonda lemedza Mulungu , pontho wakupupwa , ule umbabausa anthu kubuluka kuna Mulungu .

55002019	Mbwenye maziko akuwanga adaikha Mulungu ale , nkhabe kwanisa kutekenyeka tayu ; pontho padzulu pache palembwa mafala awa : " Mbuya ambaadziwa ale ngache , " pontho " Munthu onsene wakulonga kuti ndiye wa Mbuya , athema kuleka pyakudawa . "
55002020	M'nyumba ikulu mumbakhala piyombo pya mtundu na mtundu : pinango mphya siliva pontho golidi , pinango mphya miti pontho dongo ; pinangopyo mphyakuphatisira basa yakufunika pyakwanga , pinangombo mphyakuphatisira basa nsiku na nsiku . 
55002021	Ngakhala munthu anapichenesa yekha ene kubuluka kuna pinthu pyonsene pyakuipa , anadzaphatiswa basa kupinthu pyakufunika , thangwi iye ngwakupambulika pontho wakufunika kuna Mbuyache , kusasanyika kuti aphatiswe pabasa yonsene yadidi . 
55002022	Thunda pikhumbo pyakuipa pya chiphale , wangisira kukhala na chilungamo , chikhulupiro , kufunana na mtendere , pabodzi pene na anthu ambapembedza Mbuya na mtima wangwfro ale .

55002024	Nyabasa wa Mbuya hadatheme kukhala wanthonga tayu , mbwenye athema kukhala wakukoma mtima kuna munthu onsene , mfunzisi wakupirira , pontho wadidi . 
55002025	Iye athema kusumulula mwakufiilika anthu ale anapokanyisana na iye na chidikhiro chakuti Mulungu anadzapasa mwayi wakuleka pyakudawa pyawo mbadzadziwa pyakuonadi . 
55002026	Tenepo nzeru zawo zinadzabwereramo mbathawa msampha wa Satana , ule akhadaakwesha mbaachitisa kuvera kufuna kwache . 
55003001	Kumbuka kuti pansiku zakumalisa kunadzakhala ndzidzi wakugoswa . 
55003002	Anthu anadzakhala akupifuna okha ene , akuikha mtima pakobiri , akugaya , akudungudza , akutikana , okhonda vera anyakuabala , okhonda pereka takhuta , pontho okhonda pembedza ;
55003003	iwo anadzakhala okhonda funa anzawo , okhonda kuva nsisi , atsweda , okhonda kuuphata mtima , aukali , pontho okhonda funa pyadidi ;

55003005	podi kwene kuti iwo ambaoneka ninga anthu akupembedza , iwo ambakhonda mphamvu yache . Kuna anthu enewa ufunduke . 
55003006	Anango a iwo ambapita mwaufakafaka m'nyumba za anthu mbakwesha akazi akufewa , ale alemerwa na mtolo wa pyakudawa mbazunguzika na pikhumbo pyakuipa pya mtundu na mtundu , 
55003007	akazi ale ndzidzi onsene ambayesayesa kuti afunze , mbwenye hanakwanisa kudziwa pyakuonadi tayu . 
55003008	Ninga montho mudachitira Yane na Yambere kupokanyisa Mose , ntchibodzibodzi anthu enewa akupokanyisa pyakuonadi — anthu akuti manyerezero awo ngakupotoka pontho chikhulupiro chawo ntchakuchimwanika .

55003010	Mbwenye iwe wateweza chifunziso changa , makhaliro anga , na chikhafuna ine m'moyo mwanga ; waona chikhulupiro changa , kufulika kwanga , kufunana kwanga , kupirira kwanga , 
55003011	kubonereswa kwanga na nyatwa zanga . Iwe ukupidziwa pyonsene pidachitika kuna ine pile m'mizinda ya Antiokea , Ikonio na Listara , kubonera kukulu kudapirira ine kule . Mbwenye Mbuya adandipulumusa mupyonsenepi .

55003015	pontho ukukumbuka kuti kutomera uwanako ukudziwa Malemba akuchena , ale anakwanisa kukupasa nzeru zakuti upulumuke nazo kudzera muna chikhulupiro muna Khristu Yesu . 
55003016	Malemba onsene ngakupepeserwa na Mulungu , tenepo iwo ngakufunika kufunzisa nawo chakuonadi , kusumulula chakuipa , kusasanya chakudawika na kupereka matongero a makhaliro akulungama , 
55003017	towera munthu wakuphatira basa Mulungu akhale wakukwanakwana pontho wakuthema kuphata basa yadidi yamtundu onsene . 
55004001	Pamaso pa Mulungu na pa Khristu Yesu , ule anadzatonga mseru anthu onsene amoyo na akufa ene , pontho na thangwi yakuti akubwera pontho dzatonga ninga mfumu , ndikukudembetera pikulu pene kuti
55004002	ulalike Mphangwa Zadidi . Sasanyika kulalika mphangwazo pandzidzi unafuna anthu na pandzidzi unakhonda funa anthu , cheuza , sumulula , wangisa mtima — mwakupirira kukulu pontho mwakuchita mpholemphole . 
55004003	Thangwi ndzidzi unadzafika wakuti anthu hanadzaveserave chifunziso chakuonadi tayu , mbwenye anadzatewera pikhumbo pyawo , pontho anadzapigumanyira okha ene afunzisi azinji ale anafuna dzaapanga pinthu pinakhumba iwo kuti apive pile . 
55004004	Iwo anadzafunga makutu awo , towera aleke vesera pyakuonadi , mbwenye anadzavesera pithankano pyakusowa basa . 
55004005	Mbwenye iwe khala m'maso mupyonsene pinachitikapi ; pirira m'nyatwa , phata basa yakulalika Mphangwa Zadidi , pontho phata basako yonsene ninga nyabasa wa Mulungu .

56001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyabasa wa Mulungu , pontho nyakutumwa wa Yesu Khristu . Ine ndidasankhulwa pontho na kutumwa kaphedza kukulisa chikhulupiro cha anthu akusankhulika a Mulungu , na kuachitisa kuti adziwe pyakuonadi , pile pimbafunzisa kukhala na moyo wakulemedza Mulungu ,

56001003	Tenepo pandzidzi wache wakuthema iye adautchulula m'mphangwa zache . Ine ndidapaswa basa yakulalika mphangwazi na kutongwa na Mulungu Nyankhombo wathu . 
56001004	Kwenda kuna Tito , mwananga wakuonadi m'chikhulupiro china ife awiri . Kukoma mtima na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Baba , pontho kuna Yesu Khristu Nyankhombo wathu pikhale nawe . Basa ya Tito pansuwa ya Krete
56001005	Ndidakusiya ku Krete towera undendemeze pyonsene pidasalira kuti pichitwe pile , pontho kuti usankhule akulu a mpingo m'maluwani onsene . Kumbuka pidakupanga ine pile , 
56001006	kuti mkulu wa mpingo athema kukhala munthu wakusowa chinthu chakumpokanyisa , athema kukhala na mkazi mbodzi basi , a pontho anache akhale anyakukhulupira , nee akukhala na mbiri yakufudza , penu yakukhonda vera tayu .

56001008	Akhale munthu wakutambira alendo mwadidi , pontho wakufuna kuchita pyadidi . Akhale munthu wakuuphata mtima , wakulungama , wakuchena , pontho wakukhuza . 
56001009	Akhale munthu wakuphatisa mphangwa zakunyindirika , pontho zakutawirizana na chakuonadi chidafunzisa ife chile . Angachita tenepo anakwanisa kuwangisa mtima anthu anango na chifunziso chakuonadi , pontho kuonesa kudawa kwa anyakuchipokanyawo . 
56001010	Pana anthu azinji , makamaka Ayuda adasanduka kukhala akhristu ale , ambagalukira na kunyengeza anthu anango na pinthu pyapezi pimbalonga iwo pile .

56002003	Chita chibodzibodzi kuna akazikulu kuafunzisa kuti akhale na makhaliro akuthemerana na akazi akukhala na moyo wakuchena . Aleke khala atsweda , pontho mabitchu a pyakuledzeresa . Iwo athema kufunzisa pinthu pyadidi , 
56002004	towera afunzise akazi achitsikana kufuna amunawo na anawo , 
56002005	kukhala akuuphata mtima , pontho angwiro , kukhala akutsalakana mwadidi pya m'misa mwawo , kukhala akukoma mtima , na akuvera amunawo . Penepo nee mbodzi anakwanisa kulonga pyakuipa kuna mafala a Mulungu tayu . 
56002006	Chita chibodzibodzi kuna amuna achiphale kuawangisa mtima kukhala akuuphata mtima . 
56002007	Papyonsene iwe ene ukhale upangizi wa makhaliro adidi . Funzisa mwakuonadi mtima , pontho leka funzisa mwadzenda . 
56002008	Bulusa mafala adidi m'kanwa mwako , towera anango aleke kukusumulula nawo , pontho kuti anyamalwa onsene achite manyadzo pakukhonda kulonga na chakuipa chene pya ife . 
56002009	Mabitchu athema kuvera ambuyawo mbachita pinthu pyakuakomera ndzidzi onsene . Aleke kutawira ambuyawo mwakuapokanya , 
56002010	penu kuabera pinthu pyawo . M'mbuto mwache aonese kuti iwo ngadidi , pontho akukhulupirika ndzidzi onsene , towera papyonsene pimbachita iwo achitise anthu kukwatika na chifunziso cha Mulungu Nyankhombo wathu . 
56002011	Thangwi Mulungu aonesa kukoma kwache mtima towera anthu onsene apulumuke . 
56002012	Kukoma mtima kweneko kumbatifunzisa kuleka makhaliro okhonda lemedza Mulungu , pontho pikhumbo pya pansi pano . Kumbatifunzisa kuti tikhale akuuphata mtima , akulungama , pontho na moyo wakulemedza Mulungu , 
56002013	pandzidzi unadikhira ife Nsiku yakutsanzaya , nsiku inafuna dzaoneka demelero ya Mulungu wathu Wamkulu na Nyankhombo Yesu Khristu . 
56002014	Iye adapipereka yekha ene ninga nsembe thangwi ya ife pano , kutipulumusa kuna pyakudawika , pontho kutichitisa kuti tikhale anthu ache akuchena , pontho akuchita phinga kuchita pinthu pyadidi . 
56002015	Penepi ndiye pyathema iwe kupifunzisa , pontho phatisa basa utongi wako onsene ndzidzi unawangisa iwe mtima na kusumulula anyakukuvesera . Nee na mbodzi ene athema kukululupisa tayu . Makhaliro akuthema kukhala na akhristu
56003001	Akumbuse anthu ako pyakuvera mafumu na atongi , pontho kusasanyika kuchita pinthu pyadidi monsene mwene . 
56003002	Apange kuti aleke kulonga tsweda anthu anango , mbwenye kuti akhale mwamtendere na mwaushamwali , pontho ndzidzi onsene kukhala akufulika kuna anthu onsene . 
56003003	Kale ife tikhalimbo anthu akupupwa , okhonda vera na akunyengezwa . Tikhali mabitchu a pikhumbo pyakuipa na pyakusirira pyamtundu na mtundu . Tikhavunga ndzidzi kuchita pinthu pyakuipa na bivu ; anango adazondana nafe , ifembo tidazondana nawo . 
56003004	Mbwenye pidaoneka kukoma mtima na kutifuna kwa Mulungu Nyankhombo wathu , 
56003005	iye adatipulumusa , nee na thangwi ya mabasa adidi akhadachita ife tayu , mbwenye na thangwi ya nsisi zache . Iye adatipulumusa kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena pakutisambisa mwakuti tabalwa mwachinchino pontho kuti tina moyo wachinchino . 
56003006	Mulungu adatikhuthulira mwakuinjipa Mzimu Wakuchena kudzera muna Yesu Khristu Nyankhombo wathu , 
56003007	towera tiyeswe anthu akulungama pamaso pa Mulungu na kukoma kwache mtima , pontho titambire moyo okhonda mala unadikhira ife ule . 
56003008	Mafalawa ngakunyindirika . Pinafuna ine mphyakuti iwe udimbirire papinthu penepi , towera anyakukhulupira Mulungu achite mpholemphole kupipereka kuchita mabasa adidi . Penepi mphyadidi , pontho pyakuganyalisa kuna anthu onsene . 
56003009	Kwache thunda mphoka zakupupwa , kukumba ndandanda wa makolo akale , makangano , na kuchita nthonga thangwi ya mwambo wa Mose . Penepi mphyapezi , pontho pyakusowa basa . 
56003010	Mcheuze kabodzi munthu wakulamusa magawikano , kubuluka penepo kachiwiri kache , tenepo angachimwanika leka phatizana naye . 
56003011	Iwe ukupidziwa kuti munthu ninga weneyu manyerezero ache ngakupotoka , tenepo pyakudawa pyache pimbatsikimiza kuti iye ngwakukonwa . Mafala akumalisa nawo
56003012	Ndingatuma Aritema , penu Tikiko kuna iwe , yesayesa kudza kuna ine ku Nikopoli , thangwi ndanyerezera kuti mainja andimalire kweneko . 
56003013	Yesayesa monsene mwene kuphedza Zena , mvunuliri pamiseru , pontho Apolo kuti atome ulendo wawo , pontho uonesese kuti iwo aleke sowa chinthu na chibodzi chene . 
56003014	Anthu athu afunze kupipereka kuchita pinthu pyadidi , towera aphedze panafunika chiphedzopo ; iwo athema kukhala anthu akuganyalisa anango . 
56003015	Anthu onsene ali pabodzi na ine kuno akupereka mwenyikiro kuna iwe . Pereka mwenyikiro kuna ashamwali athu m'chikhulupiro . Kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kukhale namwe monsene . 
57001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Paulo , nyaperezo thangwi ya kutumikira Khristu Yesu . Ikubulukira pontho kuna Timoti , mbaleathu — Kwenda kuna Filemoni , shamwaliathu , pontho nyabasa mwanzathu , 
57001002	kuna mpingo ule umbagumanikana m'nyumba mwako , kuna nyamaingathu Afia , pontho kuna Arikipo , nyankhondo mwanzathu . 
57001003	Kukoma mtima pontho mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Babathu , pontho Mbuya Yesu Khristu pikhale namwe . 
57001004	Mbaleanga Filemoni , ndzidzi onsene unapemphera ine ndimbakunyerezera mbandipereka takhuta kuna Mulungu wanga thangwi ya iwepo . 
57001005	Thangwi ndimbava mule mumbafunira iwe anthu onsene a Mulungu , pontho na mule mumbakhulupira iwe Mbuya Yesu . 
57001006	Ndimbapemphera kuti chiphatizano chathu na iwe ninga anyakukhulupira chidzese kuvesa kukulu kwa mtsanzayiso onsene una ife m'moyo wathu wakuphatanizana na Khristu . 
57001007	Mbaleanga kuafuna kwako anthu a Mulungu kwadzesa kukomerwa pyakwanga mumtima mwanga , pontho kwandiwangisa mtima . Iwe watsitsimusa mitima ya anthu onsene a Mulungu . 
57001008	Natenepo podi kwene kuti ndinakwanisa kuwanga mtima kukutonga ninga mkhristu mwanzako kuchita pyathema iwe dzachita , 
57001009	kwache ndinachita kukupempha thangwi ya kukufuna kwanga . Ine Paulo , nkhalamba , ule chinchino ndili m'perezo thangwi ya kutumikira kwanga Khristu Yesu , 
57001010	ndikukupempha thangwi ya Onesimo a ule adasanduka mwananga muna Khristu ndzidzi una ine m'perezo , tenepo ine ndakhala ninga babache . 
57001011	Kale iye akhali wakusowa basa kuna iwe , mbwenye chinchino anakwanisa kuphedza tonsene awirife , iwe na ine ene . 
57001012	Chinchino ndikumbwezera kuna iwe khala ninga ndikutumiza mtimanga . 
57001013	Ndikhapifuna kumkoya kuna ine kuno , towera andiphedze m'mbuto mwako ndzidzi una ine m'perezo uno thangwi ya kulalika Mphangwa Zadidi . 
57001014	Mbwenye sinafuna kuchita pinthu mbudzati tawirizana napyo , thangwi ndinafuna kuti uchite chadidichi mwakufuna kwako , nee mwakukakamizwa tayu . 
57001015	Mwinango Onesimo udalekana naye kwene ndzidzi ung'ono ene basi , towera kutsogoloko udzakhale naye kwenda na kwenda . 
57001016	Tenepo chinchino iye si bitchu kokha tayu , mbwenye ngwakufunika kupiringana bitchu , iye ndi mbale wapamtima muna Khristu . Ine ndimbamfuna pyakwanga , kwache iwembo umbamfuna pyakwangaletu kupiringana ine , ninga munthu pontho mkhristu mwanzako . 
57001017	Natenepo ngakhala umbalonga kuti ndine mwanzakodi wakuphata naye basa pabodzi , mtambire mwadidi Onesimoyo khala ninga ukutambira ine . 
57001018	Ngakhala akudawira , penu kuti akufiyali , ndinadzapagali ndine pyafiyali iyepyo . 
57001019	Pano , ine Paulo ndikulemba na dzanja yanga ene . Pyafiyali iyepyo , ndinadzapagali ndine , Paulo . Ndimomwene ine sidatheme kukukumbusa tayu kuti pidandifiyalisa iwe ndi moyo wako ene . 
57001020	Ande , mbaleanga , ndaphata miyendo , ndikomerembo mtima ine kundichitira chadidichi thangwi ya Mbuya ; tsitsimusa moyo wanga ninga mkhristu mwanzako . 
57001021	Ndikulemba penepi na kupidziwa mwadidi mwene kuti unati uchite pyapempha inepi , pontho kuti unati uchite pikulu kupiringana penepi . 
57001022	Chinthu chinango ntchichi : undisasanyire subi ya alendo , thangwi ndikukhulupira kuti Mulungu anati ave kupemphera kwa imwe monsene mbadzandibwezera kuna imweko . 
57001023	Epafra nyaperezo mwanzanga thangwi ya kutumikira Khristu Yesu akuperekambo mwenyikiro kuna imwe . 
57001024	Anzanga anyakuphata nawo basa pabodzi , enewa ndi Maliko , Aristanko , Dema na Luka akuperekambo mwenyikiro . 
57001025	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuya Yesu Khristu kukhale namwe monsene . 
58001001	Kalene Mulungu adalonga kuna makolo athu kazinji kene , pontho munjira zizinji kudzera muna maprofeti , 
58001002	mbwenye nsiku zakumalisa zino iye alonga kuna ife kudzera muna Mwanache . Kudzera muna iye , Mulungu adalenga dziko yonsene , pontho iye asankhulwa na Mulungu kuti adzatambire pinthu pyonsene pakumalisa . 
58001003	Iye ambaonesa cheza cha demelero ya Mulungu , pontho iye ndi sasawa na Mulungu monsene mwene . Iye ambachitisa pinthu pyonsene kuthimiza kukhalapo na mafalache amphamvu . Pidamala iye kupichitisa kuti anthu anakwanisa kulekererwa pyakudawa pyawo , iye adakhala kudzulu kumadyo kwa Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene . Mwana Mulungu ngwamkululetu
58001004	Mwana Mulungu adaikhwa kukhala wamkululetu kupiringana angelo , sasawa na dzina ile idampasa Mulungu njikululetu kupiringana ya angelo . 
58001005	Chipo Mulungu hadalonge tayu kuna mbodzi wa angelo ache mbati , " Iwe ndiwe Mwananga , lero ndasanduka Babako . Penu Mulungu kulonga pya angelo ache na mbodzi ene tayu mbati , " Ndinati ndikhale Babache , tenepo iye anasanduka Mwananga . "
58001006	Pidasala Mulungu pang'ono kutumiza Mwanache wautombo padziko yapansi , adalonga mbati , " Angelo onsene a Mulungu athema kumpembedza . "
58001007	Pya angelo iye adalonga mbati , " Mulungu ambasanduza angelo kukhala ninga mphepo , pontho anyabasache ninga malulume a moto . "
58001008	Mbwenye pya Mwana iye adalonga mbati , " Ufumu wanu , Mulungu , unadzakhala kwenda na kwenda ! Chilungamo ndi ndodo yanu yachifumu . 
58001009	Mumbafuna pyakulungama mbamuzondana na pyakudawika . Ndi thangwi yache Mulungu , Mulungu wanu , akusankhulani , pontho akupasani chilemedzo kupiringana chidapasa iye anzanu chile , pakukudzozani na mafuta , chitsikimizo cha kukomerwa . "
58001010	Iye adalonga pontho mbati , " Imwe , Mbuya , pakutoma mudalenga dziko yapansi , pontho na manjanu mudasasanya kudzulu . 
58001011	Iwo anadzamala , mbwenye imwe munadzakhalapo ; iwo anadzasakala ninga nguwo . 
58001012	Munadzaafunyafunya ninga mkanjo , pontho ninga mumbachitirwa nguwo , iwo anadzasanduzika . Mbwenye imwe ndzidzi onsene munadzakhala sasawa , pontho moyo wanu nkhabe dzamala tayu . "
58001013	Chipo Mulungu hadalonge tayu kuna angelo ache na mbodzi ene mbati , " Khala kumkono wanga wamadyowu kufikirana ndiikhe anyamalwako ninga chakusanjikirapo manyalo ako . "
58001014	Apo , angelo mbani ? Iwo ndi mizimu , ile imbatumikira Mulungu , pontho imbatumwa kuphedza anthu akufuna dzatambira chipulumuso ale . 
58002001	Ndi thangwi yache tathema kukakamira pyonsene pimbava ife , towera tileke kutaya njira . 
58002002	Mphangwa zidapaswa makolo athu na angelo zile zikhali na mphamvu zikulu mwakuti munthu adakhonda teweza , penu kuvera mphangwazo ule , adatchunyuswa mwakuthemerana naye . 
58002003	Ife nkhabe kwanisa na pang'ono pene tayu kuthawa kutchunyuswa , ngakhala tinakhonda tsalakana chipulumuso chikulu ninga chenechi . Mbuya chakutoma adalonga pya chipulumuso chenechi , tenepo ale adamvesera adatsikimizira kuna ife kuti mphyakuonadi . 
58002004	Pandzidzi onthowo , Mulungu adathimiza umboni wache kuna umboni wawo pakuchita pidzindikiro na pyakudodomesa pyamtundu onsene , pontho kugawa mitukwa ya Mzimu Wakuchena malingana na kufuna kwache . 
58002005	Mulungu hadaikha angelo kuti akhale atongi padziko yachinchino inafuna kudza ile tayu — dziko inalonga ifeyi . 
58002006	Mbwenye ninga mwalemberwa ipyo panango m'Malemba kuti , " Mulungu , munthu mbani wakuti mumbamnyerezera ; munthu wakubalwa na munthu pyache wakuti imwe mumbamtsalakana ?
58002007	Ndzidzi pang'ono imwe mudamsanduza kukhala wang'ono kupiringana angelo ; imwe mudamdzoza ufumu na demelero pontho chilemedzo , 
58002008	mbamuikha pinthu pyonsene pansi pa manyalo ache . " Ipyo pikulonga kuti Mulungu adasasanya munthu kukhala mtongi wa pinthu pyonsene ; penepa pikulonga pakwecha kuti mphinthu pyonsene , kwache ife nkhabe ona chinchino munthu kutonga pinthu pyonsene tayu . 
58002009	Mbwenye timbaona Yesu , ule ndzidzi pang'ono adaikhwa kukhala wang'ono kupiringana angelo , towera kudzera muna kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu , iye afere anthu onsene . Tikuona chinchino pano kuti adzozwa ufumu na demelero pontho chilemedzo , thangwi ya nyatwa za imfa zidaona iye zile . 
58002010	Pikhali pyakuthema kuti Mulungu , nyakulenga pinthu pyonsene , pontho nyakuchitisa pinthu pyonsene kuthimiza kukhalapo , achitise Yesu kukhala wakuthema monsene mwene kudzera muna nyatwa zidaona iye zile , towera atsogolere ana azinji kuti agawane demelero yache . Thangwi Yesu ndiye nyakuatsogolera kwenda kudemelero . 
58002011	Iye ambachenesa anthu kuna pyakudawa pyawo , tenepo iye pabodzi na anthu adacheneswa ale ana Baba mbodzi basi . Ndi thangwi yache Yesu nkhabe manyadzo tayu na kulonga kuti iwo mbabale ache . 
58002012	Iye akulonga kuna Mulungu mbati , " Ndinati ndipange abale anga pya ukulu wanu ; ndinati ndikukuzeni pandzidzi unagumanyikana iwo kukupembedzani . "
58002013	Iye akulonga pontho mbati , " Ndinadzanyindira Mulungu . " Akulonga pontho mbati , " Pano ndina ana andipasa Mulungu ale . "
58002014	Apo podi ana enewa mbanthu akukhala na chiropa na mnofu , Yesuyo adasanduka kukhalambo munthu ninga iwo . Iye adachita penepi , towera kudzera muna imfache avunge Satana , ule ana utongi pa imfa , 
58002015	pontho kuti asudzule onsene , ale akhali mabitchu moyo wawo onsene thangwi ya kugopa kwawo imfa . 
58002016	Mphyakuveka mwadidi kuti ale ambaphedza iye si angelo tayu , mbwenye ninga mwalembera m'Malemba kuti , " Iye ambaphedza pidzukulu pya Abrahamu . "
58002017	Na thangwi ya penepi iye akhadathema kukhala ninga abale ache monsene mwene kuti akhale Nyansembe Wamkulu wakukhulupirika , pontho wansisi pakutumikira kwache Mulungu , towera pyakudawa pyonsene pya anthu pilekererwe . 
58002018	Tenepo chinchino iye anakwanisa kuphedza anthu ali pakati pamayesero ale , thangwi iye makayo akhalimbo pakati pamayesero na kubonera kwene . 
58003001	Abale anga akuchena , ale ambachemerwa na Mulungu ! Nyerezerani pya Yesu , ule adatuma Mulungu kudzakhala Nyansembe Wamkulu wa chikhulupiro chimbatawira ife chile . 
58003002	Iye akhali wakukhulupirika kuna Mulungu , adamsankhula kuphata basa yeneyi ule , sasawambo na mudakhulupirika Mose pabasache m'Nyumba ya Mulungu . 
58003003	Munthu anamanga nyumba ambalemedzwa pikulu kupiringana nyumbayo , sasawambo Yesu athema kulemedzwa pikulu kupiringana Mose . 
58003004	Nyumba zonsene zimbamangwa na anthu , mbwenye Mulungu ndiye nyakumanga pinthu pyonsene . 
58003005	Mose akhali wakukhulupirika ninga nyabasa m'Nyumba yonsene ya Mulungu , tenepo iye adachitira umboni pya pinthu pikhafuna dzalonga Mulungu kutsogolo . 
58003006	Mbwenye Khristu ninga Mwana , ngwakukhulupirika kuyang'anira Nyumba ya Mulungu . Tenepo ife ndife nyumbache , ngakhala tinathimiza kuwanga mtima , pontho kudikhira pinthu pinafuna ife dzatambira . 
58003007	Tenepo , ninga mumbalongera Mzimu Wakuchena kuti , " Mungava fala ya Mulungu lero , 
58003008	lekani kuumisa mtimanu , ninga mudachitira makolo anu ndzidzi udagalukira iwo Mulungu , ninga mukhali iwo m'thando nsiku idayesa iwo Mulungu ile . 
58003009	Mulungu alonga kuti : Kweneko iwo adandiyesa na kundisosa podi kwene kuti adaona pinthu pidachita ine pyaka makumanayi . 
58003010	Tenepo ndidazhangali na anthu enewa mbandilonga kuti , ' Ndzidzi onsene iwo nkhabe khulupirika tayu , pontho ambakhonda kuvera matongero anga . '
58003011	Ndidazhangali mbandiadumbirira kuti , Two nkhabe dzapita tayu m'dziko ile ikhafuna ine kuapumisa . ' "
58003012	Anyakukhulupira anzanga , khalani m'maso kuti pakati panu paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakukhala na mtima wakuipa , pontho okhonda khulupira mwakuti iye ambabauka kubuluka kuna Mulungu wamoyo . 
58003013	Mbwenye , kuti paleke khala na mbodzi ene pakati panu wakunyengezwa na pyakudawa mbaumisa mtimache , imwe mwathema kuwangisana mtima unango na mwanzache nsiku na nsiku , ndzidzi una ife na mafala m'Malemba akuti " Lero " . 
58003014	Ife tonsene ndife anzache a Khristu tingapirira kufikirana kumamalisiro na chidikhiro chikhali na imwe pakutoma chile . 
58003015	Penepi ndiye pinalonga Malemba kuti , " Mungava fala ya Mulungu lero , lekani kuumisa mtimanu ninga mudachitira makolo anu ndzidzi udagalukira iwo Mulungu . "
58003016	Mbani anthu adava fala ya Mulungu mbamgalukira ? Mbanthu adabuluswa na Mose m'dziko ya Iguputo ale . 
58003017	Mbani adazhangalirwa na Mulungu pyaka makumanayi ? Mbanthu adadawa mbafera m'thando ale . 
58003018	Pidadumbira Mulungu mbati , " Iwo hanapita m'dziko ikhafuna ine kuapumisa ile tayu " — iye akhalonga ani ? Akhalonga anthu akupandukira ale . 
58003019	Chinchino tikupiona kuti iwo hadakwanisa kupita m'dziko mule , thangwi iwo hadakhulupire tayu . 
58004001	Chinchino Mulungu adumbira kuti tinadzatambira kupuma kudalonga iye kule . Tendeni tichite mpholemphole kuti paleke gumanwa na mbodzi ene wa imwe wakuchimwana kutambira kupumaku . 
58004002	Thangwi ife tava Mphangwa Zadidi , ninga mudachitira iwombo . Iwo adava mphangwa za Mulungu , kwache nee zidaaganyalira tayu , thangwi pidaziva iwo hadazitambira na chikhulupiro tayu . 
58004003	Ife anyakuzikhulupira , timbatambira kupuma kudalonga Mulungu kule . Pili ninga montho mudalongera iye kuti , " Ndidazhangali mbandidumbira kuti : Two nkhabe dzapita tayu m'dziko ikhafuna ine dzaapumisa ile ! ' " Iye adalonga penepi pikhadamalisa iye kulenga dziko yapansi . 
58004004	Panango m'Malemba penepi pyalongwa pya Nsiku Yakupuma kuti : " Mulungu adapuma pabasache yonsene pansiku yachinomwe . "
58004005	Pyonthopi pyalongwa pontho kuti , ' Two nkhabe dzapita tayu m'dziko ikhafuna ine dzaapumisa ile . "
58004006	Ale adatoma kuva Mphangwa Zadidi hadatambira kupuma kule , thangwi iwo hadakhulupire tayu . Mbwenye pana anango ale atawiriswa kutambira kupumako . 
58004007	Ndi thangwi yache Mulungu adaikha nsiku inango ile imbachemerwa kuti " Lero " , pidalonga iye pyaka pizinji pene pidagwanda pile kudzera muna Davite m'Malemba akuti , " Ngakhala imwe munava fala ya Mulungu lero , lekani kuumisa mtimanu . "
58004008	Ngakhala Yoshua akhadapasa anthu kupuma kukhadadumbira Mulungu kule , m'nduli mwache Mulungu nee mbadalonga pya nsiku inango tayu . 
58004009	Tenepo ninga muna ipyo , kupuma kwa anthu a Mulungu kwathimiza kukhalapo ninga kupuma kudachita Mulungu pansiku yachinomwe ile . 
58004010	Munthu anatambira kupuma kudadumbira Mulungu kule , anadzapuma pabasache , sasawa ninga mudapumira Mulungu pabasache . 
58004011	Apo , tendeni tichite phinga kuti titambire kupumaku , towera paleke khala mbodzi pakati pathu wakupichimwana ninga mudachitira iwo , thangwi ya kusowa kwawo chikhulupiro . 
58004012	Mafala a Mulungu ngamoyo , pontho akuphata basa mwamphamvu , akutwa kupiringana talasada yakutwa uku na uku . Iyo imbalasa m'bwaloletu kufikirana kule kudagumana moyo na mzimu , pontho na kule kudagumana mfundo na mnongonongo a m'magogodo . Imbatonga pikhumbo na pyakunyerezera pya mtima wa munthu . 
58004013	Nkhabe chinthu chingabisike kuna Mulungu tayu ; pyakulengwa pyonsene mphyakufununkhulwa , pontho mphyakuoneka pamaso pache . Iye ndiye anadzatitonga mseru pa pyonsene pyachita ife . 
58004014	Apo , tendeni tiphatise chikhulupiro chimbatawira ife . Thangwi tina Nyansembe Wamkululetu ule afikiratu pamaso pa Mulungu — Yesu Mwana Mulungu . 
58004015	Nyansembe wathu Wamkulu ngwakuva nsisi na kusowa kwathu mphamvu . Nyansembe wathu Wamkulu adayeswa monsene mwene ninga mumbayeserwa ifembo , kwache iye hadadawa tayu . 
58004016	Apo , tendeni tikhale akuwanga mtima mbatifedzeni kuna mpando wachifumu wa Mulungu , kule kuna kukoma mtima . Kweneko tinadzaverwa nsisi , pontho tinadzagumana kukoma mtima kule kunafuna dzatiphedza pandzidzi onthowo unakufuna ife . 
58005001	Nyansembe Wamkulu onsene ambasankhulwa kubulukira pakati pa anthu anzache mbaikhwa kutumikira Mulungu m'mbuto mwawo , kupereka mitukwa na nsembe thangwi ya pyakudawa . 
58005002	Podi iye maka ngwakusowa mphamvu papinthu pizinji , anakwanisa kupirira mwakufulika na anthu okhonda dziwa pinthu , pontho ambachita umambala ale . 
58005003	Podi iye ngwakusowa mphamvu , athema kupereka nsembe , nee na thangwi ya pyakudawa pya anthu pyokha tayu , mbwenye na thangwi ya pyakudawa pyache pene . 
58005004	Nkhabe munthu ambapipasa yekha ene chilemedzo kukhala Nyansembe Wamkulu tayu , mbwenye munthu athema kuchemerwa na Mulungu kuti akhale Nyansembe Wamkulu ninga mudachitira Aroni . 
58005005	Sasawambo na Khristu , iye hadapipasa yekha ene chilemedzo kukhala Nyansembe Wamkulu tayu . M'mbuto mwache Mulungu ndiye adapilonga kuna iye mbati , " Iwe ndiwe Mwananga , lero ndasanduka Babako . "
58005006	Iye adalonga pontho panango mbati , " Iwe unadzakhala nyansembe wakukhala na kukhala mundandanda wa unyansembe wa Melekizedeki . "
58005007	Pandzidzi ukhali Yesu na moyo padziko yapansi adapemphera na kudembetera kuna Mulungu mwakugaluza fala , pontho na misozi , kuna nyakukwanisa kumpulumusa kuimfa ule . Mulungu adamva thangwi iye akhali wakupichepesa , pontho wakupipereka kuna Mulungu . 
58005008	Podi kwene kuti iye akhali Mwana Mulungu , iye adadziwa kukhala wakuvera kudzera m'nyatwa zidaona iye zile . 
58005009	Pikhadachitiswa iye kukhala wakuthema monsene mwene , iye adasanduka phata ya chipulumuso chokhonda mala cha anthu onsene akumvera ,
