58005010	tenepo Mulungu adamuikha kukhala Nyansembe Wamkulu mundandanda wa unyansembe wa Melekizedeki . 
58005011	Pana pizinji pyakuti tilonge pya penepi , mbwenye mphyakunensa kukufiithulirani , thangwi ndimwe anthu okhonda vesa msanga . 
58005012	Ndzidzi wakukwana mukhali nawo wakuti imwe mbamudakwanisa kukhala afunzisi , kwache munafuna unango wakuti akufunziseni pontho basi chifunziso chakutoma cha mphangwa za Mulungu . M'mbuto mwa kudya pyakudya pyakuuma , imwe mwathema basi kuti mum we mkaka . 
58005013	Munthu wakumwa mkaka okha , weneyo ndi kachiya basi wakukhonda kudziwa chifunziso chakuti pyakulungama ninji . 
58005014	Pyakudya pyakuuma mphya akulu , ale pakuphatisa basa manyerezero awo ndzidzi ukulu ene anakwanisa kusiyanisa pinthu pyadidi na pyakuipa . 
58006001	Apo , tendeni m'tsogolo na chifiinziso chakukola , pontho tisiye chifunziso chakutoma cha mphangwa za Chikhristu . Mbatileke kumanga pontho maziko akulonga pya kuleka makhaliro akudzesa imfa , pontho pya kukhulupira Mulungu ;
58006002	pya chifunziso cha pya maubatizoc pontho na pya kusanjika manja ; pya kulamuka kwa anthu kuimfa , pontho pya kutonga miseru kwakukhala na kukhala kunafuna dzachita Mulungu . 
58006003	Tendeni m'tsogolo ! Ngakhala Mulungu anatitawirisa , tinadzachita pinthu penepi . 
58006004	Pinakwanisika tani kuti anthu ale akhonda chikhulupiro chawo kubwezwa kuti aleke pontho pyakudawa pyawo . Iwo ndzidzi unango akhalimbo m'cheza cha Mulungu ; iwo adalawa mtukwa wa kudzulu mbatambira pabodzi na anthu anango Mzimu Wakuchena ;
58006005	iwo adalawa udidi wa mafala a Mulungu , pontho adava mphamvu za ndzidzi unadza m'tsogolowo . 
58006006	Tenepo iwo angakhonda chikhulupiro chawo , si pyakukwanisika tayu kuti iwo abwezwe kuleka pontho pyakudawa pyawo , thangwi penepa iwo akukhomera pontho Mwana Mulungu pamtanda kupidzesera okha ene nyatwa , pontho kumchitisa kululupiswa pakwecha . 
58006007	Mulungu ambatsanzayisa mataka ambamwerera mvula kazinji kene ale mbameresa mbewu zimbapereka phoso kuna anyakulima zile . 
58006008	Mbwenye ngakhala iwo anameresa minga na tsanga , iwo nkhabeve basa tayu , pontho pana kugoswa kwakuti Mulungu anaatemberera ; mamalisiro ache nkhuvungwa na moto . 
58006009	Abale anga apamtima , podi kwene kuti tipilonge pyathu ninga tenepo , ife timbakhulupira kuti muli napyo pinthu pyadidi pile pyatsagana na chipulumuso chanu . 
58006010	Mulungu ngwachilungamo . Iye nkhabe dzaduwalira tayu basa idaphata imwe ile , penu kumfuna kudachita imwe pakuphedza anthu ache , pontho na kuthimiza kuaphedza kunachita imwe chinchinoku . 
58006011	Chinafuna ife pyakwanga ntchakuti munthu onsene wa imwe athimize kukhala na chipapo kufikirana kumamalisiro , towera pinthu pinadikhira imwepyo pidzachitikedi . 
58006012	Ife nkhabe funa kuti imwe mukhale anthu akupolola tayu , mbwenye mukhale ninga ale ambatambira pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu pile kudzera muna chikhulupiro pontho kupirira . 
58006013	Pidadumbira Mulungu kuna Abrahamu kuchita pikhadalonga iye pile , podi pakhali nkhabe mbodzi wamkulu kupiringana iye , iye adaphatisa basa dzinache ene pidadumbira iye . 
58006014	Iye adalonga mbati , " Ndikudumbira kuti ndinadzakutsanzayisa pikulu mbandidzakupasa pidzukulu pizinji . "
58006015	Abrahamu akhali wakupirira , tenepo iye adatambira pinthu pikhadadumbira Mulungu kuna iye pile . 
58006016	Munthu angadumbira , ambaphatisa basa dzina ya munthu unango wamkulu kupiringana iyeyo , tenepo kudumbirako kumbamalisa mphoka yonsene . 
58006017	Kuna ale adathema kutambira pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu pile , iye akhafuna kuti pikhale pyakuveka mwadidi mwene kuti iye nkhabe sanduza pyakufuna pyache tayu , natenepo kudumbira kudachita iye kule , adakutsikimiza na chiverano . 
58006018	Pana pinthu piwiri , kudumbira na chiverano , pyakuti nkhabe kwanisika kusanduzika , pontho pyakuti Mulungu nkhabe nama tayu . Tenepo ife ale tidathawira kuna iye kuti tikhale pakupata , tiwange mtima kuphatisa chidikhiro china ife chile . 
58006019	Ife tina chidikhiro chenechi ninga mzati wa moyo wathu . Icho ntchokhonda tekenyeka , pontho ntchakutchinjirizwa . Chimbapita na pa chinguwo chakutchinga nacho Nyumba ya Mulungu yakudzulu na kwendaletu kumbuto yakuchenesesa ya m'bwalomu . 
58006020	M'mbuto mwathu Yesu apita mwenemo ife mbatidzati , mbakhala nyansembe wamkulu wakukhala na kukhala , mundandanda wa unyansembe wa Melekizedeki . 
58007001	Melekizedeki weneyu akhali mfumu wa ku Salemu , pontho nyansembe wa Mulungu Wakudzuludzulu . Ndzidzi ukhabwerera Abrahamu kunkhondo kule kudakunda iye mafumu anayi , Melekizedeki adagumana na Abrahamu mbamtsanzayisa , 
58007002	tenepo Abrahamu adampasa chakhumi cha pinthu pyonsene pikhadapokosera iye . Dzina ya Melekizedeki chakutoma nkhulonga kuti , " Mfumu yakulungama " , pontho na thangwi yakuti iye akhali mfumu ya Salemu , dzina yeneyi nkhulonga pontho kuti , " Mfumu wa Mtendere . "
58007003	Pya babache na mache Melekizedeki , penu pya mbodzi wa makolo ache nkhabe dziwika tayu ; pya kubalwa kwache , penu pya imfache nkhabe dziwika tayu . Ninga Mwana Mulungu , iye ambakhala nyansembe kwenda na kwenda . 
58007004	Apo lero mwaona ukulu wache . Abrahamu , kholo wathu wakuveka , adampasa chakhumi cha pinthu pyonsene pidapokosera iye kunkhondo . 
58007005	Pidzukulu pya Levi , pile ndi anyansembe , atongwa na mwambo kusonkhesa chakhumi kuna Alsraele anzawo , podi kwene kuti anzawo mphidzukulumbo pya Abrahamu . 
58007006	Melekizedeki hakhali chidzukulu cha Levi tayu , kwache adasonkhesa chakhumi kuna Abrahamu mbamtsanzayisa , munthu ule Mulungu akhadadumbira kuna iye . 
58007007	Nkhabe penuka tayu kuti munthu anatsanzayisa anangoyo ngwamkulu pyakwanga kupiringana nyakutsanzayiswayo . 
58007008	Kulonga pya anyansembe chakhumi chawo chimbasonkheswa na anthu ambafa ale ; mbwenye kulonga pya Melekizedeki chakhumi chikhasonkheswa na ule ambalongwa kuti ana moyo , ninga munalongera Malemba . 
58007009	Tinakwanisa kulonga kuti pidapereka Abrahamu chakhumi , Levi , ule pidzukulu pyache pidasonkhesa chakhumi , adaperekambo . 
58007010	Levi akhali adzati balwa tayu , mbwenye tinakwanisa kulonga kuti iye akhali m'manungo mwa kholo wache Abrahamu , ndzidzi udagumanikana Melekizedeki na iye . 
58007011	Kuperekwa kwa mwambo kuna Alsraele udagona pa unyansembe wa Levi . Tenepo unyansembe wa Levi mbudakhala wakuthema monsene mwene , nee mbapadafunikave nyansembe wamtundu unango tayu , ule ali mundandanda wa unyansembe wa Melekizedeki , nee wa Aroni tayu . 
58007012	Thangwi unyansembe ungasanduzwa , penepo mwambo wathema kusanduzwambo . 
58007013	Tenepo Mbuyathu ule pyache pyalongwa penepa , akhali wa dzinza inango , tenepo nee na mbodzi ene wakubulukira m'dzinza yeneyi adatumikira ninga nyansembe tayu . 
58007014	Mphyakudziwika mwadidi mwene kuti iye adabalwa m'dzinza ya Yuda ; tenepo pidalonga Mose pya anyansembe , iye hadalonge pya dzinza yeneyi tayu . 
58007015	Penepi pikuveka mwadidi mwene thangwi ya kufika kwa nyansembe unango ninga Melekizedeki . 
58007016	Iye adaikhwa kukhala nyansembe , nee na thangwi ya kubulukira m'dzinza ya unyansembe malingana na matongero a anthu tayu , mbwenye na thangwi ya mphamvu za moyo okhonda vungika ule . 
58007017	Thangwi Malemba akulonga kuti , " Iwe unadzakhala nyansembe kwenda na kwenda mundandanda wa unyansembe wa Melekizedeki . "
58007018	Tenepo matongero akale aikhwa pakhundu thangwi akhali akusowa mphamvu na akusowa basa . 
58007019	Mwambo wa Mose hudakwanise kusanduza chinthu na chibodzi chene tayu kukhala pyakuthema monsene mwene . Tenepo chinchino chidikhiro chadidiletu chaperekwa chile chinakwanisa kutifikisa chifupi na Mulungu . 
58007020	Kuthimiza penepi pana kudumbira kwa Mulungu . Anyansembe anango adapita kwene unyansembe okhonda kudumbirako . 
58007021	Mbwenye Yesu adakhala nyansembe thangwi ya kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kuna iye pidalonga iye mbati , " Mbuya adumbira , tenepo iye nkhabe dzasanduza manyerezero ache tayu : ' Unadzakhala nyansembe wakukhala na kukhala . ' "
58007022	Na thangwi ya kudumbira kweneku tinakwanisa kuona kuti Yesu ntchitsikimizo cha chiverano chachinchino . 
58007023	Anyansembe a chiverano chakale akhale azinji , thangwi iwo akhafa mbachimwana kuthimiza basawo . 
58007024	Mbwenye Yesu ngwakukhala na kukhala , pontho basache ya unyansembe nkhabe dzasiyira unango tayu . 
58007025	Tenepo iye anakwanisa chinchino pontho na ndzidzi onsene kupulumusa anyakudza kuna Mulungu kudzera muna iye , thangwi iye alipo ndzidzi onsene kuadembetera Mulungu m'mbuto mwawo . 
58007026	Tenepo Yesu ndi Nyansembe Wamkulu ule ambatipasa pinthu pimbasowa ife . Iye ngwakuchena ; muna iye nkhabe chinthu chakumpokanyisa , penu chakudawa tayu ; iye apambulwa pakati pa anthu akudawa , pontho akwizwa kupiringana pinthu pyonsene pya kudzulu . 
58007027	Iye hakhali ninga anyansembe akulu anangowa tayu ; iye nkhabe funika kupereka nsembe nsiku na nsiku tayu , chakutoma thangwi ya pyakudawa pyache , angamala penepo , thangwi ya pyakudawa pya anthu . Iye adapichita nyampheraphera kupereka nsembe kabodzi kene basi , ndzidzi udapipereka iye yekha ene pamtanda . 
58007028	Mwambo wa Mose umbasankhula anthu akhonda thema monsene mwene kukhala anyansembe akulu ; mbwenye kudumbira kudachita Mulungu kule kudadza m'nduli mwa mwambo wa Mose kumbasankhula Mwana , ule achitiswa kukhala wakuthema monsene mwene kwenda na kwenda . 
58008001	Pyonsene pinalonga ifepi pyagona pakuti tina Nyansembe Wamkulu ninga weneyu , ule akhala kumadyo kwa mpando wachifumu wa Mulungu Wademelero kudzulu . 
58008002	Iye ambatumikira ninga Nyansembe Wamkulu m'Mbuto Yakuchenesesa , yeneyi ndi chikhumbi chadichadi chidamangwa na Mbuya chile , nee na anthu tayu . 
58008003	Nyansembe Wamkulu onsene ambasankhulwa kuti apereke pyakupereka na nsembe za nyama kuna Mulungu , tenepo Nyansembe wathu Wamkulu athema kukhala na pinthu pinango pyakuti apereke . 
58008004	Iye mbadakhala pansi pano , nee mbadakhala nyansembe tayu , thangwi yakuti pano pana kale anyansembe ale ambapereka pyakupereka pakuteweza mwambo wa Chiyuda . 
58008005	Basa imbaphata iwo m'mbuto yakuchena ntchithunzithunzi cha pinthu pili kudzulu . Ndi thangwi yache Mose , pikhali iye chifupi kusasanya Chikhumbi cha Mulungu , adacheuzwa na Mulungu mbati , " Sasanya Chikhumbicho ninga montho mudaoneserwa iwe paphiri pale . "
58008006	Mbwenye chinchino , Yesu apaswa basa ya unyansembe ile njikulu kupiringana yawo , thangwi chiverano chidasasanya iye pakati pa Mulungu na anthu ache ntchadidi kupiringana chakale chile , podi icho chidagona pa kudumbira pa pinthu pyadidiletu pile . 
58008007	Ngakhala chiverano chakutoma chile chikhali chakusowa chinthu chakupokanyisa , nee mbapadafunika pontho chinango tayu . 
58008008	Mbwenye Mulungu adagumana muna anthu chinthu chakuapokanyisa mbalonga mbati , " Mbuya alonga kuti : Nsiku zikudza zile zinafuna dzachita ine chiverano chitswa na Alsraele , pontho na anthu a ku Yuda . 
58008009	Icho nee chinadzakhala ninga chiverano chidasasanya ine na makolo awo chile tayu , pansiku idaaphata ine pamkono kuabulusa m'dziko ya Iguputo . Iwo hadakhulupirika chiverano chidasasanya ine na iwo tayu , natenepo ine ndidaapasa nkhodolo . 
58008010	Chinchino chenechi ntchiverano chinafuna ine dzasasanya na Alsraele nsiku zinadzazo alonga Mbuya : Ndinadzaikha matongero anga m'manyerezero mwawo , mbandidzaalemba m'mitima mwawo . Ndinadzakhala Mulungu wawo , iwombo anadzakhala anthu anga . 
58008011	Nkhabe dzafunikave munthu na mbodzi ene tayu kufunzisa tsanthembache , penu kulonga kuna mbaleache kuti : ' Dziwa Mbuya . ' Thangwi onsene kutomera wang'ono kufikirana wamkulu anadzandidziwa . 
58008012	Ndinadzaalekerera pyakudawa pyawo , tenepo ine nkhabe dzakumbukave umambalawo tayu . "
58008013	Pakulonga pya chiverano chitswa , Mulungu asanduza chiverano chakutoma chile kukhala chakusowa basa ; tenepo chinthu chingasowa basa mbachikalamba , chenecho chinchino nkhabe onekave tayu . 
58009001	Chiverano chakutoma chile chikhali na matongero akupembedzera nawo , pontho na mbuto yakupembedzera yakusasanywa na anthu . 
58009002	Chikhumbi chidamangwa . M'subi yakunja , ile ikhachemerwa Mbuto Yakuchena , mukhali chakuikhirapo nyale , tebulu na mikate yakuperekwa kuna Mulungu . 
58009003	Kunduli kwa chinguwo chachiwiri chakutchinga nacho kukhali subi yakuchemerwa Mbuto Yakuchenesesa . 
58009004	M'bwalo mwache mukhali guwa ya golidi yakufukizira pyakununkhira , pontho na Bokosi ya Chiverano yonsene yakukukutizwa na golidi . M'bokosimo mukhali chitomba cha golidi chakudzala na mana , ndodo ya Aroni ikhadaphwitha masamba ile , pontho na miyala miwiri yakusemwa padalembwa matongero pale . 
58009005	Padzulu pa Bokosi pakhali pyakulengwa pinango pyakukhala na maphaphido kuonesa demelero ya Mulungu ; ipyo pidaphimbira na maphaphido awo pambuto pakhalekererwa pyakudawa pale . Mbwenye chinchino si ndzidzi wakulonga pinthu pyonsene pya penepi tayu . 
58009006	Umu ndi mule mukhadasasanywa pinthu pyonsene pile . Nsiku na nsiku anyansembe akhapita m'subi yakunja ya Chikhumbi kaphatamo basawo , 
58009007	mbwenye m'subi ya m'bwalo akhapitamo ndi Nyansembe Wamkulu ene basi , kwache akhapitamo kabodzi basi pachaka . Iye akhakwata chiropa mbakachipereka kuna Mulungu ninga nsembe yakulekerera nayo pyakudawa pyache , pontho na pyakudawa pikhadachita anthu mwakukhonda kupidziwa . 
58009008	Mzimu Wakuchena ambarunzisa mwakuveka kubulukira pa masasanyiro enewa kuti njira yakupita m'Mbuto Yakuchenesesa nkhabe fungulirwa tayu , mwenemo subi yakunja ile ilipo basi . 
58009009	Penepi ntchithunzithunzi kwene basi cha pinthu pimbachitika nsiku zinopi . Ipyo pikulonga kuti pyakupereka na nsembe za nyama zakuperekwa kuna Mulungu nkhabe kwanisa kusanduza chikumbu mtima cha nyakupembedza kukhala chakuthema monsene mwene tayu , 
58009010	podi ipyo pikulonga kwene pya pyakudya , pyakumwa , pontho na mitemo yakusiyanasiyana ya kupichenesa nayo . Matongero onsenewa ngakulonga pinthu pyakuchitwa pa manungo . Iwo adaikhwa kwene kuti akhalepo kufikirana ndzidzi wakuti Mulungu adzasanduze pinthu pyonsene kukhala pyachinchino . 
58009011	Mbwenye Khristu adza kale ninga Nyansembe Wamkulu wa pinthu pyadidi pili kale leropi . M'chikhumbi mumbatumikira iye ntchakurunikaletu pontho ntchakuthema monsene mwene , icho ntchakusasanywa nee na anthu tayu ; kweneku nkhulonga kuti si cha dziko yakuchita kulengwayi tayu . 
58009012	Pidapita Khristu m'Mbuto Yakuchenesesa m'chikhumbimo , iye hadapita na chiropa cha mbuzi , penu cha ng'ombe zimuna kachipereka nsembe tayu , mbwenye adapichita nyampheraphera kupita kabodzi kene basi na chiropa chache chene mbachitisa chipulumuso kukhala chakukhazikika kwenda na kwenda . 
58009013	Chiropa cha mbuzi na cha ng'ombe zimuna pontho na dotha ya nyama zakupserera pikhawazwa pana anthu akukhonda chena pamaso pa Mulungu , tenepo penepi pikhaachenesa pakubulusa kukhonda chena kwawo . 
58009014	Apo ndi tani na chiropa cha Khristu , ule kudzera muna Mzimu wakukhala na kukhala , iye adapereka moyo wache ninga nsembe yakuthema monsene mwene kuna Mulungu . Chiropa chache chinadzachenesa chikumbu mtima chathu kuna mitemo yakupichenesa nayo yonsene yakusowa basa , towera titumikire Mulungu wamoyo . 
58009015	Na thangwi yeneyi Khristu ndiye nyakusasanya chiverano chitswa , towera ale adachemerwa na Mulungu atambire kutsanzaya kokhonda mala kudadumbira Mulungu kule . Penepi pinakwanisa kuchitika thangwi ya imfa ya Khristu , ile idapulumusa anthu kuna pyakudawa pikhachita iwo ndzidzi ule ukhali iwo na chiverano chakutoma chile . 
58009016	Ngakhala munthu adumbira kusiyira unango mfumache pakuchita kulemba , mphyakufunika kutsikimiza kuti nyakudumbirayo afadi , 
58009017	thangwi kudumbira kweneko nkhabe mphamvu tayu ngakhala nyakudumbira ali m'maso ; mbwenye kumbaphata basa mwenechiro angafa . 
58009018	Ndi thangwi yache podi na chiverano chakutoma chene chile chidatoma kuphata basa pakuphatisa basa chiropa . 
58009019	Mose chakutoma adalalika kuna anthu onsene matongero onsene adalembwa m'mwambo ale . Tenepo iye adakwata chiropa cha ng'ombe zimuna na cha mbuzi mbachivungaza na madzi mbachiwaza pana bukhu ya mwambo na pana anthu onsene pakuphatisa basa chitsamba cha hisopi na ubweya wakufira wa mabira . 
58009020	Iye adalonga mbati , " Ichi ntchiropa chakutsikimizira chiverano cha Mulungu chidakupangani iye kuti muchivere chile . "
58009021	Monthomonthomo Mose adawazira chiropa chile pana Chikhumbi cha Mulungu , pontho na pana pinthu pyonsene pikhaphatiswa basa pakupembedza pile . 
58009022	Ndimomwene malingana na mwambo chirupirupi pinthu pyonsene pimbacheneswa na chiropa , tenepo ngakhala chiropa nkhabe chuchiswa , penepo pyakudawa nkhabe dzalekererwa tayu . 
58009023	Ngakhala pikhali pyakufunika kuti pithunzithunzi pya kudzulupi picheneswe na nsembe zenezi , apo ndi tani na pinthu pyakudzulu makapyo ; ipyo pimbafuna nsembe zadidiletu kupiringana zenezi . 
58009024	Thangwi Khristu hadapita m'Mbuto Yakuchena yakusasanywa na anthu tayu , ile ikhali kwene chithunzithunzi cha mbuto chadichadi . Iye adenda kudzulu makako , kule kunaonekera iye chinchino pamaso pa Mulungu thangwi ya ife pano . 
58009025	Nyansembe Wamkulu wa Chiyuda ambapita m'Mbuto Yakuchenesesa chaka na chaka na chiropa cha nyama . Mbwenye Khristu hadende kapipereka nsembe yekha ene kazinji kene tayu , 
58009026	thangwi mbapidakhala tenepo , iye mbadabonera kazinji kene kutomera pa kulengwa kwa dziko yapansi . M'mbuto mwache chinchino pili ife chifupi na kufika kumamalisiro a ndzidzi uno , iye adapichita nyampheraphera kuoneka kabodzi kene basi kubulusa pyakudawa pyonsene kudzera muna imfache ninga nsembe . 
58009027	Kudaikhwa kuna munthu kufa kabodzi basi , kubuluka penepo atongwe mseru na Mulungu . 
58009028	Sasawambo na Khristu adaperekwa nsembe kabodzi basi kubulusa pyakudawa pya anthu azinji . Iye anadzaoneka kachiwiri , nee kuti adzabuluse pyakudawa tayu , mbwenye kudzapulumusa anthu anamdikhira ale . 
58010001	Mwambo wa Chiyuda si chithunzithunzi chamumphu cha pinthu pyadidi pinafuna kudzapyo tayu , mbwenye pikuonesa kwene pang'ono pya pinthu chadichadi pile . Nsembe zonthozonthozo zimbaperekwa ndzidzi onsene , pontho chaka na chaka . Apo pinakwanisika tani kuti kudzera muna nsembe zenezi mwambo uchitise anyakudza kuna Mulungu kukhala akuthema monsene mwene ?
58010002	Anthu akupembedza Mulungu mbadacheneserwadi pyakudawa pyawo , iwo nee mbadakhala tayu na chikumbu mtima chakuti adadawa , pontho kupereka nsembe mbakudamala . 
58010003	Kwache , ninga muna ipyomu , nsembe zimbaperekwa chaka na chaka kukumbusa anthu pyakudawa pyawo . 
58010004	Thangwi chiropa cha ng'ombe zimuna na cha mbuzi nkhabe kwanisa na pang'ono pene kubulusa pyakudawa tayu . 
58010005	Thangwi ya penepi , pidadza Khristu padziko yapansi pano , adalonga kuna Mulungu mbati , " Imwe nkhabe funa nsembe , penu pyakupereka tayu , mbwenye imwe mwandisasanyira manungo . 
58010006	Imwe nkhabe komerwa na nsembe za nyama zakupserera paguwa , penu nsembe zakubulusira pyakudawa tayu . 
58010007	Tenepo ine ndidalonga kuti , ' Ndili pano , Mulungu , kuchita pinafuna imwe , ninga mwalemberwa ipyo pya ine m'bukhu ya mwambo . ' "
58010008	Chakutoma iye adalonga mbati , " Imwe nkhabe funa , penu kukomerwa na nsembe , pontho na pyakupereka , penu na nsembe za nyama zakupserera , pontho nsembe zakubulusira pyakudawa tayu . " Iye adalonga penepi , podi kwene kuti mwambo ndiye umbatonga kuti pinthu penepi piperekwe . 
58010009	Tenepo iye adalonga mbati , " Ndili pano , Mulungu , kuchita pinafuna imwe . " Mulungu adabulusa nsembe zakutoma zile towera aikhe nsembe ya Khristu m'mbuto mwazo . 
58010010	Na thangwi yakuti Yesu Khristu adachita pyonsene pidafuna Mulungu kuti iye achite , tenepo tonsenefe tacheneswa kuna pyakudawa thangwi ya nsembe ya manungo ache idachita iye nyampheraphera kuipereka kabodzi kene basi ile . 
58010011	Anyansembe a Chiyuda ambaphata basawo nsiku na nsiku , pontho ambapereka nsembe zibodzibodzizo kazinji kene , kwache nsembe zenezi nkhabe kwanisa na pang'ono pene kubulusa pyakudawa tayu . 
58010012	Khristu adapereka nsembe ibodzi ya kubulusira pyakudawa , nsembe ya mphamvu kwenda na kwenda , tenepo iye adakhala kumadyo kwa Mulungu . 
58010013	Kweneko iye akudikhira kufikirana Mulungu aikha anyamalwache ninga chakusanjikirapo manyalo ache . 
58010014	Tenepo na nsembe ibodzi ile , iye achitisa anthu ambacheneserwa pyakudawa pyawo ale kukhala akuthema monsene mwene kwenda na kwenda . 
58010015	Mzimu Wakuchena akuchitirambo umboni pya pinthu penepi . Chakutoma iye akulonga mbati , 
58010016	" Chiverano chinafuna ine dzachita na iwo nsiku zinadzazo ntchichi , Mbuya alonga : Ndinadzaikha matongero anga m'mitima mwawo , mbandidzaalemba m'manyerezero mwawo . "
58010017	Tenepo iye athimiza kulonga mbati , " Ine nkhabeve dzakumbuka pyakudawa pyawo , penu mabasawo akuipa tayu . "
58010018	Mulungu pyalekerera iye pyonsenepi , penepa nkhabeve funika kupereka nsembe zakubulusira pyakudawa tayu . 
58010019	Tenepo , abale anga , ife tina utumbe onsene wakupita m'Mbuto Yakuchenesesa kudzera muna imfa ya Yesu . 
58010020	Iye adatifungulira njira yachinchino yakwendera kuna Mulungu , njira yamoyo kugwanda na pachinguwo chakutchinga nacho mbuto yeneyi — chinguwo chenechi ndi manungo ache . 
58010021	Podi tina nyansembe wamkulu , mkadamu wa Nyumba ya Mulungu , 
58010022	natenepo tendeni tidze chifupi na Mulungu na mtima wakuonadi , pontho na chikhulupiro chakukhazikika , na mitima yakucheneswa kuna chikumbu mtima chakutipokanyisa , pontho na manungo akusambiswa na madzi akuchena . 
58010023	Tendeni tiimire dzololo pana chidikhiro chimbatawira ife na mulomo wathu , thangwi tinakwanisa kunyindira Mulungu kuti anachita pinthu pidadumbira iye pile . 
58010024	Tendeni tinyerezere pya mule munakwanisa ife kuwangisana mtima unango na mwanzache kukhala akufunana , pontho akuchita udidi , 
58010025	mbatilekeni kukhala na nsambo wakukhonda kugumanyikana pabodzi ninga mumbachitira anthu anango . Mbwenye tinyanye kuwangisana mtima unango na mwanzache , thangwi munakwanisa kuona Nsiku yakudza pontho Mbuya ili chifupi . 
58010026	Thangwi nkhabeve nsembe inafuna dzabulusa pyakudawa pyathu tayu , ngakhala tinathimiza kudawa chadala mwenemo tadziwadi pyakuonadi pya Mphangwa Zadidi . 
58010027	Chinthu chasala na ife ntchakuti tidikhire mwamantha kutongwa mseru , pontho moto wakugoswa unafuna dzavunga anthu ambapokanya Mulungu ale . 
58010028	Munthu anakhonda vera mwambo wa Mose , ambaphiwa mwakukhonda verwa nsisi ngakhala pana mboni ziwiri , penu zitatu zakulonga kuti iye adawa . 
58010029	Apo , ndi tani na munthu wakululupisa Mwana Mulungu , munthu ule ambaipisa chiropa cha chiverano cha Mulungu , chile chimbamchenesa kuna pyakudawa pyache , pontho ule ambatikana Mzimu , nyakutionesa kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu ? Nyerezerani , munthu ninga weneyu athema kutchunyuswa pikulu tani !
58010030	Thangwi timbamdziwa ule adalonga kuti , " Kubwezera nkhwanga , ndinati ndidzabwezere " ; pontho ule adalonga kuti , " Mbuya anadzatonga mseru anthu ache . "
58010031	Ntchinthu chakugoswa kugwa m'manja mwa Mulungu wamoyo !
58010032	Kumbukani mukhali imwe kale mule . Ndzidzi wenewo , pidasanduka imwe kwene kukhala akhristu , mudaona nyatwa zizinji kwache imwe hamudakundwe nazo tayu . 
58010033	Ndzidzi unango imwe mukhatikanwa , pontho mukhabonereswa pakwecha , ndzidzi unango imwe mudakhala pabodzi na ale adasanyiswa ninga mudachitirwambo imwe . 
58010034	Imwe mudasanyika pabodzi na anyaperezo , pontho pidapokoserwa imwe pinthu pyanu pyonsene , mudapirira mwakukomerwa , thangwi mukhapidziwa kuti muna mfuma inango yadidi yakukhala na kukhala . 
58010035	Natenepo lekani kutaya mtima , thangwi ngakhala munathimiza kuwanga mtima munadzatambira mfupo ukulu . 
58010036	Imwe mwathema kukhala akupirira , towera muchite pinafuna Mulungu , pontho mutambire pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu pile . 
58010037	Thangwi , ninga mudalongera Malemba kuti , " Ndzidzi pang'ono basi , nyakufuna kudza ule , anati adzedi ; iye nkhabe dzadembuka tayu . 
58010038	Kwache anthu anga akulungama , anati adzakhulupire mbakhala na moyo ; mbwenye ngakhala mbodzi pakati pawo anabwerera m'nduli , ine nkhabe dzakomerwa naye tayu . "
58010039	Ife si ife anthu akubwerera m'nduli , penu akutayika ale tayu . M'mbuto mwache ndife anthu akukhala na chikhulupiro , pontho akupulumuka ale . 
58011001	Kukhala na chikhulupiro nkhukhala okhonda penuka na pinthu pinadikhira ife dzatambira , pontho kutsikimiza kuti pinthu pyokhonda oneka pilipo . 
58011002	Na thangwi ya chikhulupiro chawo makolo akale adachitirwa umboni na Mulungu . 
58011003	Ntchikhulupiro chimbatichitisa kuvesa kuti dziko yonsene idalengwa na mafala a Mulungu , pontho kuti pinthu pyakuoneka pidasasanywa kubulukira kupinthu py okhonda oneka . 
58011004	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Abele kupereka kuna Mulungu nsembe yadidi kupiringana ya Kaini . Na thangwi ya chikhulupiro chache Mulungu adamchitira umboni kuti iye ngwakulungama , pontho adakomerwa na pyakupereka pyache . Pidachita Abele kudzera muna chikhulupiro chache , pikuthimiza kulonga basi na lero , podi kwene kuti iye afa . 
58011005	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Enoki kukwatwa kwenda kudzulu kuna Mulungu mwakuti iye hadafe tayu . Tenepo nee mbodzi adakwanisa kumgumana tayu , thangwi Mulungu akhadamkwata . Malemba akulonga kuti Enoki mbadzati kwatwa kwenda kudzulu , Mulungu adakomerwa naye pyakwanga . 
58011006	Kusowa chikhulupiro nkhabe munthu anakwanisa kuchitisa Mulungu kukomerwa tayu , thangwi munthu onsene wakudza kuna Mulungu , athema kukhulupira kuti Mulungu alipodi , pontho kuti ambafupa anthu ambamsakasaka ale . 
58011007	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Nowa kuvera kumcheuza kudachita Mulungu papinthu pikhafuna kudza m'tsogolo pile , pinthu pyakuti pidadzati oneka tayu . Iye adavera Mulungu mbasasanya chimwadiya mule mudapulumukira iye na banjache . Pakuchita tenepo iye adachitisa anthu a padziko yapansi kukonwa , tenepo Nowa adayeswa munthu wakulungama na Mulungu ninga mumbayesera iye akulungama anthu anango akhali na chikhulupiro ale . 
58011008	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Abrahamu kuvera kumchemera kudachita Mulungu kuti abuluke m'dziko mwache kwenda kudziko ikhadadumbira Mulungu kuti anadzampasa ile . Tenepo iye adabuluka m'dziko mwache mule mwakukhonda dziwa kukhaenda iye . 
58011009	Ntchikhulupiro chidamchitisa kuti iye akwanise kukhala ninga mlendo m'dziko idadumbira Mulungu kumpasa ile . Iye adakhala m'makhumbi ninga mudachitira Isake na Yakobo m'nduli mwache , ale adatambira pinthu pyonthopyo pidadumbira Mulungu kuna Abrahamu . 
58011010	Thangwi Abrahamu akhadikhira mzinda udatandwa na kumangwa na Mulungu , mzinda una maziko akukhazikika ule . 
58011011	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Abrahamu kukhala baba , podi kwene kuti iye akhali wakukalamba pyakwanga , pontho Sara akhali wakuuma nthumbo . lyes adanyindira Mulungu kuchita pidadumbira iye pile . 
58011012	Ndi thangwi yache muna munthu mbodziyu , ule akhali ninga munthu wakufa , mudabuluka pidzukulu pyakuinjipa ninga nyenyezi , pontho pyokhonda lengeseka ninga tchetcha ya pagombe . 
58011013	Tenepo onsenewa adathimiza kukhala na chikhulupiro chawo ndzidzi udafa iwo . Iwo hadatambira pinthu pikhadadumbira Mulungu pile tayu , mbwenye adapiona na pakansinzo mbakomerwa napyo . Iwo adatawira pakwecha kuti akhalidi alendo , pontho okhonda khazikika padziko yapansi pano . 
58011014	Anthu ale ambalonga tenepa , ambaoneseratu kuti akusaka dziko inango ene kuti ikhale yawo ene . 
58011015	Iwo nkhabe nyerezerave pya dziko ikhadasiya iwo ile tayu ; iwo mbadachita tenepo , mbadagumana mwayi wakubwererako . 
58011016	M'mbuto mwache iwo akhadatchuwa dziko yadidi — dziko ya kudzulu . Tenepo Mulungu nkhabe chita manyadzo tayu kuti iwo amchemere Mulungu wawo , thangwi iye aasasanyira mzinda . 
58011017	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Abrahamu kupereka mwanache Isake ninga nsembe pandzidzi ukhamyesa Mulungu ule . Abrahamu akhali munthu ule Mulungu akhadadumbira kuna iye , kwache iye adasasanyika kupereka mwanache mbodzi ene ule ninga nsembe . 
58011018	Mulungu akhadalonga kuna iye mbati , " Nkhudzera muna Isake kuti iwe unadzakhala na pidzukulu pidadumbira ine kuna iwe . "
58011019	Abrahamu adakhulupira kuti Mulungu anakwanisa kulamusa Isake kuimfa ; penepa tinakwanisa kulonga kuti Abrahamu adatambira pontho Isake kubulukira kuimfa . 
58011020	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Isake kulongeratu kuna Yakobo na Esau pya mtsanzayiso ukhafuna iwo dzatambira m'tsogolo . 
58011021	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Yakobo kutsanzayisa ana onsene awiri achimuna a Yosefe iye mbadzati kufa . Iye adatsamira kudzulu kwa ndodo yache mbapembedza Mulungu . 
58011022	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Yosefe , pikhali iye chifupi kufa , kulonga pya kubuluka kwa Alsraele m'dziko ya Iguputo , mbaapangiratu pyakuti iwo adzachite na mtembo wache , iye angadzafa . 
58011023	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa makolo a Mose kumbisa miyezi mitatu pidabalwa iye . Iwo adaona kuti iye akhali mwana wakubalika , tenepo iwo hadagopa matongero a mfumu ule tayu . 
58011024	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Mose kukhonda kuchemerwa mwanache wa mwana wamkazi wa mfumu pikhadakula iye . 
58011025	Iye adasankhula kusanyika pabodzi na anthu a Mulungu kusiyana na kukomerwa na madyerero a pyakudawa ndzidzi wakuchepa basi . 
58011026	Iye adanyerezera kuti kuona nyatwa zikulu thangwi ya Khristu kukhali mfuma ikulu kupiringana mfuma yonsene ya mu Iguputo , thangwi iye adaikha mtima pana rnfupo ukhafuna iye dzatambira m'tsogolo ule . 
58011027	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa Mose kubuluka pyache mu Iguputo mwakukhonda gopa kuzhangali kwa mfumu , thangwi iye akhapirira ninga munthu adaona Mulungu okhonda oneka ule . 
58011028	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa kuti iye akhazikise Phwando ya Paska , pontho kutonga kuti chiropa chikhwazwe m'misuwo , towera Mngelo Wakupha aleke kupha ana autombo a Alsraele . 
58011029	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa kuti Alsraele akwanise kuwambuka Nyanza Yakufira khala ninga akhaponda pamtunda , mbwenye pidayesambo Aiguputo kuti achite chibodzibodzi , madzi adaabiza . 
58011030	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa mafufu a mzinda wa Yeriko kugwa mudafamba Alsraele kuuzungulira nsiku zinomwe . 
58011031	Ntchikhulupiro chidachitisa puta Rahabi kuti aleke kuphiwa pabodzi na anthu adakhonda vera Mulungu ale , thangwi iye adatambira mwadidi anyakuzonda a ku Israele ale . 
58011032	Apo ndithimize basi kulonga ? Nkhabe ndzidzi wakukwana wakuti ndilonge pya Gidioni , Balaki , Samisoni , Yefita , Davite , Samuele na maprofeti tayu . 
58011033	Kudzera muna chikhulupiro chawo adamenya nkhondo na madziko onsene mbaakunda . Iwo adachita pinthu pyakulungama mbatambira pinthu pikhadadumbira Mulungu pile . Iwo adafunga milomo ya nkhalamu , 
58011034	adathimisa moto wakugoswa mbapulumuka kuphiwa na matalasada . Iwo akhali akusowa mphamvu , kwache adasanduka kukhala amphamvu ; iwo akhali na mphamvu pankhondo mbakunda anyankhondo achilendo . 
58011035	Kudzera muna chikhulupiro akazi adatambira pontho abale akhadalamuswa kuimfa ale . Anango adakhonda pyakusudzulwa ale , adafa pyawo mwakusanyika , towera adzalamuke kuimfa mbakhala na moyo wadidi . 
58011036	Anango adaseluswa mbakwapulwa , anangombo adamangwa na njema mbaikhwa m'perezo . 
58011037	Iwo adatemwa na miyala , adachekwa katinakati , adaphiwa na talasada . Iwo akhafamba uku avala nthembe za mbuzi na mabira — akutcherenga , akusanyiswa , pontho akuvuyiwa . 
58011038	Dziko yapansi hikhali yakuthema kukhala anthu enewa tayu . Iwo akhafambafamba m'tsanga na m'mapiri ninga anthu akuthawa kwawo mbakhala pyawo m'mphako na m'madzimba . 
58011039	Anthu enewo ambachitirwa umboni thangwi ya chikhulupiro chawo ! Kwache iwo hadatambira pidadumbira Mulungu pile tayu , 
58011040	thangwi Mulungu akhadanyerezera kudzatichitira chinthu chadidi chene . Pikhafuna iye mphyakuti iwo asanduzwe akuthema monsene mwene , kwache ife tikhalepo pabodzi nawo . 
58012001	Podi tazungulirwa na mwinji ukulu wa umboni , natenepo tendeni titaye pinthu pyonsene pyakutitchinga , pontho pyakudawa pimbatiphatirira msangansanga pile , pontho tendeni tithamange na chipapo bitchabitcha atoma ifeyu . 
58012002	Tendeni tiikhe maso athu pana Yesu , ule ndi nyakutomesa chikhulupiro chathu , pontho nyakuchichitisa kukhala chakuthema monsene mwene . Iye adapirira nyatwa zidaona iye pamtanda , thangwi ya kukomerwa kukhadikhira iye kule ; iye hadaikhe konta kufa pamtanda , podi kwene kuti chikhali chinthu chakuchitisa manyadzo , pontho chinchino iye akhala kumadyo kwa mpando wachifiimu wa Mulungu . 
58012003	Nyerezerani pya iye ule adapirira umalwa ukulu kubulukira kuna anyakudawa ! Tenepo imwe lekani kutopa , pontho kutaya mtima . 
58012004	Mukumenyana kwanu na pyakudawa , sikuti mwapitchinjiriza kale mpakana kubulusa chiropa chanu tayu . 
58012005	Kadi imwe mwaduwalira mafala akuwangisa mtima , ambakupangani Mulungu ninga anache ale ? " Mwananga , vesera Mulungu angakusumulula , pontho leka taya mtima iye angakulongera . 
58012006	Thangwi Mbuya ambasumulula munthu onsene ambafuna iye , mbatchunyusa munthu onsene ambatambira iye ninga mwanache . "
58012007	Pirirani kusanyika kwanu ninga mumbachitira mwana angatchunyuswa na baba ; kusanyika kwanu kumbaonesa kuti Mulungu ambakuyesani anache . Mbani mwana ule chipo hadzati tchunyuswa na babache tayu ?
58012008	Ngakhala imwe nkhabe tchunyuswa ninga mumbachitira anache onsene , penepo si imwe anache chadichadi tayu , mbwenye ana auputa . 
58012009	Nanjinanji , ababathu a pansi pano akhatitchunyusa , tenepo ife tikhaalemedza . Apo ndi tani kuvera kwathema ife kuchita kuna Babathu wa kudzulu kuti tikhale na moyo !
58012010	Ababathu a pansi pano adatitchunyusa ndzidzi pang'ono ninga pikhali ipyo pyakuthema kuna iwo , mbwenye Mulungu ambapichita kuti pitiganyalise , towera ife tikhalembo akuchena ninga iye . 
58012011	Tingatchunyuswa ndzidzi wenewo pimbaoneka ninga mphinthu pyakutitsukwalisa , nee pyakutichitisa kukomerwa tayu . M'nduli mwache pimbabala kulungama na mtendere kuna anthu ale adafunziswa na kutchunyuswaku . 
58012012	Natenepo wangisani mikono yanu yakusowa mphamvu na mabondo anu akutetemerawo !
58012013	Thimizani kufamba m'njira zakulungama kuti miyendo ya anyakulamala ileke bumbunyuka , mbwenye iwange . 
58012014	Yesani kukhala mwamtendere na anthu onsene , pontho kukhala na moyo wakuchena , thangwi nkhabe munthu anadzaona Mbuya okhonda khala na moyo wenewu tayu . 
58012015	Khalani m'maso kuti paleke khala unango wakubauka kubuluka kuna kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu . Paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakukhala ninga mmera wakuwawa , ule ungakula umbanensa anthu na kuwawa kwacheko . 
58012016	Khalani m'maso kuti paleke khala munthu na mbodzi ene wakuzuda , penu munthu wakukhonda lemedza Mulungu ninga Esau , ule adagulisa chidzo cha utombo wache na kudya kubodzi basi . 
58012017	Kubuluka penepo mukupidziwa kuti iye akhafuna kutsanzayiswa na babache , kwache iye adakhonderwa , thangwi hadakwanise kusanduza pikhadachita iye pile tayu ; podi kwene kuti iye adapipempha na misozi . 
58012018	Imwe hamudadza ninga mule mudadzera Alsraele kuna pinthu pyakuphatika tayu , kuphiri ya Sinai yakugaka moto na mdima wakugoswa , pontho na chonzi ile , 
58012019	kulira kwa ngoma , pontho na kuveka kwa fala mwakuti pidava anthu falayi , iwo adapempha kuti fala ileke longa pontho , 
58012020	thangwi iwo hadakwanise kupirira tayu matongero akuti , " Ngakhala nyama ene yakukhuya phiriyo , yathema kuponyerwa miyala . "
58012021	Pinthu pyonsene pikhaoneka pyakugoswa pyakwanga mwakuti Mose adalonga mbati , " Ndikutetemera na mantha ! "
58012022	Mbwenye imwe mwadza kuphiri ya Zioni , pontho kumzinda wa Mulungu Wamoyo , Yerusalemu wa kudzulu , pabodzi na angelo ache pikwipikwi . 
58012023	Mwafika kumbuto yakukomerwa kule kumbagumanyana ana autombo a Mulungu , ale madzinawo alembwa kudzulu . Imwe mwadza kuna Mulungu , nyakutonga anthu onsene mseru , pontho mwadza kuna mizimu ya anthu akuchena adachitiswa kukhala akuthema monsene mwene ale . 
58012024	Imwe mwadza kuna Yesu , nyakusasanya chiverano chitswa , pontho kuna chiropa chakuwazwa , chile chimbalonga pya pinthu pyadidiletu kupiringana chiropa cha Abele . 
58012025	Onesesani kuti muleke khonda kuvesera iye ambalonga ule . Ale adakhonda kuvesera ule adaapasa mphangwa za Mulungu padziko pano , hadapulumuka tayu . Apo ife tinadzapulumuka tani ngakhala tinakhonda kuvera nyakulonga kubulukira kudzulu ule ?
58012026	Pandzidzi wenewo falache idatekenya dziko yapansi , mbwenye chinchino iye adumbira kuti , " Ndinadzatekenya pontho nee dziko yapansi yokha tayu , mbwenye na kudzulu kwene . "
58012027	Mafala akuti " pontho " akuonesa pakwecha kuti pyakulengwa pyonsene pinadzatekenywa na kubuluswa m'mbuto mwapyo , towera pinthu pyakukhonda tekenyeka pidzakhale kwenda na kwenda . 
58012028	Podi ife tatambira ufumu okhonda tekenyeka , tendeni tipereke takhuta na kupembedza Mulungu mwakumkomera , mwakumgopa pontho mwamantha ;
58012029	thangwi Mulungu wathu ndi moto wakuvunga . 
58013001	Thimizani kufunana unango na mwanzache ninga abale . 
58013002	Khalani anthu akutambira alendo mwadidi m'nyumba mwanu . Akhalipo anango ale adachita penepi , pontho adatambira angelo mwakukhonda kupidziwa . 
58013003	Kumbukani anthu ali m'perezo ale khala ninga imwembo muli nawo pabodzi m'perezomo . Kumbukani anthu ali panyatwa ale khala ninga nyatwa zinaona iwozo mukuziona ndimwe . 
58013004	Mphyakufunika kuti banja ilemedzwe na anthu onsene ; amuna na akazi akhale akukhulupirika kuna unango na mwanzache , thangwi anthu akuchita pyakuzuda na uputa ale , anadzakonwa pamaso pa Mulungu . 
58013005	Lekani khala anthu akufuna pyakwanga kobiri , pontho mwathema kukwana na pinthu pina imwe . Thangwi Mulungu alonga mbati , " Ine nkhabe dzakusiyani tayu ; ine nkhabe dzakutayani tayu . "
58013006	Apo tendeni tiwange mtima mbatilonge kuti , " Nyakundiphedza ndi Mbuya Mulungu , tenepo ine nkhabe dzachita mantha . Munthu anandichitanji ? "
58013007	Kumbukani akadamu anu akutoma , ale adalalika mafala a Mulungu kuna imwe . Nyerezerani pya moyo ukhali na iwo ule , pontho tsanzirani chikhulupiro chikhali na iwo chile . 
58013008	Yesu Khristu nkhabe sanduzika tayu ; ngontho ule dzulo , lero , pontho kwenda na kwenda . 
58013009	Lekani kutawirisa pifunziso pyakunama kukubausani . Mphyadidi kuwangiswa mtima na kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu , nee pakuvera matongero akulonga pya pinthu pyakuthema kudya tayu ; anthu ambavera matongero ninga enewa nkhabe ganyali nawo tayu . 
58013010	Ife tina guwa ile anyansembe akutumikira m'mbuto zakupembedzeramo ya Ayuda nkhabe tawiriswa kudya nsembe zakuperekwa paguwapo tayu . 
58013011	Nyansembe Wamkulu wa Chiyuda ambapita na chiropa cha nyama m'Mbuto yakuchenesesa kapereka nsembe zakuti pyakudawa pilekererwe , mbwenye manungo a nyamazo akhapiswa kunja kwa msasa . 
58013012	Ndi thangwi yache Yesu adafa kunja kwa mzinda , towera kuchenesa anthu kuna pyakudawa na chiropa chache . 
58013013	Apo tendeni kuna iyeko kunja kwa msasa kuti tikalulupiswe naye pabodzi . 
58013014	Thangwi ife nkhabe mzinda wakukhazikika pansi pano tayu ; unafuna ife ndi mzinda unadzawo . 
58013015	Tenepo tendeni ndzidzi onsene tikuze Mulungu kudzera muna Yesu ninga nsembe , ile imbapereka mulomo wathu pakutawira kuti iye ndi Mbuya . 
58013016	Kumbukani kuchita udidi , pontho kuphedzana unango na mwanzache , thangwi penepi ndi nsembe zimbakomera Mulungu zile . 
58013017	Lemedzani akadamu anu , pontho verani pinalonga iwo . Iwo ambayang'anira miyoyo yanu okhonda kupuma , thangwi iwo athema kulonga pya basawo pamaso pa Mulungu . Ngakhala imwe munaavera , iwo anadzaphata basawo mwakukomerwa , mbwenye ngakhala munakhonda kuavera , iwo anadzaphata basa mwakutsukwala , tenepo imwe nee munadzaganyali napyo tayu . 
58013018	Thimizani kutipempherera . Tikupidziwa kuti tina chikumbu mtima chakusowa chakupokanyisa , thangwi pinafuna ife mphyakuti ndzidzi onsene tichite pinthu pyakulungama . 
58013019	Ndikukupemphani na mtima onsene kuti mupemphere kuti Mulungu anditumize pontho kuna imweko chinchino pano . 
58013020	
58013021	
58013022	Abale anga , ndikukupemphani kuti muavese mwakupirira mafala akukuwangisani mtimawa , thangwi kalata yakulemberani ineyi njing'ono . 
58013023	Ine ndinafuna kuti mupidziwe kuti mbaleathu Timoti abuluswa m'perezo . Iye angafika msanga , ndinati ndidze naye pabodzi ndingadza kweneko dzakuonani . 
58013024	Perekani mwenyikiro kuna akadamu anu onsene , pontho na anthu onsene a Mulungu . Abale athu a kudziko ya Atalia akukupasanimbo mwenyikiro . 
58013025	Kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kukhale na imwe monsene . 
59001001	Kubulukira kuna ine Yakobo , nyabasa wa Mulungu , pontho wa Mbuya Yesu Khristu — Kwenda kuna anthu onsene a Mulungu adabalalikira padziko yonsene ale . Mwenyikiro !
59001002	Abale anga , mupiyese mwekha ene akutsanzaya pikulu mayesero a mtundu na mtundu angakugwerani , 
59001003	thangwi mukupidziwa kuti chikhulupiro chanu chingaona mayesero ninga enewa , mamalisiro ache kumbakuchitisani kukwanisa kupirira . 
59001004	Onesesani kuti kupirira kwanu kwathema kuphata basa muna imwe mwakumalisikiratu , towera mukhale anthu akuthema monsene mwene , amumphu pontho na okhonda sowa chinthu na chibodzi chene . 
59001005	Mbwenye ngakhala unango pakati panu anasowa nzeru , apemphe kuna Mulungu , tenepo Mulungu anadzampasa , thangwi Mulungu ambapereka mwakufewa manja , pontho mwakukoma mtima kuna anthu onsene . 
59001006	Kwache mungapemphera muleke penuka , mbwenye mukhulupire . Munthu wakupenuka akhala ninga bimbi ya m'nyanza yakugwinywa na mphepo uku na uku . 
59001007	Munthu ninga weneyu aleke nyerezera kuti iye anadzatambira chinthu na chibodzi chene kubulukira kuna Mbuya . 
59001008	Iye ngwa mitima miwiri , okhonda likha papinthu pyonsene pimbachita iye . 
59001009	Mkhristu wapansiletu athema kukomerwa Mulungu angamkwiza , 
59001010	pontho mkhristu wakufuma athema kukomerwa Mulungu angamtchithisa . Thangwi anyamfuma anadzamala ninga maluwa amtsanga . 
59001011	Dzuwa imbabuluka na kupitsa kwache mbaivula mbewu ; maluwa ambayoyoka , pontho kubalika kwa mbewu ile kumbavungika . Ntchibodzibodzi kuna munthu wakufuma , anadzavungwa mwenemo ali pakati papinthu pinaphata iye . 
59001012	Ngwakutsanzaya munthu ule anathimiza kupirira pandzidzi wa mayesero , thangwi iye angapikwanisa pamayesero ninga enewa , anati adzafupwe moyo ule udadumbira Mulungu kuna anthu ambamfuna ale . 
59001013	Munthu angayeswa na mayesero ninga enewa , aleke longa kuti , " Mayesero enewa akubulukira kuna Mulungu . " Thangwi Mulungu nkhabe kwanisika kuyeswa na pyakuipa , penu iye kuyesa munthu na mbodzi ene na pyakuipa tayu . , 
59001014	Mbwenye munthu ambayeswa na pyakuipa angakwewa na kukweshwa na pikhumbo pyache . 
59001015	Tenepo iye angatawirisa pikhumbo pyachepyo kumtonga , pimbabala pyakudawa , kubuluka penepo pyakudawapyo pingakula , pimbabala imfa . 
59001016	Abale anga apamtima , lekani nyengezwa !
59001017	Mitukwa yonsene yadidi , pontho yakuthema monsene mwene imbabulukira kudzulu ; iyo imbabulukira kuna Mulungu , nyakulenga pyonsene pyakuonesa cheza pyakudzulu , ule ngokhonda sanduzika ninga nthunzi wakuzungunukazungunuka . 
59001018	Na kufuna kwache iye adatipasa moyo kudzera muna mafalache akuonadi , towera ife tikhale pyakuvuna pyakutoma pa pyakulengwa pyache pyonsene . 
59001019	Abale anga apamtima , kumbukani ipi ! Munthu onsene athema kuchimbiza kuva , kwache aleke kuchimbiza kulonga , aleke pontho kuchimbiza kuzhangali . 
59001020	Kuzhangali kwa munthu nkhabe kwanisa kumchitisa kukhala na moyo wakulungama umbafuna Mulungu ule tayu . 
59001021	Natenepo lekani nsambo onsene wakuipa na makhaliro akudawika akuinjipa . Verani Mulungu , pontho tawirani mwakupichepesa mafala ambabzala iye m'mitima mwanu , ale anakwanisa kukupulumusani . 
59001022	Lekani kupinyengeza mwekha ene pakuvesera kwene mafalawa , mbwenye imwe mwathema kuchita pinalonga iwopyo . 
59001023	Munthu anavesera mafala mbakhonda chita pinalonga iwopyo akhala ninga munthu wakuyang'ana pasupeyo mbaona nkhope yache ninga muna iye . 
59001024	Iye ambapiyang'anisisa yekha ene , sindzidzi nkhubuluka penepo ambaduwalira makhaliro a nkhope yache . 
59001025	Mbwenye munthu onsene wakuyang'ana mwambo wakuthema monsene mwene umbadzesa utumbe kuna anthu ule , mbathimiza kuuvesera mwadidi , nee kuuvesera kokha mbaduwalira tayu , mbwenye mbachita pimbalonga iwo — munthu ninga weneyu Mulungu anadzamtsanzayisa papinthu pyonsene pimbachita iye . 
59001026	Ngakhala pana munthu unango ambapiyesa yekha ene kuti iye ngwakupembedza , kwache mbakhonda chita mpholemphole na lulume yache , iye akupinyengeza yekha ene , pontho chipembedzo chache ntchapezi . 
59001027	Chipembedzo changwiro , pontho chakusowa chinthu chakupokanyisa pamaso pa Mulungu Baba , ntchakuti munthu aphedze ana na akazi akusiyiwa panyatwa zawo , pontho apikoye gopesera kuipiswa na pinthu pya pansi pano . 
59002001	Abale anga , podi imwe mumbakhulupira Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu , Mbuya wademelero , lekani kuchitira anthu pinthu mwakuyang'ana nkhope . 
59002002	Tisangize tenepa , munthu unango wakufuma , wakuvala mphete ya golidi na nguwo zakubalika adza pamgumano panu , pontho munthu unango wakutcherenga , wakuvala masakala adzambo ponthopo . 
59002003	Mungalemedza munthu wakuvala pyadidi ule mbamulonga kuna iye kuti , " Khalani padidipa , " mbamulonga kuna nyakutcherenga ule kuti , " Imira pale " , penu " Khala pansi chifupi na manyalo anga " . 
59002004	Kadi imwe nkhabe kuona tayu kuti penepa mwasankhula pakusiyanisa pakati panu , pontho kuti mwatonga na manyerezero akuipa ?
59002005	Veserani kuno , abale anga apamtima ! Mulungu adasankhula anthu akutcherenga m'maso mwa anthu a pansi pano kuti akhale akufuma m'chikhulupiro , pontho kutambira Ufumu ule udadumbira iye kupereka kuna onsene ambamfuna ale . 
59002006	Mbwenye imwe mumbalulupisa anthu akutcherengawo . Ayi , si anthu akufuma ale tayu ambakuboneresani na kukukwekweterani kuna anyakutonga miseru ?
59002007	Ayi , si onthowo ale tayu ambashola dzina yadidi ya Khristu , ile idapaswa imwe pidasanduka imwe kukhala akhristu ?
59002008	Mbwenye ngakhala munaveradi mwambo ukulu wa Ufumu wa Mulungu ule umbagumanwa m'Malemba akuti , " Funa mwanzako ninga mumbapifiinira iwe wekha " , penepo mwachita pinthu pyadidiletu . 
59002009	Mbwenye ngakhala munachitira anthu pinthu mwakuyang'ana nkhope , penepo mwadawa , pontho mwakonwa thangwi ya kuswa mwambo . 
59002010	Munthu anaswa matongero abodzi , podi kwene kuti akoye anango onsene , penepo iye adawira mwambo onsene . 
59002011	Thangwi ule adalonga mbati , " Leka chita uputa " , ngonthoyo adalonga pontho mbati , " Leka chita upandu . " Ngakhala munachita upandu , podi kwene kuti mukhonde chita uputa , imwe mwaswa mwambo basi . 
59002012	Longani na kuchita ninga anthu ale anadzatongwa mseru na mwambo , umbadzesa utumbe kuna anthu ule . 
59002013	Thangwi Mulungu angadzatonga anthu nkhabe dzavera nsisi tayu ale adakhonda verambo anzawo nsisi . Mbwenye anthu ansisi nkhabe dzagopa kutongwa mseru na Mulungu tayu . 
59002014	Abale anga , pana udidi wanji munthu angalonga kuti ana chikhulupiro , kwache mabasache mbakhonda tsikimizira chikhulupiro chachecho ? Ayi , chikhulupiro chenechi chingakwanise kumpulumusa ?
59002015	Tisangize kuti pana abale , penu anyamainga ale akusowa pyakuvala , pontho nkhabe kudya kwakukwana tayu . 
59002016	Pana udidi wanji penepa kuapanga kuti , " Mulungu mbakutsanzayiseni ! Valani pyakukhumba , pontho idyani mbamukhuta ! " — ngakhala hamunaapasa tayu pinthu pinasowa iwo pamoyo wawo ?
59002017	Ntchibodzibodzi na chikhulupiro : chikhulupiro chokha , chakusowa mabasa akuchitsikimizira , ntchakufa . 
59002018	Mbwenye munthu unango anati alonge mbati , " Mbodzi ana chikhulupiro , unango ana mabasa . " Penepa kutawira kwanga nkhuku : " Ndionese mule munakwanisira munthu kukhala na chikhulupiro chokha , chakusowa mabasa akuchitsikimizira . Ine ndinakuonesa chikhulupiro changa kudzera muna mabasanga . "
59002019	Imwe mumbakhulupira kuti pana Mulungu mbodzi ekha basi . Mumbachita pyadidi ! Na mizimu yakuipa ene imbakhulupirambo mbaitetemera na mantha . 
59002020	Pupwewe ! Kadi iwe ukufuna kuoneswa kuti chikhulupiro chakusowa mabasa akuchitsikimizira ntchapezi ?
59002021	Kholo wathu Abrahamu adayeswa tani wakulungama ? Ipyo pidadzera muna mabasa adachita iye , pidapereka iye mwanache , Isake , paguwa yansembe pale . 
59002022	Iwe unakwanisa kuona kuti chikhulupiro chache na mabasache pikhaphatizana , pontho chikhulupiro chache chidachitiswa kukhala chakuthema monsene mwene , thangwi ya mabasache . 
59002023	Malemba adakwanakwana ale adalonga kuti , " Abrahamu adakhulupira Mulungu , tenepo na thangwi ya chikhulupiro chache Mulungu adamuyesa wakulungama . " Natenepo Abrahamu adathulwa shamwaliache Mulungu . 
59002024	Mwaona , mphapo , kuti munthu ambayeswa wakulungama pamaso pa Mulungu thangwi ya mabasache , nee na chikhulupiro chokha tayu . 
59002025	Pikhali chibodzibodzi kuna Rahabi , puta ule . Mulungu adamuyesa wakulungama pamaso pache thangwi ya mabasache , pidatambira iye anthu a ku Israele adadza dzazonda ale , mbaaphedza kuthawa na njira inango . 
59002026	Natenepo ninga manungo akusowa mzimu ngakufa , sasawambo chikhulupiro chakusowa mabasa akuchitsikimizira ntchakufa . 
59003001	Abale anga , azinji a imwe aleke yesa kukhala afunzisi . Imwe mukupidziwa kuti ife afunzisi tinadzanyanya kutongwa mseru kupiringana anangowa . 
59003002	Tonsenefe timbachita umambala papinthu pizinji . Mbwenye ngakhala munthu anakhonda kuchita umambala papinthu pimbalonga iye , weneyo ngwakuthema monsene mwene , pontho iye anakwanisa kutonga manungo ache onsene . 
59003003	Ife timbaikha simbi kukanwa kwa kavalo kuti ativere , tenepo timbakwanisa kumpanga kwenda konsene kunafuna ife . 
59003004	Nyerezerani pya chimwadiya , kukula ninga kwachita icho kule , chimbagwinywa na mphepo yamphamvu , kwache chimbafambiswa na kang'ombo , tenepo chimwadiya chimbaenda konsene kumbafuna nyakuchapa ule . 
59003005	Tenepo penepi pili sasawa na lulume ; kaphindi ka manungo ninga keneka , kambagaya pya pinthu pikulupikulu . Nyerezerani kukula kwachita nsitu unakwanisa kupiswa na kantchasi ka moto !
59003006	Tenepo lulume yakhala ninga moto . Iyo ndi dziko yakuipa pakati pa mapindi a manungo . Lulume imbaipisa munthu onsene , pontho imbapisa moyo onsene kutomera kubalwa mpakana kufa , pontho iyo ene imbapiswa na gehena . 
59003007	Munthu anakwanisa kufuya , pontho afuyadi pyakulengwa pinango pyonsene ninga nyama zamtsanga , mbalame , nyama zakukambadza na nsomba . 
59003008	Mbwenye chipo nkhabe munthu adatoma kufuya lulume tayu . Lulume njakuipa , pontho nkhabe sumulululika tayu , njakudzala na pinthu pyakupha . 
59003009	Timbaiphatisa basa kupereka takhuta kuna Mbuya pontho Babathu , pontho na kutemberera nayo anzathu , adalengwa mwakulandana na Mulungu ale . 
59003010	Mafala akupereka nawo takhuta pontho akutemberera nawo ambabuluka m'kanwa monthomo . Abale anga , penepi pileke kuchitika . 
59003011	Ayi madzi adidi na akuipa angabuluke pamphuno ibodzi ?
59003012	Abale anga , ayi muti wamkuyu ungabale nsapo za olivi , penu muti wamphesa kubala makuyu ? Ayi mphuno ya madzi amunyu ingabuluse madzi adidi ?
59003013	Mbani pakati panu munthu wanzeru , penu wakuvesa pinthu ? Iye athema kupitsikimiza na makhaliro ache adidi , pontho na pinthu pimbachita iye mwakupichepesa na mwanzeru . 
59003014	Mbwenye mtimanu ungakhala wabivu , wanyongo na waukundi , lekani dawira pyakuonadi pakunyadira nzeru zanu . 
59003015	Nzeru ninga zenezi nkhabe bulukira kudzulu tayu , mbwenye nsapansi pano , za anthu pyawo , pontho za mizimu yakuipa . 
59003016	Pale pana bivu na ukundi , penepo pontho pana kuvunganyika na kuipa kwa mtundu onsene . 
59003017	Mbwenye nzeru zakubulukira kudzulu papyonsene nsakutoma zangwiro ; zakufuna mtendere , zakufulika , pontho zachishamwali ; zakudzala na nsisi , pontho zakubulusa pyakuvuna pya mabasa adidi ; nkhabe tonga mwakuyang'ana nkhope , pontho nkhabe ufakafaka tayu . 
59003018	Anyakufuna mtendere , ale ambabzala mbewu mwamtendere , pyakuvuna pyawo mphyakulungama . 
59004001	Makangano na nthongazi pakati panupa pimbabulukira kupi ? Ipyo pikubulukira kuna pikhumbo pya manungo anu , pimbachita nkhondo muna imwe pile . 
59004002	Imwe mumbafuna pinthu , kwache nkhabe kwanisa khala napyo tayu , tenepo mwasasanyika kupha ; imwe mumbasirira pikulu kukhala na pinthu , kwache nkhabe kwanisa kupigumana tayu , natenepo mumbakangana na kumenyana . Imwe nkhabe khala na pinthu pimbafuna imwe , thangwi imwe nkhabe kupipempha kuna Mulungu tayu . 
59004003	Pontho mungapipempha , nkhabe kupitambira tayu , thangwi mumbapipempha na manyerezero akuipa . Pinthu pimbapempha imwe mumbapivunga kwene kufuna kuchitisa manungo anu kukomerwa . 
59004004	Anthu okhonda khulupirika imwe ! Kadi nkhabe kudziwa tayu kuti kukhala shamwali wa dziko yapansi nkhukhala nyamalwa wa Mulungu ? Munthu onsene anasankhula kukhala shamwali wa dziko yapansi akupichitisa yekha ene kukhala nyamalwa wa Mulungu . 
59004005	Lekani nyerezera kuti nkhabe pyakuonadi m'Malemba ale ambalonga kuti , " Mzimu Wakuchena udaikha Mulungu muna ife ngwakutifuna mwantchanje . "
59004006	Mbwenye kukoma mtima kule kumbapereka Mulungu nkhwamphamvu pyakwanga pene . Ninga mumbalongera Malemba kuti , " Mulungu ambakhonda kudungudza , mbwenye ambapereka kukoma mtima kuna anthu akupichepesa . "
59004007	Natenepo verani Mulungu . Khondani Satana , penepo iye anadzakuthawani . 
59004008	Fedzani chifupi na Mulungu , iyembo anadzafedza chifupi na imwe . Sambani m'manja mwanu , anthu akudawikamwe ! Chenesani mitimanu , mfakafakamwe !
59004009	Tsukwalani , lirani na kusintili ; kuseka kwanu kusanduke kulira , kukomerwa kwanu kusanduke kutsukwala !
59004010	Pichepeseni mwekha ene pamaso pa Mbuya , tenepo iye anadzakukuzani . 
59004011	Abale anga , lekani kulongera pyakuipa mwanzanu . Munthu onsene analongera pyakuipa mkhristu mwanzacheyo , penu kumtonga mseru , iye akulongera pyakuipa na kutonga mwambo wa Mose . Imwe mungatonga mwambo , penepo si imweve ambavera mwambo ule tayu , mbwenye ndimwe anyakuutonga . 
59004012	Mulungu ene basi ndiye nyakupereka mwambo , pontho nyakutonga mseru . Iye ndiye ene basi anakwanisa kupulumusa na kuvunga kwene . Ndimwe animbo imwe kuti mutonge mseru anzanu . 
59004013	Chinchino ndivesereni , imwe ale mumbalonga kuti , " Lero , penu mangwana tinati tiende kumzimda uwu na uwo , kule kunafuna ife kakhala chaka chamumphu kuchita malonda mbatigumana kobiri zizinji . "
59004014	Imwe nkhabe na kudziwa kwene tayu kuti moyo wanu mangwana unakhala tani . Imwe mwakhala ninga utsi ule umbaoneka ndzidzi pang'ono , kubuluka penepo mbaubisika . 
59004015	Pyathema imwe kulonga mphipi : " Ngakhala Mbuya anapifuna , tinakhala na moyo mbatichita pyanganapyangana . "
59004016	Mbwenye chinchino mukutumbama na kugaya ; kutumbama konsene ninga kweneku nkhudawa . 
59004017	Tenepo munthu anadziwa pyadidi pyathema iye kuchitapyo mbakhonda kupichita , penepo iye adawa . Kucheuza anyamfuma
59005001	Tenepo , chinchino veserani , imwe anthu akufuma ! Lirani mwakugaluza fala , thangwi ya nyatwa zinafuna dzakugwerani zile . 
59005002	Mfumanu yamala vunda , pontho nguwo zanu zamala dyiwa na uchenje . 
59005003	Golidi na silivanu achita ubzimbiri , tenepo ubzimbiri wenewu unadzakhala umboni wakukupokanyani , pontho unadzadya manungo anu ninga moto . Imwe mwapigumanyira mfuma nsiku zakumalamala kale zino . 
59005004	Imwe nee mudapagali anthu adakuphatirani basa m'minda mwanu ale tayu . Vani kudungunya kwawo ! Chiliro cha ale ambavuna mbewu zanu kwafika m'makutu mwa Mulungu , Mbuya Wamphamvu zonsene . 
59005005	Padziko pano mwakhala na moyo wakuvunga kobiri kuchitisa manungo anu kukomerwa . Mwapinenepesa mwekha kusasanyikira nsiku ya kuchekwa . 
59005006	Imwe mwachitisa kukonwa na kupha anthu akukhonda dawa ; iwo hambakukhondesani tayu kuti imwe muchite tenepo . 
59005007	Abale anga , pirirani mphapo , kufikirana kudza pontho kwa Mbuya . Yang'ani kupirira kumbachita nyakulima kudikhira kutokota kwa mbewu zache zakufunika . Iye ambapirira na kudikhira kuvumba kwa phumphuli na mulope . 
59005008	Tenepo imwembo mwathema kupirira pontho kuimira dzololo , thangwi nsiku ya kudza pontho kwa Mbuya ili chifupi . 
59005009	Abale anga , lekani kudungunya mwakupokanyisana unango na mwanzache , towera Mulungu aleke dzakutongani mseru . Nyakutonga mseru aimira kale pamsuwo . 
59005010	Abale anga , kumbukani pya maprofeti , ale adalonga na dzina ya Mbuya . Enewa anakwanisa kukhala upangizi wa kupirira panyatwa . 
59005011	Ife timbaayesa akutsanzaya , thangwi adapirira . Imwe mwava pya kupirira kwa Yobu , pontho mukudziwa pinthu pidamchitira Mbuya pakumalisira pache . Thangwi Mulungu ngwakudzala na nsisi , pontho wakuva nyambalo . 
59005012	Abale anga , padzulu pa pyonsenepi , lekani kudumbira mungaverana na mwanzanu . Lekani kudumbira na kudzulu , penu na dziko yapansi , penu na chinthu na chibodzi chene . Longani kwene kuti , " Ande " ngakhala kutawirako ndi ande , pontho kuti , " Tayu " ngakhala kutawirako ndi tayu , penepo imwe nkhabe dzakonwa tayu pamaso pa Mulungu . 
59005013	Ayi alipo unango pakati panupo ali panyatwa ? Iye apemphere . Alipo unango akomerwa ? Iye aimbe nyimbo kukuza nazo Mulungu . 
59005014	Alipo unango ana utenda ? Achemere akulu a mpingo kuti ampempherere mbakhwaza mafuta pana iye na dzina ya Mbuya . 
59005015	Angapemphera na chikhulupiro , mtendayo anati awange ; Mbuya anadzampasa pontho mphamvu . Ngakhala iye adawa pyakudawa pyache pyonsene pinadzalekererwa . 
59005016	Tenepo , bwekani pyakudawa pyanu kuna unango na mwanzache , pontho mupemphererane unango na mwanzache , towera muv ange . Kupemphera kwa munthu wakulungama kumbakhala kwamphamvu , pontho kumbachita pinthu pikulu . 
59005017	Mprofeti Elia akhali munthu sasawa na ife . Iye adapemphera pyakwanga pene kuti kukhonde khala mvula , tenepo mvula hidadze tayu pyaka pitatu na theka . 
59005018	Iye adapemphera pontho , penepo mvula idavumba , dzikombo mbibala mbewu . 
59005019	Abale anga , ngakhala mbodzi pakati panu abauka kubuluka kuna pyakuonadi , tenepo unango angambweza , 
59005020	kumbukani ipi : munthu anabweza munthu wakudawa kubulukira kuna makhaliro ache akudawikayo anati adzapulumuse moyo wa munthu wakudawayo kuimfa mbachitisa pyakudawa pizinji kulekererwa . 
60001001	Kubulukira kuna ine , Peturo , nyakutumwa wa Yesu Khristu — Kwenda kuna anthu akusankhulika a Mulungu , ale adathawa kwawo kubalalikira kunthemba za Ponto , Galatia , Kapadokia , Asia na Bitinia . 
60001002	Imwe mudasankhulwa malingana na kupidziwiratu kwa Mulungu Baba . Iye adakusanduzani kukhala anthu akuchena kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena , towera muvere Yesu Khristu , pontho mucheneswe kudzera muna chiropa chache . Kukoma mtima na mtendere pikhale kuna imwe mwakuinjipa . 
60001003	Tendeni tipereke takhuta kuna Mulungu , pontho Baba wa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu ! Na thangwi ya nsisi zache zikulu , iye adatipasa moyo utswa pakulamusa Yesu Khristu kuimfa . Penepi pimbatichitisa kuti tikhale na chidikhiro chadichadi , 
60001004	tenepo ife maso ali kunjira kudikhira kutambira mtsanzayiso ukulu umbakoyera Mulungu anthu ache ule . Iye ambakukoyerani mtsanzayiso kudzulu , kule ipyo nkhabe kwanisa kuvunda , penu kuvungika , penu kusuluka tayu . 
60001005	Penepi mphyanu imwepo , ale kudzera muna chikhulupiro chanu mumbakoyiwa mwadidi na mphamvu ya Mulungu kuti mudzatambire chipulumuso chile chasasanywa kale kudzatchululwa pakumala kwa ndzidzi uno . 
60001006	Komerwani napyo penepi , podi kwene kuti chinchino mwathema kutsukwala ndzidzi pang'ono basi , thangwi ya nyatwa za mayesero a mtundu na mtundu anaona imwewa . 
60001007	Mayesero nkhufuna kutsikimiza kuti chikhulupiro chanucho ntchamaso . Golidi ene , ule anakwanisa kuvungwa , ambayeswa na moto , sasawambo na chikhulupiro chanu , chile ntchakufunika pikulu kupiringana golidi , chimbayeswa basi ; mamalisiro ache nkhudzesa ukulu , demelero na chilemedzo pansiku ya kudza pontho kwa Yesu Khristu . 
60001008	Podi kwene imwe hamudamuone tayu , kwache mumbamfuna basi . Podi kwene imwe hamumbamuona chinchino tayu , kwache imwe mumbamkhulupira basi . Natenepo mumbatsanzaya na kukomerwa kukulu kwakukhonda longeka , 
60001009	thangwi imwe mukutambira mamalisiro a chikhulupiro chanu , chile ntchipulumuso cha moyo wanu . 
60001010	Maprofeti ale adalongeratu pya kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu kukhafuna imwe dzatambira adabwanyulabwanyula , pontho kusakasaka mpholemphole kufuna kudziwa pya chipulumuso chenechi . 
60001011	Iwo adayesayesa kudziwa ndzidzi wache ukhali upi , pontho na mule mukhafuna ipyo kudzera . a Akhali Mzimu wa Khristu muna iwo ule akhathonya ndzidzi wenewu pakulongeratu pya nyatwa zikhafuna dzapirira Khristu , pontho na demelero ikhafuna dzatambira iye m'nduli mwache ile . 
60001012	Mulungu adatchulula kuna maprofeti enewa kuti basa ikhaphata iwo hikhali yakuganyalisa iwo tayu , mbwenye kuganyalisa imwepo . Iwo adalonga pya pinthu pile pyava imwe chinchinopi kubulukira kuna anyamphangwa adalalika Mphangwa Zadidi na mphamvu ya Mzimu Wakuchena , ule adatumwa kubulukira kudzulu . Penepi mphinthu pile na angelo ene ambafuna kuti apivese . 
60001013	Natenepo manyerezero anu mbasasanyike kuchita pinthu . Khalani m'maso , pontho ikhani chidikhiro chanu monsene mwene pana kutsanzaya kunafuna dzatambira imwe Yesu Khristu angadzabwera pontho . 
60001014	Khalani anthu akuvera Mulungu , pontho lekani teweza pikhumbo pyakuipa pikhali na imwe pandzidzi ukhali imwe anthu okhonda dziwa Khristu . 
60001015	M'mbuto mwache khalani anthu akuchena papyonsene pinachita imwe , sasawa ninga Mulungu adakuchemerani ule ngwakuchenambo . 
60001016	Malemba akulonga kuti , " Khalani anthu akuchena , thangwi ine ndine wakuchena . "
60001017	Imwe mungapemphera kuna Mulungu mumbamchemera Baba , ule ambatonga anthu onsene okhonda yang'ana nkhope kutewezana na pinthu pidachita iwo , tenepo khalani na moyo wakumgopa m'moyo wanu onsene pansi pano . 
60001018	Thangwi mukudziwa kuti si siliva penu golidi tayu , pinthu pyakuti pinakwanisika kuvungika , pidapagalwi kuti imwe muombolwe kuna makhaliro anu akusowa basa adatambira imwe kubulukira kuna makolo anu ale , 
60001019	mbwenye ikhali nsembe yakudula ya Khristu , ule akhali ninga mwanabira wakusowa chilema , penu dontho . 
60001020	Iye adasankhulwa na Mulungu mwenemo dziko yapansi mbidzati lengwa , tenepo iye adaoneswa pakwecha nsiku zakumalisazi thangwi ya imwepo . 
60001021	Kudzera muna iye , imwe mudakhulupira Mulungu ule adamulamusa kuimfa mbampasa demelero ; tenepo chikhulupiro chanu na chidikhiro chanu pyakhazikika pana Mulungu . 
60001022	Podi chinchino mwapichenesa mwekha ene pakuvera kwanu pyakuonadi mwakuti mumbakwanisa kuafuna anyakukhulupira anzanu na mtima wakuonadi , funanani unango na mwanzache kubulukira pansi pamtimanu .
