61001001	Kubulukira kuna ine , Simoni Peturo , nyabasa , pontho nyakutumwa wa Yesu Khristu — Kwenda kuna anthu , ale kudzera muna kulungama ulungama kwa Yesu Khnstu , ule ndi Mulungu , pontho Nyankhombo wfthu , adatambira chikhulupiro chakufunika pyakwanga sasawa ninga chidatambira ife chile . 
61001002	Kukoma mtima na mtendere pikhale pyanu mwakuinjipa kudzera muna udziwisi wanu pana Mulungu , pontho Yesu Mbuyathu . 
61001003	Mphamvu ikulu ya Mulungu yatipasa pinthu pyonsene pimbasowa ife kuti tikhale na moyo wakupembedzadi Mulungu kudzera muna udziwisi wathu pana iye , ule adatichemera kuti titambire khundu ya demelero yache ene , a pontho udidi wache . 
61001004	Munjira yeneyi iye atipasa mitukwa yadidiletu , pontho yakufunika pyakwanga idadumbira iye ile , towera kudzera muna mitukwa yeneyi tikwanise kupulumuka kuna kuvungika kule kuli pansi pano thangwi ya pikhumbo pyakuipa , pontho kuti tikwanise kukwata khundu ya umulungu wache . 
61001005	Na thangwi yeneyi chitani phinga kuthimiza udidi kuna chikhulupiro chanu ; kuna udidi wanu thimizani udziwisi ;
61001006	kuna udziwisi wanu thimizani kuuphata mtima ; kuna kuuphata mtima kwanu thimizani kupirira ; kuna kupirira kwanu thimizani kukhala na moyo wakulemedza Mulungu ;
61001007	kuna moyo wanu wakulemedza Mulungu thimizani kuafuna akhristu anzanu ; pontho kuna kuafuna kwanu akhristu anzanu thimizani kuafuna anthu onsene . 
61001008	Penepi mphinthu pyathema imwe kukhala napyo , tenepo ngakhala munakhala napyo pyakuinjipa , nee munadzakhala anthu akupolola , pontho okhonda ganyalisi m'moyo wanu wakudziwa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu tayu . 
61001009	Mbwenye munthu anakhonda khala na penepi akhala ninga nyankhunguwisi , wakukhonda kwanisa kuona patali , pontho aduwalira kuti kalene adacheneserwa pyakudawa pyache . 
61001010	Tenepo abale anga , chitani phinga pyakwanga pene kuti muchitise kukuchemerani , pontho kukusankhulani kudachita Mulungu kukhala kwakukhazikika ; mungachita tenepo , imwe nkhabe dzagwa m'pyakudawa tayu . 
61001011	Tenepo munadzatambirwa na manja mawiri pamsuwo wakupitira mu Ufumu okhonda mala wa Mbuyathu , pontho Nyankhombo wathu Yesu Khristu . 
61001012	Tenepo ndzidzi onsene ndinadzakukumbusani pya pinthu penepi , podi kwene kuti mukupidziwa kale , pontho kuti mwakhazikika kale pa pyakuonadi pidatambira imwe pile . 
61001013	Ndapinyerezera kuti mphyakuthema , ndzidzi unakhala ine m'manungo a pansi pano , kukutsitsimusani pakukukumbusani pya pinthu penepi . 
61001014	Ndikupidziwa kuti chinchino pano ndinati ndisiye manungo anga ninga mudapilongera Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu mwakuveka kuna ine . 
61001015	Tenepo ndinachita phinga kuti pikhale pyakukwanisika kuti mukumbuke penepi ndzidzi onsene ine ndingadzafa . 
61001016	Ife nee tidateweza pithankano pyakupekwa mwakuchenjera na anthu pidakudziwisani ife pya mphamvu zache , pontho na kubwera pontho kwa Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu tayu . Mbwenye tidaona ukulu wache na maso athu ene . 
61001017	Thangwi iye adatambira demelero na chilemedzo kubulukira kuna Mulungu Baba , pandzidzi udaveka fala yakubulukira kuna Mulungu wa demelero yonsene kulonga kuti , " Uyu ndi mwananga wapamtima , ndakomerwa naye pyakwanga ! "
61001018	Ife ene pano tidava fala yeneyi ikulonga kubulukira kudzulu , pandzidzi ukhali ife naye paphiri yakuchena ile . 
61001019	Natenepo ife tikukhulupira pyakwanga pene kuti mphangwa zidalongwa na maprofeti ale nsakuonadi . Tenepo mphyadidi kuti muzikoye mwadidi thangwi zakhala ninga nyale yakugaka kumbuto yamdima , kufikirana makalakwecha , pontho kumwinikira kwa nyenyezi mumtima mwanu . 
61001020	Mbwenye padzulu pa pyonsenepi imwe mwathema kudzindikira kuti nkhabe mphangwa zauprofeti za m'Malemba zidathumbusulwa na munthu pa yekha tayu . 
61001021	Mphangwa zauprofeti nee zidadza na kufuna kwa munthu tayu , mbwenye anthu adalonga mphangwa zakubulukira kuna Mulungu na mphamvu za Mzimu Wakuchena . 
61002001	Maprofeti akunama adaoneka kale kene pakati pa anthu , sasawambo afunzisi akunama anadzaoneka pakati panu . Iwo anadzadzesa m'chibisobiso pifunziso pyakunama pyakuvunga mbadzakhonda Mbuya adaaombola ule . Tenepo iwo anadzapichemerera okha ene kuvungika kwakututumusa . 
61002002	Anthu azinji anadzateweza makhaliro awo akuzuda ; anango anadzalonga tsweda Njira Yakuonadi , thangwi ya pinthu pimbachita iwo . 
61002003	Na thangwi ya kufuna mfuma afunzisiwa anadzakudyerani mkopekope na pithankano pyakupekwa na iwo pile . Kwache kutchunyuswa kwawo kwasasanywa kale , pontho Nyakuavunga ali m'maso kuadikhira . 
61002004	Mulungu hadaleke kutchunyusa angelo adadawa ale tayu , iye adaaponya kugehena , kumdima kule kunakoyiwa iwo uku amangwa na njema kudikhira Nsiku inafuna dzatonga Mulungu anthu mseru . 
61002005	Mulungu hadaleke kutchunyusa anthu akale ale tayu , iye adadzesa madzi makulu padziko yonsene yapansi kuna anthu okhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu , mbwenye adapulumusa Nowa , ule adalalika pya chilungamo , pabodzi pene na anthu anango anomwe basi . 
61002006	Mulungu adatchunyusa mizinda ya Sodomu na Gomora , adaivungiratu na moto mbachitisa kuti ikhale upangizi kuna pinafuna dzachitikira anthu okhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu . 
61002007	Iye adapulumusa Loti , munthu wakulungama , ule akhanensiwa na makhaliro akuzuda a anthu okhonda tsalakana pya mwambo ale . 
61002008	Munthu wakulungamayu akhakhala pakati pawo , tenepo nsiku na nsiku iye adasanyika pyakwanga na kuona , pontho na kuva makhaliro akudawika akhachita anthu ale . 
61002009	Mbuya ambadziwa kupulumusa pamayesero anthu ambatsalakana pya iye ale , pontho na kukoya anthu akudawa kudikhira kuatchunyusa Nsiku inafuna iye dzatonga mseru anthu a padziko yapansi , 
61002010	makamaka anthu ambateweza pikhumbo pyakunyansa pya manungo ale mbalulupisa utongi wa Mulungu . Afunzisi akunama ngakuwanga mtima , pontho akudungudza , pontho nkhabe chita mantha kutikana pyakulengwa pyademelero pyakudzulu tayu . 
61002011	Podi na angelo ene , ale ngamphamvu pikulu kupiringana afunzisi akunamawa , nkhabe kuasumira na mafala akutikana pamaso pa Mbuya tayu . 
61002012	Mbwenye anthu enewa akhala ninga nyama zamtsanga , pirombo pyakusowa nzeru , pile pidabalwa kwene kuti piphatwe na kuphiwa basi , pimbatikana iwo pinthu pyonsene pinakhonda iwo kuvesa . Iwo anadzavungwa ninga nyama zantsanga , 
61002013	tenepo iwo anadzabwezerwa nyatwa thangwi ya nyatwa zidaonesa iwo anthu anango . Chinthu chimbaakomera nkhuchita pakwecha na masikati pinthu pyakukhutisa pikhumbo pya manungo awo ; iwo ngakunyansa , pontho ngakuchitisa manyadzo angadya namwe pabodzi , thangwi ambakomerwa na kukunyengezani . 
61002014	Iwo nkhabe yang'ana chinango tayu , mbwenye akazi akuti achite nawo uputa ; pikhumbo pyawo kufuna kuchita pyakudawika nkhabe khuta tayu . Iwo ambachitisa anthu akusowa mphamvu kukweshwa na misampha . Iwo ngaluso pakuchita mtima , pontho Mulungu aatemberera !
61002015	Iwo asiya njira yakulungama , pontho abauka kubuluka kuna njirawo ; iwo atewera njira ya Balamu , mwana Beori , ule adakhumba mfuma idakwanisa iye kuigumana , thangwi ya kuchita kwache pyakudawa ile , 
61002016	tenepo iye adasumululwa thangwi ya pyakudawa pyache . Bulu wache , nyama yakukhonda longa , adalonga na fala ya munthu mbamkhondesa kuchita pyakuseluka pikhafuna chita mprofetiyo . 
61002017	Anthu enewa akhala ninga mphuno zakuuma za madzi , pontho akhala ninga nkhungu yakugwinywa na mphepo ; Mulungu aakoyera mbuto yawo kumdima wakugoswa pyakwanga . 
61002018	Iwo ambalonga mafala akudungudza , pontho akupupwa , pontho ambaphatisa basa pikhumbo pyakuipa pyakusirira pya manungo kukwesha napyo ale atoma kwene chinchino kupulumuswa pakati pa anzawo akale akudawika . 
61002019	Iwo ambadumbira pya utumbe , mwenemo iwo ndi mabitchu a pinthu pyakuipa pimbavunga pile — thangwi munthu ambasanduka kukhala bitchu wa pinthu pimbamkunda pile . 
61002020	Ngakhala anthu anapulumuka kuna pyakuipa pya pansi pano pimbaavunga pile pakudziwa Mbuyathu pontho Nyankhombo wathu Yesu Khristu , m'nduli mwache mbakweshwa pontho kukundwa na pinthu pyonthopyo , pakumalisira pache anadzakhala wakunyanya kuipa kupiringana mukhali iye pakutoma pale . 
61002021	Iwo mbadakhonda dziwa njira yakulungama , mbapidakhala pyadidi kuna iwo , kusiyana na kuidziwa mbabauka kubuluka kuna matongero akuchena adapaswa iwo ale . 
61002022	Pinthu pyaachitikirapi pikuonesa kuona kwa mwambi wakuti , " Mwanambwa ambabwerera kadya pontho matapiko ache " , pontho " Nkhumba imbabwerera pontho kabulumunda m'matope ingamala sambiswa . "
61003001	Ashamwali anga apamtima , kalata yeneyi njachiwiri kukulemberani . M'makalata onsene awiriwa ndayesayesa kulamusa pyakunyerezera pyangwiro m'mitima mwanu pakukukumbusani pya pinthu penepi . 
61003002	Pinafuna ine mphyakuti imwe mukumbuke mafala adalongwa kalene na maprofeti akuchena ale , pontho na matongero a Mbuya pontho Nyankhombo , adakupasani anyakutumwanu ale . 
61003003	Chakutoma papyonsenepi , imwe mwathema kuvesa kuti munsiku zakumalisazi anthu anango ale ambatongwa na pikhumbo pyawo pyakuipa anadzaoneka . Iwo anadzakuselusani
61003004	mbati , " Ayi Khristu hadadumbira tayu kuti anadzabwera pontho ? Apo lero ali kupi ? Makolo athu afa kale , mbwenye pinthu pyonsene pili monthomo kubulukira pandzidzi udalengwa dziko yapansi ! "
61003005	Iwo akuduwalira chadala kuti kale kene Mulungu adalenga kudzulu na dziko yapansi na mafalache . Dziko yapansi idalengwa kubulukira kumadzi , pontho na madzi . 
61003006	Tenepo iye adaphatisa basa madzi onthowo , madzi makulu kuvunga nawo dziko yapansi yakale ile . 
61003007	Mbwenye kudzulu na dziko yapansi pili chinchinopi Mulungu akupikoya na mafalache onthowo , towera pidzavungwe na moto . Iye akupikoya kudikhira nsiku inafuna iye dzatonga na kuvunga anthu okhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu ale . 
61003008	Ashamwali anga apamtima , lekani duwalira chinthu chibodzi chakuti nkhabe kusiyana pamaso pa Mulungu tayu : kuna iye nsiku ibodzi yakhala ninga pyaka pikwi , pontho pyaka pikwi pyakhala ninga nsiku ibodzi . 
61003009	Mbuya nkhabe dembuka kuchita pinthu pidadumbira iye pile tayu , ninga mumbapinyerezera anthu anango mule . M'mbuto mwache iye ambapirira namwe , thangwi iye nee ambafuna kuti munthu na mbodzi ene avungike tayu , mbwenye pimbafuna iye mphyakuti anthu onsene aleke pyakudawa pyawo . 
61003010	Mbwenye Nsiku ya kubwera pontho kwa Mbuya inadzakhala ninga kudza kwa mbava . Pansiku yeneyo pinthu pyakudzulu pinadzamala na dungu ikulu , tenepo pinthu pyonsene pya kudzulu pinadzagaka na kuvungika , pontho dziko yapansi na pyonsene pili mwenemo pinadzamala .
61003011	Podi pinthu pyonsenepi pinadzavungwa tenepo , apo imwembo mwathema kukhala anthu akutani ? Imwe mwathema kukhala na moyo wakuchena , pontho wakupipereka kuna Mulungu , 
61003012	ndzidzi unadikhira imwe Nsiku ya Mulungu , pontho chitani pyakukwanisika pyonsene kuti idze chinchino pano — Nsiku inafuna dzagaka na kuvungwa kudzulu , pontho inafuna dzanyunguluka pinthu pyonsene pyakudzulu thangwi ya kupitsa . 
61003013	Mbwenye ife tikudikhira kuona pinthu pidadumbira Mulungu pile ; penepi nkhudzulu kwachinchino , pontho dziko yapansi yachinchino , kule kunafuna dzakhazikika chilungamo . 
61003014	Tenepo , ashamwali anga , yesayesani kukhala anthu angwiro , pontho akusowa chinthu chakukupokanyisani pamaso pa Mulungu , pontho kukhala mwamtendere ndzidzi unadikhira imwe Nsiku ya kubwera pontho kwa Mbuya . 
61003015	Kumbukani kuti kupirira kwa Mbuya nkhupasa danga anthu kuti apulumuke ninga montho mudakulemberani mbaleathu Paulo kuphatisa basa nzeru zidampasa Mulungu zile . 
61003016	Iye ambalonga pinthu pibodzibodzi pya penepi angalemba makalatache . M'makalatamu muna pinango pyakunensa kupivesa . Anthu okhonda dziwa pinthu , pontho okhonda khazikika mumtima mwawo ambapipotoza mwawomwawombo ninga mumbapotozera iwo Malemba anango . Tenepo iwo akupichemerera okha ene kuvungika . 
61003017	Mbwenye imwe , ashamwali anga , mukupidziwa kale penepi . Chitani mpholemphole mphapo , towera muleke dzakwatika na pyakudawika pya anthu okhonda tsalakana pya mwambo ale , gopesera munagwa kubuluka pakhazikika imwe pale . 
61003018	M'mbuto mwache thimizani kukula mukukoma mtima , pontho na udziwisi wa Mbuyathu , pontho Nyankhombo wathu Yesu Khristu . Demelero mbikhale kuna iye chinchino , pontho kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
62001001	Tikukulemberani pya mbodzi wakuchemerwa Mafala wakupasa moyo ule . Mafalayo akhalipo kutomera pakutomaletu . Tidamva , pontho tidamuonadi na maso athu . Tidamuona , pontho tidamkhuya na manjathu . 
62001002	Pidaoneka nyakupasa moyo ule , ife tidamuona . Tikumchitira umboni na kukupangani pya moyo okhonda mala ule ukhali na Baba mbaudziwisa kuna ife . 
62001003	Pile pidaona ife na kupiva tikupilalikambo kuna imwe , towera imwe pabodzi na ife tikhale pachiphatizano , chile china ife na Baba , pontho na Mwanache , Yesu Khristu . 
62001004	Tikukulemberani penepi , towera kukomerwa kwathua kukhale kwamumphu . 
62001005	Mphangwa zidava ife kubulukira kuna Mwanache mbatizilalika kuna imwe nsakuti : Mulungu ndi cheza , pontho muna iye nkhabemo mdima na pang'ono pene tayu . 
62001006	Ngakhala tinalonga kuti timbaphatizana na Mulungu , kwache mbatifamba mumdima , penepo tikunama , pontho ife nkhabe teweza pyakuonadi . 
62001007	Mbwenye tingafamba m'cheza ninga kukhala m'cheza kumbachita iye , penepo tina chiphatizano unango na mwanzache , pontho chiropa cha Yesu , Mwanache , chimbatichenesa kuna pyakudawa pyonsene . 
62001008	Ngakhala tinalonga kuti ife nkhabe chakudawa tikupinyengeza tekha ene , pontho muna ife nkhabemo pyakuonadi . 
62001009	Mbwenye ngakhala tinabweka pyakudawa pyathu kuna Mulungu , iye ngwakukhulupirika pontho wakulungama mbadzatilekerera pyakudawa pyathu , pontho anadzatichenesa kuna kukhonda lungama kwathu konsene . 
62001010	Ngakhala tinalonga kuti ife hatidadawe tayu , tikumyesa Mulungu ninga ngwakunama , pontho mafalache nkhabe mbuto muna ife tayu . 
62002001	Penepi ndikulembera imwe , ananga , towera muleke kudawa . Mbwenye ngakhala unango anachita chakudawa , tili naye ule ambatidembeterera kuna Baba m'mbuto mwathu — weneyu ndi Yesu Khristu , nyakulungama . 
62002002	Iye ndi nsembe yakulekerera pyakudawa pyathu , pontho si pyathu pyokha tayu , mbwenye na pya anthu onsene a padziko yapansi . 
62002003	Ngakhala tinavera matongero a Mulungu , penepo tatsikimizadi kuti timbamdziwa . 
62002004	Ngakhala munthu analonga kuti ambamdziwa , kwache mbakhonda kuvera matongero ache , munthu weneyo ngwakunama , pontho muna iye nkhabemo pyakuonadi . 
62002005	Mbwenye munthu ambavera Mafala a Mulungu ngule kumfuna Mulungu kumbachita iye kwachitiswadi kukhala kwamumphu muna iye . Mwenemo ndiye munakwanisira ife kudziwadi kuti timbaphatizana na Mulungu . 
62002006	Munthu analonga kuti ambaphatizana na Mulungu ule , athema kukhala na makhaliro akhali na Yesu ale . 
62002007	Ashamwali apamtima , matongero anakulemberani ine si achinchino tayu , mbwenye ngontho akale , ale akhala na imwe kutomera pakutomaletu . Matongero akale ndi mphangwa zava imwe kale zile , 
62002008	kwache matongero anakulemberani inewa ngachinchino ; pyakuonadi pyache pikuoneka muna Yesu , pontho muna imwe . Thangwi mdima ukugwanda , cheza chadichadi chatoma kale kumwinikira . 
62002009	Ule analonga kuti ali m'cheza mbazonda mbaleache , penepo iye ali mumdima na lero . 
62002010	Ule anamfuna mbaleache ambakhala m'cheza , natenepo muna iye nkhabemo chinango chakufuna kumdawisa tayu . 
62002011	Mbwenye nyakuzonda mbaleache ambakhala mumdima . Ambafamba mumdima mbakhonda dziwa kunaenda iye , thangwi mdima wampasa uboliboli . 
62002012	Ndikulembera imwe , ananga , thangwi pyakudawa pyanu pyalekererwa thangwi ya pidachita Khristu . 
62002013	Ndikulembera imwe , ababa , thangwi imwe mumbamdziwa ule akhalipo kutomera pakutomaletu . Ndikulembera imwe , aphale , thangwi mwamkunda Nyakuipa ule . 
62002014	Ndikulembera imwe , ananga , thangwi Baba mumbamdziwa . Ndikulembera imwe , ababa , thangwi nyakukhalapo kutomera pakutomaletu mumbamdziwa . Ndikulembera imwe , aphale , thangwi muna mphamvu ; Mafala a Mulungu ambakhala muna imwe , pontho mwamkunda Nyakuipa ule . 
62002015	Lekani funa dziko yapansi , penu chinthu chonsene cha dziko yapansi . Mungafuna dziko yapansi , Baba nee mumbamfuna tayu . 
62002016	Thangwi chinthu chonsene cha dziko yapansi — pikhumbo pyakudawika pya manungo , kusirira kwa maso , na kudungudza na pinthu pina munthu na pimbachita iye — pyonsenepi hapimbabulukira kuna Baba tayu , mbwenye pimbabulukira kuna dziko yapansi . 
62002017	Dziko yapansi na pinthu pya m'mwenemo pimbakhumba anthu pile pinadzamala . Mbwenye ule anachita pimbafuna Mulungu anakhala na moyo okhonda mala . 
62002018	Ananga , mamalisiro ali chifupi kudza ! Mudapangwa kuti nyamalwa wa Khristu anadzabwera ; chinchino anyamalwa azinji a Khristu aoneka kale , natenepo tikudziwa kuti mamalisiro ali chifupi kudza . 
62002019	Anthu enewa hakhalidi a m'gulu mwathu tayu , ndi thangwi yache atisiya . Iwo mbadakhala a m'gulu mwathu , mbadakhala na ife . Mbwenye iwo atisiya , towera pionekedi pakwecha kuti nkhabe mbodzi wa iwo akhali wa m'gulu mwathu tayu . 
62002020	Mbwenye Khristu adakudzozani na Mzimu Wakuchena , natenepo monsene mwadziwa pyakuonadi . 
62002021	Ine ndikukulemberani , si thangwi yakuti imwe nkhabe dziwa pyakuonadi tayu , mbwenye ndi thangwi yakuti mumbapidziwa . Mumbapidziwa pontho kuti kunama nkhabe bulukira muna pyakuonadi na pang'ono pene tayu . 
62002022	Nyakunamayo mbani mphapo ? Weneyu ngule analonga kuti Yesu si Khristu tayu . Munthu wakuchita tenepo ndi nyamalwa wa Khristu — iye akhonda Baba na Mwana ene . 
62002023	Thangwi nyakukhonda Mwana akhondambo Baba ; nyakutambira Mwana atambirambo Baba . 
62002024	Onesesani kuti mwakoyadi mumtima mwanu mphangwa zidava imwe kutomera pakutoma . Ngakhala munakoya mphangwa zenezc , penepo munadzakhala ndzidzi onsene mukuphatanizana na Mwana pontho na Baba . 
62002025	Penepi ndiye pidadumbira Khristu mwenechiro kutipasa — moyo okhonda mala . 
62002026	Ndikulemba penepi kuna imwe kulonga pya ale akuyesa kukunyengezani . 
62002027	Mbwenye kuna imwe , Khristu akudzozani na Mzimu Wakuchena , ule ambakhala muna imwe mwakuti nkhabe dzafunika pontho munthu unango kuti akufunziseni tayu . Thangwi Mzimu Wakuchena adzozwa na imwe ule , ambakufunzisani pyonsene , pontho pinakufunzisani iye mphyakuonadi , si pyakunama tayu . Verani chifunziso cha Mzimuyo mbamukhala mukuphatanizana na Khristu . 
62002028	Chinchino , ananga , khalani mukuphatanizana na iye , towera angadzaoneka tidzakhale nako kuwangiswa mtima mbatidzakhonda bisala na manyadzo pamaso pache pansiku yakudza pontho kwache . 
62002029	Mumbapidziwa kuti Khristu ngwakulungama ; mupidziwetu , mphapo , kuti munthu onsene wakuphata pyakulungama weneyo ndi mwana wa Mulungu . 
62003001	Ngayang'anani kutifuna kukulu kumbachita Baba . Kutifuna kwache nkhukulu pyakwanga pene mwakuti timbachemerwa ana a Mulungu — ande ndifedi anache ! Yeneyi ndi thangwi yache anthu a padziko yapansi ambakhonda kutidziwa , thangwi iwo nkhabe dziwa Mulungu tayu . 
62003002	Ashamwali anga apamtima , chinchino ndife ana a Mulungu , kwache pidzati dziwika mwadidi mwene tayu kuti tinadzakhalanji . Mbwenye tikupidziwa kuti Khristu angadzabwera pontho , tinadzakhala ninga iye ene thangwi tinadzamuona ninga muna iyemo . 
62003003	Munthu onsene wakukhala na chidikhiro chenechi muna Khristu ambapichenesa yekha ene sasawa ninga kuchena kwachita Khristu . 
62003004	Munthu anadawa , aswa mwambo wa Mulungu , thangwi kudawa nkhuswa mwambo . 
62003005	Mumbapidziwa kuti Khristu adadza towera kudzabulusa pyakudawa , pontho muna iye nkhabemo chakudawa . 
62003006	Tenepo munthu onsene wakukhala mukuphatanizana na Khristu nkhabe thimiza kudawa tayu . Mbwenye munthu anathimiza kudawa , chipo nee hadamuone , penu kumdziwa tayu . 
62003007	Ananga , munthu mbaleke kukunyengezani ! Munthu wakuphata pyakulungama ngwakulungama sasawambo ninga Khristu ngwakulungama . 
62003008	Munthu anathimiza kudawa ngwa Satana , thangwi Satana ngwakudawa kutomera pakutoma pene . Mwana Mulungu adadza na thangwi ya kufuna kuvunga pidachita Satana pile . 
62003009	Mwana onsene wa Mulungu nkhabe thimiza kudawa tayu , thangwi umulungu umbakhala muna iye , pontho iye nkhabe kwanisa kuthimiza kudawa thangwi Mulungu ndi Babache . , 
62003010	Kweneku ndiye kusiyana pakati pa ana a Mulungu na ana a Satana . Munthu onsene anakhonda chita pinthu pyakulungama , penu anakhonda funa mbaleache , weneyo si mwana Mulungu tayu . 
62003011	Mphangwa zidava imwe kutomera pakutoma pene nsakuti ife tathema kufunana unango na mwanzache . 
62003012	Mbatilekeni kukhala ninga Kaini . Iye akhali wache wa Nyakuipa ule mbapha Abele mbaleache . Chidaphera iye mbaleacheyu ninji ? Thangwi pidachita Kaini makayo pikhali pinthu pyakudawika , mbwenye pinthu pidachita mbaleache pikhali pyakulungama . 
62003013	Tenepo , abale anga , lekani dodoma anthu a dziko yapansi pano angakuzondani . 
62003014	Timbapidziwa kuti tabuluka kuimfa mbatidza kumoyo . Penepi timbapidziwa thangwi abale athu timbaafuna . Munthu onsene anakhonda funa mwanzache akuthimiza kukhala pansi pa mphamvu ya imfa . 
62003015	Munthu anazonda mbaleache ndi mphandu , pontho mumbapidziwa kuti mphandu nkhabe moyo okhonda mala muna iye tayu . 
62003016	Umu ndi mule mumbadziwira ife kuti kufunana ninji : Khristu adapereka moyo wache thangwi ya ife pano . Ifembo tathema kupereka moyo wathu thangwi ya akhristu anzathu . 
62003017	Ngakhala munthu wakufuma ambaona mbaleache wakusowa pinthu , kwache iye mbaumisa mtimache , angalonge tani kuti ambafuna Mulungu ?
62003018	Ananga , kufunana kwathu mbakuleke khala kwa m'kanwa kokha ; kwathema kukhala kufunana kwakuonadi , kule kumbaoneka kokha na pyakuchita pyathu . 
62003019	Mwenemu ndi mule munafuna dzadziwira ife kuti ndifedi ache a pyakuonadi , pontho na mule munafuna ife dzakhala akulikha mtima pamaso pa Mulungu , 
62003020	podi na ndzidzi unatichitisa chikumbu mtima chathu kukonwa , thangwi Mulungu ngwamkulu kupiringana chikumbu mtima chathu , pontho ambadziwa pyonsene pene . 
62003021	Natenepo , ashamwali anga apamtima , tinakhala nako kulikha mtima pamaso pa Mulungu , ngakhala chikumbu mtima chathu nkhabe kutichitisa kukonwa tayu . 
62003022	Timbatambira kubulukira kuna iye pyonsene pimbampempha ife , thangwi timbavera matongero ache mbatichita pyakumkomera . 
62003023	Matongero ache ngakuti tikhulupire Mwanache Yesu Khristu na kufunana unango na mwanzache ninga mudatipangira Khristu . 
62003024	Munthu wakuvera matongero a Mulungu ambakhala mukuphatanizana na Mulungu , pontho Mulungu ambakhala mukuphatanizana naye . Timbapidziwa kuti Mulungu ambakhala mukuphatanizana na ife kudzera muna Mzimu Wakuchena adatipasa iye ule . 
62004001	Ashamwali anga apamtima , lekani khulupira anthu onsene analonga kuti ana Mzimu Wakuchena , mbwenye muayese , towera muone ngakhala Mzimu una iwo umbabulukira kuna Mulungu . Thangwi maprofeti azinji akunama afalikira m'dziko yapansi . 
62004002	Umu ndi mule munakwanisira imwe kudzindikira ngakhala munthu ana Mzimu wa Mulungu . Munthu onsene anatawira kuti Yesu Khristu adadza ninga munthu chadichadi , weneyo ana Mzimu wa Mulungu . 
62004003	Mbwenye munthu anakhonda penepi pya Khristu , weneyo nkhabe Mzimu wa Mulungu tayu . Mzimu una iye ngwakubulukira kuna nyamalwa wa Khristu ; mudapiva kuti anadzabwera , tenepa chinchino ali kale padziko yapansi pano . 
62004004	Mbwenye imwe , ananga , ndimwe ache a Mulungu , pontho mwakunda maprofeti akunama thangwi Mulungu , ule ali muna imwe , ngwamphamvu pyakwanga kupiringana Satana , ule ambakhala muna anthu ale ngadziko yapansi pano . 
62004005	Maprofeti akunama ale ambalonga pinthu pya padziko yapansi , tenepo anthu a padziko yapansi ambaavesera thangwi iwo ngadziko yapansi . 
62004006	Mbwenye ife ndife ache a Mulungu . Anyakudziwa Mulungu ambativesera , mbwenye anyakukhonda khala ache a Mulungu nkhabe kutivesera tayu . Penepi ndiye pimbatidziwisa kusiyana pakati pa Mzimu wakuonadi na mzimu wakunama . 
62004007	Ashamwali apamtima , tendeni tifunane unango na mwanzache thangwi kufunana kumbabulukira kuna Mulungu . Munthu wakufuna mwanzache ndi mwana Mulungu pontho ambamdziwa Mulungu . 
62004008	Nyakukhonda kumfuna mwanzache nkhabe dziwa Mulungu tayu , thangwi Mulungu nkhufunana . 
62004009	Mulungu adaonesa kutifuna kwache pidatumiza iye mwanache mbodzi ene padziko yapansi , towera tikhale na moyo kudzera muna iye . 
62004010	Kufunana chadichadi nkhwakuti : si ife tidamfuna Mulungu tayu , mbwenye iye adatifuna mbatitumira Mwanache kukhala nsembe yakulekerera nayo pyakudawa pyathu . 
62004011	Ashamwali apamtima , ngakhala Mulungu ambatifuna tenepa , ifembo mbatifunaneni unango na mwanzache . 
62004012	Chipo nkhabe mbodzi adaona Mulungu tayu , mbwenye ngakhala tinafunana unango na mwanzache , Mulungu ambakhala mukuphatanizana na ife , pontho kufunana kwache kunachitiswa kukhala kwamumphu muna ife . 
62004013	Timbapidziwadi kuti timbakhala mukuphatanizana na Mulungu , pontho iye ambakhala mukuphatanizana na ife , thangwi iye atipasa Mzimu wache . 
62004014	Ife tapiona mbatipangambo anango kuti Baba atuma Mwanache kudzakhala Nyankhombo wa dziko yapansi . 
62004015	Ngakhala munthu anatawira kuti Yesu ndi Mwana Mulungu , weneyo ambakhala mukuphatanizana na Mulungu , pontho Mulungu ambakhala mukuphatanizana na iye . 
62004016	Na ife enembo timbamdziwa na kunyindira kutifuna kumbachita Mulungu . Mulungu nkhufunana , munthu ambakhala mukufunanayo ambakhala mukuphatanizana na Mulungu , pontho Mulungu ambakhala mukuphatanizana na iye . 
62004017	Kufunana kweneku kumbachitiswa kukhala kwamumphu muna ife , towera ife tidzakhale nako kulikha mtima pansiku inafuna Mulungu dzatonga mseru anthu onsene . Tinadzakhala nako thangwi makhaliro athu padziko yapansi pano ali sasawa na makhaliro a Khristu . 
62004018	Mukufunana nkhabemo mantha . Kufunana kwakuthema monsene mwene kumbathamangisa mantha onsene . Munthu angagopa , ambakhala wakugopa kutchunyuswa , pontho kufunana hakudafika pa chadichadi muna iye tayu . 
62004019	Ife timbamfiina thangwi Mulungu ndiye adatoma kutifuna . 
62004020	Ngakhala unango analonga kuti ambamfuna Mulungu , kwache mbazonda mbaleache , weneyo ngwakunama . Thangwi iye nkhabe kwanisa kufuna Mulungu , ule anakhonda iye kuona tayu , ngakhala anakhonda funa mbaleache aona iye ule . 
62004021	Matongero atipasa Yesu mbawa : munthu wakufuna Mulungu athema kufuna pontho mbaleache . 
62005001	Munthu anakhulupira kuti Yesu ndiye Khristu , weneyo ndi mwana Mulungu ; pontho munthu anamfuna Baba , ambamfuna pontho na Mwanache ene . 
62005002	Mwenemu ndi mule mumbadziwira ife kuti timbaafuna ana a Mulungu : timbamfuna Mulungu na kukoya matongero ache . 
62005003	Thangwi kumfuna Mulungu nkhukoya matongero ache , pontho kuna ife matongero ache si akunensa tayu . 
62005004	Thangwi mwana onsene wa Mulungu anakwanisa kukunda dziko yapansi . Dziko yapansi timbaikunda kudzera muna chikhulupiro chathu . 
62005005	Anakwanisa kukunda dziko yapansi mbani ? Weneyu ngule ene basi ambakhulupira kuti Yesu ndi Mwana Mulungu . Kuchitira umboni pya Yesu
62005006	Yesu Khristu ngule adadza kudzera muna madzi pakubatizwa kwache , pontho na chiropa pakufa kwache . Hadadze kudzera muna madzi okha tayu , mbwenye kudzera muna madzi pabodzi na chiropa . Na Mzimu Wakuchena enembo ambachitira umboni kuti mphyakuonadi thangwi Mzimuyo ngwakuonadi . 
62005007	Mboni zilipo zitatu :
62005008	Mzimu Wakuchena , madzi na chiropa . Onsene utatu wawo umbapereka umboni ubodzi ene . 
62005009	Timbakhulupira umboni wa munthu ; mbwenye umboni wa Mulungu ngwamphamvu pikulu , pontho iye apereka umboni wenewu wakulonga pya Mwanache . 
62005010	Tenepo munthu anakhulupira mwana Mulungu ule , ana umboni wenewu mumtima mwache ; mbwenye ule anakhonda kukhulupira Mulungu , ambamsanduza kukhala wakunama , thangwi hadakhulupira umboni wa Mulungu wakulonga pya Mwanache ule tayu . 
62005011	Umboni wache ngufu : Mulungu atipasa moyo okhonda mala . Moyo wenewu phatache ili muna Mwanache . 
62005012	Nyakukhala na Mwanayo ana moyo wenewu ; nyakusowa Mwana Mulungu nkhabe moyo . 
62005013	Ndikukulemberani penepi towera imwe anyakukhulupira Mwana Mulungu mupidziwe kuti muna moyo okhonda mala . 
62005014	Timbalikha mtima pamaso pa Mulungu thangwi timbapidziwa kuti ambativa tingampempha chinthu malingana na kufuna kwache . 
62005015	Ngakhala timbapidziwa kuti ambativa tingapempha chinthu timbapidziwa pontho kuti tatambira chinthu chonsene champempha ifecho . 
62005016	Ngakhala unaona mbaleako akuchita chakudawa chokhonda kudzesa imfa , umpempherere kuna Mulungu , tenepo Mulungu anadzampasa moyo mbaleakoyo . Penepa ndikulonga kuna ale pyakudawa pyawo nkhabe dzesa imfa . Mbwenye kulipo kudawa kwinango kwakudzesa imfa , penepa ndikulonga kuti uleke kupipempherere . 
62005017	Kuchita pinthu pyonsene pyokhonda lungama nkhudawa , mbwenye kulipo kudawa kwinango kokhonda dzesa imfa . 
62005018	Timbapidziwa kuti ana a Mulungu nkhabe thimiza kudawa tayu , thangwi Mwana Mulungu ambaakoya mwadidi , pontho Nyakuipayo nkhabe kwanisa kuakuwaza tayu . 
62005019	Timbapidziwa kuti ndife ache a Mulungu , podi kwene dziko yonsene yapansi ikhale pyayo pansi pa utongi wa Nyakuipa ule . 
62005020	Timbapidziwa kuti Mwana Mulungu adza mbatichitisa kuvesa , towera tidziwe Mulungu wakuonadi . Ife timbakhala mukuphatanizana na Mulungu wakuona — mukuphatanizana na Mwanache Yesu Khristu . Weneyu ndi Mulungu wakuona , pontho moyo okhonda mala . 
62005021	Ananga , chalirani kupembedza mifanikizo . 
63001001	Kubulukira kuna Mkulu wa mpingo — Kwenda kuna mkazi wakusankhulwa na Mulungu na kuna anache a ambafuna ine na mtimanga onsene ale . Si ine ndekha tayu , mbwenye anyakudziwa pyakuonadi onsene ambakufunani , 
63001002	thangwi pyakuonadi pimbakhala muna ife , pontho pinadzakhala na ife kwenda na kwenda . 
63001003	Kukoma mtima , nsisi na mtendere pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu Baba pabodzi na Yesu Khristu , Mwanache , pikhale pyathu mwakuonadi na kufunana . 
63001004	Ndikhali wakukomerwa pyakwanga pidagumana ine kuti ananu anango akuteweza pyakuonadi , ninga montho mudatipangira Baba . 
63001005	Natenepo ndikupempha imwe , mkazi wakusankhulwa na Mulungu , kuti tifunane unango na mwanzache . Matongero anakulemberani inewa si achinchino tayu . Enewa ndi matongero akhali na ife kubulukira pakutoma . 
63001006	Kufunana kunalonga ineku nkhwakuti tikhale akuvera matongero a Mulungu . Matongero ache ninga mwavera imwe kubulukira pakutoma ngakuti monsene mukhale akufunana . 
63001007	Anyakunyengeza anthu azinji , pontho anyakukhonda tawira kuti Yesu Khristu adadza ninga munthu chadichadi , afalikira padziko yonsene yapansi . Munthu wakuchita tenepo ngwakunama , pontho ndi nyamalwa wa Khristu . 
63001008	Onesesani kuti muleke dzataya pidaphatira ife basa pile , mbwenye kuti mudzatambire mfupo wanu wamumphu . 
63001009	Munthu anakhonda thimiza kukhala na chifunziso cha Khristu , mbwenye mbathimizirapo pyachembo , weneyo nkhabe Mulungu tayu . Munthu anathimiza kukhala nacho chifunziso chenechi ana Baba na Mwana ene . 
63001010	Tenepo , ngakhala munthu unango anadza kuna imwe mbakhonda funzisa chifunziso chenechi , lekani kumtambira kumusa kwanu , pontho lekani na kumpasa kwene mwenyikiro . 
63001011	Thangwi nyakumtambira mwadidiyo anadzasanduka mwanzache wakuchita naye pinthu pyakuipa pimbachita iye pile . 
63001012	Ndina pizinji pyakuti ndikupangeni , kwache sinafiina kuti ndichite kupilemba m'kalata tayu . M'mbuto mwache ndikudikhira kudza kwanuko kuti ndidzalonge namwe maso na maso , towera tidzakomerwe monsene mwene . 
63001013	Ana a nanako wakusankhulwac na Mulungu akupereka mwenyikiro kuna imwe . 
64001001	Kubulukira kuna Mkulu wa mpingo — Kwenda kuna shamwalianga wapamtima , Gayo , ambafima ine na mtima wakuonadi ule . 
64001002	Shamwalianga wapamtima , ndimbapemphera kuti pyonsene pikufambire mwadidi , pontho kuti ukhale wakuwanga m'manungo — ninga mumbapidziwira ine kuti moyo wako wauzimu ngwakuwanga . 
64001003	Ndidakomerwa pyakwanga pidafika abale anango achikhristu mbandipanga kukhulupirika kwako kuna pyakuonadi — ninga kuteweza pyakuonadi kumbachita iwe ndzidzi onsene . 
64001004	Nkhabe chinango chakundikomera pikulu kupiringana kuva kuti ananga ambateweza pyakuonadi . Gayo asimbwa
64001005	Shamwali wapamtima ndiwe wakukhulupirika pyakwanga pabasa imbaphatira iwe akhristu anzako podi kwene kuti iwo mbalendo kuna iwe . 
64001006	Iwo adapanga mpingo kuno pya kuafuna kudachita iwe . Uaphedze mwakukomera Mulungu , towera athimize ulendo wawo . 
64001007	Thangwi adalamuka ulendo wawo kuphatira basa Khristu mbakhonda chiphedzo chakubulukira kuna anyakukhonda khala akhristu . 
64001008	Ifembo akhristu tathema kuaphedza anthu enewa , towera tikwate khundu pabasawo inaphatira iwo kuvekesa pyakuonadi . Pya Diotrefe na Demetrio
64001009	Ndidalemba kalata yachigwandira kuna mpingo , mbwenye Diotrefe , nyakuthanda kukhala mkadamu pakati pawo , nkhabe dzavesera pinalonga inepi tayu . 
64001010	Tenepo ndingadza ndinadzakumbusa mabasa onsene ambaphata iye , pinthu pyakuipa pontho tsweda pimbatilongera iye pile . Kwache pimbachita iye si pyokhapyo tayu ; iye ambakhonda kutambira abale achikhristu , pontho podi na anthu ene ambafuna kuatambira ale , iye ambayesa kuabulusa mumpingo . 
64001011	Shamwalianga wapamtima , leka tsanzira pinthu pyakuipa , mbwenye utsanzire pinthu pyadidi . Munthu ambachita pinthu pyadidi , weneyo ngwache wa Mulungu , mbwenye nyakuchita pyakuipa , weneyo hadaone Mulungu tayu . 
64001012	Munthu onsene ambachitira Demetrio umboni wadidi . Na pyakuonadi pene pimbamchitira umboni , na ife enembo tinamchitira umboni , pontho iwe ukupidziwa kuti pinalonga ifepi mphyakuonadi . Mafala akumalisa nawo
64001013	Ndili napyo pizinji pyakukupanga , kwache sinafuna kuti ndichite kupilemba m'kalata tayu . 
64001014	Ndikudikhira kudzakuona chinchino pano , penepo tinadzalonga maso na maso . Mtendere mbukhale nawe . Ashamwali ako akupereka mwenyikiro kuna iwe . Upereke mwenyikiro kuna ashamwali athu onsene na madzinawo . 
64001015	
65001001	Kubulukira kuna ine , Yuda , mbaleache Yakobo , pontho nyabasa wa Yesu Khristu , — Kwenda kuna anthu achemerwa na Mulungu , ambafunwa na Mulungu Baba , mbatchinjirizwa na Yesu Khristu ale . 
65001002	Nsisi , mtendere na kufunana pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu pikhale namwe mwakuinjipa . 
65001003	Ashamwali anga apamtima , podi kwene kuti ine ndidapifuna pyakwanga kukulemberani pya chipulumuso china ife tonsene , kwache mtimanga udandikakamiza kuti ndikuwangiseni mtima kuti mumenye nkhondo yakutchinjiriza chikhulupiro , chidachita Mulungu nyampheraphera kuchipereka kuna anthu ache kabodzi kene basi chile . 
65001004	Thangwi anthu anango okhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu adapita pakati pathupa mwakukhonda dziwika , anthu ale ambapotoza mphangwa za kukoma mtima kwa Mulungu wathu ninga chinthu chakuapasa utumbe wakuchitira pyakuzuda , pontho ngale ambakhonda Yesu Khristu , Mbuyathu pontho Mfumu yekha ene ule . Kalene Malemba adalongeratu pya kutchunyuswa kwatambira iwo . 
65001005	Podi kwene kuti imwe mukupidziwa pyonsenepi , chinchino ndikufuna kukukumbusani mule mudapichita Mbuya a nyampheraphera kupulumusa anthu a ku Israele kabodzi kene basi kubulukira m'dziko ya Iguputo , mbwenye pidamala penepo , iye adavunga anthu adakhonda khulupira ale . 
65001006	Kumbukani angelo ale hadakhutira na utongi ukhadaperekwa kuna iwo ule , mbwenye iwo adasiya mbuto zawo zikhakhala iwo zile : iwo adamangwa na njema kumdima kwenda na kwenda , kule kunaakoya Mulungu kudikhira Nsiku ikulu inafuna iwo dzatchunyuswa . 
65001007	Kumbukani Sodomu na Gomora na maluwani a chifupi ale . Ninga angelo , anthu a m'maluwani enewa akhachita pyakuzuda mbateweza pikhumbo pyakupokanyisana na makhaliro aumunthu ; kutchunyuswa kwawo na moto okhonda mala mphyakucheuza anthu anango onsene . 
65001008	Mbwenye anthu enewa akuchita chibodzibodzi kuteweza ndoto zawo , zile zimbaachitisa kuti adawire manungo awo ; iwo ambalulupisa utongi wa Mulungu mbatikana pyakulengwa pyamoyo pyademelero pya kudzulu . 
65001009	Nee Mikaeli ene , mkadamu wa angelo onsene , adachita penepi tayu . Ndzidzi ukhapokanyana iye na Satana kukanganirana mtembo wa Mose , iye hadawange mtima tayu kulonga na mafala akumtikana nawo kuti akonwa , mbwenye adalonga mbati , " Mbuya mbakusumulule ! " Mbwenye anthu enewa ambalongera pyakuipa pinthu pyonsene pimbakhonda iwo kuvesa ; tenepo pinthu pimbadziwa iwo na nzeru zawo zakubalwa nazo pile , ninga mumbachitira pirombo pyantsanga , mphyonthopyonthopyo pimbaavunga . 
65001010	
65001011	Dzedze kuna anthu enewa . Iwo atsanzira pinthu pidachita Kaini pile . Iwo adawa pikulu ninga mudachitira Balamu , thangwi ya kukhumba kobiri . Iwo agalukira ninga mudachitira Kora , tenepo iwo avungikambo ninga iye . 
65001012	Na lidyo yawo yakusowa nayo manyadzo iwo akhala ninga pyakuswipisa maphwando anu ambachita imwe pabodzi kuonesa kufunana kwanu . Iwo ambatsalakana pyawo pene basi . Iwo akhala ninga makole akugwinywa uku na uku na mphepo , kwache okhonda dzesa mvula . Iwo akhala ninga miti yokhonda bala nsapo , penu ukhale pyawo ndzidzi wache tani ; miti ile yadulwa mitsitsi mbiferatu . 
65001013	Mabasawo akuchitisa manyadzo akhala ninga mapovu akubulukira kuna mabimbi akugoswa pabara . Iwo akhala ninga nyenyezi zakufambafamba , tenepo Mulungu akuakoyera mbuto kumdima wakugoswaletu kwenda na kwenda . 
65001014	Enoki chidzukulu chachinomwe cha Adamu , ule kalene adalongeratu pya anthu enewa mbati , " Mbuya anadzabwera na pikwi pizinji pya angelo ache akuchena
65001015	kudzatonga mseru onsenewo , kuatchunyusa thangwi ya makhaliro awo okhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu adachita iwo , pontho thangwi ya mafala onsene akutikana adamulongera anthu akudawa okhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu ! "
65001016	Anthu enewa ndzidzi onsene kwawo nkhudungunya na kudawisa anzawo ; iwo ambateweza pikhumbo pyawo pyakuipa ; iwo ambatumbama pya okha ene mbalonga pyadidi pya anthu anango , towera aganyali napyo . 
65001017	Kwache , ashamwali anga , kumbukani pidapangwa imwe kalene na anyakutumwa a Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu . 
65001018	Iwo adalonga kuna imwe mbati , " Nsiku yakumalisa ingafika anthu anafuna dzakuselusani anati adze , anthu akuteweza pikhumbo pyawo pyokhonda tsalakana pya Mulungu ale . "
65001019	Anthu enewa ngale ambalamusa magawikano pakati pa anthu , anthu ambateweza pikhumbo pya anthu a padziko yapansi , anthu akusowa Mzimu Wakuchena ale . 
65001020	Mbwenye imwe , ashamwali anga , thimizani kukhazikisa moyo wanu pamaziko a chikhulupiro chanu chakupambulikaletuchi . Pempherani na mphamvu ya Mzimu Wakuchena , 
65001021	pontho khalani mukukufunani kwa Mulungu ndzidzi unadikhira imwe Mbuyathu Yesu Khristu kuti akupaseni moyo okhonda mala na kukoma kwache mtima . 
65001022	Verani nsisi anthu akupenuka ale ;
65001023	pulumusani anthu anango pakuaphula pamoto ; onesani nsisi kuna anango , kwache mupichite mwamantha , mbwenye muzondane na nguwo zawo zene , zile pyaipiswa thangwi ya pikhumbo pyawo pyakuipa . 
65001024	Kuna iye ule anakwanisa kukuchitani kuti muleke kugwa , pontho kukufikisani kuna demelero yache akusowa chinthu chakukupokanyisani , pontho akukomerwa pikulu —
65001025	kuna Mulungu mbodzi basi , Nyankhombo wathu , kukhale demelero , ufumu , mphamvu na utongi kudzera muna Yesu Khristu Mbuyathu , kutomera pakutomaletu , lero , pontho kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
66001001	Bukhu yeneyi ikulonga pya chidziwiso chidalonga Yesu Khristu pile . Mulungu adampasa chidziwiso chenechi kuti aonese anyabasache pinthu pyathema kuchitika chinchino pano . Khristu adaonesa nyabasache Yohani pinthu penepi kudzera muna mngelo wache adatuma iye ule . 
66001002	Yohani alonga pyonsene pidaona iye mbachitira umboni mafala a Mulungu na pyakuonadi pidatchulula Yesu Khristu . 
66001003	Ngwakutsanzaya munthu anawerenga bukhu yeneyi , pontho ngakutsanzaya ale anavera mafala a mphangwa zauprofeti m'bukhumu mbaakoya mumtima mwawo ! Thangwi ndzidzi wakuti pyonsenepi pichitike uli chifupi kudza . 
66001004	Kubulukira kuna ine Yohani — Kwenda kuna mipingo minomwe m'nthemba ya Asia . Kuna imwe kukhale mtendere na kukoma mtima pyakubulukira kuna Mulungu , ule alipo chinchino , akhalipo kale , pontho anadzakhalapo kwenda na kwenda , pontho pyakubulukira kuna mizimu minomwe yakukhala pamaso pampando wache wachifumu , 
66001005	pontho pyakubulukira kuna Yesu Khristu , mboni yakukhulupirika , nyakutoma kulamuka kuimfa , pontho mfumu wa mafumu onsene a padziko yapansi ule . Iye ambatifuna , tenepo na imfache ya pamtanda ninga nsembe , iye adatisudzula kuna pyakudawa pyathu . 
66001006	Iye adatisanduza kukhala dzinza yachifumu , pontho anyansembe kuti tiphatire basa Babache Mulungu . Kuna Yesu Khristu kukhale demelero na mphamvu kwenda na kwenda ! Ameni . 
66001007	Ngayang'anani , iye akudza pamakole ! Munthu onsene anadzamuona . Podi na adamlasa ene ale anadzamuona . Anthu a madzinza onsene a padziko yapansi anadzalira thangwi ya iye . Pilekeni pikhale tenepo ! Ameni . 
66001008	Mbuya Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene , ule alipo chinchino , akhalipo kale , pontho anadzakhalapo kwenda na kwenda alonga mbati , " Ine ndine nyakutoma , pontho nyakumalisa . "
66001009	Ine ndine Yohani , mbaleanu , pontho mwanzanu wakukwata naye khundu m'nyatwa , mu Ufumu , na mukupirira mwakufulika , ninga nyakutewera Yesu . Ndidaponywa pantchuwa ya Patimo thangwi ndikhalalika mafala a Mulungu na pyakuonadi pidatchulula Yesu . 
66001010	Pansiku ya Mbuya ndidagudumirwa na Mzimu Wakuchena , tenepo ndidava kunduli kwanga fala yamphamvu ninga kulira kwa ngoma . 
66001011	Fala ile idaveka kuti , " Lemba mumpukutu pinaona iwe mbuutumize kuna mipingo minomwe : Mpingo wa ku Efeso , wa ku Simirina , wa ku Perigamu , wa ku Tiatira , wa ku Saridi , wa ku Filadelifia , na wa ku Laodikea . "
66001012	Pidazungunuka ine kuti ndione ule akhalonga na ine , ndidaona pyakuikhirapo nyale pinomwe pya golidi . 
66001013	Pakati pa nyale zile ndidaona unango wakukhala ninga munthu . Iye adavala mkanjo wakufika kumanyalo , pagangafuwa pachembo adamangapo na bande ya golidi . 
66001014	Tsitsi yache ikhali ninga ubweya wakuchena wa bira , penu ninga matalala . Maso ache akhayerima ninga malulume a moto ;
66001015	manyalo ache akhayetima ninga utale wakunyunguluswa m'dzenje ya moto . Falache ikhatitima ninga madzi mazinji . 
66001016	M'dzanjache yamadyo adaphatira nyenyezi zinomwe . M'kanwa mwache mudabuluka talasada yakutwa uku na uku . Nkhope yache ikhayetima ninga kugaka kwa dzuwa masikati . 
66001017	Pidamuona ine , ndidagwa pansi pamanyalo ache ninga munthu wakufa . Mbwenye iye adandisanjika dzanjache yamadyo mbandipanga mbati , " Leka gopa ! Nyakutoma , pontho nyakumalisa ndine pano . 
66001018	Ana moyo ule ndine pano ! Ine ndikhali wakufa , mbwenye chinchino ndina moyo kwenda na kwenda . Imfa na dziko ya anthu akufa a ene pili pansi pa utongi wanga . 
66001019	Tenepo , lemba pyaona iwepi , pinthu pinachitika ndzidzi uno na pile pene pinafuna dzachitika m'tsogolo muno . 
66001020	Pyakubisika pya nyenyezi zinomwe zaona iwe m'dzanjanga yamadyo , na pyakuikhirapo nyale pinomwe pya golidi pile pikulonga tenepa : nyenyezi zinomwe zile ndi angelo a mipingo minomwe , pyakuikhirapo nyalembo pinomwe pile ndi mipingo minomweyo . 
66002001	" Kuna mngelo wa mpingo wa ku Efeso umulembere kuti : " Mafala akubulukira kuna ule anaphatira nyenyezi zinomwe kudzanjache yamadyo mbafamba pakati pa pyakuikhirapo nyale pinomwe pya golidi mbawa :
66002002	Mabasako onsene ndimbaadziwa ; ndimbapidziwa kuti udaphata basa mwakuwangisa mbaupirira pikulu . Ndimbapidziwa pontho kuti iwe nkhabe yang'ana kwene anthu akuipa tayu . Anthu ambapiyesa okha ene kuti mbanyakutumwa , kwache iwo si anyakutumwa tayu , udaayesa mbuona kuti mbakunama . 
66002003	Iwe ndiwe wakupirira , udabonera pyakwanga thangwi yakundiphatira basa , pontho iwe hudatope tayu . 
66002004	Kwache chinthu chinafuna ine kukupokanya nacho ntchichi : chinchino iwe nkhabe kundifuna ninga mukhachitira iwe pakutoma pale tayu . 
66002005	Nyerezeratu mphapo kwagwera iwe . Leka pyakudawa pyako mbuphate pontho pikhaphata iwe pakutoma pile . Ungakhonda leka pyakudawa pyako ndinadza mbandidzabulusa chakuikhirapo nyale chako pambuto pache . 
66002006	Chimbakomera iwembo ntchakuti umbazonda pinthu pimbachita Anikolai pile ninga mumbapizondera inembo . 
66002007	" Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave pinalonga Mzimu Wakuchena kuna mipingopi ! " Nyakukunda ndinadzampasa utongi wakudya nsapo za muti wakupasa moyo ule uli m'munda mwa Mulungu . 
66002008	" Kuna mngelo wa mpingo wa ku Simirina umulembere kuti : " Mafala akubulukira kuna nyakutoma pontho nyakumalisa , ule adafa mbakhala pontho na moyo mbawa :
66002009	nyatwa zako ndimbazidziwa , pontho kutcherenga kwako ndimbakudziwa — kwache ndiwedi nyakufuma ! Pyakuipa pimbakulongera anthu ambapiyesa kuti mba Yuda ale , kwache si Ayuda tayu , ndimbapidziwa ; iwo ngam'gulu ya Satana . 
66002010	Leka chita mantha na nyatwa zinafuna iwe kuona chinchinozi . Vesera kuno ! Satana anadzayesa anango a iwe pakukuponyani m'perezo mbaudzasanyika nsiku khumi . Khala wakukhulupirika kuna ine , podi na kufa kwene , tenepo ndinadzakupasa moyo ninga mrupo wakuonesa kukunda kwako . 
66002011	" Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave pinalonga Mzimu Wakuchena kuna mipingopi ! " Anyakukunda nkhabe dzakuwazwa na imfa yachiwiri tayu . 
66002012	" Kuna mngelo wa mpingo wa ku Perigamu umulembere kuti : " Mafala akubulukira kuna nyakukhala na talasada yakutwa uku na uku mbawa :
66002013	Ndimbapidziwa kuti kumbakhala iwe ndiye kuna mpando wachifumu wa Satana . Iwe wakhala wakukhulupirika kuna ine mbaukhonda kutaya chikhulupiro chako podi na pandzidzi wa Antipasi , mboni yanga yakukhulupirika . Iye adapherwa kuna iwe makako , kumbakhala Satana kule . 
66002014	Mbwenye pana pinthu pingasi pinafuna ine kukupokanya napyo : kuna iweko kuna anthu anango ale ambateweza chifunziso cha Balamu , ule adafunzisa Balaki kudachitisa Alsraele kudawa pakuanyengerera kuti adye kudya kwakuperekwa nsembe kuna mifanikizo , pontho kuchita pyakuzuda . 
66002015	Ntchibodzibodzi pakati pako pana anthu anango ale ambateweza chifunziso cha Anikolai . 
66002016	Natenepo leka pyakudawa pyako . Ungakhonda leka pyakudawa pyako ndinati ndidze kuna iwe chinchino pano mbandidzachita nkhondo na anthu enewa na talasada yakubuluka m'kanwa mwanga . 
66002017	" Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave pinalonga Mzimu Wakuchena kuna mipingopi ! " Kuna anyakukunda ndinadzaadyesa mana akubisika . Ndinadzapereka pontho kuna munthu onsene wa iwo mwala wakuchena wakulembwa dzina yachinchino , ile yakuti nkhabe kuidziwa munthu na mbodzi ene tayu , kupambula nyakuitambira yekha basi !
66002018	" Kuna mngelo wa mpingo wa ku Tiatira umulembere kuti : " Mafala akubulukira kuna Mwana Mulungu , ule maso ache ngakuyerima ninga malulume a moto , pontho manyalo ache ngakuyetima ninga utale mbawa :
66002019	Mabasako onsene ndimbaadziwa . Kuafuna kwako anango , kukhulupirika kwako , kuphata kwako basa ya Mulungu , na kupirira kwako kwene ndimbapidziwa . Ndimbapidziwa chinchino ukuphata basa kupiringana pakutoma pale . 
66002020	Kwache chinthu chinafuna ine kukupokanya nacho ntchichi : iwe umbayang'ana kwene mkazi wakuchemerwa Yezebele , ule ambapilonga kuti ndi mprofeti . Na chifunziso chache iye ambanyengeza anyabasanga mbaafunzisa kuti achite pinthu pyakuzuda mbadya kudya kwakuperekwa nsembe kuna mifanikizo . 
66002021	Mkazi weneyu ndidampasa ndzidzi wakuti aleke pyakudawa pyache , kwache iye hadafune kuleka chita pyakuzuda pyachepyo tayu . 
66002022	Natenepo ndinadzamchitisa kugona pabonde na utenda ukulu mbandidzaonesa nyatwa ikulu kuna ale akhachita naye pyauputa angakhonda leka pyakudawika pikhachita iwo na iye pile . 
66002023	Ndinadzapha anyakutewerache , penepo mipingo yonsene inadzapidziwa kuti ine ndine nyakudziwa manyerezero awo na pikhumbo pyawo . Ndinadzapagali munthu onsene muna iwe pyakuthemerana na mabasache . 
66002024	" Mbwenye anango monsenene a mumpingo wa ku Tiatira hamudateweza chifunziso chakuipachi tayu ; mbamukhonda kufiinzambo pimbalonga iwo kuti ' mphinthu pyakuzika pyakubisika pya Satana . ' Sinakuthimizirani mitolo inango padzulu pa yeneyi tayu , 
66002025	mbwenye imwe muphatise pidafunza imwe , kufikirana ndidzabwere . 
66002026	Kuna nyakukunda ule ambachita pinafuna ine mpakana kumamalisiro ndinadzampasa utongi pa anthu a madzinza onsene , 
66002027	utongi ule udatambira ine kubulukira kuna Baba . Iwo anadzaatonga na mthondodzo wa utale mbadzaaswa ninga nkhali
66002028	mbandidzaapasa nthanda . 
66002029	" Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave pinalonga Mzimu Wakuchena kuna mipingopi !
66003001	" Kuna mngelo wa mpingo wa ku Saridi umulembere kuti : " Mafala akubulukira kuna nyakukhala na mizimu minomwe ya Mulungu pontho na nyenyezi zinomwe ule mbawa : Mabasako onsene ndimbaadziwa . Ndimbadziwa kuti una mbiri yakuti una moyo , kwache ndiwe wakufa . 
66003002	Lamuka uwangise pyakusala , pile pili chifupi kufa . Thangwi ndaona kuti mabasako hadamalisike pamaso pa Mulungu wanga tayu . 
66003003	Kumbuka pidafunziswa na pidava iwe ; upivere mbauleka pyakudawa pyako . Ungakhonda kulamuka , ndinadzakudzera ninga mbava , iwe mbudzakhonda dziwa na ndzidzi wache ene unafuna kudza ine . 
66003004	Mbwenye iwe una anthu pang'ono ku Saridiko , ale hadaswipise nguwo zawo na pyakudawa tayu . Munadzafamba na ine akuvala nguwo zakuchena thangwi mwathema kuchita tenepo . 
66003005	Nyakukunda anadzavazikwa pyakuchena ninga tenepa . Ine nkhabe dzafudza madzinawo m'bukhu ya moyo tayu . Ndinadzapilonga pakwecha pamaso pa Babanga na angelo ache ene kuti anthu enewa nganga . 
66003006	" Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave pinalonga Mzimu Wakuchena kuna mipingopi !
66003007	" Kuna mngelo wa mpingo wa ku Filadelifia umulembere kuti : " Mafala akubulukira kuna nyakuchena na nyakuonadi , ule ana mfungulo , pontho ukhali wa Davite . Angafungula msuwo , nkhabe mbodzi anakwanisa kuufunga tayu . Angaufunga , nkhabe mbodzi anakwanisa kuufungula tayu mbawa :
66003008	Pimbachita iwe ndimbapidziwa . Ndimbapidziwa kuti una mphamvu zakuchepa , kwache wateweza chifunziso changa mbukhala wakukhulupirika kuna ine . Ndafungula pamaso pako msuwo wakuchimwanika kufiingwa na munthu na mbodzi ene . 
66003009	Kulonga pya gulu ya Satana , anyakunama ale , ambalonga kuti mba Ayuda , kwache iwo si Ayuda tayu , ndinadzaadzesa kuna iwe mbadzalamba pamaso pako . Iwo onsene anadzapidziwa kuti ine ndimbakufunadi . 
66003010	Podi iwe wakoya matongero anga akuti upirire , inembo ndinadzakukoya mwadidi ndzidzi wa nyatwa unafuna kudza padziko yonsene yapansi dzayesa anthu onsene akukhala mwenemo . 
66003011	Ndikudza chinchino pano . Koya mwadidi pina iwe towera paleke khala mbodzi wakudzakubera mfupo wakuonesa kukunda kwako . 
66003012	Nyakukunda ndinadzamchitisa kukhala mzati m'Nyumba ya Mulungu wanga , iyembo nkhabe dzabulukamo tayu . Pana iye ndinadzalembapo dzina ya Mulungu wanga na dzina ya Mzinda wa Mulungu wanga , ule ndi Yerusalemu wachinchino wakutchitha kubulukira kudzulu kuna Mulungu wanga . Ndinadzalemba pontho dzinanga yachinchino pana iye . 
66003013	" Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave pinalonga Mzimu Wakuchena kuna mipingopi !
66003014	" Kuna mngelo wa mpingo wa ku Laodikea umulembere kuti : " Mafala akubulukira kuna nyakuchemerwa Ameni , ule ndi mboni yakukhulupirika na yakuonadi , pontho ndi phata ya pyonsene pidalenga Mulungu mbawa :
66003015	Mabasako ndikuadziwa . Ndikupidziwa kuti si iwe wakutonthola penu wakupisa tayu . Mbudakhala wakutonthola penu wakupisa mbapidakhala pyadidi . 
66003016	Ndinati ndikuphule m'kanwa mwanga thangwi ndiwe wabebebe basi , mbukhonda khala wakutonthola penu wakupisa . 
66003017	Iwe umbalonga kuti , ' Ndine wakufuma ; ndina pinthu pizinji , pontho ine nkhabe sowa chinthu tayu . ' Kwache iwe nkhabe dziwa tayu kuti ndiwe wadzedze na wakutsukwalisa ! Ndiwe wakutcherenga , boliboli pontho wachipezipezi . 
66003018	Ndikukupanga kuti ugule kuna ine golidi wakucheneswa na moto , towera ukhale wakufuma . Ugule pontho nguwo zakuchena kuna ine kuti uvale mbubisa upezi wakupasa manyadzo una iwewu . Ugule pontho kuna ine mtombwe wa m'maso towera ukwanise kuona . 
66003019	Anthu onsene a pamtima panga ndimbaalongera mbandiatchunyusa . Tenepo uleke pyakudawa pyako kubulukira pansi pa mtimako . 
66003020	Yang'ana ! Ndaimira pamsuwo pano kudidimiza . Ngakhala unango anava falanga mbafungula msuwo , ine ndinadzapita mwenemo mbandidya naye pabodzi iyembo mbadya na ine . 
66003021	Kuna nyakukunda ndinadzampasambo utongi kudzakhala chifupi na ine pampando wanga wachifumu , ninga kukunda kudachita ine mbandikhala chifupi na Baba pampando wache wachifumu . 
66003022	" Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave pinalonga Mzimu Wakuchena kuna mipingopi ! "
66004001	Kubuluka penepa ndidaona masomphenya mbandiona msuwo wakufunguka kudzulu . Fala idava ine pakutoma pale kulonga na ine ninga kulira kwa ngoma ile , idaveka pontho kuti , " Bwera kudzulu kuno . Ndinadzakuonesa pinafuna dzachitika , penepi pingamala . "
66004002	Kabodzinakabodzi ndidagudumirwa na Mzimu Wakuchena , tenepo ndidaona mpando wachifumu kudzulu wakukhalirwa na munthu . 
66004003	Nyakukhala pampando ule akhali na makhaliro akuyetima ninga miyala yakudula yakuchemerwa yasipi na korinali . Mpando wachifumu ule udazungulirwa na taleza wakuoneka ninga mwala wakuyetimira wakuchemerwa samarada . 
66004004	Kuzungulira mpando wachifumu onthowo pakhali mipando inango yachifumu makumawiri na minayi . Pamipando pale padakhalirwa na akuluakulu makumawiri na anayi . Iwo adavala nguwo zakuchena na pipewu pyachifiimu pya golidi mumsolo mwawo . 
66004005	Kubulukira kumpando wachifumu ule mukhabuluka kuchetuma kwa njazi , pontho mungu na kuguma kwa chiphaliwali . Patsogolo pa mpando wachifumu ule pakhali ntsakali zinomwe , zile ndi mizimu minomwe ya Mulungu . 
66004006	Patsogolo pa mpando wachifumu ponthopo pakhaoneka ninga pakhali nyanza yakuoneka ninga gilazi yakuyetima ninga mwala wakuchemerwa khulustali . Kuzungulira mpando wachifumu pale , pakati na pakati kukhundu zache zinayi , pakhali pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pyakukhala na maso uku na uku , kutsogolo na kunduli kwene . 
66004007	Chakutoma chidaoneka ninga nkhalamu , chachiwiri chidaoneka ninga ng'ombe imuna , chachitatu chikhali na nkhope ninga ya munthu ; pontho chachinayi chidaoneka ninga gokomola wakumbuluka . 
66004008	Pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayipi chibodzichibodzi pikhali na maphaphido matanthatu , pontho maphaphidowo adadzala na maso kunja na m'bwalo mwene . Mosiku na masikati ipyo pimbaimba mwakukhonda lekeza kuti , " Wakuchena , wakuchena , wakuchena ndi Mbuya Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene , ule akhalipo kale , alipo chinchino , pontho anadzakhalapo kwenda na kwenda . "
66004009	Ndzidzi onsene ukhapereka pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile demelero , chilemedzo na takhuta kuna nyakukhala pampando wachifumu , ule ana moyo kwenda na kwenda , 
66004010	akuluakulu makumawiri na anayi ale akhapiponya pansi patsogolo pa nyakukhala pampando wachifumu ule mbampembedza iye wakukhala na moyo kwenda na kwenda ule . Iwo ambaponya pansi pipewu pyawo pyachifumu patsogolo pampando wachifiimu ule mbalonga mbati , 
66004011	" Mbuya Mulungu wathu ! Ndimwe wakuthema kutambira demelero , chilemedzo na mphamvu . Thangwi ndimwe mudalenga pinthu pyonsene , pontho na kufuna kwanu pyonsene pidalengwa mbapikhalapo . "
66005001	Ndidaona mpukutu kudzanja yamadyo ya nyakukhala pampando wachifumu ule . Mpukutu ule ukhali na pyakulembwa khundu zonsene ziwiri mbumyatirirwa na pyakumyatira pinomwe . 
66005002	Ndidaona mngelo wamphamvu akuvunza mwakugaluza fala mbati , " Mbani athema kukanandula pyakumyatira kufungula mpukutuwu ? "
66005003	Mbwenye kudzulu , penu padziko yapansi na dziko ya pansi pamataka pakhali nkhabe munthu na mbodzi ene wakukwanisa kufungula mpukutu ule mbayang'ana m'bwalo mwache tayu . 
66005004	Ndidalira pikulu pene thangwi pakhali nkhabe munthu na mbodzi ene wakuthema kufungula mpukutu ule mbayang'ana m'bwalo mwache . 
66005005	Natenepo mbodzi wa akuluakulu ale adalonga kuna ine mbati , " Leka kulira . Yang'ana ! Nkhalamu yakubulukira kudzinza ya Yuda , Chidzukulu cha Davite , nyakukunda ule , ndiye anakwanisa kukanandula pyakumyatira pinomwepi mbafungula mpukutuwo . "
66005006	Penepo ndidaona Mwanabira aimira pakati na pakati pampando wachifumu wakuzungulirwa na pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pontho na akuluakulu . Mwanabira adaoneka ninga akhadaphiwa . Akhali na nyanga zinomwe , pontho maso manomwe , yeneyi ndi mizimu minomwe ya Mulungu yakutumizwa padziko yonsene yapansi . 
66005007	Mwanabira adenda mbakakwata mpukutu ukhali m'dzanja yamadyo ya nyakukhala pampando wachifumu ule . 
66005008	Pidachita iye tenepo , pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile pabodzi na akuluakulu makumawiri na anayi ale adalamba pamaso pa Mwanabira . Onsene akhali na nyakatangale na ndilo za golidi zakudzala na pyakununkhira , pile nkhupemphera kwa anthu a Mulungu . 
66005009	Iwo adaimba nyimbo yachinchino mbati , " Ndimwe mwathema kukwata mpukutu mbamukanandula pyakumyatira pyache kuufungula . Thangwi imwe mudaphiwa , tenepo na imfanu ninga nsembe mudagulira Mulungu anthu a madzinza , malongero , madziko na mitundu yonsene . 
66005010	Imwe mwaachitisa kukhala dzinza yachifumu , pontho anyansembe kuphatira basa Mulungu wathu , pontho iwo anadzatonga padziko yapansi . "
66005011	Ndidayang'ana pontho mbandiva angelo pikwipikwi , chimwinji chokhonda lengeseka ! Iwo adaimira mwakuzungulira mpando wachifumu , pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile na akuluakulu ale
66005012	mbaimba mwakugaluza fala mbati , " Mwanabira akhadaphiwa ule athema kutambira mphamvu , mfuma , nzeru , mboko , chilemedzo , demelero na ukulu ! "
66005013	Penepo ndidava pyakulengwa pyonsene pyakudzulu , pya dziko yapansi , pya dziko ya pansi pamataka na pya m'bara — pyakulengwa pyonsene pyamoyo pikhaimba kuti : " Kuna nyakukhala pampando wachifumu , pontho na kuna Mwanabira kukhale ukulu , chilemedzo , demelero na mphamvu kwenda na kwenda ! "
66005014	Pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile pidatawira kuti , " Ameni ! " Penepo akuluakulu ale adalamba mbapembedza . 
66006001	Tenepo ndidaona Mwanabira akukanandula chakumyatira chakutoma , pontho ndidava fala ya chibodzi cha pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile kulonga ninga chiphaliwali kuti , " Bwera ! "
66006002	Ndidayang'ana mbandionapo kavalo wakuchena . Nyakupakira kavalo ule akhaphatira uta . Iye adapaswa chipewu chachifumu , tenepo adabuluka mbaenda ninga nyakukunda kwenda kakunda . 
66006003	Kubuluka penepo Mwanabira adakanandula chakumyatira chachiwiri ; ndidava chakulengwa chamoyo chachiwiri kulonga kuti , " Bwera ! "
66006004	Kavalo unango adabuluka , weneyu akhali wakufira . Nyakupakira kavalo weneyu adapaswa mphamvu zakubulusa mtendere padziko yapansi , towera anthu achekane . Iye adapaswa talasada ikulu . 
66006005	Tenepo Mwanabira adakanandula chakumyatira chachitatu ; penepo ndidava chakulengwa chamoyo chachitatu chile kulonga kuti , " Bwera ! " Ndidayang'ana mbandiona kavalo wakuswipa . Nyakumpakira adaphatira mdida wakuyesera kulemera kwa pinthu m'manja mwache . 
66006006	Ndidava chinango chakuveka ninga fala pakati pa pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile kulonga kuti , " Mdida ubodzi wa tirigu ngwakupagalwi munthu angaphata basa pansiku , pontho midida mitatu ya barele njakupagalwi munthu angaphata basa pansiku , kwache lekani vunga mafuta aolivi na vinyu ! "
66006007	Pidakanandula Mwanabira chakumyatira chinayi ndidava fala ya chakulengwa chamoyo chachinayi chile kulonga kuti , " Bwera ! "
66006008	Ndidayang'ana mbandiona kavalo wakuchenerera . Nyakumpakira dzinache akhali imfa , pontho m'nduli mwache akhatewerwa na Hade . Onsene uwiriawo adapaswa utongi pa khundu ibodzi mwa makhundu manayi a padziko yapansi kuti aphe anthu na nkhondo , njala , mliri , pontho na nyama zantsanga . 
66006009	Pidakanandula Mwanabira chakumyatira chachishanu ndidaona mizimu ya anthu kunsi kwa guwa ya nsembe , ale adaphiwa thangwi ya kulalika mafala a Mulungu pontho na umboni udachita iwo . 
66006010	Iwo adakhuwa mwakugaluza fala mbati , " Mbuya Wamphamvu zonsene , wakuchena na wakuonadi ! Munadikhira kufikirana lini kukhonda tonga mseru anthu akukhala pansi pano kubwezera chiropa chathu ? "
66006011	Penepo munthu onsene wa iwo adapaswa mkanjo wakuchena mbapangwa kuti abange puma pang'ono kufikirana konta yamumphu ya anyabasa anzawo na abale ale adathema kuphiwa ninga iwo ikwane . 
66006012	Tenepo ndidaona Mwanabira akukanandula chakumyatira chachitanthatu . Chiteketeke chikulu chidachitika . Dzuwa idasanduka yakuswipa ninga nguwo yalopa , pontho mwezi udasanduka wakufira monsene mwene ninga chiropa . 
66006013	Nyenyezi zonsene zakuthambo zidatchodoka mbazigwa pansi ninga kutchodoka kumbachita nkhuyu ziwisi muti ungatekenyeka na mphepo ikulu . 
66006014	Thambo idakununduka ninga kufunywa kwa mpukutu . Mapiri na ntchuwa pidabuluka m'mbuto mwapyo . 
66006015	Kubuluka penepo mafumu a padziko yapansi , atongi na akadamu ankhondo , anyakufuma , anyamphamvu na anthu anango onsene , mabitchu na atumbe , adabisala m'madzimba na m'miyala ya m'mapiri . 
66006016	Iwo adakhuwa kuna mapiri na kuna miyala mbati , " Tigwereni mutibise kuti tileke kuoniwa na nyakukhala pampando wachifumu , pontho kuti tibisike gopa ukali wa Mwanabira !
66006017	Thangwi nsiku ya kugoswa ya kutchunyuswa kwawo ili pano , mbani , mphapo , anakwanisa kuwangisira ? "
66007001	Kubuluka penepo ndidaona angelo anayi aimira kunkhomo zinayi za dziko yapansi . Adaphata mphepo zonsene zinayi kuti zileke kumenya dziko yapansi , bara penu pamiti . 
66007002	Ndidaona mngelo unango akudza kubulukira kumabulukiro dzuwa na chidindo cha Mulungu wamoyo . Iye adachemera mwakugaluza fala angelo anayi ale akhadapasa Mulungu mphamvu zakuvunga nazo dziko yapansi na bara . 
66007003	Mngelo ule adalonga mbati , " Lekani vunga dziko yapansi , bara , penu miti kufikirana tidzadinde anyabasa a Mulungu wathu papipumu pawo . "
66007004	Ndidapangwa kuti konta ya anthu adindwa chidindo cha Mulungu papipumu pawo ale ikhali pikwi dzana na makumanayi na pinayi . Akhali akubulukira madzinza onsene khumi na awiri a Israele .
