66007014	Ndidamtawira kuti , " Munapidziwa ndimwe , Mbuya . " Tenepo iye adalonga kuna ine mbati , " Enewa ngale apulumuka kuna kusanyika kukulu kudaona iwo kule . Iwo afula mikanjo yawo mbapichenesa m'chiropa cha Mwanabira . "
66007015	Ndi thangwi yache iwo ali patsogolo pampando wachifumu wa Mulungu mbamtumikira mosiku na masikati m'Nyumba ya Mulungu . Nyakukhala pampando wachifumu ule anadzakhala nawo mbaakoya mwadidi . 
66007016	Iwo nkhabeve dzava njala na nyota tayu . Nee dzuwa , penu mbebe unafuna dzaavula enewa tayu , 
66007017	thangwi Mwanabira wakukhala pakati na pakati pampando wachifumu anadzakhala makabuswawo mbadzaatsogolera kumphuno za madzi akupasa moyo . Mulungu anadzaapukuta misozi yonsene m'maso mwawo . 
66008001	Pidakanandula Mwanabira chakumyatira chachinomwe kudzulu kukhali kumatama chifupi mphindi makumatatu . 
66008002	Tenepo ndidaona angelo anomwe akuimira pamaso pa Mulungu . Iwo adapaswa ngoma zinomwe . 
66008003	Mngelo unango ule akhali na chakufukizira pyakununkhira cha golidi adadza mbaimira paguwa ya nsembe . Iye adapaswa pyakununkhira pizinji kuti athimizire pa kupemphera kwa anthu onsene a Mulungu , nakuti pontho apipereke nsembe paguwa ya golidi ikhali patsogolo pampando wachifumu ile . 
66008004	Utsi wa pyakununkhira pyakuotchiwa udakwira kudzulu pabodzi na kupemphera kwa anthu a Mulungu kubulukira m'manja mwa mngelo wakuimira pamaso pa Mulungu . 
66008005	Tenepo angelo adathukula chakufukizira pyakununkhira mbachidzaza na moto wakubulukira paguwa mbachiponyera padziko yapansi . Penepo pakhali mungu na kuguma kwa chiphaliwali , kuchetuma kwa njazi na chiteketeke . 
66008006	Tenepo angelo anomwe akhali na ngoma zinomwe ale adasasanyika kuti azilize . 
66008007	Mngelo wakutoma adaliza ngomache . Tenepo padadza matalala na moto wakuvungazikana na chiropa mbapiponyerwa padziko yapansi . Khundu ibodzi ya makhundu matatu a dziko yapansi idapiswa , konta ibodzi ya makonta matatu a miti idapiswa , na mpovu ene udapiswambo . 
66008008	Tenepo mngelo wachiwiri adalizambo ngomache . Chinthu chinango chakuoneka ninga phiri ikulu yakuyerima moto chidaponywa m'bara . Khundu ibodzi ya makhundu matatu a bara idasanduka chiropa , 
66008009	konta ibodzi ya makonta matatu a pinthu pyamoyo pya m'bara pidafa , pontho konta ibodzi ya makonta matatu a miyadiya mikulumikulu idavungika . 
66008010	Tenepo mngelo wachitatu adaliza ngomache . Kubulukira kudzulu nyenyezi ikulu yakugaka ninga ntsakali idagwera pakhundu ibodzi ya makhundu matatu a mikulo na mphuno za madzi . 
66008011	Dzina ya nyenyezi yeneyi ndi Kuwawa . Khundu ibodzi ya makhundu matatu a madzi ale adawawa , pontho anthu azinji adafa pidamwa iwo madzi enewo thangwi akhadasanduka akuwawa . 
66008012	Tenepo mngelo wachinayi adaliza ngomache . Khundu ibodzi ya makhundu matatu a dzuwa , mwezi na ya nyenyezi zidamenywa , natenepo khundu ibodzi ya makhundu matatu a pyonsenepyo pidaswipa ; khundu yachitatu ya masikati na khundu yachitatu ya mosiku pakhali nkhabe cheza . 
66008013	Tenepo ndidayang'ana mbandiona gokomola akumbuluka kutali chidzuludzulu mbandimva akulonga mwakugaluza fala kuti , " Dzedze ! Dzedze ! Dzedze kuna anthu akukhala padziko yapansi , thangwi ya kulira kwa ngoma zinango zitatu zathema kuliza angelo anango atatu ale ! "
66009001	Tenepo mngelo wachishanu adaliza ngomache . Ndidaona nyenyezi , ile ikhadagwa padziko yapansi , tenepo idapaswa mfungulo wakufungula nawo Chiphompho chikulu .
66009002	Nyenyezi ile idafungula chiphompho chikulu chile , tenepo utsi udabuluka kweneko ninga utsi wakubulukira kudzenje ikulu yakunyungulusira utale . Dzuwa na thambo pidaswipiswa na utsi wakubulukira kuchiphompho chikuluchi . 
66009003	Nyadzombe adabuluka muutsi mule mbaphamira padziko yapansi . Nyadzombe weneyu adapaswa mphamvu sasawa na mphamvu za akong'a
66009004	mbapangwa kuti aleke vunga miti penu udzu na mbewu zinango zene tayu , mbwenye akwanise kuboneresa anthu akusowa chidindo cha Mulungu papipumu pawo . 
66009005	Nyadzombe hadatawiriswe kupha anthu ale tayu , mbwenye kuasanyisa miyezi mishanu . Kuva kwache kupha kwakhala ninga kupha kumbava munthu angalumwa na kong'a . 
66009006	Nsiku zenezo iwo anadzasakasaka imfa , kwache nkhabe dzaigumana tayu . Anadzafuna kuti afe , mbwenye imfa inadzaathawa . 
66009007	Nyadzombe weneyu akhaoneka ninga akavalo akusasanyika kamenya nkhondo . Pamsolo pache pakhali pinthu pyakuoneka ninga pipewu pyachifiimu pya golidi , nkhope yache mbikhala ninga nkhope za anthu . 
66009008	Tsitsi yache ikhali ninga tsitsi ya akazi , mano ache akhali ninga mano a nkhalamu . 
66009009	Anyakaditi ache adagudumirwa na chinthu chakuoneka ninga mayala a utale akutchinjiriza nawo panyakaditi . Mungu wakubuluka m'maphaphido mwache ukhaveka ninga mungu wa akavalo azinji akuthamangira kunkhondo . 
66009010	Nyadzombeyi akhali na michira na mbolera ninga ya akong'a . Mphamvu yakukuwaza nayo anthu miyezi mishanu ikhali kumichirache . 
66009011	Iye ana mfumu wakuatonga , ule ndi mngelo wakutonga chiphompho chikulu . M'Chiheberi dzinache ndi Abadoni ; m'Chigriki dzinache ndi Apolioni kulonga kuti Nyakuvunga . 
66009012	Dzedze yakutoma yagwanda , kwache pasala awiri kuti adze . 
66009013	Tenepo mngelo wachitanthatu adaliza ngomache . Ndidava fala yakubulukira kunkhomo zinayi za guwa yansembe ya golidi ikhali pamaso pa Mulungu ile . 
66009014	Fala idalonga kuna mngelo wachitanthatu ule kuti , " Sudzula angelo anayi amangwa pamkulo ukulu wa Firate ! "
66009015	Angelo anayi adasudzulwa ; iwo adasasanyika kale kuti aphe konta ibodzi ya makonta matatu a anthu a padziko yapansi paora yonthoyonthoyi ya nsiku yonthoyo ya mwezi onthowo na chaka chonthochi . 
66009016	Ndidapangwa konta ya anyankhondo akupakira akavalo ale kuti akhalipo chikwi cha pikwi madzana mawiri . 
66009017	M'masomphenya mwanga ndidaona akavalo na anyakuapakirache . Iwo akhali na mayala a utale akutchinjiriza nawo pagangafuwa pawo akufira ninga moto , a choza ninga thambo , na akhare ninga sulufule . Misolo ya akavalo ikhali ninga nkhalamu , pontho m'kanwa mwawo mudabuluka moto , utsi na sulufule . 
66009018	Konta ibodzi mwa makonta matatu a anthu a padziko yapansi adaphiwa na miliri mitatuyi : moto , utsi na sulufule wakubulukira m'kanwa mwa akavalo . 
66009019	Thangwi mphamvu ya akavalo ili m'kanwa mwawo na kumichira kwa wo . Michirawo ikhali na misolo ninga wa nyoka mbaiphatisa basa kukuwaza nayo anthu . 
66009020	Anthu anango onsene a padziko yapansi , ale adasala okhonda phiwa na miliri ile , hadaleke pyakudawa pyawo pakupembedza pidasasanya iwo na manjawo tayu . Iwo hadaleke kupembedza mizimu yakuipa , pontho mifanikizo ya golidi , siliva , mkuwa , miyala na miti , pinthu pile nkhabe kwanisa kuona , kuva penu kufamba tayu . 
66009021	Iwo hadaleke pyakudawa pyawo kuchita pyaupandu , pyamatsenga , pyakuzuda na kuba tayu . 
66010001	Tenepo ndidaona mngelo unango wamphamvu akutchitha kubulukira kudzulu . Iye adakukutizwa na makole , taleza mbazungulira kumsolo kwache ; nkhope yache ikhali ninga dzuwa , pontho miyendo yache ikhali ninga mizati ya moto . 
66010002	Iye adaphatira mpukutu ung'ono wakufungula m'manja mwache . Adapondesa dzinyalo yache yamadyo pabara mbapondesa dzinyalo yache yamabzere pamtunda , 
66010003	mbachemera mwakugaluza fala kule kudaveka ninga kubangula kwa nkhalamu . Pidamala iye kuchemera piphaliwali pinomwe pidatawira na kuguma . 
66010004	Si ndzidzi pidaguma piphaliwali pile , inembo ndikhali chifupi kulemba . Mbwenye ndidava fala yakubulukira kudzulu kulonga kuti , " Bisa , pontho leka lemba pinalonga piphaliwali pinomwepi . "
66010005	Tenepo mngelo adaona ine apondesa mwendo ubodzi pabara pontho mwendo unango pamtunda ule , adakwiza mkono wache wamadyo m'dzulu
66010006	mbadumbira na dzina ya Mulungu , nyakukhala na kukhala , ule adalenga kudzulu , dziko yapansi na bara na pyonsene pili mwenemo . Mngelo adalonga mbati , " Nkhabeve dzadembuka tayu !
66010007	Mbwenye mngelo wachinomwe angaliza ngomache , penepo manyerezero akubisika a Mulungu anadzakwanakwana ninga mukhadalongera iye kuna anyabasache , maprofeti . "
66010008	Tenepo fala idava ine kulonga kubulukira kudzulu pakutoma ile idalonga pontho kuna ine kuti , " Ndoko kakwate mpukutu wakufungulwa waphatira mngelo wakuponda pabara na pamtunda pene ule . "
66010009	Ndidenda kuna mngelo ule mbandikampempha kuti andipase mpukutu ung'ono ule . Adandipanga mbati , " Kwata uudye ; iwo unadzasanduka wakuwawa m'chifu mwako , mbwenye unadzakhala wakutapira ninga uchi m'kanwa mwako . " Ndidakwata mpukutu ule kubulukira m'manja mwache mbandiudya , iwo ukhali wakutapira ninga uchi m'kanwa mwanga , mbwenye pidamala ine kuudya , udasanduka wakuwawa m'chifu mwanga . 
66010010	
66010011	Tenepo ndidapangwa kuti , " Iwe wathema kulonga pontho mphangwa za kubulukira kuna Mulungu zakulonga pya madzinza , mitundu , pilongero na mafumu . "
66011001	Ndidapaswa kamtete kale kadaoneka ninga nthondodzo wakuyesa nawo . Ndidapangwa kuti , " Ndoko ukayese Nyumba ya Mulungu na guwa ya nsembe , pontho ukalengese onsene anapembedza m'Nyumba ya Mulungumo . 
66011002	Kwache leka kayesa chintalo cha Nyumbayo , thangwi ntchakuperekwa kuna madzinza okhonda dziwa Mulungu , ale anadzapondedza Mzinda Wakuchena miyezi makumanayi na miwiri . 
66011003	Ndinadzatumiza mboni zanga ziwiri zakuvala masakha . Iwo anadzalonga mphangwa za kubulukira kuna Mulungu pansiku chikwi na madzana mawiri na makumatanthatu . "
66011004	Mboni ziwiri ndi miti miwiri ya Olivi na nyale ziwiri zakuimira pamaso pa Mbuya wa dziko yapansi . 
66011005	Ngakhala unango anadzayesera kuakuwaza , moto unabuluka m'kanwa mwa mboni ziwiri zile kudzavunga anyamalwawo . Natenepo onsene anyakuyesera kuakuwaza , anadzaphiwa . 
66011006	Enewa ana utongi wakufunga kuthambo , towera kuleke dzakhala mvula pandzidzi unafuna iwo dzalonga mphangwa za kubulukira kuna Mulungu . Iwo pontho ali nawo utongi wakusanduza madzi kukhala chiropa . Iwo pontho ana utongi wakuvunga dziko yapansi na miliri yakulekanalekana pandzidzi unafuna iwo . 
66011007	Angadzamala lalika mphangwa zawo , chirombo chakubulukira kuchiphompho chikulu chinadzamenyana nawo . Chirombocho chinadzaakunda mbadzaapha . 
66011008	Mitembo yawo inadzagona m'njira ya mzinda ukulu , kule kudakhomerwa Mbuyawo pamtanda . Mzinda wenewu dzinache mwakuphiphirisa umbadziwika na Sodomu , penu Iguputo . 
66011009	Anthu a madziko , madzinza , mitundu na pilongero pyonsene padziko yapansi anadzaona mitembo yawo pansiku zitatu na theka ya nsiku , pontho iwo nkhabe dzatawirisa kuikha mitemboyo m'masiye tayu . 
66011010	Anthu a padziko yapansi anadzakomerwa pyakwanga na kuia kwa anthu awiriwa . Anadzatsanzaya mbadzatumizirana unango na mwanzache mitukwa , thangwi maprofeti enewa akhaonesa anthu a padziko yapansi nyatwa ikulu . 
66011011	Pidagwanda nsiku zitatu na theka , muya wakupasa moyo udadza mbudzapita muna iwo kubulukira kuna Mulungu . Natenepo maprofeti awiri akufa ale , adaimira dzololo . Anthu onsene adaaonawo , adagoswera pikulu . 
66011012	Maprofeti ale adava fala yakugaluza kubulukira kudzulu kuapanga kuti , " Bwerani kudzulu kuno ! " Iwo adendadi kudzulu na makole , anyamalwawo mbali kuaona . 
66011013	Pandzidzi onthowo padachitika chiteketeke chikulu . Khundu ibodzi ya makhundu khumi a mzinda ule idagwa . Anthu pikwi pinomwe adaphiwa na chiteketeke . Anyakusalira na moyo adagoswera mbakuza Mulungu wa kudzulu . 
66011014	Dzedze yachiwiri yagwanda , kwache yachitatu inati idze chinchino pano . 
66011015	Kubuluka penepo mngelo wachinomwe adaliza ngomache . Kudzulu kudaveka mafala akugaluza kulonga kuti , " Mphamvu zakutonga nazo dziko yapansi nsa Mbuyathu na Khristu wache wakusankhulika . Iye anadzatonga kwenda na kwenda ! "
66011016	Akuluakulu makumawiri na anayi akukhala pamipando yawo yachifumu pamaso pa Mulungu ale , adalamba mbapembedza Mulungu
66011017	mbalonga mbati , " Mbuya Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene , ule alipo chinchino , na ule akhalipo kale ! Tinapereka takhuta kuna imwe thangwi mwakwata mphamvu yanu ikulu mbamutoma kutonga ! Madzinza okhonda dziwa Mulungu adadzazwa na ukali , thangwi wafika ndzidzi wakupangiza ukali wanu , ndzidzi wafika wakutonga mseru anthu akufa . Ndzidzi wafika wakuti mupase mfupo anyabasanu , maprofeti , pontho anthu anu , onsene ambakugopani ale , ang'ono na akulu ene . Ndzidzi wafika wakuti muvunge anyakuvunga dziko yapansi ! "
66011018	
66011019	Nyumba ya Mulungu kudzulu idafungulwa , pontho Bokosi ya Chiverano idaoniwa mwenemo . Penepo padachitika kuchetuma kwa njazi , mungu na kuguma kwa chiphaliwali , pontho chiteketeke mbapagwa matalala amphamvu . 
66012001	Tenepo kudzulu kudaoneka chidziwiso chikulu chakudodomesa : pakhali mkazi wakuvala dzuwa , mwezi mbukhala pansi pa manyalo pache na chipewu chachifumu cha nyenyezi khumi na ziwiri kumsolo kwache . 
66012002	Iye akhali chifupi kubala mbalira na mtswotswo wa kubalako . 
66012003	Chidziwiso chinango chidaoneka kuthambo . Padaoneka nthonga ikulu yakufira yakukhala na misolo minomwe , nyanga khumi na chipewu chachifumu m'misolo yonsene minomwe . 
66012004	Chidagwinya khundu ibodzi ya makhundu matatu a nyenyezi zakudzulu na mchirache mbaziponyera padziko yapansi . Chidaimira patsogolo pamkazi kuti amdyere mwanache si ndzidzi nkhumbala . 
66012005	Tenepo adabala mwana wamamuna , ule anadzatonga madzinza onsene na nthondodzo wachisimbi . Mbwenye mwana ule adagonkhwa mbayendeswa kuna Mulungu , pontho kumpando wache wachifumu . 
66012006	Mkazi ule adathawira kuthando kule kudamsasanyira kale Mulungu mbuto yache kuti akakoyiwe mwadidi nsiku chikwi na madzana mawiri na makumatanthatu . 
66012007	Tenepo nkhondo idagundika kudzulu . Mikaeli na angelo ache adamenyana na nthonga ile — nthonga idamenyambo na angelo ache , 
66012008	mbwenye nthonga idakundwa . Tenepo icho pabodzi na angelo ache hadatawirisweve kukhala m'mbuto zawo kudzulu tayu . 
66012009	Nthonga ikulu idaponyerwa kunja — nyoka yakale ile yakuchemerwa Nyakuipa , penu Satana . Nthonga yeneyi idanyengeza anthu a padziko yonsene yapansi . Yeneyi pabodzi na angelo ache adaponyerwa padziko yapansi . 
66012010	Kubuluka penepo ndidava pontho fala yakugaluza kubulukira kudzulu kulonga kuti , " Chinchino chipulumuso cha Mulungu chafika ! Chinchino Mulungu aonesadi mphamvu zache ninga mfumu ! Chinchino Nyankhombo adasankhula iye kukhala Mfumu aonesadi utongi wache . Thangwi nyakupangirira abale athu pamaso pa Mulungu wathu mosiku na masikati ule , aponywa padziko yapansi . 
66012011	Abale athu adamkunda na chiropa cha Mwanabira , pontho na umboni udachita iwo ; iwo adapipereka okha ene kufa okhonda ikha konta kutaya moyo wawo . 
66012012	Natenepo kudzulu na anthu onsene akukhala kweneko mbakomerwe ! Mbwenye dzedze kuna dziko yapansi na bara ! Thangwi Satana atchithira kuna imwe . Iye ngwakudzala na ukali thangwi akupidziwa kuti ndzidzi wache wasala pang'ono basi . "
66012013	Pidaona nthonga ile kuti yaponywa padziko yapansi , idatoma kuthamangisa mkazi adabala mwana wamamuna ule . 
66012014	Mkazi ule adapaswa maphaphido mawiri a chigokomola chikulu kuti akwanise kuthawira kumbuto yache kuthando kule kunafuna iye dzakoyiwa mwadidi pyaka pitatu na theka gopesera kuphatwa na nthonga ile . 
66012015	Tenepo nthonga ile idapaira madzi makulu m'nduli mwa mkazi ule , towera akukulule mkazi ule . 
66012016	Mbwenye dziko yapansi idaphedza mkazi ule , idayashamula kukanwa kwache mbakhudyula madzi makulu adapaira nthonga ile . 
66012017	Nthonga ile idazhangali nave mkazi ule mbienda kamenyana na pidzukulu pyache pikhadasala pile . Enewa akhali ale ambavera matongero a Mulungu mbakhala akukhulupirika kuna pyakuonadi pidatchulula Yesu pile . 
66013001	Nthonga ile idenda kaimira m'khundu mwa bara . Kubuluka penepo ndidaona chirombo chikuluthuka kubulukira m'bara . Chikhali na nyanga khumi na misolo minomwe . Nyanga zonsene zidavala chipewu chachifumu chachechache . Pamisolo yonsene pakhali madzina akushola Mulungu . 
66013002	Chirombo chenechi chikhaoneka ninga nyalugwe . Manyalo ache akhali ninga a thika . Kanwa yache ikhali ninga ya nkhalamu . Nthonga ile idapereka kuna chirombo mphamvu zache , mpando wache wachifumu na utongi wache ukulu . 
66013003	Msolo ubodzi wa chirombo ukhaoneka ninga ukhali na njinda , kwache njindacheyo ikhali yakupola kale . Anthu onsene a dziko yonsene yapansi adadodoma mbatewera chirombocho . 
66013004	Munthu onsene adapembedza nthonga , ile ikhapereka utongi wache kuna chirombo . Iwo adapembedza pontho chirombocho mbati , " Mbani akhala sasawa na chirombochi ? Mbani angamenyane nacho chirombochi ? "
66013005	Chirombo chidatawiriswa kulonga mafala akulunkuma pontho akushola Mulungu na kuonesa mphamvu zache miyezi makumanayi na miwiri . 
66013006	Chidagundika kushola Mulungu , kutikana dzinache , mbuto imbakhala iye , pontho na onsene akukhala kudzulu . 
66013007	Chidatawiriswa kumenyana na anthu a Mulungu , pontho kuakunda . Chidapaswa utongi pana anthu a mitundu , madziko , madzinza , na pilongero pyonsene . 
66013008	Anthu onsene akukhala padziko yapansi anadzachipembedza , onsene ale madzinawo hadalembwe tayu m'bukhu ya moyo ya Mwanabira , ule adaphiwa dziko yapansi mbidzati lengwa . 
66013009	Ule ana makutu akuva , mbave !
66013010	Nyakulongwa kuti anadzamangwa , anadzamangwadi . Nyakulongwa kuti anadzaphiwa , anadzaphiwadi . Penepa mphyakufunika kuti anthu a Mulungu achite phinga kupirira mbakhala akukhulupirika . 
66013011	Kubuluka penepo ndidaona chirombo chinango chikubuluka pansi . Chikhali na nyanga ziwiri ninga za Mwanabira , mbachilonga ninga nthonga . 
66013012	Chidaphatisa basa utongi ukulu wa chirombo chakutoma chile pamaso pache mbakakamiza dziko yapansi na pyonsene pili mwenemo kupembedza chirombo chakutoma , chile chikhali na njinda yakupola kale . 
66013013	Chirombo chachiwirichi chidachita pinthu pikulu pyakudodomesa . Chidatchithisa moto padziko yapansi kubulukira kudzulu pamaso pa anthu onsene . 
66013014	Chidanyengeza anthu onsene akukhala padziko yapansi na pyakudodomesa pidatawiriswa icho kuchita pamaso pa chirombo chakutoma chile . Chirombo chidapanga anthu kuti asasanye mfanikizo wakulemedza nawo chirombo chikhadalaswa na talasada , kwache mbachikhala na moyo chile . 
66013015	Chirombo chachiwiri chidatawiriswa kupumira muya muna mfanikizo wa chirombo chakutoma chile , towera mfanikizo ule ukwanise kulonga mbupha anthu onsene anakhonda kuchipembedza . 
66013016	Chirombo chidakakamiza anthu onsene , ang'ono na akulu ene , akufiima na akutcherenga ene , mabitchu na atumbe ene kuti adindwe chidindo m'dzanja yamadyo , penu pachipumu pawo . 
66013017	Nkhabe mbodzi adakwanisa kugula penu kugulisa wakusowa chidindochi , chile ndi dzina ya chirombo , penu konta yakuimira dzina ya chirombochi . 
66013018	Penepa panafunika nzeru . Nyakukhala na udziwisi alengese konta ya chirombocho , thangwi konta yeneyi ikuimira dzina ya munthu . Kontache ndi madzana matanthatu na makumatanthatu na tanthatu . 
66014001	Kubuluka penepo ndidayang'ana mbandiona Mwanabira aimira paphiri ya Zioni . Pabodzi na iye akhali anthu pikwi dzana na makumanayi na pinayi . Enewa mbanthu akukhala na chidindo cha dzina ya Mwanabira , pontho na dzina ya Babache papipumu pawo . 
66014002	Ndidava fala yakubulukira kudzulu yakuveka ninga kukuka kwa madzi pamatiti , pontho ninga kuguma kwa chiphaliwali . Idaveka ninga nyimbo zakuimbwa na anyakuimba anyakatangale . 
66014003	Anthu ale adaimba nyimbo yachinchino patsogolo pampando wachifumu , pontho pamaso pa pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi na akuluakulu . Nkhabe na mbodzi ene adakwanisa kufunza nyimboyo kupambula anthu pikwi dzana na makumanayi na pinayi , adaombolwa pakati pa anthu onsene ale . 
66014004	Enewa akhali amuna ale adakhonda kupiipisa okha ene na akazi ; iwo akhakhala ninga amiyali okhonda dziwa mamuna . Ambatewera Mwanabira konsene kunaenda iye . Iwo adaombolwa pakati pa anthu onsene mbaperekwa ninga pyakuvuna pyakutoma kuna Mulungu na kuna Mwanabira . 
66014005	Iwo hadagumanwa akulonga chakunama na chibodzi chene tayu , pontho nkhabe chinthu chakuapokonya tayu . 
66014006	Kubuluka penepo ndidaona mngelo unango akumbuluka m'dzuludzulu na Mphangwa Zadidi zokhonda mala kuzilalika kuna anthu a padziko yapansi , anthu a mitundu , madziko , madzinza na pilongero pyonsene . 
66014007	Adalonga mwakugaluza fala mbati , " Gopani Mulungu na kukuza ukulu wache ! Thangwi ndzidzi wakufika wakuti atonge anthu mseru . Pembedzani iye , nyakulenga kudzulu , dziko yapansi , bara na mphuno za madzi ! "
66014008	M'nduli mwa mngelo wakutoma ule , mngelo wachiwiri adalonga mbati , " Wagwa ! Mzinda wa Babulo ukulu wagwa ! Iye adamwesa madzinza onsene vinyu wakuwawa — vinyu wakuwawa wa pikhumbo pyache pyakuzuda ! "
66014009	M'nduli mwa angelo awiri adatumwa ale , mngelo wachitatu adalonga mwakugaluza fala mbati , " Nyakupembedza chirombo na mfanikizo wache mbatambira chidindo pachipumu pache , penu m'manja mwacheyo
66014010	anadzamwa yekha ene vinyu wa ukali wa Mulungu , vinyuyo adatsanyulira iye na mphamvu zache zonsene m'khomitcho ya ukali wache . Onsene anachita penepi anadzabonereswa na moto pontho sulufule pamaso pa angelo akuchena na Mwanabira . 
66014011	Utsi wa moto wakuaboneresa umbakhala tolotolo kwenda na kwenda . Anyakupembedza chirombo na mfanikizo wache mbakhala na chidindo cha dzinache , nkhabe puma tayu mosiku na masikati . "
66014012	Penepa panafunika kupirira makamaka kuna anthu ache a Mulungu , ale ambakoya matongero a Mulungu mbakhala akukhulupirika kuna Yesu . 
66014013	Tenepo ndidava fala yakubulukira kudzulu kulonga kuti , " Ulembe kuti : Ngakutsanzaya ale kutoma chinchino kwenda m'tsogolo , anafa mbali kuphata basa ya Mbuya ! " Mzimu Wakuchena atawira mbati , " Andedi ! Anadzakomerwa na kupuma kuna mabasawo akuwanga akhaphata iwo , thangwi udidi wa mabasawo anaenda nawo pabodzi pene . "
66014014	Kubuluka penepo ndidayang'ana mbandiona makole akuchena . Pamakolepo padakhala unango wakuoneka ninga munthu . Adavala chipewu chachifumu cha golidi mumsolo mwache . M'manja mwache akhali na chikwakwa chakutwa . 
66014015	Padadza pontho mngelo unango wakubulukira ku Nyumba ya Mulungu mbalonga mwakugaluza fala kuna ule adakhala pamakole mbati , " Phatisa basa chikwakwa chako uvune , thangwi ndzidzi wafika ; pinthu pya padziko yapansi pyatokota kuti pivunwe ! "
66014016	Natenepo ule adakhala pamakole adaphatisa basa chikwakwa chache mbavuna pyonsene pya padziko yapansi . 
66014017	Kubuluka penepo ndidaona mngelo unango akubuluka m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kudzulu , akhali nachombo chikwakwa chache chakutwa . 
66014018	Tenepo mngelo unango wakuyang'anira moto adadza kubulukira paguwa ya nsembe . Iye adakhuwa mwakugaluza fala kuna mngelo akhali na chikwakwa chakutwa ule mbati , " Phatisa basa chikwakwa chako , ugwande mphesa zakubulukira m'minda yamphesa ya padziko yapansi thangwi mphesa zatokota ! "
66014019	Natenepo mngelo adaphatisa basa chikwakwa chache chakutwachile padziko yapansi mbavuna mphesa mbaziponyera pachakutswinyira vinyu chikulu cha ukali wa Mulungu . 
66014020	Mphesa zidafinywa muchakutswinyira vinyu chile kunja kwa mzinda , pontho chiropa chidatayikira kufikirana matanyo pikwi madzana matatu mbachikwira na makhono mawiri . 
66015001	Kubuluka penepo ndidaona chidziwiso chinango chikulu pontho chakudodomesa kuthambo . Ndidaona angelo ana miliri minomwe . Yeneyi ikhali yakumalisa thangwi kweneku kukhali kumalisa kwakuonesa ukali wa Mulungu . 
66015002	Tenepo ndidaona bara yakuoneka ninga gilazi yakuvungazika na moto . Ndidaona pontho ale adakunda chirombo na mfanikizo wache pontho na konta yakuimirira dzinache . Iwo akhaimira m'khundu mwa bara uku aphatira anyakatangale adaapasa Mulungu ale , 
66015003	mbaimba nyimbo ya Mose nyabasa wa Mulungu , pontho na nyimbo ya Mwanabira mbati , " Mbuya Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene , mabasanu ngakulu , pontho ngakudodomesa ! Imwe mfumu ya madzinza , njira zanu nsakulungama pontho zakuonadi !
66015004	Mbuya , mbani anadzakhonda kukugopani , mbakhonda kukuza ukulu wanu ? Wakuchena ndimwe ene basi . Madzinza onsene anadzabwera mbadzapembedza pamaso panu , thangwi pyakuchita pyanu pyakulungama pyaoneka na onsene ! "
66015005	Kubuluka penepo ndidaona Nyumba ya Mulungu yafunguka kudzulu . M'bwalo mwache mukhali Chikhumbi cha umboni wa Mulungu . 
66015006	Angelo anomwe akukhala na miliri minomwe ale adabuluka m'Nyumba ya Mulungu . Adavala nguwo zakuchena zayetiyeti , pontho adamanga mabande a golidi pagangafiiwa pawo . 
66015007	Tenepo chibodzi cha pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile chidapereka kuna angelo anomwe ale ndilo zinomwe za golidi zakudzala na ukali wa Mulungu , ule ngwakukhala na kukhala . 
66015008	Nyumba ya Mulungu idadzala na utsi wakubulukira kuna demelero na mphamvu za Mulungu . Nkhabe mbodzi adakwanisa kapita m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kufikirana miliri minomwe idadza na angelo anomwe ale idamala . 
66016001	Tenepo ndidava fala yakugaluza kulonga kuna angelo anomwe ale kubulukira m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kuti , " Ndoko kakhuthule ndilo zinomwe za ukali wa Mulungu padziko yapansi ! "
66016002	Mngelo wakutoma adenda mbakakhuthula ndilo yache padziko yapansi . Pironda pyakugoswa na pyakupha pidabuluka m'manungo mwa ale akhali na chidindo cha chirombo na mwa ale adapembedza mfanikizo wache . 
66016003	Tenepo mngelo wachiwiri adakhuthulambo ndilo yache pabara . Madzi adasanduka ninga chiropa cha munthu wakufa . Tenepo pinthu pyonsene pyamoyo pidafa m'baramo . 
66016004	Mngelo wachitatu adakhuthula ndilo yache m'mikulo na m'mphuno za madzi ; madzi ache adasanduka chiropa . 
66016005	Ndidava mngelo wakuyang'anira madzi kulonga mbati , " Kutonga mseru kwachita imwe nkhwakulungama . Imwe nyakuchena , ndimwe ule alipo chinchino , pontho ule akhalipo kale !
66016006	Anthu enewa adachuchisa chiropa cha anthu a Mulungu na cha maprofeti , natenepo mwaapasambo chiropa kuti amwe . Tenepo akutambira pyakuthemerana na pidachita iwo . "
66016007	Penepo ndidava fala yakubulukira paguwa ya nsembe kulonga kuti , " Mbuya Mulungu Wamphamvu , zonsene , kutonga kwanu mseru nkhwakuonadi pontho kwakulungama ! "
66016008	Tenepo mngelo wachinayi adakhuthulira ndilo yache padzuwa . Dzuwayo idatawiriswa kuti ipitse anthu na moto wache . 
66016009	Iwo adapitswa na kupitsa kwakugoswa , tenepo anthu ale adatemberera Mulungu , ule ana utongi pamiliri yeneyi . Kwache iwo hadaleka pyakudawa pyawo mbakuza Mulungu tayu . 
66016010	Tenepo mngelo wachishanu adakhuthulira ndilo yache pampando wachifumu wa chirombo . Mdima udagwera ufumu wa chirombo . Anthu adadzadzada malulume awo thangwi ya kuva kwawo kupha . 
66016011	Iwo adatemberera Mulungu wa kudzulu thangwi ya pironda na kuva kwawo kupha . Kwache iwo hadaleka pyakudawa pyawo tayu . 
66016012	Tenepo mngelo wachitanthatu adakhuthulira ndilo yache pamkulo ukulu wa Firate . Mkulo udauma kupereka njira kuna mafumu akubulukira kumabulukiro dzuwa . 
66016013	Tenepo ndidaona mizimu mitatu yakuipa ile idaoneka ninga anyanchidwe . Mizimu yeneyi ikhabulukira m'kanwa mwa nthonga , m'kanwa mwa chirombo na m'kanwa mwa mprofeti wakunama . 
66016014	Yeneyi ndi mizimu mitatu yakuipa , ile imbachita pyakudodomesa . Mizimuyi imbaenda kuna mafumu a padziko yonsene yapansi kugumanyisa mafumu onsene pabodzi kudzamenya nkhondo pa Nsiku ikulu ya Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene . 
66016015	Mbuya akulonga kuti , " Ngavani ! Ndikudza ninga mbava ! Ngwakutsanzaya ule anakhala m'maso mbakoya nguwo zache chifupi na iye , towera akhonde dzafamba chipezipezi mbadzachita napyo manyadzo ! "
66016016	Tenepo mizimu ile idagumanyisa mafumu onsene ale pabodzi pene pambuto yakuchemerwa Aramagedo m'Chiheberi . 
66016017	Kubuluka penepo mngelo wachinomwe adawazira ndilo yache m'dzulu . Fala yakugaluza idaveka kubulukira kumpando wachifumu m'Nyumba ya Mulungu kulonga kuti , " Pyamala ! "
66016018	Pakhali kuchetuma kwa njazi , mungu na kuguma kwa chiphaliwali , pontho chiteketeke chakugoswa . Chipo nkhabe chiteketeke chinango chakukhala ninga chenechi chidachitika kutomera kulengwa kwa munthu tayu ; chenechi chikhali chakugoswa pyakwanga kupiringana pyonsene . 
66016019	Mzinda ukulu udagawikana m'mapindi matatu . Mizindambo ya madziko onsene idavungika . Mulungu adakumbuka mzinda ukulu wa Babulo mbaumwesa vinyu wa m'khomitcho mwache — vinyu wa ukali wache wakugoswa . 
66016020	Ntchuwa zonsene zidabisika ; mapiri onsene adamala fudzika . 
66016021	Matalala akuluakulu , akulemera ninga makilogramu makumashanu ibodzi adagwera anthu kubulukira kudzulu . Tenepo iwo adatemberera Mulungu thangwi ya miliri ya matalalawo , podi miliri ikhali yakugoswa pyakwanga . 
66017001	Mngelo mbodzi mwa angelo anomwe adathukula ndilo zinomwe ale adadza kuna ine mbalonga mbati , " Bwera ndikuonese kutchunyuswa kunafuna dzachitika kuna puta wakuveka , ule ndi mzinda ukulu wakumangwa pakati pa mikulo mizinjiyi . 
66017002	Mafumu a dziko yapansi adachita uputa na mzinda wenewu . Anthu a dziko yapansi adaledzereswa na vinyu wa uputache . "
66017003	Mzimu Wakuchena adandigudumira , mngelo mbandithukula kwenda nane kuthando . Kweneko ndidaonako mkazi akhala pamsana pa chirombo chakufira chile chidalembwa madzina akushola Mulungu m'manungo mwache monsene ; chirombo chenechi chikhali na misolo minomwe na nyanga khumi . 
66017004	Mkazi ule adavala pyachoza na pyakufira mbampsampsirwa na golidi , miyala yakubalika pontho na usanga wakudula . M'manja mwache adaphatirira khomitcho ya golidi yakudzala na pyakuipa na pyakunyansa , pinthu pyauputa pidachita iye pile . 
66017005	Pachipumu pache padalembwa dzina yakuzimbaisa yakulonga kuti , " Babulo , mzinda ukulu iwe , mama wa maputa onsene , pontho wa pyakunyansa pyonsene pya dziko yapansi . "
66017006	Tenepo ndidaona kuti mkaziyo akhadaledzera na chiropa cha anthu a Mulungu , pontho na chiropa cha anthu onsene adaphiwa thangwi ya kukhala akukhulupirika kuna Yesu . Pidaona ine mkazi ule , ndidadodoma pyakwanga . 
66017007	Natenepo mngelo ule adandivunza mbati , " Unadodomeranji ? Ine ndinakutchululira pyakubisika pyache pya mkazi weneyu , na chirombo chapakira iye , chakukhala na misolo minomwe na nyanga khumichi . 
66017008	Chirombo chidaona iwe chile , chikhali na moyo kalene , mbwenye chinchino nkhabeve moyo tayu . Kwache chinadzabuluka kuchiphompho chikulu mbachienda kavungwa . Anthu akukhala padziko yapansi ale madzina adakhonda kulembwa m'bukhu ya moyo kutomera kulengwa kwa dziko yapansi , anadzadodoma angadzachiona chirombochi , chile chikhali na moyo kalene , mbwenye chinchino nkhabeve moyo tayu , kwache chinadzaoneka pontho . 
66017009	" Penepa panafunika nzeru na kuvesa mwadidi . Misolo minomwe ile ndi mapiri manomwe panakhala mkazi ule , pontho enewa ndi mafumu manomwe . 
66017010	Pakati pa mafumu enewa mashanu adagwa , mbodzi akutonga , mbwenye unangoyo hadzatifika tayu . Kwache angadzafika anadzakhala kwene ndzidzi wakuchepa . 
66017011	Mbwenye chirombo chile chikhali na moyo kalene , mbwenye chinchino nkhabeve moyo tayu , chenecho maka ndiye mfumu yachisere . Kwache weneyu ndi mbodzi wa gulu ya mafumu manomwe ale , pontho akwenda kavungwa . 
66017012	" Nyanga khumi zaona iwe zile ndi mafumu khumi , ale hadzati toma kutonga tayu , mbwenye anadzapaswa utongi ninga mafumu pabodzi na chirombo paora ibodzi basi . 
66017013	Chakufuna cha onsene khumiwa ntchibodzi chene , tenepo iwo anadzapasa chirombo mphamvu pabodzi na utongi wawo . 
66017014	Iwo anadzamenya nkhondo na Mwanabira ; kwache Mwanabira pabodzi na anthu ache akuchemerwa , akusankhulwa na anyakumtewera akukhulupirika anadzakunda chirombo thangwi Mwanabira ndi Mbuya wa ambuya , pontho Mfumu wa mafumu . "
66017015	Mngelo adandipanga pontho mbati , " Madzi aona iwe ale , pale pakhala puta , ndi madziko , madzinza , mitundu ya anthu na pilongero pyawo . 
66017016	Nyanga khumi zaona iwe zile pontho chirombo chile pinadzazonda putayo . Anadzampokosera py onsene pina iye mbadzamsiya chipezipezi . Anadzamdya manungo ache mbadzampitsa na moto . 
66017017	Thangwi Mulungu aikha manyerezero mumtima mwawo kuchita pinthu pinafuna iye kuti iwo aphatizane pyakupereka mphamvu zawo zakutonga nazo kuna chirombo kufikirana mafala a Mulungu akwanekwane . 
66017018	" Mkazi aona iwe ule ndi mzinda ukulu ule akutonga mafumu a padziko yapansi . "
66018001	Pidamala penepi ndidaona mngelo unango akutchitha kubulukira kudzulu . Iye akhali na utongi ukulu , pontho cheza chache chidamwinikira dziko yonsene yapansi . 
66018002	Adakhuwa na fala yamphamvu mbati , " Wagwa ! Mzinda ukulu wa Babulo wagwa ! Asanduka mbuto yakukhala mizimu yakuipa , mbuto yakuthawirako mizimu yonsene yakuipa , pontho mbuto zakuthawira mbalame zonsene zakunyansa na zakuipa zene . 
66018003	Thangwi adaledzeresa madzinza onsene a anthu na vinyu wa pyakuzuda pyache . Mafumu onsene a padziko yapansi adachita naye pyauputa . Anyamalonda onsene a padziko yapansi adafuma na madyaidyache akuinjipa . "
66018004	Kubuluka penepo ndidava fala inango yakubulukira kudzulu kulonga kuti , " Imwe anthu anga , bulukanimo mumzindamo , towera muleke kwata khundu pa pyakudawa pyache , pontho towera muleke gwerwa na miliri inaona iyeyo . 
66018005	Thangwi pyakudawa pyache ndi mulu ukulu wakuphata kudzulu , pontho Mulungu akumbuka mabasache akuipa . 
66018006	Mbwezereni pidakuchitanimbo iye ; mbwezereni kawiri papinthu pyonsene pidakuchitirani iye . Mdzazireni kawiri khomitcho yache na vinyu wakuwawa ninga adakusasanyirani iye ule . 
66018007	Msanyiseni na kumchitisa kutsukwala pikulu pene kuthemerana na demelero idapipasa iye yekha ene , pontho na madyaidya akhachita iye . Iye ambadungudza mumtima mwache kuti , ' Ine mfumu , ndakhala pampando ! Si ineve mamfelwa tayu , pontho ine nkhabeve dzasintili tayu . '
66018008	Na thangwi yeneyi nsiku inango iye anadzagwerwa na miliri — utenda , kutsukwala na njala ikulu . Anadzapiswa na moto , thangwi Mbuya Mulungu , nyakumtonga mseru ule , ngwamphamvu zikulu . "
66018009	Mafumu a padziko yapansi adachita naye uputa na madyaidya ale anadzalira na kusintili mzindawu iwo angadzaona utsi wa kupitswa kwa mzindawu . 
66018010	Na mantha na mantha thangwi ya kubonera kunafuna dzachita mzindawu , anadzaimira kutali mbalira mbati , " Dzedze , una dzedze ! Babulo , mzinda ukulu , pontho wamphamvu ! Thangwi watchunyuswa paora ibodzi ene basi ! "
66018011	Anyamalonda a padziko yapansi anadzalira na kusintili mzindawu thangwi nkhabe munthu anagula pontho malondawo —
66018012	malondawo a golidi , siliva , miyala yakudula na usanga , nguwo zakuchena , zachoza , zakufewa , zakufira ; mitundu yonsene ya miti yokhonda onekaoneka , pontho na pinthu pyakusasanywa na nyanga za nzowu , pontho pyakusasanywa na miti yakudula ; na pinthu pyakusasanywa na mkuwa , masimbi na miyala yakubalika ;
66018013	pyakukomesera pyakudya pya mtundu na mtundu , pyakununkhira , mure , libano ; vinyu na mafuta , ufa , pontho tirigu ; ng'ombe na mabira , akavalo na pingolo , mabitchu podi na moyo wa anthu ene . 
66018014	Anyamalonda ale akulonga kuna mzindawu mbati , " Pyakudzipa pikhathanda mtimako pyakumalira . Mfumako na demelero yako konsene kwakumalira , pontho hunadzapigumanave tayu ! "
66018015	Anyamalonda ale adagulisa pinthu penepi mbafuma napyo kubulukira mumzindawu , anadzaimira kutali kugoswerwa na nyatwa inaona mzindawo . Anadzalira na kusintili
66018016	mbati , " Dzedze , una dzedze , Mzinda ukulu ! Ukhavala nguwo zakuchena , zakufira na zachoza , mbupithemesera manungo ako onsene na golidi , miyala yakudula na usanga !
66018017	Mfuma yonseneyi yavungwa paora ibodzi ene basi ! " Akadamu onsene a miyadiya pabara , onsene anyakufamba pamiyadiyayo , anyakuifambisa , na onsene anyakuganyali na barayo anadzaimira kutali . 
66018018	Angadzaona utsi wa kupitswa kwa mzindawo , anadzakhuwa mbati , " Ayi ukhalipo mzinda unango ukulu ninga wenewu ? "
66018019	Anadzakapira fumbi pamsolo pawo mbadzalira na kusintili mbati , " Dzedze , una dzedze , Mzinda ukulu . Kweneku nkhule kudatumisa onsene akukhala na miyadiya pabara kudzera muna mfumache ! Avungwa paora ibodzi ene basi ! "
66018020	Komerwani imwe kudzulu , thangwi ya kuvungika kwa mzindawu . Komerwani imwe anthu a Mulungu , anyakutumwa na maprofeti , thangwi Mulungu autchunyusa mzindawu thangwi ya pinthu pidakuchitanimbo iye !
66018021	Tenepo mngelo unango wamphamvu adathukula chimwala , kukulu kwache ninga libwe ikulu . Adaponya chimwala chile m'bara mbalonga mbati , " Uku ndiye kuponywa pansi kwamphamvu kunafuna dzachitwa Babulo , mzinda ukulu ule , mbukhonda dzaoneka pontho . 
66018022	Muna iwe nkhabe dzaveka pontho kuimba kwa anyakatangale , kuimba kwa anthu , anyakuimba pitoliro na anyakuliza ngoma tayu . Muna iwe nkhabe misiri waluso anafuna dzakhala mwenemo pontho tayu . Muna iwe nkhabe dzaveka pontho kupeya kwa malibwe tayu !
66018023	Cheza cha nyale nkhabe dzakumwinikira pontho tayu . Fala ya anyakukazhali nkhabe dzaveka pontho muna iwe tayu . Anyamalondako akhali anthu akuveka konsene kwene padziko yapansi , pontho ukhanyengeza anthu a madzinza onsene na matsengako ! "
66018024	Chiropa cha maprofeti , anthu akuchena a Mulungu , na anthu onsene adaphiwa padziko yapansi chidagumanwa mumzinda wenewu . 
66019001	Pidamala penepi ndidava kubuma kwa mwinji ukulu wa anthu kudzulu kulonga mbati , " Kuzani Mulungu ! Chipulumuso , demelero na mphamvu mphyache pya Mulungu wathu !
66019002	Kutonga kwache mseru nkhwakuonadi , pontho kwakulungama . Iye akonwesa puta wamkulu , ule adaipisa dziko yapansi na uputache . Mulungu amtchunyusa kubwezera chiropa cha anyabasache . "
66019003	Iwo adakhuwa pontho mbati , " Kuzani Mulungu ! Utsi wakupitswa kwa mzinda ule , ukhali tolotolo kwenda na kwenda ! "
66019004	Akuluakulu makumawiri na anayi pabodzi na pyakulengwa pyamoyo pinayi pile , adalamba mbapembedza Mulungu ule adakhala pampando wachifumu . Iwo adakhuwa mbati , " Ameni ! Kuzani Mulungu ! "
66019005	Tenepo fala idaveka kubulukira pampando wachifumu ule kulonga kuti , " Kuzani Mulungu wathu , imwe anyabasache monsene , na imwe anyakumgopa , akulu pabodzi na ang'ono ene ! "
66019006	Tenepo ndidava chinango chakuveka ninga mwinji ukulu wakukhala ninga kutitima kwa madzi pamatiti , pontho ninga kuguma kukulu kwa chiphaliwali mbukhuwa kuti , " Kuzani Mulungu ! Thangwi Mbuya Mulungu wathu Wamphamvu zonsene ndi Mfumu !
66019007	Tendeni tikomerwe na kusekera ; tendeni tikuze ukulu wache ! Thangwi kukazhali kwa Mwanabira kwafika . Nyakufuna iye kukazhali naye amala kale sasanyika . 
66019008	Mkaziyo apaswa nguwo zakuchena zakuyetima kuti avale . " Nguwo zakuchena zikuimirira mabasa akulungama a anthu a Mulungu . 
66019009	Tenepo mngelo adalonga kuna ine mbati , " Lemba ipi : Ngakutsanzaya ale achemerwa kuti adzadye nawo phwando ya kukazhali ya Mwanabira . " Iye adathimiza kulonga mbati , " Enewa ndi mafala akuonadi a Mulungu . " Penepa pokha ndidagwa pansi pamanyalo ache kumpembedza , mbwenye iye adalonga kuna ine mbati , " Leka chita tenepo ! Ine ndi nyabasa mwanzako wa iwe na abale ako , ale adakhulupira pyakuonadi pidatchulula Yesu pile . Pembedzani Mulungu ! Thangwi py akuonadi pidatchulula Yesu ndiye pimbapepesera maprofeti . "
66019010	
66019011	Tenepo ndidaona kudzulu kwakufunguka , mbandionako kavalo wakuchena . Nyakumpakira ambachemerwa Nyakukhulupirika pontho Nyakuonadi ; iye ambatonga mseru na kumenya nkhondo pakuphatisa basa chilungamo . 
66019012	Maso ache akhali ninga malulume a moto , mbavala pipewu pyachifumu pizinji . Pamanungo pache padalembwa dzina yokhonda dziwika kuna unango , mbwenye iye yekha ene basi . 
66019013	Mkanjo udavala iye udavikwa m'chiropa . Dzinache ndi Mafala a Mulungu . 
66019014	Anyankhondo a kudzulu akupakira akavalo akuchena uku avala nguwo zakuchena zakuyetima adamtewera . 
66019015	M'kanwa mwache mudabuluka talasada yakutwa ile inafuna iye dzakunda nayo madzinza . Anadzatonga na nthondodzo wachisimbi mbadzapondedza mphesa m'chakupswinyiramo vinyu wa ukali wakugoswa wa Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene . 
66019016	Pamkanjo wache na pantchafu pache padalembwa dzina yakuti , " Mfumu wa mafumu , na Mbuya wa ambuya . "
66019017	Tenepo ndidaona mngelo aimira padzuwa . Adakhuwa mwakugaluza fala mbapanga mbalame zonsene zakumbuluka m'dzulu mbati , " Gumanyikanani pabodzi kuti mudzadye phwando ikulu ya Mulungu !
66019018	Bwerani mudzadye manungo a mafumu , akadamu ankhondo , asirikali , nyama ya akavalo na manungo a anyakuapakira , pontho manungo a anthu onsene , mabitchu na atumbe , akulu na ang'ono ene ! "
66019019	Tenepo ndidaona chirombo na mafumu a dziko yapansi pabodzi na anyankhondo awo agumanyikana pabodzi kuti amenyane na ule adapakira kavalo wakuchena pabodzi na anyankhondo ache . 
66019020	Mbwenye chirombo chidamangwa uperezo pabodzi na maprofeti akunama ale adachita pyakudodomesa pamaso pache . Na pyakudodomesa adanyengeza napyo anthu ale adadindwa chidindo cha chirombo mbapembedza mfanikizo wa chirombocho . Chirombo chile pabodzi na maprofeti akunama adaponywa amoyo m'nyanza ya moto wa sulufule . 
66019021	Anyankhondo awo adaphiwa na talasada yakutwa yakubulukira m'kanwa mwa nyakupakira kavalo ule . Mbalame zonsene zidadya manungo awo ninga mukhafunira izo . 
66020001	Tenepo ndidaona mngelo akutchitha kubulukira kudzulu . M'manja mwache adaphatirira mfungulo wa Chiphompho chikulu na njema zakulemera . 
66020002	Adaphata nthonga , nyoka yakale ile dzinache ndi Nyakuipa , penu Satana , mbachimanga uperezo pyaka chikwi chibodzi . 
66020003	Iye adachiponya ku Chiphompho chikulu , adachifungira mbazwirimitha kuti chileke dzanyengeza madzinza pyaka chikwi chibodzi . Pyaka chikwi pingadzagwanda anadzasudzula pandzidzi wakufinimpha . 
66020004	Natenepo ndidaona mipando yachifumu , pontho anyakuikhalira adapaswa mphamvu zakutonga nazo mseru . Ndidaona pontho mizimu ya anthu ale adagwandwa msolo thangwi yakulalika pyakuonadi pidatchulula Yesu pile , pontho na thangwi ya kulalika mafala a Mulungu . Enewa hadapembedza chirombo , penu mfanikizo wache ule tayu , pontho adakhonda kudindwa chidindo chile papipumu penu m'manja mwawo . Adalamuka kuimfa mbatonga dziko pabodzi na Khristu pyaka chikwi chibodzi . 
66020005	Anyakufa anango onsene hadalamuke kuimfa tayu kufikirana pyaka chikwi chibodzi pile pidagwanda . Kweneku nkhulamuka kuimfa kwakutoma . 
66020006	Ngakutsanzaya , pontho ngakupambulika ale anadzalamuka na anthu pakulamuka kuimfa kwakutomaku . Imfa yachiwiri inadzakhala nkhabe mphamvu pana iwo tayu . Enewa anadzakhala anyansembe a Mulungu na Khristu , mbadzatonga pabodzi na iye pyaka chikwi chibodzi . 
66020007	Pyaka chikwi chibodzi pingadzamala , Satana anadzasudzulwa pauperezo wache
66020008	mbadzaenda kanyengeza madzinza a mphepo zonsene zinayi za dziko yapansi , madzinza enewa ndi Gogi na Magogi . Satana anadzaagumanyisa pabodzi pene onsene kwenda kamenya nkhondo . Anadzakhala akuinjipa ninga tchetcha ya pagombe ya bara . 
66020009	Iwo adamwazikana padziko yonsene yapansi mbazungulira msasa wa anthu a Mulungu na mzinda wapamtima pache . Mbwenye moto udatchitha kubulukira kudzulu mbuavunga . 
66020010	Tenepo Satana , nyakuanyengeza ule , adaponywa m'nyanza ya moto wa sulufule , kule kudaponywa kale chirombo pabodzi na mprofeti wakunama . Iwo anadzakhala akubonereswa mosiku na masikati kwenda na kwenda . 
66020011	Tenepo ndidaona mpando ukulu wakuchena wachifumu na nyakuukhalirache . Dziko yapansi na kudzulu idathawa pamaso pache mbaikhonda oneka pontho . 
66020012	Pontho ndidaona anthu akufa , akulu na ang'ono ene aimira patsogolo pampando wachifumu . Mabukhu adafungulwa , kubuluka penepo bukhu inango idafungulwambo , ikhali bukhu ya moyo . Anyakufa adatongwa mseru malingana na mabasa akhadaphata iwo ninga mudalemberwa iwo m'mabukhu mule . 
66020013	Tenepo bara idabulusa anyakufa mwenemo . Imfa na dziko ya anyakufa idabulusambo anyakufa akhakoya iwo . Tenepo onsene adatongwa mseru malingana na mabasa akhadaphata iwo . 
66020014	Tenepo imfa na dziko ya anyakufa pidaponywa m'nyanza ya moto . Nyanza ya motoyi ndi imfa yachiwiri . 
66020015	Onsene adakhonda lembwa madzinawo m'bukhu ya moyo adaponywa m'nyanza ya moto . 
66021001	Tenepo ndidaona kudzulu kwachinchino na dziko yapansi yachinchino . Kudzulu kwakale na dziko yapansi yakale pidamala , pontho bara pakhali nkhabepo . 
66021002	Ndidaona Mzinda Wakuchena , Yerusalemu wachinchino , akutchitha kubulukira kudzulu kuna Mulungu . Akhali wakusasanyika ninga mwali wakufuna kukazhali wakuvala mwadidi kuti akagumane na mamunache . 
66021003	Ndidava fala yakugaluza kubulukira kumpando wachifumu kulonga kuti , " Chinchino kumusa kwa Mulungu kuna anthu . Iye anadzakhala na iwo , iwombo anadzakhala anthu ache . Mulungu mwenechiro anadzakhala na iwo mbadzakhala Mulungu wawo . 
66021004	Iye anadzapukuta misozi m'maso mwawo . Nkhabe dzakhala pontho imfa , penu kutsukwala , penu kulira , penu kuva kupha tayu . Pinthu pyakale pyamala . "
66021005	Tenepo nyakukhala pampando wachifumu adalonga mbati , " Ndinasasanya pinthu py onsene kukhala pyachinchino . " Adalonga pontho kuna ine mbati , " Ulembe penepi thangwi mafala enewa ngakuonadi , pontho akunyindirika . "
66021006	Adalonga pontho mbati , " Pyamala ! Ndine Alefa pontho Omega , nyakutoma na nyakumalisa . Ule anava nyota ndinadzampasa mwakukhonda pagali madzi akubulukira m'mphuno za madzi akupasa moyo . 
66021007	Nyakukunda onsene ndinadzampasa penepi . Ine ndinadzakhala Mulungu wache , iyembo anadzakhala mwananga . 
66021008	Mbwenye anyamantha na anyakusowa chikhulupiro , anyakuchita pyakunyansa , mphandu , anyakuchita pyakuzuda , anyamatsenga , anyakupembedza mifanikizo , na anyakunama onsene , mbuto zawo ndi nyanza ya moto wa sulufule . Yeneyi ndi imfa yachiwiri . "
66021009	Mbodzi mwa angelo anomwe , ale akhaphatirira ndilo zinomwe zakudzala na miliri yakumalisa minomwe adadza kuna ine mbalonga mbati , " Bwera ndikuonese nyakufuna kukazhali na Mwanabira . "
66021010	Ndidagudumirwa na Mzimu Wakuchena , tenepo mngelo adandithukula mbandiendesa kuphiri ikulu pontho yakulapha . Adandionesa Yerusalemu , Mzinda Wakuchena , wakutchitha kubulukira kudzulu kuna Mulungu , 
66021011	mbuyetima na demelero ya Mulungu . Mzinda wenewu udayetima ninga mwala wakudula , ninga mwala wa yasipi , wakuoneka ninga mwala wa khulustali . 
66021012	Mzinda ule ukhali na mafufu makulumakulu pontho akulapha , pontho ukhali na misuwo khumi na miwiri . Anyakuonera misuwoyo akhali angelo khumi na awiri . Pamisuwopo padalembwa madzina a madzinza khumi na awiri a Alsraele . 
66021013	Makhundu onsene manayi akhali na misuwo mitatumitatu . Mitatu kumabulukiro dzuwa , mitatu kumpoto , mitatu kumwera , pontho mitatu kumadokero dzuwa . 
66021014	Mafufu a mzinda wenewu adamangwa pamiyala ya maziko khumi na miwiri yakuikhwa pansi . Pamiyala yeneyi padalembwa madzina khumi na awiri a anyakutumwa a Mwanabira . 
66021015	Mngelo adalonga na ine ule akhali na mdida wa nthondodzo wa golidi kuyesa nawo mzinda ule , mafufu na misuwo yache . 
66021016	Mzinda ukhali sasawa makhundu onsene ; umimba na ulaphi wache pikhali sasawa . Mngelo adauyesa mzindawu na mdida wache wa nthondodzo : ulaphi na umimbache na chengo chene pikhali makhono chikwi cha pikwi piwiri na madzana manayi . 
66021017	Mngelo ule adayesa pontho fufu . Chengo chache chikhali makhono makumi matanthatu , malingana na mdida ukhaphatisa iye basa . 
66021018	Mafufu adasasanywa na miyala yakuchemerwa yasipi . Mzinda udasasanywa na golidi chadichadi wakuonekera ninga gilazi . 
66021019	Miyala ya maziko a mafufu a mpanda pikhali pyakusasanywa na miyala yamtundu na mtundu yakudula . Mwala wa maziko akutoma ukhali yasipi , wachiwiri ukhali safira , wachitatu ukhali kalikedoni , wachinayi ukhali samarada , 
66021020	wachishanu ukhali saridoni , wachitanthatu ukhali kaneliani , wachinomwe ukhali kirisolito , wachisere ukhali berilo , wachifemba ukhali topasa , wachikhumi ukhali kirisoparasa , wachikhumi na chibodzi ukhali yakinthu , pontho wachikhumi na chiwiri ukhali amatisita . 
66021021	Misuwo khumi na miwiri ya mzinda ule idasasanywa na miyala khumi na miwiri ya usanga wakudula . Pamsuwo onsene mwala wa usanga ubodziubodzi . Msewu ukulu wa mumzinda mule ukhali wa golidi chadichadi ninga gilazi yaonekera uku na uku . 
66021022	Ine sidaone Nyumba ya Mulungu mumzinda mule tayu , thangwi Mbuya Mulungu Wamphamvu zonsene na Mwanabira ndiye Nyumba ya Mulungu . 
66021023	Mzinda wenewu nkhabe funika dzuwa penu mwezi tayu kuti aumwinikire thangwi demelero ya Mulungu ndiye imbaumwinikira , Mwanabira mbakhala nyale yache . 
66021024	Madzinza a padziko yapansi anadzafamba akumwinikirwa na cheza cha mzindawu . Mafumu a dziko yapansi anadzadza na mfuma zawo mumzindamu . 
66021025	Misuwo ya mzindawu inadzakhala yakufungulwa ndzidzi onsene ; nkhabeve dzafungwa thangwi nkhabe dzakhala mosiku tayu . 
66021026	Demelero na mfuma ya madzinza pinadzapitiswa mumzindamu . 
66021027	Mbwenye nkhabe chinthu chakuipa chinafuna dzapitiswa mumzindamu , penu munthu wakuchita pinthu pyakuchitisa manyadzo , penu kulonga pyakunama tayu . Mbwenye ale ene basi madzinawo adalembwa m'bukhu ya moyo ya Mwanabira ndiye anadzapita mumzindamo . 
66022001	Mngelo adandionesa pontho mkulo wa madzi akupasa moyo . Akhayetima ninga mwala wa khulustali , kukuka kubulukira pampando wachifumu wa Mulungu pontho wa Mwanabira . 
66022002	Ukhatchithira pakati na pakati pamsewu wa mumzinda mule . Makhundu onsene mawiri a mkulo ule akhali na muti wakupasa moyo . Muti wenewu ukhabala nsapo khumi na kawiri pachaka , kabodzi pamwezi . Masambache ngakuwangisa nawo madzinza . 
66022003	Nkhabe chibodzi chakutembererwa na Mulungu chinafuna dzagumanwa mumzindamu tayu . Mpando wachifumu wa Mulungu pontho wa Mwanabira unadzakhala mumzindamu , anyabasachembo anadzampembedza . 
66022004	Iwo anadzaona nkhope yache , pontho dzinache inadzalembwa papipumu pawo . 
66022005	Panadzakhala nkhabeve mosiku tayu , iwo mbadzakhonda funa nyale , penu cheza cha dzuwa , thangwi Mbuya Mulungu anadzakhala cheza chawo , pontho iwo anadzatonga ninga mafumu kwenda na kwenda . 
66022006	Tenepo mngelo adalonga kuna ine mbati , " Mafala enewa ngakuonadi , pontho anakwanisa kunyindirwa . Mbuya Mulungu ambapasa maprofeti Mzimu wache ule , atumiza mngelo wache kudzaonesa anyabasache pinthu pinafuna dzachitika chinchino pano . "
66022007	Yesu alonga mbati , " Ngavani ! Ndikudza chinchino pano ! Ngakutsanzaya ale ambavera mafala auprofeti a m'bukhumu ! "
66022008	Ine pano , Yohani , ndava na kupiona pinthu penepi . Pidamala ine kupiva na kupiona , ndidalamba pamaso pa mngelo adandionesa pinthu penepi ule . Ndikhali chifupi kumpembedza , 
66022009	mbwenye iye adandipanga mbati , " Leka chita penepi ! Ndine nyabasa mwanzako pontho wa abale ako maprofeti , pontho na ale onsene ambavera mafala a m'bukhu yeneyi . Pembedza Mulungu ! "
66022010	Tenepo adandipanga mbati , " Leka kubisa mafala auprofeti a m'bukhuyi , thangwi ndzidzi wakuti pinthu pyonsenepi pichitike uli chifupi . 
66022011	Nyakuchita pyakuipa mbachite pyache pyakuipapyo . Nyakunyansa mbakhale pyache wakunyansa . Nyakulungama mbathimize kukhala wakulungama . Nyakuchena mbathimize kukhala wakuchena . "
66022012	Yesu alonga mbati , " Ngavani ! Ndikudza chinchino pano ! Ndinadzabwera na mfupo yanga kudzapasa munthu mbodzimbodzi malingana na mabasa akhachita iye . 
66022013	Ndine Alefa na Omega , nyakutoma na nyakumalisa , kutoma na kumalisa . "
66022014	Ngakutsanzaya ale aflila mikanjo yawo , towera akhale na utongi kudya nsapo za muti wakupasa moyo mbapita mumzinda na pamsuwo . 
66022015	Mbwenye kunja kwa mzinda kuna anyakuchita pyaunambwa , anyamatsenga , anyakuchita pyakuzuda , mphandu , anyakupembedza mifanikizo na ale kunama nkhudya kwawo na pyakuchita pyawo pene . 
66022016	" Ine , Yesu , ndatuma mngelo wanga kudzachitira umboni pya pinthu penepi kuna imwe m'mipingo . Ndine chidzukulu cha dzinza ya Davite . Ine ndine nthanda . "
66022017	Mzimu Wakuchena na mwali wakufuna kukazhali alonga mbati , " Bwera ! " Onsene anapiva alongembo mbati , " Bwera ! " Mbadze anyakuva nyota ; anapifunayo atambire mwakukhonda pagali madzi akupasa moyo . 
66022018	Ine Yohani ndikucheuza onsene anava mafala auprofeti a m'bukhumu : unango angadzathimizira chinango pa mafala enewa , Mulungu anadzamthimizirambo miliri yalembwa m'bukhumu . 
66022019	Unango angadzabulusa chinthu pa mafala auprofeti m'bukhumu , Mulungu anadzambulusirambo khundu yache pamuti wakupasa moyo na ya Mzinda Wakuchena unalongwa m'bukhumu . 
66022020	Nyakuchitira umboni pyonsenepi alonga mbati , " Andedi ! Ndikudza chinchino pano ! " Pikhale tenepo . Idzani Mbuya Yesu !
66022021	Kukoma mtima kwa Mbuya Yesu kukhale na anthu onsene a Mulungu . ' Ameni .
